translation: {'yo': 'Títí di ìgbà tí ó máa fi kó ẹrù rẹ̀ lọ pátápátá, kí oníkálùkù ní ìtẹ́lọ̀rùn pẹ̀lú ohunkóhun tó bá rí jẹ.', 'en': 'Pending the time she would finally pack and go, everybody should be content with eating just anything.'}
{'yo': 'Ó mọ bí ó ṣe má a tọ́jú ara rẹ̀ àti Tinú.', 'en': 'She knew how best she was going to take care of herself and Tinu.'}
{'yo': 'Kí Àlàmú kọ́ bí ó ṣe máa tọ́jú ara rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Alamu Should learn to look after himself.'}
{'yo': 'Kí ìyá rẹ̀ má tún padà wá láti máa jágbe kí ó sì pòwe ìkà kankan.', 'en': 'His old Mama should not come back again and be given the chance to snap and make any further wicked insinuations.'}
{'yo': 'Báyìí, ó ti di kí olórí dorí ẹ̀ mú, kí oníkálùkù wà fún ra ara rẹ̀, Ọlọ́run wà fún gbogbo wa.', 'en': 'Now it was going to be everybody for himself, God for us all.'}

{'yo': '"Làbákẹ́ ń ṣe ìṣe ""òun ló mọ̀"" ọkàn rẹ̀ déédé gbé sókè láti kọ orin rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ohùn òkè, ohùn rẹ̀ dún bí i agogo."', 'en': '"Labake assumed a ""na him sabi"" posture and found herself suddenly in high spirits, she sang in high pitch, her voice rang like a bell."'}
{'yo': 'Ìrísí rẹ̀ fi inú dídùn rẹ̀ hàn.', 'en': 'Her countenance was gay.'}
{'yo': 'Ó sọ fún ara rẹ̀ pé òun kò ní ìṣòro kankan.', 'en': 'She told herself she had no problem.'}
{'yo': 'Kò ní nǹkankan láti dààmú fún.', 'en': 'Nothing to worry about.'}
{'yo': 'Kò sí obìnrin náà lórí ilẹ̀ ní gbogbo ayé tí inú rẹ̀ dún tó bí inú rẹ̀ ṣe dùn.', 'en': 'No woman on earth in the whole wide world was ever as happy as she was.'}
{'yo': 'Kí ló ṣe tí inú rẹ̀ kò ní dún?', 'en': 'Why should she not be happy?'}
{'yo': 'Ọjọ́ rẹ̀ ti níye nínú ilé Àlàmú.', 'en': "Her days were numbered in Alamu's house."}
{'yo': 'Ọjọ́ ìbànújẹ́ àti wàhálà rẹ̀ ti níye.', 'en': 'The days of sorrow and tribulations were numbered.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹjọ́ ìkọ̀sílẹ̀ ti wà lọ́nà, òun náà ti fẹ́rẹ̀ ẹ́ palẹ̀mọ́ àwọn nǹkan rẹ̀ tán.', 'en': "The divorce suit was well on the way, she'd almost finished packing her things."}

{'yo': 'Tinú ò sì fún un ní wàhálà kankan, ọmọbìnrin kékeré náà kúnfún ìyè, ẹ̀mí àlàáfìà tó péye ni Ọlọ́run fi jíǹkí òun fún ara rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Tinu gave her no problem, the little girl was full of life and spirit, she herself had been blessed with good health.'}
{'yo': 'Ládúrú ìnira tó wà nílẹ̀ ó sì rẹ̀wà síbẹ̀, ìdúró rẹ̀ dún síbẹ̀.', 'en': "In spite of the difficult period at home she'd maintained her pretty look, her elegant posture."}
{'yo': 'Kò sí ẹni tó má ri tá sọ pé obìnrin tó ní ìṣòro ni.', 'en': 'Nobody seeing her would ever think she was a woman with problems.'}

{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú ìrísí omidan tí ó ní lọ́wọ́ lọ́wọ́ yìí, ó lè padà sí England kí ó sì tún padà sí àyè oge síse ẹ̀.', 'en': 'With her present girlish shape and figure, she could go back to England and re-enter the glamorous world of fashion.'}
{'yo': 'Á kàn nílò láti tún ara rẹ̀ ṣe fún bí oṣù mẹ́ta sí mẹ́rin, á padà sípò.', 'en': 'She would need only three or four months tuning up and reconditioning her body, then catch up finally.'}
{'yo': 'Fún ìdí èyí, kò sí àbámọ̀, ó rẹ́rìn-ín tàríyá-tàríyá, ó palẹ̀mọ̀, ó jó.', 'en': 'So no regrets, she sang hilariously, she clapped her hands, she danced.'}

{'yo': 'Ohùn òkè rẹ̀ tínrín, ó sì ń gbọ̀n rìrì, ó jùdí sí ìlú àti orin inú afẹ́fẹ́ tí ó ń rò lọ́kàn, ó ka ìwọ̀n ẹsẹ̀ díẹ̀ síwájú-sẹ́yìn ó ń fò sókè tìdùnnú-tìdùnnú, ó tún sọ fún ara rẹ̀ léraléra pé obìnrin tí ó láyọ̀ ni òun, ó láyọ̀... l-á-y-ọ̀! láyọ̀... láyọ̀ gidi gan.', 'en': 'Her soprano voice was throated, and trembling, she wiggle her hips the imaginary rhythm of the brass and the wind instruments, she took measured steps forward backward and jumped up excitedly telling herself again and again that she was a happy woman, happy... h-a-p-p-y! happy... very happy.'}

{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ na ẹ̀yìn, ó sì ti àyà sí wájú, ó jupá láìsídìíwọ́, ó ń gbé ẹsẹ̀ sósì sọ́tùn-ún, sọ́tùn-ún sósì, ó ń làágùn!', 'en': 'Labake straightened her back and threw out her chest, arms swung freely, her feet marked time left, right, left right, she was sweating!'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n dúró ná ó ... kí gan-an ló ń sẹlẹ̀?', 'en': 'But wait... what really was happening?'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ dúró díẹ̀ láti bi ara rẹ̀ ní èyí.', 'en': 'Labake stopped briefly to ask herself.'}
{'yo': 'Ó sé èémí fún ìṣẹ́jú kan, ó ń wòye.', 'en': 'She held her breath minute, pondering.'}
{'yo': 'Kíni ìdí fún gbogbo àfihàn ìdùnnú àti ìyírí yìí?', 'en': 'Why all this show of excitement and intoxication?'}
{'yo': 'Ṣe òun ti ń ya wèrè? Ṣe òun náà ti ń ya wèrè ni?', 'en': 'Was she going mad? Was she going crazy too?'}
{'yo': '"""Rárá, Rárá o,"" ó dá ará rẹ̀ lóhùn ... Rárá."', 'en': '"""No, No,"" she answered herself... No."'}
{'yo': 'Àlàmú ló ń sínwín, kódà, Àlàmú ló tí ya wèrè.', 'en': 'It was Alamu going mad, it was Alamu who had infact, gone mad.'}
{'yo': 'Kìí ṣe òun ...kì í ṣe òun!', 'en': 'Not her ... Not her!'}
{'yo': 'Níwájú Ọlọ́run àti ènìyàn!', 'en': 'Before God and man!'}

{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ ná ọwọ́ rẹ̀ méjéèjì síwájú, ó sì jó pẹ̀lú ìtara sí ìlú àfinúrò orin náà.', 'en': 'Labake stretched forward her two arms and danced, more enthusiastically, to that imaginary rhythm of music.'}
{'yo': 'Kò sí ìṣòro fún un mọ́.', 'en': 'No more problem for her.'}

{'yo': 'Inú rẹ̀ dùn, ó dùn dáadáa. Ó bẹ́ wọ inú yàrá ìgbafẹ́ pẹ̀lú ìgbésẹ̀ ijó rẹ̀ tó lọ́pọ̀, ìsọwọ́jùdí rẹ̀ sàjèjì, ó ń rìn súnmọ́ jígí adádúró díẹ̀díẹ̀ níbi tí inú rẹ̀ ti tún bọ̀ dùn sí i.', 'en': 'She was happy, quite happy. She breezed into the sitting room with her clumsy dancing footsteps, her strange, intricate movement of the hips, slowly towards the standing mirror where she became even more excited'}

{'yo': 'Ó ju ọwọ́ rẹ̀ méjéèjì sínú afẹ́fẹ́ ó sì yípoyípo láìmọye ìgbà títí tí òyì fi kọ́ ọ.', 'en': 'She threw up her two hands into empty air and twisted her body round and round and round several times - until she became dizzy.'}
{'yo': 'Ó sì ṣubú sínú àga tí ó wà nítòsí, ó ń mí lókèlókè.', 'en': 'Then she slumped into the nearby chair, breathing heavily, perspiring profusely.'}

{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn èyí ni gbogbo ilé bẹ̀rẹ̀ ìrìnàjò àjò pàtàkì sínú òfurufú pẹ̀lú rẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí adáwakọ̀ òfurufú ...', 'en': 'Then the whole building started a momentary journey into space with her as its solitary astronaut...'}

{'yo': 'Kíni ìdí? Kíni ìdífún gbogbo èyí? Ó tún ara rẹ̀ bi. Kí ló ń sẹlẹ̀? Se orí tirẹ̀ náà o ti máa yí báyìí?', 'en': "Why? Why all these? She asked herself again. What's happening? Wasn't she really running out of her mind too?"}

{'yo': 'Sènábù mí kanlẹ̀ láti ẹ̀yìn ìlèkùn ilé ìkóunjẹpamọ́ sí níbi tí ó ti ń dúró wòran màdáámù rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Zenabu heaved a heavy sigh from behind the pantry door where she stood watching her madam.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ti gbọ́ àwọn orin àjèjì màdáámù, ó sì tún ti rí ijó abàmì rẹ̀ tí ò bálù mu.', 'en': "She had heard madam's strange songs and now she's seen her dance a strange, off-beat dance."}

{'yo': 'Bí ó ṣe wá ń gbìyànjú àti padà sínú ilé oúnjẹ láti má jẹ́ ki wọ́n rí i, ó sẹrí mọ́ ògiri, ó sì ṣísẹ̀ sórí àwọn abọ́ tí ó sẹ̀sẹ̀ kó wọ ilé oúnjẹ náà.', 'en': "As she tried to get back inside the pantry to avoid her attention, she knocked her head against the wall and tripped over the plates she'd just brought inside the pantry."}
{'yo': 'Nǹkankan máa ń wà nípa màdáámù báyìí tí ó ń lé Sènábù lára rẹ̀ ni gbogbo ìgbà.', 'en': 'There was something about madam now that was always pushing Zenabu away from her.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbàkúgbà tí ó ba rí i, nǹkankan máa ń sọ fún un pé kí ó sá lọ, tàbí kí ó sá pamọ́.', 'en': 'Each time she saw her something always told her to run away, or hide.'}
{'yo': 'Màdáámù ti ń kanra ganan lẹ́nu ọjọ́ mẹ́ta yìí.', 'en': 'Madam had been so aggressive in recent times.'}
{'yo': 'Kò fẹ́ jọ pé ó fẹ́ràn rẹ̀ mọ́ ìsọwọ́ wò ó àti bí ó se ń ba sọ̀rọ̀.', 'en': 'It did not appear that she liked her anymore - the way she now looked and talked to her.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbàkúgbà tí Màdáámù bá farahàn ní yàrá ìgbafẹ́, kíá ni Sènábù máa ń wábi gbà wọ ilé ìgbọ̀nsẹ̀ láti lọ sẹ̀yọ́!', 'en': "Each time madam showed up in the sitting room, therefore, Zenabu would find her way into the toilet to answer nature's call!"}
{'yo': 'Sùgbọ́n kò fẹ́ jọ pé ọgbọ́n yẹn máa ṣiṣẹ́ mọ́.', 'en': 'But, it did not seem as if that trick would work anymore.'}

{'yo': 'Nítorí àná alánàá ni màdáámù ṣì kígbe pé: Sènábù! Sènábù! Ibo ni èké kékeré yì wà?', 'en': 'Because only yesterday, madam cried out: Zenabu! Zenabu! Where is this mischievous little creature?'}
{'yo': 'Níbí Màdáámù! Níbí Màdáámù! Sènábù dáhùn.', 'en': 'Here madam! Here madam! Zenabu had answered.'}
{'yo': 'Nílé ìgbọ̀nsẹ̀, bí ó ṣe ń ṣe? Kí ni ó ń bá olòṣì kékeré yìí jà ná?', 'en': '"""Inside the toilet as usual? What the hell is wrong with this little wretch?"'}

{'yo': '"Gbogbo ìgbà ní ilé ìgbọ̀nsẹ̀ ""kò sí nǹkankan Màdààmú, èmi rè é màdààmú"" Sènábù dúró níwájú rẹ̀, ó ń wò pẹ̀lú ojú ẹ̀bẹ̀."', 'en': '"Always in the toilet \'Nothing madam! Here I am madam!"" Zenabu had stood before her, looking at her pleadingly."'}

{'yo': 'Ọwọ́ màdààmú ti yára gbá etí Sènábù kékeré mú ó sì sọ àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ ìríra sí i, ó gbò ó jìgìjìgì síbí sóhùn-ún.', 'en': "Madam's smart fingers caught Zenabis little ears, and as she uttered some obscenities shook her violently, pushing her hither and thither."}
{'yo': '"Ó pariwo, ""Wà á tó lọ, isẹ́ ẹ ti fẹ́rẹ̀ ẹ́ tán, ó dàbí i pé o ò mọ̀."', 'en': '"You will soon go away!\' she shouted, ""your job here is almost done, you don\'t seem to know."'}
{'yo': 'Láìpé, wọn á dá ẹ padà fún àwọn ènìyàn rẹ̀.', 'en': "Soon you'll be returned to your people."}
{'yo': 'Fúnmi lọ́jọ́ méjì sí mẹ́ta.', 'en': 'Give me just two or three days.'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ tú ọwọ́ rẹ̀, Sènábù sì subú, gbà!.', 'en': "Labake let go her hands and Zenabu's body hit the floor with a thump!"}
{'yo': 'Kò sẹ́nikẹ́ni nítòsí láti sọ gbogbo èyí fún.', 'en': 'There was nobody near to tell all these to.'}

{'yo': 'Ó wu Sènábù púpọ̀ láti rẹ́ni sọ ìrírí rẹ̀ fún - ẹni tó ṣe é fọkàn tán, ẹni tí yóò yé, tí yóò sì káàánú ẹ̀.', 'en': 'Zenabu, very much, longed for somebody to relate her experience to - a trusted person, one who would understand and pity her.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ wòye bí ayọ̀ rẹ̀ ṣe kún tó nígbẹ̀yìn gbẹ́yín tí màmá àgbà tún kan ìlẹ̀kùn ilé yẹn.', 'en': 'Imagine her joy when at last, old Mama again knocking at the door of the house.'}
{'yo': 'Tí ó tún bá òun nìkan nílé!', 'en': 'And her all alone in the house too!'}

{'yo': 'Màmá ò tíì jóòkó tàìjókòó ti ahọ́n Sènábù bẹ̀rẹ̀ si í gbòn bí i ti ìrù ajá tí ó ń mì tí ó bá rí olówó rẹ̀.', 'en': "Mama had barely taken her seat when Zenabu's tongue started to wag like the restless tail of a dog on seeing its owner."}
{'yo': 'Màdáámù ti ya wèrè! Sènábù kéde fún màmá àgbà.', 'en': 'Madam has gone mad! Zenabu announced to old Mama.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ti ya wèrè gan-an! Ó ti jọ ehànnà, bí ológbò-igbó.', 'en': 'Gone thoroughly mad! It is a great looks wild like the bush cat.'}

{'yo': 'Irun rẹ̀ tí ó ki bí i igbó yẹn ti dà wálẹ̀ sí èjìká rẹ̀, èyí sì ń jẹ́ kí jọ èṣù.', 'en': 'Her rough bushy hair has dropped carelessly over her neck, stretching to her shoulders making her look like a devil.'}
{'yo': 'Èékánná rẹ̀ ti wá gùn gan-an ó sì mú, à fi bí ti ẹnu ẹyẹ.', 'en': 'Her finger nails are now very long and sharp, like the beak of the kingfisher.'}

{'yo': 'Ọjọ́ kan ò lè kọjá kí màdáaḿù má ti èékánná yẹn bọ̀ ọ́ lẹ́rẹ̀kẹ́ kí ò sì fà á létí.', 'en': 'There was not a day madam would not deep her long nails inside her cheeks and pull her by the ears.'}
{'yo': 'Ó fi etí àti ẹ̀rẹ̀kẹ́ rẹ̀ wíwú han màmá.', 'en': 'She showed her blistered ears and swollen cheeks to Mama.'}

{'yo': 'Màdáámù á sì yá á sí wẹ́wẹ́ níjọ́ kan pẹ̀lú bí ó ṣe ń lọ yìí, pẹ̀lú èékánná gígùn rẹ̀ tí ó mú yẹn tàbí eyín irin rẹ̀ yẹn nítorí ó tí ya wèrè.', 'en': 'Madam would one day tear her to pieces, at the rate she was going, with those long, sharp nails of hers or with those snaggy iron teeth because she had become mad.'}

{'yo': 'Wèrè gidi, Sènábù jẹ́wọ́ pé ó ti sú òun, á sì wù òun láti padà sọ́dọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn rẹ̀ nílé.', 'en': 'Very mad, Zenabu confessed she was fed up, and would like to go back to her people at home.'}
{'yo': 'Màmá láyọ̀ ńlá bí ó ṣe ń tẹ́tí sí bí Sènábù ṣe ń sọ ìtàn rè.', 'en': 'Listening to Zenabu relate her story gave Mama great joy.'}
{'yo': 'Ó fi ọwọ́ lu ọmọ náà jẹ́jẹ́ lẹ́yìn, ó sì sọ fún un pé kí ó má ṣe dààmú.', 'en': 'She patted the little girl on the back and told her not to worry.'}
{'yo': 'Ohun gbogbo á dára níkeyìn ...', 'en': 'All would be well at last...'}
{'yo': 'Ó dára bí Làbákẹ́ ṣe ń yí lórí.', 'en': 'It was good Labake was running mad.'}
{'yo': 'Ohun tí wọn ń retí ni.', 'en': 'It was expected.'}
{'yo': 'Èyí kò sì jẹ́ ìyàlẹ́nu fún màmá.', 'en': 'Mama was not surprised.'}
{'yo': 'Èṣùníyì ti sọ fún un pé Làbákẹ́ á jẹ nínú ẹ̀fọ́ ìkà tí ó ti rò kí ó tó pẹ́.', 'en': 'Esuniyi had told her Labake would have a bitter taste of her own medicine before long.'}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, ó tí wá ń sẹlẹ̀, nǹkan tí ó ju èyí á tó máa sẹlẹ̀.', 'en': 'And now, it has started to happen, greater things were soon going to happen.'}
{'yo': 'Irun-orí àti èékánná Làbákẹ́ ni màmá wá gbà ní ìgboro.', 'en': "Mama was in town to collect some of Labake's hair and her fingernails."}
{'yo': 'Èṣùníyì fẹ́ lò ó láti fi túnbọ̀ ba ti Làbákẹ́ jẹ́.', 'en': "Esuniyi needed them for further action so that Labake's final doom might be sealed."}

{'yo': 'Kò ní láti ya ẹnikẹ́ni lẹ́nu lẹ́yìn èyí láti rí Làbákẹ́ lẹ́yìn ọ̀sẹ̀ kan tàbí méjì ní àwọn òpópónà kí ó sì dúró sí gbàgede ọjà níbi tí àwọn ènìyàn tí wọn wá ṣe kárà-kátà á tí rí ìran pípé wò.', 'en': 'It should not surprise anybody, therefore, to see Labake - probably next week or week after - run out to the streets and pitch her home in the market square under the full glare of people who had come to buy and sell.'}
{'yo': 'Èṣùníyì ti sọ ọ́, màmá sì mọ́ pé bí ó ṣe máa sẹlẹ̀ gan-an nìyẹn.', 'en': 'Esuniyi had said it and Mama knew that was exactly what would happen.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbẹ̀yìn gbẹ́yín, Làbákẹ́ á fí orúnkún rẹ̀ ráwọ ọgbà Èsúńiyì pẹ̀lụ́ ìronúpíwàdà.', 'en': "Finally, Labake would crawl on her knees, in penitence to Esuniyi's lunatic asylum."}
{'yo': 'Ní ti Àlàmú, Èṣùníyì ti sọ fún màmá pé kò séwu lóko mọ́.', 'en': 'In the case of Alamu, Esuniyi had told Mama there was no cause for alarm anymore.'}
{'yo': 'Ipò tí Àlàmú wà á máa yàtọ̀ sí dáadáa láti ìsínyì lọ.', 'en': "Alamu's condition would start improving henceforth."}
{'yo': 'Inú màmá dùn, gbogbo nǹkan ti Èṣùníyì sọ fún ló ti ń wá sí ì músẹ.', 'en': 'Mama was happy, all what Esuniyi told her had started to come to pass.'}
{'yo': 'Àlàmú padà délé, ó sì bá ìyá rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ìrísí tó fi inú dídùn hàn.', 'en': 'Alamu returned home and met his mother with a gay countenance.'}
{'yo': 'Ó kí ìyá náà pẹ́lù ẹ̀rín músẹ́ lẹ́nu ní ìdọ́bálè.', 'en': 'He greeted the old woman smiling prostrating.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ń ti ibi isẹ́ kan pàtàkì nígboro bọ̀, èyí ti àyọrísí rẹ̀ mú un dárayá.', 'en': 'He was returning from an important mission to town, the outcome of which greatly cheered his spirit.'}
{'yo': 'Fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ nínú oṣù mẹ́sàn-án, Àlàmú mí ìmí ìtura.', 'en': 'For the first time in nine months, Alamu heaved a sigh of relief.'}

{'yo': 'Fún odidi oṣù mẹ́sàn-án gbáko ní ó ti yí ara rẹ̀ ká pẹ̀lú àdììtú kan tí ó rú gbogbo ènìyàn lójú; àsírí kan tí kò ṣe é ṣe fún ẹnikẹ́ni láti tú - yàtọ̀ sí ọkùnrin kan tí ó súnmọ́ ọn pẹ́kípẹ́kí - Àdìó ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ̀ kanṣoṣo.', 'en': 'For nine whole months, he had surrounded himself with a mystery that had continued to baffle everybody; a secret that had proved impossible for anybody to decipher - except for that one man who was so dear to him - Adio his only friend.'}
{'yo': 'Níbáyìí, òpin àdììtú yẹn ti wà nítòsí.', 'en': 'Now the end of that mystery was in sight.'}
{'yo': 'Òpin sí dàrúdápò ọpọlọ àti ìrora rẹ̀ ti súnmo itòsí.', 'en': 'The end of his mental and physical agony was in view, the end of his madness was at hand.'}

{'yo': 'Wọn tí sọ fún un pé kí ó dúró fún ọ̀sẹ̀ méjì sí i tí gbogbo ìṣòrorẹ̀ á fi yanjú pátápátá.', 'en': 'He had been told to wait for only two more weeks when all his problems would be practically solved.'}
{'yo': 'Àlàmú kò gbà etí rẹ̀ gbọ́.', 'en': "Alamu couldn't believe his ears."}
{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú ìwànwara ní ó fi ń ka àwọn ọjọ́, ení, èjì, ẹ̀ta, ẹ̀rin, àrún, ẹ̀wá, mẹ́ẹ̀dógún ...', 'en': 'Eagerly, he counted the days one, two, five, ten, fifteen...'}
{'yo': 'Ọjọ́ mẹ́ẹ̀dógún sí i! Ó ń ka wákàtí! ìsẹ́jú!', 'en': 'Fifteen more days! He counted the hours! The minutes!'}
{'yo': 'Ó jẹ́ ìyàlenu fún Àdìó bí Àlàmú ṣe ń ṣe àfihàn ìrusókè ìdùnnú rẹ̀.', 'en': "Adio was amused at Alamu's show of thrill and excitement."}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀, ọ̀sẹ̀ méjì sì ni wọ́n sọ, ìdájọ́ á sì wáyé?', 'en': 'Well, two weeks more they say and judgment would be delivered?'}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹn kéré púpọ̀ níye sí oṣù mẹ́sàn-án tí ó ti fi ń dúró.', 'en': "That was too short a time compared with the nine months that he'd been waiting."}
{'yo': 'Ṣé yóò sunkún ni, tàbí yóò rẹ́rìn-ín músẹ́ lẹ́yìn ọ̀sẹ̀ méjì?', 'en': 'Was he going to cry or was he going to smile after a fortnight?'}
{'yo': 'Wọn tisọ fún un pé á rẹ́rìn-ín músẹ́.', 'en': "He'd been told he would smile."}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo nǹkan ló sì tọ́ka sí i dájúdájú pé yóò rẹ́rìn -ín músẹ́.', 'en': 'Everything pointed to the fact that he would smile.'}

{'yo': 'Fún ìdí èyí, ó tó kí ó kúkú bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí i rẹ́rìn- ín músẹ́ láti ìsìnyí nínú ìrètí áti ìgbàgbọ́ pé gbogbo nǹkan a sìse fún rere.', 'en': 'So, it was just proper that he should start smiling from now on, in hope and optimism.'}
{'yo': 'Ìdí nìyí tí ó fi fi ẹ̀rín músẹ́ tó rí yan-ran yan-ran kọ mọ̀nà pàdé ìyá rẹ̀...', 'en': 'That was why he now met his old mother with a dazzling natural smile...'}
{'yo': 'Màmá ń wo ọmọ rẹ̀, ọkàn rẹ̀ sì kọrin fáyọ̀.', 'en': 'Mama watched her son, and her heart sang for joy.'}

{'yo': 'Ọmọ rẹ̀ wa rè é tó ń rẹ́rìn-ín músẹ́ sí i tí ó sì ń fèsì bí ó ṣetọ́ sí ìbéèrè àti àsọgbà ọ̀rọ̀ wọn.', 'en': 'Here was her son now smiling at her and responding normally to questions and discussions.'}

{'yo': 'Kílótún kù, Àlàmú fi tọ̀wọ̀tọ̀wọ̀ tọrọ ìyọ̀ǹda lọ́wọ́ ìyá rẹ̀ pé òun ṣì tún ní àwọn nǹkan mìíràn láti ṣe ní ìgboro. Fún ìdí èyí ó fẹ́ padà jáde ṣùgbọ́n kò níí pẹ́.', 'en': 'What was more, Alamu politically took permission from his mother that he had other things doing in town again. He would, therefore, be going back but would not be long.'}

{'yo': 'Ọmọ rẹ̀ ti wá ńi ìbuyì fún un, láti gbà ààyè! Apá kìíní iṣ́e náà ti parí! Á dáa fún Èṣùníyì.', 'en': 'Her son now had the courtesy to take permission! The first part of the job had been accomplished! God bless Esuniyi.'}
{'yo': 'Màmá dúró pẹ̀lú sùúrù pé kí Làbákẹ́ dé.', 'en': 'Mama waited patiently for Labake to return.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí ó sì rí i tí ó ń bọ̀ lọ́ọ̀ọ́kán, ó tètè tú apẹ̀rẹ̀ tí ó gbé wá láti ìgbèríko, ó sì mú ìgò kékeré tí ó tọ́jú òògùn babaláwo rẹ̀ sí.', 'en': "And when she saw her approaching from a distance, she quickly rummaged through the basket she brought from the district and took out a small bottle inside which she kept the herbalist's concoction."}
{'yo': 'Èṣùníyì ti sọ bí ó ṣe máa lò ó fún un.', 'en': "She'd been properly briefed by Esunivi on how she would apply it."}

{'yo': 'Nísìnyí, ó ta gbọ̀n-ọ́n gbọ̀n-ọ́n sẹ́nu ọ̀nà yàrá Làbáké, ó sì wọn òògùn náà sílẹ̀ sórí ìlà tẹ́ẹ́rẹ́ kan.', 'en': "So, now, she staggered towards the doorstep of Labake's room and sprinkled the concoction, in a straight line."}

{'yo': 'Ó se pàtàkì kí Làbákẹ́ dá a kọjá bí ó bá ti ń wọ yàrá rẹ̀ kí tiẹ̀ lè túbọ̀ bá a ní tọkàn-tarà.', 'en': 'It was important that Labake should walk across it as she entered her so that she might be more violently possessed both mind and body.'}

{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn tí ó bá ti wọn òògùn náà tán, Màmá yípo yípo lẹ́ẹ̀marùn-ún gẹ́gẹ́bí babaláwo rẹ̀ ṣe la kalẹ̀.', 'en': "After sprinkling the preparation, Mama turned round and round five times according to the herbalist's instructions."}

{'yo': 'Bí ó ṣe wà lórí ẹ̀ẹ̀kẹ́rin, Làbákẹ́ wọlé, ó ń wo ìyá àgbà náà, pẹ̀lú ẹnu rẹ̀ ní lílà sílẹ̀.', 'en': 'But as she was starting on the fourth round, Labake entered, watching the old woman, mouth agape.'}

{'yo': 'Màmá dúró fún ìgbà díẹ̀, kanrí mọ́lẹ̀ ní èsì kíkí Làbákẹ́ ó sì fẹ̀yìntì ògiri tí ó kọjú sí ògiri yàrá Làbákẹ́, ó ń sọ àwọn ìpèdé tí wọn ní kó pè tí ó bá ti fojú gán-án-ni Làbákẹ́ sí ara rẹ̀ láìmoye ìgbà.', 'en': "Mama stood for a while, nodded in reply to Labake's greetings and then leaned against the wall facing Labake's room, muttering to herself, several times, the short incantatory sentence she'd been asked to recite on first seeing Labake."}
{'yo': 'Ní òpin gbogbo rẹ̀, màmá bú sẹ́rìn-ín.', 'en': 'At the end of it all, Mama laughed.'}
{'yo': 'Ìrísí Làbákẹ́ jọ ti ẹhànnà gidi, ó tiẹ̀ tún banilẹ́rù ju bí Sènábù ti ṣàpèjúwe rẹ̀.', 'en': "Labake's appearance was indeed wild, it was even more terrible than Zenabu had described it."}

{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ ti wá ya wèrè gidi báyìí - bí ó ṣe rí, ó dàbí i ewèlè tí ó wá láti inú ihò àpáta tí ó ti ṣetán ìjà!', 'en': 'Labake had really gone mad now - the way she looked like some dreadful monster from inside an old cave poised for rampage!'}
{'yo': 'Irun rẹ̀ tí ó dàbí i igbó dà wálẹ̀ sọ́rùn àti èjìká rẹ̀, ó sì bo apá ibìkan lójú rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Her bushy hair dangled over her neck and shoulders and hid part of her face.'}
{'yo': 'Irun yẹn ... bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, ọ̀kan lára àwọn nǹkan ti ìyá wá wá rè é.', 'en': "The hair... yes, that was one of the items she'd come for."}

{'yo': 'Kí ó tó máa lọ sí ìgbéríko ní ìrọ̀lẹ́, ó gbọ́dò rí i pé ó rí èyí tó tó wọ̀n nínú irun náà gé kí ó sì tọ́jú rẹ̀ sínú apẹ̀rẹ̀ rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Before leaving for the district later in the day, she had to ensure that a sizeable lock of that hair was cut and kept away inside her basket.'}
{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn náà ní èékáná gígùn ọwọ́ Làbákẹ́, èékán gígùn pupa rè.', 'en': "Then, Labake's long finger nails, her red, long nails."}
{'yo': 'Ìyen tún ní nǹkan tí ó wá mú.', 'en': "That was one other item she'd come to fetch."}
{'yo': 'Ojú màmá ń wo láti irun orí Làbákẹ́ dúdú dé èékaná pupa rẹ̀ fún ìgbà díẹ̀.', 'en': "Mama's eyes roamed from Labake's black hair to her red nails for some time."}
{'yo': 'Nígbẹ̀yìn, ó wo Làbákẹ́ tààrà ó sì ní;', 'en': 'Finally she looked Labake straight in the face and said;'}
{'yo': '"""Ẹm Ẹm Ẹm!,"" ó kọ́kọ́ tún ọ̀nà òfun rẹ̀ ṣe. ""Ẹm....Ìwọ. Ìwọ sì wá níbí?"""', 'en': '"""Hem... Hem... Hem!"" she cleared her throat, ""Hem... You. You are still here?"""'}
{'yo': '"Làbákẹ́ fi ojú paárẹ́ ó sì rìn lọ sí ọ̀nà yàrá rẹ̀. ""Kí lo tún ń dúró ńbí fún?"""', 'en': '"Labake ignored her and walked towards her room. ""What else are you staying here for?"""'}
{'yo': '"""Ṣé èmi?,"" Làbákẹ́ bèèrè."', 'en': '"""Me?,"" Labake asked."'}

{'yo': 'Ó wọ yàrá rẹ̀ lọ ní dídá ibòdè màmá kọjá! Ó kó sínú páńpẹ́ màmá! Páńpẹ́ babaláwo!', 'en': "She entered her room crossing Mama's border! Falling into Mama's laid down trap! The herbalist's trap!"}

{'yo': '"Ní ìṣẹ́jú kan, ó kù gìrì jáde láti inú yàrá rẹ̀, ó dójúkọ màmá pẹ̀lú ìwò tí ó lè pànìyàn lójú rẹ̀. ""Mo ti ń gbọ́ báyìí!"""', 'en': '"And in a minute, she rushed out of her room again and confronted Mama, wearing a murderous look. ""I am now listening!"""'}
{'yo': '"Ó wo o. ""Kí ni ó ń sọ, ìyá àgbà?"""', 'en': '"""She glared. What are you saying, old woman? """'}
{'yo': '"""Bi mí ní kí ni, ìyá àgbà?"""', 'en': '"""Asking me what, old woman!"""'}
{'yo': '"""Bóyá o ò ..."""', 'en': '"""Whether you are ..."""'}
{'yo': '"""Bóyá o ò se kí ni, ìyá àgbà!"""', 'en': '"""Whether you are what, old woman!"""'}

{'yo': '"""Lọ ibo, ìyá àgbà!,"" Làbákẹ́ ti súnmọ́ màmá báyìí, tí ó sì ń na èékáná pupa gígùn rẹ̀ tìhàlè-tìhàlè."', 'en': '"""Gone where, old woman! ,"" Labake had moved closer to Mama now, pointing her long red finger nails threateningly."'}
{'yo': '"""Ṣe o fẹ́ nà mí ni?"""', 'en': '"""You want to beat me?"""'}
{'yo': 'Wò ó ìyá! Àtẹ́lẹwọ́ ń yún mi, ó ń ṣe mí bí kí n gbá ojú àjẹ́ àgbà kan!', 'en': 'Look old woman! My palms are itching to slap the face of an old witch!'}

{'yo': 'Ṣé o rí bí ìka ọwọ́ mi ṣe ń sún yìí, ó ń sé wọn bí i kí wọ́n fa ẹyin ojú àjẹ́ méjéèjì yọ láti inú àkò.', 'en': 'See my fingernails moving and moving, anxious now to pluck out the eyes of the hag from their sockets.'}
{'yo': '"""Èmi! Èmi, Làbákẹ́?"""', 'en': '"""Me! Me, Labake?"""'}
{'yo': '"""Mo ń ní àìbalè nínú ẹnu mi! Mo fẹ dánbí ẹyín ẹnu mi ṣe mú tó wò!"', 'en': 'I feel a tingling sensation inside my mouth! I want to test the sharpness of my teeth!'}
{'yo': '"Nípa rírì wọ́n bọ inú àwọ̀ híhunjo àgbàyà kan"""', 'en': 'Dipping them inside the wrinkled pallor of an old hag!'}
{'yo': '"""Tani? Ìwọ àgbàyà yìí ni! Ìwọ lo ya wèrè!"""', 'en': '"""Who? It is you old hag! You that is mad! """'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ni, wèrè! Ó wò yípo yípo bí i ẹni tí gìrì wárápá gbé.', 'en': '"""Yes, mad! You turned round and round like one in the grip of an epileptic fit."'}
{'yo': 'Ó lẹ̀ mọ́ ògiri bí ajá gbígbó tó rẹ̀.', 'en': 'You leaned against the wall like a tired old dog!'}

{'yo': 'Ó ń sọ̀rọ̀ kẹ́lẹ́ kẹ́lẹ́ bí ewúrẹ́ alágbàtó tí ó ń jẹ́ àpọje lẹ́nu! Wèrè! Wèrè! Wèrè ni mo sọ! Kí tún ni ẹ bí kò ṣe wèrè lobìnrin!', 'en': 'You whispered like the nanny goat chewing the cud! Mad! Mad! I Say Mad! What else are you but a mad woman!'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ dúró, ó ń mí lókèlókè lé màmá.', 'en': 'Labake stood breathing heavily on Mama.'}

{'yo': 'Bí màmá bá sọ gbólóhùn kan sí i, bó bá sọ ẹyọ ọ̀rọ̀ kan, Làbákẹ́ ò bá ti bò ìyá àgbà náà, á sì rán an lọ sí sàréè láìtó ọjọ́.', 'en': 'A sentence more from Mama even a word more, and Labake would have hauled herself on the old woman and sent her grave before the appointed time.'}
{'yo': 'Màmá rẹ́rìn-ín músẹ́, ó sì fi ọgbọ́n ẹ̀wẹ́ jáwọ́.', 'en': 'Mama smiled, and tactfully withdrew.'}
{'yo': 'Kò bínú, kò bínú rárá.', 'en': 'She was not annoyed, not annoyed at all.'}
{'yo': 'Òògùn ló ń sisẹ́ lára Làbákẹ́.', 'en': 'Labake was already under a spell.'}

{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ ti gbẹ́ kòtò ara rẹ̀ nísìnyí tí ó ti dá ìlà òògùn kọjá lẹnú ọ̀nà yàrá rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Labake had literally dug her own grave now that she had crossed the concoction line across the doorstep of her own room.'}

{'yo': 'Ohun tí ó kàn kù fún un ní kí ó gbé Làbákẹ́ sínú pósí, kí ó kàn án pa, kí ó sì sín-in sínú ilẹ̀ tí ó gbẹ́.', 'en': 'What remained for her to do was to literally put Labake inside the prepared coffin, nail the coffin, and bury it inside the deep earth.'}
{'yo': 'Màmá yọwó, ó sì gbà Làbákẹ́ láàyè láti tẹ̀síwájú láti máa sọ̀rọ̀ fitafita pẹ̀lú ìrunú.', 'en': 'Mama withdrew and allowed Labake to continue raving and raging.'}

{'yo': 'Láti ìsínyì lọ, sọ́gbá ẹ àgbàyà! Yé é na imú híhunjo rẹ̀ yẹn! Ó tí gbélé ayé kọjá ìwúlò rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Mind your own business henceforth, old hag! Stop poking your wrinkled nose! You have outlived your usefulness.'}

{'yo': 'Fi mí sílẹ̀ àjẹ́ àgbàyà! Fi mí lọ́rùn sílẹ̀! Padà lọ sí ìgbéríko láti lọ ṣe àdúrà ìkẹyìn rẹ̀ lórí ilẹ̀ eèpè.', 'en': 'Leave me old witch! Leave me alone! Go back to the district to say your last prayers on earth.'}
{'yo': 'Àsìkò rẹ̀ tíẹ titó, sáré rẹ̀ sí tì wà nílẹ̀.', 'en': 'Your time is up already and your grave is ready.'}
{'yo': 'Má wà sí ìgboro mọ́ láé.', 'en': 'Never come to town again.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣóogbọ́ bẹ́ yẹn àjẹ́!', 'en': 'You hear that hag!'}
{'yo': 'Màmá ò fèsì ọ̀rọ̀ kan, kàkà bẹ́ẹ̀ ń ṣe ló ń rẹ́rìn-ín músẹ́, ó mọ̀ ohun tó ń sẹlẹ̀.', 'en': 'Mama did not utter a word in reply, rather she was smiling, she knew what was happening.'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ ti ya wèrè báyìí.', 'en': 'Labake was mad now.'}

{'yo': 'Wèrè sán-ún sán-ún. Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Èṣùníyì ṣe sọ fún, ìdí èyí kò ní èsì kankan, láìpẹ́, Làbákẹ́ á kẹ́rù lọ sí ilé rẹ̀ tuntun ní gbàgede ọjà. Fún ìdí èyí, kí idán ìbínú sọ̀rọ̀ náà tẹ̀síwájú: Tẹ̀síwájú!', 'en': 'Thoroughly mad. Just as Esuniyi had said, so she would not give a single reply, very soon, Labake would pack to her new home in the market square. So, let the tirade continue: Go on!'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, kò tẹ̀síwájú! Ṣe ó ti rẹ̀ é ní?', 'en': 'Yes, go on! Are you tired?'}
{'yo': 'Kò tí ì yẹ kí ó rẹ̀ ẹ́! Ó gbọ́dọ̀ jẹ́ kí ó tẹ̀síwájú lọ́nàkonà!', 'en': "You couldn't be tired yet! Let the tirade continue by all means!"}

{'yo': 'Ìdákẹ́rọ́rọ́ wà lẹ́yìn ìsẹ́jú márùn-ún, màmá sẹ́jú sí Sènábù; kẹ́lẹ́kẹ́lẹ́ náà ní ọmọbìnrin kékeré náà kanrí mọ́lẹ̀ padà.', 'en': 'After some five minutes, there was quiet Mama winked at Zenabu; silently and knowingly, the little girl nodded her head back.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ti mọwọ́ màmá tó bẹ́ẹ̀ tí ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ ti wá rọrùn láàrin wọn.', 'en': 'She had grown so much used to Mama now that communication between them had become quite easy.'}

{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn tí ó ti dá ara rẹ̀ láàmú, tí ó ti gbé ẹ̀mí ara rẹ̀ gbóná Làbákẹ́ gbọ̀nà balùwẹ̀ lọ láti sanra pẹ̀lú omi tútù, ní kíá sì ni Sènábù bẹ̀rẹ̀ isẹ́', 'en': 'Labake, after working herself up, setting her own body ablaze went inside the bathroom to have a cold shower and swiftly, Zenabu moved into action.'}

{'yo': 'Kì í ṣe àjèjì sí yàrá màdáámù, gbogbo ibi kọ́lọ́fín àti ikòrògún yàrá náà ni ó mọ̀.', 'en': "She was not a stranger to madam's bedroom, she knew all the nooks and corners of things included in the room."}
{'yo': 'Ó mọ gbogbo ibi tí màdáámù ń tọ́jú àwọn nǹkan ẹ̀ sí títí mọ́ àwọn nǹkan àṣírí rẹ̀.', 'en': 'She knew where madam kept all her most private of all her possessions.'}

{'yo': 'Nìsínyí tí màdáámù ti fẹ́rẹ̀ ẹ́ kó ẹrù rẹ̀ tán, ó rọrùn fún un láti rí àwọn nǹkan méjì tí ó wà. Láàrin ìsẹ́jú mẹ́ta, ó tí parí isẹ́ tí wọn gbé fún un ó sì jáde láti inú yàrá màdáámù, tí ó sì di nǹkan méjéèjì mọ́wọ́, ó fi bébà àtijọ́ kan wé e, tí ó sì rí tónítóní, ó sì ń rẹ́rìn-ín músẹ́ sí màmá.', 'en': "And now that madam had neatly packed, it was all the more easy for Zenabu to locate the two items she was looking for. Under three minutes, she had finished the assignment and she came out of madam's room clutching the two items, neatly wrapped up inside an old paper, and smiling at Mama."}
{'yo': 'Màmá gbà á ó sì tètè fi sínú apẹ̀rẹ̀ rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Mama got the piece of paper and quickly tucked it away inside her basket.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbà ti màdáámù jáde láti inú balùwè, ohun tí ó rí nípé Sènábù kékeré ń bá Tinú seré lẹ́nu ọ̀nà, màmá sì ń dágbére fún Àlàmú tó sẹ̀sẹ̀ ń wọlé dé, tí wọn sí ń ṣe ìlérí láti wá wò ó kí ó to di òpin ọ̀ṣẹ̀ náà.', 'en': 'When finally Labake emerged from inside the bathroom, what she saw was little Zenabu playing with Tinu on the corridor, and Mama bidding Alamu who had just come in goodbye promising to check back on him before the end of that week.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn nǹkan méjì náà wà ní ìpamó nínú apẹ̀rẹ̀ rẹ̀.', 'en': 'The two items were secure inside her basket.'}

{'yo': 'Màmá ti jí àwọn nǹkan náà wò nínú apẹ̀rẹ̀ rẹ̀, ó sì tẹ ẹ lọ́rùn; mẹ́rin nínú èékánná pupa ọwọ́ Làbákẹ́ tí ó fi nawọ sí i láìpẹ́ yìí, tí ó yọ nígbà tí ó wọ yàrá.', 'en': "Mama had stolen a look at the two items herself, and had been very much pleased: four of Labake's long red nails which she pointed at her a short while ago and which she had removed as she Chtered the room."}

{'yo': 'Èékán-ná ayédèrú! Àti díẹ̀ nínú irun Làbákẹ́ tí ò dà wálẹ̀ sára rẹ̀ láìpẹ́ yìí tí ó yọ nígbà tí ó fẹ́ wọ balùwẹ̀, ayédèrú irun rẹ̀!', 'en': 'Her false nails! Then Labakes Small lock of hair, which some minutes ago had boen dangling over her body and which she had removed as she prepared to go to the bathroom, her wig!'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn nǹkan méjì yìí ti wà nílẹ̀ fún Èṣùníyì.', 'en': 'These two items now for Esubiyi!'}

{'yo': 'Àsìkò náà ti súnmọ́, ti Làbákẹ́ á sáré jáde nínú ilé níhòòhò wọ òpópónà: ìgbà tí ó máa ṣo gbàgede ọjà di ilé, ìgbàtí á rákò lórí orúnkún rẹ̀ wọ ọgbà Èṣùníyì tí ó wà ní agbèègbè ìyàsọ́tọ̀ nínú igbó ìgbèriko.', 'en': "The time was near, when Labake would run of the house into the streets naked: when she would pitch her home at the market square, when she would crawl on her knees to Esuniyi's camp in the isolated area of the forest in the district!"}

{'yo': 'Gbogbo ìyẹn ló yọ́risí ìdánmọ́rántó hàn lójú màmá bí ó ṣe ń ròyìn ìtàn àseyọrí ìrìnàjò rẹ̀ sí ìgboro fún Èṣùníyì.', 'en': "So far so good, that about summed up the radiance on Mama's face as she related the story of her successful visit to town to Esuniyi."}

{'yo': 'Ipò Àlàmú ti yàtọ̀, kò ní i kan àbùkù orí fífọ́ mọ́. Kò ní jiyà ìrẹnisílẹ̀ tí wọn á ti jù ú sí yàrádúdú ilé ẁer̀e pẹ̀lú àwọn ògidì asínwín tí won máa ń han tí won tún ń pariwo gẹ́gẹ́ bí alágbàágbé.', 'en': "Alamu's condition had improved, Alamu would not suffer the indignity of having his head shaved. He would not suffer the humiliation of being thrown inside the dark room of the mad house with those eccentric inmates velling and hooting."}

{'yo': '"""Wàhálà ni mo sì i ń ri yìí,"" màmá gbọ́ ti Èṣùníyì sọ èyí ""Ìjọ̀ngbọ̀n ó tí ì parí pátápátá."', 'en': '"I can still see trouble,\' Mama heard Esuniyi say, ""Trouble is not yet over completely."""'}

{'yo': 'Ní wọ̀n ìgbà tí aṣojú àwọn ọ̀tá bá sì wà nínú ilé pẹ̀lú ọmọ rẹ̀, ohunkohun ló sì le sẹlẹ̀.', 'en': '"As long as the enemies agent remains with your son at home, anything could still happen."""'}
{'yo': '"Màmá wò Èṣùníyì, ""Kí la wá fẹ́ ṣe pẹ̀lú Làbákẹ́ báyìí?."""', 'en': '"Mama looked at Esuniyi, ""what shall we do now with Labake?"""'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ ẹni ègún.', 'en': 'Accursed Labake.'}
{'yo': 'Aṣojú àwọn ọ̀tá.', 'en': "The enemies' agent."}
{'yo': 'Ó ń ṣe màmá bí ìgbà tí abẹ́rẹ́ tó mú gún-un lọ́kàn Làbákẹ́ sí ní abẹ́rẹ́ náà.', 'en': 'Mama felt a sharp pin pricking her heart, Labake was that pin!'}
{'yo': '"""A ní láti tì í jáde,"" Èṣùníyì tẹ̀síwájú, ""kíákíá sì ní pẹ̀lú."""', 'en': '"She must be flushed out\', Esuniyi continued, ""and very quickly too."""'}
{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn náà ní á tó le rímú mí.', 'en': "It's only then that we can breathe properly."}
{'yo': 'Sùgbọ́n pẹ̀lú nǹkan méjì tí ẹ ti mú wáyìí ...', 'en': "But with these two things you have brought now.'"}

{'yo': '"Èṣùníyì yọ bébà ti wọn di irun àti èékáná Làbákẹ́ sí yìí jáde... ""Kò sí wàhálà, Màmá."""', 'en': "Esuniyi held out the piece of paper inside which Labake's lock of hair and nails were wrapped.... 'No problem, Mama'"}
{'yo': 'Màmá tún ọ̀nà ọ̀fun rẹ̀ ṣe.', 'en': 'Mama cleared her throat.'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀, ẹ ṣeun. Ohun tí mo fẹ́ kí ẹ ṣe nísìnyí ní pé kí..kí ... kí ...', 'en': 'Well, thank you. What I want you to do now is to... to... to...'}

{'yo': 'Ohùn ẹjọ́ wuuru kíkí kan láti ọ́kan nínú àwọn yàrá ilé wèrè náà ní ó dà ọ̀rọ̀ mọ́ wọn lẹ́nu', 'en': 'They were interrupted by the sound of a deep murmur coming from inside one of the rooms of the mad house.'}
{'yo': '"""Ohun tí màá fẹ́ kí ẹ ...ẹ ...ẹ ..."""', 'en': 'What I will want you to... to... to...'}
{'yo': 'Ohùn wuuru tí ó wa láti inú ilé wèrè náà ti wá di ariwo ńlá, tí ó fẹ̀rẹ̀ dí ènìyàn létí.', 'en': "The murmur from the mad house had now developed into a loud noise, splitting listeners'."}
{'yo': 'Èyí ni àbùdá àhámọ́ Èṣùníyì kan.', 'en': "That was a common feature of Esuniyi's enclave."}
{'yo': 'Láìsí àní-àní, àwọn èèyàn rẹ̀ ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ eré ìje wọn bí wọ́n ṣe máa ń ṣe.', 'en': 'No doubt, his people were at their game their, usual game.'}
{'yo': 'Ìjà tí wọ́n máa ń já fún ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ níyẹn.', 'en': 'The usual physical attack one another had probably started again.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbàkugbà tí wọ́n bá si bẹ̀rẹ̀, gbẹgẹdẹ máa ń gbiná.', 'en': 'Each time they started it, it was usually like hell itself breaking loose.'}
{'yo': 'Wọn á bo ara wọn bí i ajá ọlọ́kúnr̀un, wọn á lu ara wọn, wọn á tún ya arà wọn jẹ.', 'en': 'They would pounce on one another, like rabies-infected dogs and snap and smack and tear.'}
{'yo': 'Ariwo àwọn wèrè náà mú ohùn màmá wálẹ̀.', 'en': "The lunatics yelling noise drowned Mama's voice."}

{'yo': 'Màmá ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ si í bẹ Bàbá olóògùn pẹ̀lú ìtara, pé kí ó lọ gbogbo agbára rẹ̀ láti yanjú Làbákẹ́ ní kíákíá - lónìí sọ́la.', 'en': 'Mama had started appealing passionately to the medicine man to use all his power to eliminate Labake as quickly as possible - today or tomorrow.'}
{'yo': 'Kí ó mú un wálẹ̀ lórí orúnkún rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Bring her down to her knees.'}

{'yo': 'Kí ó jẹ́ kí àwọn ọ̀tá ọmọ rẹ̀ yòókù tí ò ṣe é́ fojú rí rìn lọ níhòòhò sinú igbó kìjikìji tí ìkòkò àti àmọ̀tẹ́kùn á ti máa dúró láti dojú kọ wọ́n, ohun tí Màmá fẹ́ nìyẹn.', 'en': 'Cause the other invisible enemies of her son to wander naked into the thick jungle where hyenas and leopards would be waiting to launch a fierce attack on them, that was what she wanted.'}

{'yo': 'Nǹkan tí ó ń sọ fún Èṣùníyì pé kí ó ṣe nìyẹn tí ariwo àwọn wèrè yẹn fi tún pọ̀ sí i.', 'en': 'That was what she was telling Esuniyi to do when the noise from the lunatics came on more and more compellingly.'}
{'yo': 'Èṣùníyì dìde gírí, ó sáré sọ́na ibi tí ariwo náà ti ń wá.', 'en': 'Esuniyi stood up abruptly, he raced towards the direction of the noise.'}
{'yo': 'Láàárín ìṣẹ́jú kan, ó ti sárẹ padà.', 'en': 'In a minute, he ran back again.'}
{'yo': 'Ó sáré wọ yàrá kan nínú iyẹwù tirẹ̀.', 'en': 'He rushed inside an inner room in his own Apartment.'}
{'yo': 'Ó jáde pẹ̀lú àtòrì kan tí ó ká yí orí rẹ̀.', 'en': 'He came out circling a long whip over head.'}

{'yo': 'Ojú rẹ̀ ràn. Isan dá dúró lọ́tọ̀ ní ọwọ́ rẹ̀ líle, ètè rẹ̀ ń gbọ̀n, ara rẹ̀ ń gbọ̀n pẹ̀lú ìbínú àti ìmí-ẹ̀dùn.', 'en': 'His eyes bulged. The veins stood out in single layers over his strong arms, his lips trembled, his body shook with anger and emotion.'}

{'yo': 'Ní àwọn ìgbà tó ṣe gẹ́gẹ́, Èṣùníyì máa ń tutù, á jọ aláìsẹ̀, ara rẹ̀ balẹ̀, á máa sọ̀rọ̀ díẹ̀díẹ̀, láìpariwo pẹ̀lú ìfọ̀kansì.', 'en': 'At nomal times, Esubiyi would look innocent and calm, talking slowly, quickly, camestly.'}
{'yo': 'Á rẹ́rìn-ín músẹ́ jẹ́jẹ́, á máa wojú yín bí ó ṣe ń sọ̀rọ̀.', 'en': 'He would smile gently, looking you straight in the face as he spoke.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà yẹn ó dàbí i gbogbo ọkùnrin, bí ọkùnrin gidi bí ìwọ àti èmi.', 'en': 'He was then like any other man, every other man like you and me.'}

{'yo': 'Sùgbọ́n lẹ́ẹ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan báyìí, ti yán-pọn-yán-rin bá wà nínú àgọ́ yì, Èṣùníyì máa ń di ọkùnrin àrà ọ̀tọ̀.', 'en': 'But on such occasions as this, when this camp was in pandemonium, Esuniyi was a completely different man.'}

{'yo': 'Á pariwo àsẹ rẹ̀, pẹ̀lú ohùn rẹ̀ tí ó ń búramú-ramù bí àtẹ́wó ààrá. Ó jẹ́ òkùnrin tí ó kúnfún okun ńlá àti ìrísí.', 'en': 'He would bark out orders, his voice roaring like a clap of thunder. He was a man of great strength and physique.'}
{'yo': 'A gbá ẹni tí ó ṣè mú pẹ̀lú ìwà èérí àti ìrorò ẹkùn.', 'en': 'He would grab his victim with the viciousness of an octopus and the ferocity of a tiger.'}
{'yo': 'Iṣan apá rẹ̀ á yi, á wá le koko.', 'en': 'The strong muscles of his arms would become tense and straighten up.'}
{'yo': 'Egungun rẹ̀ á nà, á fẹ́rẹ̀ ẹ́ lè kán.', 'en': 'The bones would screech almost cracking.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹni tí ó gbá mú náà á pariwo ìbẹ̀rù, á sì padà sẹ́yìn pẹ̀lú ìjọ̀wọ́ pátápátá bí i ti ọ̀ọ̀kùn tí ati ra mọ́lẹ̀.', 'en': 'His victim would let forth a fearful yelp and recoil immediately in total submission like the trampled millipede.'}
{'yo': 'Yàtọ̀ sí ti ipá ojú kó-ojú, Èṣùníyì ní àwọn ìlànà mìíràn.', 'en': 'Apart from the use of physical force, Esubiyi had other methods.'}

{'yo': 'Wà á rí i tí ó di ìwo ẹtù rẹ̀ ti ẹ̀jẹ̀ ti yí mú sókè nínú afẹ́fẹ́, á máa bá àwọn àwòmọ́ mẹ́rin ayé sọ̀rọ̀, àwọn adarí kádàrá ẹ̀dá - ó ń perí àwọn ẹ̀mí inú afẹ́fẹ́ láti sisẹ́ nínú iṣan gbígbóná àwọn wèrè náà kí ara wọn lè wálẹ̀.', 'en': 'You would see him holding his blood-stained antelope horn high up in the air, addressing the four elements - the controllers of human destiny - invoking the invisible spirit of the air to work on the boiling nerves of the lunatics and restore them to order.'}
{'yo': 'Ó sì máa ri bẹ́ẹ̀, bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ fún ìgbà díẹ̀.', 'en': 'And it would be so, if only momentarily.'}
{'yo': 'Sùgbọ́n nísìnyí, ìlànà wámú-wámú-wámú ni ó fẹ́ lò.', 'en': '"But now, it was the ""wham-wham-wham! method."'}
{'yo': 'Fúnbí ì ìsẹ́jú márùn-ún, Màmá ń gbọ́ ohùn àtòrì lára àwọn ènìyàn ara rẹ̀ sì súnkì.', 'en': 'For over five minutes, Mama heard the lashing sound of the whip over human bodies and shrank.'}
{'yo': 'Ibí yìí kì í ṣe ibi lásán rárá.', 'en': 'This was truly no ordinary place.'}

{'yo': 'Ní òpin ìgbésẹ̀ ìfìyà-jẹ̀nìyàn rẹ, Èṣùníyì padà lọ bá màmá pẹ̀lú ìkórajo ènìyàn tí ó pé, pẹ̀lú ojú ọmọlúàbí lẹ́ẹ̀kan sí i.', 'en': 'At the end of his punitive step, Esuniyi retumed to Mama with the composure of a normal human being, a serene look, once again, on his face.'}

{'yo': '"""Ó ní láti rí báyẹn,"" ó sọ fún màmá, ""Bí ó ṣe yẹ kí ó rí ní yẹn màmá ...bí bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ ...bí bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́..."" Màmá kanrí mọ́lẹ̀ ní ìdáhùn."', 'en': '"""It has to be like that,"" he told Mama. ""That\'s how it should be Mama... otherwise ... otherwise..."" Mama nodded knowingly."'}
{'yo': '"Ó mọ ohun tí ìtumọ̀ ""bí bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́"" Èṣùníyì jẹ́..."', 'en': "She knew what Esuniyi's 'otherwise' meant..."}
{'yo': 'Bí bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́, àwọn wèrè fúnrawọn náà ágbàjọba ilé náà.', 'en': 'Otherwise, the Lunatics themselves would take over the control of the mad house.'}
{'yo': 'Bí bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́, wọn á sọ ibẹ̀ di pápá ogun.', 'en': 'Otherwise, they would turn the place into a battlefield.'}

{'yo': 'Bí bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ wọn a dojúkọ Èṣùníyì lọ́jọ kan, wọn á sì lé e jáde kúrò nínú ọgbà rẹ̀. Wọn tún lè pá a', 'en': 'Otherwise they would attack himself one day and chase him out of his house. They can even kill him.'}
{'yo': 'Bí bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́, wọn á dáná sun gbogbo ilé inú àgọ́ náà, wọn à sì na pápá bora.', 'en': 'Otherwise, they would burn down all the buildings inside the camp and escape.'}
{'yo': 'Kò sí nǹkan tí wọn ó le ṣe tí òfin àti àsẹ bá dàrú.', 'en': 'There was nothing they would not do once law and order broke down.'}
{'yo': 'Màmá mí ìmí ìtura.', 'en': 'Mama heaved a sigh of relief.'}
{'yo': 'Ò ní ìdí láti máa fọpẹ́ fún Elédúmàrè.', 'en': 'She had cause to be Thankful to God.'}

{'yo': 'Kí ni ìbá ṣe kání pé Àlàmú wà láàrin àwọn ènìyàn yìí, tí yóò sì gba ìhùwàsí ìroro burúku yìí?', 'en': 'What would she do if Alamu to be there among these people and be given this harsh, acrimonious treatment?'}

{'yo': 'Kí ni ìbá ṣe kání ọmọ rẹ̀ ní ó dúró lábẹ́ igi ọ̀kánkán yẹn, tí ó ti fẹ́rẹ̀ ẹ́ já sí ìhòòhò tán, tí ó ń nawọ́ sí nǹkan tí ò sí, tí ó sì ń bá afẹ́fẹ́ òfìfo sọ̀rọ̀?', 'en': 'What would she do if it was her son that was now standing, half naked, under that tree, some yards away, pointing at nothing and talking to the empty air?'}

{'yo': 'Bí ó bá jẹ́ Àlàmú ní ó ń rìn yíká ilé kékeré yẹn láìnídìí nínú irú ìrìn láyípo yìí? Kí ni ìbá ṣe? Kò sí.', 'en': 'If it was Alamu that was now walking round and round that small building without any motive, and in such endless merry-go-round? What would she do? Nothing.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ó bá jẹ́ Àlàmú ni ó wọ àkísà tí ó tún ń tọ̀ sí àtẹ́lẹwọ́ ọwọ́-òsì rẹ̀ tí ó ná síwájú tí ó tún ń rẹ́rìn-ín?', 'en': 'If it was Alamu that was now clad in rags and urinating on the palm of his outstretched left hand and laughing?'}
{'yo': 'Èṣùníyì wo màmá, ó sì ṣàkíyèsí ìkorò tó wá lójú rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Esuniyi watched Mama and noticed the grim look of concern over her countenance'}
{'yo': 'Màmá, kò sí ìdí fún ìbẹ̀rù.', 'en': 'Mama, there is no cause for fear.'}
{'yo': 'Ohun gbogbo á dára níkẹyìn.', 'en': 'All will be well at last.'}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo isẹ́ náà ti fẹ́rẹ̀ ẹ́ parí.', 'en': 'The whole job is as good as finished.'}
{'yo': 'Sùgbọ́n ẹ ṣì ní láti mú u wá sibí', 'en': 'But you still have to bring him here.'}
{'yo': '"""Mú tani wá?"" Màmá bèèrè"', 'en': '"""Bring who?"" Mama asked."'}
{'yo': '"""Ẹ mú ọmọ yín wá màmá. Ọmọkùnrin ti yin?"""', 'en': '"""Bring your child Mama. Your son?"""'}
{'yo': '"""Èyí túmọ̀ sí pé... pé... Àlàmú tún ní láti... láti... wá"""', 'en': 'You mean that... that... Alamu still has to.. to... come...'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, ó ní láti wà níbí, fúnrarẹ̀.', 'en': 'Yes, he must be here himself, personally.'}

{'yo': 'Á mu láti inú ìkòkò àgbo, á wẹ̀ nínú odò àgbo ní gbangba, à á sì sín gbẹ́rẹ́ sí i lẹ́rẹ̀kẹ́, ní igbá àyà àti abíyá rẹ̀.', 'en': 'To drink from the medicine pot, to swim inside that open whirlpool, and to be incised on the cheeks, chest and the armpits.'}
{'yo': 'Ọmọ yín ní láti ní ìdáàbòbò tó péye.', 'en': 'Your child has to be adequately protected.'}
{'yo': 'Nǹkankan ò gbọdọ̀ yọ ọ́ lẹ̀.', 'en': 'Nothing must be left to chance.'}
{'yo': 'Ìwò ìdààmú wà lójú màmá.', 'en': 'Mama looked disturbed.'}

{'yo': 'Báwo ní yóò ṣe rọrùn fún un láti mú Àlàmú wá sí ìgbèríko, páàpáà júlo, sí ọgbà Èṣùníyì? Apá ọrọ yìí sẹ̀sẹ̀ hàn de sí ni. Báwo nì ó ṣe máa ṣe é?', 'en': 'How easy was it going to be bringing Alamu to the district, and to the asylum? That aspect of the matter had just occurred to her. How was she going to do it?'}

{'yo': 'Ṣé kí ó dọ́gbọ́n àìsàn, kí ó ránsẹ́ sí i nígboro pé kí ó wá rí i kíákíá ní dùbúlẹ̀ àìsàn rẹ̀?', 'en': 'Should she feign sickness, send a message down to him in town and ask him to come and see her urgently on her sick bed?'}
{'yo': 'Kí ni yóò sọ fún un tó bá ti wá dé?', 'en': 'What would she say when finally he arrived?'}
{'yo': 'ṣé kí ó wá sọ òótó fún un ni?', 'en': 'Should she come out frankly and tell him the truth?'}
{'yo': 'Òtítò tí ó korò nípa ipò rẹ̀?', 'en': 'The bitter truth about his condition?'}
{'yo': 'Òtítò ti òun gan alára kò mọ̀ láti iye ọjọ́ yìí?', 'en': 'The truth that he himself had not been aware of all these days?'}
{'yo': 'Màmá rò ó fún ìsẹ́jú kan.', 'en': 'Mama reflected for a minute.'}
{'yo': 'Ọkàn rẹ̀ ṣáko lọ.', 'en': 'Her mind wandered'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀, kò sí àní-àní, kò sí àní-àní, ó ní láti ṣe é.', 'en': 'Well, no choice, no choice, she had to do it.'}
{'yo': 'Ó jẹ́ isẹ́ tí ó gbọ́dọ̀ ṣe.', 'en': 'It was a task she must perform.'}
{'yo': 'Paríparí ẹ̀, ọmọ rẹ̀ ṣáà ni, ọmọ rẹ kan ṣoṣo.', 'en': 'Afterall, Alamu was her son, her only son.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀tọ́ rẹ̀ ni láti jẹ́ kí ó mọ̀ gbogbo òótọ́ ọ̀rọ̀ náà, bí ò bá tiẹ̀ dùn mọ́ ọ́n.', 'en': 'She was duty-bound to let him know the whole truth however unpalatable it was going to be to him.'}
{'yo': '"""O ti ya wèrè!,"" Á jẹ́ kí ọmọ rẹ̀ mọ̀, á dijú sọ ọ́ láìdéènàpẹnu."', 'en': '"""You are mad!"" She would let her son know point blank - and without mincing words."'}
{'yo': 'Dájúdájú kò ní gba eti rẹ̀ gbọ́, ó lè dùn-un, ó lè tàbùkù bá a.', 'en': 'It would surely sound unbelievable to him, probably hurt him, probably embarrass him.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n kò ní wò ìyẹn.', 'en': 'But she would not care.'}
{'yo': 'Á tún un sọ dáadáa.', 'en': 'She would say it again, loud and clear.'}
{'yo': '"""Ó ti ya wèrè Àlàmú! Ìṣọwọ́sọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ gan-an fi hàn pé o ya wèrè."', 'en': '"""Alamu, you are mad! The way you talk shows you are mad."'}
{'yo': 'Ìhùwàsí rẹ fihàn pé o ya wèrè.', 'en': 'The way you behave shows you are mad.'}
{'yo': 'Bí ó ṣe ń wò gan-an fi hàn pé ó ya wèrè.', 'en': 'The way you look shows you are mad.'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni. Ọmọ mí ó ti ya wèrè! Sùgbọ́n Àlàmú, isẹ́ àwọn ọ̀tá ní.', 'en': 'Yes. You-are-mad-my-son! But Alamu, it is the work of the enemies.'}
{'yo': '"Ó máa ṣe pàtàkì láti jẹ́ kí ó mọ̀, ""Iṣẹ́ àwọn ọ̀tá ni èyí."""', 'en': '"It would be important to let him know, ""This is the work of the enemies."'}

{'yo': 'Àti wí pé, pabanbarì gbogbo rẹ̀ ò ṣẹ̀yìn ìyàwó rẹ̀, ìyàwó rẹ̀ gan-an. Òun ní àsojú àwọn ọ̀tá.', 'en': "And, at the centre of it all is none but your very wife, Your own very wife. She's the enemies' agent'."}
{'yo': 'Bóyá Àlàmú gba èyí gbọ́ tàbí kò gbà á kò ṣe pàtàkì sí i.', 'en': 'Whether or not Alamu would believe this was not important to her.'}
{'yo': 'Kò kàn án bín-in-tín báyìí.', 'en': 'She would not care a jot.'}
{'yo': 'Wàhálà ti Àlàmú nìyẹn.', 'en': "That was going to be Alamu's own problem."}

{'yo': '"Nǹkan tí ó ṣe pàtàkì ni láti jẹ́ kí ó mọ̀ ǹkan tó ń sẹlẹ̀ lẹ́kùn-ún rẹ́rẹ́, gbogbo òtítọ́ ibẹ̀. ""ṣùgbọ́n jẹ́ kí n sọfún ẹ Àlàmú, Làbákẹ́ yẹn á fẹnu họra. Ìwọ ṣáà má ṣèyọnu.,"" á tu ọmọ rẹ̀ nínú pẹ̀lú èyí."', 'en': '"What was important was to let him know all the details, all the truth. ""But let me tell you, Alamu, that Labake will pay. You don\'t worry.,"" she would console her son with it."'}
{'yo': 'Ìwọ ṣáà má ṣèyọnu.', 'en': "You just don't worry."}
{'yo': '"""Mo ti sa gbogbo ipá mi láti wá ojútùú sí i, Èṣùníyì sì ti ń ràn wá lọ́wọ́ gidi."', 'en': '"""I have tried my best to save the situation and Esubiyi has been assisting us so much."'}

{'yo': 'Èyí ló fà á tí o fi wà láàyè lónìí, ìdí níyì tó ò ṣe tí ì já sí ìgboro - ìwọ lè má mọ̀.', 'en': "That's why you are still alive today, that's why you have not gone out onto the streets - you may not know."}

{'yo': 'Nítorí tìrẹ. Mo ti rubo àwọn òrìsà pẹ̀lú ewúrẹ́, orógbó, ataare àti epo pupa.', 'en': 'On your behalf. I have made sacrifices to the gods with billy goats, alligator pepper, bitter kola and red palm-oil.'}

{'yo': 'Màmá mọ̀ pé gbogbo èyí á já Àlàmú láyà bí ó bá gbọ́, sùgbọ́n ṣé ó yẹ kí ìyẹn tún da òun fún rarẹ̀ láàmú?', 'en': 'Mama knew Alamu would be shocked to hear all these but, could she be bothered?'}
{'yo': 'Rárá, kò ní wulẹ̀ gbé orí sókè láti wojú ọmọ rẹ̀.', 'en': "No, she would not even raise her head up to look at her son's face."}
{'yo': '"""Àlàmú gbaradì,"" á pàpà sọ fún un ""A jọ ń lọ rí Èṣùníyì nísìnyí."""', 'en': '"""Now, get prepared Alamu,"" she would finally tell him, we are going together now to see Esuniyi."'}
{'yo': '"""Èmi? Fún kí ni?,"" Ó ń rò ó bí ọmọ rẹ̀ ṣe ń dáhùn ìbéèrè padà, tí ó ń tẹnumọ pé."', 'en': '"""Me? What for?"" She could imagine her son questioning back, protesting."'}
{'yo': '"""Èmi kọ́! Èmi kọ́!"""', 'en': '"""Not me! Not me!."""'}

{'yo': '"""Ìwọ ni Àlàmú !,"" ó pinnu láti pariwo mọ́ ọn padà, Ìwọ ni, Ìwọ, Ìwọ àti èmi! A jọ ń lọ nísìnyí ni, sọ́dọ̀ oníṣègùn."', 'en': '"""It\'s you Alamu!,"" she resolved she would shout back, \'It\'s you, You, you and me! We\'ll go together now, to the herbalist."'}

{'yo': 'Wà á mu láti inú ìkòkò àgbo rẹ̀. Wà á wẹ̀ nínú ibú omi tí ó wà ní ààrin ibùdó rẹ̀, wọn á sì sín gbẹ́rẹ́ sí ọ́ lára.', 'en': 'You will drink from his medicine pot. Take your bath inside the open pool in the centre of his camp and be incised on the body.'}
{'yo': 'Àfàìmọ̀ kí Àlàmú má fi ṣe yẹ̀yẹ́ tàbí kí ó kàn kúrò níwájú rẹ̀, tàbí kí ó tilẹ̀ ki eré mọ́lẹ̀.', 'en': 'Alamu would probably Laugh at her and walk away, or take to his heels even.'}
{'yo': 'Màmá fúnrarẹ̀ á lé e mú.', 'en': 'She would pursue him herself.'}
{'yo': 'Màmá wóye ara rẹ̀ bí ó ṣe ń lé Àlàmú lọ sọ́nà igbó olókùúta náà.', 'en': 'Mama imagined herself chasing Alamu down the stony crooked forest path.'}

{'yo': 'Tí ó ń lé e lọ sọ́nà etí odò Akókurà, tí ó bẹ̀ẹ́ pé kí ó padà, tí ó ń bẹ́ẹ̀ kí ó tó di wí pé ó kọjá odò náà.', 'en': 'Chasing him to the bank of river Akokura, appealing to him to come back. begging him, before he would cross that river.'}
{'yo': 'Kí ó tó di wí pé ó kọjá ibi tí kò ti ní lè padà.', 'en': 'Before he would cross the Rubicon.'}
{'yo': 'Bí ó bá filè kọjá odò Akókurà, kò ní í sí ìrètí kankan fún un mọ́.', 'en': 'Once he crossed river Akokura, there will be no further hope.'}
{'yo': 'Kò gbọdọ̀ kọjá odò kankan, bí bẹ́ẹ̀ kọ́... Ó ń wòye bí ọmọ rẹ̀ ṣe ń kánjú lọ.', 'en': 'He should not cross any river - or else... She imagined her son still hurrying away.'}

{'yo': 'Ọwọ́ agbára ńlá àwọn ọ̀tá wà lára rẹ̀, ó ń tí í, tì í, ó ń jẹ́ kí ó máa kọ gbogbo ìgbìyànjú láti mú kí orí-rẹ̀ pé. Ó ń gbọ́ bi Àlàmú ṣe ń jágbe mọ́ ọn.', 'en': 'The mighty power of the enemies was upon him, pushing him, pushing him, making him resist all attempt to bring sanity back. She could hear Alamu snapping back at her.'}
{'yo': 'Màmá, ẹ padà sábúlé! Ẹ lọ sinmi lábúlé! Èmi á padà sí ìgboro.', 'en': 'Go back to the village Mama! Go and rest in the village! I would go back to town.'}
{'yo': 'Nǹkan ò ṣe mí! Mo ní iṣẹ́ tí mo fẹ́ ṣe ní ìgboro, mo tètè ń lọ!', 'en': 'Nothing is wrong with me! I have business to do in town, so, I am hurrying away!'}

{'yo': "Màmá tún wòye ara rẹ̀ bí ó ṣe gbá a mú, ó gba mú gírí-gírí, ìgbámú 'pamí-nísìnyí, pamí nísìnyí'.", 'en': "Mama imagined herself launching a grip, a firm grip on him, a 'kill-me-now, kill-me-now' grip."}
{'yo': 'Èṣùníyì rẹ́rìn-ín, Màmá jókòó sára, ó déédé tají lójú àlá àsìkò tí ó ń lá.', 'en': 'Esuniyi laughed, Mama sat straight, waking up suddenly from her momentary dream.'}
{'yo': 'Èṣùníyì tí ń wò ó látẹ̀ẹ̀kan ti ó ń ka nǹkan tí ó ń lọ lọ́kàn rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Esuniyi had all along been watching her reading her mind.'}
{'yo': 'Ń ṣe ni ó dàbí i pé ó ti rí àwòrán nǹkan tí ó ń lọ níbẹ̀.', 'en': 'It was as if he had seen the picture of what went on inside it.'}

{'yo': "Màmá, ọmọ yín ò ní kọ̀ láti wá sí abúlé'. Èṣùníyì sọ, Màá tẹ̀lé yín lọ láti mú un wá.", 'en': '"""Your son will not refuse coming to the district Mama."" Esunyi said, I\'ll go with you to bring him."'}
{'yo': 'Tayọ̀tayọ̀ ló máa fi tẹ̀lé wa.', 'en': 'He will gladly follow us.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ má da ara yín láàḿu màmá, màá kàn yọ fóró sínú ilé wọn fún bí ìsẹ́jú kan sí méjì.', 'en': "Don't worry Mama, I'll just pop into their house for a minute or two."}

{'yo': 'Ojú wa á ṣe mẹ́rin, o dẹ ma tan sibẹ. Màá sáré padà wá sí abúlé, á sì tẹ̀lé mi bí ó bá yá bóyá ni òní jẹ́ lọ́jọ́ náà tàbí ọjọ́ kejì.', 'en': "Our eyes would be four, and that's all. I'll rush back to the district and he'll follow later, probably that same day or the following day."}
{'yo': 'Màmá tún mí kanlẹ̀, ó ní ìgbẹkẹ̀lé tó dúró gírí nínú agbára bàbá olóògùn.', 'en': 'Mama heaved a heavy sigh again, she had implicit confidence in the powers of the medicine man.'}
{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú ọkùnrin yìí, Èṣùníyì, ó fẹ́rẹ̀ ẹ́ lè má sí nǹkan tí ò ṣeéṣe.', 'en': 'With this man, Esuniyi, nothing seemed impossible.'}
{'yo': 'Fún ìdí èyí, ó gbọ̀nà abúlé lọ, pẹ̀lú ìtura lọ́kàn rẹ̀.', 'en': 'So, she left for the village with a feeling of relief.'}

{'yo': 'Yàrá òfìfo wà nínú ilé alámọ̀ Màmá níbi tí Àlàmú lè dúró sí, bí ó bá nílò, lẹ́yìn tí ó bá ti jàjà ṣàṣeyọ́rí nínú mímú un wá si abúlé.', 'en': "There was one vacant room inside Mama's mud building in the village where Alamu could put up, if need be, when finally they succeeded in bringing to the district."}
{'yo': 'Kò nílò láti padà sí ìgboro ní ọjọ́ náà.', 'en': 'He did not have to return In the same day.'}
{'yo': 'Èṣùníyì lè fẹ́ kí ó sùn mọ́jú.', 'en': 'Esuniyi might want him to stay over.'}
{'yo': 'Fún ìdí ìyẹn, Àlàmú lè wá sí Abúlé kí ó sì sùn mọ́jú ọjọ́ kejì.', 'en': 'In that case, Alamu could come to the village and stay the night.'}

{'yo': 'Màmá bẹ̀rẹ̀ sì í tún yàrá náà ṣe lẹ́sẹ̀kẹsẹ̀, ó gbọn gbogbo jàǹkárìwọ̀ sílẹ̀, ó sì lé àwọn ááyán àti ọmọ-onílé lọ.', 'en': 'Mama set about putting the vacant room in good order instantly, she brushed down the cobwebs and chased away the geckos and cockroaches.'}

{'yo': 'Ó wọ́n omi sílẹ̀, ó sì bẹ̀rẹ̀ si í gba a, ó ń sín láìmoye ìgbà, orí rẹ̀ ń ró bí agogo.', 'en': 'She sprinkled water on the floor and started sweeping it, she sneezed for the umpteenth time, her head rang like a bell.'}
{'yo': 'Ó fún imú rẹ̀, omi jáde lójú rẹ̀, etí rẹ̀ di fún ìsẹ́jú kan.', 'en': 'She blew her nose, water came from her eyes and she went deaf for a minute.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tó yá ti ó yán, ìlèkùn inú eti rẹ̀ ṣí gbayawu, atẹ́gùn tó ti há síbẹ̀ sá jadé ó tún sín.', 'en': 'Later when she yawned, the doors of her ears flung open and the trapped air rushed out of them, again she sneezed.'}
{'yo': 'Ìjìyà gbá à ní ayé jẹ́.', 'en': 'Life was all suffering.'}
{'yo': 'Bí ó ṣe rí fún màmá gan-an rè é.', 'en': 'That was even more so with Mama.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ti jìyà, irú ìyà ti obìnrin kankan ò jẹ rí.', 'en': "She'd suffered, probably like no other woman had ever suffered before."}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀ẹ̀mẹ́rin ní ayé rẹ̀ ni oyún ti bàjẹ́ mọ́ ọn lára. Méjì kí ó tó bí Àlàmú àti méjì mìíràn lẹ́yìn Àlàmú.', 'en': 'Four times in her life, she lost her pregnancy. Two before Alamu and two after him.'}
{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn náà kò lè lóyún mọ́, ó wọ iye ọjọ́ orí tí kò ti lè ṣabiyamọ mọ́.', 'en': "Then she couldn't become pregnant again, then she reached menopause."}
{'yo': 'Àlàmú nìkan lọmọ kan ṣoṣo tí ó ṣẹ́kù fún un.', 'en': 'Alamu remained her only child.'}

{'yo': 'Níbí i ọdún mẹ́wàá sẹ́yìn, tí ọmọ rẹ̀ lọ sí ìlú Òyìnbó, Màmá rò wí pé ogun wíwá ayọ̀ ayérayé ti borí rẹ̀.', 'en': "When about ten years ago, her son went to the white man's country, Mama felt she had lost the battle to cure permanent happiness in life."}
{'yo': 'Ń ṣe ní ó dàbí ẹni pé Àlàmú ti rìn ìrìnàjò àrèmabọ̀.', 'en': 'It was as if Alamu had gone on a jourmey of no return.'}
{'yo': 'Màmá nìkan ló dàbí ẹni pé ó kù láyé.', 'en': 'Mama was virtually left alone in the world.'}
{'yo': '"""Aṣọ"" rẹ̀ kanṣoṣo ní wọn ti bọ́ lára rẹ̀."', 'en': '"Her only ""garment\' had been literally stripped off her."'}
{'yo': 'Ó wá wà ní ògòlòǹto.', 'en': 'And she stood naked.'}
{'yo': 'Ayé ti pàdánù àwọ̀ àti ẹwà rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Life lost its colour and radiance.'}

{'yo': 'Bàbá Àlàmú tí ì bá ṣe alátìlẹ́yìn àti olùfọ kàntán ti dùbúlẹ̀ àìsàn tí ò sí jẹ orúkọ ọmọ rẹ̀ lẹ́nu títí ó fi ku, èyí gbo màmá dé ọpọlọ àti ìmọ̀lára lẹ́yìn ìgbà náà.', 'en': "Alamu's father who could have provided the much-needed support and assurance for her had broken down in health and later died whispering the name of his son, Mama became visibly shaken mentally and emotionally, thereafter."}

{'yo': 'Òótọ́ ni pé wọn máa ń ka lẹ́tà Àlàmú sí eti ìgbọ́ rẹ̀, láti fi jẹ́ kí ó mọ̀ pé Àlàmú ṣì wà láàyè.', 'en': "It was true they often read Alamu's letters to her hearing, letting her know Alamu was alive."}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, Màmá ò gbàgbọ́.', 'en': 'Still Mama would not believe.'}

{'yo': 'Á dijú rẹ̀, á sì tẹ́tí sí àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ ìtura tó wà nínú lẹ́tà Àlàmú. Ara rẹ̀ á yá, ó sì mókun, ó sì ń ṣe dáadáa nínú ẹ̀kọ́ rẹ̀, ó wà níbẹ̀ nínú òtútù, ó ń tiraka láti wá ọjọ́ iwájú fún ara rẹ̀ àti Màmá, láìpẹ́ á máa padà bọ̀ nílé láti wá dara pọ̀ mọ́ ọn.', 'en': "She would close her eyes and listen to the soothing words contained in Alamu's letter. He was hale and hearty, doing well in his studies, he was there in the cold land struggling to secure a better future for himself and Mama, very soon he would be coming back home to join her."}
{'yo': 'Kí Màmá mọ́kàn, kí ó wà láàyè kí ó si tẹ̀síwájú láti máa gbàdúrà fún un.', 'en': 'Mama should take heart, stay alive and continue to pray for him.'}
{'yo': '"""Ọmọ yín onífẹ̀ẹ́ òótọ́ - Àlàmú """', 'en': '"""Your ever loving son - Alamu."""'}
{'yo': 'Màmá á lajú rẹ̀, á sì ṣàṣàrò sí ara rẹ̀ ni àìgbàgbọ́.', 'en': 'Mama would open her eyes and muse to herself in disbelief.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣe gbogbo èyí lè jẹ́ òtítọ́ ṣá?', 'en': 'Could all these be true really?'}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo èyí lè jẹ́ àlá dídùn lásán.', 'en': 'All these might just be a mere sweet dream.'}
{'yo': 'Tàbíkí ó jẹ́ ète àwọn èèyàn dáadáa kan tí kò fẹ́ kí ó wọ sàréè láìtọ́jọ́.', 'en': 'Or the trick of some good people who did not want her inside the grave too soon.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn tí kò fẹ kí ó ku ikú àdágbé, tí wọn sì ní láti tù ú lọ́kàn pẹ̀lú lẹ́tà tí wọn ní ọmọ rẹ́ kọ.', 'en': 'Those who did not want her to die of loneliness, who then had to console her with letters allegedly written by her son.'}
{'yo': 'Ọmọ rẹ̀ tí ó mọ̀, lọ́kàn ara rẹ̀ ti lọ sí ìrìnàjò àrèmabọ̀.', 'en': 'The son she knew, deep down in her heart had gone on a journey of no return.'}

{'yo': 'Ó ti sọnù títí láé, lẹ́yìn tí ó tí dúró ìdúró asán fún ọdún mẹ́jọ fún ìpàdabọ̀ Àlàmú, kò sí ìpinnu mìíràn tí màmá lè ní.', 'en': "Lost forever, after waiting eight years in vain for Alamu's return, there was no other conclusion Mama could draw."}

{'yo': 'Ìyẹn ni ó sì sàlàyé ìdí tí ìyá àgbà náà ṣe wo ọmọ rẹ̀ ni ìwò ìyanu àti àìgbàgbọ́ ní ọjọ́ tí ó jàjà padà sílé láti ìlú England.', 'en': 'And that explained why the old woman gazed at her son in wonder and incredulity the day he finally arrived back in the country from England.'}

{'yo': 'Ìyẹn sàláyé ìdí, tí màmá fi ń bí ara rẹ̀ bóyá ọmọkùnrin tí o dá ṣáṣá yìí ni Àlàmú, tàbí òkú rẹ̀ ni fún odidi ọ̀sẹ̀ kan gbáko.', 'en': 'That explained why, for a whole week after, Mama kept asking herself whether the healthy looking Vivacious young man was really Alamu or his ghost.'}

{'yo': 'Ó sì ń pè é ní gbogbo orúkọ rẹ̀ - gbogbo àwọn orúkọ tókúnfún ìfẹ́ tí ó ń pè é nígbà kékeré, láì mọyè ìgbà lọ́jọ́ kọ̀ọ̀kan fún odidi ọ̀ṣẹ̀ kan.', 'en': 'And she called him by all his names - all the affectionate names he gave him during childhood, several times each day for one whole week.'}

{'yo': 'Ó jẹ ṣónṣó ayọ̀ rẹ̀, irú ìgbà ayọ̀ bẹ́ẹ̀ ò padà dè bá Màmá mọ́. Ilé ayé jẹ́ ṣẹkẹ́ṣẹkẹ̀ ìyà gígùn kan. Tí kò lópin.', 'en': 'It was the climax of her joy, such joyous period would came back again to Mama. Life was one long chain of suffering. No end to it.'}
{'yo': 'Ó jẹ́ ìgbésẹ̀ tí ó ń tẹ̀síwájú.', 'en': 'It was a continuous event.'}
{'yo': 'Màmá rò ó wí pé òpin ìjìyà òun ti dé nígbà ti ọmọ rẹ̀ dé.', 'en': 'Mama thought the end of suffering had come with the return of her son.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n kété tí ó pé ọdún méjì lẹ́yìn ti Àlàmú dé, ìbànújẹ́ tí ó gbọ̀nà àràmìíràn yọ ló tún dé bá Màmá.', 'en': "But precisely two years after Alamu's retum, a heartache of a different dimension took possession of Mama."}

{'yo': 'Ìbànújẹ́ tí ó fún un ni ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àìroóorún-sùn òru, tí ó jẹ́ kí ó máa lá àìmọye àlákàlàá, ti ó ń jẹ́ kí omú rẹ̀ máa já pàtì láì mọyè ìgbà, tí ó wá sọ ọ́ di àlejò gbogbo ìgbà sí ọgbà babaláwo.', 'en': "A heartache which gave her several sleepless nights, which made her have several dreadful dreams, which made her breasts twitch several times, and which now made her a regular visitor to the herbalist's asylum."}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo èyí, fún ìfẹ́ ọmọ.', 'en': 'All for love of the child.'}
{'yo': 'Kò ṣeé ṣe láti mọ̀ ìjìnlẹ̀ ìyà ìyá lórí ọmọ.', 'en': "It was not possible to fathom the depth of a mother's suffering over the child."}
{'yo': 'Èyí ni ìdí kan pàtàkì tó fi jẹ́ pé ìyá ní ó lọmọ lóòótọ́.', 'en': "That's one reason the mother is the true owner of the child."}

{'yo': 'Màmá ní ìpinnu líle kan lọ́kàn rẹ̀ pé nígbà tí ó bá tún fojú kan Làbákẹ́, ìtàn náà á yàtọ̀.', 'en': 'Mama made a desperate resolution, next time she set her eyes on Labake, the story was going to be different.'}
{'yo': 'Á gbé e gbóná fún un, á sẹ orí rẹ̀ mọ́ Làbákẹ́ láyà, á ya á jẹ.', 'en': "She would be downright violent with her, knock her head against Labake's chest, tear at her."}
{'yo': 'Kòní í dúró de ẹ̀san díẹ̀díẹ̀ ti babaláwo yẹn mọ́.', 'en': 'She would not wait for that slow vengeance of the herbalist anymore.'}
{'yo': 'Lọ́jọ́ tí ó bá tún padé Làbákẹ́, á pa á run ní kíákíá.', 'en': 'The day she met Labake again, perdition would come down quick and fast on her.'}

{'yo': '"Fi Àlàmú sílẹ̀! Á pariwo lé aṣojú àwọn ọ̀tá, á dì ì lọ́fun mú ""Fi ọmọ mi sílẹ̀! Ọmọ mí kan ṣoṣo."', 'en': "Leave Alamu alone! she would shout on the enemies' agent, holding her by the throat, leave my son alone! My only son."}
{'yo': 'Asọ mi, fi asọ mi kan ṣoṣo sílẹ̀ kí ó gbádùn ayé rẹ̀. Kẹ́rù ẹ kí o lọ!', 'en': 'My garment, leave my only garment alone to enjoy his life Pack and go!'}
{'yo': '"""Kó ẹrù rẹ̀ kí ó lọ nísìnyí! Á jẹ́ àṣẹ."', 'en': "Pack your load and go now!' It is going to be an order."}
{'yo': 'Kò sí ìtàkùrọsọ pẹ̀lú ọ̀tá tí ó wà nílé mọ.', 'en': 'No dialogue anymore with the enemy at home.'}

{'yo': 'Kò ní fún un láyè láti dá gbọn un bí ó ṣe ṣe níjọ́sí, tí ó ń pè é ni ìyá àgbà, àgbàyà, àjẹ́...', 'en': 'She would not give her chance to snap at her like she did the other day, calling her old woman, hag, witch...'}
{'yo': 'Kó ẹrù ẹ́ kí o lọ nísìnyí! Jẹ́ ká rí ẹ̀yìn rẹ Làbákẹ́. O ò gbọdọ̀ wẹ̀yìn!', 'en': "Pack your load and go now! Let's see your back Labake. Never dare look back!"}
{'yo': 'Obìnrin tí wọn fí ń sépè obìnrin! Ọmọ ìyá àjẹ́! Asojú Èṣù! Lọ! Máa lọ!', 'en': 'Accursed woman! Daughter of a witch! Agent of the devil! Go! Go away!'}
{'yo': 'Màmá jù ìgbálẹ̀ tí ó dìmú sílẹ̀, omijé bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ṣàn wálẹ̀ lẹ́rẹ̀kẹ́ rẹ̀ tí ó ti hunjọ.', 'en': 'Mama dropped the broom she was holding and tears started trickling down her wrinkled cheeks'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà tí ó yá, ó bẹ̀rẹ̀ si í sunkún gidi.', 'en': 'Later, she started to sob violently.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé á lè ní okun láti kojú Làbákẹ́?', 'en': 'Would she have that strength to attack Labake?'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé ọwọ́ rẹ̀ tí ò lágbara yìí ò ní dójú tì í lọ́jọ́ náà?', 'en': 'Would her feeble hands not disappoint her that day?'}

{'yo': 'Ṣé agbára ọ̀dọ́ tó wà lára Làbákẹ́ òní da inú rẹ̀ tí ó ti rẹ̀ yìí rú, Ṣé kò ní ran eruku jáde nímú rẹ̀, tí á sì yọ ahọ́n kúrò lẹ́nu rẹ̀?', 'en': "Would Labake's youthful energy not rumble her tired stomach, send steam rushing down her nostril, throw her tongue out of her mouth?"}
{'yo': 'Oh! Bí ó bá jẹ́ pé ó mọ bí wọn se ń fa irebọn ìbọn ni!', 'en': 'Oh! If only she knew how to pull the trigger of a damn gun!'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n, kí ó mú Àlàmú wá ná! Kí ó gba ọmọ rẹ̀ sílẹ̀ ná!', 'en': 'But, let Alamu be brought first! Let her son be saved first!'}
{'yo': 'Inú màmá kò dùn sí fífi okun inú rẹ̀ ṣòfò lórí wàhálà ojú-fún-ojú, eyín-fún-eyín.', 'en': "Mama was not happy dissipating her energy on an eye for eye, tooth for tooth' venture."}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹn á wáyé bí ó bá ya.', 'en': 'That would come later.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n báyìí, kí wọ́n kọ́kọ́ gba Àlàmú sílẹ̀ ná.', 'en': 'But now, let Alamu first be rescued.'}
{'yo': 'Èṣùníyì ti ṣe ìlérí láti tẹ̀lé e.', 'en': 'Esuniyi had promised to follow her.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n jọ máa lọ sí ìgboro láti mú un wá ni.', 'en': 'They were going together to bring him from town.'}
{'yo': 'Ní gbogbo òru, Màmá kò le sùn.', 'en': "For the better part of the night, Mama's eyes refused to close."}

{'yo': 'Láìsí àní-àní, ojú á ti Àlàmú láti rí i pẹ̀lú babaláwo tí ó wọ ẹ̀wù apẹtẹ tí ó kuńfún ẹ̀rù.', 'en': 'Alamu would, no doubt, be embarrassed to see her in company of a fetish priest in the dreaded apete garment.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n bí ó ṣe yẹ kí ó rí nìyẹn, ó yẹ kí ó yée.', 'en': 'But that was how it should be, he should understand.'}
{'yo': 'A gbìyànjú láti ní òye... O gbọ́dọ̀ yé e.', 'en': 'He should try to understand ... he must understand.'}
{'yo': 'Màmá bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí i ṣẹ́ ojú... ṣẹ́ ojú.', 'en': "Mama's eyes started blinking ... blinking."}
{'yo': 'Nígbẹ̀yìn gbẹ́yín, ó sùn.', 'en': 'Finally the eyes closed up in sleep.'}
{'yo': 'Ọkàn ìyá àgbàlagbà kúrò nínú gbogbo nǹkan nígbà tó yá.', 'en': "The old woman's mind, thereafter, went numb to everything."}
{'yo': 'Ó kúrò nínú híhó ẹyẹ òwìwí lórí àwọn igi igbó àyíká.', 'en': 'Numb to the hooting of the owl on the surrounding trees of the forest.'}
{'yo': 'Ó kúrò nínú gbígbó àwọn ajá ń ààrin gùngun ìlú.', 'en': 'Numb to the incessant barking of the dogs in the centre of the village.'}

{'yo': '"Kì í ṣe ohun tí ó rọrùn láti ṣe ""ó dààbọ̀"" sí ilé tí ó tí jẹ́ ti ẹni fún ìgbà pípẹ́ ."', 'en': "It was not anything easy, saying the final goodbye to a home that had been one's own for a long time."}
{'yo': 'Láìwo bí ilé náà ti ṣe gbé ara rẹ̀ kalẹ̀, fún ẹni tí ó ń fi í lẹ.', 'en': 'No matter the way such a home had presented itself to the person leaving it.'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ mọ èyí dáadáa.', 'en': 'Labake knew this very well.'}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, ó mí àmíkàn ó sì wo gbogbo nǹkan inú ilé yíká tìlọ́ra tìlọ́ra.', 'en': 'So now, she heaved a heavy sigh and looked round nervously at everything inside the house.'}
{'yo': 'Bóyá, ọjọ́ rẹ̀ tí ó kẹ́yìn, ní ó ń lò yìí nílé Àlàmú.', 'en': "She was probably spending her last day in Alamu's house."}
{'yo': 'Ó ti múra ó sì fẹ jáde láti lọ ṣe àwọn òwò kíá kíá kan ní ìgboro.', 'en': 'She had dressed up and was about to go out to do some urgent business in town.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ti bá awakọ̀ ọ̀kọ̀ akẹ́rù kan dú nàá-dúrà sílẹ̀.', 'en': 'Already, she had negotiated with a mammy wagon driver.'}
{'yo': 'Awakọ̀ náà ń bọ̀ lọ́la pẹ̀lú ọ̀kọ̀ rẹ̀ láti wá fi kó àwọn nǹkan rẹ̀ lọ.', 'en': 'The driver would be around tomorrow with his vehicle, to carry away her things.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ti sọ fún dẹ́rẹ́bà náà bí ó ṣe fẹ́ kí isẹ́ náà ṣe rí.', 'en': "She'd told the driver how she wanted the job done."}
{'yo': 'Ó fẹ́ kí isẹ́ náà parí láìfàkókò ṣòfò, kí ó má ju bí i, kání wákàtí méjì.', 'en': 'She wanted the job completed with dispatch, in not more than, say, two hours.'}
{'yo': 'Kò gbọdọ̀ pe àkíyèsí àwọn aládúgbò rárá.', 'en': 'The neighbours attention should not be attracted at all.'}

{'yo': 'Awakọ̀ ọkọ̀-akẹ́rù náà ti ṣe ìlérí ìfọwọ́sọwọ́pọ̀ rẹ̀, ó sì fi Làbákẹ́ lọ́kàn balẹ̀ pé isẹ́ náà kò ní gba òun àti àwọn èèyàn òun ju wákàtí kan lọ.', 'en': 'The mammy-wagon driver had promised his Co-operation and assured Labake that the business would not take him and his men more than one hour.'}

{'yo': 'Mo fi Ọlọrún tó dámi ṣẹlẹ́rìí, awakọ̀ náà sọ èyí, ó fa ìka ìlábẹ̀ rẹ̀ mú, ó sìnáàsí ojú ọ̀runfún àtẹnumọ́.', 'en': 'I swear to God Almighty who made me, he said, sucking his forefinger and then pointing it to the sky emphatically.'}
{'yo': 'Inú Làbákẹ́ dùn.', 'en': 'Labake was happy.'}
{'yo': 'Ìdágbére ìkẹyìn! Èyí kì í ṣe ohun tí ó rọrùn fún ẹnikẹ́ni.', 'en': 'Final adieu! This had never been anything easy for anyone.'}
{'yo': 'Kò sì lè jẹ́ nǹkan tí ó rọrùn fún Làbákẹ́ náà.', 'en': 'And it was not going to be an easy thing for Labake either.'}
{'yo': 'Okàn rẹ bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí í lù kì kì kì.', 'en': 'Her heart started beating fast.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn nǹkan tí ó fẹ ki pé ó dì gbóṣe pọ̀.', 'en': 'There were so many things to say goodbye to.'}

{'yo': 'Ówọ ilé ìdáná, ó sọ̀rọ̀ wúyẹ́wúyẹ́ ara rẹ̀, ó sì jadé. Ó wọ balùwẹ̀, ó sọ̀rọ̀ kẹ́lẹ́kẹ́lẹ́ sí ara rẹ̀, ó sì wọ ilé-ìgbé.', 'en': 'She entered the kitchen, muttered something to herself, and came out of it. She entered the bathroom, whispered something to herself and went into the toilet.'}
{'yo': 'Ní ìṣẹ́jú kan, ó jáde kúrò nínú yàrá kékeré, ó sì yọjú wo ìyàrá Àlàmú.', 'en': "In a minute, she came out of the small room, and peeped inside Alamu's room."}
{'yo': 'Ó wo yàrá ofìfo náà fírí...', 'en': 'She surveyed the empty room briefly.'}

{'yo': 'Ó rí asọ ìdọ̀tí Àlàmú tí ó kó jọ sórí ibi ìfasọkọ́ onídùró, àti àwọn mìíràn tí ó fọ́nká sí orí ibùsùn.', 'en': "She saw Alamu's dirty clothes piled up on the standing hanger, some of them scattered on the bed."}
{'yo': 'Atòjọ fáílì ìwé dúró lórí tábílì rẹ̀.', 'en': 'A pyramid of files stood on his table.'}
{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn náà ni àwọn jà-ǹ-kárìwọ̀ kọ̀rọ̀ yàrá.', 'en': 'Then those cob-webs in the corners of the room.'}
{'yo': 'Òórùn burúkú kan gba afẹ́fẹ́ inú yàrá Àlàmú.', 'en': "A foul odour permeated the air in Alamu's room."}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ fi ọwọ́ di ihò imú rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Labake held her nostrils.'}

{'yo': 'Gbogbo nǹkan ní ó doríkodò nínú yàrá àjòjì yìí - yàrá ọkùnrin wèrè kan! Làbákẹ́ jan ilẹ̀kùn náà padé, ó sì tún wọ inú yàrá tirẹ̀.', 'en': "Everything was topsy-turvy inside the strange room - the room of a mad man! Labake slammed Alamu's door and went inside her own room again."}
{'yo': 'Ní ìṣẹ́jú mìíràn, ó jáde níbẹ̀ ó sì wọ yàrá ìgbafẹ́, ojú rẹ̀ pọ́n gidi.', 'en': 'In another minute, she came out of it and emerged in the sitting room, her eyes desperately burning red.'}
{'yo': 'Òpin nì yẹn! Ó kù gìrì jáde kúrò ní ilé náà wọ òpópónà.', 'en': 'That was the end! She rushed out of the flat into the street.'}
{'yo': 'Tiyè-tiyè, ó padà wo ilé wọn.', 'en': 'Instinctively, she gazed back at their flat.'}
{'yo': 'Irú àwòrán ìbẹ̀rù wo ní ilé Àlàmú wá dà lójú rẹ̀.', 'en': "What a dreadful picture Alamu's flat now cut in her eyes."}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí wọn kọ́kọ́kó wọ inú ilé náà ní kété tí wọn ṣègbeyàwó, ó wà pẹ̀lú ìrètí gíga láti sọ ilé náà di párádísè.', 'en': 'When they first moved into the flat shortly after their wedding, it was with the high hope of making the place a paradise.'}
{'yo': 'Ó gba Àlàmú níyànjú pé kí ó ra àwọn nǹkan ti yóò mú kí ilé náà rẹwà.', 'en': 'She encouraged Alamu to purchase items that would make the house look exquisite.'}
{'yo': 'Ó sì lo gbogbo ìrírí rẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí ológe àti olùdárà láti jẹ́ kí ilé náà rí dáadáa.', 'en': 'And she used all her experience as a trained model and designer to make the home look good.'}

{'yo': 'Ó kó àwọn àpótí òdòdó sí ojú àwọn fèrèsé, ó fi àwòrán kọ́ sára ògiri ní kọ̀rọ̀ yàrá ìgbafẹ́ àti àwọn iyẹ̀wù.', 'en': 'She rested flower vases on all the window panes, hung photographs neatly on the wall in the corners of the sitting room and the bedrooms.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ra kápéétì ara ọ̀tọ̀ fún yàrá ìgbafẹ́.', 'en': 'They purchased special carpets for the sitting room.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn kọ́tíìnì àti ìbòjú fèrèsé jẹ́ gidi.', 'en': 'The curtains and window blinds were of air quality.'}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo nǹkan inú ilé ló wà létò-létò.', 'en': 'Everything inside the house in order.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn àlejò tó bá wá sí ilé wọn máa ń gbóòórùn òdòdó tútù, wọn sì máa ń kan sárá sí ìyá-ilé náà.', 'en': 'Visitors to their house breathed the smell of fresh flowers and were full of for the lady of the house.'}
{'yo': 'Èyí tẹ́ Làbákẹ́ lọ́rùn.', 'en': 'Labake was grand style - so it seemed pleased.'}
{'yo': 'Ilé ọkọ náà ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ ní ara ọ̀tọ̀ bí ó ṣe jọ.', 'en': 'The matrimonial home had taken off in.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n, ṣe ilé nìyẹn?', 'en': 'But was that truly a home?'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ padà bẹ̀rẹ̀ si í tún ara rẹ̀ bi.', 'en': 'Labake was later compelled to begin asking herself.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé kì í ṣe pé ó kàn dára sí ilé lásán ni, kàkà kí ó fi kọ́ ilé?', 'en': 'Was she not merely decorating a house, instead of building a home?'}

{'yo': 'Kò pẹ́ kí ó tó yé Làbàkẹ́ pé kíkó ilé ọkọ ẹni ju títò àti dídárà si àwọn yàrá ilé lọ.', 'en': 'It did not take Labake a long time to realize that building a good matrimonial home was more than merely furnishing and decorating the rooms of a building.'}

{'yo': 'Ilé gidi ni àwọn ènìyàn - ọkọ àti ìyàwó tí wọn ń bá ara wọn sọ̀rọ̀ tímọ́-tímọ́, tí wọn nífẹ̀ẹ́ ara wọn, tí wọn jọ ń ṣètò, tí wọ́n jọ ń wo ọjọ́ iwájú pẹ̀lú ìrètí àti ìgbàgbọ́ pé ohun gbogbo á dára.', 'en': 'The real home was made up of people - husband and wife interacting intimately with each other, loving each other, planning together, looking ahead to the future with hope and optimism.'}
{'yo': 'Ilé ọkọ gidi kún fún ènìyàn àti ìmọ̀lára ènìyàn.', 'en': 'The real matrimonial home was made of human beings with human feelings.'}
{'yo': 'Kì í ṣe ilé lásán - òrùlé àti ògiri.', 'en': 'Not the building - wall and roof.'}
{'yo': 'Kì í ṣe bí á ṣe dára sí àwọn yàrá, Làbákẹ́ ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ mọ̀.', 'en': 'Not the hypocritical decoration of the rooms, Labake now knew.'}
{'yo': 'Ó fi báàgì ìkọ́pá rẹ̀ sábẹ́ apá rẹ̀ ó sì rìn wọ òpòpónà náà, tí ó ń pé kabúkabú.', 'en': 'She clutched her small handbag firmly under her and walked out into the street hailing a taxi.'}
{'yo': 'Kò pẹ ẹ́, lásìkò yìí, kí ó tó dé Òkè-Àdó.', 'en': 'It did not take her long, this time, to get to Oke-Ado.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé, ọ̀nà àbùjá ò tí ko ṣe é gbà, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ iṣẹ́ ni ìjọba ń ṣe ní títì Agbeni sí Ògùnpa gígùn yẹn.', 'en': 'Although the short-cut was still impassable, a of work had been done by the government on the long Agbeni Ogunpa road.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn òfin ìkóni-níjàánu kan ti wọ ara àwọn awakọ̀ dánfó àti kabúkabú, àti ogun tí wọn dàkọ, àíní-ikora-ẹni-nìjàánu àwọn ọlọ́jà òpòpónà tí ó ti ṣe.', 'en': 'Some discipline was injected into the danfo and taxi drivers and the war against indiscipline with the street had been waged and won too.'}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo wọn ni wọ́n bẹ̀rù òfin tuntun tí àwọn ìjọba fẹ́ fi lẹ́lẹ̀ láìpẹ́.', 'en': 'They all feared the new decree soon to be enforçed by the government.'}

{'yo': '"Awakọ̀ kí awakọ̀ tó bá gbé ọkọ̀ rẹ̀ sọ́nà lọ́nà àìtọ́ á fojú winá ní àwọn ilé ẹjọ́ alágbèéká; awakọ̀ to bá dá ""súnkẹrẹ-fàkẹrẹ"" ọkọ̀ sílẹ̀, wọn á fà á lé ilé-ẹjọ́ lọ́wọ́; àwọn ọlọ́jà tí ó bá tajà ní òpópónà, ìjìyà tí ó le ń dúró dè wọ́n."', 'en': "Any, driver who parked his vehicle wrongly would be summarily dealt with by the mobile courts; any driver who caused a traffic hold-up' would also be handed over to the courts and for traders who engaged in street trading, stiff penalties awaited them."}

{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, òpòpónà wá mọ́ féfé, wíwakọ̀ lópòópónà Agbeni Ògùnpa wá ń dùn mọ́ bí i tí àwọn títì mìíràn nílùú ńlá.', 'en': 'So now, the street was clear and driving on Agbeni Ogunpa road, like every other road of the city, was becoming more and more pleasurable.'}
{'yo': 'Láìpẹ́, Làbákẹ́ ti dé ìyẹ̀wù àwọn agbejọ́rò.', 'en': "Soon Labake was in her lawyers' chambers."}
{'yo': 'Àyíká ìyẹ̀wù náà kì í bà á lẹ́rù mọ́.', 'en': 'The environment in the chambers no longer scared her.'}
{'yo': 'Ó tí mọ́ ọn lára.', 'en': 'It had become familiar to her now.'}

{'yo': 'Ìpayà àti àìbalẹ̀ ọkàn tí ó gbá a mú nígbà àkọ́kọ́ tí ó máa dé ibẹ̀ ti pòórá pátápátá.', 'en': 'The panic and the anxiety which gripped her during her first visit had completely disappeared.'}
{'yo': 'Ara rẹ̀ balẹ̀ báyìí bí ó ṣe ń bá olùgbàlejò iléeṣẹ́ náà sọ̀rọ̀.', 'en': 'She felt at ease now as she spoke freely with the friendly receptionist.'}
{'yo': '"""Ẹ ṣoríire lónìí màdáámú,"" olùgbàlejò náà sọ̀rọ̀ pẹ̀lú ẹ̀rín músẹ́ lẹ́nu,"', 'en': '"""You are lucky today madam\', the receptionist said, presenting a smile."'}
{'yo': '"""Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, ẹ mọ̀ ọ́n rìn. Wọ́n wà nínú ilé."" ""Ṣé lóòótọ́?"""', 'en': '"""Yes, lucky. He\'s in\', ""Really?"'}
{'yo': '"""Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni,"" ""Mo ṣoríire nìyẹn,"" ""Lóòótọ́ ni màdáámú."', 'en': '"Yes, Then I am lucky, ""You are indeed madam."'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ẹ ní láti dúró fún bí i ìṣẹ́jú díẹ̀.', 'en': "But you'll have to wait for a few minutes."}
{'yo': '"Ẹnìkan wà pẹ̀lú wọn."""', 'en': "There's somebody in there with him him'."}
{'yo': '"""Ẹ ṣeun, màá dúró."""', 'en': "Thank you, I'll wait'."}
{'yo': 'Èyí ni ìgbà ẹ̀ẹ̀kẹ́rin tí Làbákẹ́ ti ṣe àbẹ̀wò sí ìyẹ̀wù náà.', 'en': "This was Labake's fourth visit to the chambers."}
{'yo': 'Kò ní àǹfààní láti bá wọn, yàtọ̀ sí ìgbà àkọ́kọ́, kí ó bá ìkankan nínú àwọn agbẹjọ́rò méjèèjì.', 'en': 'She had not been lucky since her first visit, to meet any of the two lawyers.'}
{'yo': 'Ní ọ̀pọ̀ ìgbà wọ́n ti sọ fún un pé wọ́n jáde.', 'en': 'At various times, she had been told they were out.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà kan, wọ́n sọ fún un pé agbẹjọ́rò Mústàfá ti lọ fún ìrìnàjò òwò lókè-òkun.', 'en': 'At one time she was told Lawyer Mustafa had gone on a business trip overseas.'}
{'yo': 'Kò ya Làbákẹ́ lẹ́nu láti gbọ́ ìyẹn.', 'en': 'Labake was not surprised to hear that.'}
{'yo': 'Ó rántí pé ó ti sọ nǹkan tí ó jọ èyí ní ìgbàtí órí iyẹn.', 'en': 'She remembered he had dropped a hint to that effect the other time.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ní òun á rìn ìrìnàjò lọ sí Englandi, Àbí ṣé Amẹ́ríkà ni?', 'en': 'He said he would make a trip to England or, was it to America?'}

{'yo': 'Ní ìgbà àbẹ̀wò mìíràn, wọ́n sọ fún un pé ìkejì agbẹjọ́rò Mústàfá ti lọ ṣe àwíjàre ẹjọ́ kan ní ilé-ẹjọ́ Èkó.', 'en': "During another visit, she was told that Lawyer Mustafa's partner had gone to argue a case in a Lagos Court."}

{'yo': 'Nígbà àbẹwò ìgbẹ̀yìn Làbákẹ́ sí ibẹ̀, ó pàdé akọ̀wé àṣírí àwọn agbẹjọ́rò náà, tí ó fi í lọ́kàn balè pé iṣẹ́ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ lórí ẹjọ́ rẹ̀.', 'en': "During Labake's last visit to chambers she met the lawyers' confidential secretary who assured her that action had started on her case."}
{'yo': 'Wón ti ṣe àkọsílè ẹjọ́ rẹ̀, ọ̀nà àti ṣiṣẹ́ rẹ̀ sì ti jáde.', 'en': 'The case had been registered, and its strategy mapped out by the lawyers.'}

{'yo': 'Ìwé àkójopọ̀ àwòrán ìgbéyàwó, òrùka ìgbéyàwó, àti ìwé-ẹ̀rí ìgbéyàwó tí ó mú wá ni wọ́n ti yẹ̀wò fínní fínní, wọn á sì fi hàn nílé ẹjọ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹ̀rí.', 'en': 'The wedding album, the marriage ring and the certificate she brought had been inspected and would be tendered in court as exhibits.'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ ti tẹ́tí pẹ̀lú ìfọkànsí.', 'en': 'Labake had listened in rapt attention.'}

{'yo': 'Ohun tí ó kù fún un tí akọ̀wé náà sọ ni pé, kí ó pàdé ọ̀kan lára àwọn agbẹjọ́rò méjèèjì fún ìtàkùrọ̀sọ ráńpé.', 'en': 'What remained for her, the secretary said, was to formally meet any of the two lawyers for a brief chat.'}

{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn náà ni wọ́n á gbé ẹjọ́ náà lọ ilé-ẹjọ́, tí wọ́n á fi ìwé ìpèlẹ́jọ́ ráńṣ́ẹ́ sí ọkọ rẹ̀, wọn á sì gbaradì láti lọ sí ilé-ẹjọ́ láti ṣe àwíjàre ẹjọ́ náà.', 'en': 'Then they would quickly file the suit, issue a court summons to her husband, and prepare to go to court to argue the case.'}

{'yo': 'Akọ̀wé àṣírí náà fi í lọ́kàn balẹ̀ pé ẹjọ́ rẹ̀ á rọrùn láti gbá mú, ó yàtọ̀ sí àwọn ẹjọ́ gbẹ̀ ẹ́ gbẹ̀ ẹ́, tí àwọn agbẹjọ́rò náà ti gbá mú.', 'en': 'The confidential secretary had assured her that her case was going to be very easy to prosecute, compared with the other naughty ones the lawyers handled.'}
