{'yo': 'Wọn átètè parí tirẹ̀ ní ìjókòó ẹ̀ẹ̀mejì.', 'en': 'Hers would be quickly disposed of in not more than two proceedings.'}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, oríti bá Làbákẹ́ ṣe é, Á gbọ́ ọ̀rọ̀ lẹ́nu ọlọ́rọ̀.', 'en': "Now Labake was lucky, She would hear it all from the horse's mouth."}
{'yo': 'Ìkejì agbẹjọ́rò Mústàfá wà nínú ilé, á sì lọ bá a láìpẹ́ lórí ọ̀rọ̀ náà.', 'en': "Lawyer Mustafa's partner was in, and she was shortly going to meet him over the matter."}
{'yo': 'Á pàdé agbẹjọ́rò kejì yìí fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́.', 'en': 'She would be meeting this second lawyer for the first time.'}
{'yo': 'Olùgbàlejò tó kóni mọ́ra náà fi í lára balẹ̀, ó ń bá a sọ̀rọ̀ tímọ́tímọ́.', 'en': 'The friendly receptionist kept her at ease, talking intimately to her.'}
{'yo': '"""Àwọn ọmọ náà ńkọ́?"""', 'en': '"""How are the children?"'}
{'yo': '"""Ẹ ṣeun"""', 'en': '"""Thank you."'}
{'yo': '"""Àti bàbá wọn, màdáámú?"""', 'en': '"""And their father, madam?"'}
{'yo': '"""Wọ́n wà dáadáa, ẹ ṣeun,"" Kí tún ni kí Làbákẹ́ sọ?"', 'en': "Fine, thank you', What else would Labake say?"}
{'yo': 'Ojú rè wò. rá-rà-rá oníkálùkù pẹ̀lú ìṣòro tirẹ̀.', 'en': 'Her eyes wandered. Everybody with their own problems.'}
{'yo': 'Bàbá Tinú wà lálàáfíà, àbí ṣe yóò sọ pé kò sí lálàáfíà ni?', 'en': "Tinu's father was alright, would she say he was not alright?"}
{'yo': 'Ojú Làbákẹ́ rí aago ọ̀rún-ọwọ́ wúrà tí ó ń kọ mọ̀nà lọ́rùn ọwọ́ olùgbàlejò náà.', 'en': "Labake's eyes caught the gold watch twinking on the wrist of the receptionist."}
{'yo': 'Ó ṣàkíyèsí ọwọ́ aago náà tí ó ń tàn.', 'en': 'She noted the phosphore scent glow of its tiny hands.'}
{'yo': 'Èyí jẹ́ àǹfàànì fún un láti yí kókó ọ̀rọ̀ wọn padà sí nǹkan gbogbo ògbò.', 'en': 'This was an opportunity for her to change the topic of discussion over to some general things.'}

{'yo': '"""Ẹ ní aago ọrùn-ọwọ́ tó rẹwà,"" Làbákẹ́ sọ èyí, ó ń bá olùgbàlejò náàwí, ""Tuntun ni, àbí?"""', 'en': '"""You have a fine wrist-watch\', Labake observed. addressing the receptionist, ""Newly purchased, I suppose?"""'}
{'yo': '"""Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, màdáámú."', 'en': 'Yes, madam.'}
{'yo': 'Oṣù méjì sèyín la rà á.', 'en': 'Bought only two months ago.'}
{'yo': 'Ìlú Washington la ti rà á, nígbà ìgbádùn àṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ṣe ìgbéyàwó.', 'en': 'We got it in Washington during our honeymoon.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀ko mi náàní irú ẹ̀.', 'en': 'My husband has a similar one.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣéẹ rí i, a jọ máa ń ra nǹkan papọ̀ ni.', 'en': 'You see, we are always purchasing things together.'}
{'yo': 'Bí mo bá ra búláòsì, òun náà á fẹ́ ṣẹ́ẹ̀tì!', 'en': 'Buy a blouse and he would want a shirt!'}
{'yo': 'Bí mo ra ṣẹ́ẹ̀tì kan òun náà á fẹ́ ṣòkòtò kan.', 'en': 'Buy a shirt and he too would want a pair of trousers.'}
{'yo': '"Bí mo bá ra irun aláwọ̀sórí, Olúwa ò! Dàpọ̀ náàá fẹ́ fìlà."""', 'en': 'Buy a wig and, oh my God! Dapo would want a hat!'}
{'yo': '"""Mo rí i. Ó dáa bẹ́ẹ̀"""', 'en': "I see. That's good'."}
{'yo': '"""Ẹ ṣeun màdáámú."', 'en': 'Thank you madam.'}
{'yo': 'À ń gbèrò láti padà lọ ní òpin ọdún yìí láti lọ ra àwọn nǹkan sí i.', 'en': 'We intend to go back at the end of the year to do some more shopping'}
{'yo': 'Ìlú Amẹ́ríkà mà rẹwà.', 'en': 'America is so beautiful.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ nǹkan tó rẹwà ni ó wà láti rà.', 'en': 'Lots and lots of beautiful things to purchase.'}
{'yo': '"Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn èèyàn dáadáa dáadáa ló wà níbẹ̀ láti pàdé"""', 'en': '"Lots of nice, nice people to meet."""'}

{'yo': '"""Òótọ́ ni,"" Kání àsìkò tí inú rẹ̀ dùn ni, Làbákẹ́ ò bá sọ fún olùgbàlejò náà pé òun náà kì í ṣe àjèjì sí ilẹ̀ aláwọ̀ funfun."', 'en': "That's right, In happier times, Labake would have told the receptionist that she too was not a stranger to Uncle Sam's country."}

{'yo': 'Kò bá so ó pé òun ti ṣe àìmọye àbèwò sí Amẹ́ríkà láti Brítéènì, ó sì ti dé gbogbo ìlú ńlá náà.', 'en': 'That she had made several visits to America from Britain, and had toured the great cities extensively.'}
{'yo': 'Ó lọ sí Philadelphia, Los Angeles àti San Francisco; New Orleans àti Chicago.', 'en': 'She was in Philadelphia, Los Angeles and San Francisco, New Orleans and Chicago.'}

{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, nígbà tí inú rẹ̀ ń dùn, Làbákẹ́ ò bá ti ṣe ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tó péye fún olùgbàlejò náà lórí àwọn ibi tí ó lè lọ ní Amẹ́ríkà tíó bá fẹ́ ra nǹkan - párádísè àwọn òǹràjà ni òpópónà Madison ní New York, Neiman Marcus ńlá ní Washington DC àti Tower complex olómí ńlá - tí ó jẹ́ ẹwà Chicago.', 'en': 'Yes, during happier times, Labake would have lectured the receptionist, thoroughly, on where to go in America for shopping the shoppers paradise on Madison Avenue in New York the great Neiman Marcus in Washington DC and the mighty Water Tower Complex - the pride of Chicago.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀rọ̀ tó wà nílẹ̀ nísinsìnyí yàtọ̀', 'en': 'The situation now was quite different.'}
{'yo': '"""Amẹ́ríkà rẹwà"" olùgbàlejò náà tún un sọ, tí ojú rẹ̀ ń dán."', 'en': '"""America is beautiful the receptionist repeated, her eyes shining bright."'}

{'yo': '"Làbákẹ́ gbé e léwòn kíákíá. Èyí jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àwọn arìnrìnàjò lọ sí ""ìlú ọba"" tí ìgbéraga máa ń wọ̀ lẹ́wù tí wọ́n bá padà dé ilé nítorí wọ́n ti jàjà ní àǹfààní àtilọ sí ìlú Amẹ́ríkà tí wọ́n ti lajú."', 'en': 'Labake sized her up quickly. This was one of the travelers to the States who would arrive back at home full of pride at having the rare privilege of visiting civilized America.'}

{'yo': '"Àbẹ̀wò oṣù méjì àbí kínla wọn máa ń mú wọn lọ sí olú-ìlú; wọn á ri àwọn iná òpópónà tí ó ń dán àti òpópónà àìmọye, wọn á wá sáré wálé láti sọ̀rọ̀ ""ẹwà Amẹ́ríkà,"" àwọn àlejò lásán làsàn tí ò mọ nǹkankan nípa àwọn àdúgbó tí ò ṣe é fojú rí ní ìlú òyìnbó."', 'en': "Their two month, or so visit would take them to the state capitals, they would see the glittering street lights and the multiple-carriage highways and then rush back home to talk of beautiful America, mere casual visitors who knew nothing about the ghetto areas in Uncle Sam's country!"}

{'yo': 'Ojú Làbákẹ́ lọ sí ibi ohun ọ̀ṣọ́tó ń danná ní ìka ọwọ́ olùgbàlejò náà - òrùka ìgbéyàwó rẹ̀ .', 'en': "Labake's eyes rested on the sparkling ornament on the receptionist's finger - her wedding ring."}
{'yo': 'Ó ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ ṣe ìgbéyàwó ni lóòótọ́!', 'en': 'She was newly- married truly!'}
{'yo': 'Abájo tí ìdùnnú ṣe kún ojú rẹ̀ tí ó wá di ẹlẹ́jọ́ wẹ́wẹ́.', 'en': 'No wonder her face radiated happiness, and she became talkative.'}
{'yo': 'Abájọ tí ìyè fi kún inú rẹ̀.', 'en': 'No wonder she was so full of life.'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ rí ṣéènì olólùfe tí ó ń mì lọ́rùn rẹ̀.', 'en': "Labake saw a lover's chain dangling from her neck."}
{'yo': '"""Ẹtàsé rírí ọkọ mi,"" olùgbàlejò náà tẹ̀síwájú, ẹnu rẹ̀ kò ṣe é dá dúró!"', 'en': '"""You missed seeing my husband, the Receptionist continued, her mouth would not be stopped!"'}

{'yo': '"""Ẹ tàsé rẹ̀ fún bí i ìṣẹ́jú díẹ̀ màdáámú, ó lọ lẹ́yìn ìgbà tí ó fẹ́rẹ̀ ẹ́ lè fìfẹ́ yí mi lórí, ó sì ṣèlérí láti wá gbé mi ní aago mẹ́ta ààbọ̀ gérégé."', 'en': 'You missed him just by a few minutes madam, he just left after teasing me crazy, and promising he would come back to pick me on the dot of three thirty.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣe ẹ rí i, màdáámú, òjòwú ọkùnrin ni mo ní lọ́kọ.', 'en': 'You see, madam, I have a jealous man for a husband.'}
{'yo': 'Dàpọ̀ ò lè gbà láti rí i pé mo ṣe ìṣẹ́jú kan ní àsìkò èlé iṣẹ́ níbi.', 'en': "Dapo can't stand me uing a minute over-time work here."}
{'yo': 'Kò ní í jẹ́ kí n dájáde.', 'en': "Won't allow to go out alone."}

{'yo': '"Á máa sọ ọ́ ní gbogbo ìgbà pé ""wò ó olólùfẹ́, ohun tí Ọlọ́run Ọba báti so pọ̀, kí ẹnikẹ́ni má ṣe tú u ká"""', 'en': "And would always tell me, ok darling, what God has joined together, let no one put asunder'"}

{'yo': 'Lèyín náà, á fà mí lẹ́rẹ̀kẹ́ jẹ́jẹ́, á wá lẹ̀ mọ́ mi, bí ìgbà tí ènìyàn kan bá wà nítòsí tó fẹ́ gbà mí mọ́ ọn lọ́wọ́ nígbàkugbà.', 'en': 'Then, pull at my cheeks tenderly, cling on to me as if somebody, close at hand, would snatch me from him any minute.'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ gbójú kúrò, ó sún pèlú ìnira lórí ìjókòó.', 'en': 'Labake looked away, she shifted uncomfortably on the chair.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ti ń jowu olùgbàlejò yìí pẹ̀lú ìgbéraga àti ayọ̀ tó farahàn.', 'en': 'She was already becoming envious of this receptionist in obvious connubial elation.'}

{'yo': '"Ọ̀rọ̀ ""Ohun tí Ọlọ́run Ọba ti so pọ̀"" rẹ̀ wọ ọpọlọ rẹ̀ débi ipò àìlọ́pọlọ, tí ""kí ẹnikẹ́ni má ṣe yà wọ́n"" rẹ̀ gún un lọ́kàn bí ẹ̀gún."', 'en': 'Her what God has joined together jerked her brain to a state of insensibility, and the let no man put asunder pricked her in the mind like a thorn.'}

{'yo': 'Dájúdájú, kìí ṣe ìgba àkọ́kọ́ tí yóò gbọ́ ọ̀rọ̀náà nìyen, ó jẹ́ ọ̀rọ̀ tí kò ṣàjèjì.', 'en': 'Surely, that was not the first time she would hear the expression, it was a hackneyed expression.'}

{'yo': 'Ó ti gbọ́ ọ nígbà mọ́kànlélẹ́gbẹ̀rún, ṣùgbọ́n kí wọ́n rán an létí nínú àsìkò yìí tó láti mú kí ọkàn rẹ̀ máa lù kì-kì-kì bí ìgbà tí wọ́n fòlù lù ú.', 'en': "She'd heard it a thousand and one times, but to be reminded of it at this point in time was enough to make the heart pound violently as if under the weight of a sledge hammer."}

{'yo': 'Láìpẹ́, ìlẹ̀kùn inú ìyẹ̀wú náàṣí sílè, ọkùnrin sísanra kan tí ó wọ agbádá kúrò ní ọ́fíìsì agbẹjọ́rò.', 'en': "Very soon, the inner door of the chambers opened, and a fat man in agbada left the lawyers' office."}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n pe Làbákẹ́ wọlé ní ìsẹ́jú kan, ó sì bá ara rẹ̀ níwájú ọkùnrin tí yóò bá a tú ohun tí Ọlọ́run ti so pọ̀ ká - ìkejì agbẹjọ́rò Mústàfá.', 'en': "Labake was ushered in and in a minute, found herself face to face with the man who would help her put asunder what God has joined together - Lawyer Mustafa's partner."}
{'yo': '"""Ẹ wọlé síbí màdáámú."', 'en': 'Come right in madam.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹtúra ká.', 'en': 'Feel free.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ mú ìjókòó.', 'en': 'Take a chair'}
{'yo': '"Ẹ káàbọ̀,"" agbẹjọ́rò tí ó wọ súùtù aláwò eérú, tí ó sì kan ìgò dúdú mọ́jú, bá a wí."', 'en': 'You are welcome, the lawyer in grey suit and dark glasses addressed her'}
{'yo': '"""Ẹ̀yin ni ìyáàfin Àlàmú Ọláoyè?"""', 'en': '"""You are Mrs. Alamu Olaoye?"'}
{'yo': '"""Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni... bẹ́ẹ̀... bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, ""Fún ìsìnyí màdáámú?"""', 'en': 'Yes... Yes... Yes, At least for now madam?'}
{'yo': '"""Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni. Ẹ ṣeun"""', 'en': 'Yes. Thank you.'}
{'yo': '"""Èmi ni ẹjọ́ yín wà ní ìkáwọ́ rẹ̀, ṣé ó tẹ́ ẹ yín lọ́rùn?"""', 'en': '"""I am handling your case, is that alright with you?"'}
{'yo': '"""Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni,"" ""Ẹ́ fẹ́ kọ ọkọ yín sílẹ̀?"""', 'en': '"""Yes, You want a divorce?"'}
{'yo': '"""Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni."" ""Ẹnìkejì mi ti fún mi ní ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́ àlàyé."', 'en': '"""Yes."" My partner has given me all the details."'}
{'yo': 'Ohùn yín tí a gbà sílẹ̀ náà wà níbí.', 'en': 'Your tape recorded statement is also here.'}
{'yo': '"Ṣe ẹ ò ní nǹkan tí ẹ fẹ́ fi kún àwọn nǹkan tíẹ ti sọ fún wa?"""', 'en': "You have anything more to add to what you've already told"}
{'yo': '"""Rárá. Kò sí nǹkankan. Rárá ẹm ..."""', 'en': 'No. Nothing. No em...'}
{'yo': '"""Màdáámú ẹ wá. Ẹ sọ̀rọ̀ sókè. Dáadáa."""', 'en': 'Come madam. Speak up. Well.'}
{'yo': '"""Ẹnnn ...yàtọ̀ sí pé mo fẹ́ kí ẹjọ́ náà yanjú ni kòpẹ́ kòpẹ́ yìí ẹm..ẹm."""', 'en': 'Except... Except that... that I want the case disposed of as quickly as em.. em.'}
{'yo': '"""Ó yé mi bí o ṣe ń ṣe yín màdáámú."', 'en': 'Can understand your anxiety madam.'}
{'yo': 'A ti ṣetán ní ọ̀dọ̀ wa níbí.', 'en': 'We are ready at our end here.'}
{'yo': '"Kò sí ìṣòro."""', 'en': 'No problem.'}
{'yo': '"""Ẹ ṣeun, mo fẹ́ kí ẹjọ́ náà tètè níyanjú kíákíá nítorí pe."""', 'en': 'Thank you, I want the case settled quickly because.'}
{'yo': '"""Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, màdáámú. Ẹ túra ká... Nítorí pé?"""', 'en': 'Yes, madam. Feel free... Because?'}
{'yo': '"""Nítorí pé ọkùnrin yìí lè pamí lára nígbàkúùgbà"""', 'en': '"Because, this man can harm me any time."""'}
{'yo': '"""Ṣé lóòótọ́?"""', 'en': 'Is that so?'}
{'yo': '"""Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, orí rẹ̀ ti yí. Ó ti ya wèrè..."""', 'en': '"""Yes, he is now out of his mind. He had gone mad..."'}
{'yo': '"""Ẹ sọ fún mi! ó dáa."', 'en': 'Tell me! OK.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ má ṣèyọnu màdáámú, tó bá dọ̀la à á lọ sílé ẹjọ́.', 'en': "Don't worry madam, tomorrow we go to court."}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹn ńkọ́?', 'en': 'How about that?'}
{'yo': '"Ṣé ẹ fẹ́ ẹ́ bẹ́ẹ̀?"""', 'en': 'Do you like it that way?'}
{'yo': '"""Ẹ ṣeun gan an ni."', 'en': '"""Thank you very much."'}
{'yo': '"Nǹkan tí mo fẹ́ nìyẹn."""', 'en': '"That is what I want."""'}
{'yo': '"""Ṣé inú yín ti dùn báyìí ìyáàfin Ọláoyè?"""', 'en': '"""You are happy now Mrs. Olaoye?"'}

{'yo': '"""Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni. Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni."" Kò ye Làbákẹ́ ìdí tí ojú fi ń tì í tó yìí níwájú agbẹjọ́rò náà."', 'en': '"""Yes. Yes. Labake could not understand why she felt so shy in the presence of the lawyer."'}
{'yo': 'Ó lẹ̀ jẹ́ nítorí pé ó ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ ń pàdé rẹ̀ fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́.', 'en': 'It might be because she was meeting him for the first time.'}

{'yo': 'Ó lè jẹ́ pé àwọn ìbéèrè náà ń bá a lójijì bí i àdó olóró alùgbàù. Tàbí ìtàkurọ̀sọ òun pẹ̀lu olùgbàlejò ẹ̀ẹ̀kan ló dúró lọ́kàn rẹ̀ púpọ̀.', 'en': 'It might be because those questions came dropping on her like bombshells. Or that her earlier conversation with the receptionist had weighed on her subconscious mind so much.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹhn... Ohunkóhun tí ì bá à fà á, ó kàn ṣàkíyèsí pé òun kò lè wojú agbejọ́rò rẹ̀ tààrà.', 'en': "Well... Whatever the Reason, she just discovered she couldn't look her lawyer straight in the face."}

{'yo': 'Ó dáhùn gbogbo ìbéèrè rẹ̀ láìwojú rẹ̀, á wo ògiri èyìn rẹ̀, á wo àwọn ìwé ńlá ńlá tó wà lórí pẹpẹ ńlá tàbí kí ó gbójú sílẹ̀ máa wo rọ́ọ̀gì fẹ́lẹ́fẹ́lẹ́ ọ́fíìsì náà.', 'en': 'She answered all his questions dodging him, looking at the wall over his head, gazing at the fat books on the big shelf or looking down at the soft office rug.'}
{'yo': 'Kò dá a lójú pé agbẹjọ́rò náà kò ṣàkíyèsí àìbalẹ̀ ara rẹ̀.', 'en': 'She was not sure the lawyer himself did not notice her nervousness.'}

{'yo': 'Bóyá ìdí tí ó fi ń sọ fún un pé kí ó túra ká nìyẹn, kí ó ṣe pẹ̀lẹ́pẹ̀lẹ́ pé kí ó má ṣèyọnu pé kò sí ìṣoro.', 'en': 'That was probably why he kept telling her to feel free to take things easy, not to worry, that there was no problem.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣàdéédé, ni agbẹjọ́rò náà gbé ohùn rẹ̀ sókè, ó ní:', 'en': 'Suddenly, the lawyer raised his voice and said:'}
{'yo': '"""Wò mí dáadáa."', 'en': '"""Look at me properly."'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ wò mí! Wojú mi!', 'en': 'Labake look at me! See my face!'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé o ò mọ̀ mí ni?', 'en': "Don't you know me?"}
{'yo': '"Ṣá à ti pàdé láìmọye ìgbà rí?"""', 'en': "Haven't we met several times before?"}

{'yo': 'Agbẹjọ́rò náà yọ ìgò dúdú ojú rẹ̀ kúrò, kíyèsi, ojú tí ó wo Làbákẹ́ kò ṣe ojú ẹlòmìíràn yàtò sí ojú agbẹjọ́rò Àdìó, ọ̀rẹ́ Àlàmú tímọ́tímọ́!', 'en': "The lawyer removed his dark glasses and behold, the face that gazed back at Labake was the face of no other person but that of Lawyer Adio, Alamu's bosom friend!"}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ wò ó láìgbàgbọ́, nǹkan tí ó ṣẹlẹ̀ nínú rẹ̀ lẹ́sẹ̀kẹsẹ̀ ò ṣe é ṣ̀àpèjúwe.', 'en': 'Labake gazed at him in disbelief, What immediately went on inside her was indescribable.'}
{'yo': 'Fún ìgbà pípẹ́, ó wò, wò,ó wò.', 'en': 'For a very long time, she gazed and gazed.'}
{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn náàni ó bẹ̀rẹ̀ si í mí lóke, ó ń wò bí i ẹni tí ó rí òkú.', 'en': "Then she started breathing heavily, staring as if she'd seen an apparition."}
{'yo': 'Àwọn méjèèjì jókòó láìsọ̀rọ̀, wọ́n wo ara wọn pẹ̀lú ìyàlẹ́nu ńlá àti àìgbàgbọ́.', 'en': 'The two of them sat speechless, regarding each other with utmost wonder and incredulity.'}
{'yo': 'Ó jé ìpàdé àìròtẹ́lẹ̀ tí ó kan Làbákẹ́ gbọ̀ngbọ̀n bí ìgbà tí iná bá gbé e.', 'en': 'It was a most unexpected meeting which affected Labake like an electric shock'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n àsìkò yìí ni agbẹjọ́rò Àdìó tí ń dúró dè tipẹ́.', 'en': 'But this was the moment Lawyer Adio had been waiting for ever since.'}

{'yo': 'Ó ti yẹ fáìlì tí agbẹjọ́rò mústàfá ṣí sílẹ̀ tí ó sì ta àtaré rẹ̀ sí i kí ó tó di wí pé ó rìn ìrìnàjò kúrò ní orílẹ̀-èdè.', 'en': "He'd gone through the file which Lawyer Mustafa created and later transferred to him before he travelled out of the country."}

{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú etí Àdìó ni ó fi gbọ́ gbogbo nǹkan tí Làbákẹ́ ní láti sọ nípa ìbáṣepọ̀ rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ọ̀rẹ́ òun.', 'en': "With Adio's ears wide open, he'd heard all that Labake had to say concerning her association with his friend."}

{'yo': 'Ó jẹ́ ìsípa yátí ó mi èèyàn tìtì, ó ti rí ìwé àkójo àwòrán ìgbéyàwó wọn, ó ti ṣàgbéyẹ̀wò ìwé-ẹ̀ríìgbéyàwó wọn pẹ̀lú ìka ọwọ́tó ń gbọ̀n rìrì.', 'en': "It was a most shocking revelation, he'd seen their wedding album and had inspected their marriage certificate with trembling fingers."}
{'yo': 'Láti ìgbà náà, ni ó ti ń dúró pẹ̀lú inú dídùn fún àsìkò yìí láti wáyé.', 'en': 'And ever since, had been waiting with almost uncontrollable excitement, for this moment to come.'}

{'yo': 'Nísinsìnyí, níbí ni ó wà, lójúkojú pẹ̀lú ìyàwó ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ̀ nígbẹ̀yìn gbẹ́yín. Ó ṣàjèjì, àbí bẹ́ẹ̀ kọ́ Làbákẹ́?', 'en': "Now, here he was, face to face with his friend's wife at last Stance. Strange, isn't it Labake?"}
{'yo': '"""Àdìó sọ ọ́ jẹ́jẹ́. Ó dáa, má ṣèyọnu rárá."', 'en': "Adio said slowly, Don't worry at all."}
{'yo': 'Jẹ́ ká a sọ̀rọ̀.', 'en': "Let's get talking."}

{'yo': 'Ki í ṣe bí i ọ̀rọ̀ agbẹjọ́rò àti oníbàárà rẹ̀, ṣùgbọ́n bí i afẹ́nifére ìdílé, tí ó bá ìyàwó ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ̀ tí ó ṣe é fọkàn tán sọ̀rọ̀.', 'en': 'Now as lawyer talking to his client, but as the -Wisher of the family talking to the wife of his good friend.'}
{'yo': '"Ǹ jẹ́ a lè ṣe ìyẹn Làbákẹ́?"""', 'en': 'Could we do that Labake?'}

{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ kò fèsì, ó hàn gbangba pé kò tí ì ṣàṣeyọrí gbígba ara rẹ̀ sílẹ̀ lọ́wọ́ ìdààmútó ń lọ nínú rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Labake did not answer, obviously, she had not Succeed in extricating herself from the ensuring to readjust her internal confusion.'}
{'yo': 'Àdìó fún un lásìkò díẹ̀ láti fi í lára balẹ̀.', 'en': 'Adio gave her some more time.'}

{'yo': 'Englandi ni ó ti rí Àdìó gbẹ̀yìn, ní àsìkò yẹn, Àdìó ṣe ìmúdúró ìbáṣepọ̀ rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú Àlàmú.', 'en': 'It was in England she last met Adio, at that time Adio maintained a steady association with Alamu.'}
{'yo': 'Ènìyàn méjì pẹ̀lú ẹ̀mí kan, ni wọ́n máa ń pè wọ́n.', 'en': 'Two people with one soul, they used to call them.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n bá ara wọn mu bí ìdodo ẹ̀fọn, ọ̀rọ̀ wọn kòtàsé ara wọn rí.', 'en': 'They fitted like a pair of gloves and together played a tune that never registered a discordant note.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà náà, Àdìó jẹ́ akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ìmọ̀-òfin, tí Àlàmú sì jẹ́ akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ìmọ̀-ìṣirò.', 'en': 'Adio was then a law student and Alamu an accountancy student.'}
{'yo': 'Yunifásitì kan náà ni àwọn méjèèjì si lọ.', 'en': 'Both of them attending the same university.'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ rántí ẹ̀ẹ̀mejì tí Àdìó dá sí ìjà wọn lórí ọ̀rọ̀ Josephine àti Caroline.', 'en': 'Labake remembered Adio mediating on two occassions in their quarrel over Josephine and Caroline.'}

{'yo': 'Ó rántí òde àìlópin wọn papọ̀ lọ sí tíátà àti ilé sinimá pẹ̀lú Àdìó àti ọ̀rẹ́bìnrin rẹ̀ Lará.', 'en': 'He remembered their endless trips together to the theatres and the cinema houses with Adio and his girlfriend Lara.'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ rántí àbẹ̀wò òpin-ọ̀sẹ̀ wọn lọ sí àwọn ìgbèríko nígbàtí wọ́n ṣì wà ní Englandi.', 'en': 'Labake remembered their weekend visits to the suburbs whilst in England.'}
{'yo': 'Ó wo Àdìó dáadáa nísinsìnyí. Òun fúnrarẹ̀ ṣe wá gọ̀ báyìí. Ó ponú.', 'en': 'She looked at Adio closely now. She was like a fool really. She was being stupid.'}
{'yo': 'Báwo ni ó ṣe yára gbàgbé Àdìó kíá bẹ́ẹ̀?', 'en': 'How could she have forgotten Adio so easily?'}
{'yo': 'Ó ń fi ara rẹ̀ ṣe yẹ̀yẹ́.', 'en': 'She was making a fool of herself.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ń wò ó láìsọ̀rọ̀.', 'en': 'She watched him, speechless.'}
{'yo': 'Lèyín tí ó jàjà mí ìmí ìtura, Àdìó bèèrè pé:', 'en': 'When finally she heaved a sign of relief, Adio asked:'}
{'yo': '"""Ṣé wà á wá sọ pé mi ò kún ojú òṣùnwọ̀n láti bá ẹ sọ̀rọ̀ yìí Làbákẹ́?"""', 'en': '"""Would you say now that I am not qualified to discuss this topic with you Labake?"'}
{'yo': '"""Rárá...rárá...,"" Làbákẹ́ rọra dáhùn tìrònú tìrònú"', 'en': '"""Na... No... Labake answered slowly, meditatively,"'}
{'yo': '"""Ki í ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀. Ṣùgbọ́n. Ṣùgbọ́n. ẹm..."""', 'en': '"""Not that. But. But. em..."'}
{'yo': '"""Wò ó Làbákẹ́, tí o bá ṣì wà lórí pé o fẹ́ ṣẹjọ́ ìkọ̀sílẹ̀ ní ilé-ẹjọ́, mi ò ní ní ko má ṣe é."', 'en': "Look Labake, if you insist on contesting the divorce in court, I won't stop you."}
{'yo': '"Ṣùgbọ́n nǹkan tí mò ń sọ ni pé, a ṣì lè yanjú ọ̀rọ̀ náà..."""', 'en': 'But all I am saying is that we can still talk about the matter...'}
{'yo': 'Èmi àti ẹ...', 'en': 'You and me...'}
{'yo': '"""Hun....bẹ́ẹ̀ ni"" ""Ó dáa bẹ́ẹ̀.......mo dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ ẹ fún ìyẹn Làbákẹ́."', 'en': '"""Hum. Yes.\' ""Good.., And thank you Labake for that."'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé o ní Àlàmú fìyà jẹ ẹ́?', 'en': 'Did you say Alamu ill-treated you?'}
{'yo': '"""Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni."" ""Báwo? - ṣé ó ń nà ọ́ ni?"', 'en': '"""Yes. How? - Probably beating you?"'}
{'yo': '"""Rárá."" ""Ṣé kò tí ì gbé ọwọ́ rẹ̀ sókè láti nà ọ́ lẹ́ẹ̀kan rí?"', 'en': "No. Hasn't he raised up his hands to beat you once?"}
{'yo': '"Kí ó gbá ọ létí? tàbí nǹkan?"""', 'en': 'Slap you? Or something?'}
{'yo': '"""Kò tí ì ṣe ìyẹn"""', 'en': "He has not done that.'"}
{'yo': '"""Mo rí bẹ́ẹ̀. Á jẹ́ pé ó ti fìyà jẹ ẹ́ lọ́nà mìíràn nìyẹn?"""', 'en': 'I see. He must have punished you then - in some other way?'}
{'yo': '"""Hùn...hùn..."" ""Àwọn ìdáhùnsi ìmúnibínú ńkọ́?"', 'en': '"""Hum.. Hum... What about provocative utterances?"'}
{'yo': 'Bí i kó pariwo. Kí ó kígbe mọ́ ẹ?', 'en': 'Like shouting. Yelling on you?'}
{'yo': '"Kí ó fìbínú dáhùn, àti àwọn mìíràn."" ""Rárá."""', 'en': 'Talking angrily, and the rest of it. No.'}
{'yo': '"""Kò sí nǹkan tí ó jọbẹ́ẹ̀?"', 'en': 'Nothing like that?'}
{'yo': 'Àdìó béèrè, ó sì rẹ́rìn-ín músẹ́.', 'en': 'Adio asked, then smiled.'}
{'yo': '"""Báwo ni ọ̀rẹ́ mi ṣé wá fìyà jẹ ọ́ Làbákẹ́?"', 'en': '"""How then has my friend ill-treated you Labake?"'}

{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ ronú fún ìṣẹ́jú kan, ó gbìyànjú láti rántí àpẹẹrẹ àwọn ìgbà tí ó jìyà lọ́wọ́ Àlàmú.', 'en': "Labake reflected for a minute, she tried to remember some instances of ill-treatment that she'd suffered in the hands of Alamu."}
{'yo': 'ó dánu dúró, ó ń wo òkè àjà, kò sí àpẹẹrẹ tí ó wá sí i lọ́kàn ní kíá.', 'en': 'She paused, looking up at the ceiling, no example readily came to her mind.'}
{'yo': '"""Mi ò mọ̀, Ṣùgbọ́n mo ṣáà mọ̀ pé ó fìyà jẹ mí."""', 'en': "I don't know, but I just know that he ill-treated me."}
{'yo': 'Àdìó tún rẹ́rìn-ín músẹ́.', 'en': 'Adio smiled again.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ wo bí Làbákẹ́ ṣe ń koṣé níbi ìfọ̀rọ̀wánilẹ́nuwò abẹ́lé!', 'en': '"See Labake flopping in an ""under-the-roof cross-examination!"'}

{'yo': 'Tí ó bá jẹ́ ìfọ̀rọ̀wánilẹ́nuwò amúnigbọ̀n ti ilé-ẹjọ́ ni, á ti jẹ́wọ́ pé òun lòun ṣẹ̀, á tọrọ ìdáríjì tàbí àánú.', 'en': 'If it were the rigorous Cross-examination, in court then she would own up that she was wrong and ask for pardon or leniency!'}
{'yo': '"""Ṣé o ní Àlàmú ti ya wèrè, Làbákẹ́?"""', 'en': 'Did you say Alamu is mad, Labake?'}
{'yo': '"""Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, ìyẹn ò rúni lójú"""', 'en': 'Yes, that is clear.'}
{'yo': '"""Ẹẹẹn? Ṣé ìyẹn lè jẹ́ òótọ́ ṣá?"', 'en': 'What? Could that be true really?'}
{'yo': '"Báwo ni o ṣe mọ ìyẹn?"""', 'en': 'How did you know that?'}
{'yo': '"""Ẹ̀rín ni ó máa ń rín ní gbogbo ìgbà."', 'en': 'He is always laughing.'}
{'yo': 'Ọtí mímu àti sìgá fífà ní gbogbo ìgbà.', 'en': 'Always drinking and smoking.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ti kó gbogbo ohun èèlò inú ilé lọ tán.', 'en': "He's carried away all the items in the house."}
{'yo': '"Kì í túraká rárá."""', 'en': "Always moody.'"}
{'yo': '"""Kí lo ti ṣé nípa gbogbo èyí?"', 'en': 'What did you do about all these?'}
{'yo': '"Ṣé o ti gbìyànjú àti bá a sọ ó rí?"""', 'en': 'Have you ever tried to talk him out of it?'}
{'yo': '"""Ó máa ń lọ́ra láti sọ̀rọ̀"""', 'en': '"""He\'s always reluctant to talk."'}
{'yo': '"""Ṣé o mọ̀ bóyá ó ní ìṣoro kankan?"""', 'en': 'Do you know whether he has problems?'}
{'yo': '"""Ìṣoro? Bóyá, irú ìṣòro wo?"', 'en': 'Problem? May be, what type of problem?'}
{'yo': '"Èmi ò mọ̀ síìṣòro kankan."""', 'en': "I don't know of any problem."}
{'yo': '"""O ò tí ì ṣàmúlò àsìkò láti fi wádìí."', 'en': '"""You have not taken time to find out."'}
{'yo': 'Ó dáa, Làbákẹ́, jẹ́ kí n sọ èyí fún ọ, pé ọkọ rẹ ní àwọn ìṣòro.', 'en': 'Well, Labake, let me tell you this, that your husband has problems.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ìṣòro tí ó tó mú ọkàn rẹ̀ kúrò - ọkàn ẹnikẹ́ni.', 'en': "Problems enough to distract his attention - anybody's attention."}
{'yo': 'Ìṣòro tí ó tó láti mú ayé sú ẹnikẹ́ni.', 'en': 'Problems enough to frustrate any man.'}
{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìyàwó tó fẹ́ràn rẹ̀ dáadáa, ó yẹ kí o gbìyànjú láti ba a sọ̀rọ̀.', 'en': 'As a wife who loves him so well, you should try and talk things over with him.'}
{'yo': 'Èmi pẹ̀lú ọkọ rẹ máa ń ríra dáadáa.', 'en': 'Your husband and I see quite often.'}
{'yo': 'Kò ya wèrè. Mo mọ ìyẹn dájú.', 'en': 'He is not mad. That much I know.'}
{'yo': 'Ó lè má fọkàn sí o.', 'en': 'He may be absent-minded.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n kò ya wèrè.', 'en': 'But he is not mad.'}
{'yo': 'Àlàmú ò ya wèrè.', 'en': 'Alamu is not mad.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀rẹ́ mi ò ya wèrè.', 'en': 'My friend is not mad.'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ si í làágùn.', 'en': 'Labake had started perspiring.'}

{'yo': 'Ó ṣé e bí ìgbà tó bá wà ní ìlú àlá, kò retí nǹkan tí ó rí àti èyítí ó sì gbọ́. Nǹkankan dè é mọ́lẹ̀, ó ń dì í mú láti fò sókè láti orí ìjókòó rẹ̀, kí ó rìn jáde, kí ó sì pariwo;', 'en': 'She felt as if she was in dreamland, really she did not bargain for what she saw and heard. She was seized with the urge to jump up from her seat, walk out and snap'}
{'yo': 'Dánudúró! Dánudúró! Agbẹjọ́rò aláhọ́n oyin! Má yí mi lọ́kàn padà!', 'en': 'Stop! Stop! Lawyer of the honey tongue! Stop persuading me!'}
{'yo': '"Má fi ẹnu dídùn rẹ tàn mí mọ́! Màá kọ ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ sílẹ̀!."""', 'en': "Stop cajoling me with your sugar tongue! i'll divorce your friend!"}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n kàkà kí óṣéèyí, Làbákẹ́ lẹ̀dí mọ́ àga tí ó jókòó lé.', 'en': 'But instead Labake pressed herself more firmly to the chair she sitting on.'}
{'yo': 'Nǹkan tí Àdìó ń sọ ń ṣiṣé àmúmọ́lẹ̀.', 'en': 'What Adio was saying had a shoking effect.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n jẹ́ nǹkan tí kò fẹ́ gbọ́, Ṣùgbọ́n kò ní agbára láti yẹ gbígbọ́ rẹ̀ - láìnídìí kankan.', 'en': 'They were things she did not want to hear but which she had no power to stop listening to - for no obvious reason.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ó ní láti fèsì sí díẹ̀ lára àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ náà tí Àdìó ń sọ, bi bẹ́ẹ̀ kọ́, Àdìó á kó gbogbo ẹ̀bi lé e, á sì dá a lẹ́bi gbogbo rẹ̀.', 'en': 'But she had to speak up to some of the issues Adio was now raising, otherwise, Adio would heap all the blame on her and declare her guilty through and through.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ti gbaradì pípé nìgbà tí Àdìó ní;', 'en': 'She was fully prepared, therefore, when Adio said:'}
{'yo': '"""Làbákẹ́ o ò jẹ́ kí ìyá ọ̀rẹ́ mi mọ̀ nípa gbogbo èyí, àbí ṣé o jẹ́ kí wọ́n mọ̀?"""', 'en': '"""Labake you did not let my friend\'s mother know all about these did you?\'"'}

{'yo': '"""Màmá?,"" Làbákẹ́ dáhùn, ""Kò sí orúkọ tí màmá ò pè mí tán - èṣù, aṣoju ọ̀tá, apààyàn -tí wọ́n ní èmi ni mò ń ṣé ọmọ àwọn, tí wọ́n lérí láti pa mí tí mi ò bá kó jáde ní ilé ọmọ àwọn lẹ́sẹ̀kesẹ̀."', 'en': '"""Mama?"" retorted Labake, ""Mama called me all sorts of names devil, enemies\' agent, murderer holding me responsible for her son\'s plight, threatening to kill me if I did not pack out of her son\'s house immediately."'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ṣépè, wọ́n sì gégùn-ún fún mi.', 'en': 'She swore oaths at me and cursed me.'}
{'yo': 'Mi ò lè sọ gbogbo nǹkan tójú mi rí lọ́wọ́ ìyá rẹ̀ tán báyìí.', 'en': 'I cannot relate now all I have suffered in the hands of his mother.'}
{'yo': 'Mi ò sì lè gbàgbé.', 'en': 'I can never forget.'}
{'yo': '"Mi ò lérò pé mo lè dárí jìn ín láé pẹ̀lú."""', 'en': '"I don\'t think I will ever forgive either."""'}

{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ tú èrò ọkàn rẹ̀, pẹ̀lú ìbínú sín ǹ kan tí ó pè ní àìṣòtítọ́ nínú àníyàn àti fọ ara rẹ̀ mọ́. Inú Àdìó sì dùn.', 'en': 'Labake unburdened her mind, out of anger at what she considered sheer injustice out of the anxiety to exonerate herself. Adio was happy.'}
{'yo': '"""Ìyẹn dára,"" ó sọ èyí, ""O rí i sọ Làbákẹ́."', 'en': '"That\'s good\' he said, ""You have a point Labake."'}
{'yo': 'O sì sọ ọ dáa, Ṣùgbọ́n rántí, Làbákẹ́, màmá ti dàgbà.', 'en': 'And you have made it beautifully, but remember, Labake, mama is old.'}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀wọ́ ìran mìíràn ni wọ́n ti wá - ará àtijọ́, aláṣà ni wọ́n, wọ́n sì tún máa ń gbàgbọ́ nínú nǹkan tí ò tó nǹkan.', 'en': 'She belongs to a different generation, old fashioned, traditional and superstitious.'}

{'yo': 'Tún rò ó, Làbákẹ́, nǹkan tí màmá ṣe ni ìyá tèmi náà ì bá ṣe bó bá jẹ́ àwọn.', 'en': 'Come to think of it, Labake, what Mama did is exactly what my own old mother would have done too in similar circumstance.'}
{'yo': 'Ó yẹ kí o mọ gbogbo èyí Làbákẹ́.', 'en': 'You should know all these Labake.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀rẹ́ mi ò lè fọwọ́ sí ti màmá, àbíṣé ó fọwọ́ sí ọ̀rọ̀ màmá?', 'en': "My friend couldn't have approved of Mama's stand, did he approve of it?"}
{'yo': 'Mo jẹ́ rìí ọ̀rẹ́ mi. Làbákẹ́ rò ó, ó sì sọ ọ́ jẹ́jẹ́ pé,', 'en': 'I trust my friend. Labake reflected and slowly she said,'}
{'yo': '"""Rárá. Rárá... Kò ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀, Kò tiè gbọ́ sí i."', 'en': "No. No... He did not, he's not aware of it."}
{'yo': 'Ìgbà kán wà ti mo fẹ́ sọ fún un, Ṣùgbọ́n kò ní í gbọ́.', 'en': 'There was a time I wanted to let him know of it, but he would not listen.'}
{'yo': 'Nítorí náà, mí ò sọ fún un mọ́.', 'en': 'So, I stopped talking about it to him.'}
{'yo': '"""Lọ́rọ̀ kan,"" Àdìó dáhùn, ""ọ̀rẹ́ mi ò mọ nǹkankan nípa ìhùwàsí màmá?"""', 'en': "In other words', Adio interjected, 'my friend did not know anything about Mama's behaviour?'"}

{'yo': '"""Rárá,"" fún ìdí èyí, a kò lè dá a lẹ́bi... O ò lè dáa lẹ́bi fún nǹkan tí kò mọ̀ nípa."', 'en': '"""No, so we cannot blame him... you cannot blame him for something he did not know about."'}
{'yo': 'Má jẹ́ kí a dá a lẹ́bi Làbákẹ́.', 'en': "Don't let us blame him Labake."}
{'yo': 'Àdìó tún ti ní àmì ayò mìíràn!', 'en': 'Adio had scored another point!'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ ń bínú sí ara rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Labake was annoyed with herself.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ò báṣé pé ó bá a lójijì ni, kò bá ti gbé ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ kalẹ̀ lọ́nà tí ó dáa jù báyìí lọ.', 'en': 'If she had not been caught unawares, she probably would have presented her case in a more coherent way.'}

{'yo': 'Nísinsìnyí, kò mọ̀ bóyá kí ó tẹ̀síwájú pẹ̀lú ọ̀rọ̀ náà, tàbí kí ó tọrọ gáfárà lọ́wọ́ Àdìó.', 'en': "And now she didn't know whether to continue with the discussion or ask Audio to excuse her."}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n kí ó tó ráyè ṣé ìpinnu, Àdìó ti sọọ̀rọ̀ mìíràn lù ú...', 'en': 'But before she ever had the time to reach a resolution, Adio had dealt the final knock-out blow...'}
{'yo': '"""Làbákẹ́. Làbákẹ́. Kò sí iyèméjì nípa rẹ̀."', 'en': '"""Labake. Labake. There is no doubt about it."'}
{'yo': 'O ti jìyà, mo mọ̀ ọ́n.', 'en': 'You have suffered, I know it.'}
{'yo': '"Ó ṣeni láàánú, ṣùgbọ́n ìjìyà, tí o mọ̀ yìí, jẹ́ ara àdánwò ìfẹ́ òtítọ́. Ṣé o gbọ́?"""', 'en': "It is a pity, but suffering, you know, is part of the test of true love. Don't you agree?"}
{'yo': '"Làbákẹ́ kò wí ""bẹ́ẹ̀ ni,"" kò sì wí ""bẹ́ẹ̀ kọ́."" Ìrújú bá a."', 'en': '"Labake did not say \'yes\', she did not say ""no"" either. She was confused."'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀rọ̀ iwájú rẹ̀ yìí jẹ́ ọ̀rọ̀ tí ó ní láti lo ọjọ́, ọ̀sẹ̀ láti fi rò ó.', 'en': 'The matter before her was a matter she had to spend days, even weeks, thinking about.'}
{'yo': 'Kò gbọdọ̀ sọ nǹkankan báyìí.', 'en': 'No stand should be taken now.'}
{'yo': 'Agbẹjọ́rò Àdìó ti sa ipá rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Lawyer Adio had done his best.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ti ṣiṣé rẹ̀ dáadáa.', 'en': 'He had played his part well.'}

{'yo': 'Bí Làbákẹ́ ṣé dìde láti lọ, ó gbọ́ agbẹjọ́rò náà tí ó ń ṣèlérí láti bẹ̀ wọ́n wò nílé, kò ní í yẹ̀, kí ó máa retí rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Even as Labake stood up to go, she heard the lawyer promising he would pay them a visit at home, unfailingly, she should expect him.'}

{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ pa ilẹ̀kụ̀n ìyẹ̀wù náà dé jẹ́jẹ́ lèyín rẹ̀, ẹ̀rín músẹ́ tó múnúdùn ni ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ̀, olùgbàlejò ìyèwù náà fi pàdé rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Labake closed the door of the chambers gently behind her and was received outside with a sunny cheerful smile by her friend, the receptionist.'}

{'yo': 'Ní ìsàlẹ̀, ní òpópónà, dẹ́rẹ́bà Àdìó ń dúró, ó sì ń ṣí ilẹ̀kùn ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ ọ̀gá rẹ̀ láti fi gbé Làbákẹ́ padà sílé.', 'en': "And downstairs, on the street, Adios drive was waiting, opening the door of his master's car to take Labake back home."}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ dúró ní ibùdókọ̀. Ó bọ́ sílẹ̀, ó sì ń dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ awakọ̀ Àdìó.', 'en': 'Labake stopped at the motor park. She got out, thanking Adios driver.'}
{'yo': 'Ní ìṣẹ́jú kan, ọkọ̀ náà yípo ó sì tẹná lọ sọ́nà Òkè-Àdó.', 'en': 'In a minute, the car tuned the roundabout and zoomed off in the direction of Oke-Ado.'}
{'yo': 'Ó jẹ́ ọkọ̀ mẹ̀sí ọlọ́yẹ́.', 'en': 'It was a Mercedes-Benz.'}

{'yo': 'Nǹkan ń dùn fún Àdìó, láìsí àní-àní- agbẹjọ́rò tó ní lárí ni, ó ń gbádùn gbogbo àǹfààní tí ìlú ní láti fún un.', 'en': 'Life was no doubt smiling on Adio - a very successful lawyer, enjoying all the wonderful opportunities offered by the city.'}

{'yo': 'Ó rí bí i ẹni tó jẹun kánú, tí ó sì ti lẹ́ran léti dáadáa, pàápàá jùlo ọrùn rẹ̀ àti ikùn rẹ̀.', 'en': 'He looked well-fed, and had put on a lot of weight, especially around the neck and the tummy.'}
{'yo': 'Ìdí nìyẹn tí kò fi ṣeéṣe fún Làbákẹ́ láti dá a mọ̀ lẹ́sẹ̀kẹsẹ̀.', 'en': 'That was why it was not immediately possible for Labake to recognise him.'}

{'yo': 'Nìgbà tí wọ́n ṣì wà ní Englandi, Àdìó jẹ́ ọkùnrin pẹlẹbẹ kan, tí ojú máa ń tì; ó tálákà gan an - gbogbo ìgbà ni ó fi máa ń gbàdúrà pé kí ìdápadà ìwé-ọ̀fẹ́ rẹ̀ ótètè dé láti ọ̀dọ̀ àjọ tó ga jù.', 'en': 'Way back in England, Adio was a slim shy-looking man; so indigent - always praying for the quick arrival of his scholarship reimbursement from the High Commission.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n láìsí àní-àní, ó ń gbìyànjú gbìyànjú, ó ń siṣé kárakára. Olóríire ọkùnrin...', 'en': 'But Nonetheless, struggling and struggling, working very hard. Lucky man...'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ dura kọjá láàárín àwọn èrò yanturu tó wà ní ìdíkọ̀.', 'en': 'Labake chested and elbowed her way through the surging motor park crowd.'}
{'yo': 'Èyí jẹ́ ibìkan tí kò nífẹ̀ẹ́ láti máa dé.', 'en': 'This was one place she did not always like visiting.'}
{'yo': 'Yàtọ̀ sí ti ariwo tó wà ni gbogbo ibẹ̀, ibùdókọ̀ jẹ́ àgọ́ ibi tí onírúurú ènìyàn wà.', 'en': 'Apart from the noise everywhere, the motor park was the haven of all sorts of people.'}
{'yo': 'Kò sì ṣeéṣe láti ya awakọ̀ olódodo sọ́tọ̀ sí àwọn ògbólógbòó ọmọ ìta àti ọlọ́sà.', 'en': 'It was not possible to distinguish honest drivers from the notorious touts and pickpockets.'}
{'yo': 'Ko ṣe éṣe láti dáà wọn òǹtàjà àti ọlọ́jà gidi mọ̀ yàtò sí àwọn ọmọ ìta àti olè.', 'en': 'It was not possible to know genuine hawkers and traders from smugglers and tricksters.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn apidán ìbílẹ̀ àti àwọn sogún dogóje náà ní òmìnira àtilọ àtibọ̀ ní ibùdókọ̀, ìtàjà ohun àlòkù sì pọ ni gbogbo kọ̀ọ̀rọ̀ ibẹ̀.', 'en': 'The local magicians and money doublers were allowed to operate freely inside the motor and the sale of second-hand goods flourished at the nooks and corners of the place.'}
{'yo': 'Gáréèjì náà rí jálajàla, ó dọ̀tí, èrò ti pọ̀jù, ó sì já gbangba.', 'en': 'The garage ugh, it was dirty, rowdy and exposed.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ará káńsù ti gbìyànjú, láì ṣàṣeyọrí nípa wíwá nǹkan ṣe sí ọ̀rọ̀ ààbò ẹ̀mí àti ohun ìní àwọn ènìyàn tó ń ná ibẹ̀.', 'en': 'The Council people had tried, without much success to do something about the security of life and property of the people who patronised the place.'}

{'yo': 'Bí kì í báṣe pé Làbákẹ́ fẹ́ jábọ̀ fún awakọ̀ ọkọ̀ akẹ́rù rẹ̀, kò sín ǹkan tíì bá gbé e wá bí.', 'en': "If it's not because Labake wanted to report back to her mammy-wagon driver that brought here, nothing on earth could have."}
{'yo': 'Ó yírùn yírùn, ó narùn narùn, ó ń wọ́nà láàrin àwọn èrò, àwọn òǹtàjà àti àwọn agbèrò.', 'en': 'She peered and craned her neck, meandering her way through passengers, hawkers and touts.'}
{'yo': 'Ní gbẹ̀yìn gbẹ́yín, ó dé ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn awakọ̀ ọkọ̀ akẹ́rù náà.', 'en': 'At last she got to him, the mammy-wagon driver.'}

{'yo': 'Ibẹ̀ ni ó wạ̀, lọ́wọ́ ẹ̀yìn, lẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ ọkọ̀ rẹ̀, ó ń rojọ́ aláriwo pẹ̀lú mẹ́ta nínú àwọn akẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀.', 'en': 'There he was a little way off, by the side of his vehicle, engrossed in a noisy conversation with three of his mates.'}
{'yo': 'Bóyá iṣẹ́ bí wọ́n ṣé fẹ́ bá a kẹ́rù ni wọ́n ń ṣètò rẹ̀, òun ni wọ́n ń sọ.', 'en': 'They were probably discussing with her ... planning the strategy for the evacuation of her belongings.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ó bá jẹ́ pé bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, ó mọ̀ ọ́n rìn nìyẹn, ó ti wá sọ fún wọn pé kí wọ́n ṣì fi ílẹ̀ fún ìgbà díẹ̀.', 'en': 'If that was the case, then she was with them at the nick of time, she had come to tell him to drop the matter for some time.'}
{'yo': 'Ìdàgbà sókè tuntun kan ló dé, wọn yóò sì ní láti sún ọjọ́ ẹrù kíkó síwájú.', 'en': 'There was a new development and the proposed evacuation would have to be shelved.'}
{'yo': 'Awakọ̀ ọkọ̀-akẹ́rù náà mi èjìká rẹ̀ nígbà Làbákẹ́ sọ nípa ìsúnsíwájú náà fún un.', 'en': 'The mammy-wagon driver shrugged his shoulders when Labake told him about the postponement.'}

{'yo': '"""Ó dìgbà mí ìn...ó dìgbà mí ìn,"" Làbákẹ́ sọ èyí, ""Bóyá lọ́sẹ̀ tó ń bọ̀ tàbí èyí tó tẹ̀lé e. Ṣùgbọ́n ó dìgbà mí ìn."', 'en': "Till another time... Till another time, Labake said, 'May be next week or week after. But definitely till another time."}
{'yo': '"Ẹ pẹ̀lẹ́. Mà á tún kàn sí i yín."""', 'en': "Sorry. I'll contact you again'."}
{'yo': '"Ó dáa màdáámú, kò sí wàhálà,"" ó fèsì pẹ̀lú ohùn tí ò fì dùnnú hàn."', 'en': "Alright madam, no harm done', he answered in a not-too-happy tone."}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹn ni òpin òwò kékéré tí ò bá mówó kíá wọlé fún un.', 'en': 'That was the end of a small business that would have fetched quick money.'}

{'yo': 'Inú rẹ̀ ti ṣàdéédé ń dùn títí di àsìkò yẹn, nítorí ó ti fi èrò èrè iṣẹ́ kíá òwúrò kùtùkùtù sọ́kàn.', 'en': "He'd been unusually hilarious up to that time because he kept the idea of a quick early morning profit at the back of his mind."}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n báyìí. Ó dáa.', 'en': 'But now. Well.'}

{'yo': 'Ọkọ̀ pijó 504 kan kọjá lára wọn, ẹni tí ó ni í sì bóyín, ó sì ń juwọ́ sí awa kọ̀ọkọ̀-akẹ́rù náà. Awakọ̀ náà juwọ́ sí i padà, tí ó ń pè é ní ìnagijẹ rẹ̀ bí i mélòó kan.', 'en': 'A commercial Peugeot 504 saloon car pulled up a few yards away from them and the owner of the car emerged flashing his teeth and waving to the mammy-wagon. The driver waved back throwing one or two nicknames at him.'}
{'yo': '"""Bàbá o! Àjẹpẹ́ ayé sà."""', 'en': 'Baba o! A je pe aye sir!'}
{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn náà ni ó kọjú sí Làbákẹ́ padà...', 'en': 'Then turning back to Labake...'}

{'yo': '"Àwọn ni alága àwọn ẹgbẹ́ awakọ̀... Alága wa... Máa ń bá wa ṣére gan an...,"" awakọ̀ náà sọ fún Làbákẹ́."', 'en': "He is the chairman of the Drivers' Union... Our chairman... Very popular with us..', the driver said to Labake,"}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ wo ọkùnrin náà. Ojú rẹ̀ ti gán-án-ní nọ́mbà ọkọ̀ náà.', 'en': 'Labake looked closely at the man. Her eyes caught the plate number of his car.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀ẹ̀ẹ̀ẹ́n! Làbákẹ́ wo nọ́ḿbà náà pẹ̀lú ìgbọ̀nrìrì ojú kan.', 'en': "What! Labake stared at the car's registration number in frozen stillness."}
{'yo': 'Ọkàn rẹ̀ bẹ̀rẹ̀ si í ṣiṣẹ́ lemọ́lemọ́... Ọkọ̀ Àlàmú! Ọkọ̀ Àlàmú tẹ́lẹ̀tẹ́lẹ̀!', 'en': "Her heart immediately started pumping hard... Alamu's car! Alamu's former car!"}
{'yo': 'Ni ó ṣì wà ní ipò tó dára yìí!', 'en': 'Still in very good condition!'}
{'yo': '"""Ṣé ẹm...ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ ọkùnrin náà nìyẹn?"', 'en': "Is that em.. the man's car?"}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ béèrè, ó dạ́tọ́ mì.', 'en': 'Labake asked, swallowing some saliva.'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ rẹ̀ ni. Ó rà á ní àlòkù. Àlòkù?', 'en': 'Yes, his car, he got it second hand. Second hand?'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, àlòkù, lọ́wọ́ ọkùnrin kan tí wọ́n ló wà nínú ìṣòro.', 'en': 'Yes, second hand, from one man they say was in trouble.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀m...màdáámú, wàhálà pọ̀ láyé yìí o.', 'en': 'Hem... Madam, there is plenty of trouble in this world you.'}

{'yo': 'Nítorí náà ni alága wa ṣé rà á lọ́wọ́ rẹ̀ ní gbàǹjo - lọ́wọ́ ọkùnrin náà - ọkùnrin tó wà nínú ìṣòro yẹn..., awakọ̀ ọkọ̀ akẹ́rù náà yọwọ́ rẹ̀ síta láti fi ṣàpèjúwe bí ìṣòro tí ó ń sọṣé tóbi tó. Ìṣòro?', 'en': 'So Chairman bought the car cheap cheap from the man - the man in trouble... The mammy-wagon driver held out his two hands - to indicate the bigness of the trouble he was describing. Trouble?'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni màdáámú, ọkùnrin alákọ̀wé náà kan ìjọ̀gbọ̀n, ìjọ̀gbọ̀n owó.', 'en': 'Yes madam, the alakowe man ran into trouble, money trouble.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ní ọkùnrin náà pàdánù iṣé rẹ̀, kò sì lè bọ́ ara rẹ̀, bọ́ ẹbí mọ́.', 'en': 'The man, they say, lost his job, and could no longer feed himself, feed his family.'}
{'yo': '"Nítorí náà lóṣé ta ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ náà ní gbàǹjo fún alága wa. ""Ẹ́ mọọkùnrin náà nìyẹn?"""', 'en': '"So he sold the car cheap cheap to Chairman.\' You know the man then?."""'}

{'yo': 'Hùn. Kò dájú. ṣùgbọ́n lásìkò kan mo rí i tí ó kọjá níbí. Àwọn ènìyàn sì sọ pé orí ọkùnrin náà ti yí báyìí. Mi ò mọ̀.', 'en': "Hum. Not quite. But one time I saw him walk past here. People say the man's head has turned now. I don't know"}

{'yo': 'Irun orí Làbákẹ́ dúró gírígírí, ẹ̀rẹ̀kẹ́ rẹ̀ hun pọ̀, óṣe é bí ìgbà tí ó bá fẹ́ rẹ́rìn-ín, bí kì í báṣé irun òkè ojú rẹ̀tí ó hunpọ̀ ní àsìkò kan náà! Ṣùgbọ́n kì íṣé ẹ̀rín rárá.', 'en': "The hair on Labake's head stood up straight, hair cheeks wrinkled, giving the impression of somebody wanting to laugh if not for her brow which had knitted in several wrinkles at the same time! But, it was no laughter afterall."}
{'yo': 'Ó ju ẹ̀rín lọ. Ó dáa fún un làsìkòyìí pé, kí ó tètèkúrò.', 'en': 'More than laughter. Better for her in the circumstance, to get away fast.'}

{'yo': 'Bíbẹ́ẹ̀ kọ́, ìgbìyànjú rẹ̀ láti dá omi ojú náà padà yóò já sásán, omi ojú náà tí ó kún sí ìpéǹpéjú rẹ yìí á tó ṣàn wálẹ̀.', 'en': 'Otherwise, her supreme effort to keep back the tears would prove abortive and the tears already welling up now beneath her eyelids would come streaming down.'}
{'yo': 'Màdáámú...màdáámú..., Ọlọ́run nìkan ló lè gba èèyàn lọ́wọ́ ìṣòro ayé yìí o.', 'en': 'Madam... Madam..., only God can save man from all the troubles of this world o.'}
{'yo': 'Ilé ayé ìkà tí à ń gbénú rẹ̀ yìí. Ọlọ́run nìkan ló lè gba èèyàn o.', 'en': 'This wicked world in which we are living. Only God can protect man o...'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, wọ́n ní ìyàwó rẹ̀ ni ó fi òògùn yí i lóri.', 'en': 'Yes, They say his wife was the one who turned his head with juju.'}

{'yo': "Ẹ̀yin obìnrin léwu gan an. Gbogbo yín lẹ dùn ún rí tẹ́ ẹ rẹwà. ṣùgbọ́n àti súnmọ́ ọn yín, iná ni o... 'Iná?'", 'en': "You women are dangerous. You all look fine and beautiful. But to move near you is fire o... 'Fire?"}

{'yo': '"Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, iná gìdí màdáámú. Báwo ni ìyàwó kan ṣe lè níkà débi kí ó fi òògùn yí orí ọkọ rẹ̀ láì nídìí?"""', 'en': '"Yes, real fire, madam. How can a wife be so wicked as to turn the husband\'s head with juju just for fun?"""'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ gbà á gbọ́? Mo gbà á gbọ́ o, màdáámú.', 'en': 'You believe it? Madam, I believe it o.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ má bínú o màdáámú, ṣùgbọ́n mi ò lè fọkàn tán obìnrin.', 'en': "I am sorry madam, but I don't trust women."}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ìyàwó mi mẹ́tẹ̀ẹ̀ta nílé mọ́. ṣùgbọ́n, àjẹ́ ni ìyàwó ọkùnrin yìí máa jẹ́.', 'en': "My three wives at home know it. But this man's wife must be a witch."}

{'yo': 'Mo gbọ́ pé àwọn ènìyàn tó wà ní àyíká wọn ti pinnu láti sọ̀ko pa obìnrin náà, lónìí àbí lọ́la. Níbo?', 'en': 'I hear that people around them have decided they would stone the woman to death, today or tomorrow. Where?'}

{'yo': 'Mi ò mọ̀ màdáámú, àwọn ènìyàn kàn ń sọ ọ́ káàkiri ni. Ẹyin obìnrin, mo bẹ̀rù yín. Àwọn obìnrin ni wọ́n máa ń fa wàhálà fún gbogbo ọkùnrin.', 'en': "I don't know madam, people just say it all about. You women, I fear you. Women are the cause of all men's trouble."}
{'yo': 'Láti gbé e yín sílé, ọkùnrin ní láti múra dáadáa.', 'en': 'To have you at home, man must prepare well well.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ má bínú màdáámú, mo ri pé inú yín kò dùn sí mi bí ẹṣe ń wò. Ẹ mábínú, ṣùgbọ́n mo mọ̀ pé ẹ̀yin ò lèṣé irú nǹkan bẹ́ẹ̀ sí ọkọ ti yín, kí ẹ lo òògùn.', 'en': 'I am sorry madam, I can see you are not happy with me - the way you are looking. I am sorry indeed, but I know you cannot do that type of thing to your own husband using juju.'}
{'yo': 'Mo mọ̀ pé ẹ kì í ṣé irú obìnrin tí...tí...tí...', 'en': 'I know you are not that type of woman who... who... who...'}

{'yo': '"""Omijé náà ti ṣé ìran Làbákẹ́ bàìbàì, láàrin ìṣẹ́ju àáyá márùn-ún, á dalẹ̀ ara rẹ̀. Nítorí náà, ó tètè rìn kúrò. Màá máa rí i yín nígbà mìíràn, nígbà mìíràn... mà árí iyín."""', 'en': "The tears had now blurred Labake's vision, five seconds more and she would betray herself. So, she walked quickly away. I will see you again. Another time. Another time. I'll see you."}

{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ rìn koja ibùdókọ̀ náà, ó ń nu ojú rẹ̀, ó ń wo ọwọ́ iwájú rẹ̀ tààrà, ó kọ̀ láti jẹ́ kí ìpolówó àti ìpè àwọn ọlọ́jà dà á láàmú lọ́tùn-ún lósì, pé kí ó wá wo ọjà gbàǹjo tí wọ́n ń tà.', 'en': 'Labake walked away across the motor park, wiping her face, looking straight in front of her, refusing to be distracted by the call of the hawkers left and right, inviting her to come and have a look at their second-hand articles.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n kó àwọn ọjà náà pọ̀, ẹ̀rọ amómitutù tí ìfà lọ́wọ́ wọn ti bàjẹ́, ẹ̀rọ amóhùn-máwòrán tí ara rẹ̀ kò pé; ẹ̀rọ ìgbohùn sí lẹ̀tí àwọn nǹkankan ti yọ nínú rẹ̀; ẹ̀rọ akọrin tí àwọn ẹ̀yà ara rẹ̀ kò pé mọ́; àti àwọn fáànù adá dúró tí àwọn nǹkankan ti kúrò lára rẹ̀. Gbogbo àwọn èyí ni àwọn ọlọ́jà náà wá ń pe àkíyèsí Làbákẹ́ sí, bí óṣé ń wá ọ̀nà àti jáde nínú rúkèrúdò ibùdókọ̀ náà.', 'en': "They jumbled all the articles together in great piles, fridges with their handlebars and locks damaged; television sets with their tuning knobs missing, tape recorders without either the bass tone control or the fast-rewind knobs, record players whose pick-up, armrests and safety catches had gone and standing fans with broken revolving boxes and speed switches. All these the hawkers now invited Labake's attention to, as she sought her way out of the jumble of the motor park."}
{'yo': 'Màdáámú, ẹ wo bí.', 'en': 'Madam, have a look here.'}
{'yo': 'Màdáámú, báwo ni.', 'en': 'Madam, how are you?'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ṣéun ọjọ́ màdáámú.', 'en': 'Thank you for the other day madam'}
{'yo': 'Ọmọ ńkọ́? Ṣé àlàáfíà ni ọ̀gá wà?', 'en': 'How pikin? Hope oga is doing fine?'}
{'yo': 'Màdáámú, èmi ni o...èmi ni mò ń kíi yín, màdáámú.', 'en': 'Madam, na me o... Na me de greet you so, madam.'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ fi ojú ìrira wo àwọn tó ni ohùn náà.', 'en': 'Labake cast one hateful look after another at the owners of the voice.'}

{'yo': 'Ó rí ọkùnrin méjì tí wọ́n ń tẹ̀lé e, tí wọ́n ń bóyín sí i - wọ́n sì ń kíi, wọ́n ń tẹ̀lé e, wọ́n fẹ́ kí ó dúró bá wọn sọ̀rọ̀.', 'en': 'She saw two men close on her heels, flashing their teeth at her - still greeting her, still coming after her, still wanting her to stop and talk.'}

{'yo': '"Ó pa wọ́n tì, ó sì rìn kíá... kò sí nǹkan tí ọlọ́jà ò lèṣe láti fi pe àkíyèsí rẹ - wọn á fọwọ́ tọ́ ọ, wọn á rẹ́rìn-ín músẹ́ sí ọ, wọn á bá ọ dápàárá, wọn á pè ọ́ ní ""sìstá,"" àǹtí, màdáámú - gbogbo rẹ̀ láti rí ipé o ra nǹkankan tàbí òmíràn..."', 'en': "She ignored them and walked faster... there was no length hawkers would not go to attract your attention - petting you, smiling at you, joking with you, calling you sister, auntie', madam all to cajole you into purchasing one item or another..."}

{'yo': 'Ó sáré wo àwọn ọkùnrin méjì náà lẹ́ẹ̀ kansí i, ó sì dá Làbákẹ́ lójú pé kì íṣé ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ tí yóò rí wọ́n rè é. Síbẹ̀, ó ṣì tẹsẹ̀ mọ́rìn kíá.', 'en': 'Another quick look at the two men and Labake was sure she was not seeing them for the first time. Still, she kept on walking fast.'}
{'yo': 'ṣùgbọ́n... dúró... dúró... dúró... Làbákẹ́ dúró fún ìṣẹ́jú àáyá mẹ́ta... Ó ti mọ̀ wọ́n báyìí.', 'en': 'But.. Wait. Wait... Wait... Labake hesitated for three seconds... Now she knew them.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ọkùnrin gbàǹgbà méjì tó sin Àlàmú wálé!', 'en': 'The two hefty men who accompanied Alamu home!'}

{'yo': '"Àwọn alátùn-únṣé"" tó gbé ẹ̀rọ amómitutù, ẹ̀rọ amóhùn-máwòrán àti fáànù olókè wọn lọ ní oṣù díẹ̀ sẹ́yìn - fún ""àtúnṣe""! Làbákẹ́ yásẹ̀."', 'en': '"The ""repairers\' who carried away their refrigerator, television and ceiling fan some months ago - ""for repairs\'! Labake\'s footsteps quickened."'}

{'yo': 'Ó fẹ́rẹ̀ ẹ́ lè máa sáré báyìí, bí ó bá dúró ìṣẹ́jú kan pẹ́, nǹkankan ń sọfún un pé á rí nǹkan tó lè mú un dákú níbẹ̀, láti inú ọjà àlòkù inú ìsọ̀ àwọn Ọkùnrin yìí.', 'en': "She was almost running now, A minute's delay, something told her, and she would see what would make her faint on the spot, from the jumbled mass of those second hand articles inside these men's stalls."}
{'yo': 'Ṣé kò sì tí ì rí tó? Ṣé kò tí ì gbọ́ ọ̀rọ̀ tí ó lè mú un ya wèrè tó?', 'en': "And hadn't she seen enough? Hadn't she heard enough to make her run mad?"}
{'yo': '"Tó tiẹ̀ lè mú un para ẹ̀? Ó fi ìyẹ́ kún ẹsẹ̀ rẹ̀ , ó sì ""fò"" délé."', 'en': '"To even make her commit suicide? She added wings to her legs and ""flew"" home."'}
{'yo': 'Nílé, Làbákẹ́ pariwo, Jáde! Jáde! Àlàmú!', 'en': 'At home, Labake shouted, Come out! Come out Alamu!'}

{'yo': 'Jáde nínú yàrá rẹ! Jáde níbi tó o sá pamọ́ sí! Mo gbọ́dọ̀ bá ọsọ̀rọ̀ báyìí. Nǹkankan ò ní dámi dúró!', 'en': 'Come out of your room! Out of your hiding! I must talk to you now. Nothing will stop me!'}
{'yo': 'Ṣènabu sáré lọ ile láti ọ̀kan nínú àwọn ile to wa nitosi, o si wo yara ìgbàlejo.', 'en': 'Zenabu ran home from one of the houses close by, and entered the sitting room.'}
{'yo': 'Tinu dúró lẹ́yìn rẹ̀. Àwọn nikan ni wọ́n wà nílé, Ṣènábù sọ fún màdáámú.', 'en': 'Tinu stood behind her. They were alone in the house, Zenabu told madam.'}
{'yo': 'Nítorí pé ọ̀gá ti jáde pẹ̀lú ọkùnrin kan. Ọ̀gá sì sọ pé àwọn máa tóó dé.', 'en': 'Because master had just gone out with one man. And master said he would soon be back.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n gbé ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìwé sinu ọkọ. Ọkùnrin náà sì bá wọn gbé lára àwọn ìwé náà.', 'en': 'He carried plenty of files into the car. The man with him helped carry some of the files too.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀gá ni àwọn ń lọ sí Èkó, ọgá ní kí ó tọ́jú ilé dáadáa.', 'en': 'Master said they were going to Lagos, master told her to take care of the house well.'}
{'yo': 'Kí ó sì sọ fún màdáámú pé àwọn á dé ní alẹ́ ọjọ́ yẹn tàbí bóyá ó dọ̀la.', 'en': 'And tell madam they might come back that night, or till tomorrow.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀gá sọ pé Tinú ò gbọdọ̀ ké. Ọgá tún sọ pé...', 'en': 'Master said Tinu must not cry. Master also said...'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ ti Sènábù kúrò lọ́nà, ó wọ yàrá rẹ̀, ó sì ti ilẹ̀kùn lẹ́yìn.', 'en': 'Labake pushed Zenabu out of the way, entered her room and locked the door behind.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tó yá, igbe ẹkún ọkàn tíì yà ń jẹ wá láti inú yàrá - ó pẹ́ fún ìṣẹ́jú mẹ́ta kan, ó dáwọ́ dúró fún bí ìṣẹ́jú méjì kan, ó tún bẹ̀rẹ̀ bí ìrora sò bìà, bí óṣe máa ń dun ni, tí á tún rowọ́.', 'en': 'Soon the sharp cry of a soul in torment came from inside the room - lasting for some three minutes, stopping for some two minutes only to pick up again like the slow, on-and-off pain of guinea worm, Ceasing and picking up, picking up and ceasing.'}
{'yo': 'Á dáwọ́ dúró díẹ̀. Lẹ́yìn náà, ó ń dáwọ́ dúró pátápátá nígbà tí oorun ti ń kún ojú rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Ceasing temporarily. Then ceasing finally when sleep overtook the eyelids.'}
{'yo': '"Mi ò ní í sùn lónìí, ó gbin, ""Mi ò níí di ojú mi."', 'en': "I'll not sleep today', she moaned, I'll not close my eyes."}
{'yo': 'Màá jókòó báyìí, á bá mi lórí ìjókòó báyìí...mo ń dúró...mò ń dúró...', 'en': "I'll be sitting down like this, he'll meet me sitting down like this.. waiting. Waiting..."}
{'yo': 'Lóòótọ́, Làbákẹ́ kò dijú rẹ̀ - títí mọ ìgbà tí ilẹ̀ ti ṣú dáadáa.', 'en': 'And truly, Labake did not close her eyes - even when the night was so far spent.'}

{'yo': 'Ó gbọ́ ohùn orin fújì láti ọ̀nà jíjìn, ní ibi ìnáwó kan ní ìgboro ìlú.', 'en': 'She heard the distant sound of the amplifier, blaring fuji music at some night party in the heart of the town.'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ tẹ́tí, lẹ́yìn ìgbà díẹ̀, orin náà kò dún mọ́. Ariwo rẹ̀ lọlẹ̀.', 'en': 'Labake listened, after some time, the music seized. The revelling had stopped.'}
{'yo': 'Ọgọọgọ́rùn-ún náírà - títí mọ́ ẹgbẹẹgbẹ̀rún - ló ti ṣòfò.', 'en': 'Hundreds of naira - even thousands - had gone down the drain!'}
{'yo': 'Ìdạ́kẹ́ rọ́rọ́ wá wà ní gbogbo ìlú, afẹ́fẹ́ náà tutù, ó sì dákẹ́ rọ́rọ́.', 'en': 'Silence now lay upon the whole city, the air was old and still.'}

{'yo': 'Nǹkan tí ó da ìdákẹ́ rọ́rọ́ náà láàmú ni ariwo lemọ́ lemọ́ fèrè àwọn ọlọ́dẹ àti ohùn kó-ń-lé-ó-gbé-lé agogo wọn.', 'en': 'What broke the stillness now was the intermittent sound of the whistle of the night watchmen and the konleogbele sound of their bells.'}

{'yo': 'Aago ń lọ, ó ti wá di aago méjì géérégé lówùúrọ̀. Ohùn aago ìdágìrì dé etí Làbákẹ́, ó wá sí yàrá ìgbàlejò ó sì jókòó.', 'en': "The wall clock continued ticking away, it was now two o'clock in the morning. The sound of the alarm watch blare's ears, she came to the sitting room and sat down."}

{'yo': 'Ó tẹjú mọ́ ilẹ̀kùn pẹ̀lú ìpinnu pé òun á bá Àlàmú fa oríṣìíríṣìí ní ìṣẹ́jú tí ó bá fojú hàn nínú ilé.', 'en': 'Her eyes gazed intently at the door resolving she would take Alamu up on several issues the very minute he showed his face in the house.'}

{'yo': 'Àlàmú ní láti tẹ́ ẹ lọ́rùn pẹ̀lú àlàyé tó dán mọ́rán lórí gbogbo nǹkan tí ó gbọ́ lẹ́nu àwọn èèyàn - àwọn aládùúgbò, lẹ́nu ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ̀ àti awakọ̀ọkọ̀-akẹ́rù náà.', 'en': 'Alamu had to satisfy her with a concrete explanation on all those things she had heard from people from neighbours, from his friend and from the mammy-wagon driver.'}
{'yo': 'Ayé Àlàmú wá jẹ́ àdììtú sí i, Àlàmú nìkan ló sì lè tú u.', 'en': 'His life had become one bundle of mystery to her and it was, Alamu alone who could interprete the mystery.'}

{'yo': 'Ayé rẹ̀ ti di kókó ńlá kan tí wọ́n so pa tí ó sì jẹ́ pé òhun nìkan ni ó lè tú u. Ìyẹn ni ó ní láti ṣe ní kété bó báṣé ń wọlé.', 'en': 'His life had become one big knot and it was he alone who could untie it. That he had to do the very moment he stepped into the house.'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ ti rí oríṣìíríṣìí nǹkan fún rarẹ̀ - tí ó jẹ́ kókó tí ó sì jẹ́ ògidì.', 'en': 'Labake had seen a lot of things herself - factual and reasonably authentic.'}

{'yo': 'Àlàyé wo ni Àlàmú yóò ṣé sí gbogbo rẹ̀? Àlàyé náà gbọ́dọ̀ lè yíni lọ́kàn padà, kí ó lè tẹ́ ẹ lọ́rùn.', 'en': 'What explanation would Alamu give to them all? The explanation must be so convincing, so persuading to satisfy her.'}
{'yo': 'Ó wòye irú ipa tí ọ̀rẹ́ Àlàmú á tún fẹ́ kó nínú ọ̀rọ̀ náà.', 'en': "She wondered what further role Alamu's friend was going to play in the matter."}
{'yo': 'Báwo ni wọ́n ṣe fẹ́ gba ọ̀rọ̀ ìyá ọkọ rẹ̀ mú?', 'en': 'How effectively were they going to handle the matter of the mother-in- law?'}
{'yo': 'Fún ìdáhùn kíákíá, níbo ni Àlàmú lọ?', 'en': 'For an immediate query, where had Alamu gone to?'}
{'yo': 'Kí ló sì fà á tí ó fi sun ibẹ̀ mọ́jú?', 'en': 'Why did he spend the night there?'}
{'yo': 'Kíni ìdí tí kò fi sọ fún un tẹ́lẹ̀ pé òun á sùnta?', 'en': 'Why did he refuse to let her know before hand that he would keep the night outside?'}
{'yo': 'Ohùn ìlù òwúrọ̀ kùtùkùtù orí rédíò aládùúgbò kan ló dáhùn ìbéèrè rẹ̀.', 'en': "It was the early-morning drum signal on a neighbour's radio set which answered her questions."}
{'yo': 'Ìdáhùn tí kò tẹ́ni lọ́rùn tó ń sọ pé ilẹ̀ ti mọ́.', 'en': 'A not too-satisfying answer merely indicating the arrival of dawn.'}
{'yo': 'Orí fọ́ Làbákẹ́ gidi, ara ń ro ó, ó sì yán.', 'en': "Labake's head ached badly, she felt pain all over the body and yawned."}
{'yo': 'Ṣé nǹkan tí wọ́n ń pè ní ìjìyà ìfẹ́ rè é?', 'en': 'Was this what they called suffering for the sake of love?'}
{'yo': 'Ìfẹ́ wá jẹ́ nǹkan gidi kan tó ń mú èèyàn jìyà báyìí.', 'en': 'Love must be a giddy thing indeed to make one suffer so much like this.'}
{'yo': 'Ìlú ńlá ní dàájí! Gbogbo nǹkan ti tún jí sáyé.', 'en': 'The city at dawn! Everything was alive again.'}
{'yo': 'Òmìrán tó ń sùn ti jí! Ìgbòkègbọdọ̀ ìlú ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ bí ó ṣé máa ń wáyé.', 'en': 'The sleeping giant has woken up! The hustle and bustle of city life had started as usual.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ará ìlú tètè ń gbọ̀nà ibi iṣẹ́ wọn lọ, bí ikòkòrò tẹ́rù ń bà.', 'en': 'The city people, like frightened ants, hurried away to their various places of work.'}
{'yo': 'Iṣẹ́ iṣẹ́ iṣẹ́ ṣáà ni fún gbogbo wọn. Iṣẹ́ àti ìyá.', 'en': 'It was work, work and work for them all. Work and quench!'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ìbùsọ-ọkọ̀ ni ẹ̀rọ̀ kún bámú.', 'en': 'The bus stops were crowded.'}

{'yo': '"Rírí ọkọ̀ ìlú wọ̀ wá dogun - ẹni yára lòògùn ń gbè - ""èèyàn mọ́kàndínláàádọ́ta ní jokòó, èèyàn mọ́kàndínlọ́gọ́rùn-ún nídùúró!."""', 'en': 'Getting inside the city buses was a battle - survival of the fittest forty nine sitting, ninety nine standing!'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn aboyún ń jìjà gbara pẹ̀lú okun, bẹ́ẹ̀ náà làwọn ọmọbìnrin tó ń kánjú àtidé ilé-ìwé ki wọ́n má pẹ̀ ẹ́.', 'en': 'The pregnant women fought it out with the same zeal and energy as the teenage girls rushing to school struggling to beat lateness.'}

{'yo': 'Ati àwọn ọ̀dọ́mọkùnrin tó dá ṣáṣá tí wọ́n ń fi agbára wọn hàn nípa bíbẹ́ wọnú ọkọ̀ láti ojú fèrèsé kéé-kèè-kééọkọ̀!', 'en': 'And the able-bodied young men demonstrated their agility by crashing inside the city buses through the small windows of the vehicle!'}

{'yo': 'Ní apá àdúgbò Làbákẹ́ nílùú náà, àwọn oníkiri ń polówó ọjà wọn ní ohùn orin, ohùn dídùn.', 'en': "In Labake's area of the town, the local hawkers had started advertising their commodities in sing- song, sonorous voices."}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀wọ́ àwọn ọmọkùnrin àti ọmọbìnrin kéé-kèè-kéé kan ti yí ìsọ̀ kan ká níwájú láti ra ìrẹsì àti túwó tí ó ti ń hó nínú ìkọ̀kọ̀orí iná - wọ́n ń retí kó jinná kíá.', 'en': 'A group of young boys and girls had gathered round the small stall in front to purchase the rice and tuwo which had started boiling hot inside the pots on the fire - a look of expectancy on their faces.'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ na ẹsẹ̀ rẹ̀, ó sì jókòó sí ìta ilé wọn.', 'en': 'Labake stretched her legs and came out to the verandah of their house.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn aránṣọbìnrin ìbílẹ̀ náà ti wà lọ́nà ìsọ̀ wọn.', 'en': 'The local seamstresses were already on their way to their various shops.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n gbé maṣíìnì ìránṣọ wọn sórí pẹ̀lú ìrọ̀rùn lọ́nà tó ti mọ́ wọn lára, tí wọ́n sì ń tàkùrọ̀sọ lórí oríṣìíríṣìí nǹkan tí ó jẹmọ́ òwò wọn...', 'en': 'They balanced their sewing machines on the head with accustomed ease, chattered all along about this and that topic, connected with their trade...'}

{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ náà jẹ́ ránṣo-ránṣo gidi tí ó sì mọṣẹ́ dáadáa. Ó lè dárà sí ẹ̀wù, pàápàá báyìí láti bá ìgbà mu.', 'en': 'Labake too used to be a good seamstress and very creative too. She could design garments, even now, to match the latest trends in fashion.'}
{'yo': 'Nìgbà tó ṣì wà ní Englandi, ó kọ́ ẹ̀kọ́ nínú ìránṣọ àti ìdáràsí.', 'en': 'While in England, she took some courses in sewing and designing.'}

{'yo': 'Èyí kún ẹ̀kọ́ rẹ gan an tí ó jẹmọ́ oge, kò ṣeésé fún un láti ṣé òwò rẹ̀ ní orílẹ̀-èdè yìí lẹ́sẹ̀kẹsẹ̀ nítorí ẹ̀rọ̀ gbogbo ògbò àwọn ènìyàn nípa rẹ̀.', 'en': "This in addition to her core course which was modelling, it had not been possible for her to practise her trade here in the country, straight away, because of people's general apathy to it."}

{'yo': 'Bí bẹ́ẹ̀ kọ́, bí i àwọn aránṣọbìnrin yìí, òun náà ìbá wà lọ́nà ibiṣẹ́ tirẹ̀ báyìí.', 'en': 'Otherwise, like these seamstresses, she too would by now have been on her way to her place of work.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ní àkókò yìí, ìyàwó ilé tí kò níṣẹ́ àṣejẹ ni.', 'en': 'For now, she was a full time housewife.'}

{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ gbójú rẹ̀ kúrò lọ́dọ̀ àwọn aránṣọbìnrin náà, tí wọ́n ti ń bọ́ sí kọ̀rọ̀ òpópónà náà.', 'en': 'Labake took her eyes away from the seamstresses, who had negotiated the comer of the street.'}

{'yo': 'Ó yán, ara kò rọ̀ ọ́rárá, apá rẹ̀ yi, òòyì ń kọ́ ojú rẹ̀. Ó ń ṣe é bí i ti ìyàwó ilé tí ógún iyán ẹ̀kún odó márùn-ún lánàá fún àwọn àlejò aláfòruwọ̀lú.', 'en': 'She yawned, she was, understandable, not feeling comfortable, her limbs were stiff, her eyes were drowsy. She felt like that housewife who went through the ordeal of pounding five yam-filled mortars the previous day, all alone, for some late-night visitors.'}

{'yo': 'Ihà rẹ̀ àti oríkèéríkèé ara ń ro ó bí i ti ajẹ̀ṣẹ́ tí óṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ yege ìjà lọ́nà ogún nínú ìdíje ìjà sẹ́ńtúri! Ó tún bẹ́ wọlé.', 'en': 'Her ribs and joints ache like that of a boxer who had just survived twenty gruelling rounds in a fight of the century! She stumbled inside again.'}

{'yo': 'Sènábù ti wà ní yàrá ìgbafẹ́, ó dúró ṣinṣin sí ẹ̀gbẹ́ òkìtì kékeré kan, nǹkan tí wọ́n dì sínú aṣọ ìrọ̀rí búlúù tí wọ́n gbé sínú garawa oníke.', 'en': 'Zenabu was already in the Sitting room, standing at attention by the side of a small mound, something wrapped up inside a blue pillow case, placed in a plastic bucket.'}
{'yo': 'Mo ti fẹ́ máa lọ nísinsìnyí mà.', 'en': 'I am ready to go now ma.'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ wo kiní kékeré iwájú rẹ̀ láwòfín.', 'en': 'Labake took a cursory look at the small figure in front of her.'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, Sènábù ni, ó fẹ́ máa lọ, ó sì ń tọrọ ààyè lọ́wọ́ rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Yes, it was Zenabu, wanting to go, and taking permission from her.'}
{'yo': 'Ibo lò ń lọ Sènábù? Mò ń lọ ilé mà.', 'en': 'Go where, Zenabu? Go home ma.'}
{'yo': 'Ilé? Níbo? Ní Kwárà.', 'en': 'Home? Where? In Kwara.'}
{'yo': 'Kwárà? Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, Kwárà, ilé mi mà.', 'en': 'Kwara? Yes. Kwara, My home ma.'}
{'yo': '"Kílódé? Kí ló ṣé ọ́ Sènábù?"""', 'en': "Why? What's wrong with you Zenabu?"}
{'yo': 'Kò sí nǹkankan Màdáámú', 'en': 'Nothing madam'}
{'yo': 'Sọ̀rọ̀ Sènábù! Kí ló ṣẹlẹ̀ ?', 'en': 'Come on Zenabu! What is it?'}
{'yo': 'Ẹm... ẹm... Kò sí... Kò sí màdáámú.', 'en': 'Em... em... Nothing... Nothing madam.'}
{'yo': 'Ò ń ṣièrè ni! Ṣó o ya wèrè ni!', 'en': 'Are you crazy! Are you mad!'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀rẹ̀kẹ́ Sènábù hunjọ, irun ojú rẹ̀ yi, ó sì dijú rẹ̀.', 'en': "Zenabu's cheeks wrinkled, her brows tensed and she closed her eyes."}

{'yo': 'Ó tún ṣí ojú rẹ̀, omijé sì bẹ̀rẹ̀ si í dà wá lẹ̀ bí i ìlẹ̀kẹ̀ ní tẹ̀lé-ǹ-tẹ̀lé sẹ́ rẹ̀kẹ́ rẹ̀ kékeré.', 'en': 'She soon opened them again and the tears came in beads chasing one another down her little cheeks.'}
{'yo': '"Màdáámú...màdáámú, óké jáde, ""Nǹkan tí wọ́n ló ń ṣe yín nìyẹn."""', 'en': '"Madam. Madam, she sobbed out, ""That\'s what. what they say you are."""'}
{'yo': 'Kíni? Wọ́n sọ pé ẹm... ẹm... pé... pé ẹ ti ya wèrè màdáámú.', 'en': '"""What? They say that em... em.. that.. that you are crazy madam."'}
{'yo': 'Èmi? Ta ló sọ bẹ́ẹ̀ fún ọ?', 'en': 'Me? Who told you that?'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ará ilé kejì.', 'en': 'People in the other house.'}
{'yo': 'Sènábù na ìka ọwọ́ rẹ̀ sí àwọn ilé tó wà lá yìí ká wọn.', 'en': 'Zenabu pointed her finger towards the houses around them.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n ní màdáámú mi ti ya wèrè, wọ́n ní ọ̀gá mi ti ya wèrè, wọ́n ní inú iléwèrè ni mò ń gbé. Àwọn èèyàn ibẹ̀yẹn ló sọ ọ́... Sènábù tún nawọ́.', 'en': 'They say my madam has gone mad, they say my master has gone mad too, they say my madam has gone crazy, they say I am living inside a mad house. The people there said it... Zenabu pointed her finger again.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ará àdúgbò! Àwọn aládùúgbò puruntu yìí!', 'en': 'Neighbours! These illiterate neighbours!'}

{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ pohùn réré, wọn ò mọ nǹkankan yàtọ̀ sí kí wọ́n kan èèyàn lábùkù, kí wọ́n ṣèké, kí wọ́n sìsọ̀rọ̀ banilórúkọjẹ́, wọn ti sọ irún ǹ kan bẹ́ẹ̀ sí etí rẹ̀ náà rí.', 'en': 'Labake lamented, they know nothing but to scandalise, to gossip, to slander, they had said things like these to her own hearing too before.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ọ̀wọ́ aládùúgbò aláì mọ̀kan-mọ̀kàn yìí.', 'en': 'These packs of ignorant, illiterate neighbours.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn tí wọ́n mọ̀ ọ́n ṣe ò ju kí wọ́n ba ti ènìyàn jẹ́.', 'en': 'Their stock in trade is to assassinate character.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹnu wọn kìí gbé jẹ́ẹ́. Bí ó bá sì máa wà pẹ̀lú Àlàmú, á tẹnumọ́ ọn pé kí wọ́n kúrò ní àdúgbò àìmọ̀kan-mọ̀kàn yìí.', 'en': 'They would not anchor their mouths. If she would still remain with Alamu, she would insist that they leave this illiterate infested area of the city.'}

{'yo': 'A tẹnumọ́ ọn pé kí wọ́n lọ sí àdúgbò tó lajú níìlùú - agbègbè ìyàsọ́tọ̀ ìjọba - níbi tí àwọn ènìyàn tó lajú, tó mọ nǹkan tó ń lọ ń gbé tayọ̀ tayọ̀.', 'en': 'She would insist that they pack off to a more exclusive section of the city - the G.R.A section - where civilised and well-informed people live in joyful isolation.'}

{'yo': 'Nísinsìnyí, àwọn aládùúgbò burúkú wọnyì ti ń ṣiṣé lórí ọmọ-ọ̀dọ̀ wọn tí ò mọ̀ kan.', 'en': 'Now these awfully detestable neighbours of theirs had started working on their innocent housemaid.'}
{'yo': 'Kání pé wọ́n sọ fún Sènábù pé Àlàmú nìkan ló ya wèrè, ìbá dáa.', 'en': 'If they had told Zenabu that it was Alamu alone who had gone mad, that would have been better.'}
{'yo': 'Tàbí kání pé wọ́n sọ fún ọmọ náà pé Màmá náà ya wèrè, ìbá tún dáa.', 'en': 'Or if they had told the poor girl that old Mama, in addition had gone crazy, it would have been alright too.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n kí wọ́n sọ pé òun, Làbákẹ́ náà ti ya wèrè? Irú ọ̀rọ̀kọ́rọ̀ wo nìyẹn?', 'en': 'But to say that she, Labake, had also gone mad? What arrant nonsense!'}
{'yo': 'Sènábù... Sènábù... sọ fún mi, ṣé wọ́n sọ fún ọ pé Àlàmú ya wèrè?', 'en': 'Zenabu... Zenabu... tell me, they told you Alamu had gone mad?'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni màdáámú. ṣùgbọ́n ṣé wọ́n diìdí sọ fún ẹ pé èmi náà ti ya wèrè ni?', 'en': 'Yes, madam. But did they really tell you I had gone mad also?'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, wọ́n sọ fún mi pé wèrè ti yín le jù.', 'en': 'Yes, they told me you are more mad.'}
{'yo': 'Èmi? Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, màdáámú.', 'en': 'Me? Yes, madam'}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, Sènábù, ṣé ìyẹn ló fà á tó o fi ń sunkún?', 'en': 'Now, Zenabu, is that why you are crying?'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé ìdí tí o fi fẹ́ padà sílé ní Kwárà nì yẹn?', 'en': 'Is that why you want to return home to Kwara?'}
{'yo': 'Rárá, màdáámú. Kí wá ni?', 'en': 'No, madam. What then?'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ní ẹ máa fi eyín ya ẹran ara mi... ní alẹ́.', 'en': 'They said you will tear my flesh... with your teeth... in the night.'}
{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn tí mo bá sùn, wọ́n ní ẹ ò ní í sùn lọ́jọ́ tí ẹ bá máaṣé e.', 'en': 'After I am asleep, they said you will not sleep on the day you will do it.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n wọ́n ní ẹmá a dúró di ìgbà tí mo bá ti sùn wọra.', 'en': 'But that you will wait until I had slept off well.'}
{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn náà lẹ ẹ́ wá gbá mi mú. Nítorí pé, ẹ ti ya wèrè.', 'en': 'Then you will grab me. Because you have gone mad.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n sọ gbogbo èyí fún mi màdáámú. Ìwọ náà sì gbà wọ́n gbọ́, Sènábù?', 'en': 'They tell me all these things madam. And you believe them, Zenabu?'}

{'yo': '"Màdáámú... màdáámú... ẹ ò sùn mọ́jú láti alẹ́ àná. Mọ́jú àárò yìí ma... Mi ò dijú mi màdáámú."""', 'en': 'Madam... Madam... You stayed awake all through last night. Till this morning ma.. I did not close my eyes madam...'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, mi ò sùn Sènábù, ṣùgbọ́n kò lè yé ẹ. Làbákẹ́ déédé ráńtí ipò rẹ̀.', 'en': "Yes, I stayed awake Zenabu, but you can't understand. Labake suddenly realised her own position."}
{'yo': 'Bí Sènábù bá kà ásẹ́ṣẹ̀, òun ní láti gba arà rẹ̀ sílè.', 'en': 'If Zenabu was on the offensive, then, she had to be on the defensive.'}

{'yo': 'Sènábù... Sènábù. Ìdí tí mo ṣé lajú sílẹ̀ láti àná títí di àárọ̀ yìí ò lè yé ẹ. O kéré láti mọ ìdí rẹ̀.', 'en': "Zenabu... Zenabu. You can't understand why I stayed awake all through the night till this morning. You are too young to know why"}
{'yo': 'Màdáámú, àwọn èèyàn náà sọ ìdí rẹ̀ fún mi. Ṣé wà á dẹ́kun!', 'en': 'Madam, the people told me why. Will you stop!'}

{'yo': '"Ṣé wà á dẹ́kun àti máa tẹ́tí sí àwọn wèrè yìí! Ṣé wà á dẹ́kun láti máa sọ̀rọ̀ nípa àwọn wèrè èèyàn yìí!"""', 'en': 'Will you stop listening! Listening to these mad people! Will you stop talking about these crazy people!'}

{'yo': 'Sènábù gbójú kúrò, ó sì gún èjìká rẹ̀. Ó jọ wípé kò gba ti Làbákẹ́, tàwọn aládùúgbò wọn ló gbà.', 'en': 'Zenabu looked away and defiantly shrugged her little shoulders. It appeared she was with the neighbours, rather than with her.'}
{'yo': 'Níbá yìí, kí lo wá fẹ́ṣe Sènábù?', 'en': 'So, what are you going to do now Zenabu?'}
{'yo': 'Màdáámú, mo ti kó ẹrù mi.', 'en': 'Madam, I have packed my load.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀n ẹ́n? Mo dẹ̀ ń padà lọ sí ilé.', 'en': 'And? And I am going back home.'}
{'yo': 'Ò ń sá lọ ilé - láìsí àní-àní - ò ń sáfún wèrè obìnrin àbí?', 'en': 'You are running back home - no doubt - from a mad woman?'}
{'yo': 'Rárá, màdáámú. Kí wá ni?', 'en': 'No, madam. What then?'}
{'yo': 'Mo kàn fẹ́ padà sílé ni...mo fẹ́ lọ bá bàbá àti ìyá mi.', 'en': 'Just going back home...to my father and mother.'}
{'yo': 'Ó dáa. Sènábù, padà sí yàrá rè nísinsìnyí! Lọ gbé ẹrù rẹ sílẹ̀ báyìí! Ṣé o gbọ́!', 'en': 'Ok. Zenabu, go back to your room now! Go and put down your load right now! You hear!'}

{'yo': 'Sènábù tún gún èjìká ó dẹ̀ mirí tàfojúdi tàfojúdi, omijé ojú rẹ̀ ti gbẹ tán pátápátá.', 'en': 'Zenabu once more shrugged her shoulders and shook her little head daringly, rebelliously, the tears inside her eyes had completely dried up.'}

{'yo': 'Ìwò ọ̀dájú ló wá hàn nínú ìrísí àìmọ̀kan rẹ̀, kò mira. Kàkà bẹ́ẹ̀, ó gbé ẹrù rẹ̀ kékeré, ó sì wà á mọ́ra, ó sì dúró túbọ̀ fẹsẹ̀ múlè.', 'en': 'A look of desperation was now visible on her innocent countenance, she did not move. Instead, she picked up her small load and clutched it firmly in her hands then stood rooted to the ground.'}
{'yo': 'Èrù ba Làbákẹ́ díẹ̀. ṣé ọmọ kékeré yìí ya wèrè ni?', 'en': 'Labake was a bit scared. Was this little girl mad?'}
{'yo': 'Á jẹ́ pé ó ti ya wèrè. Á dáa kí ó jẹ́ kí ọmọ-ọ̀dọ̀ òsì yìí rọ́nà lọ.', 'en': 'She really must be mad. It would be better to allow this little wretch of a housemaid have her way.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ wò ó bí ó ṣé ń wò, tàfojúdi tàfojúdi. Ẹ wò bí óṣe ń ṣu ẹnu pọ̀. Ẹ wo iná lójú rẹ̀ kékeré.', 'en': 'See her looking impudently. See her pouting her small lips. See fire inside her small eyes.'}
{'yo': '"Ó dáa Sènábù, Làbákẹ́ farabalẹ̀ sọ̀rọ̀, ""O lè máa lọ sí ìlú yín... A ti tú ọ sílẹ̀."', 'en': "Alright Zenabu', Labake said piping down, 'You can go to your home town... You are released."}

{'yo': 'Sènábù gbé ẹrù rẹ̀ kékeré sílẹ̀, ó sì nawọ́ rẹ̀. Ó fẹ́ gba owó-oṣù rẹ̀ tókù, àti owó ọkọ̀ rẹ̀ lọ́wọ́ màdáámú.', 'en': 'Zenabu put down her small load and stretched out her hands. She wanted the balance of her monthly allowance and, of course, her transport fare, from madam.'}

{'yo': '"Èmi ò ní owó kankan láti fún ọ... Mi ò ní owó ọkọ̀ láti fún ọ níwọ̀n ìgbà tó jẹ́ pé ò ń lọ ní tìẹ ni. Ti owó, wà á ní láti dúró kí ọ̀gá dé."""', 'en': "I have no money to give you... No transport fare to give you even since you are going away on your own volition. For money, I'm afraid you have to wait for master to retum."}
{'yo': 'Ó dáa... Màá dúró de ọ̀gá.', 'en': 'Alright.. I will wait for master.'}
{'yo': 'Ó dáa Sènábù, ìyẹn dára, dúró dè é, lọ dúró nínú yàrá rẹ títí ọ̀gá á fi padà dé?', 'en': "Ok Zenabu, that's right, wait for him, go and stay in your room till master comes back?"}

{'yo': 'Rárá! Rárá! Màá dúró níbí! Màá dúró báyìí, títí ọ̀gá máa fi dé. Wọn á bá mi níbí.', 'en': 'No! No! I will stay here! I will stand here like this, till master will come. He will meet me here.'}

{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ rẹ́rìn-ín sí ara rẹ̀, ọmọ yìí ti ya wèrè gidi... Kí ó dúró síbẹ̀, Làbákẹ́ yán yíyán aláriwo. Ó dìde, ó sì ta gíẹ́gíẹ́ lọ sí ọ̀nà yàrá rẹ̀, ó gbé Tinú sáyà.', 'en': 'Labake smiles to herself, this girl had thoroughly gone mad... Let her remain standing there, Labake yawned loud. She stood up and staggered towards her own room propping Tinu to her chest, she had become badly spent.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ti rẹ̀ ẹ́ gidi, oorun sì ń kùn un gidi.', 'en': 'Really intoxicated with sleep. Nature would not be cheated'}
{'yo': 'Kò gba ojú Làbákẹ́ ní ìṣẹ́jú mẹ́ta láti pàdé.', 'en': "It did not take Labake's eyes two minutes to close up."}
{'yo': 'Kò gba àyà rẹ̀ ní ìṣéju mẹ́ta láti bẹ̀rẹ̀ si í mí.', 'en': 'It did not take her chest three minutes to begin heaving - like a reed in the tide.'}
{'yo': 'Àlàmú kò rìrìn àjò lọ sí Èkó.', 'en': 'Alamu did not travel to Lagos.'}

{'yo': 'Kódà, ó wà nìlúu pẹ̀lú Àdìó, ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ̀, ìpàdé wọn ló tè yìí jẹ́ ìpàdé tó ní ìyàtọ̀.', 'en': 'As a matter of fact, he was very much around in town with Adio his friend, their meeting this time was a meeting with a difference.'}

{'yo': 'Àdìó wo Àlàmú , ó sì rẹ́rìn-ín músẹ́, Àlàmú náà rẹ́rìn-ín padà sí Àdìó, ẹ́rín ìtẹ́lọ́rùn.', 'en': 'Adio looked at Alamu and smiled, Alamu too smiled back at Adio - a smile of satisfaction and contentment.'}

{'yo': 'Báwo ni Àlàmú yóò ṣé dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ̀ fún nǹkan tí ó ti ṣé láti ràn án lọ́wọ́ láti oṣù mẹ́sàn-án sẹ́yìn tí ó ti wà nínú ìṣòro, ọ̀run àpáàdì tó ń jó, ọ̀run àpáàdì lórílẹ̀ ayé.', 'en': "How was Alamu going to thank his friend enough for what he had done to assist him these past nine months that he'd been in trouble, burning hell, hell on earth."}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n bọ ara wọn lọ́wọ́, àjọkọ ni ọkàn wọn kọrin ayọ̀ àti ìdúpẹ́ sínú láti dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ Ọlọ́run, ènìyàn méjì pẹ̀lú ẹ̀mí kan!', 'en': 'They shook hands, together their hearts sang the silent song of happiness and gratitude to God, two people with one soul!'}

{'yo': 'Àlàmú kálòlò ìdúpẹ́ rẹ̀, gbogbo ìtàn náà gùn, tó bẹ́ẹ̀ tí kò mọ ibi tí yóò ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ rẹ̀ ní sísọ.', 'en': 'Alamu stammered his gratitude, the whole story was long, so long he did not know where exactly to begin relating it.'}

{'yo': "Ọ̀pọ̀ àsìkò á wà tó bá yá', Àdìó sọ èyí, 'láti sọ ìtàn náà ní kíkún, ṣùgbọ́n nísinsìnyí, jẹ́ ká a yọ ayọ̀ ìṣẹ́gun.'", 'en': '"There will be plenty of time later\', Adio said, ""to tell the full story, for now, let\'s celebrate the Victory."'}
{'yo': 'Wákàtí méjì sẹ́yìn, Àdìó ńṣe àwíjàre ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ̀ nílé ẹjọ́.', 'en': 'Two hours ago, Adio was sweating it out in court on behalf of his friend.'}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹn ni ìgbà kẹ́ta tí yóò ṣé àwíjàre ẹjọ́ Àlàmú.', 'en': "That was the third time he would argue Alamu's case."}

{'yo': 'Fún wákàtí kan ó lé díẹ̀, ódúró ti Àlàmú gírígírí bí ìbéèrèṣe dojú kọÀlàmú láti ẹnu agbẹjọ́rò alátakò rẹ̀, kò sì ẹnikẹ́ni tó wà nílé ẹjọ́ tó mọ ibi tí àáké ọ̀rọ̀ náà yóò sọlẹ̀ sí. Àgbétúngbé àyẹ̀wò náà le koko, o ṣé fínífíní, ó sì parí:', 'en': "For over one hour, he stood by Alamu as the barrage of questions came pouring in from the opponent's lawyer, and when at last Adio started his own cross-examination of Alamu's opponent, nobody present in court was in any doubt as to where the axe would fall. The cross examination was rigorous, it was searching, it was through:"}
{'yo': '"Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Àlàmú Ọláoyè ti wàní ẹnu iṣé yín fún ọdún márùn-ún?"""', 'en': 'Mr. Alamu Olaoye had been in your employment for four years?'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni. Ẹ̀ẹ̀mélòó ni ẹ ti fìwé pè é lẹ́jọ́ ?', 'en': 'Yes. How many times did you issue queries to him?'}
{'yo': 'A kò béèrè rí. Ìkìlọ̀ ńkọ́ ?', 'en': 'There were no queries for him. What about warnings?'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀ẹ̀mejì. Ẹrí dà?', 'en': 'Two times. Where is the evidence?'}

{'yo': 'Ṣé ẹ kọ wọ́n sílẹ̀? Rárá, àfẹnusọ ni. Ọ̀gbẹ́ni alábòójútó òṣìṣẹ́, ṣé ẹ ní ẹ dá ìgbìmọ̀ ìwádìí sílẹ̀?', 'en': 'Were they written warnings? No Verbal. Mr. Personnel Manager, did you say you set up a probe panel?'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni. Láti ṣé kíni? Ẹ fún wa ní ìwé tí ì júwe iṣẹ́ wọn wà.', 'en': 'Yes. To do what? Give us the paper containing its terms of reference.'}
{'yo': 'Kò sí ìwé. Mo kàn sọ fún àwọn àjọ náà pé kí...kí...kí...', 'en': 'No paper. I just told the panel to... to... to...'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé ẹ gba ohùn sílẹ̀ nígbà tí wọ́n ṣè pàdé ìgbìmọ̀ ìwádìí náà?', 'en': 'Was the proceeding during the probe tape recorded?'}
{'yo': 'Rárá, a kò gbà á. Ṣé ẹ kàn ṣé àgékúrú ìwádìí yín lásán ni?', 'en': 'No, it was not. You merely paraphrased evidence at the probe in black and white?'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni. Mò ń sọ pé ìwádìí yin gba ọ̀rọ̀ lẹ́nu Àlàmú tipátipá.', 'en': "Yes. I put it to you that Alamu's evidence at the probe was taken under duress."}

{'yo': 'Ẹ kàn ṣé ìwádìí arúmọjẹ ni alákòóso òṣìṣé - tí ẹ kàn ń fimú kó pàǹtí kiri láàrin àwọn ọmọ ìgbìmọ̀ aṣèwádìí, ẹ sì ń halẹ̀ mọ́ wọn.', 'en': 'You stage-managed the probe Mr. Personnel Manager - secretly nosing round members of the panel, intimidating them with threats.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ ò lè sẹ́ èyí torí a ti fi gbogbo èrí tó gbe èyí lẹ́sẹ̀ hàn nílé ẹjọ́. Agbẹjọ́rò Àdìó sì kọjú sí adájọ́ tó mọṣẹ́ náà:', 'en': '"You no longer can deny this because we have shown the court evidence to prove this."" Lawyer Adio now turned to the learned Judge."'}

{'yo': 'A ògbọdọ̀ gbàgbé, olúwa à mi, pé alága ìgbìmò ìwádìí arúmọjẹ yìí tí ó ń ṣiṣẹ́ níi léeṣẹ́ yìí jẹ́ àna alákòóso òṣiṣẹ́ iléeṣẹ́ yìí.', 'en': "We must not forget, my lord, that the chairman of this kangaroo probe is the Personnel Manager's in-law who works in the Establishment."}

{'yo': 'Ìbátàn rẹ ni akọ̀wé, àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ méjì yòó kù sì jẹ́ ìbátan ọ̀rẹ́ alábòójútó òṣìṣẹ́.', 'en': "The secretary is his cousin, the other two members are relations of the Personnel Manager's friend."}
{'yo': 'Ìdí nìyí tí ó fi rọrùn fún un látiṣé awúrúju yìí.', 'en': 'That was why he found it easy to stage-manage things.'}

{'yo': 'Láti ìgbà tí ẹjọ́ yìí ti bẹ̀rẹ̀, Olúwa à mi, mẹ́ta nínú àwọn ẹlẹ́rìí olújẹ́jọ́ yìí ni ó ti na pápá bora, àwọn elẹ́rìí yòókù kòṣé é gbáralé.', 'en': "Ever since the beginning of this case, my lord, three of the defendant's key witnesses have absconded, the other witnesses are unreliable."}

{'yo': 'Àwọn tó ń kọrin yin alákòóso òṣìṣẹ́ àti àwọn tó mọ ẹ̀pón àti ìkínikú-oríire ni wọ́n, a sì ti rí wọn nílé ẹjọ́yìí bí wọ́n ṣé fìdí rẹmi lábẹ́ àgbéyẹ̀wò tààrà, òdodo àti ìbéèrè ìwádìí.', 'en': "They are the Personnel Manager's praise singers and professional congratulations, we have seen in this court how they fell, like a pack of cards under frank and honest cross-examination."}

{'yo': 'Oníbàárà mi, ọ̀gbẹ́ni Àlàmú Ọláoyè ti jìyà àìmọ̀dí àti ìtìjú látàri irọ́ àìlèṣe ojúṣe-ẹni àti ìṣowó-kúmo-kùmo tí wọ́n pa mọ́ ọn, tí wọ́n sì fún un níwèé ìyọníṣẹ́ tí alábòójútó òṣìṣẹ́ iléeṣẹ́ Bajoks fún un.', 'en': "My client. Mr. Alamu Olaoye has been made to suffer untold hardship and embarrassment as a result of the false allegation of dereliction of duty and financial mis-management levelled against him and the consequent illegal sack letter issued by the Personnel Manager of Bajoks Company Limited'."}

{'yo': 'Ìgbésẹ̀ alábòójútó òṣìṣẹ́ wá látàrí ìṣirò ìpinnu rẹ̀ láti yọ oníbàárà mi níṣẹ́, kí wọ́n sì fi èèyàn tiwon tí óṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ kẹ́ kọ̀ọ́ gboyè nínú ìmọ̀ ìṣirò owó ní yunifásitì, tí àwọn lẹ́tà ìwáṣẹ́ rẹ̀ àti ẹ̀rí mo-kúnjú-ìwọn rẹ̀ ń bẹ lọ́fíìsì báyìí.', 'en': "The Personnel Manager's move is a calculated attempt to eliminate my client from the Establishment and slot in his own man who had just graduated in Accountancy from the university and whose letter of application and C.V. are now resting in the Personnel Manager's office."}

{'yo': 'Lákòótán, Olúwa à mi, wọn ti wọ́ orúkọ rere oníbàárà mi tuurutu nínú ẹrọ̀fọ̀, wọn ti bà á lórúkọ jẹ́, wọn ti bà á jẹ́ lójú a darí alábòójútó, tí ó jẹ́ ọ̀gá iléeṣẹ́.', 'en': 'Conclusively, my lord, the good name of my client has been dragged into the mud, his reputation tamished. He has been painted black in the eyes the Managing Director, the overall boss of company.'}

{'yo': 'Fún ìdí èyí, mo rọ ilé-ẹjọ́ yìí kí wọ́n fi òfin gba oníbàárà mi lọ́wọ́ àwọn ajunilo abatẹnijẹ́ yìí.', 'en': 'I therefore pray the court to invoke the law to wrest my client from the vicious grip of his tormentors and oppressors.'}

{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn iṣéju mẹ́ẹ̀dógún, adájọ́ náà bẹ̀rẹ̀ si í ṣàtúnwò àwọn ẹ̀rí olùpẹjọ́ àti olùjẹ́jọ́, àti gbogbo àkọsílẹ̀ wọn, ìyọníṣẹ́ tó lòdì ni ti aṣírò-ọrọ̀ àgbà iléeṣẹ́ Bajoks, Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Àlàmú Ọláoyè, ìgbésẹ̀ alábòójútó òṣìṣẹ́, kò bófin mu.', 'en': 'Some fifteen minutes later, the learned Judge started reviewing the submissions of both the plaintiff and the defendant, finally pronouncing the verdict: wrongful termination of appointment of the Senior Accountant of Bajoks Company Limited, Mr. Alamu Olaoye.
