Action of the Personnel Manager, illegal.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n kò sì fi àwòrán tòótọ́ bí ọ̀rọ̀ náà ṣe lọ han adarí alábòójútó iléeṣẹ. Alábòójú tóò ṣìṣẹ́ rẹ̀ ti tàn án.', 'en': 'The Managing Director of the company was not kept in the true picture of things. He had been deceived by his Personnel Manager.'}

{'yo': 'Kí Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Àlàmú Ọláoyè padà sínú iléeṣẹ́ náà gẹ́gẹ́ bí i aṣírò-ọrọ̀ àgbà ní kíá.', 'en': 'Mr. Alamu Olaoye is therefore to be re-absorbed into the company as the Senior Accountant with immediate effect.'}

{'yo': 'Owó-oṣù rẹ̀ fún oṣù mẹ́sàn-án ni iléeṣẹ́ gbọ́dọ̀ san fún un ní kíákíá, àfikún owó rẹ̀ ọdọ ọdụ́n gbọ́dọ̀ gba òǹtẹ̀, kí ó sì gbà á.', 'en': 'His nine-month salary is to be paid in arrears with immediate effect by the company, his annual incremental credit to be approved and effected.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹgbẹ̀rún márùn-ún náírà ni olùjẹ́jọ́ gbọ́dọ̀ san fun Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Àlàmú Ọláoyè fún ìbàjẹ́.', 'en': 'A cost of five thousand naira to be paid as damages to Mr. Alamu Olaoye by the defendant.'}

{'yo': 'Ìhùwàsí alábòójútó òṣìṣẹ́ lè dí ìlọsíwájú àti ọjọ́ iwájú iléeṣẹ́ Bajoks lọ́wọ́, fún ìdí èyí, mo gba a darí alábòójútó níì yánju láti ṣé ìwádìí tó mún ádọ́kọ sí gbogbo iṣé alábòójútó òṣìṣẹ́ náà... Bí ó ṣe lọ rè é.', 'en': '"The attitude of the Personnel Manager is seen to be inimical to the progress and aspiration of a reputable company of Bajoks standing and the Managing Director is advised to institute a high powered inquiry into the activities of the Personnel Manager..."" That was how it all went."'}

{'yo': 'Bí agbẹjọ́rò Àdìó ṣé ja àjàṣẹ́gun ogun olófin náà fún ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ̀. Nì báyìí, ohun tó ṣékù fún wọn ni láti kí ara wọn kúoríire, nìgbà tọ́wọ́ bá sì dilẹ̀, wọn ámáaṣé ìrántí ìtàn títí débi àjàṣẹ́gun rẹ̀.', 'en': 'That was how Lawyer Adio fought and finally won the legal battle for his friend. And now, what was left for them was to congratulate each other; then, at leisure, recapitulate the story leading up to this final victory.'}

{'yo': '"Àsìkò á pọ̀ tó bá yá, Àdìó tún un sọ,""láti sọ gbogbo ìtàn náà, ní báyìí jẹ́ kí a ṣàjọyọ̀...àti pé jẹ́ kí a bẹ̀rẹ̀ àjọyọ̀ náà báyìí! Àdìó tẹ bọ́tíìnì kan lára ẹ̀rọ ìgbohùnsílẹ̀ rẹ̀."', 'en': '"There will be plenty of time later\', Adio repeated, ""to tell all the story, for now, let\'s celebrate... and, what a way to begin the celebration! Adio pressed a button on his tape-recorder."'}

{'yo': 'Àlàmú tẹ́tí... Ohùn obìnrin, tí ó kún fún ìfisùn àti ìbànújẹ́ jáde síta. Ohùn míì ǹ tún wà - ó jẹ́ ohùn ọkùnrin, tí ó ń ní igbe láàárín.', 'en': "Alamu listened... A lady's voice full of complaints and bitterness came out loud. There was another voice - that of a man, occasionally intersecting."}

{'yo': 'Ìtàkurọ̀sọ̀ láàárín èèyàn méjì pẹ́fún bí ìṣẹ́jú márùn-ún, ohùn obìnrin náà korò sí i, ó sì le ní òpin rẹ̀.', 'en': 'The dialogue between the two peony lasted for about five minutes, the female voice became more and more bitter and severe towards the end of the tape.'}

{'yo': 'Ohùn Làbákẹ́ òṣe é ṣì mú! Ẹṣẹ̀kẹṣẹ̀ ni Àlàmú dá ohùn aya rẹ̀ mọ̀! Kò sí àṣìṣe nípa rẹ̀...ó tètè mọ̀ pé òun ní ẹjọ́ mìíràn láti rò.', 'en': "Labake's voice was unmistakable! Alamu instantly recognised the voice of his wife! No mistake about it...it quickly dawned on him that there was a fresh case to contest."}

{'yo': 'Ni àsìkò yìí, ẹjọ́ ìgbéyàwó wọn ni, Làbákẹ́ á jẹ́ olùpẹjọ́, òun ni á jẹ́ olùjẹ́jọ́. Kò lè dúró de àsìkò tí yóò dúró lójúkojú pẹ̀lú Làbákẹ́.', 'en': 'This time, a matrimonial case, Labake was going to be the complainant, he was going to be the defendant. Anxiously he waited for the time he would come face to face with Labake.'}

{'yo': 'Ìyẹn á jẹ́ ọ̀rọ̀ iṣéju márùn-ún bí nǹkan sí ìsìnyí. Ọ̀kọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ Àdìó ń dúró níta láti gbé wọn lọ.', 'en': "That would be in a matter of five minutes or so from now. Adio's car was waiting outside to take them away."}
{'yo': 'Aago mẹ́ta ló lù báyìí lọ́sàn-án, gbogbo nǹkan ló dákẹ́ rọ́rọ́ ní ilé Àlàmú.', 'en': "It was now three o'clock in the afternoon. Everything was quiet in Alamu's house."}

{'yo': 'Èyí ṣàjèjì, Ọkàn ọ̀fintótó àwọn ará àdúgbò wọ́n wà lókè, ní àwọn ọjọ́ mìíràn, àwọn aládùúgbò yìí máa ń tẹ́tí sí bí Àlàmú ṣé ń ṣáná sí ẹ́ńjíìnì ọkọ̀ jalopí rẹ̀ - tí ó fi ń dà wọ́n láàmú.', 'en': "That was very unusual, the neighbours' curiosity was aroused, on other days the neighbours often listened as Alamu revved the old engine of his jalopy - disturbing their peace."}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n máa ń tẹ́tí sí bí óṣé ń rín ẹ̀rín aláruwo abàmì rẹ̀, àti bí Làbákẹ́ ṣé máa ń pariwo àṣẹ rẹ̀ fún Sènábù.', 'en': 'They often listened to him yell out his strange outlandish laughter, and Labake blaring orders at Zenabu.'}

{'yo': 'Tinú á máa sunkún níbì kan nínú ilé. Wọ́n máa ń gbọ́ ìgbésẹ̀ náà; bí i kí Làbáké ma lọ sọ́jà; bí i kí Àlàmú sáré máa bọ́lẹ̀ lórí àkàsọ̀ ilé. Kí ó sì fẹ̀yín ọkọ̀ rẹ̀ rìn kúrò nínú ọgbà ìgbọ́kọ̀sí sí ìrìnàjò aláìlópin rẹ̀ lọ sí ìgboro; Kí Tinú máa ṣére ní ọ̀dẹ̀dẹ̀ ilé wọn; Kí Sènábù máa yọ́ jáde láti báà wọn ọmọdébìnrin ẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ ní àwọn ilé àyíká wọn.', 'en': 'Tinu would be crying somewhere inside the house. There used to be movements too; like Labake rushing out to the market; Alamu hurriedly descending the stall case. backing the car out of the garage on his seemingly endless trips out to town; Tinu toddling about on the verandah of the house; Zenabu sneaking out to play with the other girls of her age group in the nearby house.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n nísinsìnyí, nílé Àlàmú, kò sí ariwo kankan, kò sí ìgbésẹ̀ kankan, ó ti rí bẹ́ẹ̀ láti àáro -títí di ìsìnyí - aago mẹ́ta lọ́sàn-án.', 'en': "But now, in Alamu's house, there was no noise and there was no movement, it has been like that morning - up till now - three o'clock in the afternoon."}

{'yo': 'Ìyẹn ṣàjèjì, níbo ni wèrè ọkùnrin wà? Wèrè ìyàwó rẹ̀ dà? Eku kékeré tí wọ́n pè lọ́mọ wọn dà? Àti ìkà ẹ̀dá tí wọ́n ń pè ní Sènábù, tí ó máa ń fún wọn ní ìròyìn tí ò lábùlà nǹkan tí ó ń lọ nínú ilé wèrè yìí?', 'en': 'That was strange, where was the mad man? Where was his mad wife? Where was that little rat they called their child? And the mischievous creature called Zenabu who used to give them first-hand accounts of what went on inside this mad house?'}

{'yo': 'Bí àwọn aládùúgbò bá ní àǹfààní sí ilé Àlàmú, wọ́n á ti rí i pé Sènábù ṣì ń sùn lẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ ẹrù kékerénínú yàrá ìgbafẹ́ nínú ilé.', 'en': "If the neighbours had access to Alamu's house, they would have seen that Zenabu was still deep in sleep - by the side of a small load inside the sitting room of the house."}

{'yo': 'Wọn ò bá ti rí i pé Tinú kékeré sì ń sun oorun àlàáfíà nínú yàrá ìyá rẹ̀ nínú ilé, àwọn aládùúgbò ò bá rí i pe Làbákẹ́ fún rarẹ̀ ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ jí, ó ń yán, ó ń nara lẹ́yìn alẹ́ àìsùn...', 'en': "They would have seen that little Tinu was still in peaceful slumber in her mother's room in the house, the neighbours would have seen that Labake herself had just woken up, yawning and stretching her body after a sleepless night..."}

{'yo': 'Bí àwọn èké àdúgbò ṣe ń wò lemọ́ lemọ́ tí wọ́n ń nàka, ni ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ mẹ̀sí ọlọ́yẹ funfun kan wọlé, tí ó sì paná níwájú ilé Àlàmú. Àlàmú jáde nínú ọkọ̀ náà, ọkùnrin mìíràn sì tẹ̀lé e pẹ́kí pẹ́kí.', 'en': "As the inquisitive neighbours continued gazing intently and pointing fingers, a white Mercedes-Benz zoomed in and jerked to a stop in front of Alamu's house. Alamu came out of the car, another man following closely after him."}
{'yo': 'Àwọn méjèèjì jọ gun àkàsọ̀ ilé náà, wọ́n ń sọ̀rọ̀, wọ́n sì ń kanrí mọ́lẹ̀ tì dùnnú tì dùnnú.', 'en': 'Together they ascended the stairs talking and nodding excitedly.'}

{'yo': 'Nínú yàrá ìgbàlejo, Àlàmú àti ẹnìkejì rẹ̀ pàdé Làbákẹ́, wọ́n sì rí i pé Sènábù ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ ń jí láti ojú oorun ni.', 'en': 'Inside the sitting room, Alamu and his companion met Labake and saw that Zenabu was Just waking up from sleep.'}

{'yo': 'Ọmọ kékeré náà kóra jọ, ó nara, ó sì fọwọ́ pa ojú rẹ̀ láìmọye ìgbà, ó wò rá rà rá - láti mọ̀ bóyá ó ti dé Kwara tàbí kòì débẹ̀.', 'en': 'The little girl scrambled up stretched and rubbed her face several times, she looked round and round - apparently to find out whether or not she was already in Kwara!'}

{'yo': 'Ní ìṣẹ́jú kan, ó ṣàkíyèsí ibi tí ó wà. Kíá ó bẹ̀rẹ̀ mọ́lẹ̀ ó sì gbé ẹrù rẹ̀ kékeré sọ́wọ́ gírígírí:', 'en': 'In a minute she discovered where she was. Quickly she bent down and clutched her small load firmly in her hands:'}

{'yo': 'Mo ti ṣe tán láti máa lọ mà, Sènábù kékeré nawọ́ rẹ̀ bí ìgbà ti asinwo ń bèèrè owó lọ́wọ́ Ajigbèsè rẹ̀.', 'en': '"I am ready to go now ma."" Little Zenabu stretched out her hand in the manner of a creditor asking for money from his debtor."'}

{'yo': 'Wọ inú yàrá rẹ lọ báyìí Sènábù!, Àlàmú jágbe. Ọkàn rẹ̀ wà nínú ọ̀rọ̀ tó pàtàkì ju ìyẹn lọ. Kò sì ráyè ti ọmọ oníbàjẹ́ kékeré kan....', 'en': "Get inside your room now Zenabu!' Alamu blurted. His mind was set on a more important issue. And he had no time for a silly, raving little girl..."}

{'yo': 'Wọlé kíá nísìnyí! Sènábù tún nu ojú rẹ̀, ó sìrí i fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́, láìsí ọ̀rọ̀ ìyàn, ó sáré wọ inú ilé oúnjẹ - yàrá rẹ̀ kékeré.', 'en': 'Get you inside quickly now! Zenabu brushed her face again and saw him for the first time, without a word of protest, she stumbled inside the pantry - her little room.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn enìyán mẹ́ta tí ó ṣékù sí yàrá ìgbàfe náà wá ní àsìkò láti wo ara wọn, Fún ìgbà pípẹ́, wọ́n wo ara wọn ní ìdákẹ́ rọ́rọ́, wọ́n dúró bí i òkú mẹ́ta tí a ti yí padà tí wọ́n fẹ́ parí ìjà ayé ọlọ́jọ́ pípẹ́ wọn.', 'en': 'The three people left in the sitting room now had plenty of time to gaze at one another. For a long time, they regarded one another silently, they stood like three transformed dead bodies now coming together in Hades to settle their age-long, earthly quarrel!'}

{'yo': 'Ìwò ìdojúko àti ìrira ni ó kún ojú Làbákẹ́, ó fẹ́ jọ pé ó ń ṣépè fún Àlàmú lọ́kàn rẹ̀- fún gbogbo oṣù mẹ́sàn-án yìí.', 'en': "Labake's gaze was confrontational and hatred-filled, she seemed to be cursing Alamu under her breath for all the sorrow and tribulations he had unleashed on her these past nine months."}

{'yo': 'Ìwò ojú Àlàmú ni èyí tó ń bẹ̀bẹ̀; ìwò jọ̀wọ́-má-bínú, tẹ̀bẹ̀ tẹ̀bẹ̀, ojú rẹ̀ wo ìrísí ìbínú Làbákẹ́.', 'en': "Alamu's own gaze was the apologetic, beg-your-pardon gaze. Pleadingly, his eyes surveyed Labake's angry countenance."}

{'yo': 'Àdìó jẹ́ kí ìjà ìdákẹ́rọ́rọ́ náà lọ láàárín tọkọtaya wọn fún ìgbà díẹ̀ láìsíì díwọ́.', 'en': 'Adio allowed the silent attack and defence to linger on between husband and wife without interruption for some time.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbẹ̀yìn gbẹ́yín, ó fi ọ̀rọ̀ dẹ́kun ìdákẹ́rọ́rọ́ náà, Ẹ jẹ́ kí gbogbo wa jókòó, kí a sìsọ̀rọ̀.', 'en': "Finally, he broke the silence with, Let's all sit down and talk'."}

{'yo': 'Àlàmú wo ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ojú títàn bí ìràwọ̀. Nìgbà tí ó yí wojú ìyàwó rẹ̀, omijé ti ṣarajọ, omijé ti ń ṣàn wálẹ̀ lẹ́rẹ̀kẹ́ rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Alamu looked at his friend with eyes twinkling like stars. When he tumed to look at the face of his wife, the tears had actually gathered, her own tears, of course, had started pouring down her cheeks.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ jẹ́ kí a jókòó sọ̀rọ̀, Àdìó tẹnumó ọn.', 'en': '"Let\'s sit and talk,"" Adio repeated."'}
{'yo': 'Sọ̀rọ̀ nípa kíni! Làbákẹ́ pariwo, ó ṣì ń sunkún.', 'en': "Talk about what!' Labake shouted, still sobbing."}
{'yo': 'Ṣé... ṣé... a lè tún jọ́kọ̀ó sọ̀rọ̀ nípa nǹkankan mọ́ láé?, Ó kálòlò.', 'en': '"Can... can... we ever sit down and talk... talk about anything on this earth again?"" She stammered."'}

{'yo': '"A máa jókòó sọ̀rọ̀... a ní láti jókòo, kí a sọ̀rọ̀,"" Àdìó bẹ̀bẹ̀, Kí a sọ ọ́ parí."""', 'en': '"We\'ll sit and talk... We just must sit down and talk,"" Adio pleaded, \'talk things over."""'}
{'yo': 'Mo ní láti ṣàlàyé, Àlàmú sọ̀rọ̀ pẹ̀lú ohùn tí ó jọ pé ó tẹnu ẹlòmíràn jáde.', 'en': 'I have to explain, Alamu submitted in a voice that seemed to come from another person.'}

{'yo': 'Ìdákẹ́rọ́rọ́ tí ó pẹ́ tún wáyé. Àlàmú gbìyànjú láti ṣarajo, Làbákẹ́ nu ojú tirẹ̀ pẹ̀lú aṣọ ìnujú, ó sì fun imú rẹ̀.', 'en': 'There was prolonged silence again. Alamu tried to get himself together, Labake wiped her own face with a handkerchief and blew her nose.'}

{'yo': '"Lẹ́yìn náà ni ó tún wo ọkọ ṛẹ̀. Làbákẹ́ doríkodò. Ẹ̀rín ""ha ha ha ha"" abàmì yẹn tún wá sí etí rẹ̀, ó gbọ́ ohùn ìfiniṣeyẹ̀yẹ́ àwọn aládùúgbò lẹ́ẹ̀kan sí i, ó tún rí awakọ̀ ọkọ̀ akẹ́rù tí ó ń ṣàpèjúwe bí orí ṣe yí tó."', 'en': '"Then she took another look at her husband. Labake bent her head. That strange \'ha ha ha ha"" laughter came to her ears once more, she heard the mocking voices of the neighbours once more, she saw, anew, how the mammy-wagon driver demonstrated the turning of the head."'}

{'yo': '"Lẹ́yìn náà, ó gbin, omijé tuntun tún ṣarajọ, àwọn ohunèèlò tí o kó kúrò nílé Àlàmú... Kí ló ṣẹlẹ̀ ?"""', 'en': 'Then, she moaned, and fresh tears gathered, those items which you carried away from home Alamu... What happened?'}

{'yo': '"Mo tà wọ́n Làbákẹ́, kébi má ba à pa wá, mo tà wọ́n láti lè jẹ́ ká a rọ́wọ́ mú lọ ṣénu....."" Ó ṣàkíyèsí pé òun ní láti díjú, kí ó sọ òtítọ́, ọ́nà yìí ni ó lè gbà láti dá ìfọkàn tán Làbákẹ́ nínú rẹ̀ padà."', 'en': "I sold them Labake, so that we would not starve, I sold them to make ends meet... Adio discovered he had to be blunt and tell the truth, that was the only way to restore Labake's confidence which had been badly shaken."}

{'yo': 'Ọkọ̀ rẹ ńkọ́, Àlàmú? Mo ta ìyẹn náà Làbákẹ́... Àdìó sìṣé dáadáa láti lè jẹ́ kí n lo ọkọ̀ bítù àlòkù rẹ̀ .', 'en': 'What about your car, Alamu? I sold that one out too Labake... Adio was kind enough to let me have his old Volkswagen.'}

{'yo': 'Ní ìṣẹ́ju àáyá kan, àwòrán alága àwọn ẹgbẹ́ awakọ̀ wá sí ọkàn Làbákẹ́ - ó lára, ó níkùn agbè, ó ń rẹ́rìn-ín músẹ́, ó sì ń juwọ́ tayọ̀ tayọ̀ sí awakọ̀ ọkọ̀-akẹ́rù náà.', 'en': "In a twinkle of an eye the picture of the Chairman of the Driver's Unon came to Labake's mind - a huge-framed, pot bellied individual, smiling and waving cheerfully to the mammy- wagon driver."}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ tún rí àwọn nǹkan àlòkù tí wọ́n ń tà ní ọjà kékeré ní ibùdókọ̀.', 'en': 'Labake saw, again, the jumbled mass of second-hand articles at the motor park mini-market.'}

{'yo': 'Ó tún gbọ́ lẹ́ẹ̀kan sí i, ohùn àwọn tí ó ń pè é pé kí ó wá ra nǹkan àlòkù.', 'en': 'She heard, once more, the voice of the traders calling her, inviting her to come and purchase second-hand articles.'}
{'yo': "Àlàmú... Àlàmú...' Làbákẹ́ tesíwájú, 'Kí ló ṣẹlẹ̀ sí iṣẹ́ rẹ?'", 'en': '"Alamu... Alamu...\' Labake continued, ""What happened to your job?"'}
{'yo': 'Mo pàdánù rẹ̀ Làbákẹ́. Làbákẹ́ ti fẹ́rẹ̀ ẹ́ dákú pẹ̀lú gbogbo ìfihàn yìí.', 'en': 'I Lost it Labake. Labake nearly collapsed at all these revelations.'}

{'yo': 'Kò mọ nǹkankan nípa wọn, kò mọ̀ pé Àlàmú ti ń du ẹjọ́ ìyọníṣẹ́ rẹ̀ nílé ẹj̣́o.', 'en': "She knew nothing about them, she didn't know Alamu had been contesting his termination of appointment in court."}
{'yo': 'Kò sì mọ̀ pé Àdìó ni agbẹjọ́rò rẹ̀. Kò mọ̀ pé Àlàmú ti jáwé olúborí ẹjọ́ náà.', 'en': 'She did not know Adio was his lawyer. She did not know Alamu had won the case.'}
{'yo': 'Àlàmú ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ ń sọ gbogbo èyí fún un báyìí. Ẹnu yà á láìgbàgbọ́.', 'en': 'Alamu was just relating all these to her now. Her jaw dropped in disbelief.'}
{'yo': 'O sì ń fa sìgá, ò ń mu ọtí náà Àlàmú.', 'en': 'And you were smoking and drinking too Alamu.'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, Làbákẹ́ láti fi lé ìbànújẹ́ kúrò.', 'en': 'Yes, Labake to keep the sorrow away.'}
{'yo': 'O ò sọ nǹkankan fún mi rí Àlàmú.', 'en': 'You never told me anything Alamu.'}
{'yo': 'Mo lẹ̀rọ pé á bà ọ́ lọkàn jẹ́ ni, Làbákẹ́', 'en': 'I thought it would break your heart, Labake.'}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo ìdáhùn tí ó wá láti ẹnu Àlàmú la ọkàn Làbákẹ́ kọjá bí i idà.', 'en': "Each answer from Alamu cut through Labake's heart like a dagger."}
{'yo': 'Pé Àlàmú kó gbogbo nǹkan tó pọ̀ báyìí pamọ́ fi ẹ̀dùn sínú iṣan ṛẹ̀.', 'en': 'That Alamu had kept so much away for so long filled all her veins with pain.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbẹ̀yìn gbẹ́yín, O bà mí lọ́kàn jẹ́ Àlàmú... Nínú gbogbo rẹ̀, ìyá rẹ dúró lé mi lọ́rùn, Màmá?', 'en': 'Finally, you broke my heart Alamu... And all through, your mother was at my throat. Mama?'}

{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, Làbákẹ́ sọ gbogbo ìyà tí ó jẹ lọ́wọ́ Màmá, ẹmí ìdára-ẹni-lẹ́bi bà lé Àlàmú, ó sì bẹ̀rẹ̀ si í tọrọ àforíjì.', 'en': 'Yes, Labake related all she had suffered in the hands of Mama, the sense of guilt descended heavily on Alamu and he started mumbling unreserved apology.'}

{'yo': 'Ilẹ̀kùn kàn, kíkàn náà jẹ́ lemọ́lemọ́. Kò sí nǹkankan nínú wọn tí ó ti gbáradì fún àlejò tí ó ń kán ilẹ̀kùn, tí ó sì jàjà wọ inú ilé láìdúró de èsì.', 'en': 'There was a knock on the door, the knock was persistent. None of them was prepared for the visitor who knocked and eventually came into the room without waiting for an answer.'}
{'yo': 'Màmá! Ó wọ inú ilé - tí Èṣùníyì sì tẹ̀lé e.', 'en': 'Mama! She came into the room - followed closely by Esuniyi.'}

{'yo': 'Èṣùníyì dúró fún ìṣẹ́ju àáyá díẹ̀ lẹ́nu ọ̀nà, lẹ́yìn náà, ó wò yíká, ó sì bẹ̀rẹ̀ si ísọ̀rọ̀ kẹ́lẹ́kẹ́lẹ́ sí ara rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Esuniyi hesitated for some seconds at the door, then looked round, and started whispering to himself.'}
{'yo': 'Ó na ìka ìlábẹ̀ rẹ̀ lẹ́ẹ̀mẹ́ta sí Àlàmú, ó sì fọwọ́ kan àyà tirẹ̀ lẹ́ẹ̀mẹ́ta náà.', 'en': 'He pointed his forefingers, three times, to Alamu and touched his own chest three times too.'}

{'yo': 'Ó bẹ̀rẹ̀ mọ́lẹ̀, ó wo ojú Àlàmú, ó sì bẹ̀rẹ̀ si í fẹ̀yìn rìn jáde nínú ilé, ó sì ń sọ̀rọ̀ wụ́yẹ́wụ́yẹ́.', 'en': 'He bent down, looked Alamu in the face, and started backing out of the room, still mumbling, still whispering.'}

{'yo': 'Ogun ti ṣé, màmá rẹ́rìn-ín músẹ́, iṣé tí ó yá ni, gẹ́gẹ́ bí wọ́n ti ṣé gbẹ̀rò rẹ̀ nìyẹn.', 'en': 'The spell had been cast. Mama smiled, it was a swift operation, just like it had been planned.'}

{'yo': 'Kò ju iṣéju mẹ́ta lọ, kí ẹnikẹ́ni tó ní àǹfààní láti sọ̀rọ̀ kan, Èṣùníyì ti wà ní ìsàlẹ̀, ó ń já lọ ní òpópónà.', 'en': 'It did not last more than three minutes. And before anybody had the time to say a word, Esuniyi was already downstairs, trudging away along the street.'}
{'yo': 'Làbákẹ́ súnmọ́ Àlàmú, ó sì sọ ọ́ sí i léti kẹ́lẹ́kẹ́lẹ́; Bàbá oniṣègùn ìyá rẹ.', 'en': "Labake moved nearer Alamu and whispered to his ears: Your mother's medicine man."}
{'yo': 'Tí wọ́n mú wá láti abúlé, láti wo aágànná rẹ sàn.', 'en': 'Brought from the village to cure your malady.'}

{'yo': 'Ó tún sún mọ́ Àdìó, ó sọ̀rọ̀ kẹ́lẹ́kẹ́lẹ́: Bàbá oníṣègùn Màmá tí wọ́n mú wá láti wo aágànná ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ sàn.', 'en': "She moved up to Adio again and whispered: Mama's medicine man, brought to cure your friend's malady."}

{'yo': '"Àwọn èèyàn mẹ́tẹ̀ẹ̀ta pààrọ̀ ìwò fìrí, wọ́n sì rẹ́rìn-ínmúsẹ́. Ta ni ó ya wèrè gan an? Kò sí elòmíràn bí kòṣé ọkùnrin tí ó wọ ẹ̀wù ""apẹtẹ"" yìí."', 'en': 'The three people exchanged quick glances and smiled. Who was mad really? None but this man in apete dress.'}
{'yo': 'Bí a ṣe lè: Dènà ìdojúkọ Fíṣíìnì', 'en': 'How to: Avoid Phishing Attacks'}
{'yo': 'Ìtúnwò Ìkẹyìn 9-6-2017', 'en': 'Last reviewed: 9-6-2017'}

{'yo': "Nípasẹ̀ ìmúgbòrò ààbò rẹ lórí ayélujára, o lè ṣ'alábàápàdé òṣèré ibi t'ó pète láti sọ ààbò rẹ di yẹpẹrẹ.", 'en': 'On your path to improving your digital security, you may encounter bad actors who attempt to undermine your security goals.'}
{'yo': 'Òṣèré burúkú ni a pe irú ọ̀tá, tàbí adojúkọni báwọ̀nyí.', 'en': 'We call these bad actors adversaries, or attackers.'}

{'yo': 'Bí adojúkọni bá fi ímeèlì tàbí ìsopọ̀ tó jọ gidi, àmọ́ tí ó jẹ́ àrànkàn ni à ń pè ní Fíṣíìnì.', 'en': "When an attacker sends an email or link that looks innocent, but is actually malicious it's called phishing."}
{'yo': 'Ìdojúkọ Fíṣíìnì sábà máa ń rí gẹ́lẹ́ bíi iṣẹ́-ìjẹ́ láti tàn ọ́:', 'en': 'A phishing attack usually comes in the form of a message meant to convince you to:'}
{'yo': 'Kí o ṣíra tẹ', 'en': 'click on a link;'}
{'yo': "ìsopọ̀ adaríẹni s'ójú ìwé mìíì", 'en': 'open a document;'}
{'yo': 'Kí o gba ẹ̀da iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú sílẹ̀ sórí ẹ̀rọ-ayárabíàṣáà rẹ; tàbí', 'en': 'install software on your device; or'}
{'yo': 'Kí o tẹ orúkọ ìdánimọ̀ àti ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ sórí ibùdó-ìtàkùn tó jọ ògidì.', 'en': "enter your username and password into a website that's made to look legitimate."}

{'yo': 'Ìdojúkọ Fíṣíìnì lè tàn ọ́ fi kí o fi ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ sílẹ̀, tàbí tàn ọ́ láti fi iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú àidara sórí ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ.', 'en': 'Phishing attacks can trick you into giving up your passwords or trick you into installing malware on your device.'}

{'yo': 'Adojúkọni lè lo iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú àrànkàn láti fi pàṣẹ fún ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ, jí ìwífún-un rẹ, tàbí fi ṣe alamí.', 'en': 'Attackers can use malware to remotely control your device, steal information, or spy on you.'}

{'yo': "Ìtọ́nà yìí yóò ràn ọ́ lọ́wọ́ láti tètè dá ìdojúkọ Fíṣíìnì mọ̀ ní kété tí o bá ṣ'alábàápàdée wọn àti àwọn ọ̀nà tó wúlò tí yóò ràn ọ́ lọ́wọ́ láti gbaradì fún wọn", 'en': 'This guide will help you to identify phishing attacks when you see them and outline some practical ways to help defend against them.'}
{'yo': 'Àwon oríìsí ìdojúkọ Fíṣíìnì tó wà', 'en': 'Types of Phishing Attacks'}
{'yo': 'Fíṣíìnì fún Ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé (tí a mọ̀ sí kíkórèe ìwé-ẹ̀rí) ', 'en': 'Phishing for Passwords (aka Credential Harvesting) '}

{'yo': "Fíṣíìnì fún Ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé lè tàn ọ́ kí o ṣ'èṣì fún wọn ní ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ nípa fífi ìsopọ̀ ṣ'ọwọ́ sí ọ.", 'en': 'Phishers can trick you into giving them your passwords by sending you a deceptive link.'}
{'yo': 'Ojúlé ìtàkùn àgbáyé inú iṣẹ́-ìjẹ́ lè darí ẹni sí ibòmíràn.', 'en': 'Web addresses in a message may appear to have one destination, but lead to another.'}
{'yo': 'Lórí ẹ̀rọ-ayárabíàṣáà rẹ, o máa rí URL tí ò ń lọ, bí o bá fẹ́ tẹ ìsopọ̀.', 'en': 'On your computer, you can usually see the destination URL by hovering over the link.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n a lè díbọ́n ìsopọ̀ kí o jọ ara, tàbí lílo orúkọ ibùdó ìtàkùn tí ọmọ-ọ̀rọ̀ kan ti dín àti o lè daríì rẹ lọ sí ojúùwé ìtàkùn àgbáyé tó jọ èyí tí o ti máa ń lò, bíi Gmail tàbí Dropbox.', 'en': 'But links can be further disguised with lookalike letters, or by using domain names that are one letter off from legitimate domain names and may direct you to a webpage that appears to go to a service that you use, such as Gmail or Dropbox.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ojú ìwé ìfiwọlé wọ̀nyí sábà máa ń rí bí òótọ́ ti yóò tàn ọ́ láti fi orúkọ-ìdánimọ̀ àti ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ sílẹ̀.', 'en': "These fake replica login screens often look so legitimate that it's tempting to type your username and password"}
{'yo': 'Bí o bá ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀, o ó fi ohun-ẹ̀rí ìfiwọléè rẹ ránṣẹ́ sí adojúkọni.', 'en': 'If you do, you will send your login credentials to the attackers.'}
{'yo': 'Torí ìdí èyí, kí o tó tẹ ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé, yẹ pátákó àdírẹ́ẹ̀sì orí ibùdó-ìtàkùn asàwáríkiriì rẹ wò.', 'en': 'So before typing any passwords, look at the address bar of your web browser.'}
{'yo': 'Yóò fi ògidì orúkọ agbègbè-ìkápá ojú ìwé náà hàn gbangba.', 'en': 'It will show the real domain name of the page.'}
{'yo': 'Bí kò bá jọ ibùdó tí o mọ̀ tẹ́lẹ̀, máà tẹ̀síwájú!', 'en': "If it doesn't match the site you think you're logging into, don't continue!"}
{'yo': 'Ṣèrántí wípé àwòrán ilé-iṣẹ́ tí o rí lójú ìwé àyédèrú kò fi hàn wípé ojúlówó ni.', 'en': "Remember that seeing a corporate logo on the page doesn't confirm it's real."}
{'yo': 'Ẹnikẹ́ni lè gbé ẹ̀da àwòrán-ìdánimọ̀ sí orí ojú ìwé tí wọn láti fi tàn ọ́ jẹ.', 'en': 'Anybody can copy a logo or design onto their own page to try and trick you.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn onífíṣíìnì mìíì máa ń lo ibùdó tó fojú jọ ojúlé-ìtàkùn àgbáyé láti tàn ọ́: https://wwwpaypal.com/ yàtọ̀ sí, https://www.paypal.com/.', 'en': 'Some phishers use sites that look like popular Web addresses to fool you: https://wwwpaypal.com/ is different from https://www.paypal.com/.'}

{'yo': '"Ẹ̀wẹ̀wẹ̀, https://www.paypaI.com/ (tí ò ní ""i"" nílá dípò ""L"" kékeré yàtọ̀ sí https://www.paypal.com/."', 'en': '"Similarly https://www.paypaI.com/ (with a capital letter ""i"" instead of a lowercase ""L"") is different from https://www.paypal.com/."'}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀pọ̀ ènìyàn máa ń lo ayí-atọ́ka-ibùdó-ìtàkùn di kúkúrú URL kí URL gígùn ba rọrùn fún kíkà tàbí tẹ̀, ṣùgbọ́n a lè fi èyí ṣe ìpamọ́ ibùdó burúkú.', 'en': 'Many people use URL shorteners to make long URLs easier to read or type, but these can be used to hide malicious destinations.'}

{'yo': 'Bí o bá gba URL kúkúrú bíi ìsopọ̀-adáríẹni t.co lórí Twitter, gbìyànjú kí o ṣe àyẹ̀wò ìdánilójú https://www.checkshorturl.com/ láti tú àṣìírí ibi tí ò ń lọ gan-an.', 'en': "If you receive a shortened URL like a t.co link from Twitter, try putting it into https://www.checkshorturl.com/ to see where it's really going."}
{'yo': 'Rántí, ó rọrùn láti ṣe àyédèrú ímeèlì kí ó ba han ojúlé ìdápadà ímeèlì ẹ̀tàn.', 'en': "Remember, it's easy to forge emails so that they display a false return address."}

{'yo': 'Èyí túmọ̀ sí wípé ìṣàyèwò ojúlé ímeèlì àfiṣẹ́-ìjẹ́-ránṣẹ́ kò tó láti mọ̀ bóyá olóòótọ́ ni ẹni tó rí iṣẹ́-ìjẹ́ ránṣẹ́ tàbí ìdà kejì.', 'en': "This means that checking the apparent email address of the sender isn't enough to confirm that an email was really sent by the person it appears to be from."}
{'yo': 'Àwọ̀n fífẹ̀ ni onífíṣíìnì sábà máa ń lò fi ṣiṣẹ́ láabi wọn.', 'en': 'Most phishing attacks cast a wide net.'}

{'yo': 'Adojúkọni lè fi ímeèlì ránṣẹ́ sí ọgọọgọ́rùn-ún tàbí ẹgbẹẹgbẹ̀rún ènìyàn láti tẹ àwòrán fídíò alárinrin, ìwé tó ṣe pàtàkì, tàbí àríyànjiyàn ìsanwó kan.', 'en': 'An attacker might send emails to hundreds or thousands of people claiming to have an exciting video, important document, or billing dispute.'}

{'yo': 'Àmọ́ nígbà mìíràn a máa ń daríi ìdojúkọ fíṣíìnì sí ẹni tí a mọ̀ kiní kan nípa rẹ̀.', 'en': 'But sometimes phishing attacks are targeted based on something the attacker already knows about an individual.'}

{'yo': '"Èyí ni a pè ní ""Fíṣíìnì ọkọ̀."" Rò ó wípé o gba ímeèlì kan láti ọ̀dọ ẹ̀gbọ́n Boris tí ó ní àwòrán ọmọọ̀ rẹ̀ nínú."', 'en': '"This is called ""spearphishing."" Imagine you receive an email from your Uncle Boris that says it contains pictures of his kids."'}
{'yo': 'Níwọ̀n ìgbà tí Boris ní ọmọ àti pé ìjẹ́rìí sí ojúlé ímeèlìi rẹ̀ jọ èyí tí o mọ̀ tẹ́lẹ̀, o ṣí i.', 'en': 'Since Boris actually has kids and it looks like it is from his address, you open it.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà tí o ṣí i, o rí fáìlì àgbàsílẹ̀ kékeré PDF tí a fi mọ́ ọn.', 'en': 'When you open the email, there is a PDF document attached to it.'}

{'yo': 'Bí o bá ṣí PDF náà, o lè fi àwòrán ọmọ Boris hàn, ṣùgbọ́n o ti ṣe kẹ́lẹ́kẹ́lẹ́ gbé iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú àìdára sórí ẹ̀rọ-ayárabíàṣáà rẹ tí yóò máa ṣe alamí ohun tí o bá ń ṣe wò.', 'en': '"When you open the PDF, it may even display pictures of Boris"" kids, but it also quietly installs malware on your device that can be used to spy on you."'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀gbọ́n Boris kọ́ ló fi ímeèlì yẹn ránṣẹ́, ṣùgbọ́n ẹni tí o mọ̀ wípé ó ni ẹ̀gbọ́n kan tó ń jẹ́ Boris (tí ó ní ọmọ wẹ́wẹ́).', 'en': "Uncle Boris didn't send that email, but someone who knows you have an Uncle Boris (and that he has children) did."}

{'yo': 'PDF tí o ṣíra tẹ̀, tí aka PDF ń ṣí lọ́wọ́, ni iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú àìdára yìí yá lò fi fọ́n odùu rẹ̀ ká sórí ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ.', 'en': 'The PDF document that you clicked on started up your PDF reader, but took advantage of a bug in that software to run its own code.'}
{'yo': 'Láfikún sí PDF tí o rí, o ti ṣe àgbàsílẹ̀ ẹ̀da iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú àìdára sórí ẹ̀rọ ayárabíàṣáà rẹ.', 'en': 'In addition to showing you a PDF, it also downloaded malware onto your computer.'}

{'yo': 'Iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú àìdára yẹn sì lè jí ẹnimímọ̀ àti ká àwòrán tí ayàwòrán àti gbohùngbohùn rẹ̀ gbọ́ sílẹ̀.', 'en': "That malware could retrieve your contacts and record what your device's camera and microphone sees and hears."}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀nà tó dára jù fún ìdáààbòbò araà rẹ lọ́wọ́ ìdojúkọ fíṣíìnì ni láti máà tẹ ìsopọ̀ adarí ẹni tàbí ṣí àfimọ́ tí a fi mọ́ ímeèlì.', 'en': 'The best way to protect yourself from phishing attacks is to never click on any links or open any attachments.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n àmọ̀ràn yìí kò jẹ́ nǹkankan fún ọ̀pọ̀ ènìyàn. Àwọn ọ̀nà tó yanrantí fún ààbò fíṣíìnì wà nísàlẹ̀.', 'en': 'But this advice is unrealistic for most people. Below are some practical ways to defend against phishing.'}
{'yo': 'Ìrànwọ́ bí o ṣe lè gbógunti Ìdojúkọ Fíṣíìnì', 'en': 'How to Help Defend Against A Phishing Attack'}
{'yo': 'Fi àfikún fún iṣẹ́-àìrídìmúù rẹ', 'en': 'Keep your software updated'}

{'yo': 'Ìdojúkọ Fíṣíìnì alo iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú àìdára sábà máa ń gbójúlé odù-aṣàṣìṣe iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú láti gbé iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú àìdára sóríi ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ.', 'en': 'Phishing attacks that use malware often rely on software bugs in order to get the malware onto your machine.'}

{'yo': "Lọ́pọ̀ ìgbà bí a bá ṣ'àkíyèsíi odù-aṣàṣìṣe, oníṣọnà iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú yóò gbé àfikún àtúnṣe jáde.", 'en': 'Usually once a bug becomes known, a software manufacturer will release an update to fix it.'}

{'yo': 'Èyí túmọ̀ sí wípé iṣẹ́-àìrídìmúu ti tẹ́lẹ̀ ní odù-aṣàṣìṣe tó pọ̀ tí a lè lò fi gbé iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú àìdára sórí ẹ̀rọ.', 'en': 'This means that older software has more publicly-known bugs that could be used to help install malware.'}
{'yo': 'Gbígba àfikún iṣẹ́-àìrídìmúù rẹ lóòrèkóòrè yóò dín ewu iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú àìdára kù.', 'en': 'Keeping your software up to date reduces malware risks.'}
{'yo': 'Lo aṣàkóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé aṣiṣẹ́fúnrarẹ̀.', 'en': 'Use a password manager with auto-fill.'}

{'yo': 'Aṣàkóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé aṣiṣẹ́fúnrarẹ̀ yóò ṣe àpamọ̀ ibùdó tí o ti ń lo ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé ọ̀hún.', 'en': 'Password managers that auto-fill passwords keep track of which sites those passwords belong to.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ó ṣe rọrùn fún ènìyàn tó láti bọ́ sí pánpẹ́ ojú ìwé ìfiwọlé ayédèrú, aṣàkóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé ò le è lùgbàdí irú ẹ̀tàn bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': "While it's easy for a human to be tricked by fake login pages, passwordmanagers are not tricked in the same way."}

{'yo': 'Bí o bá ń lọ aṣàkóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé (títí kan aṣàkóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé tó bá asàwáríkiriì rẹ́ wà), tí ó kọ̀ láti ṣiṣẹ́ kíkọ ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé fúnra rẹ̀, ó yẹ kí o ṣe iyèméjì, kí o ṣe àtúnyẹ̀wò ibùdó tí o wà.', 'en': "If you use a password manager (including the built-in password manager in your browser), and it refuses to auto-fill a password, you should hesitate and double check the site you're on."}

{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀, lo ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé alágbára tí aṣàkóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé lè kọ fúnra rẹ̀ lórí ojú ìwé ìfiwọlé ayédèrú dípò kí o fi ọwọ́ọ̀ rẹ tẹ̀ ẹ́.', 'en': 'Better yet, use randomly generated passwords so that you are forced to rely on auto-fill, and less likely to type your password into a fake login page.'}
{'yo': 'Jẹ́rìí sí ímeèlì pẹ̀lú afiṣẹ́-ìjẹ́ ránṣẹ́', 'en': 'Verify Emails with Senders'}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀nà kan láti mọ̀ bí ímeèlì kan bá jẹ́ ìdojúkọ Fíṣíìnì ni wíwòó ní ìkànnì mìíràn láti yẹ ẹni tó fi ránṣẹ́ wò.', 'en': 'One way to determine if an email is a phishing attack is to check via a different channel with the person who supposedly sent it.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ímeèlì náà bá wá láti ilé-ìfowópamọ́ọ̀ rẹ, máà tẹ ìsopọ̀ adarí ẹni sí ojú ìwé mìíràn tí a fi sí inú ímeèlì náà.', 'en': "If the email was purportedly sent from your bank, don't click on links in the email."}

{'yo': 'Kàkà bẹ́ẹ̀, pe ilé-ìfowópamọ́ọ̀ rẹ tàbí kí o ṣí aṣàwáríkiriì rẹ kí o sì tẹ URL ilé-ìfowópamọ́ọ̀ rẹ sí i.', 'en': "Instead, call your bank or open your browser and type in the URL of your bank's website."}

{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́, bí ẹ̀gbọ́n Boris bá fi ímeèlì tí o ní àfimọ́ nínú, pè é lórí ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ọ kí o béèrè bóyá ó fi àwòrán ọmọ rẹ̀ ránṣẹ́ kí o tó ó ṣí i.', 'en': 'Likewise, if your Uncle Boris sends you an email attachment, call him on the phone and ask if he sent you pictures of his kids before opening it.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣí ìwé afurasí nínú Google Drive', 'en': 'Open Suspicious Documents in Google Drive'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ènìyàn ń fojú sọ́nà fún ìfimọ́ láti ọwọ́ ẹni tí o kò mọ̀.', 'en': 'Some people expect to receive attachments from unknown persons.'}
{'yo': 'Fún àpẹẹrẹ, oníròyìn sábà máa ń gba ìwé láti ibi pàtàkì oríṣiríṣi.', 'en': 'For example, journalists commonly receive documents from sources.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ó lè nira láti ṣe ìjẹ́rìísí bóyá ìwé Word, àtẹ́kalẹ̀ Excel, tàbí fáìlì PDF kì í ṣe ti búburú.', 'en': "But it can be difficult to verify that a Word document, Excel spreadsheet, or PDF file isn't malicious."}
{'yo': 'Bí èyí bá wáyé, o kò gbọdọ̀ ṣíra tẹ fáìlì tí o gba ẹ̀dàa rẹ̀ sílẹ̀ lẹ́rìnmejì.', 'en': "In these cases, don't double-click the downloaded file."}
{'yo': 'Kàkà bẹ́ẹ̀, gbé e sóríi Google Drive tàbí akàwé mìíràn lórí ayélujára.', 'en': 'Instead, upload it to Google Drive or another online document reader.'}

{'yo': 'Èyí yóò yí ìwé náà padà sí àwòrán tàbí sí HTML, tí yóò dí gbígbé iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú àìdára lọ́wọ́ lórí ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ.', 'en': 'This will turn the document into an image or HTML, which almost certainly will prevent it from installing malware on your device.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ó bá hùn ọ́ láti kọ́ ìmọ̀ iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú tuntun fún kíka ímeèlì tàbí kíka ìwé ilẹ̀ òkèèrè, ó ní ẹ̀rọ ìṣiṣẹ́ tí yóò dín ipa iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú àìdára kù.', 'en': "If you're comfortable with learning new software and willing to spend time setting up a new environment for reading mail or foreign documents, there are dedicated operating systems designed to limit the effect of malware."}
{'yo': 'TAILS jẹ́ ti ẹ̀rọ ìṣiṣẹ́ ti Linux tó máa ń pa araà rẹ̀ rẹ́ lẹ́yìn tí a bá lò ó tán.', 'en': 'TAILS is a Linux-based operating system that deletes itself after you use it.'}

{'yo': "Qubes jẹ́ ẹ̀rọ ìṣiṣẹ́ mìíràn lórí Linux tí máa ń ṣe jẹ́jẹ́ ya iṣẹ́ s'ọ́tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ kí wọ́n ba máà di ara wọn lọ́wọ́, tí yóò dín ipa iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú àìdára kù.", 'en': 'Qubes is another Linux-based system that carefully separates applications so that they cannot interfere with each other, limiting the effect of any malware.'}
{'yo': 'Méjèèjì ló ń ṣiṣẹ́ lóríi ẹ̀rọ-ayárabíàṣá àgbélétan àti àgbélétábìlì.', 'en': 'Both are designed to work on laptop or desktop computers.'}

{'yo': "O kò le è fi ìsopọ̀ àti fáìlì tí o kò fọkàn tàn sí VirusTotal, iṣẹ́ orí ayélujára ayẹ fáìlì àti ìsopọ̀ wò láti lòdì s'ónírúurú agbógunti-odù-àrànká-abẹ̀rọ-ayárabíàṣájẹ́ tí yóò sì jíhìn àbájáde rẹ̀.", 'en': 'You can also submit untrusted links and files to VirusTotal, an online service that checks files and links against several different antivirus engines and reports the results.'}

{'yo': 'Èyí kò dájú - antivirus sábà máa ń kùnà láti rí iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú àìdára tuntun tàbí ìdojúkọ - ṣùgbọ́n ó dára ju àìsíi rẹ̀ lọ.', 'en': "This isn't foolproof - antivirus often fails to detect new malware or targeted attacks - but it is better than nothing."}

{'yo': 'Fáìlìkífáìlì tàbí ìsopọ̀kísopọ̀ tí o bá gbé sórí ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé gbogboògbò, bíi VirusTotal tàbí Google Drive, lè jẹ́ wíwò fún ẹnikẹ́ni tó bá ń ṣiṣẹ́ fún ilé-iṣẹ́ yẹn, tàbí ẹnikẹ́ni tó bá ní ààyè sí ibùdó-ìtàkùn yẹn.', 'en': 'Any file or link that you upload to a public website, such as VirusTotal or Google Drive, can be viewed by anyone working for that company, or possibly anyone with access to that website.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ìwífún inúu fáìlì náà bá jẹ́ èyí tí ẹnìkejì ò gbọdọ̀ rí, o lè fẹ́ lo òmíràn.', 'en': 'If the information contained in the file is sensitive or privileged communications, you may want to consider an alternative.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣọ́ra fún àlàyé inú ímeèlì', 'en': 'Be Careful of Emailed Instructions'}

{'yo': '"Àwọn ímeèlì Fíṣíìnì kan máa ń parọ́ wípé àjọ alátìlẹ́yìn fún ilé iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ ni àwọn ń ṣe, wọ́n á sì ní kí o fi ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ ṣọwọ́, tàbí f\'ààyè gba ""atẹ́rọ̀ ayárabíàṣá ṣe"" láti wọ ẹ̀rọ ayárabíàṣáà rẹ, tàbí yọ ààbò orí ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ kúrò."', 'en': '"Some phishing emails claim to be from a computer support department or technology company and ask you to reply with your passwords, or to allow a ""computer repair person"" remote access to your computer, or to disable some security feature on your device."'}

{'yo': 'rọ́ nípa ìdí tí ó yẹ kí o fi gbọ́ sí wọn lẹ́nu ní ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́ ni ohuninú ímeèlì náà yóò jẹ́, fún àpẹẹrẹ, wípé àpótí ímeèlì rẹ tí kún tàbí wípé olè ti wọ inú ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ', 'en': 'The email might give a purported explanation of why this is necessary, by claiming, for example, that your email box is full or that your computer has been hacked.'}
{'yo': 'Láìbọ́sírere, gbígbọ́ sí àwọn ọ̀daràn wọ̀nyí lẹ́nu lè ṣe àkóbá fún ààbò rẹ.', 'en': 'Unfortunately, obeying these fraudulent instructions can be bad for your security.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣọ́ra kí o tó fún ẹnikẹ́ni ní ìwífún tó lè kó ọ síta bí ọmọ ọjọ́ mẹ́ta àyàfi bí ó bá dáa lójú wípé ibi dáadáa ni aṣèbéèrè náà ti wá.', 'en': "Be especially careful before giving anyone technical data or following technical instructions unless you can be absolutely certain that the request's source is genuine."}

{'yo': 'Bí ìfura bá ṣe ọ́ nípa ímeèlì tàbí ìsopọ̀ tí ẹnìkan fi ránṣẹ́ sí ọ, máà ṣí i tàbí ṣíra tẹ̀ ẹ́ àfi ìgbà tí o bá ti gbìyànjú àwọn ìmọ̀ràn tí a kà sókè wọ̀nyí àti bí o bá rí àrídájú wípé kì í ṣe ti aburú.', 'en': "If you are at all suspicious of an email or link someone has sent you, don't open or click on it until you've mitigated the situation with the above tips and can be confident it's not malicious."}
{'yo': "Bí a ṣe lè: f'ààyègba ìfẹ̀rílàdí Ọlọ́nà-méjì", 'en': 'How to: Enable Two-factor Authentication'}

{'yo': 'Ìfẹ̀rílàdí ọlọ́nà-méjì (tàbí 2FA) ni ìgbẹ́sẹ̀ ìdánimọ̀ òǹlò nípa lílo àkójọpọ̀ ìfẹ̀rílàdí oríṣi méjì láti lo iṣẹ́ apèsè.', 'en': '"Two-factor authentication (or ""2FA"") is a way to let a user identify him or herself to a service provider by requiring a combination of two different authentication methods."'}

{'yo': "Èyí lè jẹ́ ohun tí òǹlò mọ̀ (bíi ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé tàbí PIN), ohun tí òǹlò ní (bíi àmì iṣẹ́-àrídìmú tàbí ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ọ), tàbí nǹkan tí a fimọ́ tàbí tí kò ṣe é yà s'ọ́tọ̀ lára òǹlò (bíi ìtẹ̀ka wọn).", 'en': 'These may be something that the user knows (like a password or PIN), something that the user possesses (like a hardware token or mobile phone), or something that is attached to or inseparable from the user (like their fingerprints).'}
{'yo': 'O ó ti máa lo 2FA nínú ìgbé ayéè rẹ.', 'en': 'You probably already use 2FA in other parts of your life.'}

{'yo': 'Bí o bá lo ATM láti gbowójádé, o gbọdọ̀ ní ike pélébé ilé-ìfowópamọ́ọ̀ rẹ (ohun tí o ní) àti PIN rẹ (ohun tí o mọ̀) ', 'en': 'When you use an ATM to withdraw cash, you must have both your physical bankcard (something you possess) and your PIN (something that you know).'}

{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, ọ̀pọ̀ iṣẹ́ orí ayélujára á máa lo ìdánimọ̀ kan ṣoṣo fún òǹlò wọn gẹ́gẹ́ bíi ààtòàbáwá - ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé.', 'en': 'Right now, however, many online services only use one factor to identify their users by default - a password.'}
{'yo': 'Báwo ni 2FA ṣe ń ṣiṣẹ́ lórí ayélujára?', 'en': 'How does 2FA work online?'}

{'yo': 'Àìmọye iṣẹ́ orí ayélujára - títí kan Facebook, Google, àti Twitter - ń pèsèe 2FA gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀nà mìíràn fún ìfẹ̀rílàdí ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé nìkan.', 'en': 'Several online services - including Facebook, Google, and Twitter - offer 2FA as an alternative to password-only authentication.'}

{'yo': "Bí o bá f'ààyègba iṣẹ́ yìí, wà á fi ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé àti ọ̀nà mìíràn ṣe ìfẹ̀rílàdí.", 'en': "If you enable this feature you'll be prompted for both a password and a secondary method of authentication."}

{'yo': "Ọ̀nà kejì ni ọ̀kan nínúu SMS tàbí odù àlòlẹ́ẹ̀kan tí áàpù ẹ̀rọ alágbèéká afohunìkọ̀kọ̀ pamọ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Afẹ̀rílàdí Google, Duo Mobile, áàpù Facebook, tàbí Clef) tí a yà s'ọ́tọ̀ fún iṣẹ́ yìí yóò gbà jáde.", 'en': 'authentication. This second method is typically either a one-time code sent by SMS or a one-time code generated by a dedicated mobile app that stores a secret (such as Google Authenticator, Duo Mobile, the Facebook app, or Clef).'}
{'yo': 'Èyíkéyìí, ọ̀nà kejì ni ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ọ alágbèékáà rẹ, ohun tí ó sábà máa ń ní.', 'en': 'In either case, the second factor is your mobile phone, something you (normally) possess.'}

{'yo': 'Ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé (títí kan Google) náà nítìlẹ́yìn ìpamọ́ odù alálòlẹ́ẹ̀kan, tí ẹ̀da rẹ̀ ṣe é gbà sórí ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ, ṣe é tẹ̀ sórí ìwé, àti fi pamọ́ sí ibìkan.', 'en': 'Some websites (including Google) also support single-use backup codes, which can be downloaded, printed on paper, and stored in a safe location as an additional backup.'}

{'yo': "Ní kété tí o bá ti f'ọwọ́ sí i láti máa lo 2FA, o nílò ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ àti odù alálòlẹ́ẹ̀kan láti orí ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ọ alágbèékáà rẹ kí o tó ó r'áàyè wọ ìṣàmúlòo rẹ.", 'en': "Once you've opted-in to using 2FA, you'll need to enter your password and a one-time code from your phone to access your account."}
{'yo': "Kí ló dé tí mo fi gbọdọ̀ f'ààyègba 2FA?", 'en': 'Why should I enable 2FA?'}

{'yo': '2FA ń fún ìṣàmúlòo rẹ ní ààbò tó péye nípa mímú ọ fi ẹ̀rí làdí ìdánimọ̀ọ rẹ ju ọ̀nà kan lọ.', 'en': '2FA offers you greater account security by requiring you to authenticate your identity with more than one method.'}

{'yo': "Èyí túmọ̀ sí wípé, bí ẹnikẹ́ni bá ti ẹ̀ gba ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ mú nípò kìnínní, wọn kò ní le è r'ọ́nà wọ ìṣàmúlòo rẹ àyàfi bí wọ́n bá ní ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ọ alágbèékáà rẹ tàbí r'ọ́nà ipò-kejì lo ìfẹ̀rílàdí mìíràn.", 'en': 'This means that, even if someone were to get hold of your primary password, they could not access your account unless they also had your mobile phone or another secondary means of authentication.'}
{'yo': 'Ǹjẹ́ 2FA ní àléébù?', 'en': 'Are there downsides to using 2FA?'}

{'yo': "Bótilẹ̀jẹ́pé 2FA ń fún ni ní ààbò tó péye fún ìfẹ̀rílàdí, ewu àtìmóde ìṣàmúlòo rẹ le è wáyé, fún àpẹẹrẹ, o kò mọ ibi tí o ṣ'ọwọ́ọ̀ ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ rẹ sí tàbí o ti pàdánùu rẹ, tàbí pààrọ̀ ike pélébé SIM rẹ, tàbí rìnrìn àjò sí ìlú mìíràn láì tan ìrìn-káàkiri orí ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ.", 'en': 'Although 2FA offers a more secure means of authentication, there is an increased risk of getting locked out of your account if, for example, you misplace or lose your phone, change your SIM card, or travel to a country without turning on roaming.'}

{'yo': '"Ọ̀pọ̀ nínú iṣẹ́ 2FA ní ń pèsè àkàsílẹ̀ ""àpamọ́"" kúkúrú alálòlẹ́ẹ̀kan tàbí odù ""ìgbàpadà."""', 'en': '"Many 2FA services provide a short list of single-use ""backup"" or ""recovery"" codes."'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀rìnkan o lè lo ọ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan odù yìí fi wọ ìṣàmúlòo rẹ, kò sì wúlò mọ́ lẹ́yìnwá.', 'en': 'Each code works exactly once to log in to your account, and is no longer usable thereafter.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ọ̀kan-àn rẹ kò bá balẹ̀ nípa ìpàdánù ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ọ rẹ tàbí ẹ̀rọ ìfẹ̀rílàdí mìíràn, tẹ odù wọ̀nyí jáde kí o sì máa gbé e kiri.', 'en': 'If you are worried about losing access to your phone or other authentication device, print out and carry these codes with you.'}
{'yo': '"Wọn yóò ṣì ṣiṣẹ́ bí ""ohun tí o ní,"" níwọ̀n ìgbà tí o bá tẹ ẹ̀dà kan ṣoṣo."', 'en': '"They\'ll still work as ""something you have,"" as long as you only make one copy, and keep it close."'}

{'yo': "Kí o sì tọ́júu odù náà kí o rí i dájú wípé ẹlòmíràn kò rí i tàbí r'áàyè sí i nígbàkúùgbà.", 'en': 'Remember to keep the codes secure and ensure that no one else sees them or has access to them at any time.'}

{'yo': "Bí o bá lo odù àkópamọ́ tàbí pàdánùu rẹ, o lè gba òmíràn jáde tí o bá r'áàyè wọ inú ìṣàmúlò rẹ.", 'en': "If you use or lose your backup codes, you can generate a new list next time you're able to log in to your account."}
{'yo': "Ìṣòro mìíràn tí ẹ̀rọ 2FA tó ń lo iṣẹ́-ìjẹ́ SMS ni wípé iṣẹ́-ìjẹ́ SMS kò l'áàbò tó.", 'en': "Another problem with 2FA systems that use SMS messages is that SMS messaging isn't that secure."}

{'yo': "Ó ṣe é ṣe fún ògbólógbòó adojúkọni láti r'áàyè wọ inúu ìṣàsopọ̀ ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ọ rẹ (gẹ́gẹ́ bíi àjọ aṣèwádìí ọ̀daràn tàbí ẹgbẹ́ arúfin kan) láti jí àti lo odù tí a lo SMS fi ránṣẹ́ sí ọ.", 'en': "It's possible for a sophisticated attacker who has access to the phone network (such as an intelligence agency or an organized crime operation) to intercept and use the codes that are sent by SMS."}

{'yo': "Pàápàá adojúkọni tí kì í ṣe ògbólógbòó ti dáríi iṣẹ́-ìjẹ́ ẹlòmíràn sórí ilàa tirẹ̀, tàbí r'ọ́nà wọ ilé-iṣẹ́ apèsè àfihàn iṣẹ́-ìjẹ́ tí a fi ránṣẹ́ sórí ilà hàn láì nílò ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀.", 'en': 'There have also been cases where a less sophisticated attacker (such as an individual) has managed to forward calls or text messages intended for one number to his or her own, or accessed telephone company services that show text messages sent to a phone number without needing to have the phone.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ọkàn-an rẹ̀ ò bá balẹ̀ nípa ìdojúkọ, pa ìfẹ̀rílàdí SMS, kí o sì lo áàpù afẹ̀rílàdí bíi Google Authenticator tàbí Authy.', 'en': "If you're worried about this level of attack, turn off SMS authentication, and only use authenticator apps like Google Authenticator or Authy."}
{'yo': 'Láìbọ́sírere, àṣàyàn yìí kò sí lárọ̀ọ́wọ́tó fún gbogbo iṣẹ́ afààyègbà 2FA.', 'en': 'Unfortunately this option is not available with every 2FA-enabled service.'}

{'yo': 'Níròpọ̀, lílo 2FA túmọ̀ sí wípé o lè máa gbé ìwífún tó pọ̀ ṣọwọ́ iṣẹ́ tí ò rọ̀ ọ́ lọ́rùn.', 'en': 'In addition, using 2FA means you may be handing over more information to a service than you are comfortable with.'}
{'yo': 'Bí o bá ń lo Twitter, tí o sì lo orúkọ ìnagijẹ nígbà tí o forúkọsílẹ̀.', 'en': 'Suppose you use Twitter, and you signed up using a pseudonym.'}

{'yo': "Pàápàá bí o kò bá fi ìdánimọ̀ lẹ́kùnún rẹ́rẹ́ fún Twitter, àti bí o bá wọ̀ ọ́ lóríi Tor tàbí VPN, bí o bá f'ààyègba 2FA SMS, Twitter kò ní ṣaláì ní àkọsílẹ̀ ilà ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ọ alágbèékáà rẹ.", 'en': 'Even if you carefully avoid giving Twitter your identifying information, and even if you access the service only over Tor or a VPN, if you enable SMS 2FA, Twitter will necessarily have a record of your mobile number.'}

{'yo': 'Èyí ni pé, bí ilé ẹjọ́ bá pa á láṣẹ, Twitter lè fi ilà ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ọ rẹ dá ọ mọ̀.', 'en': 'That means that, if compelled by a court, Twitter can link your account to you via your phone number.'}

{'yo': 'Èyí lè máà jẹ́ ìṣòro fún ọ, ìyẹn bí o bá lo orúkọ àbísọọ̀ rẹ lórí iṣẹ́kíṣẹ́, àmọ́ bí pípa ìdánimọ̀ọ rẹ mọ́ bá pọn dandan, ṣe àtúnrò nípa lílo 2FA SMS.', 'en': 'This may not be a problem for you, especially if you already use your legal name on a given service, but if maintaining your anonymity is important, think twice about using SMS 2FA.'}

{'yo': "Níparí, ìwádìí ti fi hàn wípé àwọn òǹlò kan máa ń yan ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé tí kò nípọn tó bí wọ́n bá f'ààyègba 2FA tán, pẹ̀lú èrò wípé ọ̀nà kejì yóò dáàbò bò wọ́n.", 'en': 'Finally, research has shown that some users will choose weaker passwords after enabling 2FA, feeling that the second factor is keeping them secure.'}
{'yo': "Rí i dájú wípé o yan ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé tí ó lágbára lẹ́yìn tí o bá ti f'ààyègba 2FA.", 'en': 'Make sure to still choose a strong password even after enabling 2FA.'}
{'yo': 'Wo ìtọ́nà bí a ṣe ń ṣẹ̀dá ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlée wa fún olobó.', 'en': 'See our creating strong passwords guide for tips.'}
{'yo': "Báwo ni mo ṣe lè f'ààyègba 2FA?", 'en': 'How do I enable 2FA?'}
{'yo': "Èyí yàtọ̀ láti agbègbè s'ágbègbè, bẹ́ẹ̀ náà ni ìpèlórúkọ wọ́n yàtọ̀.", 'en': 'This differs from platform to platform, as does the terminology used.'}
{'yo': "Ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́ àkàsílẹ̀ àwọn ibùdó tó l'átìlẹ́yìn fún 2FA wà ní https://twofactorauth.org/.", 'en': 'An extensive list of sites supporting 2FA is available at https://twofactorauth.org/.'}

{'yo': "Fún àwọn iṣẹ́ tó wọ́pọ̀, o lè wo Ìtẹ̀jáde 2FA Ọlọ́jọ́ Méjìláa wa, tó ṣàpèjúwe bí o ṣe lè f'ààyègba 2FA lóríi Amazon, Ilé-Ìfowópamọ́ America, Dropbox, Facebook, Gmail ati Google, LinkedIn, Outlook.com àti Microsoft, PayPal, Slack, Twitter, àti Yahoo Mail.", 'en': 'For the most common services, you can refer to our 12 Days of 2FA post, which shows how to enable 2FA on Amazon, Bank of America, Dropbox, Facebook, Gmail and Google, LinkedIn, Outlook.com and Microsoft, PayPal, Slack, Twitter, and Yahoo Mail.'}

{'yo': 'Bí o bá fẹ́ ààbò tó kójú òṣùwọ̀n tí kò ní í jẹ́ kí olè lè jí ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ, ka àkàsílẹ̀ yìí kí o sì tan 2FA sílẹ̀ fún gbogbo ìṣàmúlò ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé tí o ṣe kókó tí o gbẹ́kẹ̀lé.', 'en': 'If you want better protection against stolen passwords, read through this list and turn on 2FA for all of the important web accounts you rely on.'}
{'yo': 'Lílo Alákòóso Ọ̀rọ̀-Ìfiwọlé fún Ìṣẹ̀dá Ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé tó Lágbára', 'en': 'Creating Strong Passwords Using Password Managers'}

{'yo': "Àtúnùntúnlò ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé jẹ́ ọ̀nà ààbò tí kò dára. Bí òṣèré ibí bá gbá ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé tí o ti tún lò lórí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ iṣẹ́ mú, wọ́n lè r'ọ́nà wọ inú ìṣàmúlò rẹ.", 'en': "Reusing passwords is an exceptionally bad security practice. If a bad actor gets ahold of a password that you've reused across multiple services, they can gain access to many of your accounts."}
{'yo': 'Torí ìdí èyí ni ó fi dára tí ó sì pọn dandan kí a ní ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé tó lágbára, tó sì yàrà ọ̀tọ̀.', 'en': 'This is why having multiple, strong, unique passwords is so important.'}
{'yo': 'Ní rere, alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé lè ṣerànwọ́.', 'en': 'Fortunately, a password manager can help.'}

{'yo': "Alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé ni irinṣẹ́ tí í máa ń ṣẹ̀dá àti fi ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé pamọ́ fún ọ, kí o ba lè lo onírúurú ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé lóríi onírúurú ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé láì sí wípé ó há a s'ágbárí.", 'en': 'A password manager is a tool that creates and stores passwords for you, so you can use many different passwords on different sites and services without having to memorize them.'}
{'yo': 'Alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé:', 'en': 'Password managers:'}
{'yo': 'Máa ń ṣàgbajáde ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé tó ṣòro fún ọmọ-ènìyàn láti mọ̀.', 'en': 'generate strong passwords that a human being would be unlikely to guess.'}
{'yo': 'Máa ń fi ọ̀gọ̀rọ ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé sí ìpamọ́ (àti èsì fún ìbéèrè ààbò) pẹ̀lú ààbò tó péye.', 'en': 'store several passwords (and responses to security questions) safely.'}
{'yo': 'dáàbò bo ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ pẹ̀lú ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé olúwa (tàbí gbólóhùn ìfiwọlé ọlọ́rọ̀ kan).', 'en': 'protect all of your passwords with a single master password (or passphrase).'}
{'yo': 'KeePassXC ni irúfẹ́ alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé tó jẹ́ irinṣẹ́ ìṣísílẹ̀ ọ̀fẹ́.', 'en': 'KeePassXC is an example of a password manager that is open-source and free.'}

{'yo': "O lè tọ́júu irinṣẹ́ yìí sórí ẹ̀rọ-ayárabíàṣá àgbélétábìlì rẹ tàbí kí o fi s'ínúu aṣàwákiri ibùdó-ìtàkùn rẹ.", 'en': 'You can keep this tool on your desktop or integrate it into your web browser.'}

{'yo': "KeePassXC kì í fi àyípadà tí o bá ṣe nígbà tí o bá lò ó pamọ́ fúnra rẹ̀, bí ó bá d'aṣẹ́ sílẹ̀ lẹ́yìn tí o ti fi ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé kún tilẹ̀, o lè pàdánùu rẹ títí láéláé.", 'en': "KeePassXC does not automatically save changes you make when using it, so if it crashes after you've added some passwords, you can lose them forever."}
{'yo': 'O lè yí èyí padà nínú ààtò.', 'en': 'You can change this in the settings.'}
{'yo': 'Ò ń gbèrò bóyá alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé ni irinṣẹ́ tó tọ́ sí ọ?', 'en': 'Wondering whether a password manager is the right tool for you?'}
{'yo': 'Bí ọ̀tá ńlá bíi ìjọba bá ń lépaà rẹ, o lè máà jẹ́ bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': 'If a powerful adversary like a government is targeting you, it might not be.'}
{'yo': 'Lílo alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé máa ń ṣẹ̀dáa ìkúnnà kan ṣoṣo.', 'en': 'using a password manager creates a single point of failure.'}
{'yo': 'Alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé jẹ́ ìlépa gbangba fún ọ̀tá.', 'en': 'password managers are an obvious target for adversaries.'}
{'yo': 'Ìwádìí ṣíni níyè wípé ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé ni ìpalára lè bá.', 'en': 'research suggests that many password managers have vulnerabilities.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ọkàn-an rẹ kò bá balẹ̀ lórí ìdojúkọ orí ẹ̀rọ ayárabíàṣá olówó iyebíye, o lè lo èyí tí kò gba wàhálà púpọ̀.', 'en': "If you're worried about expensive digital attacks, consider something more low-tech."}

{'yo': '"O lè ṣẹ̀dá ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé àfọwọ́ṣe (wo ""bí a ṣe ń lo dice fún ìṣẹ̀dá ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé alágbára"" nísàlẹ̀) kọ ọ́ sílẹ̀, kí o tọ́júu rẹ̀ síbi tó l\'áàbò."', 'en': '"You can create strong passwords manually (see ""Creating strong passwords using dice"" below), write them down, and keep them somewhere safe on your person."'}
{'yo': 'Dúró, ṣe àgbárí kọ́ ni ó yẹ kí a há ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé sí àti kí a máa kọ ọ́ sílẹ̀ rárá?', 'en': "Wait, aren't we supposed to keep passwords in our heads and never write them down?"}

{'yo': "Lóòótọ́, kò burú bí a bá kọ ọ́ sílẹ̀, kí a sì fi pamọ́ síbìkan bí àsùnwọ̀n ìkówósí àfisápò rẹ, èyí yóò ta ọ́ jí b'ọ́rọ̀-ìfiwọlé tí o kọ sílẹ̀ bá di àwátì tàbí bí wọ́n bá jí i.", 'en': "Actually, writing them down, and keeping them somewhere like your wallet, is useful so you'll at least know if your written passwords go missing or get stolen."}
{'yo': 'Bí a ṣe ń lo dice fi ṣẹ̀dá ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé alágbára', 'en': 'Creating Strong Passwords Using Dice'}
{'yo': "Ó ní àwọn ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé alágbára tí ó yẹ kí o há s'ágbárí.", 'en': 'There are a few passwords that you should memorize and that need to be particularly strong.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ni:', 'en': 'These include:'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé fún ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ', 'en': 'passwords for your device'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé fún ìyí-dátà-padà-sí-odù-ààbò (bíi ìyí-dátà-padà-sí-odù-ààbò díìskì kíkún) ', 'en': 'passwords for encryption (like full-disk encryption) '}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé olúwa, tàbí gbólóhùn ìfiwọlé ọlọ́rọ̀ kan, fún alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ', 'en': '"the master password, or ""passphrase,"" for your password manager"'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé ímeèlì rẹ.', 'en': 'your email password'}

{'yo': 'Ìṣòro kan tí àwọn èèyàn bá ń yan ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé fúnra wọn ni pé àwọn èèyàn kò mọ̀ bí a ṣe ń ṣe àṣàyàn láìròtẹ́lẹ̀ àti aláìsọtẹ́lẹ̀.', 'en': "One of many difficulties when people choose passwords themselves is that people aren't very good at making random, unpredictable choices."}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀nà ìṣẹ̀dá ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé tó lágbára tí ó sì ṣe é rántí jù ni bí a bá lo dice àti àkàsílẹ̀ ọ̀rọ̀ láti yan ọ̀rọ̀ láìròtẹ́lẹ̀.', 'en': 'An effective way of creating a strong and memorable password is to use dice and a word list to randomly choose words.'}
{'yo': '"Lápapọ̀, àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ wọ̀nyí ni ""gbólóhùn ìfiwọlé ọlọ́rọ̀ kan."""', 'en': '"Together, these words form your ""passphrase."""'}
{'yo': 'Gbólóhùn ìfiwọlé ọlọ́rọ̀ kan ni irúfẹ́ ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé aláàbò tó máa ń gùn.', 'en': '"A ""passphrase"" is a type of password that is longer for added security."'}

{'yo': 'Fún ìyí-dátà-padà-sí-odù-ààbò díìskì àti alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ, ó kéré jù, yan ọ̀rọ̀ mẹ́fà.', 'en': 'For disk encryption and your password manager, we recommend selecting a minimum of six words.'}
{'yo': 'Kí ni ṣe tí ó fi yẹ kí o lo ọ̀rọ̀ mẹ́fà?', 'en': 'Why use a minimum of six words?'}
{'yo': 'Kí ní dé tí ó fi yẹ kí o fi dice ṣe ìṣàjọ ọ̀rọ̀ onígbólóhùn kan láìròtẹ́lẹ̀?', 'en': 'Why use dice to pick words in a phrase randomly?'}

{'yo': 'Bí ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé bá ṣe gùn àti bí ó ṣe jẹ́ àṣàyàn láìròtẹ́lẹ̀, bẹ́ẹ̀ni yóò ṣe le fún ẹ̀rọ ayárabíàṣáà àti ènìyàn láti rò.', 'en': 'The longer and more random the password, the harder it is for both computers and humans to guess.'}
{'yo': 'fídíò alálàyé kan rè é.', 'en': "here's a video explainer."}
{'yo': 'Gbìyànjú kí o lo àṣàkalẹ̀ ọ̀rọ̀ EFF láti ṣe gbólóhùn ìfiwọlé ọlọ́rọ̀ kan.', 'en': "Try making a passphrase using one of EFF's word lists."}

{'yo': 'Bí adojúkọ bá dojúkọ ẹ̀rọ ayárabíàṣáà rẹ tàbí ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ, tí iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú alamí wà lóríi rẹ̀, iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú alamí lè máa wò ọ́ bí o bá ń tẹ ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé olúwaà rẹ.', 'en': 'If your computer or device gets compromised and spyware is installed, the spyware can watch you type your master password and could steal the contents of the password manager.'}

{'yo': 'Torí náà ó pọn dandan kí ẹ̀rọ ayárabíàṣáà rẹ àti ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ ó wà ní mímọ, kí o máà sí iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú àìdára bí o bá ń lo alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé.', 'en': "So it's still very important to keep your computer and other devices clean of malware when using a password manager."}
{'yo': '"Ọ̀rọ̀ nípa ""ìbéèrè ààbò"""', 'en': '"A Word About ""Security Questions"""'}
{'yo': '"Kíyèsára fún ""ìbéèrè ààbò"" tí ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé ń lò fi ṣe ìfẹsẹ̀múlẹ̀ ìdánimọ̀ọ rẹ."', 'en': '"Beware of the ""security questions"" that websites use to confirm your identity."'}

{'yo': 'Ìdáhùn òdodo sí ìbéèrè wọ̀nyí máa ń wà ní àrọ́wọ́tóo gbogboògbò tí yóò sì gbé ẹ̀rí tí ọ̀tá lè lò fi fo ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ kọjá yányán.', 'en': 'Honest answers to these questions are often publicly discoverable facts that a determined adversary can easily find and use to bypass your password entirely.'}
{'yo': 'Kàkà bẹ́ẹ̀, fi ìdáhùn tí kì í ṣe òdodo pọ́nbélé tí ẹnìkan yàtọ̀ sí ìwọ kò mọ̀ sílẹ̀.', 'en': 'Instead, give fictional answers that no one knows but you.'}
{'yo': 'Fún àpẹẹrẹ, bí ìbéèrè ààbò bá ní:', 'en': 'For example, if the security question asks:'}
{'yo': 'Kí ni orúkọ ẹranko ilé tí o fẹ́ràn àkọ́kọ́ọ̀ rẹ?', 'en': '"""What was the name of your first pet?"""'}
{'yo': 'Ìdáhùn rẹ lè jẹ́ ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé aláìròtẹ́lẹ̀ tí alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ gbàjáde.', 'en': 'Your answer could be a random password generated from your password manager.'}
{'yo': "O lè fi ìdáhùn àìṣòdodo pọ́nbélé wọ̀nyí s'ínúu alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ.", 'en': 'You can store these fictional answers in your password manager.'}
{'yo': 'Ronú nípa ibùdó-ìtàkùn tí o ti lo ìbéèrè ààbò rí kí o sì gbèrò nípa ìyípadà èsì rẹ.', 'en': "Think of sites where you've used security questions and consider changing your responses."}

{'yo': 'Máà lo ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé tàbí ìbéèrè ààbò kan náà fún gbogbo ìṣàmúlò fún gbogbo ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyéè tàbí iṣẹ́.', 'en': 'Do not use the same passwords or security question answers for multiple accounts on different websites or services.'}
{'yo': 'Ìmúṣiṣẹ́pọ̀ ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ lóríi ẹ̀rọ gbogbo', 'en': 'Syncing Your Passwords Across Multiple Devices'}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀pọ̀ alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé ń fi ààyè gba ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ lórí gbogbo ẹ̀rọ - nípa àmúṣiṣẹ́pọ̀.', 'en': 'Many password managers allow you to access your passwords across devices through a password-synchronizing feature.'}

{'yo': 'Èyí ni pé bí o bá mu ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ ṣiṣẹ́ pọ̀ lórí ẹ̀rọ kan, yóò ṣàfikún lórí ẹ̀rọ ìyókù', 'en': 'This means when you sync your password file on one device, it will update it on all of your devices.'}

{'yo': '"Alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé lè fi ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ pamọ́ ""s\'ínúu kùkukùru,"" tí ó túmọ̀ sí wípé a ti yí dátà rẹ̀ padà sí odù ààbò sínú apèsè àrọ́wọ́tó."', 'en': '"Password managers can store your passwords ""in the cloud,"" meaning encrypted on a remote server."'}

{'yo': 'Bí o bá nílòo ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ, alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé wọ̀nyí yóò ṣe àgbàjáde ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé, yóò sì tú ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé tí a ti yí padà sí odù ààbò fúnra rẹ̀.', 'en': 'When you need your passwords, these managers will retrieve and decryptthe passwords for you automatically'}

{'yo': 'Alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé tí ń fi apèsèe tirẹ̀ ṣe ìpamọ́ tàbí ìrànwọ́ àmúṣiṣẹ́pọ̀ ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ rọrùn bíi kàásínǹkan, ṣùgbọ́n ìpalára ìdojúkọ lè bá wọn.', 'en': 'Password managers that use their own servers to store or help synchronize your passwords are more convenient, but are slightly more vulnerable to attacks.'}

{'yo': "Bí o bá fi ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ pamọ́ sí orí ẹ̀rọ ayárabíàṣá àti s'ínúu kùkukùru, adojúkọni kò ní í lo ẹ̀rọ ayárabíàṣáà rẹ láti mọ ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ.", 'en': 'If your passwords are stored both on your computer and in the cloud, an attacker does not need to take over your computer to find out your passwords.'}
{'yo': ' (Wọ́n ní láti fọ́ gbólóhùn ìfiwọlé ọlọ́rọ̀ kan ti alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ.) ', 'en': " (They will need to break your password manager's passphrase though.) "}

{'yo': "Bí èyí bá kàn ọ́ gbọ̀ngbọ̀n, máà mú ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ ṣiṣẹ́ pọ̀ s'ínúu kùkukùru, kàkà bẹ́ẹ̀ fi wọ́n pamọ́ sórí ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ.", 'en': "If this is concerning, don't sync your passwords to the cloud and instead opt to store them on just your devices."}
{'yo': 'Tọ́júu ìkópamọ̀ ilée dátà ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ torí aìíṣeémọ̀.', 'en': 'Keep a backup of your password database just in case.'}

{'yo': 'Àkópamọ́ wúlò bí o bá pàdánù ilé dátà ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ látàrí ìdaṣẹ́sílẹ̀, tàbí tí ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ bá di jíjí.', 'en': 'Having a backup is useful if you lose your password database in a crash, or if your device is taken away from you.'}

{'yo': 'Alákòóso ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé sábà máa ń ní ọ̀nà láti ṣe àkópamọ́ fáìlì, tàbí kí o lo iṣẹ́ àkópamọ́ tó wọ́pọ̀.', 'en': 'Password managers usually have a way to make a backup file, or you can use your regular backup program.'}
{'yo': 'Ìfẹ̀rílàdí Ọlọ́nà púpọ̀ àti ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé ẹ̀rìnkan.', 'en': 'Multi-Factor Authentication and One-Time Passwords'}

{'yo': "Ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé alágbára, aláràọ̀tọ̀ kì í mú u rọrùn fún òṣèré ibi láti r'áàyè wọ ìṣàmúlò rẹ fún ìfẹ̀rílàdí ọlọ́nà méjì.", 'en': 'Strong, unique passwords make it much harder for bad actors to access your accounts to further protect your accounts, enable two-factor authentication'}

{'yo': "Àwọn iṣẹ́ kan a máa fún ni ìfẹ̀rílàdí ọlọ́nà méjì (tí a tún ń pè ní 2FA, ìfẹ̀rílàdí ọlọ́nà púpọ̀ tàbí ìfẹ̀rílàdí ìgbésẹ̀ méjì), tí òǹlò gbọdọ̀ lo ohun méjì (ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé àti ọ̀nà mìíràn) láti r'áàyè wọ ìṣàmúlò wọn.", 'en': 'Some services offer two-factor authentication (also called 2FA, multi-factor authentication, or two-step verification), which requires users to possess two components (a password and a second factor) to gain access to their account.'}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀nà kejì lè jẹ́ odù alálòlẹ́ẹ̀kan tàbí òǹkà tí ẹ̀rọ alágbèéká gbàjáde.', 'en': 'The second factor could be a one-off secret code or a number generated by a program running on a mobile device.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀nà méjì ni a lè fi ṣe ìfẹ̀rílàdí ọlọ́nà méjì lórí ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ alágbèéká:', 'en': 'Two-factor authentication using a mobile phone can be done in one of two ways:'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ọ rẹ lè ṣiṣẹ́ ìfẹ̀rílàdí láti ṣe àgbájáde odù ààbò (gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Afẹ̀rílàdí Google tàbí Authy) tàbí kí o lo ẹ̀rọ iṣẹ́ àìrídìmú àládàádúró (gẹ́gẹ́ bíi YubiKey); tàbí', 'en': 'your phone can run an authenticator application that generates security codes (such as Google Authenticator or Authy) or you can use a stand-alone hardware device (such as a YubiKey); or'}

{'yo': 'Iṣẹ́ náà lè fi àtẹ̀jíṣẹ́ SMS pẹ̀lú àfilé odù ààbò tí ó ní láti tẹ̀ nígbàkúùgbà tí o bá fẹ́ wọlé.', 'en': 'the service can send you an SMS text message with an extra security code that you need to type in whenever you log in.'}

{'yo': 'Kàkà kí o gba àfilé odù ààbò, o lè yan iṣẹ́ ìfẹ̀rílàdí tàbí ẹ̀rọ iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú àládàádúró.', 'en': 'If you have a choice, pick the authenticator application or stand-alone hardware device instead of receiving codes by text message.'}

{'yo': "Ó rọrùn fún adojúkọni láti ṣ'àtúndarí odù wọ̀nyí sórí ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ọ ti wọn ju ìdákọjá afẹ̀rílàdí lọ.", 'en': "It's easier for an attacker to redirect these codes to their own phone than it is to bypass the authenticator."}

{'yo': "Àwọn iṣẹ́ kan, gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Google, náà máa ń f'ààyè gbà ọ́ láti ṣ'àgbàjáde àkàsílẹ̀ ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé ẹ̀rìnkan ṣoṣo, tí a tún ń pè ní ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé alálòlẹ́ẹ̀kan.", 'en': 'Some services, such as Google, also allow you to generate a list of one-time passwords, also called single-use passwords.'}
{'yo': 'Ó yẹ kí a tẹ̀ ẹ́ sórí ìwé tàbí kọ ọ́ sílẹ̀ kí a máa gbé e kiri.', 'en': 'These are meant to be printed or written down on paper and carried with you.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀ẹ̀kan ṣoṣo ni ọ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé wọ̀nyí ń ṣiṣẹ́, torí náà bí iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú alamí bá jí ọkàn, olè náà kò ní le è lò ó fún ohunkóhun lọ́jọ́ iwájú.', 'en': "Each of these passwords works only once, so if one is stolen by spyware when you enter it, the thief won't be able to use it for anything in the future."}

{'yo': "Bí ìwọ tàbí ilé-iṣẹ́ẹ̀ rẹ bá ní irinṣẹ́ ìtàkùrọ̀sọ tirẹ̀, iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú ọ̀fẹ́ wà lárọ̀ọ́wọ́tó tí ó ṣe é lò láti f'ààyègba ìfẹ̀rílàdí ọlọ́nà méjì láti r'áàyè wọ ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ.", 'en': "If you or your organization run your own communications infrastructure, there's free software available that can be used to enable two-factor authentication for accessing your systems."}

{'yo': '"Wá iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú tí ó jẹ́ ti ìṣísílẹ̀ ""Ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé Ẹ̀̀rìnkan ṣoṣo Adálórí Àkókò"" tàbí RFC 6238."', 'en': '"Look for software offering implementations of the open standard ""Time-Based One-Time Passwords"" or RFC 6238."'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà mìíràn, O ní láti sọ Ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ', 'en': 'Sometimes, You Will Need to Disclose Your Password'}
{'yo': 'Òfin nípa sísọ ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé yàtọ̀ láti ibìkan dé òmíràn.', 'en': 'Laws about revealing passwords differ from place to place.'}

{'yo': "Nígbà mìíràn o lè kọ̀ jálẹ̀ kí o máà fún ẹnikẹ́ni ní ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọléè rẹ, níbo mìíràn ẹ̀wẹ̀wẹ̀ òfín ìbílẹ̀ f'ààyè gba ìjọba láti béèrè fún ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé ẹnikẹ́ni - àti pàápàá fi ọ́ sí àtìmọ́lé bí o bá jẹ́ afurasí tí ó mọ ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé tàbí kọ́kọ́rọ́ kan.", 'en': 'In some jurisdictions you may be able to legally challenge a demand for your password while in others, local laws allow the government to demand disclosure - and even imprison you on the suspicion that you may know a password or key'}
{'yo': 'A lè lo ìdẹ́rùbà ìpalára ojúkorojú láti fi gba ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé lọ́wọ́ èèyàn.', 'en': 'Threats of physical harm can be used to force someone to give up their password.'}

{'yo': "Tàbí kí o bá araà rẹ nínú ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ kan, bíi rírin ìrìn àjò s'ódìkejì ìlú, níbi tí àwọn aláṣẹ lè ti dá ọ dúró tàbí gba ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ bí o bá kọ̀ láti fún wọn ní ọ̀rọ̀-ìfiwọlé tàbí ṣí ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ.", 'en': 'Or you may find yourself in a situation, such as travelling across a border, where the authorities can delay you or seize your devices if you refuse to give up a password or unlock your device.'}
{'yo': 'Bí a ṣe ń: fo ìtẹríbọlẹ̀ Ayélujára dá', 'en': 'How to: Circumvent Online Censorship'}

{'yo': 'Èyí ni àkótán kúkúrú nípa ìfòdá ìtẹríbọlẹ̀ orí ayélujára, ṣùgbọ́n kì í ṣe ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́.', 'en': 'This is a short overview to circumventing online censorship, but is by no means comprehensive.'}

{'yo': 'Ìjọba, ilé-iṣẹ́, ilé-ìwé, àti apèsèe ẹ̀rọ-àìrídìmú tí yóò dí òǹlò lọ́wọ́ kí wọ́n ba máà rí ààyè wọ àwọn ibùdó-ìtàkùn kan.', 'en': 'Governments, companies, schools, and Internet providers sometimes use software to prevent their users from accessing certain websites and services.'}
{'yo': 'Èyí ni a pè ní ìsẹ́ ẹ̀rọ-ayélujára tàbí ìdígàgá, tí í ṣe irúfẹ́ ìtẹríbọlẹ̀ kan.', 'en': 'This is called Internet filtering or blocking, and it is a form of censorship.'}

{'yo': 'Atẹríbọlẹ̀ẹ́ lè dígàgá ojú ìwé ìtàkùn-àgbáyé kan ṣoṣo tàbí gbogbo ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé pọ̀.', 'en': 'Filtering comes in different forms. Censors can block individual web pages, or even entire websites.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà mìíì, ohuninú ojú ìwé orí ayélujára ní í máa ń fa ìdígàgá', 'en': 'Sometimes, content is blocked based on the keywords it contains.'}
{'yo': 'Onírúurú ọ̀nà ni a fi lè fo ìtẹríbọlẹ̀ orí ayélujára dá.', 'en': 'There are different ways of beating Internet censorship.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn kan ń fi ààbò ìṣọ́ni bò ọ́, ṣùgbọ́n ọ̀pọ̀ ò ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': 'Some protect you from surveillance, but many do not.'}

{'yo': 'Bí alákòóso ìṣàsopọ̀ ayélujáraà rẹ bá ṣẹ́ tàbí dígàgá ibùdó kan, o lè lo irinṣẹ́ ìfòdá tí yóò mú ọ rí ìwífún tí o nílò.', 'en': 'When someone who controls your net connection filters or blocks a site, you can almost always use a circumvention tool to get to the information you need.'}

{'yo': 'Fiyèsíi: irinṣẹ́ ìfòdá aṣèlérí ààbò tàbí ibi-ìkọ̀kọ̀ kì í sábà í ṣe ti ìkọ̀kọ̀ tàbí ní ààbò.', 'en': 'Note: Circumvention tools that promise privacy or security are not always private or secure.'}

{'yo': '"Irinṣẹ́ tó ń lo gbólóhùn bíi ""anonymizer"" kì í sábà pa ìdánimọ̀ọ rẹ mọ́ fínnífínní."', 'en': '"And tools that use terms like ""anonymizer"" do not always keeps your identity completely secret."'}
{'yo': 'Irinṣẹ́ ìfòdá tó dára jù fún ọ dá lóríi àwòṣe ìdẹ́rùbà rẹ.', 'en': 'The circumvention tool that is best for you depends on your threat model.'}
{'yo': 'Bí àwòṣe ìdẹ́rùbà rẹ ò bá dá ọ lójú ṣáká tó, bẹ̀rẹ̀ níhìn-ín.', 'en': "If you're not sure what your threat model is, start here."}
{'yo': 'Nínú àpilẹ̀kọ yìí, a máa sọ̀rọ̀ nípa ọ̀nà mẹ́rin tí a lè gbà fo ìtẹríbọlẹ̀ orí ayélujára dá.', 'en': "In this article, we'll talk about four ways to circumvent censorship:"}
{'yo': 'Bíbẹ aṣojú ìtàkùn wò láti wọ ibùdó-ìtàkùn tí a ti dígàgáa rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Visiting a web proxy to access a blocked website.'}
{'yo': 'Bíbẹ aṣojú ìtàkùn tí a ti yí dátà rẹ̀ padà sí odù ààbò láti wọ ibùdó-ìtàkùn tí a ti dígàgáa rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Visiting an encrypted web proxy to access a blocked website.'}
{'yo': 'Lílo Ìṣàsopọ̀ Àìrí Ìkọ̀kọ̀ (VPN) láti wọ ibùdó-ìtàkùn tàbí iṣẹ́.', 'en': 'Using a Virtual Private Network (VPN) to access blocked websites or services.'}
{'yo': 'Lílo aṣàwákiri Tor láti wọ ibùdó-ìtàkùn tí a ti dígàgáa rẹ̀ tàbí dáàbò bo ìdánimọ̀ọ rẹ.', 'en': 'Using the Tor Browser to access a blocked website or protect your identity.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ìpìlẹ̀ ìmọ̀', 'en': 'Basic techniques'}

{'yo': 'Iṣẹ́ tí irinṣẹ́ ìfòdá sábà máa ń ṣe ni dídaríi dátà tó ń gba orí ìtàkùn rẹ kí o ba yẹ ẹ̀rọ tó ń ṣe ìdígàgá tàbí ìsẹ́ kúrò.', 'en': 'Circumvention tools usually work by diverting your web traffic so it avoids the machines that do the blocking or filtering.'}

{'yo': "Iṣẹ́ tí í ṣe àtúndaríi ìṣàsopọ̀ ayélujára fo ìdígàgá kọjá là ń pè ní aṣojú ń'gbà mìíì.", 'en': 'A service that redirects your Internet connection past these blocks is sometimes called a proxy.'}
{'yo': 'HTTPS ni ẹ̀dà ààbò fún ìfẹ́nukò HTTP tí ò ń lò fi wọ ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé.', 'en': 'HTTPS is the secure version of the HTTP protocol you use to access websites.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà mìíràn Atẹríbọlẹ̀ẹ́ lè dígàgá ẹ̀dà ibùdó àìláàbò (HTTP) ', 'en': 'Sometimes a censor will only block the insecure (HTTP) version of a site.'}

{'yo': 'Ìyẹn ni pé o lè wọ ibùdó tí a dígàgá náà bí o bá tẹ ẹ̀dà àdírẹ́ẹ̀sì ibùdóò rẹ tó bẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú HTTPS.', 'en': 'That means you can access the blocked site simply by entering the version of the web address that starts with HTTPS.'}

{'yo': 'HTTPS máa ń dá atẹríbọlẹ̀ dúró láti máà le è ka dátà tó ń gba oríi ìtàkùn rẹ, torí náà wọn kò le è sọ ọ̀rọ̀-aṣínà tí a fi ránṣẹ́, tàbí orí ojú ìwé ìtàkùn-àgbáyé tí ò ń bẹ̀wò.', 'en': 'HTTPS stops censors from reading your web traffic, so they cannot tell what keywords are being sent, or which individual web page you are visiting.'}
{'yo': 'Atẹríbọlẹ̀ ṣì lè rí orúkọ agbègbè ìkápáa gbogbo ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé tí o bá lọ.', 'en': 'Censors can still see the domain names of all websites you visit.'}

{'yo': '"ún àpẹẹrẹ, bí o bẹ ""eff.org/https-everywhere"" wò atẹríbọlẹ̀ lè rí i wípé o wà lóríi ""eff.org,"" ṣùgbọ́n kì í ṣe pé o wà lóríi ojú ìwée ""https-everywhere."""', 'en': '"So, for example, if you visit ""eff.org/https-everywhere"" censors can see that you are on ""eff.org"" but not that you are on the ""https-everywhere"" page."'}

{'yo': 'Tí o bá ní ìfura irúfẹ́ ìdígàgá àìle báyìí, gbìyànjú kí o tẹ https:// síwájú agbègbè ìkápá dípò http:', 'en': 'If you suspect this type of simple blocking, try entering https:// before the domain in place of http:'}

{'yo': 'Gbìyànjú kí o gbé alátànkáa EFF ibi-gbogbo tí yóò fúnra rẹ̀ tan HTTPS níbi tó bá yẹ sórí ẹ̀rọọ̀ rẹ.', 'en': "Try installing EFF's HTTPS Everywhere extension to automatically turn on HTTPS where possible."}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀nà mìíràn tí o lè gbà fi fo ìtẹríbọlẹ̀ dá ni bí o bá lo orúkọ agbègbè-ìkápá mìíràn tàbí URL.', 'en': 'Another way that you may be able to circumvent basic censorship techniques is by trying an alternate domain name or URL.'}

{'yo': 'Fún àpẹẹrẹ, kàkà kí o bẹ http://twitter.com wò, o lè gbìdánwò láti ṣí ibùdó náà lóríi ẹ̀dà ti ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ọ alágbèéká ní http://m.twitter.com.', 'en': 'For example, instead of visiting http://twitter.com, you might try the mobile version of the site at http://m.twitter.com.'}

{'yo': 'Atẹríbọlẹ̀ tó dígàgá ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé tàbí ojú ìwé ìtàkùn-àgbáyé ń fi àkàsílẹ̀ ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé àìdára tí a ti gbẹ́sẹ̀ òfin lé ṣiṣẹ́, torí náà ohunkóhun tí kò bá sí lórí àkàsílẹ̀ àìdára yẹn yóò la ìtẹríbọlẹ̀ kọjá.', 'en': 'Censors that block websites or web pages work from a blacklist of banned websites, so anything that is not on that blacklist will get through.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n lè máà mọ gbogbo onírúurú ẹ̀dà orúkọ ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé ní pàtó - ju gbogbo rẹ̀ lọ bí alákòóso ibùdó bá mọ̀ wípé a ti dígàgáa rẹ̀ àti pé a orúkọ agbègbè ìkápá tí a fi sílẹ̀ ju ọ̀kan lọ.', 'en': "They might not know of all different versions of a particular website's name - especially if the administrators of the site know it is blocked and register more than one domain."}
{'yo': 'Aṣojú orí ìtàkùn-àgbáyé', 'en': 'Web-based proxies'}

{'yo': "Aṣojú orí ìtàkùn-àgbáyé (gẹ́gẹ́ bíi http://proxy.org/) jẹ́ ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé tí ń f'ààyè gba òǹlò láti wọ ibùdó tí a dígàgáa rẹ̀ tàbí tẹríi rẹ̀ bọlẹ̀.", 'en': 'A web-based proxy (such as http://proxy.org/) is a website that lets its users access other blocked or censored websites.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀nà tó dára láti fo ìtẹríbọlẹ̀ dá lèyí.', 'en': 'It is therefore a good way to circumvent censorship.'}

{'yo': 'Láti lo aṣojú orí ìtàkùn-àgbáyé, bẹ aṣojú náà wò kí o tẹ àdírẹ́ẹ̀sì ibùdó-ìtàkùn tí o fẹ́ rí sí i; aṣojú yìí yóò fi ojúùwé ibùdó-ìtàkùn tí o béèrè fún hàn ọ́.', 'en': 'In order to use a web-based proxy, visit the proxy and enter the web address that you want to see; the proxy will then display the web page you asked for.'}

{'yo': "Bótiwùkíórí, aṣojú orí ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé kì í pèsèe ààbò kankan àti pé kò ní ṣ'ẹnuure bí àṣàyàn àwòṣe ìdẹ́rùbà rẹ bá ní aṣọ́ní tí ń ṣọ́ ìṣàsopọ̀ rẹ.", 'en': "However, web-based proxies don't provide any security and will be a poor choice if your threat model includes someone monitoring your internet connection."}
{'yo': 'Wọn kò ní ràn ọ́ lọ́wọ́ láti lo iṣẹ́ tí a ti dígàgá gẹ́gẹ́ bíi áàpù iṣẹ́-ìjẹ́ oníwàràǹṣesà rẹ.', 'en': 'They will not help you to use blocked services such as your instant messaging apps.'}

{'yo': 'Aṣojú orí ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé máa ní àkọsílẹ̀ ohun gbogbo tí ò ń ṣe lórí ayélujára, tí ó lè jẹ́ ewu ìdáààbòbò fún òǹlò mìíràn lórí àwòṣe ìdẹ́rùbà wọn.', 'en': 'The web-based proxy will have a complete record of everything you do online, which can be a privacy risk for some users depending on their threat model'}
{'yo': 'Aṣojú tí dátà rẹ̀ ti yí padà sí odù ààbò', 'en': 'Encrypted proxies'}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀kẹ́ àìmọye irinṣẹ́ aṣojú tó ń lo ìyí-dátà-padà-sódù-ààbò láti pèsè ìpele ìròpọ̀ ààbò lórí agbára ìdákọjá ìsẹ́.', 'en': 'Numerous proxy tools utilize encryption to provide an additional layer of security on top of the ability to bypass filtering.'}
{'yo': 'Ìṣàsopọ̀ náà ti yìí dátà padà sí odù ààbò kí ẹlòmíràn ó máà ba à lè rí ibi tí ò ń bẹ̀wò.', 'en': 'The connection is encrypted so others cannot see what you are visiting.'}

{'yo': "Nígbà tí aṣojú tí dátà rẹ̀ ti yí padà sí odù ààbò l'áàbò tó péye ju aṣojú orí ìtàkùn-àgbáyé lọ, apèsè irinṣẹ́ náà lè rí ìwífún nípaà rẹ.", 'en': 'While encrypted proxies are generally more secure than plain web-based proxies, the tool provider may have information about you.'}
{'yo': 'Fún àpẹẹrẹ, wọ́n lè ní orúkọ àti àdírẹ́ẹ̀sì ímeèlì rẹ lákọsílẹ̀.', 'en': 'They might have your name and email address in their records, for instance.'}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹ́n túmọ̀ sí wípé irinṣẹ́ wọ̀nwọ̀nyí kì í pèsèe àìlórúkọ dójú àlà.', 'en': 'That means that these tools do not provide full anonymity.'}

{'yo': '"Aṣojú ìtàkùn-àgbáyé tí dátà rẹ̀ ti yí padà sí odù ààbò tó rọrùn jù ni ""https"" - èyí yóò lo ìyí-dátà-padà-sódù-ààbò tí ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé tó l\'áàbò pèsè."', 'en': '"The simplest form of an encrypted web proxy is one that starts with ""https"" - this will use the encryption usually provided by secure websites."'}

{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀, ṣọ́ra - àwọn to ni aṣojú wọ̀nyí lè rí dátà tí o fi ránṣẹ́ sí àti bọ̀ wá láti ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé ààbò mìíràn.', 'en': 'However, be cautious - the owners of these proxies can see the data you send to and from other secure websites.'}
{'yo': 'UltraSurf àti Psiphon jẹ́ àpẹẹrẹ irinṣẹ́ báwọ̀nyí.', 'en': 'Ultrasurf and Psiphon are examples of these tools.'}
{'yo': 'Ìṣàsopọ̀ Àìrí Ìkọ̀kọ̀', 'en': 'Virtual Private Networks'}

{'yo': 'Ìṣàsopọ̀ Àìrí Ìkọ̀kọ̀ (VPN) máa ń yí dátà padà sí odù ààbò, yóò sì fi gbogbo dátà ránṣẹ́ láti orí ẹ̀rọ-ayélujáraà rẹ sóríi ẹ̀rọ ayárabíàṣá mìíràn.', 'en': 'A Virtual Private Network (VPN) encrypts and sends all Internet data from your computer through another computer.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀rọ ayárabíàṣá yìí lè jẹ́ ti iléeṣẹ́ ìṣòwò kan tàbí ilé-iṣẹ́ àìjèèrè apèsèe VPN, ilé iṣẹ́ẹ̀ rẹ, tàbí ẹni mímọ̀.', 'en': 'This computer could belong to a commercial or nonprofit VPN service, your company, or a trusted contact.'}

{'yo': 'Ní kété tí iṣẹ́ẹ VPN bá ti wà, o lè lò ó fi wọ ojú ìwé ìtàkùn-àgbáyé, ímeelì, iṣẹ́-ìjẹ́ oníwàràǹṣesà VoIP, àti iṣẹ́ orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára tó kù.', 'en': 'Once a VPN service is correctly configured, you can use it to access webpages, e-mail, instant messaging, VoIP, and any other Internet service.'}

{'yo': 'VPN máa ń dáàbò bo ìwífún tó ń kọjá lórí ayélujára kí àwọn alamí má ba à rí i lágbègbè kan, ṣùgbọ́n apèsèe VPN rẹ ṣì lè ṣe àkọsílẹ̀ ibùdó-ìtàkùn-àgbáyé tí o wọ, tàbí jẹ́ kí ẹnìkẹ́ta yọ́ kẹ́lẹ́ wọ inúu aṣàwáríkiri ayélujáraà rẹ.', 'en': 'A VPN protects your traffic from being spied on locally, but your VPN provider can still keep logs of the websites you access, or even let a third party snoop directly on your web browsing.'}

{'yo': 'Ó dá lóríi àwòṣe ìdẹ́rùbà rẹ, o ṣe é ṣe kí ìjọba ó máa fẹtíkọ́ ìṣàsopọ̀ VPN rẹ tàbí gbígbá àkọsílẹ̀ VPN rẹ mú lè di ewu ńlá.', 'en': 'Depending on your threat model, the possibility of a government listening in on your VPN connection or getting hold of VPN logs may be a significant risk.'}
{'yo': "Fún òǹlò mìíràn, èyí lè lágbára jù f'áǹfààní tó wà nínú lílo VPN fún ìgbà díẹ̀.", 'en': 'For some users, this could outweigh the short-term benefits of using a VPN.'}
{'yo': 'Fún àlàyé nípa àwọn iṣẹ́ VPN ní pàtó, ṣíra tẹ ibí.', 'en': 'For information about specific VPN services, click here.'}
{'yo': 'Ní EFF a kò le è jẹ́rìí sí VPN wọ̀nyí.', 'en': 'We at EFF cannot vouch for this rating of VPNs.'}
{'yo': 'VPN mìíràn tí ó ní ìlànà ààbò tó yàrá ọ̀tọ̀ lè jẹ́ ti ọ̀daràn.', 'en': 'Some VPNs with exemplary privacy policies could be run by devious people.'}
{'yo': 'O kò gbọdọ̀ lo VPN tí o kò fi ọkàn tàn.', 'en': 'Do not use a VPN that you do not trust.'}
{'yo': 'Tor jẹ́ iṣẹ́-àìrídìmú orísun-ìṣísílẹ̀ tí a ṣe kí ìdánimọ̀ọ rẹ ó ba wà nípamọ́ lórí ìtàkùn àgbáyé.', 'en': 'Tor is open-source software designed to give you anonymity on the web.'}
{'yo': 'Aṣàwáríkiri ìtàkùn-àgbáyé ni aṣàwáríkiri Tor tí a kọ́ sóríi ìṣàsopọ̀ àìlórúkọ òǹlò Tor.', 'en': 'Tor Browser is a web browser built on top of the Tor anonymity network.'}

{'yo': 'Nítorí bí Tor ṣe ń gbé dátà ká lórí aṣàwáríkiri ibùdó-ìtàkùn rẹ, ó gbà ọ́ láàyè láti fo ìtẹríbọlẹ̀ dá.', 'en': 'Because of how Tor routes your web browsing traffic, it also allows you to circumvent censorship.'}
{'yo': ' (Wo bí a ṣe ń: lo ìtọ́nà Tor fún Linux, macOS àti Windows) ', 'en': ' (See our How to: Use Tor guides for Linux, macOS and Windows).'}

{'yo': 'Bí o bá ṣí Aṣàwáríkiri Tor, o lè ṣe àṣàyàn àfihàn wípé oríi ìṣàsopọ̀ tí a tẹríi rẹ̀ bọlẹ̀ lo wà:', 'en': 'When you first start the Tor Browser, you can choose an option specifying that you are on a network that is censored:'}

{'yo': "Tor kò ní fo ìtẹríbọlẹ̀ ọ̀pọ̀ ìlú kọjá nìkan, ṣùgbọ́n, bí o bá fàṣẹ fún un bí ó ṣe yẹ, ó lè dáàbò bo ìdánimọ̀ọ rẹ kí ó máà bọ́ s'ọ́wọ́ ọ̀tá tó ń tẹ́tí sí ìṣàsopọ̀ ìlúù rẹ. Síbẹ̀, ó lè máa fà tìkọ̀, kò sì rọrùn ní lílò.", 'en': "Tor will not only bypass almost all national censorship, but, if properly configured, can also protect your identity from an adversary listening in on your country's networks. It can, however, be slow and difficult to use."}

{'yo': '"Láti ka bí o ṣe lè lo Tor lórí ẹ̀rọ ayárabíàṣá àgbélétábìlì, ṣíra tẹ ibí fún Linux, ibí fún MacOS, tàbí ibí fún Windows, àmọ́ jọ̀wọ́ rí i dájú wípé o f\'ọwọ́tọ́ ""configure"" dípò ""connect"" nínú àwòrán fèrèsé òkè."', 'en': '"To learn how to use Tor on a desktop machine, click here for Linux, here for macOS, or herefor Windows, but please be sure to tap ""Configure"" instead of ""Connect"" in the window displayed above."'}
{'yo': '---Àjọ̀dún òṣìṣẹ́: Abẹnugan ilé-ìgbìmọ̀ as̩ojú rọ òṣìṣẹ́ láti tẹramọ́ iṣẹ́ fún àbájáde rere.', 'en': '"Workers"" Day Celebration: House Speaker tasks Nigerian workers on productivity"'}
