{'yo': 'Ẹgbẹ́ Ohùn Àgbáyé dúró ṣinṣin pẹ̀lú Luis Carlos, ẹbíi rẹ̀, àti oníròyìn aládàáṣiṣẹ́ gbogbo àwọn tí ó ń mú ìjọba ṣe bí ó ti yẹ ní Venezuela.', 'en': 'The Global Voices community stands in solidarity with Luis Carlos, his family, and all other independent journalists working to hold power to account in Venezuela.'}

{'yo': 'À ń retíi rẹ̀ kí ó dé kíákíá ní àlàáfíà ara àti ẹ̀mí, a ó máa gbé àwọn ìròyìn síta nípa ìròyìn yìí bí ó ba ṣe ń tẹ̀ wá lọ́wọ́.', 'en': 'We wish for his safe and speedy return, and will continue to update this story as it develops.'}
{'yo': 'Ìwé àbádòfin ìlò ẹ̀rọ alátagbà yóò pa òmìnira ọ̀rọ̀ sísọ lórí ayélujára ní Nàìjíríà', 'en': "Nigeria's social media bill will obliterate online freedom of expression"}
{'yo': 'Ìwé àbádòfin náà yóò fi àṣẹ fún ìṣánpa ẹ̀rọ ayélujára ní Nàìjíríàj', 'en': 'The draconian bill will legalize internet shutdowns in Nigeria'}

{'yo': 'Aṣojú Mohammed Sani Musa ni agbátẹrùu ìwé àbádòfin ìlò ẹ̀rọ alátagbà. Àwòrán àgékù láti ibùdó Channel Television You Tube .', 'en': 'Senator Mohammed Sani Musa is the sponsor of the social media bill. Screenshot from Channel Television You Tube video.'}

{'yo': '"Lọ́jọ́ 20 oṣù Belu, Ìwé Àbádòfin tí ó fi Ààbò fún Irọ́ àti Màkàrúrù tí ó rọ̀ mọ́ ọn ti ọdún-un 2019, tí a mọ̀ sí ""ìwé àbádòfin ìlò ẹ̀rọ alátagbà,"" tí Aṣojú kan tí orúkọ rẹ̀ ń jẹ́ Mohammed Sani Musa ṣe agbátẹrùu rẹ̀, ti di kíkà nínú ìgbìmọ̀ fún ìgbà kejì."', 'en': '"On November 20, the Protection from Internet Falsehoods and Manipulation of other Related Matters Bill 2019, known as the ""social media bill,"" sponsored by Senator Mohammed Sani Musa, sailed through a second reading."'}

{'yo': 'Èròńgbà ìwé àbádòfin ìlò ẹ̀rọ alátagbà náà ni láti dẹ́kun àwọn àhesọ àti gbólóhùn tí kì í ṣe òtítọ́ lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélukára bí ajere.', 'en': 'The social media bill aims to curb online falsehoods and mis- and disinformation.'}

{'yo': 'Bí-ó-ti-lẹ̀-jẹ́-wípé, kì í ṣe láti fi òfin de ìlò ẹ̀rọ alátagbà ni ìwé àbádòfin náà dá lé lórí, àmọ́ ṣá, ó máa pa òmìnira ọ̀rọ̀ sísọ lórí ayélujára, ìsọ alátakò ìjọba di ọ̀daràn àti fífi àtìpà ẹ̀rọ ayélujára fúngbà díẹ̀ sínú ìwé òfin.', 'en': 'However, the real intent is not regulation, but rather, the annihilation of online freedom of expression, criminalization of government criticism and legalization of internet shutdowns in Nigeria.'}
{'yo': 'Àtẹ̀pa bí erín bá tẹ koríko ni àwọn ọmọ Nàìjíríà tẹ irú ìwé àbádòfin báyìí pa ní ọdún-un 2016.', 'en': 'A similar bill was beaten dead in its track in 2016.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ ni bí o bá gbó ìjọba lẹ́nu (tako ìjọba) ', 'en': 'Any form of government criticism is a crime'}

{'yo': '"Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Abala 1A ti ṣe ṣàlàyé, èròńgbà ìwé àbádòfin yìí ni láti ""[máà jẹ́] kí ìgbéjáde ọ̀rọ̀ tí kò ní òtítọ́ kan nínú tàbí èyí tí ẹ̀ríi rẹ̀ kò f\'ẹsẹ̀ rinlẹ̀ tó ó jáde ní Nàìjíríà."""', 'en': '"This bill aims to ""[prevent] the transmission of false statements or declaration of facts in Nigeria,"" according to Section 1a."'}

{'yo': '"Yóò yọ ọwọ́ kílàńkó àwọn àtẹ̀jáde irọ́ tí ó lè kó orílẹ̀ èdèe Nàìjíríà sí ""ìyọnu,"" láwo láì gbàgbée àwọn ọ̀ràn bíi ètò ìlera gbogboògbò, ààbòo gbogboògbò, ""ìbalẹ̀-ọkàn-an gbogboògbò tàbí ìṣúná owóo gbogboògbò"" àti ""àwọn ìbáṣepọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdèe Nàìjíríà pẹ̀lú àwọn orílẹ̀ èdè mìíràn."""', 'en': '"It will ban the dissemination statements likely to be ""prejudicial"" to Nigeria, including subjects like public health, public safety, ""public tranquility or public finances"" and Nigeria\'s ""friendly relations with other countries."""'}

{'yo': '"Abala 1c sọ bí ìwé àbádòfin náà yóò ṣe ""mú, ṣàkóso àti fi ààbò bo ìlònílòkulò àwọn ìṣàmúlò àti ẹ̀rọ adánìkanṣiṣẹ́ orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára."""', 'en': '"The bill will also ""detect, control and safeguard against coordinated misuse of online accounts and bots,"" according to Section 1c."'}

{'yo': 'Ní àlàyé síwájú sí i, kò sí ohun tí ojú òfin tuntun náà kò leè tó bí ó bá ti jẹ́ lórí ayélujára - lábẹ́ àbùradà à ń gbógun ti àhesọ àti irọ́ pọ́nbẹ́lẹ́.', 'en': 'In other words, everything is permissible to monitor and control in the proposed law - under the guise of fighting false information.'}

{'yo': '"Ọ̀run ń ya bọ̀ ni ìwé àbádòfin ìlò ẹ̀rọ alátagbà náà, kò yọ ẹnìkan sílẹ̀, gbogbo ọmọ orílẹ̀ èdèe Nàìjíríà ni yóò bá, kò kan agbègbè tàbí ibi tí ènìyàn fi ṣe ibùgbé, máà ṣe é l\'oògùn máà mọ́, ọwọ́ àwọn ológìnní ojú tólé ojú tóko ni ""gbólóhùn irọ́ tí kò ní ẹ̀rí"" tí ó bá gba òpópónà ẹ̀rọ ayélukára bí ajere Nàìjíríà yóò bọ́ sí."', 'en': '"The social media bill is omniscient since it will be binding for every Nigerian citizen, regardless of residence or geographic location, as long as the ambiguous ""false statement of fact"" is transmitted within the country."'}
{'yo': 'Abala 3a sí b (i) ti ìwé àbádòfin ìlò ẹ̀rọ alátagbà sọ wípé:', 'en': 'Section 3a to b (i) of the social media bill states that:'}

{'yo': "Ẹnikẹ́ni kò gbọdọ̀ wu ìwà kíwà kan nínú tàbí lẹ́yìn odi Nàìjíríà láti tari gbólóhùn tí kò ní òtítọ́ kan tí a kò leè fi ẹ̀ríi rẹ̀ múlẹ̀ síta; àti àgbésórí afẹ́fẹ́ ayélujára gbólóhùn t'ó lè kó orílẹ̀ èdèe Nàìjíríà síta bí ọmọ ọjọ́ mẹ́jọ nípa ti ààbò ìlú.", 'en': 'A person must not do any act in or outside Nigeria in order to transmit in Nigeria a statement knowing or having reasons to believe that it is a false statements of fact; and the transmission of the statement in Nigeria is likely to be, prejudicial to the security of Nigeria or any part of Nigeria.'}

{'yo': '"Ọ̀ràn-an ti ""ààbò orílẹ̀-èdè"" ni orí Èṣù tí òfin náà dúró lé láti pa ẹ̀tọ́ sí òmìnira ọ̀rọ̀ sísọ mọ́."', 'en': '"The nebulous ""national security"" excuse is used to justify the trumping of free expression."'}

{'yo': "Àmọ́ kò tán síbẹ̀, kò sí ẹní tó lè tako ìjọba Nàìjíríà tàbí gbó o lẹ́nu nítorí kì í ṣ'àṣìṣe.", 'en': 'But it does not stop there, the Nigerian government is always right and cannot be criticized.'}

{'yo': '"Ní Abala 3b (vi), gbólóhùn tí ó bá yẹpẹrẹ ""ojúṣe tàbí ìṣe, tí ó jẹ́ ti ìjọba lójú ará ìlú"" kò leè la orí ayélujára kọjá."', 'en': '"According to Section 3b (vi), any statement that diminishes ""public confidence in the performance of any duty or function of, in the exercise of any power of the government"" is prohibited."'}

{'yo': '"Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Abala 3b (v) ti ṣe fi hàn, èyí ní í ṣe pẹ̀lú gbólóhùn tí ó: ""fa ìmúnilọ́tàá, tí a sọ sí ẹnìkan tàbí ìtara láàárín àwọn ènìyàn."""', 'en': '"According to Section 3b (v), this applies to any statement that: ""incites feelings of enmity, hatred, directed at persons or ill-will between different groups of persons."""'}

{'yo': 'Èyí léwu nítorí ó fi àyè gba àwọn onípò àṣẹ láti lo agbára nílòkulò.', 'en': 'This is dangerous because it leaves regulators open to contradictory interpretations that could be abused by political actors.'}
{'yo': 'Ta ní í sọ bóyá gbólóhùn kan lè fa rògbòdìyàn?', 'en': 'Who defines and approves what incites feelings of hatred?'}

{'yo': 'Ìyẹn túmọ̀ sí wípé lílo inú kan tàbí mímú àwọn olóṣèlúu mú ìléríi wọn ṣe lè já sí ìkórìíra lójúu wọn.', 'en': 'It means that seeking transparency or even daring to hold a politician accountable could be declared hateful.'}

{'yo': 'Owó ìtanràn fún ẹni tí ilé ẹjọ́ bá dá lẹ́bi tó láàárín ẹgbẹ̀rún 200 àti ẹgbẹẹgbẹ̀rún 10 owó naira [tí ó tó $556 sí $28,000 owó orílẹ̀ èdèe United States], ìtìmọ́lé fún ọdún mẹ́ta tàbí méjèèjì.', 'en': 'The punishment upon conviction for any provisions of the bill is a fine that ranges between 200,000 and 10 million naira [about $556 to $28,000 United States dollars], imprisonment for a term not exceeding three years or both.'}
{'yo': 'Àṣẹ fún Àjọ Agbófinró láti ṣán ẹ̀rọ ayélujára pa fúngbà díẹ̀', 'en': 'Police licensed to shut down the internet'}

{'yo': '"Ìwé àbádòfin ìlò ẹ̀rọ alátagbà náà fún ìjọba lágbára bí ó ṣe hù wọ́n láti ṣán ẹ̀rọ ayélukára bí ajere pa nígbàkúùgbà tí ó bá lérò wípé ó tọ́, nípasẹ̀ ""Àṣẹ Ìdígàgá Ìráyè"" láti lo ayélujára bí ó ti ṣe wà ní Abala 12, òǹkaye 3:"', 'en': '"The social media bill also grants the government unlimited power to switch off the internet, through the ""Access Blocking Order"" as contained in Section 12, number 3:"'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀ka Agbófinró leè fi àṣẹ fún Àjọ Ìgbóhùnsáfẹ́fẹ́ Nàìjíríà NCC [Nigerian Communications Commission - tí ó ń ṣe bòńkárí ìtàkùrọ̀sọ orí ẹ̀rọ ayárabíàṣá] láti pa á láṣẹ fún apèsè àyè sí ìlò ẹ̀rọ ayélujára kí ó gbé ìgbésẹ̀ lójú ẹsẹ̀ tí ò ní mú àwọn òǹlò rí àyè lo ayélujára ní Nàìjíríà.', 'en': 'The Law Enforcement Department may direct the NCC [Nigerian Communications Commission - the regulatory agency for the telecommunication industry] to order the internet access service provider to take reasonable steps to disable access by end-users in Nigeria.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn apèsè ayélujára gbọdọ̀ tẹ̀lé òfin ìdígàgá yìí tàbí kí wọ́n ó sanwó ìtanràn tí ó tó ẹgbẹẹgbẹ̀rún 5 sí 10 owó naira [$14,000-28,000 USD].', 'en': 'Internet service providers must comply with this blocking order or risk upon conviction a fine within the range of 5 to 10 million naira [$14,000-28,000 USD].'}

{'yo': '"Ní àfikún, ìwé àbádòfin náà fi àrídájú ààbò bo àwọn apèsè iṣẹ́ ẹ̀rọ ayélujára tí kò ní mú wàhálà ""ará ìlú tàbí bẹ́ẹ̀ "" tí kò bá à lè jáde láti ìdájọ́ kan tí ẹnikẹ́ni kò bá pè wọ́n fúnopé ""wọ́n tẹ̀lé òfin ìdígàgá ìráyé"" sí ayélujára, ìyẹn bí abala 12, òǹkaye 5 ṣe fi lélẹ̀."', 'en': '"In addition, the bill under consideration indemnifies the internet service providers from any ""civil or criminal liability"" incurred from a lawsuit brought against them for ""complying to any access blocking order,"" according to section 12, number 5."'}

{'yo': "Ìtẹ́rí ẹ̀tọ́ ọmọnìyàn náà ṣ'ókùnkùn sí i nítorí wípé òfin náà gba àwọn ọlọ́pàá láyè lábẹ́ òfin láti pa àṣẹ ìdígàgá-àyè bí ó ti ṣe hù wọ́n.", 'en': 'The human rights violations get murkier because the law grants the police a legal license to command an access-blocking order at whim.'}

{'yo': '"Abala 15a sọ wípé ""iṣẹ́ ọpọlọ"" ọlọ́pàá ní àsìkò ""ìṣèwádìí ẹ̀rí tó dájú"" jẹ́ kókó láti fagilé ìṣánpá ẹ̀rọ ayélujára ní orílẹ̀ èdè náà."', 'en': '"Section 15a states that only the ""initiative"" of the police in face of ""overwhelming sufficing evidence"" is needed to cancel an internet shutdown in the country."'}

{'yo': '"Ní ìparí, ""kò sí àyè fún ẹjọ́ọ kò tèmi lọ́rùn ní Ilé-ẹjọ́ Gíga"" [Abala 13 (2) ] tí eẹnikẹ́ni lè fi yẹ ìdígàgá sílẹ̀ láì máà kọ́kọ́ tọ ọlọ́pàá lọ láti fagilé òfin ìdígàgá náà."', 'en': '"Consequently, ""no appeal may be made to the High Court"" [Section 13 (2) ] by any party to revoke such a ban without first applying to the police to revoke an existing blocking order."'}

{'yo': 'Ipa èyí hàn gbàgàdà - ẹnikẹ́ni kò ní leè gba ilé ẹjọ́ lọ fún ìgbèjà ìfẹ̀tọ́ ẹni dunni yìí tí ìdígàgá náà ṣì wà.', 'en': 'The implications of this are obvious - no one can resort to the courts for redress in the face of this violation while the blocking order persists.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn aṣojú-ṣòfin tí ó wà lẹ́yìn ìwé àbádòfin ẹ̀rọ alátagbà náà', 'en': 'The lawmakers behind the social media bill'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn aṣojú-ṣòfin mẹ́ta kan ni ó gbé ìwé àbádòfin náà sórí nínú ìgbìmọ̀, ilé ìgbìmọ̀ àgbà: Mohammed Sani Musa (agbátẹrùu ìwé àbádòfin), Abba Moro àti Elisha Abbo.', 'en': "Three lawmakers seem to be the arrowhead of the bill in the Senate, the upper house of Nigeria's parliament: Mohammed Sani Musa (the sponsor of the bill), Abba Moro and Elisha Abbo."}

{'yo': 'Ilé-iṣẹ́ẹ Mohammed Sani Musa, Activate Technologies Limited, ni ó kó ẹ̀rọ Ìwé-pélébé Ìdìbò Alálòpẹ́ (PVCs) tí a lò fún ìbò ọdún-un 2019, nígbà tí ó jẹ́ òǹdíjedupò lábẹ́ ẹgbẹ́ olóṣèlúu tí ó ń tukọ̀ ètò ìṣèlú lọ́wọ́ All Progressives Congress (APC) fún Aṣojú Ìlà-Oòrùn Niger, ìyẹn gẹ́gẹ́ bí ilé iṣẹ́ aṣèwádìí, Premium Times ṣe tẹ̀ ẹ́ jáde.', 'en': "Mohammed Sani Musa's company, Activate Technologies Limited, supplied the Permanent Voter Cards (PVCs) machine used for the 2019 general elections, while he was the candidate of the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) for Niger East Senatorial district, according to the investigate outlet, Premium Times."}
{'yo': 'Àjọ Elétò (INEC) gba ẹ̀sùn náà mọ́ra.', 'en': 'This is an allegation that the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) admitted.'}

{'yo': "Ọ̀ràn yìí fi hàn pé àwọn alákòóso ìbò tí ó kọjá kò ṣiṣẹ́ láì lọ́wọ́ àwọn alágbára ń'nú.", 'en': "Musa's conflict of interest raised some doubts about the true independence of Nigeria's election umpire in the last election."}

{'yo': "Ishaku Elisha Abbo ti ẹgbẹ́ alátakò People's Democratic Party (PDP) jẹ́ aṣojú tí ó ń ṣojú Ẹkùn-un Àríwá Adamawa ní Ìpínlẹ̀ Adamawa, ní ìlà-oòrùn àríwá orílẹ̀ èdèe Nàìjíríà.", 'en': "Ishaku Elisha Abbo of the opposition People's Democratic Party (PDP) is a senator representing the Adamawa North Senatorial District in Adamawa State, in northeast Nigerian."}

{'yo': 'Nínú oṣù Agẹmọ 2019, ní ìṣojú ọlọ́pàá, Abbo ṣe àṣemáṣe pẹ̀lú òṣìṣẹ́bìnrin kan nínú ìsọ̀ ohun ìbálòpọ̀ ní olú-ìlú Nàìjíríà ní Abuja.', 'en': 'In July 2019, in the presence of a police officer, Abbo assaulted a female staff member in an adult sex toy store in Abuja.'}

{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn tí àwòrán càṣemáṣe náà fọ́n ká sórí ẹ̀rọ alátagbà, Abbo offered mọ ìwàa rẹ̀ lẹ́bí, ó sì bẹ̀bẹ̀.', 'en': 'After a video of the assault went viral on social media, Abbo offered a public apology.'}

{'yo': 'Abba Moro, tí í ṣe ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ẹ PDP, ni aṣojú fún ẹ̀ka Gúúsù Benue, àárín gbùngbùn àríwá Nàìjíríà.', 'en': 'Abba Moro, also with the PDP, is the senator representing Benue South district, northcentral Nigeria.'}

{'yo': 'Ní ọjọ́ 15, oṣù Ẹrẹ́nà, ọdún-un 2014, Moro, tí í ṣe ọ̀gá pátápátá ètò abélé, ló wà nídìí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ abanilọ́kànjẹ́ Ìgbanisíṣẹ́ Ẹ̀ṣọ̀ aṣọ́bodè Nàìjíríà tí àwọn ọ̀dọ́langba tí ó tó bíi ẹgbẹẹgbẹ̀rún 6 tó fẹ́ àyè iṣẹ́ ẹgbẹ̀rún 4 tí ó ṣí sílẹ̀ nínú iléeṣẹ́ Ẹ̀ṣọ̀ Aṣọ́bodè Nàìjíríà tí wọ́n kóra jọ níbi orísìírísìí jákèjádò orílẹ̀ èdè náà.', 'en': 'On March 15, 2014, Moro, as minister of interior, was responsible for the Nigerian Immigration Recruitment tragedy in which about 6 million Nigerian youths who applied for 4,000 vacant positions in Nigerian Immigration Service were forced to assemble in various recruitment locations in the country.'}
{'yo': 'Ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ tí ó burúkú jáì náà tí ó ṣekú pa ogún ènìyàn àti ìpalára fún ọ̀pọ̀ èèyàn.', 'en': 'The resulting stampede due to overcrowding led to about 20 deaths and multiple injuries.'}

{'yo': 'Moro gbà nínú of owó ìwáṣẹ̀ tí àwọn awáṣẹ́ san tí ó ń lọ bíi ẹgbẹẹgbẹ̀rún 675 owóo naira [ $1.8 USD].', 'en': 'Moro was a recipient of part of the application fees paid by the job-seekers amounting to 675 million naira [about $1.8 million USD].'}
{'yo': 'Moro kó owó sápòo rẹ̀ bẹ́ẹ̀ náà ó fo òfin ìgbanǹkan Aṣọ́bodè dá.', 'en': 'Moro not only enriched himself but also bypassed the extant procurement laws for the Immigration Service.'}
{'yo': '"""Kò nílò ìdákẹ́ jẹ́jẹ́, ìbẹ̀rù bojo tàbí ìkáàánú-araẹni"" - #SayNoToSocialMediaBill!"', 'en': '"""No need for silence, fear or self-pity"" - #SayNoToSocialMediaBill!"'}

{'yo': 'Nípa lílo àmì #SayNoToSocialMediaBill, àwọn ọmọ orí ayélujára orílẹ̀ èdèe Nàìjíríà bọ́ sóríi Twitter láti sọ èrò ọkàn-an wọn:', 'en': 'Using the hashtag #SayNoToSocialMediaBill, Nigerian netizens took to Twitter to express their collective indignation:'}

{'yo': '"Nínú gbólóhùn kan, Amnesty International fajúro sí lílo ""àwọn òfin tí ó ń fìdìí ìfojú ẹ̀tọ́ ọmọnìyàn gbolẹ̀ múlẹ̀ "" nítorí pé kò ní pa àwọn ọmọ Nàìjíríà lẹ́nu mọ́ ""láti máà sọ èrò ọkàn-an wọn"" tí yóò sì tún ""rán wọn lọ s\'ẹ́wọ̀n fún wípé wọ́n ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀ ."""', 'en': '"In a statement, Amnesty International condemned the use of ""laws to justify human rights violations"" because it will not only stop Nigerians ""from speaking their minds"" but will also ""send them to jail for doing so."""'}

{'yo': 'Lábẹ́ àbùradà à ń dẹ́kun gbólóhùn irọ́ àti ọ̀rọ̀ àhesọ, ń gbèrò ìṣòfin tí kò ní ìfẹ́ ará ìlú lọ́kàn.', 'en': 'The parliament, under the pretext of curbing mis- and disinformation, is considering the enactment of a draconian law.'}
{'yo': 'Ó jẹ́ ohun ìyàlẹ́nu, àwọn olóṣèlúu ló léwájú níbi ká gbé gbólóhùn irọ́ sórí ayélujára.', 'en': 'Ironically, the greatest propagators of false information online are political actors.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹgbẹ́ olóṣèlúu tí ó ń jẹ lọ́wọ́ àti ẹgbẹ́ alátakò gbòógì sọ Twitter di pápá ogun fa ọ̀rọ̀ ìkórìíra ẹlẹ́yàmẹ́lẹ́yá, ìròyìn tí kò pójú òṣùwọ̀n àti ọ̀rọ̀ ẹ̀tàn lásìkò ìdìbò ààrẹ ọdún-un 2019.', 'en': "Both Nigeria's ruling and main opposition parties turned Twitter into a minefield of ethnic hate speech, disinformation and propaganda during the 2019 presidential elections."}
{'yo': 'Kà síwájú sí i:', 'en': 'Read more:'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀rọ alátagbà fa ọ̀rọ̀ ìkórìíra ẹlẹ́yàmẹ́lẹ́yá, ìròyìn tí kò pójú òṣùwọ̀n àti ọ̀rọ̀ ẹ̀tàn lásìkò ìdìbò ààrẹ ọdún-un 2019', 'en': 'Social media propelled ethnocentric disinformation and propaganda during the Nigerian elections'}
{'yo': 'Twitter di pápá ogun fún gbólóhùn irọ́ lásìkò ìdìbò orílẹ̀-èdèe Nàìjíríà ọdún-un 2019', 'en': 'Twitter was a minefield of false information during the 2019 Nigerian elections'}

{'yo': 'Ní àkókò bíi ti òmìnira ọ̀rọ̀ sísọ ní Nàìjíríà tí a wà yìí, ọ̀rọ̀ ọlọ́pọlọ láti ẹnu òǹkọ̀wé orílẹ̀-èdèe Amẹ́ríkà Toni Morrison tí ó mú ìrétí dání:', 'en': 'In these troubling times of freedom of expression in Nigeria, the wise charge from American writer Toni Morrison evokes hope:'}

{'yo': '\u200eÈyí ni ìgbà tí àwọn ayàwòrán ń ṣiṣẹ́. Kò sáyé fún ìsọ̀rètínù, kò sáyé fún ìkáàánú-ara, kò nílò ìdákẹ́ jẹ́jẹ́, kò sí àyè fún ìbẹ̀rù bojo.', 'en': 'This is precisely the time when artists go to work. There is no time for despair, no place for self-pity, no need for silence, no room for fear.'}
{'yo': "A sọ, a kọ, a p'èdè.", 'en': 'We speak, we write, we do language.'}

{'yo': 'Ìwé àbádòfin ìlò ẹ̀rọ alátagbà náà ti jẹ́ kíkà ní ìgbà kejì nínú ìgbìmọ̀ Aṣojú-ṣòfin.', 'en': 'The bill is currently at its second reading in the Senate. To become law, it will need to move to committee stage where legislators will review it.'}

{'yo': 'Kí ó tó di òfin, ó gbọdọ̀ gba ìgbìmọ̀ kan tí àwọn aṣojú-ṣòfin yóò yẹ̀ ẹ́ wò. Ìgbìmọ̀ọtẹ̀ẹ́kótó náà yóò sì jábọ̀ àbájáde àyẹ̀wòo rẹ̀ fún Ìgbìmọ̀ àgbà, láti gbé e yẹ̀ wò, tí wọn yóò tẹ òmíràn jáde fún àyẹ̀wò tí ó kẹ́yìn, kí ààrẹ ó tó bu ọwọ́ lù ú.', 'en': "The committee presents its report to Parliament, the bill is debated, a clean copy is re-presented to the Senate for a final vote and then, there's the presidential assent."}

{'yo': 'A gbọdọ̀ fajú ro sí ìgbésẹ̀ Ìgbìmọ̀ kí wọ́n ba ju ìwé àbádòfin ìlò ẹ̀rọ alátagbà náà dànù sígbó.', 'en': 'The Parliament must be hard-pressed to throw out the social media bill in its entirety.'}

{'yo': 'Nítorí orílẹ̀ èdèe tí ó gbajúmọ̀ jù lọ nílẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ yóò yẹ̀ gẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ìjọba ìfipámúnisìn ní kété tí òmìnira ọ̀rọ̀ sísọ bá di títẹ̀ bọlẹ̀.', 'en': "This is because Africa's most populous country will slide smoothly into full dictatorship once freedom of expression has been extinguished."}

{'yo': 'Ilé ẹjọ́ gíga Tanzania pa á láṣẹ fún ìfòpinsí ìsoyìgì láàárín àgbàlagbà àti ọmọdé láì wo ti ìgbésẹ̀ ìmúpadàa rẹ̀', 'en': 'Tanzania high court upholds ruling to end child marriage despite attempts to repeal it'}
{'yo': '"""Èyí ni ìpinnu tí ó dára jù lọ tí ilé-ẹjọ́ yóò ṣe"""', 'en': '"""This is the best decision the court has ever made"""'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn Ọmọiléèwé ọmọdébìnrin ní Tanzania dúró fún àwòrán lọ́jọ́ 10 oṣù Agẹmọ ọdún-un, 2007. Fanny Schertzer ni ó ya àwòrán, a lò ó pẹ̀lú àṣẹ láti Wikimedia Commons, CC BY 2.0.', 'en': 'Schoolgirls in Tanzania pose for a photo on July 10, 2007. Photo by Fanny Schertzer, used with permission via Wikimedia Commons, CC BY 2.0.'}

{'yo': 'Nínú oṣù Ọ̀wàrà 2019, ilé ẹjọ́ gíga Tanzania ṣe ìdímú ṣinṣin ìdájọ́ ọdún-un 2016 tí ó pàṣẹ ó kéré jù, ọmọbìnrin àti ọmọkùnrin gbọdọ̀ pé ọmọ ọdún méjìdínlógún kí ó tó ṣe ìgbéyàwó.', 'en': "In October 2019, Tanzania's high court upheld the landmark 2016 ruling that increased the minimum age of marriage for girls and boys to 18."}

{'yo': 'Àjọ ọba orílẹ̀ èdèe Tanzania gbéègbésẹ̀ láti ṣe ìmúpadà ìpinnu yìí, nítorí wípé àwọn ọmọdébìnrin ń yára bàlágà àti wípé ààbò ni ìgbéyàwó jẹ́ fún ọ̀dọ́bìnrin aláboyún.', 'en': 'The Tanzanian government attempted to repeal this decision, claiming that girls mature earlier and marriage is a form of protection for pregnant young women, and should, therefore, be allowed to marry earlier than 18.'}

{'yo': 'Àmọ́ ní ọjọ́ 23 oṣù Ọ̀wàrà ọdún-un 2019, ìjọba orílẹ̀ èdèe Tanzania pàdánù ẹjọ́ọ kòtẹ́milọ́rùnun rẹ̀ tí àṣẹ ilé ẹjọ́ gíga ṣì dúró: akọ àtabo gbọdọ̀ pé ọjọ́ orí méjìdínlógún kí wọn ó tó ṣe ìgbéyàwó, tí èyí sì ń fi agbára kún ìgbẹ́sẹ̀ ìsoyìgì ọmọdé ní Tanzania.', 'en': 'But on October 23, 2019, the Tanzanian government lost its appeal and the high court ruling remains: The marriage age for both males and females is 18, reinforcing the ban on child marriage in Tanzania.'}

{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bí United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA) ti ṣe wí, Tanzania ni ìsoyìgì ọmọdé pọ̀ sí jù lọ lágbàáyé.', 'en': 'According to the United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA), Tanzania has one of the highest prevalence rates of child marriage in the world.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ọmọ orí ayélujára ṣíra láti fi ìdùnnúu wọn hàn lóríi ìdájọ́ náà.', 'en': 'Netizens were quick to express their delight over the ruling.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn kan kí Rebeca Z. Gyumi, aláfisùn àti ẹni tí ó lé wájú nínú ọ̀ràn ìsoyìgì àwọn ọmọdé náà.', 'en': 'Some congratulated Rebeca Z. Gyumi, the petitioner and respondent behind this case.'}

{'yo': 'Gyumi ni olùdásílẹ̀ àti alákòóso àgbà Msichana Initiative (Ètò fún àwọn Ọ̀dọ́mọbìnrin), iléeṣẹ́ tí kì í ṣe tìjọba tí ó ń ró àwọn ọmọdébìnrin lágbára nípasẹ̀ ti ẹ̀kọ́ ìwé.', 'en': 'Gyumi is the founder and executive director of Msichana Initiative (Young Woman Initiative), a Tanzanian nongovernmental organization that empowers girls through education.'}
{'yo': 'Ìgbésẹ̀ láti fòpin sí ìsoyìgì ọmọdé ní Tanzania', 'en': 'The fight to end child marriage in Tanzania'}

{'yo': 'Lọ́dún-un 2016, Gyumi na ọwọ́ ìka àbùkù sí agbára Òfin Ìgbéyàwó; Law of Marriage Act, 2002 (LMA) tí ó gba obìnrin tí kò tó ọmọ ọdún méjìdínlógún láyè láti ṣe ìgbéyàwó.', 'en': 'In 2016, Gyumi challenged the constitutionality of the Law of Marriage Act, 2002 (LMA) that allowed females under the age of 18 to get married.'}

{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìwádìí nípa ìlera Tanzania Demographic and Health Survey (TDHS) ṣe ti ṣàlàyé, ìdá 36 obìnrin tí ọjọ́ oríi wọ́n wà ní 25-49 ní í ṣe ìgbéyàwó kí wọn ó tó pé ọmọ ọdún méjìdínlógún, tí àwọn akẹgbẹ́ẹ wọn lọ́kùnrin sí jẹ́ ìdá 5.', 'en': 'According to Tanzania Demographic and Health Survey (TDHS), 36 percent of women aged 25-49 get married before their 18th birthday compared to only 5 percent for men the same age.'}

{'yo': 'Òfin LMA fi àyè gba ọmọdébìnrin tí ọjọ́ oríi wọn kò ju ọdún mẹ́rìnlá lọ láti ṣe ìgbéyàwó pẹ̀lú ìlọ́wọ́sí ilé-ẹjọ́, ìlọ́wọ́sí òbí fún ọmọ ọdún márùn-ún-dínlógún, nígbà tí ọdún méjìdínlógún jẹ́ ọjọ́ orí tí ó kéré jù lọ fún ọmọkùnrin.', 'en': 'The LMA allowed girls as young as 14 to get married with consent from a court and age 15 with the consent of the parents whereas 18 years was the minimum age for a male.'}

{'yo': 'Nípasẹ̀ àwọn aṣojú rẹ̀, Gyumi ṣàlàyé wípé àlàálẹ̀ LMA kọ iyán obìnrin kéré nítorí pé ó fún àwọn ọkùnrin ní àǹfààní ju àwọn obìnrin lọ.', 'en': 'Through her attorneys, Gyumi argued that the LMA provisions were discriminatory for giving preferential treatment to males in the matter of eligible marriage age.'}

{'yo': 'Nítẹ̀síwájú, wọ́n sọ wípé àlàálẹ̀ náà fi ẹ̀tọ́ dídọ́gba ọmọ ènìyàn yí ẹrẹ̀fọ̀ àti pé wọn fi ẹ̀tọ́ àǹfààní sí ẹ̀kọ́ ìwé dun àwọn ọmọdébìnrin.', 'en': 'They further argued that the provisions infringed the right to equality and they were too vague and too susceptible to arbitrary interpretation to deny female children their right to education.'}
{'yo': 'Gyumi rọ Ilé-ẹjọ́ Gíga láti gbé àlàálẹ̀ LMA tì sẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́.', 'en': 'Gyumi petitioned the High Court to find the provisions of LMA null and void.'}
{'yo': 'Ilé-ẹjọ́ Gíga kò ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': 'The High Court never declared the provisions in the LMA null and void.'}

{'yo': 'Àmọ́ wọ́n rí i lóòótọ́ wípé kò bá òfin mu wọ́n sì fún ìjọba lọ́dún kan láti ṣe àtúnṣe sí ohun tí kò tọ̀nà nínú àlàálẹ̀ LMA.', 'en': 'But they found the provisions unconstitutional and gave the government one year to correct the anomalies in the LMA provisions.'}

{'yo': 'Nípasẹ̀ aṣojú àgbà àwọn adájọ́, a pa ìjọba láṣẹ láti gbé ọjọ́ orí ìgbéyàwó sí ọdún méjìdínlógún fún obìnrin àti ọkùnrin.', 'en': 'Through the attorney general, the government was directed to put 18 years as the eligible age of marriage for both females and males.'}

{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀, aṣojú àgbà àná banújẹ́ sí ìdájọ́ náà ó sì kọ ìwé àtúnpè-ẹjọ́ sí Ilé-ẹjọ́ Gíga náà:', 'en': 'However, then-Attorney General George Masaju was aggrieved by the ruling and immediately served a notice of appeal to the High Court:'}

{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú ìfọwọ́sí àṣẹ ìjọba: mo ti gba ìwé àtúnpè-ẹjọ́ lóríi ẹjọ́ #childmarriage. Ẹjọ́ òǹkaye 204 ti oṣù Ọ̀wẹwẹ̀ ọdún-un 2017.', 'en': "Official: I've been served government documents of appeal in the case of #childmarriage. Case number 204 of September 2017."}
{'yo': 'Kà síwájú sí i: Mozambique sọ ìsoyìgì ọmọdé di ìwà ọ̀daràn', 'en': 'Read more: Mozambique criminalizes child marriage'}
{'yo': 'Àyè fún àtúnpè-ẹjọ́', 'en': 'Grounds for appeal'}

{'yo': 'Láàárín oṣù mẹ́rin ìgbẹ́jọ́, ìjọba gbèrò láti ṣe àtúnpè-ẹjọ́ ọdún-un 2016 tí yó ṣe àtúnṣe sí àlàálẹ̀ LMA èyí tí ó fi àyè gba ọmọdébìnrin ọlọ́jọ́-orí márùn-úndínlógún gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹni tí ó ti bàlágà fún ìgbéyàwó.', 'en': 'In four months of court proceedings, the government sought to appeal the 2016 ruling that required the revision of the provisions LMA that allowed girls to be married at the age of 15.'}

{'yo': 'Atẹ́jọ́pè, tí ó jẹ́ aṣojú àwọn adájọ́ ìpínlẹ̀, Mark Mulwambo àti Alesia Mbuya, ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ìyàtọ̀ ìwà ẹ̀dá obìnrin àti ọkùnrin tí wọ́n sì fi àṣà ìbílẹ̀ àti òfin ẹ̀sìn Ìmàle gbá àtúnpè-ẹjọ́ náà nídìí.', 'en': 'The appellant, represented by principal state attorneys, Mark Mulwambo and Alesia Mbuya, provided biological differences and customary and Islamic laws as grounds for the appeal.'}

{'yo': '"Ms. Mbuya sọ wípé ìyàtọ̀ ìwà ẹ̀dá fi ọmọdékùnrin àti ọmọdébìnrin sí ""ìsọ̀rí ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ "" àti pé, òfin fi ojú ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ wò wọ́n."', 'en': '"Ms. Mbuya argued that biological differences put boys and girls in ""different categories"" and that therefore, the law treats them differently."'}

{'yo': 'Ó sọ síwájú sí i wípé nítorí àwọn ọmọdébìnrin máa ń tètè bàlágà ju ọmọdékùnrin lọ ni òfin fi la àlàálẹ̀ bẹ́ẹ̀. Ó sọ wípé ìgbéyàwó lè fi ààbò bo ọmọdébìnrin tí kò sí nílé ọkọ tí ó ti di abaraméjì láì tó ọjọ́ orí tí ó tọ́.', 'en': 'She argued that because girls matured earlier, the law took that into consideration. She argued that marriage could protect unmarried girls who get pregnant at an early age.'}

{'yo': '"Ó sọ síwájú sí i wípé ilé ẹjọ́ kùnà bí ó ṣe ""ṣe ìmúdọ́gbandọ́gba ọjọ́ orí ọmọ àti ọjọ́ orí tí ó yẹ fún ìgbéyàwó,"" èyí tí ó túmọ̀ sí wípé ọ̀tọ̀ ni ti tọ́lú ọ̀tọ̀ ni ti tọ́lùú wò, ọ̀tọ̀ ni ó yẹ kí ilé ẹjọ́ ó là kalẹ̀ fún ọjọ́ orí ìgbéyàwó ọkùnrin àti obìnrin."', 'en': '"Further, she argued the court erred by ""equating the age of the child and the age of marriage,"" meaning that the court should consider male and female children differently when it comes to marriageable age."'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ọmọ orí ayélujára ti yára bu ẹnu àtẹ́ lu ìdí tí àtẹ́jọ́pè fi sílẹ̀ nínú ìgbẹ́jọ́.', 'en': 'Netizens were quick to criticize the grounds the appellant provided in court.'}
{'yo': "Kà síwájú sí i: Mozambique, Cote d'Ivoire gbé ìgbésẹ̀ akọni fún ẹ̀tọ́ àwọn obìnrin àti ọmọdé", 'en': "Read more: Mozambique, Cote d'Ivoire make legal strides for women and children's rights"}
{'yo': 'Dídọ̀gba abo atakọ', 'en': 'Gender equality'}

{'yo': 'Ìdájọ́ ilé ẹjọ́ náà jẹ́ atọ́ka sí ìfòpinsí àwọn àṣà tí ó ń mú ìpalára bá àwọn ọmọdébìnrin àti onírúurú ẹlẹ́yàmẹyà tòun ìfọwọ́rọ́sẹ́yìn àwọn ọmọdébìnrin ní Tanzania.', 'en': "The court's ruling is a step toward eliminating harmful practices and ending all forms of discrimination against girls in Tanzania."}

{'yo': 'Ní ti àjọ United Nations, kí a tó lè yege níbi ti dídọ́gba abo atakọ ní ọdún-un 2030, ìjọba ní láti ṣe àyípadà òfin ìyàsọ́tọ̀ọtọ̀ àti ṣíṣe àmúlò ìṣòfin tí yóò mú ìmúdọ́gba tí à ń sọ wáyé.', 'en': 'According to the United Nations, in order to achieve gender equality by 2030, governments need to change discriminatory laws and adopt legislation that proactively advances equality.'}

{'yo': 'Àbájáde ìwádìí ṣe àfihàn-an rẹ̀ wípé ọjọ́ orí tí ó tọ́ láti ṣe ìgbéyàwó bá ìpele ìwé tí ènìyàn kà àti ọrọ̀ tí ènìyán ti kó jọ (TDHS 201) tan.', 'en': 'Data shows that the age of marriage is directly related to levels of education and wealth (TDHS 201).'}

{'yo': 'Ní Tanzania, ó ní ìyàtọ̀ ọdún mẹ́fà tí ó wà láàárín ọmọdébìnrin tí kò lọ sí ilé ìwé àti àwọn tí ó ka ìwé gíga tàbí ìwé gíga jù lọ.', 'en': 'In Tanzania, there is a 6-year difference between the age of marriage between girls with no education and girls with secondary or higher education.'}

{'yo': 'Ní Tanzania, ohun tí kò bá òfin mu ni kí a fẹ́ tàbí fún akẹ́kọ̀ọ́bìnrin lóyún, ẹ̀wọ̀n ọgbọ̀n ọdún ni ẹní bá tasẹ̀ àgẹ̀rẹ̀ sófin yóò fi gbára.', 'en': 'In Tanzania, it is illegal to impregnate or marry schoolgirls with 30-year imprisonment as punishment.'}
{'yo': 'Akẹ́kọ̀ọ́bìnrin tí ó bá lóyún kì í padà sí ilé ìwé pàápàá tí ó bá bímọ tán.', 'en': 'Pregnant schoolgirls are not allowed to return to school even after they have given birth.'}

{'yo': 'Ìfòfinde ìsoyìgì pẹ̀lú ọmọdé máa ń fi ààbò fún àwọn ọmọdébìnrin, láì ro bí wọ́n ṣe wọ ilé ìwé.', 'en': 'The ban on child marriage will protect all girls, regardless of their school enrollment status.'}

{'yo': 'Ní Tanzania, ìgbéyàwó ọmọdébìnrin kì í jẹ kí ọmọdébìnrin ó kàwé tí wọn kò sì ní àǹfààní láti parí ẹ̀kọ́ọ wọn, gẹ́gẹ́ bí èsì ìwádìí láti Tanzania National Survey, 2017 ṣe ní i lákọsílẹ̀.', 'en': 'In Tanzania, child marriage bars girls from education and leads to school dropout, according to data from the Tanzania National Survey, 2017).'}

{'yo': 'Ìfòfinde ìsoyìgì yìí ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ìgbé ayé tó dára fún akẹ́kọ̀ọ́bìnrin láti parí ẹ̀kọ́ọ wọn láì sí ìdádúró.', 'en': 'This ban creates better conditions for schoolgirls to finish school without barriers.'}

{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú bẹ́ẹ̀, akẹ́kọ̀ọ́bìnrin tí ó bá fẹ́rakù ṣì ń kojú òfin tí ó ní wọn kò gbọdọ̀ padà wá sílé ìwé.', 'en': 'Even so, impregnated schoolgirls are still faced with an unconstitutional ruling that prohibits them from returning to school.'}

{'yo': '"Ààmì ìdánimọ̀ orílẹ̀ èdèe Jamaica tí Kanye West lò di awuyewuye tí ó dá fìrìgbagbòó lórí ""ìsààmì"""', 'en': '"Kanye West\'s use of Jamaican symbols sparks national dialogue on ""branding"""'}
{'yo': 'Ẹrù ọjà pẹ̀lú àkórí nípa Jamaica di títà lórí ayélujára', 'en': 'Jamaica-themed merchandise appeared in the online store'}

{'yo': 'Kanye West ń kọrin níbi ayẹyẹ ọlọ́dọọdún Ilé-ọnà ti Ọnà Ìgbàlódé ní Garden benefit, New York City, ọjọ́ 10, oṣù karùn-ún, 2011. Àwòrán láti ọwọ́ọ Jason Persse, CC BY-SA 2.0.', 'en': "Kanye West performs at The Museum of Modern Art's annual Party in the Garden benefit, New York City, May 10, 2011. Photo by Jason Persse, CC BY-SA 2.0."}

{'yo': '"Ọ̀kọrin tàkasúfèé tí ó jẹ́ ọmọ orílẹ̀ èdèe Amẹ́ríkà Kanye West gbé àríyá ""Ìsìn Ọjọ́ Ọ̀sẹ̀ "" pop-up concert wá sí Kingston, Jamaica, ní kété tí ìsinmi ọjọ́ ọ̀sẹ̀ fún Àyájọ́ Ọjọ́ Àwọn Málegbàgbé Ọmọ Orílẹ̀-èdè náà (19-21, oṣù Ọ̀wàrà ọdún-un 2019) yóò bẹ̀rẹ̀."', 'en': '"American rapper Kanye West brought his ""Sunday Service"" pop-up concert to Kingston, Jamaica, at the start of its National Heroes Day holiday weekend (October 19-21, 2019)."'}

{'yo': 'Èyí ni ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ tí ọ̀kọrin náà yóò kó ẹgbẹ́ akọrin ìyìnrere rẹ̀ kúrò ní Amẹ́ríkà, ní ìjẹ́pèe ti agbè fún ìjọba orílẹ̀ èdèe kan tí ó Ja kí ó gbé ètò náà wá sílùú òun.', 'en': 'This was the first time the rapper had taken his huge gospel choir outside the United States, reportedly at the request of a Jamaican member of his staff.'}

{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀, àríyá náà tí rí ìtakò láti ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀pẹ̀, tí ó Ho forí sọlẹ̀ pẹ̀lú àmì ìdánimọ̀ọ orílè-èdèe Jamaica tí West we lórí ọjà tí ó ń tà lóríi ibùdó ìtakùn àgbáyée rẹ̀ láì gba àṣẹ láti lò ó.', 'en': "However, the event was besieged with criticism from the outset, culminating with West's unapproved use of Jamaican emblems on merchandise being sold on his website."}

{'yo': 'Láàárín ọjọ́ méjì ni ìkéde fi lọ síta, inúu gbàgede Emancipation Park tó wà ní Kingston, olú ìlú orílẹ̀ èdè náà ni bẹbẹ́ ti wáyé - ojú ibi tí ó mú àwọn sọ̀rọ̀sọ̀rọ̀ kan wí tẹnu wọn látàrí àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ tó mú àríyànjiyàn dání tí West sọ nípa òwò ẹrú nínú ìfọ̀rọ̀wánilẹ́nuwò kan báyìí lóṣù karùn-ún ọdún-un 2018.', 'en': '"With just two days"" notice, the free concert took place at Emancipation Park in Kingston, the capital city - a location that jarred some commentators because of controversial comments West had made about slavery during a media interview in May 2018."'}

{'yo': '"Ọdún-un 2002 ni gbàgede náà di lílò ní ìbọ̀wọ̀ fún ""òmìnira dójú àmì"" fún àwọn ẹrú 300,000 ní Jamaica lọ́jọ́ 1, oṣù kẹjọ ọdún-un 1838."', 'en': '"The park was opened in 2002 in honour of the ""full freedom"" of 300,000 slaves in Jamaica on August 1, 1838."'}
{'yo': 'Ó lè jẹ́ èyí gan-an ni oun àkọ́kọ́ nípa àríyá orin náà, ṣùgbọ́n òun kọ́ ni ó gbẹ̀yìn.', 'en': 'That may have been the first bone of contention around the concert, but it was not the last.'}

{'yo': '"Pàápàá jù lọ bí Olóòtú Ètò Àṣà Olivia ""Babsy"" Grange ṣe bẹnu-àtẹ́ lu àwọn alátakò nígbà tí ó sọ wípé orílẹ̀ èdè náà ṣe àbápín nínú èrè àríyá náà, ní èyí tí aṣagbátẹrù orin kan lérò wípé àríyá náà tí ó ṣe é wò lójú ẹsẹ̀ bí ó ṣe ń lọ lóríi ìtakùn àgbáyée Ìsìn Ọjọ́ Ọ̀sẹ̀, ""gba"" àwọn ètò tí ó rọ̀ mọ́ àṣà ìbílẹ̀ tí ó jẹ́ ti Ìsinmi àwọn Málegbàgbé Ọmọ orílẹ̀ èdè sẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́."', 'en': '"Even as Culture Minister Olivia ""Babsy"" Grange responded to early criticism by saying the country was benefitting from the concert, one music promoter felt the show, which was livestreamed on the Sunday Service website, ""upstaged"" other cultural activities over Heroes Day weekend."'}

{'yo': 'Láfikún, àwọn olùgbée Kingston, tí ó bá súnkẹrẹ fàkẹrẹ kòdìmú lọ́sẹ̀ yẹn, fọ àfọ̀tẹ́lẹ̀ làásìgbò àti rọ̀tìrọti bí àwọn tó ṣíwọ́ iṣẹ́ bá ń darí lọ sílé nírọ̀lẹ́.', 'en': 'In addition, Kingston residents, who suffered unusually heavy traffic flows throughout the week, predicted chaos and confusion during the evening rush hour.'}

{'yo': 'Láì sí àní-àní, àríyá náà lọ ní ìrọwọ́-ìrọsẹ̀, ẹgbẹẹgbẹ̀rún lọ́nà ẹgbẹ̀rún àwọn Nev orílẹ̀-èdèe Jamaica gbádùn-un àríyá náà tí àwọn iléeṣẹ́ agbóhùnsáfẹ́fẹ́ orílẹ̀ èdèe Jamaica náà gba ìgbóríyìn fún iṣẹ́ takuntakun tí wọ́n ṣe:', 'en': 'Nevertheless, the concert went smoothly, several thousand Jamaicans enjoyed the show and Jamaican media companies earned online kudos for their flawless production:'}

{'yo': 'Ìròyìn etíìgbọ́ ìgboro ni wípé ó ṣeé ṣe kí ìgbésẹ̀ wà láti (Ìsìn Ọjọ́-àìkú) láti gba àsẹ èmi-ni-monií/ẹ̀tọ́ oníhun ààmì ìdánimọ̀ọ Kingston, orílẹ̀ èdè Jamaica àti ti ẹyẹ olùlànà onírù gígùn.', 'en': 'Word on the street is that there may be a move by [Sunday Service] to seek patent/ownership rights on the Kingston, Jamaica logos as well as the fabled streamer-tailed humming bird.'}

{'yo': 'Mo ti ṣe àwọn ìwádìí kan lórí ayélujára tí mo sì ṣe àwárí láti fi ti ẹ̀rí lẹ́yìn àmọ́ kádàrá kò ṣe mí lóore, mo ṣalábàápàdé ọjàa wọn tí wọ́n ń tà lórí ayélujára tó ní àwọn ààmi ìdánimọ̀ wọ̀nyí, tí ó sì ṣe dọ́gba-n-dọ́gba pẹ̀lú àríyá náà...', 'en': 'I have done a fair amount of online searches for information to corroborate the claim without luck but have come across their online release of merchandise bearing these landmark symbols, which coincided with the concert...'}

{'yo': '"Òtítọ́ orílẹ̀ èdèe Jamaica ni wípé àwọn ìjọba àná kò fi ìgbàkan kọbiara sí ìgbéró èto ọrọ̀ Ajée ""Jamaica"" tàbí àwọn ààmi ìdánimọ̀ tó jẹ́ ti wọn bíi àsíá àti àsíá apata."', 'en': '"Jamaica\'s reality is that successive political administrations have never fully appreciated the economic value of the brand ""Jamaica"" nor the symbols that [represent] that brand including its flag and its coat of arms."'}

{'yo': 'Bákannáà ni ó rí fún orin wa àti ohun tí ó rọ̀ mọ́, Ska, Mento, Rock Steady, Reggae àti bẹ́ẹ̀ bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ.', 'en': 'The same is true for our music and its associated brand marks, Ska, Mento, Rock Steady, Reggae among others.'}

{'yo': 'Ilẹ̀ Jamaica kò tètè lajú sí òwò aṣọ ṣíṣe tí ó ní ààmì pàtàkì erékùṣù tí yóò mú àwọn ènìyàn rà á wìtìwìtì.', 'en': "That Jamaica was blindsided by the release of clothing bearing the island's important symbols is a classic case of guerilla marketing."}

{'yo': 'Bí a bá fi ètò àríyá ṣe ìgbélárugẹ àwọn ọjà wọ̀nyí nínúu gbàgede Emancipation Park tí ó mú ìlọsíwájú bá ohun tí ó ju aṣọ lọ láti ọ̀dọ̀ ìjọba àti àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀ èdèe Jamaica náà, pẹ̀lú lílo àwọn ààmìi orílẹ̀ èdè náà ní ọ̀nà àrà.', 'en': "Having a concert to promote the line at the historic Emancipation Park provides tacit assent of not only the line of garments by the government and people of Jamaica, but also of the use of the country's national symbols in their creation."}

{'yo': 'Mo ti ṣe àkíyèsí wípé Iléeṣẹ́ Ètò Àṣà àti Olùdarí ìlúu Kingston ti ń gbé ìgbésẹ̀ẹ pàjáwìrì láti ra nǹkan padà. Kí àwọn méjèèjì mọ̀ pé àtúnṣe kì í ṣe nǹkan tó ma yá kíákíá.', 'en': "I have noticed that there is now hurried pushback by the Ministry of Culture as well as from the Mayor of Kingston. {'yo': 'Mo lérò wípé ìjọba ní àwọn agbẹjọ́rò tó ká ojú òṣùwọ̀n.', 'en': 'I hope that the government has good lawyers.'}

{'yo': '#SexForGrades, ètò alálàyé afẹ̀ríhàn-an BBC kan tí ó dá fìrìgbagbòó lóríi àṣemáṣe eré ìfẹ́ tí àwọn ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n ifásitì pẹ̀lú àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́bìrin ní Nàìjíríà àti Ghana ti ràn bíi pápá inú ọyẹ́ ní orí ayélujára tí ó sì ti fa àwọn ìbéèrè ọlọ́kanòjọ̀kan nípa ọ̀nà tí a leè gbà dẹ́kùn àṣemáṣe ọ̀hún láwùjọ:', 'en': '#SexForGrades, a BBC documentary on sexual harassment of female students by university professors in Nigeria and Ghana, has ignited heated online conversation and raises many questions about how to put an end to it:'}

{'yo': 'Àgbà iṣẹ́ ìwádìí náà, tí ó di gbígbé jáde ní ọjọ́ kéje oṣù Ọ̀wàrà 2019, tí akọ̀ròyin Kiki Mordi tí kò parí ẹ̀kọ́ọ rẹ̀ látàríi wípé kò fẹ́ ṣe àṣemáṣe pẹ̀lú olùkọ́ní ifásitì rẹ̀ tí ó ń fi ìdíi rẹ̀ rẹmi nínú ìdánwò nítorí wípé kò fún un ṣe ṣe atọ́kùn-un rẹ̀:', 'en': 'The groundbreaking investigation, released on October 7, 2019, was anchored by journalist Kiki Mordi, who was forced to abandon her own university degree because she refused to yield to the sexual advances by a university teacher who kept failing her:'}

{'yo': 'Boniface Igbeneghu, Ifásitì Èkó, tí a ká ìwà àṣemáṣe pẹ̀lú àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́bìrin nínú ìwádìí abẹ́lẹ̀ tí BBC ṣe.', 'en': 'Boniface Igbeneghu, University of Lagos, is caught sexually harassing female students in an undercover investigation by the BBC.'}

{'yo': '"Ìwádìí tí ó pé wákàtí kan tú àṣìírí ìwà àṣemáṣe ti ""eré ìfẹ́ fún ojú-àmì ẹ̀kọ́"" ní ifásitì Ìwọ̀-oòrùn Ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ méjì: University of Lagos (UNILAG) ti Nàìjíríà àti University of Ghana."', 'en': '"The nearly one-year investigation revealed the scandal of ""sex for grades"" crises at two West African universities: Nigeria\'s University of Lagos (UNILAG) and the University of Ghana."'}

{'yo': 'Boniface Igbeneghu, tí í ṣe kòfẹ́sọ̀ ní ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ ọnà ti UNILAG, tí ó sì tún jẹ́ àlùfáà Ìjọ Foursquare Gospel, ní Èkó, ń bẹ nínú àwọn olùkọ́ tí òkété bórù mọ́ lọ́wọ́.', 'en': "Nigeria's Boniface Igbeneghu, a professor in UNILAG'S faculty of art and an evangelical pastor of local Foursquare Gospel Church, Lagos, was one of the teachers busted by the investigation."}

{'yo': 'A rí Igbeneghu nínúu ètòo BBC náà tí ó kọ ẹnu ìfẹ́ sí ọmọdébìnrin tí ó díbọ́n gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọmọ ọlọ́jọ́ orí mẹ́tàdínlógún tí ó ń wà ìgbanisílé ẹ̀kọ́ láì fura wípé ajábọ̀ ìròyìn tí ó ń ṣe iṣẹ́ ìwádìí abẹ́lẹ̀ fún BBC ni ó ń ṣe. Igbeneghu sọ báyìí wípé:', 'en': 'Igbenegbu is seen in the BBC video sexually propositioning an undercover BBC reporter who pretended to be a 17-year-old seeking university admission. Igbenegu can be heard saying:'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé o kò mọ̀ wípé ọmọbìnrin arẹwà ni ọ́ ?', 'en': "Don't you know you are a beautiful girl?"}

{'yo': 'Ǹjẹ́ o mọ̀ wípé àlùfáà ìjọ ẹlẹ́sìn ìgbàgbọ́ ni mo jẹ́, àti pé mo tó ẹni àádọ́ta ọdún ṣùgbọ́n bí mo bá fẹ́ ọmọ ọdún mẹ́tàdínlógún ọ̀rọ̀ dídùn àti owó ni ó máa jẹ...', 'en': "Do you know I am a pastor and I am in my 50's but if I want a girl of 17 years, all I need is a sweet tongue and put some money..."}

{'yo': 'Níbi ìpàdé kan láàárín àwọn méjèèjì, Igbeneghu ṣẹ́ iná pa, ó sì ní kí ọmọdébìnrin náà ó fẹ́nu ko òhun lẹ́nu, tí ó sì tún dì mọ́ ọn gbádígbádí nínúu iyàraa iṣẹ́ẹ rẹ̀ tí ó wà ní títì pa.', 'en': 'In a final meeting between the pair, Igbenegbu switched off the lights, asked her for a kiss and went ahead to hug her in his locked office.'}
{'yo': '"Ìjọ Ajíhìnrere Foursquare ti dá Igbeneghu dúró ""lẹ́nu iṣẹ́ ìhìn rere."""', 'en': '"Foursquare Gospel Church has suspended Igbeneghu ""from all ministerial assignments."""'}

{'yo': '"Bákan náà, Ifásitì Èkó ti lé Igbeneghu kúrò ní ilé ìwé wọ́n sì ti sún ìpèré sí ẹ̀hìn ilẹ̀kùn ilé òṣìṣẹ́ tí wọ́n ń pè ní ""yàrá tútù,"" tí àwọn ọ̀gá olùkọ́ni ti máa ń ṣe àríyá níbi tí wọ́n ti máa ń gba àwọn ọ̀ṣọ́rọ̀ ọmọge lálejò."', 'en': '"Similarly, the University of Lagos has barred Igbeneghu from the school and also ordered the shutdown of the staff club\'s ""cold room,"" used by senior staff to hold parties attended by young female students and staff."'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ìbànújẹ́ ọdún sẹ́yìn', 'en': 'Recounting the trauma of years past'}

{'yo': 'Àkàrà tí ó tú sépo yìí ti fi gọ̀ngọ̀ fa kòmóòkùn ọ̀rọ̀ jáde lẹ́nu ọ̀gọ̀rọ̀ ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdèe Nàìjíríà ní orí ayélujára pẹ̀lú àmìi #SexForGrades ní oríi Twitter.', 'en': 'This exposé ignited reactions of cataclysmic proportions from Nigerians online with the trending hashtag #SexForGrades on Twitter.'}

{'yo': 'Púpọ̀ nínú àwọn òǹlò tí ó jẹ́ abo ní oríi Twitter fi ẹ̀dùn ọkàn-an wọn hàn nípa ìríríi wọn lóríi ìwà erée gélé ti ìbálòpọ̀:', 'en': 'Many female Twitter users recount their own experiences of sexual harassment:'}

{'yo': '"Lọlá Ṣónẹ́yìn, alátinúdáa àjọ̀dún ìwé àti òǹkọ̀wé, ṣàlàyé ""ìtìjú ńlá"" tí òhún rí nígbà tí amúgbálẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ ọ̀gá pátápátá ifásitì kan (DVC) fọwọ́ kan ibi tí kò yẹ kí ó fọwọ́ kàn lára òun:"', 'en': '"Lola Shoneyin, book festival curator and author, recounted the ""terrible shame"" she felt after she was touched inappropriately by a university Deputy Vice-Chancellor (DVC):"'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n oníṣìná ilé ẹ̀kọ́ gíga Nàìjíríà ti ba ti àwọn obìnrin jẹ́.', 'en': 'Philandering university professors have for decades debased female students in Nigerian tertiary institutions.'}

{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, nítorí ìtìjú àwọn tí ó fi ara pa kì í leè sọ̀rọ̀ síta èyí kò sì jẹ́ kí ó rọrùn láti dá sẹ̀ríà fún àwọn awùwà ìbàjẹ́.', 'en': 'However, it is usually difficult to prosecute perpetrators because victims are afraid of the backlash and unwilling to talk due to deep trauma associated with these abuses.'}

{'yo': '"Ní ọdún-un 2016, Ìgbìmọ̀ Àṣòfin mú àbá ẹ̀wọ̀n ọdún márùn-ún wá fún olùkọ́ní tí ilé ẹjọ́ bá dá lẹ́bi àṣemáṣe pẹ̀lú akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ nínú ""Ìwé àbádòfin Ìfòpin sí ìwà ìbàjẹ́ ìbálòpọ̀ ní Ilé Ìwé Gíga."""', 'en': '"In 2016, the ""Sexual Harassment in Tertiary Education Institution Prohibition Bill,"" passed by the Nigerian Senate prescribed a 5-year jail term for lecturers and educators convicted of sexually harassing students."'}

{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀, Àjọ Olùkọ́ni Ifásitìi Nàìjíríà kọ ẹ̀yìn sí ìwé àbá yìí, wọ́n ní ó kọ iyán àwọn kéré, nítorí ó kọjú ìjà sí àwọn olùkọ́ àti wípé ó yẹpẹrẹ àṣẹ àti agbára ilé ẹ̀kọ́ gíga.', 'en': 'However, the Academic Staff Union of Nigerian Universities opposed the bill, claiming that it was discriminatory since it targeted teachers and that it undermined university autonomy.'}

{'yo': 'Ìsọtasí ìwé àbá náà pa òfin náà ní àpakú finínfinfín - èyí kò sì jẹ́ kí ààrẹ ó bu ọwọ́ lù ú.', 'en': 'The opposition to the bill may have led to the death of that legislation - which did not get presidential assent.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé Eré ìfẹ́ fún ojú-àmì Ẹ̀kọ́ #SexForGrades ni ìjìjàngbara ilé ìjọsìn #ChurchToo tuntun?', 'en': 'Is #SexForGrades another #ChurchToo movement?'}

{'yo': 'Nínú oṣù kéje ọdún yìí, gbajúgbajà ayàwòrán-an nì, Bùsọ́lá Dakolo, fi ẹ̀sùn kan Bíọ́dún Fátóyìnbó, àlùfáà àgbà ìjọ Commonwealth of Zion Assembly (COZA), wípé ó fi ipá bá òun ní àjọṣepọ̀ nígbà tí òhún wà ní ọmọ ọdún mẹ́rindínlógún.', 'en': "In July this year, Nigeria's celebrity photographer, Busola Dakolo, accused Biodun Fatoyinbo, the lead pastor of Commonwealth of Zion Assembly (COZA), of forcefully raping her when she was 16."}
{'yo': 'Kà síwájú sí i: Àlùfáà tàbí apanijẹ bí ẹ̀pa?', 'en': 'Read more: Pastor or predator?'}
{'yo': 'Ajíhìnrere Oníwàásù nínúu wàhálà ẹ̀sùn ìfipábánilòpọ̀', 'en': 'Nigerian Evangelical preacher embroiled in rape accusations'}

{'yo': 'Fún ọdún mẹ́fà tí ó ré kọjá lọ, Fátóyìnbó aródẹ́dẹ́ ti rí ìfẹ̀sùnkàn ìfipábánilòpọ̀ ọ̀kan-ò-jọ̀kan.', 'en': 'Over the past six years, the flamboyant Fatoyinbo has been plagued by allegations of rape and sexual abuse.'}

{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀, ìfọ̀rọ̀wánilẹ́nuwò tí Dakolo ti fẹ̀sùn kan Fátóyìnbó dá awuyewuye sílẹ̀ lórí ayélukára bí ajere.', 'en': 'However, the emotional interview during which Dakolo accused Fatoyinbo ignited a national reaction online.'}

{'yo': 'Fún ọjọ́ díẹ̀, ilé ìjọsìn náà; #ChurchToo - tí í ṣe àpẹẹrẹ èmi náà ní àgbáyé #MeToo - gba ayélujára kan ní Nàìjíríà.', 'en': 'For days, #ChurchToo - a national iteration of the global #MeToo movement - trended on social media in Nigeria.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀sùn yìí fò fẹ̀rẹ̀ láti orí ayélujára sí ìfẹ̀hónúhàn lóríi òpópónà ní àwọn ìlú ńlá ní Nàìjíríà bíi Èkó àti Abuja.', 'en': 'This agitation soon morphed from online to street protests in major Nigerian cities like Lagos and Abuja.'}

{'yo': '"Ìpèsí àkíyèsí ilé ìjọsìn náà #ChurchToo movement rọ ìjọba láti da ""ọ̀ràn-an ìjìyà obìnrin àti ọmọdébìnrin dúrò."""', 'en': '"The #ChurchToo movement called on the government to take ""the issue of violence against women and girls seriously."""'}

{'yo': '"Ilé ìjọsìn náà #ChurchToo ṣípayá ìdákẹ́ rọ́rọ́ àmọ́ ""ìbàjẹ́ àṣà ìfipábánilòpọ̀ tí ó ń gbèrú, pàápàá jù lọ ní agbo ìjọsìn"" ní Nàìjíríà."', 'en': '"The #ChurchToo revealed the silent but ""horrific thriving rape culture, especially within religious circles"" in Nigeria."'}
{'yo': 'Ó fún àwọn obìnrin ní àǹfààní láti wí ti ẹnu wọn.', 'en': 'It provided an opportunity for women to speak out.'}

{'yo': 'Bíi ti #ChurchToo, ìké tantan eré ìfẹ́ fún ojú-àmì ẹ̀kọ́ #SexForGrades ti fẹ ìdí ìlòkulò agbára tí ó bí ìwà àṣemáṣe ti ìbánilájọ̀ṣepọ̀ tí àwọn obìnrin kò fi tọkàntọkàn fẹ́ síta gbangba.', 'en': 'Like the #ChurchToo movement, the #SexForGrades outcry has again revealed the realities of sexual violence against women and the abuse of power that allows this sexual violence to thrive.'}

{'yo': 'Ǹjẹ́ àmì orí ayélujára yìí yóò ṣe amọ̀nàa ìgbèjà ẹ̀tọ́ tí kì í ṣe ti orí ayélujára tí yóò béèrè fún àtúnṣe tí yóò sọ ilé ẹ̀kọ́ gíga ifásitì di ibi ààbò fún àwọn obìnrin bí?', 'en': 'Will this hashtag lead to an offline advocacy movement that pushes for reforms to ensure that universities are safe places for women?'}
{'yo': 'Ìgbà àti àkókò nìkan ni yóò sọ.', 'en': 'Time will tell.'}
{'yo': 'Ilé ẹ̀kọ́ ìmọ̀ orin kíkọ kan ṣoṣo ní Zanzibar ti fẹ́ di títì pa', 'en': "Zanzibar's one and only music academy on the brink of closure"}
{'yo': "Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ Orin Kíkọ Àwọn Orílẹ̀-èdè Dhow f'orin ṣègbélárugẹ àṣàa Swahili", 'en': 'Dhow Countries Music Academy promotes Swahili culture through music'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ láti Iléèwé Orin kíkọ Àwọn Orílẹ̀-èdèe Dhow (DCMA) ń fi qanun, fèrè, ìlù àti dùrù ní Ilé Àwọn Ẹ̀ṣọ́ Aṣọ́bodè Àtijọ́, ní Stone Town, Zanzibar, 2019. DCMA ló ni àwòrán.', 'en': 'Students from the Dhow Countries Music Academy (DCMA) rehearse the qanun, flute, drum and piano at the Old Customs House, Stone Town, Zanzibar, 2019. Photo courtesy of the DCMA.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹgbẹẹgbẹ̀rún àlejò tí ó ń rọ́ wìtìwìtì wá sí ìlú Stone Town, Zanzibar tí ó kún fún ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àtẹ̀yìnwá, ti tẹ̀lé ìró orin Iléèwé Orin kíkọ Àwọn Orílẹ̀-èdèe Dhow (DCMA), ilé ẹ̀kọ́ orin kíkọ tí ó ń ṣe ìgbélárugẹ àti ìpamọ́ àwọn àṣà orin erékùṣù náà tí ó sún mọ́ Swahili ní ẹ̀báa Omi Òkun India.', 'en': '"Thousands of visitors to the historic city of Stone Town, Zanzibar, have followed the sound of music to the Dhow Countries Music Academy (DCMA), a music school that promotes and preserves the islands"" musical traditions of the Swahili Coast along the Indian Ocean."'}

{'yo': 'Láti ọdún-un 2002, ilé ẹ̀kọ́ náà ti ṣe ìgbélárugẹ àti ìpamọ́ àkójọpọ̀ orin Lárúbáwá, India àti Ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ tí kò lẹ́lẹ́gbẹ́.', 'en': "Since 2002, the school has promoted and preserved the Zanzibar's unique mix of Arab, Indian and African cultures through music."}

{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn-in ọdún kẹtàdínlógún, iléèwé náà kò rí owó tí ó tówó nínú àpò ìkówó sí tí ó sì leè fa kí iléèwé náà ó di títì pa.', 'en': 'After 17 years, the school faces a financial crisis that threatens its closure.'}

{'yo': 'Nínú ìwé ìgbéròyìnjáde tí àwọn aláṣẹ DCMA tẹ̀ jáde, ìdá àádọ́rin nínú àwọn ọgọ́rin akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ni kò rí owó iléèwé wọn tí ó tó bíi $13 USD lóṣù san.', 'en': "Nearly 70% of its 80 full-time students can't afford to pay their tuition, which comes to about $13 USD per month, according to an official DCMA press release."}

{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú àtìlẹ́yìn àwọn onínúure tí ó ti dáwó fún iléèwé náà, owó tí ó kù ní sísan ṣì pọ̀ tó bẹ́ẹ̀ tí ó fi jẹ́ wípé, ó ṣe é ṣe kí ilẹ̀kùn-un iléèwé náà tí ó wà nínú Ilé Àwọn Ẹ̀ṣọ́ Aṣọ́bodè Àtijọ́.', 'en': 'While the school has received support over the years from international donors and diplomatic missions, they face a gap in funding that may force them to shut their doors at the historic Old Customs House.'}

{'yo': 'Láìsí owó tí ó tówó nílẹ̀ láti tẹ̀síwájú, àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ DCMA àti òṣìṣẹ́ ń fòyà kí ìró amọ́kànbalẹ̀ tí ó ń sun jáde láti inúu gbọ̀ngán olókìkí ilé ẹ̀kọ́ yìí tí ó mú erékùṣù yìí kọrin - leè wọ òkùnkùn.', 'en': 'Without crucial funds to continue, DCMA students and staff fear that the soulful sounds that flow through the hallways of this iconic institution that make these islands sing - may cease.'}

{'yo': 'Orin àti ìgbélárugẹ àṣà àti àjogúnbá nìkan kọ́ ni ilé ẹ̀kọ́ náà fi gbajúmọ̀, àmọ́ ó jẹ́ ilé fún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tí ó ń wà ibi tí wọn yóò ti fi ìmọ̀ kún ìmọ̀.', 'en': "The school not only teaches and promotes traditional culture and heritage through music, but it's also home to a community of young musicians who seek alternatives to making a living as creatives."}

{'yo': 'Akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ DCMA kan ń kọ́ qanun, ohun èlò orin ayédáadé orin taarab. Àwòrán láti iléèwé DCMA.', 'en': 'A DCMA student learns the qanun, a featured instrument in classical taarab songs. Photo courtesy of the DCMA.'}

{'yo': '"""A [ti bẹ̀rẹ̀] sí í ní rí ìdojúkọ ìgbà tí ó nira,"" alákòóso àgbàa DCMA, Alessia Lombardo sọ, nínúu àwòrán fídíò DCMA kan."', 'en': '"""We [have started] to face a very challenging financial moment,"" said Alessia Lombardo, managing director of the DCMA, in an official DCMA video."'}

{'yo': '"Láti ìsinsìnyí lọ títí di oṣù mẹ́fà sí àsìkò yìí, a kò rí àrídájú tí ó rinlẹ̀ wípé a ó leè san owó oṣù àwọn olùkọ́ni àti òṣìṣẹ́ẹ."""', 'en': '"""From now to the next six months, we are not sure that we can guarantee the salaries to our teachers and staff."""'}

{'yo': 'Ní àkókò tí a wà yìí, àwọn àkàwé-gboyè olùkọ́ 19 àti àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ mìíràn ti ṣiṣẹ́ fún oṣù mẹ́ta gbáko láì gba owó lọ sílé nítorí àìsí owó nínúu kóló iléèwé.', 'en': 'At the moment, 19 master teachers and small core staff have gone without salaries for over three months as the school struggles to secure strong funding partnerships and explore sustainable funding models for a school.'}

{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Ilé Ìfowópamọ́ Àgbáyé ṣe ti ṣàlàyé wípé, pẹ̀lú bí a ti ṣe mọ agbègbè tí iléèwé náà wà fún ibi ìrìn-àjò ìgbafẹ́ nítorí àwọn etíkun àtijọ́ àti ilé ìtura olówó ńláńlá tí ó kángun síbẹ̀, ọ̀gọ̀rọ̀ àwọn ọmọ ìbílẹ̀ ló ń bá àìníṣẹ́ lọ́wọ́ pò ó pàápàá bí ìṣẹ́ ṣe ti gbé fúkẹ́ ju ti ìgbà kan lọ.', 'en': 'While the archipelago is known as a tourist destination for its pristine beaches and luxury hotels, the majority of local people struggle with high unemployment even as poverty has slightly decreased, according to The World Bank.'}

{'yo': 'Fún ọdún mẹ́tàdínlógún, DCMA ti ṣiṣẹ́ àṣekúdórógbó nípa lílo orin ṣe ìgbélárugẹ tòun ìpamọ́ ọ̀rọ̀ àjogúnbá àti àṣà Zanzibar.', 'en': "For 17 years, the DCMA has worked tirelessly to promote and protect Zanzibar's rich heritage and traditions through music."}

{'yo': 'Orírun àwọn olóhùn-iyò akọrin taarab, Siti Binti Saad àti Fatuma Binti Baraka, tí a tún mọ̀ sí Bi. Kidude, Zanzibar ni ilé èyí-ò-jọ̀yìí orin tí ó ti inúu ìbàṣepapọ̀ àṣà àti àjọṣe ọlọ́dún gbọgbọrọ tí ó wà láàárín àwọn àdúgbò ẹ̀ka Swahili.', 'en': 'The birthplace of legendary taarab singers Siti Binti Saad and Fatuma Binti Baraka, or Bi. Kidude, Zanzibar is home to musical genres that emerged through cultural exchange and collaboration along the Swahili Coast for hundreds of years.'}

{'yo': 'Láyé òde òní, akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ leè kọ́ orin ìbílẹ̀ bíi taarab, ngoma àti kidumbak, pẹ̀lú àfikún àwọn ohun èlò ìkọrin bíi ìlù ní oníranànran, qanun àti oud, gẹ́gẹ́ bí alápamọ́ - àti òǹgbifọ̀ - àṣà àti ìṣe.', 'en': 'Today, students can learn traditional musical genres like taarab, ngoma and kidumbak, along with instruments like drums, qanun and oud, as gatekeepers - and interpreters - of culture and tradition.'}

{'yo': 'Neema Surri, a ta violin ní DCMA, ti ń kọ́ bí a ti ṣe ń ta ohun èlòo violin láti ọmọdún mẹ́sàn-án mẹ́nu lé ọ̀rọ̀ nínú àwòrán fídíò DCMA náà.', 'en': 'Neema Surri, a violin player at the DCMA, has been studying the violin since the age of 9.'}

{'yo': '"""Mo mọ àwọn ọ̀dọ́mọdé tí ó máa nífẹ̀ẹ́ sí kíkọ́ orin ṣùgbọ́n wọn kò leè san owó ìmẹ̀kọ tí ó jẹ́ owó iléèwé nítorí wípé wọn kúṣẹ̀ẹ́ wọn kò sì ní iṣẹ́ lọ́wọ́ ."""', 'en': '"""I know many young people who would like to study music but they can\'t afford the minimal tuition fee because they are poor and unemployed,"" Surri said in the DCMA video."'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ọ DCMA ń fi ohun èlò ìkọrin olókùn tín-ín-rín kọrin nínú Ilé Àwọn Ẹ̀ṣọ́ Aṣọ́bodè Àtijọ́, níbití iiléèwé náà fi ìkàlẹ̀ sí, ní Stone Town, Zanzibar, lọ́dún-un 2019. Àwòrán jẹ́ ti iléèwée DCMA.', 'en': 'Students at the DCMA rehearse at the Old Customs House, where the school is based, in Stone Town, Zanzibar, 2019. Photo courtesy of the DCMA.'}

{'yo': 'Ní ìparí àwọn ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ọ DCMA, tí wọ́n ti gba ìwé ẹ̀rí àti ní òpin ẹ̀kọ́ ọlọ́dún kan, púpọ̀ nínú àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ọ DCMA ni ó ti di àgbà ọ̀jẹ́ tí wọ́n sì í ṣeré lórí ìtàgé kárí ayé.', 'en': 'After completing DCMA workshops, certificate and diploma courses, many DCMA students go on to perform on world stages as award-winning bands and solo artists.'}

{'yo': '"Ọmọ bíbíi Zanzibar, tí ó jẹ́ akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ọ DCMA nígbà kan rí, tí ó jẹ́ olùkọ́ni ní iléèwé kan náà báyìí, Amina Omar Juma tòun ti ìlú mọ̀ọ́ká ẹgbẹ́ akọrin rẹ̀, tí ó ń ""fi àṣà ìró orin ìbílẹ̀ "" taarab papọ̀ mọ́ ti ìgbàlódélonígbàńlò kọrin, ìyẹn ""Siti àti Ẹgbẹ́ ,"" ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ padà wọ̀lú láti ìrìnàjò orin kíkọ kan ní orílẹ̀-èdèe South Africa."', 'en': '"Zanzibar\'s Amina Omar Juma, a former DCMA student and current DCMA teacher, recently returned from a tour in South Africa with her critically acclaimed, ""Siti and the Band,"" known for ""fusing the roots"" by blending traditional taarab sounds with contemporary, layered rhythms."'}

{'yo': '"Òun, àwọn díẹ̀ nínú ẹgbẹ́ akọrin rẹ̀ àti àpapọ̀ àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ DCMA ní ìgbà kan rí ṣe àgbéjáde àwo orin wọn àkọ́kọ́, ""Fusing the Roots,"" ní ọdún-un 2018, tí ó mú wọn oi ng o òǹwòran lára yá ní Sauti za Busara, tí í ṣe àjọ̀dún orin kíkọ tí ó gbàràdá jù lọ ní Ìlà-oòrùn Ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀."', 'en': '"She and other band members, also former DCMA students, released their first full album, ""Fusing the Roots,"" in 2018, going on to perform at Sauti za Busara, East Africa\'s largest music festival, that same year."'}

{'yo': '"Híhàyín ni orin Siti àti Ẹgbẹ́ ""Nielewe"" (""Gbó mi yéké"") àti àwòrán orin náà, tí ó ṣe àfihàn-an àwòrán-an, tí ó sọ ìtàn obìnrin kan tí ó ń rí ìdojúkọ abẹ̀-ilé, tí ó sì ń dárò ara rẹ̀. Ìtàn náà jọ ti Omar Juma fúnra rẹ̀:"', 'en': '"Here\'s Siti and the Band\'s ""Nielewe"" (""Understand Me"") and music video, depicting scenes from Zanzibar while telling the story of a woman who experiences domestic abuse and dreams of life in music, much like Omar Juma\'s personal story:"'}

{'yo': 'Kà síwájú sí i: Àwọn akọrin lóbìnrin Ìlà-Oòrùn Ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ kọrin tako àìfààyè gba obìnrin àwọn ọkùnrin.', 'en': 'Read more: East African women in the music industry sing out against male domination'}
{'yo': 'Ìtàn nípa àyálò àṣà àti àjọṣepọ̀', 'en': 'A history of cultural crossroads and collaboration'}

{'yo': 'Ó tó ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dógún àlejò ni ó ti wo eré, gba ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti bá àwọn akọrin lóríṣiírísí ọjọ́ ọ̀la ní iléèwé olókìkí náà ní gbólóhùn rí.', 'en': "Over 15,000 visitors have passed through the academy's iconic building to enjoy live performances, workshops and classes and interact with passionate DCMA musicians who represent the future of Zanzibar culture and heritage, according to the DCMA."}

{'yo': '"Iléèwé náà ti ṣe àyálò àti àmúpapọ̀ ọ̀kan-ò-jọ̀kan àṣà ""àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè dhow,"" tí ó wà ní ìtòsíi Òkun India àti Ọ̀gbùn-un Persia."', 'en': '"Drawing from a complex history of Indian, Arab and African exchange, the school celebrates the influence of ""dhow countries,"" with inspiration from cultures that converged along the Indian Ocean and the Persian Gulf."'}

{'yo': '"Agbègbèe Omani Sultanate, tí ó jẹ́ "" ibi gbòógì àwọn alágbára atukọ̀ orí omi ní ọgọ́rùn-ún Ọdún-un kẹtàdínlógún sí kọkàndínlógún sẹ́yìn,"" gbé àga agbára rẹ̀ láti Muscat sí Zanzibar ní ọdún-un 1840."', 'en': '"The Omani Sultanate, a ""major maritime force from the 17th to 19th centuries,"" shifted its seat of power from Muscat to Zanzibar in 1840."'}

{'yo': 'Láti Stone Town, àwọn ọba Omani ń tukọ̀ọ okòwò orí omi ìgbà náà tí ó fẹjú, títí kan kànáfùrù, wúrà, àti aṣọ , látàrí àwọn ìjì líle tí ń tu àwọn ọkọ̀ ìbílẹ̀ẹ Lárúbáwáa - dhows - ní oríi Òkun Indian, láti India sí Oman títí lọ dé Ìlà-Oòrùn Ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀.', 'en': 'From Stone Town, Omani kings oversaw elaborate systems of maritime trade, including cloves, gold, and textiles, powered by strong winds that set dhows - traditional Arab vessels - sailing across the Indian Ocean, from India to Oman to East Africa.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ọ̀dọ́ ní Zanzibar mọ rírìi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àtẹ̀yìnwá tí ó ní ohun ńlá ní í ṣe fún ọjọ́ ọ̀la wọn, ni wọ́n fi ń ṣe àdàlù èyí tí a rí nínú àwọn orin òde òní tí wọn ń gbé jáde.', 'en': 'Young Zanzibaris recognize the importance of connecting with the past to determine their future and the music created today expresses that desire to bridge the old with the new.'}

{'yo': '"Àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti olùkọ́ni DCMA ṣe ìdásílẹ̀ẹ ""TaraJazz"" láì pẹ́ yìí, èyí tí ó jẹ́ àdàlù orin ìbílẹ̀ taarab àti orin Jazz òde òní."', 'en': '"DCMA students and teachers recently formed ""TaraJazz,"" a blend of traditional taarab and modern jazz."'}

{'yo': 'Ata violin, Felician Mussa, ọmọ ogún ọdún, ti ń kọ́ ohun èlò ìkọrin olókùn tín-ín-rín náà fún ọdún mẹ́ta àtààbọ̀; TaraJazz jẹ́ ọ̀kan nínú àwọn ẹgbẹ́ akọrin tí ó àwọn ènìyàn máa ń pè sí òde jù lọ ní àwọn erékùṣù náà, ni ó wà nínú àwòrán tí ayàwòrán tí Aline Coquelle yà:', 'en': 'Their violinist, Felician Mussa, 20, has only been studying the violin for 3.5 years; TaraJazz is one of the most sought-after bands on the islands, captured here by photographer Aline Coquelle:'}

{'yo': 'Agbègbèe Swahili sọ ìtàn pàṣípààrọ àṣà ìbílẹ̀ tí DCMA ṣì ń tẹ̀síwájú nínúu rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú àjọṣepọ̀ àwọn orin-in rẹ̀ .', 'en': 'The Swahili coast tells the story of epic cultural exchanges and the DCMA continues this tradition through its musical collaborations.'}

{'yo': '"Lọ́dọọdún, iléèwé náà máa ń gbàlejò fún ètò tí a pè ní ""Ìkọlù Swahili,"" tí ó mú àgbárijọpọ̀ọ àgbà akọrin láti Ilẹ̀-Adúláwọ̀, Ìlú Abẹ́-àkóso Lárúbáwá, Ilẹ̀ Éróòpù àti Àríwá Amẹ́ríkà pẹ̀lú àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ DCMA láti ṣe orin láàárín ọ̀sẹ̀ kan."', 'en': '"Every year, the school hosts an initiative called ""Swahili Encounters,"" matching well-known musicians hailing from Africa, the Middle East, Europe and North America with DCMA students to create original musical compositions within a week-long period."'}

{'yo': '"Ní ìgbẹ̀yìngbẹ́yín ""ìkọlù"" náà, àgbárijọpọ̀ tuntun náà yóò ta bí elégbé ní Sauti za Busara, tí àjọṣepọ̀ wọ̀nyí yóò sì di ìbáṣepọ̀ ọlọ́jọ́ pípẹ́ tí kò mọ ìyàtọ̀ èdè àti àṣà, tí ó fi hàn gbangba wálíà wípé èdè kan náà tí gbogbo ayé gbọ́ ni orin."', 'en': '"At the end of the ""encounter,"" the newly-formed collaboration performs at Sauti za Busara, and many of these collaborations turn into life-time friendships that transcend the boundaries of language and culture, proving music is a universal language."'}

{'yo': 'DCMA máa ń ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ètò orin kíkọ tí ó ń ṣe ìgbélárugẹ ẹ̀bùn orin kíkọ àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti àfihàn àjọṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú ọ̀kọrin àlejò hàn ní, Stone Town, Zanzibar, 2019. DCMA ni ó ni àwòrán.', 'en': '"DCMA offers weekly live performances showcasing students"" talents and collaborations with visiting musicians, Stone Town, Zanzibar, 2019. Photo courtesy of DCMA."'}

{'yo': 'DCMA mọ rírì orin gẹ́gẹ́ bí ohun tí ó leè ró àwọn ènìyàn lágbára àti gẹ́gẹ́ bí ohun tí ó lè mú ìṣọ̀kan àti ìrẹ́pọ̀ bá àwọn ènìyàn láì wo ti àṣà - ó sì tún ń pèsè àǹfààní iṣẹ́ fún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tí ó ní ẹ̀bùn àmọ́ tí ó ń tiraka láti jẹ.', 'en': 'The DCMA recognizes that music empowers and unites people across cultures - and it also employs talented youth living in a struggling economy with limited job opportunities.'}

{'yo': 'Fún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ 1,800 tí ó ti gba ìdánilẹ́kọọ́ ní DCMA, èyí nìkan ni ibi ilé orin tí wọ́n mọ̀, níbi tí wọ́n ti ń kọ́ ẹ̀kọ́ tí wọ́n sì ti ń ní àlékún ìmọ̀ nípa iṣẹ́ orin kíkọ àti bí a ṣe ń di òǹkọrin.', 'en': 'For the 1,800 students who have trained at the DCMA, this is the only musical home they know, where they can learn and grow as professional musicians and artists.'}

{'yo': '"Arìnrìn-àjò kan láti Spain, tó bẹ DCMA wò ní kò pẹ́ yìí, kọ sí oríi TripAdvisor: ""Ní tèmi, ìṣalábàápàdée àwọn akọrin ni ìgbà tí ó meet jù lọ fún mi ní erékùṣù yìí."""', 'en': '"One traveler from Spain, who recently visited the DCMA, wrote on TripAdvisor: ""Personally, meeting the musicians was the best piece of my time on this island."""'}

{'yo': 'Bí ẹ̀ka ìrìn-àjò afẹ́ẹ Zanzibar ṣe ń gbèrò sí i, DCMA nígbàgbọ́ wípé orin ní ipa kan gbòógì ní í ṣe nínú àjọyọ̀, ìpamọ́ àti ìgbélárugẹ tòun ìpolongo àṣà, àjogúnbá àti ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àtẹ̀yìnwáa Swahili.', 'en': "As Zanzibar's tourism sector rapidly grows, the DCMA believes that music plays an essential role in the celebration, preservation and promotion of Swahili culture, heritage and history."}

{'yo': 'Zanzibar ju àwọn etíkun àti ilé ìtura olówó iyebíye rẹ̀ lọ - ó jẹ́ ibi tí ó kún fún àwọn ènìyàn ọlọ́pọlọ tí ó ní ẹ̀bùn ní poolo orí wọn látàrí àjọṣepọ̀ ọlọ́jọ́ pípẹ́ tí ó mú agbègbè náà dá yàtọ̀ gedegbe.', 'en': "Zanzibar is far more than its beaches and luxury hotels - it's a place bursting with talent that stems from an extraordinary history of cultural connection and collaboration."}
{'yo': 'Ìfiyèsí Alákòóso Ìwé Títẹ̀: Òǹkọ̀wé àtẹ́jádé yìí ti ṣiṣẹ́ ọ̀fẹ́ pẹ̀lú DCMA.', 'en': "Editor's note: The author of this post has volunteered with DCMA."}
{'yo': 'Ìṣọdẹ-àjẹ́ ṣì ń gba ẹ̀mí àwọn ènìyàn ní ìgbèríko India', 'en': 'Witch-hunting still claims lives in rural India'}
{'yo': 'Superstition and lack of awareness behind witch-hunting in India', 'en': 'Superstition and lack of awareness behind witch-hunting in India'}
{'yo': 'Ìletò kan ní ẹ̀báa Jamshedpur ní Jharkhand. Àwòrán láti ọwọ́ọ Anumeha Verma', 'en': 'A village near Jamshedpur in Jharkhand. Picture courtesy Anumeha Verma'}

{'yo': 'Ní ọjọ́ 20 oṣù Agẹmọ, àgbájọ àwọn ènìyànkéènìà gba ẹ̀mí àwọn àgbàlagbà mẹ́rin kan láì dá wọn lẹ́jọ́ ní agbègbèe Gumla ní Jharkhand, India lẹ́yìn tí a fi ẹ̀sùn-un àjẹ́ kàn wọ́n.', 'en': 'On 20 July, four elderly people were lynched by a mob in the Gumla District of Jharkhand, India after being accused of practicing witchcraft.'}

{'yo': 'Gẹ̀gẹ̀ bí ìjábọ̀ ìròyìn, àwọn àgbàlagbà wọ̀nyí ṣe ikú pa ọkùnrin kan, ni ìgbìmọ̀ abúlée Panchayat ṣe dá wọn lẹ́bi.', 'en': "According to reports, the victims were accused of causing a man's death and they were eventually found guilty of witchcraft by a Panchayat (a village assembly)."}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n wọ́ àwọn àgbàlagbà mẹ́rin wọ̀nyí jáde síta ilée wọn, àwọn ọkùnrin tí ó bòjú sì fi igi lù wọ́n títí tí ẹ̀mí fi bọ́ lára wọn.', 'en': 'The victims were dragged out of their homes and beaten to death by masked men wielding sticks.'}
{'yo': 'Mẹ́jọ nínú àwọn ènìyànkéènìà wọ̀nyí ti wà ní akóló ọlọ́pàá.', 'en': 'Eight of the attackers were subsequently arrested by police.'}

{'yo': 'Gẹ̀gẹ̀ bí àkọsílẹ̀ ọlọ́pàá tí Times of India tẹ̀jáde, ìṣọdẹ-àjẹ́ ní Jharkhand ti rán àwọn ènìyàn 123 sọ́run àpàpàǹdodo ní àárín-in oṣù Èbìbí ọdún-un 2016 sí oṣù Èbìbí ọdún-un 2019.', 'en': 'According to police data published by The Times of India, witch-hunting in Jharkhand has claimed 123 lives from May 2016 to May 2019.'}

{'yo': '"Jákèjádò, ènìyàn 134 di ẹni ẹbọra-ń-bá-jẹun látàrí èsùn-un lílo ""ògùngùn"" ní ọdún-un 2016, ìyẹn gẹ̀gẹ̀ bí Àjọ Aṣàkọsílẹ̀ Ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ Orílẹ̀-èdè náà ṣe kọ́ ọ sílẹ̀."', 'en': '"Across the country, 134 people were killed for the alleged use of ""black magic"" in 2016, according to the National Crime Records Bureau."'}
{'yo': '"Àrùn T""ó Ń Peléke Sí i"', 'en': 'A Perpetual Malady'}

{'yo': '"""Ìṣọdẹ-àjẹ́ kò jẹ́ tuntun ní Jharkhand,"" Prem Chand, Olúdásílẹ̀ àti Alága Free Legal Aid Committee (FLAC) ní Jharkhand, sọ nínúu ìfọ̀rọ̀wánilẹ́nuwò orí ẹ̀ro-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ kan."', 'en': '"""Witch-hunting is not new in Jharkhand,"" says Prem Chand, the Founding Chairman of the Free Legal Aid Committee (FLAC) in Jharkhand, in a telephonic interview."'}
{'yo': 'FLAC ti ń ṣe àtọ́nàa ìṣòfin tí ó tako ìṣọdẹ-àjẹ́ ní Jharkhand.', 'en': 'FLAC has been instrumental in bringing about legislation against witch-hunting in Jharkhand.'}

{'yo': 'Iléeṣẹ́ náà bẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣẹ́ ní agbègbè yìí ní ọdún-un 1991 nígbà tí àwọn aládùúgbò fi ẹ̀sùn kan obìnrin kan pé ó lọ́wọ́ nínú ikú ọmọdékùnrin kan.', 'en': "The organisation first began working in this area in 1991 when a woman was accused by her neighbour of causing a boy's death."}
{'yo': 'Àgbájọ àwọn ènìyànkéènìà kan dìgbò lù ú, wọ́n sì pa ọkọ àti ọmọ rẹ̀ ọkùnrin.', 'en': 'An irate mob attacked her and killed her husband and son.'}
{'yo': 'Òún fi ara pa.', 'en': 'She sustained injuries.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbàtí Prem Chand àti àwọn ẹlẹgbẹ́ẹ rẹ̀ ṣe ìbẹ̀wò sí àwọn ẹlẹ́ṣẹ̀ wọ̀nyí nínúu túbú, wọ́n bá ìpèníjà:', 'en': 'When Prem Chand and his colleagues visited the offenders in the prison, they were met with defiance:'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n sọ fún wọn wípé àwọn dúró lé oríi ẹ̀sùn tí wọ́n fi kan àwọn.', 'en': 'They told us that they stood by their accusation.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n sì tún gbàgbọ́ wípé bí ẹ̀jẹ̀ẹ ẹni tí a pè ní àjẹ́ bá kan ilẹ̀ ọ̀gẹ́rẹ́, yóò pàdánù agbára ẹlẹyẹ rẹ̀.', 'en': 'They also shared a belief that when the blood of a woman branded as a witch falls on the ground, she loses her so-called powers of sorcery.'}
{'yo': 'Prem Chand sọ wípé ó kan apá kan nínú àwọn ọmọ ìlú:', 'en': 'Prem Chand says that it affects specific sectors of the population:'}

{'yo': 'Nígbàgbogbo, àwọn obìnrin tí kò lárá tí ó tálákà ní í máa ń fi ara kááṣá.', 'en': 'Usually, it is the women from the weaker sections of the society and economically backward regions that are targeted.'}
{'yo': "Àwọn tí ó f'ara kááṣá wọ̀nyí ni àwọn Adivasis, Harijans àti Dalits.", 'en': 'The victims are mostly Adivasis, Harijans and Dalits.'}

{'yo': 'Ìfojú iyì àwọn obìnrin àti ìtasẹ̀ àgẹ̀rẹ̀ sí òfin ẹ̀tọ́ sí ayé iyì fún gbogbo ọmọ ènìyàn.', 'en': 'It is an assault on the dignity of women and a violation of constitutional rights for a dignified life for every human being.'}
{'yo': 'Òtítọ́ Àwùjọ àti Ìṣèlú', 'en': 'The Social and Political Realities'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ajìjàngbara sọ wípé ìgbàgbọ́-asán tí ó rinlẹ̀ ní ìgbèríko ni ó ń fa ìwà pálapalà náà.', 'en': 'Activists say that deeply rooted superstitions prevalent in the hinterlands are a major cause behind the practice.'}

{'yo': '"Àìgbẹ̀kọ́, ètò ìlera tí ò pójú òṣùwọ̀n àti kòlàkòṣagbe tí ó ń gb""àgbègbè tí ìwà pálapalà wọ̀nyí ti gbalẹ̀ bí i ìtàkùn ni ó fi wọ́pọ̀."', 'en': 'A lack of education, poor health facilities and economic backwardness mark the regions where these practices are prevalent.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀ràn wọ̀nyí ti fi hàn wípé àhesọ ni ó máa fi ń bẹ̀rẹ̀ .', 'en': 'The cases so far show that often a rumor started by someone is enough to get the ball rolling.'}

{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú òfin àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ India tí ó ka ìṣọdẹ-àjẹ́ sí ohun tí ó lòdì sófin, àwọn akópa ọ̀ràn wọ̀nyí rí i gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀nà ìdáààbò-ara-ẹni.', 'en': 'Despite the laws enacted by various Indian states which declare witch-hunting to be illegal, participants in these cases see it as a form of self-defense.'}

{'yo': 'Bákan náà ni wọ́n ń wí àwáwí fún gbígba ohun ìní àwọn obìnrin, fi agbára gbẹ̀san tàbí fi ipá bá obìnrin lò pọ̀.', 'en': 'It is also used as an excuse for grabbing resources owned by women, exacting revenge or even exploiting women for sex.'}
{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Prem Chand ṣe ti sọ:', 'en': 'According to Prem Chand:'}

{'yo': 'Àtètèròtẹ́lẹ̀ ni wípé ní kété tí o bá ti pe obìnrin ní àjẹ́, o lè tẹríi rẹ̀ ba fún ìlòkulò.', 'en': 'The premise is that once you brand a woman as a witch, you can subject her to any treatment.'}

{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, ó ṣe kókó láti mọ̀ wípé wọn máa ń lo ìwà pálapàla yìí fi gba tara àwọn obìnrin, kò sì kìí ṣe ìdí tí ó ń fà á pàtó.', 'en': 'However, it is important to note that the practice is used as a justification for exploitation and is not a cause behind it per se.'}

{'yo': "Ní ti ẹ̀fẹ̀, láì wí tó, panchayat náà sábà máa ń lọ́wọ́ sí ìpènìyàn ní àjẹ́ pàápàá bí kò bá pàṣẹ ìjìyà t'ó tọ́.", 'en': 'Ironically, the panchayat often provides tacit approval for branding a person a witch even if does not pass ruling on the punishment to be meted out.'}

{'yo': 'Ní àfikùn sí panchayat tí ìbó yàn, àwọn kan ńbẹ tí wọ́n pe ara wọn ní panchayat ipò-ìsàlẹ̀ láì ní àṣẹ kankan tí ó fún wọn lágbara níbikíbi ní orílẹ̀-èdè.', 'en': 'In addition to the elected panchayat, there are self-styled caste panchayats with no legal mandate whatsoever that operate in certain parts of the country.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ẹgbẹ́ yìí máa ń dájọ́ àti fi ìyà jẹ ènìyàn tí kò sì sí ẹni tí ó ká wọn lápá kò.', 'en': 'These bodies pass verdicts and mete out punishments and remain largely unchallenged.'}

{'yo': '"Ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ kan ní agbègbèe Ajmer ní Rajasthan lọ́dún-un 2017 jábọ̀ ìlọ́wọ́sí panchayat ipò-ìsàlẹ̀ tí ó ṣ""okùnfa ikú obìnrin ogójì ọdún kan."', 'en': 'An incident in Ajmer district of Rajasthan in 2017 reported involvement of caste panchayat leading to the death of a 40-year-old woman.'}

{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bí òfin, ilé ẹjọ́ lé gbé ìgbésẹ̀ tí ó tako irúu ìdájọ́ báwọ̀nyí yálà láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn panchayat tí ìbó yàn àti panchayat ipò-ìsàlẹ̀.', 'en': 'Legally, the courts can take action against such verdicts in case of both elected panchayats and caste panchayats.'}

{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, àwọn tí ó fara kááṣá ò tilẹ̀ ní àǹfààní sí ilé-ẹjọ́ òfin kí àgbájọ-àwọn-ènìyànkéènìà ó tó kojúu wọn.', 'en': 'However, the victims seldom get the opportunity to reach a court of law before they become targets of mobs.'}
{'yo': 'Ìṣọdẹ-àjẹ́ jákèjádò India', 'en': 'Witch-hunting across India'}

{'yo': 'Jharkhand ti ṣe àkọsílẹ̀ iye ẹṣẹ̀ àwọn ènìyán ṣẹ̀ tí ó pọ̀ jù lọ tí ó tan mọ́ ìṣọdẹ-àjẹ́ àmọ́ kì í ṣe ìpínlẹ̀ náà nìkan.', 'en': 'Jharkhand has recorded the highest number of crimes committed in the name of witch-hunting but it is not the only state.'}

{'yo': '"Ọ̀ràn-an ìṣọdẹ-àjẹ́ ti wà l""ákọsílẹ̀ ní Chattisgarh, Odisha, Gujarat, West Bengal Assam, Bihar, Maharashtra àti Rajasthan pẹ̀lú."', 'en': 'Cases of witch-hunting have been reported from Chattisgarh, Odisha, Gujarat, West Bengal Assam, Bihar, Maharashtra and Rajasthan too.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbà ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ kan ní 2014, Debjani Bora, ẹlẹ́sẹ̀ ehoro ọmọ bíbíi orílẹ̀-èdèe India ti fi ara kááṣá rí.', 'en': 'In a chilling incident in 2014, Debjani Bora, an Indian athlete had become a target in Assam.'}

{'yo': '"Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀rọ̀ọ Debjani, a f""ẹ̀sùn-un ìgbẹ̀mí ènìyàn púpọ̀ kàn án ní abúlée Cherekali tí ó wà ní kìlómità 180 láti Guwahati, olú-ìlúu India ti apáa ìlà-oòrùn."', 'en': "According to Debjani's statements, she was accused of being the cause of several deaths in Cherekali village located 180 km from Guwahati, the capital of the eastern state in India."}

{'yo': '"Olóríi gbọ̀gán àdúrà abúlé l""ó dárúkọ rẹ̀ tí àwọn ará abúlé sí fi ìyà jẹ́ ẹ."', 'en': 'She was allegedly named by a headman of a village prayer hall and brutally assaulted by the villagers.'}
{'yo': 'Ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ 2017 ní ipínlẹ̀ Rajasthan.', 'en': '2017 witnessed several cases in the state of Rajasthan.'}

{'yo': 'Lára èyí ni, ọmọbìnrin ogójì ọdún kan Kanya Devi rí ìkọlù tí a sì lù ú pa lẹ́yìn tí mọ̀lẹ́bíi rẹ̀ fi ẹ̀sùn kàn án ní agbègbèe Ajmer.', 'en': 'Among these, a 40-year-old woman Kanya Devi was attacked and beaten to death after being accused by her family members in Ajmer district of the state.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn Ẹni-tó-fara-kááṣá àti Ẹni-tórí-kó-yọ', 'en': 'Victims and Survivors'}

{'yo': '"Àwọn ènìyàn ń f""ẹ̀sùn kan àwọn ẹlẹyẹ fún iṣẹ́-ibi ọwọ́ọ wọn: ikú ènìyàn tàbí ẹranko, ọ̀dá òjò, àìso jìngbìnnì irúgbìn, àti bẹ́èbẹ́è lọ."', 'en': 'People blame accused witches for causing a slew of misfortunes: the death of a person or animal, droughts, crop failures, etc.'}
{'yo': 'Ìkọlù tí ó kọ lu àwọn obìnrin wọ̀nyí (àti àwọn ọkùnrin kan) rorò bí ẹranko ẹhànnà.', 'en': 'The attacks on these women (and some men) are vicious and inhuman.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà mìíràn, àwọn èsùn náà àti ìjìyà ẹṣé máa wá láti ọ̀dọ̀ mọ̀lébíi wọn.', 'en': 'At times, the accusations and punishment are meted out by their families.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn kan ń gbé tí wọ́n sì ń sọ ìtàn-an wọn tí wọ́n sì ń jà fún ẹ̀tọ́ọ wọn.', 'en': 'Some have lived to tell the tale and fight. Chutni Mahato of Saraikela in Jharkhand is one of them.'}
{'yo': 'Chutni Mahato ti Saraikela ní Jharkhand jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára wọn.', 'en': '"People from the region call her a ""tigress."""'}
{'yo': '"Àwọn ènìyàn láti agbègbè náà máa ń pè é ní ""tigress."""', 'en': 'She was accused of practicing witchcraft in 1995.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n fi ẹ̀sùn-un àjẹ́ kàn-án ní ọdún-un 1995. Láti ìgbà náà, ó ti yírapadà di ajìjàǹgbara olùtako ìfìyàjẹ àwọn obìnrin pẹ̀lú àtìléyìn Ilé-iṣẹ́-tí-kìí-ṣe-tìjọba.', 'en': 'Since then, she has transformed into an activist crusading against the victimization of women in the name of witch-hunting with the help of NGOs working to end the practice.'}

{'yo': 'Chutni sọ bí àìsí àtìlẹ́yìn tó késejárí ṣe mú u nira láti jà tako ìwà pálapàla yìí.', 'en': 'Chutni expresses how the lack of resources often makes it a struggle to fight against the practice.'}

{'yo': 'Ìbájẹ́pé àtìlẹ́yìn tó tó wá láti ọwọ́ àwọn oníṣẹọba àti ìjọba fún iṣẹ́ tí à ń ṣe níbí.', 'en': 'I wish there was more support from the authorities and government for the work that we are doing here.'}
{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, mo ti jìyà nítorí ìwà pálapàla yìí.', 'en': 'However, I have suffered because of this practice.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ènìyàn bá tọ̀ mí wá fún ìrànlọ́wọ́, mo máa dúró tì wọ́n gbágbágbá, ó sọ nínúu ìfọ̀rọ̀wánilẹ́nuwò orí ẹ̀ro-ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ kan.', 'en': 'When someone comes to me for help, I am always going to stand by them, she said in a telephonic interview.'}
{'yo': 'Dídá Ohùn Gbogboògbò Sí i', 'en': 'Formulating Public Opinion'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ẹni-tórí-kó-yọ àti ajàfẹ́tọ̀ọ́-ènìyàn rò wípé àwọn ènìyàn gbogbo kò ti ìfòpin sí ìṣọdẹ-àjẹ́ lẹ́yìn.', 'en': 'Both the survivors and activists feel that there is a lack of public opinion in support of ending witch-hunting.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ajàfẹ́tọ̀ọ́-ènìyàn tí a fọ̀rọ̀ wá lẹ́nu wò lórí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ yìí jẹ́ kí á mọ̀ wípé àbùkù ìrànwọ́ ìjọba àti àwọn onímọ̀ ni kò mú ìwà àìbójúmu náà ṣíra kásẹ̀ ńlẹ̀.', 'en': 'The activists who were interviewed for this story expressed a paucity of political will and intellectual engagement to provide the momentum required for the campaign against the heinous practice to succeed.'}

{'yo': 'Ohun tí ó dára jù lọ ni wípé àwọn tí ó ń tako ìwà burúkú yìí gbàgbọ́ wípé àyípadà lè dé.', 'en': 'A silver lining in this dark cloud is that people working against the practice believe that the situation can be turned around.'}
{'yo': 'Ní ọ̀rọ̀ọ Prem Chand:', 'en': 'According to Prem Chand:'}

{'yo': '"Akitiyan láti f""òpin sí ìṣọdẹ-àjẹ́ lè tẹ̀lé ìlànà tí ìjọba fi polongo ètò mímọ̀ọ-kọ-àti-mímọ̀ọ-kà."', 'en': 'The efforts for ending witch hunting can be modeled on the same principles that the government has used for promoting other social problems such as the literacy mission.'}
{'yo': '"Bákan náà, àwọn onímọ̀ ní láti f""ọwọ́ sí i k""áwọn ènìyàn ó ba f\'ohùn sí i."', 'en': 'Also, the intellectuals would have to lend their support to the cause to mold the public opinion.'}

{'yo': 'B. Vijay Murty, akọ̀ròyìn àti olùgbé Jharkhand ni ó gbọ̀rọ̀ sílẹ̀ lẹ́nu àwọn tí ọ̀rọ́ kàn.', 'en': 'The sources for the story were interviewed with the assistance of B. Vijay Murty, a journalist and resident editor based out of Jharkhand.'}
{'yo': 'Ìtọ́jú àwọn erin aláìlóbìíi Myanmar', 'en': "Caring for Myanmar's orphaned elephants"}
{'yo': 'Òṣìṣẹ́ àgọ̀ kan ń rọ Ayeyar Maung ní oúnjẹ. / Aung Kyaw Htet / The Irrawaddy', 'en': 'A camp staff member bottle-feeds Ayeyar Maung. / Aung Kyaw Htet / The Irrawaddy'}

{'yo': 'Àpilẹ̀kọ jẹ́ ti Aung Kyaw Htet tí ó kọ́ fún The Irrawaddy, iléeṣẹ́ oníròyìnin orí ayélujára ní Myanmar, tí Ohùn Àgbáyé ṣe àtúntẹ̀jádée rẹ̀ ní ìbámu pẹ̀lú àdéhùn ìbáṣepọ̀ tí ó wà láàárín wọn.', 'en': 'This article by Aung Kyaw Htet is from The Irrawaddy, an independent news website in Myanmar, and is republished on Global Voices as part of a content-sharing agreement.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ alábòójútó igbó rí i nínú ijù tí ó sún mọ́ Etí-omi Irrawaddy, oṣù mẹ́ta ni Ayeyar Sein nígbà náà.', 'en': 'When forestry staff found her deep in the jungle of the Irrawaddy Delta, Ayeyar Sein was three months old.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹsẹ̀ẹ rẹ̀ kan ti lu páḿpẹ́ àwọn ajérangbépa.', 'en': 'One of her legs was caught in a steel trap laid by poachers.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn onígẹdú ìjọba ló dóòlà ẹ̀míi rẹ̀, wọ́n sì gbé e lọ sí àgọ́ erin kan ní Agbègbèe Bago fún ìtọ́jú.', 'en': "Workers from the government's timber extraction enterprise saved her and sent her to an elephant camp in Bago Region for treatment."}

{'yo': 'Òhun ni ọ̀dọ̀ erin kẹjọ tí yóò rí ààbò ní Wingabaw, ibi ààbò fún àwọn erin Myanmar tí kò lóbìí.', 'en': "Now she is one of eight calves being sheltered at Wingabaw, Myanmar's only elephant orphanage."}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀dọ́ erin mìíràn, Ayeyar Maung náà rí nǹkan.', 'en': 'Another calf, Ayeyar Maung, endured a similar ordeal.'}
{'yo': 'Kí ó tó di èròo àgọ́ náà, erin oṣù mẹ́fà náà ti lu okùn.', 'en': 'Before his arrival at the camp, the six-month-old was snared in a wire trap.'}

{'yo': 'Ó sì há sí àárín àwọn òkúta nínú ijù kan náà tí a ti rí Ayeyar Sein, àwọn ọ̀wọ́ọ rẹ̀ tó kù fi í sílẹ̀ lọ.', 'en': 'As he was stuck among a group of boulders in the same forest where Ayeyar Sein was found, his herd was forced to leave him behind.'}
{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀, àwọn alábòójútó ijù tú u sílẹ̀, ó sì di aráa àgọ́ náà ní ọdún tó kọjá.', 'en': 'However, forest workers were able to free him and he arrived at the camp last year.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn méjèèjì ni erin aláìlóbìíi tí ó kéré jù lọ nínú àgọ́ náà; ọdún mẹ́rin ni erin tí ó dàgbà jù gbà lọ́wọ́ọ wọn.', 'en': 'They are the youngest of the orphans at the camp; the oldest is nearly four years their senior.'}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo wọn ni ó ní ìtàn kan tàbí òmíràn tí ó jẹ mọ́ ìjìyà láti ọwọ́ ẹ̀dá ọmọ ènìyàn adáríhununrun.', 'en': 'All have tragic backgrounds.'}
