{'yo': 'Bí ó bá jẹ́ ọ̀ràn ìfipábánilòpọ̀ ẹni púpọ̀, ẹ̀wọ̀n ọdún 20 ni àwọn ẹlẹ́sẹ̀ yóò fi gbára láì san owó ìtanràn.', 'en': 'In cases of gang rape, offenders are jointly liable to 20 years imprisonment without the option of a fine.'}

{'yo': "Síbẹ̀, Abala 47 ti Àbá òfin VAPP fi lélẹ̀ wí pé Abuja, olú ìlú orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà nìkan ni òfin yìí ti f'ẹsẹ̀ rinlẹ̀. NorthNormal àti àwọn iléeṣẹ́ mìíràn ti ń polongo kí gbogbo ìgbìmọ̀ aṣòfin ìpínlẹ̀ 36 ó sọ àbá yìí d'òfin.", 'en': "However, Section 47 of the VAPP Act stipulates that this legislation applies only in Abuja, Nigeria's capital. NorthNormal and other organisations have been campaigning for all 36 state legislative assemblies to domesticate this act."}
{'yo': 'Àtakò àwọn alágbàwí', 'en': 'Backlash against advocates'}

{'yo': '"Ọdún kan lẹ́yìn tí #ArewaMeToo gba ìgboro, Hashim sọ fún Ohùn Àgbáyé wí pé adi ìgbàwí wọn tí ó tú ""ìbàjẹ́ àwùjọ jáde,"" ó sì tún ní arapa tirẹ̀."', 'en': '"One year after sparking the #ArewaMeToo movement, Hashim told Global Voices that although their advocacy exposed the ""rot within society,"" it also took its toll."'}

{'yo': '"Hashim ní ìrírí ìyọlẹ́nu lórí ayélujára nígbà tí ẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ kojú ""ẹnìkan tí ó máa bá àwọn ọmọdé lò ní ṣísẹ̀ntẹ̀lé kiri àdúgbò"" ẹni tí ó ń ṣiṣẹ́ ní iléeṣẹ́ ìṣúná-owó gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìgbàwí orí ayélujára wọn."', 'en': '"Hashim experienced major online harassment when her group confronted ""an alleged serial abuser of minors"" who works at the finance ministry as part of their online advocacy."'}
{'yo': 'Ó sọ fún Ohùn Àgbáyé:', 'en': 'She told Global Voices:'}

{'yo': 'A ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ìpolongo tako rẹ̀ [abọ́mọdé sùn], kí ó bá gba ìwé ìyọniníṣẹ́ láti ọwọ́ mínísítà; àwọn kan kò fẹ́ bẹ́ẹ̀ torí ìdí èyí ni wọ́n ṣe gbé ìgbésẹ̀ ìpolongo ìyọlẹ́nu orí ayélujára láti sọ #ArewaMeToo di èyí tí ó lòdì sí òfin.', 'en': 'We launched a campaign against him [the serial abuser], demanding that he be sacked by the minister; some people did not like that so they orchestrated an online targeted harassment campaign to delegitimise ArewaMeToo.'}

{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Hashim ṣe sọ, àwọn ayọnilẹ́nu gbèrò láti sọ ArewaMeToo di ohun tí ó tasẹ̀ àgẹ̀rẹ̀ sí òfin nípa síso ArewaMeToo pọ̀ mọ́ LGBTQ [obìnrin-tó-ń-fẹ́-obìnrin, ọkùnrin-tí-ó-ń-fẹ́-ọkùnrin, àwọn abo àti akọ tí ó yíra padà di akọ tàbí abo àti àwọn ènìyàn tí ó ṣe àjèjì tí kò sí ní ìbámu] àti ète wọ́n ṣiṣẹ́ bí ìyọlẹ́nu orí ayélujára ṣe ń lékún sí i.', 'en': 'According to Hashim, harassers attempted to delegitimise ArewaMeToo by associating ArewaMeToo with LGBTQ [lesbians, gay, bisexual transgender and queer people] and their strategy worked as online harassment gained momentum, Hashim said.'}

{'yo': 'Ní orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà, ìgbéyàwó láàárín ọkùnrin àti ọkùnrin lòdì sófin bẹ́ẹ̀ náà ní abẹ́ òfin Sẹ́ríà àti òfin ìfìyàjẹ ẹlẹ́sẹ̀, ìbálòpọ̀ ihò ìdí àti ìbálòpọ̀ láàárín obìnrin àti obìnrin ní ìjìyà ní àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ kan.', 'en': 'In Nigeria, gay marriage is illegal and under Sharia and penal legal codes, sodomy and lesbianism are punishable in some states.'}

{'yo': 'Nípasẹ̀ dída ìgbésẹ̀ ìpolongo Hashim papọ̀ mọ́ ẹ̀tọ́ LGBTQ, àwọn ènìyàn ní orí ẹ̀rọ-ayélujára lọ́ ìpolongo wọn po wọ́n sì pe #ArewaToo àti NorthNormal ní ohun tí kò tọ́.', 'en': "By associating Haashim's movement with LGBTQ rights, online trolls distorted their message and framed #ArewaToo and NorthNormal as illegitimate."}

{'yo': 'Bí-ó-ti-wù-kí-ó-rí, Ohùn Àgbáyé kò rí àyè sí àwọn túwíìtì tí ó sọ ìgbésẹ̀ ìpolongo Hashim ní ìjà fún ẹ̀tọ́ LGBTQ.', 'en': "However, Global Voices was not able to independently verify tweets that pinned Hashim's movement to LGBTQ rights."}
{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀, Hashim ṣe àtẹ̀jáde àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ ìrètí sí orí Twitter:', 'en': 'Still, Hashim posts messages of hope on Twitter:'}

{'yo': 'Fakhriyyah Hashim, ọ̀kan lára àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ #ArewaToo àti NorthNormal (a gba àṣẹ láti lo àwòrán rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Fakhriyyah Hashim, co-founder of #ArewaToo and NorthNormal (Image used with her permission).'}
{'yo': '"Ó sọ wí pé gbogbo ìrírí yìí ran òun lọ́wọ́ láti ""ní ìfarada tí ó pọ̀"":"', 'en': '"She said all these experiences helped her grow a ""really thick skin"":"'}

{'yo': 'Ìrírí mi nípa ìgbóhùnsókè lórí ọ̀rọ̀ òṣèlú ní orí Twitter fún ìṣèjọba tí ó dára, ti kọ́ mi ní ìfaradà, àmọ́ ìyẹn kò mú mi gbaradì fún ọ̀kan-ò-jọ̀kan ìtakò tí a fojú rí látàrí ìpolongo ArewaMeToo àti NorthNormal.', 'en': "In my experience of being loud on political Twitter for good governance, I've grown a really thick skin, but even that didn't prepare me for the amount of backlash we got through ArewaMeToo and NorthNormal."}

{'yo': 'Àmọ́pé mo fi gbogbo rẹ̀ ṣe osùn mo fi para n ò sì jẹ́ kí ó fà mí sẹ́yìn, mo bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ní í ní ìrẹ̀wẹ̀síọkàn nípa ìṣèjọba Àríwá orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà àti bí wọ́n ṣe fi ọwọ́ mú ìwà ìfipábánilò...', 'en': "Though I mustered all of that and did not retreat to any cave, I did begin feeling demoralised about Northern Nigeria's governanace and response to sexual violence..."}

{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn ìkọlù kọ̀ọ̀kan, a máa ń ní okun àti agbára láti tẹ̀síwájú nítorí ìtakò mú wa rí bí àṣà ìdákẹ́ rọrọ ti ṣe rinlẹ̀ tó ní àwùjọ àti pé bí a bá fi àyè gba ìpanumọ́, a jẹ́ wí pé oko ìparun ni à ń fi orí lé.', 'en': 'After every episode of attacks, we did gather more strength and energy to push back because the backlash made us see how society enforced the culture of silence and if we allowed our lips to be sealed then that would be the real tragedy.'}

{'yo': '"Ó ṣeni láàánú, Hashim àti Ezekwesili ṣì ń janpata pẹ̀lú ìyà ""àìsí àánú ọmọlàkejì"" tí ó dìrọ̀ mọ́ ọ̀ràn ìwà ìjìyà àwọn obìnrin lórí ayélujára àti lójú ayé tòótọ́."', 'en': '"Sadly, Hashim and Ezekwesili still struggle with the excruciating ""lack of empathy"" that characterises discourse about gender-based violence on- and offline."'}

{'yo': '"Ní ti Hashim, ""ìmọ̀ọ́mọ̀ ṣààta ìgbésẹ̀ tí ó ń gbèrò láti fi ohùn fún àwọn tí ó ń jìyà ìfarapa"" nira láti gbá mú."', 'en': '"According to Hashim, this ""deliberate maligning of a cause that only seeks better for victims of sexual violence"" is incredibly difficult to grasp."'}

{'yo': '"Àròkọ yìí jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àkànṣe iṣẹ́, ""Orísun ìdánimọ̀: òfin gbàgede orí ẹ̀rọ-ayélujára bí ajere tí ń gbégi dínà ìdàgbàsókè ọ̀rọ̀ sísọ ní Ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀."""', 'en': '"This article is part of the project, ""the identity matrix: platform regulation of online threats to expression in Africa."""'}

{'yo': "Àtẹ̀jáde yìí ṣe ìbéèrè ipa ìdánimọ̀ ọ̀rọ̀ ìkórìíra tẹ̀gbintẹ̀gbin tàbí ìyàsọ́tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ tí ó dá fìrìgbagbòó lórí èdè tàbí agbègbè ilẹ̀ ayé, àṣìwífún àti ìyọlẹ́nu (pàápàá jù lọ ìyọlẹ́nu àwọn ajàfẹ́tọ̀ọ́ ọmọnìyàn àti akọ̀ròyìn l'óbìnrin) lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára bí ajere tí ó wọ́pọ̀ ní orílẹ̀ èdè Ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ méje: Algeria, Cameroon, Ethiopia, Nigeria, Sudan, Tunisia àti Uganda.", 'en': 'These posts interrogate identity-driven online hate speech or discrimination based on language or geographic origin, misinformation and harassment (particularly against female activists and journalists) prevalent in the digital spaces of seven African countries: Algeria, Cameroon, Ethiopia, Nigeria, Sudan, Tunisia and Uganda.'}

{'yo': 'Africa Digital Rights Fund ti Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA) ni ó kówó fún à kànṣe iṣẹ́ yìí.', 'en': 'The project is funded by the Africa Digital Rights Fund of The Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).'}

{'yo': '"Ní àwọn ìlú tí ó wà lábẹ́ ìsàkóso Assad ní ilẹ̀ Syria, àwọn alákòóso sọ báyìí pé ""kò sí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ààrùn kòrónà kankan"""', 'en': '"In Assad-controlled Syria, the official narrative is ""no COVID-19 cases"""'}

{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn ọdún mẹ́sàn-án ogun abẹ́lẹ́ tó gbóná girigiri, ètò ìlera ní orílẹ̀-èdè Syria ò ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀ gbópọn mọ́.', 'en': 'After nine years of a deadly civil war, the health system in Syria is barely functional.'}

{'yo': 'Ní àwọn ìlú tí ó wà lábẹ́ ìsàkóso Ààrẹ Bashar al-Assad, àwọn Aláṣẹ wọn ti tako ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ààrun COVID-19.', 'en': 'In territories controlled by President Bashar al-Assad, authorities deny the presence of COVID-19.'}

{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Fáfitì John Hopkins ̣ sọ, Orílẹ̀-èdè ọ̀hún ti sàwárí ìsẹ̀lẹ̀ Òjìlénírinwó-dínkan pẹ̀lú ikú ènìyàn mọ́kànlélógún títí di ọjọ́ kẹẹ̀ẹ́dógún osù Agẹmọ.', 'en': 'According to Johns Hopkins University, the country has confirmed 439 cases and 21 deaths as of July 15.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ìròyìn tí ó wà nílẹ̀ báyìí tí ṣe àfihàn bí ilẹ̀ náà ṣe takú wọnle tí wọ́n sì ń ṣẹ́ ìdánilójú pé ààrùn COVID-19 wà lóòótọ́.', 'en': 'But narratives on the ground reveal the ways in which the state has denied and repressed the realities of COVID-19.'}

{'yo': 'Walid Abdullah ọmọ ọdún mẹ́tàlélógún, sọ ọ́ di mímọ̀ pé ìlẹ̀ yìí tilè ṣe é débi pé wọ́n ń dába gbígba ẹ̀mí àwọn aláàárẹ̀ tí wọ́n bá funra sí pé wọ́n ní COVID-19.', 'en': 'Walid Abdullah, 23, says the state has even gone so far as to suggest terminating the lives of suspected COVID-19 patients.'}
{'yo': 'Ohùn Àgbáyé ń lo orúkọkórúkọ láti dààbò bó.', 'en': 'Global Voices is using a pseudonym upon request to protect his identity.'}

{'yo': 'Nínú ìtàkùrọsọ pẹ̀lú Ohùn Àgbáyé lórí ago, Abdullah ṣe é ní àlàyé pé ní ọjọ́ kẹtàlá ọsù èbìbí, òun pé Ilé ìwòsàn Àpapọ̀ ti Daraa ní ìha Gúúsù ilẹ̀ Syria láti fi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ààrun kòrónà kan tó wọn létí.', 'en': 'Speaking to Global Voices by phone, Abdullah explained that on May 13, he called Daraa National Hospital, in southern Syria, to inform them about a suspected case of coronavirus.'}

{'yo': '"Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Abdullah ṣe sọ, nígbà tí ó bèèrè ìgbésè tí ó yẹ ní gbígbé, òṣìṣẹ́ ìjọba tí ó gbé ìpè náà sọ pé "" Yìnbọn pà á, a kò ní ìwòsàn fún"""', 'en': '"When he asked what steps should be taken, the government hospital employee who answered the phone said: ""Shoot him - we have no cure for him,"" according to Abdullah."'}
{'yo': 'Ó yára fi òpin sí ìpè náà.', 'en': 'He quickly ended the call.'}
{'yo': 'Dájú, kò sí ọ̀rọ̀ nínú yíyin ìbọn pa ẹni tí a fura sí pé ó ní àrun COVID-19.', 'en': 'Obviously, the idea of shooting a suspected COVID-19 patient was out of the question.'}

{'yo': '"Abdullah sọ fún Ohùn Àgbáyé ""Ikú nípasẹ̀ COVID-19 sàn ju dídá ẹsẹ̀ wọ ilé ìwòsàn ìjọba lọ"""', 'en': '"""Death by COVID-19 is more honorable than to set foot in any public hospital,"" Abdullah told Global Voices."'}
{'yo': 'Èrí ìbanilọ́kanjẹ́ eléyìí tún kín in lẹ́yìn láti àwọn orísun mìíràn.', 'en': 'This harrowing testimony is corroborated by other sources.'}

{'yo': '"Àtẹ̀jáde ọjọ́ kẹwàá, oṣù Ẹrénà kan ti The Voice of the Capital, Iwé ìròyìn Olómìnira kan ní ilẹ̀ Syria sọ di mímọ̀, pé àwọn elétò ìlera láti Ilé-iṣẹ́ Ètò Ìlera ilẹ̀ Syria sọ pé ""Iṣẹ́ Ìmọ̀-ọ́n-mọ̀ṣekúpani ń wáyé ní ilé ìwòsàn ìjọba Al-Mujtahid ní olú ìlú ilẹ̀ náà, Damascus, fún àwọn tí wọ́n ní ìgbàgbọ́ pé wọ́n ní àrùn ọ̀hún ní tòótọ́, nípa fífún wọn ní àpọ̀jù oògùn tí ó máa ń rani níy""è."', 'en': '"In a March 10 report published in The Voice of the Capital, an independent Syrian newspaper, medical personnel from the Syrian Ministry of Health claimed that ""deliberate termination operations are taking place at the al-Mujtahid government hospital in the capital, Damascus, for those who are believed to be carrying the virus, through giving them additional doses of the drug [anesthetic]."""'}
{'yo': 'Èyí pẹ̀lú fi ara hàn ní orí ìkànnì alátagbà:', 'en': 'This claim also appeared on social media:'}

{'yo': 'Ẹlòmìíràn láti ilé ìwòsàn Mouwasat ni Damascus ni ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ tún jẹ́ dídì mọ́ ọwọ́ nínú àtẹ̀jáde kan náà tí ó sọ pé:', 'en': 'Another person from al-Mouwasat Hospital in Damascus was also quoted in the same article confirming this claim:'}

{'yo': '"""Iṣẹ́ Ìmọ̀-ọ́n-mọ̀ṣekúpani ń wáyé ní ibi kọ́lọ́fín pátápátá, àwọn dókìtà tí wọ́n ṣe iṣẹ́ ìtọpinpin àrùn ọ̀hún ni wọ́n sì ń ṣe é."""', 'en': '"""These terminations are conducted in complete secrecy and are carried out by doctors dedicated to following up on cases of suspected virus infection."""'}

{'yo': 'Ìgbésẹ̀ sáà ìṣèjọba Assad sí ìdẹ́kun àrùn COVID-19 yìí burú jáì, ó fi ara jọ ète tí wọ́n lò nígbà Ogun abẹ́lé Assad tí ó gba èmí ènìyàn tí ó lé díẹ̀ ní mílíọ̀nù, tí Ẹgbẹ̀rún lónà ọgọ́rùn-ún tí ó wà látìmọlé parẹ́ síbẹ̀, tí mílíọ́nù márùn-ún àbọ̀-ó-lẹ́ sì di ogunléndé káàkiri àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè àgbáyé.', 'en': "The Assad regime's desperate approach to dealing with COVID-19 parallels callous strategies used in Assad's war, which left 586,100 people dead, nearly 100,000 detained and forcibly disappeared, and 5.6 million refugees around the world."}
{'yo': 'Ìbẹ́sílẹ̀ Àjàkálẹ̀ Àrùn àti Ìtèsíwájú Ìsèjọba', 'en': 'Virus outbreak and regime survival'}

{'yo': 'Sáà ìṣèjọba Assad yìí ti sọ ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ìlú tí ó yí i ká sínú ìdààmú tí ó fi mọ́ orílẹ̀-èdè Iran náà, pẹ̀lú bí ó ṣe jẹ́ pé ilẹ̀ Syria ni ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ìlú tí ó yí i ká fi ń mí.', 'en': 'The Assad regime owes its survival to its key allies, including Iran. With few allies in the region, Iran has leaned on Syria as well.'}

{'yo': 'Ní osù Èrèlé, Orílẹ̀-èdè Iran di ọ̀kan nínú àwọn orílè-èdè tí Covid-19 ti ṣọṣẹ́ jùlo, ìbi tí ààrùn náà gbà wọ ilẹ̀ wọn ni ó ṣeéṣe kí ó jẹ́ Lebanon, Iraq àti Syria, níbi tí ìfarayíra ti ṣelẹ̀ nípasẹ̀ àjọṣepọ̀ àwọn Ológun.', 'en': "In February, Iran became one of the world's most COVID-19 affected countries and is a likely source of infection in Lebanon, Iraq and Syria, where Iranian troops have had physical contact through military cooperation."}

{'yo': 'Ní àfikún, àwọn Arìnrìnàjò-ẹ̀sin àti àwọn Arìnrìnàjò-ìgbafẹ́ láti Iran náà tẹ̀síwájú láti máa ṣe àbẹ̀wọ̀ sí àwọn ojúbọ ní Damascus títí di ọ̀ṣẹ̀ kíní osù ẹrénà (march) gẹ́gẹ́ bí Zaki Mechy tí ó jẹ́ ara àwọn Òǹkòwé March Study ti London School of Economics and Political Science (LSE) ṣe sọ.', 'en': 'Additionally, Iranian pilgrims and religious tourists, continued to visit Damascus-based shrines up until the first week of March, as reported by Zaki Mehchy, co-author of a March study published by the London School of Economics and Political Science (LSE).'}

{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀, Ìṣèjọba Assad ń tẹpẹlẹ mọ́ sísọ òfegè ìròyìn àti irọ́ lórìṣirísi bẹ́ẹ̀ ni ó tún ṣe àdínkù iye àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n ti ní COVID-19.', 'en': 'However, the Assad regime has pursued a policy of misinformation, prevarication and denial in terms of the number of COVID-19 casualties.'}

{'yo': 'Ní ìfọ̀rọ̀wánilẹ́nuwọ̀ pẹ̀lú ẹ̀ka ìròyìn ìjọba ilẹ̀ Syria ní ọjọ́ kẹtàlá Osù Ẹrẹ́nà, Mínísítà ètò ilera ilẹ̀ náà Nizar Al-Yaziji kọ̀jálẹ̀ lórí pé kò sí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ COVID-19 ní ilẹ̀ Syria, ó sọ pé:', 'en': 'In a March 13 interview with the official Syrian News Channel, Minister of Health Nizar Al-Yaziji insisted on denying the existence of any COVID-19 cases in Syria, saying:'}
{'yo': '"""A dúpé̩ ló̩wó Ọló̩run pé àwọn È̩ka Ológun ti fọ ilè̩ Syria mó kúrò ló̩wó̩ àrùnkárùn:"""', 'en': '"""Thank God that the Syrian Arab Army has cleansed the Syrian soil from many germs:"""'}

{'yo': 'Mínísítà ètò ìlera ilè̩ Syria kò tilè̩ kéde ìṣè̩lè̩ ààrùn COVID-19 àkó̩kó̩ ilè̩ náà títí di ọjó̩ kejìlélógún Osù Ẹré̩nà (March 22), èyí si ń fa ìbínú àti ìtutọ́sókè fojú gbà á ní àárín àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ Syria tí wọ́n ṣe àkíyèsí pé ìṣèjọba Assad ń parọ́, ó si ń tako ìròyìn ododo.', 'en': 'The Syrian Ministry of Health did not announce its first case of COVID-19 until March 22, causing resentment and anger among Syrians who noted that the Assad regime lied and pursued a policy of denial.'}

{'yo': '"Nínú ìwé àpilẹ̀kọ tí wọ́n fi sí orí ẹ̀rọ alátagbà-oníròyìn kan ní ilẹ̀ náà, ọ̀kan nínú àwọn ará ìlú fèsì sí ọ̀rọ̀ Yaziri, ó sọ pé ""ṣé o kò sọ nínú ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ tẹ́lẹ̀ pé gbogbo àrùn ni ó ti jẹ́ fífọ̀ kúrò ni"""', 'en': '"In an article published on an independent Syria 24 news site in response to Yaziji\'s claims, one citizen poignantly asked, ""didn\'t you say in your statement that all germs have been eliminated?"""'}
{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀ náà ìṣèjọba yìí ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ní sí ṣe àdíkù òǹkà iye àwọn tí wọ́n ní àrùn náà nínú àtẹ̀jáde wọn.', 'en': 'However, the regime has continued to report implausibly low numbers.'}

{'yo': 'Nínú àtẹjáde kan tí ọjọ́ kíní osù Igbe Àjọ tí ó pè fún Àtúnṣe Ìṣejọba Syria àti àwọn Ẹgbẹ́ Alátakò késí àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè àgbáyé láti fíná mọ́ ìṣejọba ọ̀hún, pé kí wọn ó gbé òótọ́ òǹkà iye àwọn tí wọ́n ní àrùn COVID-19 jáde.', 'en': 'In a statement dated April 1, the Coalition for Syrian Revolutionary and Opposition Forces called on the international community to put pressure on the regime to disclose verified data regarding COVID-19 cases.'}
{'yo': 'Ó gbé èrò rẹ̀ jáde lórí iye tí ó yẹ kí ó jẹ́ òótọ́, àjọ náà kọ báyìí pé:', 'en': 'Stressing the assumed existence of a large number of casualties, the coalition wrote:'}
{'yo': 'Ètò ìlera tí ó ti dẹnu kọlẹ̀', 'en': 'A broken health care system'}

{'yo': 'Gbígbà pé àjàkálẹ̀ ààrun yìí wà lóòótọ́ bu ìsejọba Assad kù nítorí pé òhun ni yóò jẹ́ kí àwọn aláṣe wọn ó fi tipá gbà lóòtọ́ pé wọn kò ní èka ètò ìlera.', 'en': 'Recognizing the pandemic is embarrassing for the Assad regime because it forces authorities to admit that the health system is non-existent.'}

{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bí London School of Economics and Political Science (LSE) ṣe sọ, àpapọ̀ iye àwọn aláàárẹ̀ COVID-19 tí wọ́n le wò ní ilẹ̀ náà kò ju ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́fà ààbọ̀ lọ (6500) nínú ọ̀gọ̀rọ̀ èníyán tí ó tó mílíọ̀nù mẹ́tàdínlógún àbọ̀ tí ó ń gbé ní ilẹ̀ náà.', 'en': 'According to the LSE study, the maximum number of COVID-19 infections that can be treated in the Syrian health sector is estimated to be only 6,500 in a nation of 17.5 million inhabitants.'}

{'yo': 'Ó ní bí iye àwọn aláàrẹ́ bá ti ju iye yìí lọ, ipá orílè-èdè náà ti pin nìyẹn, omi sì le tẹ̀yìn wọ̀gbín lẹ́nu.', 'en': 'If casualties exceed this capacity, the health system, already worn out by the war, is likely to collapse.'}
{'yo': 'Ní àsìkò ogun abélé náà, àwọn ológun ti ṣe ìkọlù tí ó lágbára sí ẹ̀ka ètò ìlera wọn.', 'en': 'Throughout the war, military attacks have caused widespread damage to the health sector.'}

{'yo': 'Àkọsílẹ̀ láti ọdọ̀ Àjọ́ WHO àti Ilé-iṣẹ́ ètò ilera ilẹ̀ Syria sọ ọ́ di mímọ̀ pé méjìdínlọ́gọ́ta nìkan ni ètò iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ pé nínú ilé ìwòsàn ìjọba ọ̀kànléláàádọ́fà tí ó wà ní ilẹ̀ náà.', 'en': "Data from the World Health Organization and the Syrian Ministry of Health show that only 58 hospitals are fully operational among the country's 111 public hospitals."}

{'yo': 'Àkọsílẹ̀ yìí tún fi hàn pé ó tó ìdá àádọ́rin nínú ọgọ́rùn-ún àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ elétò ìlera ilẹ̀ náà tí wọ́n ti kúrò láti di àtìpó àti ogúnléndé sí ilẹ̀ ibòmìíràn.', 'en': 'The data also noted that up to 70 percent of health workers have left the country as migrants or refugees, while the rest are often subjected to restrictions, including military and political interference.'}
{'yo': 'COVID-19 wà lára àjálù tí ó ń kujú ọmọnìyàn', 'en': 'COVID-19 amid ongoing humanitarian disaster'}

{'yo': 'Ó ṣeéṣe kí ó jẹ́ pé ohun tí ó jẹ́ ìdojúkọ àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ Syria jùlọ ni bí àwọn àjálù yìí ṣe rọ́ lu ara wọn; ogun, àjàkálẹ̀-àrùn àti iyàn.', 'en': 'Perhaps the biggest challenge many Syrians face is the accumulation of disasters: war, a pandemic, and famine.'}

{'yo': 'Àjọ Ìsọkan Àgbáyé ṣe ìkìlọ̀ ní ọjọ́ kẹrìndínlọ́gbọ̀n osù Okudù pé Syria ń fojú winá ebi àpafẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́kú, ìgbẹ́sẹ̀ níkíá sì nílò láti dèènà ìtànkálẹ̀ COVID-19', 'en': '"The United Nations warned on June 26 that Syria is now facing an ""unprecedented"" hunger crisis, with urgent action still needed to prevent the spread of COVID-19."'}

{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Àjọ Elétò Ounjẹ Àgbááyé ṣe sọ, òwọ́ngọ́gọ́ bá ounjẹ pẹ̀lú ìdá mọ́kànlá iye rẹ̀ tẹ́lẹ̀ ní oṣù Èbìbí yàtọ̀ sí ti oṣù Igbe, ó sì wọ́n sí i ní ìwọ̀n mẹ́tàléláàádóje nígbà tí wọ́n gbé e wò sí ti ọdun 2019.', 'en': 'According to the World Food Program, food prices rose by 11 percent in May compared to April, and 133 percent when compared to the same period in 2019.'}

{'yo': '"Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ètò ọrọ̀ ajẹ́ wọ́n ṣe dẹnukọlẹ̀. Ali al-Ahmed (orúkọkórúkọ ni èyí náà, gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹni yìí ṣe bèèrè fún ìdáàbòbò orúkọ rẹ̀) láti ìlu Daraa sọ fún Ohùn Àgbáyé ní orí ago pé ""nǹkan burú jáì, kò sí irú iṣẹ́ tí o lè ṣe, kódà kí wọn ó máa san Egbẹ̀rún mẹ́wàá owó ilẹ̀ Syria (láàrin Dọ́là kan sí márùn-ún) fún ènìyàn, kò le tóó ná."""', 'en': '"As the economic situation deteriorates, 28-year-old Ali al-Ahmed (also a pseudonym upon request to protect his identity) from Daraa city told Global Voices in a phone interview that ""the situation is bad, regardless of how much you work, even if you make 10,000 SYP a day [between $1 and $5 USD] it will not be enough."""'}
{'yo': 'Ahmed ní ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ẹrù ni àwọn ènìyàn ti kọ̀ sílẹ̀ láìgbà látàri ọ̀wọ́ngógó owó ìgbẹrù.', 'en': 'Ahmed said most people have been forced to forgo many basic goods due to exorbitant costs.'}

{'yo': 'Lásìkò tí ètò ìlera wọn ti dẹnikọlẹ̀ yìí látàari ewu ogun tí ó wu wọ́n tí ètò ọ̀rọ̀ ajé tí ó forí sánpọ́n sì ti sọ ọ̀pọ̀ ọmọ ilè Syria di Akúṣẹ̀ẹ́, Àjàkálẹ̀ ààrùn tí ò jà kiri yìí tún ti ti ìlú yìí sínú ewu àìkàsí àti ìdibàjẹ́.', 'en': 'Between a health care system shattered by years of war and an economic situation that has left many Syrians impoverished, the ongoing pandemic has pushed the country toward uncharted, catastrophic territory.'}

{'yo': 'Ìdánowò YKS ń lọ lọ́wọ́ pẹ̀lú mílíọ́nù méjì àbọ̀ akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ládúrúu gbogbo ìkìlọ̀: Ìjìnàsíra-ẹni láwùjo gan-an di àwátì.', 'en': 'YKS, with 2.5 million students, is taking place despite all the warnings: social distancing disappeared'}
{'yo': 'Àìgbọ́raẹniyé Ìdànwò YKS tuntun: ìwà rere', 'en': 'A new YKS controversy: morality'}
{'yo': 'Kì í ṣe COVID-19 nìkan ni famínfà tí ó yí Ìdánowò YKS ká ní ọdún 2020.', 'en': 'COVID-19 is not the only debate surrounding YKS in 2020.'}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ ló ti ń jà rànhìnrànhìn láti ìbẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ oṣù keje èyí tí ó nííṣe pẹ̀lú ìwé àyọkà fún ìdánwò èdè Turkish.', 'en': 'An even more impassioned discussion started in early July in relation to a text selected for the Turkish language exam.'}

{'yo': '"Ọ̀kan nínú àwọn ìbéèrè abẹ́ rẹ̀ tọ́ka sí ""Fırtınadayım, (mo wà nínú ìjì), orin olórin tàka-n-súfèé kan Mabel Matiz ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ LGBTQ."', 'en': 'One of the questions referred to the song by pop singer Mabel Matiz, a member of the LGBTQ.'}

{'yo': '"Ìbéèrè lórí ìtumọ̀ ""Gözümün gördüğü, göğsümün bildiği ile bir değil"" (tí a le tú sí ohun tí ojú mi rí kọ́ ni ohun tí aya mí mọ̀) ti ń da àwọn ìkànnì àwùjọ rú gùdùgùdù nítorí Mabel jẹ́ ẹni tí àwọn ọdọ́ mọ̀ bí ẹni mọ owó (Ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn fọ́nrán rẹ̀ ní ó máa ń ní olùwò tí ó tó àádọ́ta mílíọ́nù) àti ìṣe rẹ̀ lórí àwọn ohun tí ó jẹmọ́ akọ àti abo."', 'en': '"The question about the meaning of ""Gözümün gördüğü, göğsümün bildiği ile bir değil"" (which can be translated as ""what my eyes see is not what my heart feels"") has left its mark on social media because of Mabel\'s popularity among young people (some of his videos have 50 million views) and his sexual orientation."'}

{'yo': 'Ní ìbámu pẹ̀lú fàmínfà orí ìkànni Twitter, Halis Aygün Ààrẹ Center for Measurement, Selection and Placement (ÖSYM), ẹ̀ka ìjọba tí ó bójú tó ìṣètò ìdánwò sọ nínú ìfọ̀rọ̀wánilẹ́nuwọ̀ pẹ̀lú àgbà òṣìṣẹ́ ìròyìn kan, Yeni Akit. {'yo': 'Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ ló ti ń jà rànhìnrànhìn láti ìbẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ oṣù keje èyí tí ó nííṣe pẹ̀lú ìwé àyọkà fún ìdánwò èdè Turkish.', 'en': 'An even more impassioned discussion started in early July in relation to a text selected for the Turkish language exam.'}

{'yo': '"Ọ̀kan nínú àwọn ìbéèrè abẹ́ rẹ̀ tọ́ka sí ""Fırtınadayım, (mo wà nínú ìjì), orin olórin tàka-n-súfèé kan Mabel Matiz tí í ṣe LGBTQ ""Fırtınadayım"" (""I am in the storm""):"', 'en': '"One of the questions referred to the song by pop singer Mabel Matiz, a member of the LGBTQ+ community, ""Fırtınadayım"" (""I am in the storm""):"'}

{'yo': '"Ìbéèrè lórí ìtumọ̀ ""Gözümün gördüğü, göğsümün bildiği ile bir değil"" (tí a le tú sí ohun tí ojú mi rí kọ́ ni ohun tí aya mí mọ̀) ti ń da àwọn ìkànnì àwùjọ rú gùdùgùdù nítorí Mabel jẹ́ ẹni tí àwọn ọdọ́ mọ̀ bí ẹni mọ owó (ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn àwòrán-àtohùn rẹ̀ ní ó máa ń ní ìwò tí ó tó àádọ́ta mílíọ́nù) àti ìṣe rẹ̀ lórí àwọn ohun tí ó jẹmọ́ akọ́ṣebíabo."', 'en': '"The question about the meaning of ""Gözümün gördüğü, göğsümün bildiği ile bir değil"" (which can be translated as ""what my eyes see is not what my heart feels"") has left its mark on social media because of Mabel\'s popularity among young people (some of his videos have 50 million views) and his sexual orientation."'}

{'yo': 'Ní ìbámu pẹ̀lú fàmínfà orí ìkànni Twitter, Halis Aygün Ààrẹ Center for Measurement, Selection and Placement (ÖSYM), ẹ̀ka ìjọba tí ó bójú tó ìṣètò ìdánwò sọ nínú ìfọ̀rọ̀wánilẹ́nuwọ̀ pẹ̀lú àgbà òṣìṣẹ́ ìròyìn kan, Yeni Akit.', 'en': 'Following growing debates on Twitter, Halis Aygün, the president of the Center for Measurement, Selection and Placement (ÖSYM), the government body responsible for preparing the exam, gave an interview to far-right conservative media Yeni Akit.'}

{'yo': 'Níbẹ̀ ni ó ti sọ pé wọn yóò ṣe ìwádìí ọ̀rọ̀ náà, gbogbo àwọn tí wọ́n bá sì lọ́wọ́ nínú fífi ìwé náà si abẹ́ ìdánwò ọ̀hún ni wọ́n yóò lé kúrò lẹ́nu iṣẹ́:', 'en': 'In which he said the matter would be investigated and that those responsible for including the text would be fired:'}

{'yo': 'Ìdánwò YKS ọdún 2020 kẹ́sẹ járí kákàkiri àwọn ibùdó ìdánwò méjìdínnígbà (188) ní ìṣí ẹ̀ẹ̀mẹta, tí àwọn akópa nínú rẹ̀ sì ń lọ bíi mílíọ́nù méjì àbọ̀.', 'en': 'The 2020 YKS was completed safely and successfully in 188 exam centers in three sessions with the participation of approximately two and a half million candidates.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ìdánwò rẹ̀ jẹ́ èyí tí àwọn onímọ̀ akadá káàkiri àwọn fáfitì orílẹ̀-èdè wa ṣètò.', 'en': 'The question pool is created with the participation of thousands of academicians from different universities of our country.'}

{'yo': 'Ìkíyèsí àwọn ẹ̀kọ́ ilé àti ọgbọ́n ìbágbépò láwùjọ fùn àwọn ilé-ìwé gíga wa máa ń jẹ́ kíkíyèsí.', 'en': 'The sensitivity of the management of our institution about our national, moral values and social value judgments is clear.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ tí èyí bá ṣí mọ́ lórí ni wọn yóò di gbígbọ́n dànù kúrò nínú ìṣètò ìdánwò.', 'en': 'The members of staff responsible will be discharged from the process of question preparation.'}
{'yo': 'Fún àwọn asàmúlò ìkànnì Twitter kan, ìdájọ́ yìí kò tó:', 'en': "For some Twitter users, those measures aren't enough:"}
{'yo': '[Òkè] Ààrẹ ÖSYM sọ̀rọ̀ fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ lẹ́yìn ìdánwò!', 'en': '[Top] ÖSYM President spoke for the first time after the exam!'}

{'yo': '"""Wọ́n ti fi ìdí ìwádìí lọ́lẹ̀ láti wo ibi tí ìṣòro náà ti wọ́wá. Àwọn tí wọ́n bá lọ́wọ́ nínú rẹ̀ yóò di gbígbọ́n dànù kúrò nínú ìṣètò ìdánwò."""', 'en': '"""An investigation has been launched into the content of the problem. Responsible persons will be removed from the question preparation processes. """'}

{'yo': '[Ìsàlẹ̀] Kò tó [lá ti yọ ọ́] nìkan, Ààrẹ tí kò ka nǹkan sí náà gbọdọ̀ jẹ́ yíyọ kúrò nínú ìṣàkósọ gbogbo kí ojú rẹ̀ le wálẹ̀.', 'en': '[Bottom] It is not enough [to remove him], the neglecting president must be removed from the management process so that he is properly done with.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀wọ́ àwọn alẹ́nulọ́rọ̀ láwùjọ náà tún rí wí sí ìpinnu àti ṣètò irú ìbéèrè báyìí:', 'en': 'Conservative segments of society also question the intention behind the choice of that question:'}

{'yo': 'Nínú ìdánwò #YKS2020 tí ó wáyé lónìí, ẹ kò rí ẹlòmìíràn fi ṣe àpèjúwe fún àwọn ọmọdé wọ̀nyí àfi ọkùnrin oníbálòpọ̀-akọsíakọ nnì Mabel Matiz?', 'en': "In today's #YKS2020 exam, couldn't you find anyone else to show to teenagers other than the gay and LGBT advocate Mabel Matiz?"}
{'yo': '" (Ènìyàn tí ó gbé àkólé tí ó fi ń polongo pé ""Oníbálòpọ̀-akọsíakọ ni àwa"""', 'en': '" (The one who carries a banner saying ""we are faggots"") "'}
{'yo': 'Kí ni ẹ̀ ń gbìyànjú láti ṣe?', 'en': 'What are you trying to do?'}

{'yo': 'Èrò àwọn aṣàmúlò ìkànni Twitter kò ṣọ̀kan pẹ̀lú bí àwọn mìíràn ṣe ń tọ́ka sí àwọn àṣeyọrí Mabel Matiz àti bí ó ṣe lókìkí sí:', 'en': 'Public opinion remains largely divided as other Twitter users point out the success and popularity of Mabel Matiz:'}
{'yo': 'Èyin ọmọ ìgbìmọ̀ aṣèwádìí. Mo fẹ́ kí ẹ wo àwọn fọ́nrán Mabel Matiz.', 'en': "Dear investigative board members, I recommend that you watch Mabel Matiz's clips."}
{'yo': 'Nítorí pé a kò ní eléré mìíràn tí ó ti ṣe àmúlò àṣà wa tó báyìí ní ọ̀pọ̀ ọdún sẹ́yìn.', 'en': 'Because we have no other artists who have embraced our culture this way for many years.'}
{'yo': 'Ìdí nìyẹn tí mabelmatiz ṣe jẹ́ ìsúra wa.', 'en': '"That\'s why #mabelmatiz is the treasure of our land. He is a unique ""artist"""'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn èèyàn lórí ayélujára pé àkíyèsí sí i pé fífi ojú sun olórin tí ó jẹ́ oníbálòpọ̀-akọsíakọ, àwọn olóṣèlú yóò pa àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ tí ó ṣe kókó tì:', 'en': 'This netizen draws attention to the fact that by focusing on a gay singer politicians avoid addressing real issues:'}

{'yo': 'Kò sí ẹni tí ó figbe ta lórí àwọn afipábánilòpọ̀, síbẹ̀ ìwádìí Mabel Matiz ni wọ́n ń gbà bí ẹni ń gba igbá ọtí.', 'en': 'Nobody makes any noise about rapists, yet Mabel Matiz question becomes the subject of an investigation.'}
{'yo': 'Eléyìí kó gbogbo rẹ̀ nílẹ̀:', 'en': 'And this one concludes:'}

{'yo': '"Ẹ sọ pé ""ìdààbò bo ìṣe wa"" ṣùgbọ́n Mabel Matiz ni ẹni tí ó ṣe ìgbéjáde àṣà wa jùlọ."', 'en': '"You say ""our social value judgments"" but Mabel Matiz is the best reflector of our culture."'}

{'yo': 'Ó wa yẹ kí ìwádìí ó dá lé àwọn èyí tí ó tàbùkù Mabel Matiz tí wọ́n sì ṣẹlẹ́yàmẹ́yá rẹ̀. #MabelMatizisnotalone [Àtẹ̀jáde òkè]', 'en': 'Thus investigation should be about the ones who insult Mabel Matiz and discriminate against him. #MabelMatizisnotalone [Top of post]'}
{'yo': 'Èsì Mabel Matiz sí àìgbọ́raẹniyé náà', 'en': "Mabel Matiz's response to the controversy"}
{'yo': 'Ní ọjọ́ 3 oṣù Keje, bí fàmínfà náà ṣe ń gbóná sí i, Matiz padà la ohùn:', 'en': 'On July 3, as the debate became more heated, Matiz finally broke his silence:'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ǹlẹ́ o:) Inú mi dùn pé orin mi jẹ́ lílò fún irú ìdánwò pàtàkì bí èyí.', 'en': 'Hi:) I was very happy that my music was be the subject of such an important exam.'}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, ìyàlẹ́nu lójẹ́ fún mi bí ìgbéayé mi ṣe di ohun tí ó kan ìdánwò tí à ń sọ yìí.', 'en': 'Now I am amazed at how my personal values are subject of the same exam.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ wo ohun tí a fi dán mi wò..bí a ṣe gbé ààmi kan ní ìfẹ̀gbẹ́kẹ̀gbẹ́ pẹ̀lú orúkọ mi.', 'en': 'Look what I was tested with, while the geographical sign logo was about placed next to my name.'}
{'yo': 'Kò burú, Ìdánwò ayé kò lópin:) ', 'en': "Well, I say that life's exams never end:) "}
{'yo': 'Iyán tún di àtúngún wàyí.', 'en': 'Another roll call came from here.'}
{'yo': 'Mo ka ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn àtẹjáde tí ó ṣègbè lẹ́yín mi.', 'en': 'I read your intense messages of support.'}

{'yo': 'Òhun tí mo fẹ́ sọ nínú orin yẹn yémi, mó nímọ̀ pé ó yé ẹ̀yin náà, ara mi sì tún yá gágá sí i.', 'en': 'I understand what I want to say with my music, I sense that you understand me, and I feel even stronger now.'}
{'yo': 'N ó tẹ̀síwájú láti máa kọ orin sí i, láti máa sọ ìtàn àti láti jẹ́ ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè yìí.', 'en': 'I will continue to make my music, tell stories, and be part of this country.'}
{'yo': 'Ká tún pàdé nínú ìdánwò mìíràn...', 'en': 'See you in another exam...'}

{'yo': 'Matiz sì lókìkí síbẹ̀: lẹ́yìn ọjọ́ kan tí Aygun sọ̀rọ̀ sáfẹ́fẹ́, ó gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ méjì nínú ìdíje àmì-ẹ̀yẹ kan nípasẹ̀ ìbò tí ó pọ̀jù.', 'en': "Matiz remains very popular: Just one day after Aygun's statement, he received two awards in a competition based on the popular vote."}

{'yo': '"Ó gba àmì-ẹyẹ ipele méjì, ""Orin tí mùṣèmúṣè rẹ̀ dá múṣé jùlọ"" àti ""Olórin ọkùnrin tí mùṣèmúṣè rẹ̀ dá múṣé jùlọ"" ní ìdíje àmìẹyẹ Pantene Golden Butterfly ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kẹrìndínláàádọ́ta irú rẹ̀."', 'en': '"He won in two categories, ""Best Clip"" and ""Best Male Singer"" at the 46th Pantene Golden Butterfly Awards."'}

{'yo': 'Èyí fi hàn pé ọ̀pọ̀ ènìyá̀n ni wọ́n wà lẹ́yìn rẹ tako ọ̀rọ̀ ìbálòpọ̀-akọsíakọ tí ìjọba àti àwọn alẹ́nulọ́rọ̀ tí ìjọba ń sọ.', 'en': 'This seems to indicate that very large numbers of people support him against the homophobia expressed by the government and conservative citizens.'}
{'yo': 'Ní ọjọ́ 5 oṣù Keje, Mabel Matix tún túwíìtì:', 'en': 'On July 5, Mabel Matiz tweeted again:'}

{'yo': '"Mo gba àmì-ẹyẹ ""àwòrán-àtohùn orin tí mùṣèmúṣè rẹ̀ dá múṣé jùlọ"" àti ""Olórin ọkùnrin tí mùṣèmúṣè rẹ̀ dá múṣé jùlọ"" nínú ìdíje àmì-ẹyẹ Pantene Golden Butterfly ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kẹrìndínláàádọ́ta irú rẹ̀, Inú mi dùn!"', 'en': '"I received the ""Best Male Artist"" and ""Best Video Clip"" awards at the 46th Golden Butterfly Awards, I am happy!"'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ṣé gan ẹ̀yin olùgbọ́ mi gbogbo.', 'en': 'Thanks to all my dear listeners!'}

{'yo': 'Màá fẹ́ láti dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ Erhan Arik àti DOP Meryem Yavuz, àwọn tí wọ́n darí àwòrán-àtohùn [orin mi]', 'en': 'I would like to extend my thanks to Erhan Arık and DOP Meryem Yavuz, the precious directors of [my song]'}
{'yo': '"""I Have a Red in My Wipe"" clip tẹ́lẹ̀."', 'en': '"""I Have a Red in My Wipe"" clip."'}
{'yo': 'Bí ìlàrí bá fẹ́ tẹ́, a ní kí lọba ó ṣe?', 'en': '"When a courtier seeks disgrace, he asks, ""What can the king do?"""'}
{'yo': 'Bí iná bá dun ọbẹ̀, a dá ọ̀rọ̀ sọ.', 'en': 'If the fire gets at the stew, the stew will burst into speech.'}
{'yo': 'Bí kò sí àkópọ̀, kí lewúrẹ́ wá dé ìsọ̀ adìẹ?', 'en': "Were it not for the fact that they were brought transported together, what would a goat want in the chicken's stall?"}
{'yo': 'Bí kò sí tọ̀bùn èèyàn, ta ni ìbá jí lówùúrọ̀ tí kò bọ́jú ṣáṣá?', 'en': 'But for a person of filthy habits, who would wake in the morning and not wash his or her face clean?'}

{'yo': 'Bí mo bá torí oko kú n ó rò fáhéré; bí mo bá torí ọ̀gẹ̀dẹ̀ kú n ó rò fódò; bí mo bá torí alábàjà òkíkí kú, n ó rò fóríì mi.', 'en': 'If I die on account of a farm, I will lay my case before the hut; if I die on account of bananas, I will lay my case before the river; if I die on account of the famous woman with facial scarification, I will lay my case before my head.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ó di ọdún mẹ́ta tí ẹkùn-ún ti ń ṣe òjòjò, olugbe la ó ha rán lọ bẹ̀ ẹ́ wò?', 'en': 'If it has been three years since the leopard took ill, is it a monkey that one sends to ask its condition?'}
{'yo': 'Bí òfé ti ń fò la ti ń mọ̀ ọ́ lákọ ẹyẹ.', 'en': 'It is by its flight that the parrot proves itself a formidable bird.'}
{'yo': 'Bí òkú fẹ̀, bí kò fẹ̀, ká bi ọmọ olókùú léèrè.', 'en': 'Whether the corpse is distended or is not, one should ask the heir of the dead.'}
{'yo': 'Bí ojú bá rí, ẹnu a dákẹ́.', 'en': 'When the eyes see, the mouth remains quiet.'}
{'yo': 'Bí ojú kò bá rí, ẹnu kì í sọ nǹkan.', 'en': 'If the eye does not see, the mouth says nothing.'}
{'yo': 'Bí ojú kò bá ti olè, a ti ará ilé ẹ̀.', 'en': 'If the thief feels no shame, members of his household should.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ojú onílé bá mọ tíntín, tí ojú àlejòó tó gbòǹgbò, onílé ní ń ṣe ọkọ àlejò.', 'en': "Even though the host's eyes are tiny, and the guest's eyes are huge, it is the host who holds sway over the guest."}
{'yo': 'Bí olóde ò kú, òdee rẹ̀ kì í hu gbẹ́gi.', 'en': 'If the owner of a yard does not die, his yard is not overgrown with wild grass.'}
{'yo': 'Bí olóúnjẹ bá rojú à fi àìjẹ tẹ́ ẹ.', 'en': 'If the owner of the food is reluctant to share, one disgraces him by refusing to eat.'}
{'yo': 'Bí ọdún bá dún, bọnnọnbọ́nnọ́n a pàwọ̀ dà.', 'en': 'When the year is done, the bọnnọbọ́nnọ́n tree changes its color.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ọjàá bá tú tán, a ku olóríi pàtẹpàtẹ, a ku àgbààgbà sà-ǹkò sà-ǹkò lọ́jà; bÍfá bá pẹ̀dí tán, ìwọ̀-ǹ-wọ̀ a dìde.', 'en': 'When the market disperses, only the head of the market women remains; only the venerable elders remain; when Ifá has had his say, the genius that consults him arises.'}
{'yo': 'Bí ọjọ́ ewúrẹ́ bá pé, a ní kò sí ohun tí alápatà lè fi òun ṣe.', 'en': '"When a goat\'s day ""to die"" arrives, it says there is nothing a butcher can do to it."'}
{'yo': 'Bí ọ̀lẹ́ ò lè jà, a lè kú tùẹ̀.', 'en': 'If a lazy man cannot fight, he should be able to die disgracefully.'}
{'yo': 'Bí Ọlọ́run ò ṣe ẹni ní baba, à fi ìyànjú ṣe bí àgbà.', 'en': 'If God does not make one a father, one strives to act like an elder.'}
{'yo': 'Bí ọmọdé bá fẹ́ ṣìṣe àgbà, ọjọ́ oríi rẹ̀ ò níí jẹ́.', 'en': 'If a youth attempts to act like an elder, his age will stop him.'}
{'yo': 'Bí ọmọdé bá gun òkè àgbà, ó níláti gbọ́n.', 'en': 'If a child ascends the height of maturity, he/she must become wise.'}
{'yo': 'Bí ọmọdé bá ń ṣe ọmọdé, àgbà a máa ṣe bí àgbà.', 'en': 'When a child is being a child, an elder must remain an elder.'}
{'yo': 'Bí ọmọdé ń lérí bébé, tí kò ní baba, ti baba là ń ṣe.', 'en': 'If a child brags a great deal, but has no father, one acts the part of a father.'}

{'yo': 'Bí Ọya ń kọ lọ́run, bí Ṣàngó ń jó láyé, kò níí burú fún baba kó ní ó dọwọ́ ọmọ òun lọ́run.', 'en': 'Even if the goddess Ọya sings in heaven and the god Ṣango sings on earth, matters cannot be so bad for the father that he will say it is all up to his dead child in heaven.'}
{'yo': 'Dìgbòlugi-dìgbòlùùyàn ò jẹ́ ká mọ ajá tòótọ́.', 'en': 'The mad dog, and the person who behaves like a mad dog, both make it impossible for one to know the real dog.'}
{'yo': 'Dídákẹ́ lerín dákẹ́; àjànàkú ló lẹgàn.', 'en': 'The elephant has only chosen to remain silent; to the elephant belongs the forest.'}

{'yo': 'Eégún ju eégún; òrìṣá ju òrìṣà; Pààká lé oníṣàngó wọ̀gbẹ́.', 'en': 'Some masqueraders are greater than others; some gods are greater than others; the masquerader Pààká chases the Ṣàngó worshipper into the bush.'}

{'yo': 'Eégún ò na obìnrin lágọ̀; obìnrín tú kíjìpá ìdíi rẹ̀, ó fi na eégún.', 'en': 'The masquerader did not hit a woman with his shroud, but the woman unwraps her home-woven wrapper and hits the masquerader with it.'}

{'yo': '"Eégún pẹ́ lóde, ó fètè òkè dáhùn; wọ́n ní, ""Baba kú àbọ̀,"" ó ní, ""Hì ìì."""', 'en': '"The masquerader stayed too long on parade and is reduced to speaking with his upper lip. They said, ""Welcome, father,"" and he responded, ""He-e-e-e."""'}

{'yo': '"Eégún wọlé, ó ní òun ò rí Ejonto; Ejontó ní, ""Àkísà ni, àbí kíní wọlé?"""', 'en': '"The masquerader enters a house and claims he did not see Ejonto; Ejonto asked, ""Is that a rag that entered the house, or what?"""'}
{'yo': 'Eegun àjànàkú: ó há ìkokò lẹ́nu.', 'en': "An elephant's bone: it sticks in the wolf's mouth."}

{'yo': 'Eégbọn so mọ́ àyìnrín lẹ́nu, a ní kí adìẹ wá yán an jẹ; adìẹ́ mọ̀ pé òun náà oúnjẹ àyìnrín.', 'en': "A tick fastens on a fox's mouth and a chicken is asked to peck it off; the chicken, though, knows that it itself is food for a fox."}
{'yo': 'Ejò kì í ti ojú Ààrẹ gun ọgbà lọ.', 'en': 'A snake does not escape over the fence while a warrior watches.'}
{'yo': 'Èmí dákọ okòó, ìwọ́ dákọ okòó, ò ń pèmí ní mùkọ-mùkọ.', 'en': 'I bought twenty cowries worth of corn pap and you bought twenty cowries worth of corn pap, and you call me a corn pap addict.'}

{'yo': 'Èmi ìwọ̀fà, ìwọ ìwọ̀fà, o ní babá ní ká gbowó wá; o dá tìrẹ sílẹ̀ ná?', 'en': 'I am a pawn, you are a pawn, and you tell me the creditor sent you to collect his money; have you repaid yours?'}
{'yo': 'Epo ni mo rù; oníyangí má ba tèmi jẹ́.', 'en': 'It is palm oil that I am carrying; sandman, do not ruin my fortune.'}
{'yo': 'Erin kì í fọn kọ́mọọ rẹ̀ ó fọn.', 'en': "An elephant's trumpeting is never answered by its young's trumpeting."}
{'yo': 'Èrò ọ̀nà ni yó ròyìn ọkà tó gbó.', 'en': 'It is people who use the path that will spread the word about mature corn.'}

{'yo': 'Èsúrú ṣe fújà ó tẹ́ lọ́wọ́ oníyán; aláǹgbá ṣe fújà ó tẹ́ lọ́wọ́ ògiri; Ọlámọnrín àjàpá ṣe fújà ó tẹ́ lọ́wọ́-ọ̀ mi.', 'en': 'Èsúrú yam forgets itself and loses favor with the maker of pounded yams; the lizard forgets itself and falls into disfavor with the wall; tortoise-like He-who-will-remain-nameless forgets himself and loses all regard with me.'}
{'yo': 'Etí lobìnrín fi ń gbọ́ ohùn orò.', 'en': 'It is only with the ears that a woman hears the voice of Orò.'}
{'yo': 'Èwo ló tó ẹ̀kọọ́ gbà nínú ewé ìrúgbàá?', 'en': 'Which among the leaves of the locust-bean tree is adequate to receive corn-loaf?'}
{'yo': 'Èwo ni ti Síkírá nílùú Ìwó.', 'en': 'What business does Sikirat have in the town of Ìwó?'}
{'yo': 'Ewújù tí yóò tú ọ̀pẹ: gbogbo eyín ẹ̀ ni yóò kán tán.', 'en': 'The cane-rat that attempts to uproot a palm-tree will lose all its teeth in the attempt.'}
{'yo': 'Ewúrẹ́ ò wí pé òun ò ṣọmọ àgùntàn; àgùntàn ló wí pé òun ò ṣọmọ ewúrẹ́.', 'en': 'The goat did not say it was not sired by the sheep; it was the sheep that said it was not sired by the goat.'}
{'yo': 'Ewúrẹ́ kì í bíni ká lọ sísọ̀ àgùntàn lọ jẹ̀.', 'en': 'If sired by a goat, one does not go foraging in the realm of sheep.'}
{'yo': 'Èèyàn bí ọ̀bọ lọ̀bọ ń ya láṣọ.', 'en': 'Only people like monkeys have their clothing torn by monkeys.'}
{'yo': 'Èèyàn ò ríbi sùn, ajá ń hanrun.', 'en': 'Humans have no place to sleep, and a dog is snoring.'}
{'yo': 'Èèyàn tí ò nítìjú ojú kan ni ìbá ní; a gbórín a tó tẹṣin.', 'en': "A shameless person deserves to have only one eye, that one as large as a horse's."}
{'yo': '"""Ẹ fà á wọlé"" ló yẹ ẹlẹ́ṣin."', 'en': '"""Lead it into the stable"" is what becomes a horseman."'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ jẹ́ ká mí, ẹ jẹ́ ká simi; èèyàn ní ń fìdí èèyàn jókòó; èèyàn ìbá ṣe bí Ọlọ́run kò níí jẹ́ ká mí.', 'en': 'Let us breathe, leave us in peace; the fashion is for people to sit on their behinds; were humans in the position of God they would not permit people to breathe.'}

{'yo': '"""Ẹ kúulé"" ò yẹ ará ilé; ""Ẹ kú atìbà"" ò yẹni tí ń tàjò bọ̀; ẹni tí ò kí ẹni, ""Kú atìbà""-á pàdánù ""Ẹ kúulé."""', 'en': '"""Greetings to you, house-bound ones"" is improper for the house-bound to utter; ""Welcome home"" is not proper for the person arriving from a trip; whoever fails to give ""welcome"" to the person returning does himself or herself out of ""greetings, house-bound."""'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀bìtì ẹnu ò tàsé.', 'en': 'The mouth-trap never misses.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹgbẹ́ ẹni là ń gúnyán ewùrà dè.', 'en': "It is for one's peers that one makes pounded yam with ewùrà yams."}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀gbẹ̀rì ò mọ̀ pé arẹwà kì í gbé ẹ̀kú; gbogbo eyín kin-kìn-kin lábẹ́ aṣọ.', 'en': 'The novice does not know that a good-looking person does not wear a masquerade; all his perfectly white teeth are concealed beneath the cloth.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀gbọ́n ṣíwájú ó so aṣọ kọ́; àbúrò kẹ́yìn ó wẹ̀wù; bí a ò mọ̀lẹ, ọ̀lẹ ò mọ araa rẹ̀?', 'en': 'The elder walks in front, a loincloth draped over his shoulder; the younger walks behind, wearing a garment; if people cannot tell which one is shiftless, does he not know himself?'}

{'yo': '"Ẹlẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ́ ń lọ ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ́, o ní ""Ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ́gbẹ̀ta ni àbí ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ́gbẹ̀fà?""; èwo lo gbé níbẹ̀?"', 'en': 'A person says he has lost an unspecified amount of money, and you ask if the amount is five hundred cowries or eleven hundred cowries; which amount did you steal?'}
{'yo': 'Ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ ń pàfọ̀, ó rò pé òún ń ṣoge.', 'en': 'The pig wallows in mud, but thinks it is being a dandy.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ ò mẹ̀yẹ.', 'en': 'A pig does not know what is becoming.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹlẹ́ẹ́fà kì í lọ ẹẹ́fàa rẹ̀ ká sọ pé o di ìjẹfà tí a ti jẹun.', 'en': 'When a person proclaims the loss of six articles, one does not respond by saying one has not eaten in six days.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹni à bá fi sóko kó dàparò, ó ní òun ẹni ilé.', 'en': 'The person one would leave on the farm hoping he would become a partridge boasts that he is the indispensable presence of the household.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹni à bá tà ká fowóo rẹ̀ ra àdá: ó ní ìyà àdá ń jẹ òun.', 'en': 'A person who should be sold for money to purchase a machete bemoans his lack of a machete.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹni à bá tà ká fowóo rẹ̀ ra àtùpà: ó ní òun à-jí-tanná-wò-lóru.', 'en': 'A person who should be sold for money to purchase a lamp boasts that he is one-people-light-lamps-to-admire-at-night.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹni à bá tà ká fowóo rẹ̀ ra èbù: ó ní èlé òún kó ọ̀ọ́dúnrún.', 'en': 'A person one would sell for money to purchase quartered yams for planting: he claims that he has enough earnings to buy three hundred yam pieces.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹni à ń gbé gẹ̀gẹ̀ ni yó ba araa rẹ̀ jẹ́.', 'en': 'It is the person who is revered that will disgrace himself or herself.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹní bá dẹ ojúu rẹ̀ sílẹ̀ á rímúu rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Whoever gazes downwards with will see his or her nose.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹní dádé ti kúrò lọ́mọdé.', 'en': 'The person who wears a crown has outgrown childhood.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹni tí a bá ń dáṣọ fún kì í ka èèwọ̀.', 'en': 'The person who is clothed by others does not list what he will not wear.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹni tí a fẹ́ yàtọ̀ sí ẹni tó ní kò sí irú òun.', 'en': 'A person one loves is different from a person who says there is no one like him/herself.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹni tí a gbé gun ẹlẹ́dẹ̀, ìwọ̀n ni kó yọ̀ mọ; ẹni tó gẹṣin, ilẹ̀ ló ń bọ̀.', 'en': 'The person whom people have seated on a pig should moderate his or her strutting; even a horse rider will eventually come down to earth.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹni tí a lè gbé kì í dawọ́.', 'en': 'A person who can be lifted does not hang limp.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹni tí à ń wò láwò-sunkún ń wo araa rẹ̀ láwò-rẹ́rìn-ín.', 'en': 'A person whose appearance moves one to tears is moved to laughter by his own appearance.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹni tí a ò fẹ́, àlọ́ ò kàn án.', 'en': 'A person whose company is not desired gets no turn at riddling.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹni tí a ò fẹ́ nílùú kì í jó lójú agbo.', 'en': 'A person not welcome in the town does not take a turn in the dancing circle.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹni tí ìbá hùwà ipá ò hùwà ipá; ẹni tí ìbá hùwà ẹ̀lẹ̀ ò hu ẹ̀lẹ̀; ọ̀kùn tó nígba ọwọ́, tó nígba ẹsẹ̀ ń hùwà pẹ̀lẹ́.', 'en': 'The person one would expect to be reckless is not reckless; the person one would expect to be cautious is not cautious; the millipede with two hundred arms and two hundred legs behaves very gently.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹni tí kò lè gbé eèrà, tí ń kùsà sí erin, títẹ́ ní ń tẹ́.', 'en': 'A person who lacks the strength to lift an ant but rushes forward to lift an elephant ends in disgrace.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹni tí kò rí ayé rí ní ń sọ pé kò sẹ́ni tó gbọ́n bí òun.', 'en': 'It is a person with limited experience of life who thinks there is none as wise as he.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹni tó tan araa rẹ̀ lòrìṣà òkè ń tàn: àpọ́n tí ò láya nílé, tó ní kí òrìṣà ó bùn un lọ́mọ.', 'en': 'It is the person who deceives himself that the gods above deceive: a bachelor who has no wife at home but implores the gods to grant him children.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹni tí kò tó gèlètè kì í mí fìn-ìn.', 'en': 'A person who is not huge in stature does not breathe heavily.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹni tó tijú tì í fún araa rẹ̀.', 'en': 'The person who is self-aware protects his or her own reputation thereby.'}
{'yo': '"Ẹnìkan kì í jẹ́ ""Àwá dé."""', 'en': '"Nobody is entitled to say, ""Here we come."""'}
{'yo': 'Ẹran kí la ò jẹ rí? Ọ̀pọ̀lọ́ báni lábàtà ó ba búrúbúrú.', 'en': 'What sort of meat is it, the likes of which one has never tasted? A toad comes upon one at the swamp and cowers in fright.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀rúkọ́ ń ṣe bí ọkọ́.', 'en': 'The haft of the hoe is behaving like a hoe.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀ṣọ́ kì í gba ọfà lẹ́yìn; iwájú gangan ní ń fií gba ọgbẹ́.', 'en': 'A palace guard does not receive arrows on his back; he suffers wounds only on his front.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀wọ̀n tó tó ọ̀pẹ ò tóó dá erin dúró; ìtàkùn tó ní kí erin má ròkè ọ̀dàn, tòun terin ní ń lọ.', 'en': 'A chain as thick as a palm-tree cannot stop an elephant; the vine that proposes to stop the elephant from going to the grassland will go with the elephant.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀yá ló bí mi, ẹkùn ló wò mí dàgbà, ológìnní gbà mí tọ́; bí kò sẹ́ran lọ́bẹ̀ n kò jẹ.', 'en': 'I was born of a monkey; I was raised by a leopard, I was adopted by a cat; if there is no meat in the stew I will not eat it.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹyẹ akòkoó ní òún le gbẹ́ odó; ta ní jẹ́ fi odó akòko gúnyán jẹ?', 'en': 'The woodpecker boasts that it can carve a mortar; who ever used a mortar carved by the woodpecker to make pounded yam?'}
{'yo': 'Ẹyẹ ò lè rí omi inú àgbọn bù mu.', 'en': 'A bird cannot get at the liquid inside a coconut to drink.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹyẹ tó fi ara wé igún, ẹ̀yìn àdìrò ní ń sùn.', 'en': 'Whatever bird emulates the vulture will find itself behind the cooking hearth.'}
{'yo': 'Fálànà gbọ́ tìrẹ, tara ẹni là ń gbọ́.', 'en': "Falana, look to your own affairs; one's attention should be focused first on one's own affairs."}
{'yo': 'Fáàárí ọ̀bọ ò ju inú ìgbẹ́ lọ.', 'en': "The monkey's showing off is limited to the confines of the forest."}
{'yo': 'Gànràn-gànràn ò yẹ ẹni a bíire.', 'en': 'Unrestrained and thoughtless behavior does not befit a well-born person.'}
{'yo': '"""Gbà jẹ"" ò yẹ àgbà."', 'en': '"""Take this and eat it"" does not become an elder."'}

{'yo': '"""Gbà mí, gbà mí!"" ò yẹ àgbà; àgbà kì í ṣe ohun àlémú."', 'en': '"""Save me, save me!"" does not become an elder; an elder should not do something that will make him the object of pursuit."'}
{'yo': '"""Gbà mí, gbà mí!"" ò yẹ eégún; ""ẹran ń lémi bọ̀"" ò yẹ ọdẹ."', 'en': '"""Save me, save me!"" does not befit a masquerader; ""An animal is chasing me!"" does not befit a hunter."'}
{'yo': '"""Gba wèrè,"" ""N ò gba wèrè"" lọjà fi ń hó."', 'en': '"""Accept imputation of imbecility,"" ""I will accept no imputation of imbecility"" is the explanation for market noise."'}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo èèyàn ní ń sunkún-un Bánjọ; ṣùgbọ́n Bánjọ ò sunkún ara ẹ̀.', 'en': "Everybody laments Banjọ's fate, but Banjọ does not lament his own fate."}

{'yo': 'Gbogbo ẹgbẹ́ ń jẹ Má-yẹ̀-lóyè, ò ń jẹ Sáré-pẹgbẹ́.', 'en': "Everybody is taking the title Máyẹ̀lóyè (May-you-never-lose-the-title), but the title you receive is Sáré-pẹgbẹ́ (Run-and-assemble-the-associations' members; in other words, Courier or Messenger)."}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo ọ̀rọ̀ ní ń ṣojú èké.', 'en': 'The busybody is privy to all matters.'}
{'yo': 'Gbọ̀n-ọ́n-gbọ̀n-ọ́n kan ò sí, àfi ẹni tó bá ń ti ara ẹ̀.', 'en': 'There is no cause for staggering about, except for the person pushing himself/herself.'}
{'yo': 'Ìbàjẹ́ ọjọ́ kan ò tán bọ̀rọ̀.', 'en': 'The disgrace one incurs in one day does not disappear that soon.'}
{'yo': 'Ibi tí a bá pè lórí, a kì í fi tẹlẹ̀.', 'en': 'Whatever one names as the head, one does not tread the floor with it.'}
{'yo': 'Ibi tí a fi ara sí lara ń gbé.', 'en': 'Wherever one situates the body, there it inhabits.'}
{'yo': 'Ibi tí a fi iyọ̀ sí ló ń ṣomi sí.', 'en': 'Salt dampens only the place where it is placed.'}
{'yo': 'Ibi tí a pè lórí ní ń hurun.', 'en': 'The part one names the head is the one that grows hair.'}

{'yo': 'Ibi tí a ti mú ọ̀lẹ ò kúnná; ibi tí a ti mú alágbáraá tó okoó ro.', 'en': 'The place where a lazy person was apprehended bears no marks; the place where a powerful man was apprehended is broad enough to plant a farm.'}

{'yo': 'Ibi tí a ti ń pìtàn ká tó jogún, ká mọ̀ pé ogún ibẹ̀ ò kanni.', 'en': "Where one must recite genealogies in order to establish one's claim to inheritance, one should know that one really has no claim to patrimony there."}
{'yo': 'Ibi tí ayé bá ẹni ni a ti ń jẹ ẹ́.', 'en': 'Where life catches up with one, there one lives it.'}

{'yo': 'Ìbọ́n dídá olówó ló ní kíwọ̀fà rín rín rín kó sọ àdá nù.', 'en': "It is the master's engaging in silly antics that affords the pawn the opportunity to laugh so hard that he tosses his cutlass away."}
{'yo': 'Idà ahun la fi ń pa ahun.', 'en': 'It is with its own sword that one kills the tortoise.'}
{'yo': 'Idà ń wó ilé ara ẹ̀ ó ní òún ń ba àkọ̀ jẹ́.', 'en': 'The sword is destroying its own home, and it says it is ruining the scabbard.'}
{'yo': 'Ìdí méjéèjì tó olúwaa rẹ̀ jókòó.', 'en': 'The two buttocks are sufficient for their owner to sit on.'}
{'yo': 'Igúnnugún bà lé òrùlé; ojú tó ilé ó tó oko.', 'en': 'The vulture perches on the roof; its eyes see the homestead as well as the farm.'}
{'yo': 'Ìgbà tí ṣìgìdìí bá fẹ́ ṣe eré ẹ̀tẹ́ a ní kí wọ́n gbé òun sójò.', 'en': 'When the clay statue hankers for disgrace it asks to be placed in the rain.'}

{'yo': 'Ìgbà wo ni Mákùú ò níí kú? Mákùú ò mọ awo ó ń bú ọpa; Mákùú ò mọ̀ ó̩ wẹ̀ ó ń bọ́ sódò.', 'en': 'When will (or how can) Maku avoid the danger of dying? Maku does not know the mysteries of the cult yet he joins in its vows; Maku does not know how to swim and yet he jumps into the river.'}
{'yo': 'Ihò wo lèkúté ń gbé tó ní iṣẹ́ ilé ń díwọ́?', 'en': 'What sort of hole does the rat live in that makes him say that household work preoccupied it?'}
{'yo': 'Ìjàkùmọ̀ kì í rin ọ̀sán, ẹni a bíire kì í rin òru.', 'en': 'The wild cat never roams in daylight; a well-bred person does not wander around in the night time.'}
{'yo': 'Ìjàlọ ò lè gbé òkúta.', 'en': 'The brown ant cannot lift a boulder.'}
{'yo': 'Ìjokòó ẹni ní ń múni da ewé ẹ̀kọ nù.', 'en': 'How one sits causes one to carry the leaves used to wrap corn-meal to the dump.'}

{'yo': 'Ìjọba ń pè ọ́ o ní ò ń mu gààrí lọ́wọ́; ta ní ni ọ́, ta ní ni omi tí o fi ń mu gààrí?', 'en': 'The government summons you and you say you are busy eating cassava grains soaked in water; who owns you, and who owns the water with which you are eating the cassava?'}
{'yo': 'Ilé-ni-mo-wà kì í jẹ̀bi ẹjọ́.', 'en': '"""I-was-in-my-home"" is never the guilty party in a dispute."'}
{'yo': 'Ilé kì í jó kí baálé ilé tàkakà.', 'en': 'A house does not burn while the landlord lounges with indifference.'}
{'yo': 'Ilé kì í jó kí oorun kun ojú.', 'en': 'A house does not burn and fill the eyes with sleep.'}
{'yo': 'Ìlù kan ò tó Ègùn jó; bí a bá lù fún un a máa lu àyà.', 'en': 'One drum is not enough for an Ègùn person to dance to; if one drums for him he too will play a rhythm on his chest.'}
{'yo': 'Iná ń jó ògiri ò sá, ó wá ń gbá gẹẹrẹ gẹẹrẹ sómi.', 'en': 'Fire burns and the wall does not run from it; now it moves threateningly towards water.'}
{'yo': 'Inú burúkú làgbà ń ní, àgbà kì í ní ojú burúkú.', 'en': 'An unpleasant inside is what a venerable elder should have; a venerable elder should not have an unpleasant mien.'}
{'yo': 'Ipa ọgbẹ́ ní ń sàn; ipa ohùn kì í sàn.', 'en': 'The wound left by a cutlass may heal, but the wound left by speech does not heal.'}
{'yo': 'Ìpàkọ́ onípàkọ́ là ń rí; eniẹlẹ́ni ní ń rí tẹni.', 'en': "One sees only other peoples' occiputs; only others can see one's own."}
{'yo': 'Ìpéǹpéjú ò ní enini; àgbàlagbà irùngbọ̀n ò ṣe òlòó.', 'en': 'The eyelashes do not make dew; a venerable old beard does not behave like an ingenue.'}
{'yo': 'Ìrẹ́jẹ ò sí nínúu fọ́tò; bí o bá ṣe jókòó ni o ó bá araà rẹ.', 'en': 'There is no cheating in photography; it is just as you sit that you will find your image.'}
{'yo': 'Irú aṣọ ò tán nínu àṣà.', 'en': 'The likeness of a particular type of cloth is not lacking among those in fashion.'}
{'yo': 'Irú erin ò tán ní Àlọ́.', 'en': 'The likeness of an elephant is not scarce in Alọ.'}
{'yo': 'Ìrùkẹ̀rẹ̀ kì í yan Ifá lódì; oge, dúró o kí mi.', 'en': 'The horse-tail whisk does not shun Ifá; high-fashion maiden, pause awhile and give me a greeting.'}
{'yo': 'Ìsáǹsá ò yọ ẹ̀gún; ìsáǹsá kì í káwo ọbẹ̀.', 'en': '"The fugitive does not stop to pull a thorn ""from his/her feet""; the fugitive does not stop to clear dinner dishes."'}

{'yo': 'Ìṣẹ̀ ò ti ibìkan mú ẹni; ìyà ò tibìkan jẹ èèyàn; bí o bá rìnrìn òṣì, bí o bá ojú ìṣẹ́ wọ̀lú, igbákúgbá ni wọn ó fi bu omi fún ẹ mu.', 'en': 'Destitution does not attach to one at a particular place; suffering does not attack a person at a particular place; if one walks like a wretch into a town, if one looks like a loser when one enters a town, it is with a miserable calabash that the people will offer one water to drink.'}

{'yo': 'Ìtàkùn tó tó ọ̀pẹ kò tó pé kérin má lọ; ìtàkùn tó pé kérin má lọ Àlọ́, tòun terin ní ń lọ.', 'en': 'A vine as thick as a palm-tree trunk will not stop an elephant; whatever vine attempts to stop an elephant from going to Alọ will go with the elephant instead.'}
{'yo': 'Ìwà ní ń jọ oníwà lójú.', 'en': 'Character is always remarkable (or good) in the opinion of its owner.'}
{'yo': 'Ìwọ̀fà ní ń mú ìwọ̀fà jó.', 'en': 'A pawned person always dances with a pawned person.'}
{'yo': 'Ìwọ̀n eku nìwọ̀n ìtẹ́; olongo kì í gbé tìmùtìmù.', 'en': 'The measure of the rat is the measure of the nest; a robin does not live on a cushion.'}
{'yo': 'Ìwọ̀sí ní í ba ilé àgbà jẹ́.', 'en': "Trading insults brings ruin to an elder's home."}
{'yo': 'Ìyàwó tó na ọmọ ọbàkan, ọ̀rọ̀ ló fẹ́ gbọ́.', 'en': 'The wife who whips a relative of her husband is asking for stern rebuke.'}
{'yo': 'Jẹ́jẹ́ leégún àgbà ń jó.', 'en': 'Sedately is the way an elderly masquerader dances.'}
{'yo': 'Jòkùmọ̀ọ́ ṣe bí ẹ̀lú, aró la bẹ̀ lọ́wẹ̀.', 'en': 'The jòkùmọ̀ plant looks like the indigo plant; it is the indigo dye, though, we have use for.'}
{'yo': 'Ká ríni lóde ò dàbíi ká báni délé.', 'en': 'To see a person in the streets is not the same as going home with the person.'}
{'yo': 'Ká ríni sọ̀rọ̀ fúnni ò dàbíi ká sọ̀rọ̀ fúnni ká gbà.', 'en': 'Having people to advise one is nothing like knowing how to take advice.'}

{'yo': 'Ká wí fún ẹni ká gbọ́; ká sọ̀rọ̀ fúnni ká gbà; kà bèrè ọnà lọ́wọ́ èrò tó kù lẹ́yìn kàyè baà lè yẹni.', 'en': "If one is spoken to one should listen; if one is advised one should heed the advice; one should seek direction from straggling wayfarers in order than one's life might be pleasant."}

{'yo': 'Ká wí fúnni ká gbọ́; ká sọ̀rọ̀ fúnni ká gbà; à-wí-ìgbọ́, à-gbọ́-ìgbà ní ń fi igbá àdánù bu omi mu.', 'en': 'If one is spoken to one should listen; if one is advised one should accept the advice; refusal to listen to speech and refusal to accept advice leads to using the calabash of deprivation as a drinking cup.'}
{'yo': 'Ká wí ká gbà ló yẹ ọmọ èèyàn.', 'en': 'To heed advice is what best becomes a human being.'}

{'yo': '"Ká wí ogún, ká wí ọgbọ̀n, ""N ò fẹ́, n ò gbà"" laṣiwèré fi ń pẹ̀kun ọ̀ràn."', 'en': '"Whether one speaks twenty times or speaks thirty times, ""I do not like it, and I will not accept it"" is how the imbecile ends the discussion."'}
{'yo': 'Kàkà ká dọ̀bálẹ̀ fún Gàm̀bàrí, ká rọ́jú ká kú.', 'en': 'Rather than prostrate oneself in homage or obeisance to a Hausa person, one should rather die.'}
{'yo': 'Kàkà kí àgbò ké, àgbò a kú.', 'en': 'Rather than cry out, the ram will die.'}
{'yo': 'Kàkà kí bàbá ran ọmọ ní àdá bọ oko, oníkálukú a gbé tiẹ̀.', 'en': "Rather than the father carrying the son's cutlass home from the farm, each will carry his own."}
{'yo': 'Kàkà kí iga akàn ó padà sẹyìn, a kán.', 'en': "Rather than bend backwards, the crab's claws will break."}
{'yo': 'Kàkà kí kìnìún ṣe akápò ẹkùn, ọlọ́dẹ a mú ọdẹ ẹ̀ ṣe.', 'en': 'Rather than the lion serving as carrier for the leopard, each will hunt separately.'}
{'yo': 'Kékeré lọ̀pọ̀lọ́ fi ga ju ilẹ̀ lọ.', 'en': 'The toad is only slightly taller than the earth.'}

{'yo': 'Kí ẹrú mọ ara ẹ̀ lẹ́rú; kí ìwọ̀fà mọ ara ẹ̀ níwọ̀fà; kí ọmọlúwàbí mọ ara ẹ̀ lẹ́rú Ọlọ́run ọba.', 'en': 'Let the slave know him/herself as a slave; let the pawn know him/herself as a pawn; let the well born person know him/herself as the child of God.'}
{'yo': 'Kì í dọwọ́ọ baba kó ló di ọwọ́ ọmọ.', 'en': "Responsibility does not devolve on the father only for him to say it is his son's duty."}
{'yo': 'Kí ni àǹfàní kẹ̀tẹ̀kẹ̀tẹ̀ lára kẹ́tẹ́kẹ́tẹ́ à-gùn-fẹsẹ̀-wọ́lẹ̀?', 'en': "What is the point of bragging on account of an ass which when one rides on it one's feet drag on the ground?"}
{'yo': 'Kí ni apárí ń wá ní ìsọ̀ onígbàjámọ̀?', 'en': 'What does a bald man want in the stall of the barber?'}
{'yo': 'Kí ni Dáàró ní kó tó sọ pé olèé kó òun?', 'en': 'What did Dáàró own before he claimed he was robbed?'}
{'yo': 'Kí ni eléwée gbégbé ń tà tí ó ń sọ pé ọjà ò tà?', 'en': 'What is it that the seller of gbégbé leaves has to sell that she complains that the market is slow?'}
{'yo': 'Kí ni ìbá mú igún dé ọ̀dọ̀ọ onídìrí?', 'en': 'What would take the vulture to the stall of the hair dresser?'}

{'yo': '"Kí ni ó yá àpọ́n lórí tó fiṣu síná tó ń súfèé pé ""bí a ti ń ṣe ni inú ń bí wọn""?"', 'en': '"What has the bachelor to feel superior about, such that while he is roasting yams he is whistling the song, ""What one does fills them with jealousy""?"'}
{'yo': 'Kí ni onígbá ń ṣe tí aláwo ò lè ṣe?', 'en': 'What is the calabash owner doing that the china plate owner cannot do?'}

{'yo': 'Kí ni orí ń ṣe tí èjìká ò lè ṣe? Èjìká ru ẹrù ó gba ọ̀ọ́dúnrún; orí ta tiẹ̀ ní ogúnlúgba.', 'en': 'What can the head do that the shoulder cannot do? The shoulder carried a load and earned three hundred cowries; the head sold its own for two hundred and twenty cowries.'}
{'yo': 'Kí ni wọ́n ti ń ṣe Àmọ́dù nÍlọrin? Ewúrẹ́ ń jẹ́ bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': 'What use do the people of Ilorin have for Ahmadu? Even goats are so named.'}

{'yo': 'Kíjìpá laṣọ ọ̀lẹ; òfì laṣọ àgbà; àgbà tí ò ní tòfì a rọ́jú ra kíjìpá.', 'en': 'Durable hand-woven cloth is the material for shiftless people; loom-woven cloth is the material for the elders; whichever elder cannot afford loom-woven cloth should strive for durable hand-woven cloth.'}
{'yo': 'Kò rà, kò lówó lọ́wọ́, ó ń wú tutu níwájú onítumpulu.', 'en': 'He does not buy, he has no money, yet he sits sulkily before the seller of bean fritters.'}
{'yo': 'Kò sí ẹni tó dùn mọ́ àfi orí ẹni.', 'en': '"There is no one pleased ""by one\'s success"" except one\'s head."'}
{'yo': 'Kò sí mi lájọ àjọ ò kún: ara ẹ̀ ló tàn jẹ.', 'en': 'Without-me-in-an-assembly-the-assembly-is-not-complete deceives only himself/herself.'}
{'yo': 'Kò sí ohun tí Ṣàngó lè ṣe kó jà lẹ́ẹ̀rùn.', 'en': 'There is nothing Ṣango can do to enable itself to rage in a drought.'}
{'yo': 'Kò-sí-nílé kì í jagun ẹnu tì.', 'en': 'He-was-not-at-home never fails to prove his valor with his mouth.'}
{'yo': 'Kó-tán-kó-tán lajá ń lá omi.', 'en': 'Swiftly-consumed-swiftly-consumed is the way a dog laps up water.'}
{'yo': 'Labalábá fi ara ẹ̀ wẹ́yẹ, kò lè ṣe ìṣe ẹyẹ.', 'en': 'The butterfly likens itself to a bird, but it cannot do what a bird can do.'}

{'yo': 'Lábúlábú fara wé aró, kò lè ṣe bí aró; pòpòǹdó fara wé àgbàdo.', 'en': 'Ash mixed with water likens itself to indigo dye, but it cannot do what the dye can do; the large red bean likens itself to corn.'}

{'yo': 'Lágbájá ìbá wà a di ìjímèrè; ẹni tó bá níwájú di oloyo?', 'en': 'Were So-and-So alive he would transform himself into a brown monkey; did the person who preceded him ever transform himself into any kind of monkey?'}
{'yo': 'Láká-ǹ-láká ò ṣéé fi làjà; ọmọ eégún ò ṣéé gbé ṣeré.', 'en': "A limp is no great asset for a person wishing to stop a fight; a masquerader's child is no easy playmate."}
{'yo': 'Lásán kọ́ là ń dé ẹtù; ó ní ẹni tórí ẹ̀ ń bá ẹtù mu.', 'en': 'One does not wear ẹtù cap as a matter of course; only certain people have heads suited for such a cap.'}
{'yo': 'Lékèélékèé ò yé ẹyin dúdú; funfun ni wọ́n ńy é ẹyin wọn.', 'en': 'Cattle egrets never lay black eggs; only white eggs do they lay.'}

{'yo': 'Má tẹ̀ẹ́ lọ́wọ́ oníle, má tẹ̀ẹ́ lọ́wọ́ àlejò; lọ́wọ́ ara ẹni la ti ń tẹ́.', 'en': 'Save face with members of your household and save face with complete strangers, such a person loses face with himself/herself.'}
{'yo': 'Màlúù ò lè lérí níwájú ẹṣin.', 'en': 'A cow may not boast in the presence of a horse.'}
{'yo': 'Mànàmáná ò ṣéé sun iṣu.', 'en': 'Lightning is no good for roasting yams.'}
{'yo': '"""M̀bá wà lỌ́yọ̀ọ́ mà ti so ẹṣin""; àgùntàn-an rẹ̀ á níye nílẹ̀yí."', 'en': '"""Were I at Ọ̀yọ́ I would own a horse by now"": he should have numerous sheep to his name in this town."'}
{'yo': 'Mélòó lÈjìgbò tí ọ̀kan ẹ̀ ń jẹ́ Ayé-gbogbo?', 'en': '"How large a community is Ejigbo that one of its settlements is named Ayegbogbo ""The whole world""?"'}
{'yo': 'Mo dàgbà mo dàgó, aré ọmọdé ò tán lójúù mi.', 'en': 'I have become old and wise, but childish play has not ceased to appeal to me.'}
{'yo': 'Mo dàgbà tán èweé wù mí.', 'en': 'Having grown old I miss youthfulness.'}
{'yo': '"""Mo dára, mo dára,"" àìdára ní ń pẹ̀kun ẹ̀."', 'en': '"""I am beautiful, I am beautiful!"" has ugliness as its conclusion."'}
{'yo': '"""Mo gbọ́n tán, mo mọ̀ràn tán"" kì í jẹ́ kí agbọ́n lóró bí oyin."', 'en': '"""I am all-wise, I am all-knowing"" kept the wasp from having as much venom as the bee."'}
{'yo': '"Compare ""Mo mọ̀-ọ́ gùn"" . . ."', 'en': '"and also ""Mo mọ̀-ọ́ gún,"" . . ."'}
{'yo': '"Compare ""Mo gbọ́n tán, . . . """', 'en': '"""Mo mọ̀-ọ́ tan,."" . ."'}
{'yo': 'Compare the preceding entry,', 'en': '"also ""Mo gbọ́n tan, . . . """'}
{'yo': '"Compare ""Mo gbọ́n tán, . . . """', 'en': '"and ""Mo mỌ̀bàrà..."""'}
{'yo': '"Compare ""Mo gbọ́n tan, . . . """', 'en': '"""Mo mọ̀-ọ́ gùn, . . ."""'}

{'yo': '"""Mo yó"" ń jẹ́ ""mo yó,"" ""mo kọ̀"" ń jẹ́ ""mo kọ̀""; jẹun ǹṣó, àgbà ọ̀kánjúwà ni."', 'en': '"""I am full"" means ""I am full""; ""I decline"" means ""I decline""; eating with abandon, that is the father of all greediness."'}

{'yo': '"""N óò gba owóò mi lára ṣòkòtò yìí""; ìdí làgbàlagbà ń ṣí sílẹ̀."', 'en': '"""I will get my money\'s worth out of these trousers""; the grown man only winds up exposing his bare buttocks to the world."'}
{'yo': '"Nláńlá lọmọ abuké ń dá: ó ní ""Ìyá, ìyá, òun ó pọ̀n."""', 'en': '"The humpback\'s child has presented a formidable dilemma: he cries, ""Mother, mother, carry me on your back!"""'}
{'yo': 'Níbo lo forúkọ sí tí ò ń jẹ́ Làm̀bòròkí?', 'en': 'Where did you discard all other names and picked for yourself the name Làm̀bòròkí?'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà tí à ń to ọkà a ò to ti ẹmọ́ si.', 'en': 'When we were stacking the corn we did not stack some for the brown rat.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà tí o mọ̀ ọ́ gùn, ẹṣin ẹ ẹ́ ṣe ṣẹ́ orókún?', 'en': 'Since you claim to be a seasoned rider, how come your horse has gone lame?'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà wo làpò ẹkùn-ún di ìkálá fọ́mọdé?', 'en': 'Since when did a tiger-hide sac become a thing a child uses to harvest okro?'}
{'yo': 'Ó bọ́ lọ́wọ́ iyọ̀ ó dòbu.', 'en': 'Salt loses its good quality and becomes like saltpeter.'}
{'yo': 'Ó bọ́ lọ́wọ́ oṣù ó dàràn-mọ́jú.', 'en': 'The moon loses its esteem and shines all night long.'}
{'yo': 'O dájú dánu, o ò mọ ẹ̀sán mẹ́sàn-án.', 'en': 'Your eyes flinch not and your mouth is unstoppable, but you do not know nine times nine.'}
{'yo': 'Ó di àwùjọ ṣòkòtò kí ládugbó tó mọ ara rẹ̀ Lábèṣè.', 'en': 'Not until the gathering of trousers will Ládugbo know itself as a miscreant.'}
{'yo': 'Ó di ọjọ́ alẹ́ kábuké tó mọ̀ pé iké kì í ṣọmọ.', 'en': 'It will not be until the end of days before the humpback realizes that a hump is not a child.'}
{'yo': 'O kò mọ ẹ̀wà lóńjẹ à-jẹ-sùn.', 'en': 'You do not know what black eyed peas are like for dinner.'}
{'yo': 'Ò ń jàgbọ̀nrín èṣín lọ́bẹ̀, o ní o ti tó tán.', 'en': "You are reduced to eating last year's antelope in your stew, and yet you claim to have attained the height of good fortune."}
{'yo': 'O ru ládugbó ò ń rerá; kí ni ká sọ fẹ́ni tó ru Òrìṣàa Yemọja?', 'en': 'Because you are carrying a huge pot you strut; what would one say to the person carrying the divinity Yemoja?'}

{'yo': 'Ó tọ́ kí eégún léni lóko àgbàdo, èwo ni ti Pákọ̀kọ̀ láàrin ìlú?', 'en': 'It might be seemly for a masquerader to chase one off a corn farm, but it is not seemly for Pákọ̀kọ̀ to chase one in the middle of town.'}
{'yo': 'Ó yẹ ẹni gbogbo kó sọ pé iṣu ò jiná, kò yẹ alubàtá.', 'en': 'Everybody has a right to say the yams are not well cooked, but not the bàtá drummer.'}
{'yo': 'Ó yẹ ẹni gbogbo kó dínwó aró, kò yẹ atọ̀ọ́lé.', 'en': 'It is fitting for everybody to bargain to reduce the cost of dyeing clothes, but not the bed wetter.'}
{'yo': '"Ó yẹ ẹni gbogbo kó sọ pé ""Ọlọ́run a-ṣèkan-má-kù,"" kò yẹ akúkó."', 'en': '"Everyone can justifiably say, ""God, who has left nothing undone,"" but not a eunuch."'}

{'yo': 'Odò kékeré lalákàn-án ti lè fọ́ epo; bó bá di àgàdàm̀gbá tán, odò a gbé alákàn lọ.', 'en': 'It is only in a small stream that the crab can make its oil; when it becomes huge and swift the river sweeps the crab away.'}
{'yo': 'Òfin ni yó sọ ara ẹ̀; ìyàwó tí ń na ọmọ ìyáálé.', 'en': '"The law will assert itself, ""as in the case of"" a junior wife flogging the child of the senior wife."'}
{'yo': 'Ogun tí olójú méjì rí sá ni olójú kan ní òún ń lọ jà.', 'en': 'The war that the two-eyed person saw and fled is the same the one-eyed person vows he will join.'}

{'yo': 'Ohun méjì ló yẹ Ẹ̀ṣọ́: Ẹ̀ṣọ́ jà, ó lé ogun; Ẹ̀ṣọ́ jà ó kú sógun.', 'en': 'Only two things are proper for a warrior: the warrior goes to war and drives the enemy off; the warrior goes to war and dies in battle.'}
{'yo': 'Ohun tí à ń tà là ń jẹ; kì í ṣe ọ̀rọ̀ oní-kẹrosíìnì.', 'en': 'What one sells is what one eats; that does not apply to the kerosene seller.'}
{'yo': 'Ohun tí eèrá bá lè gbé ní ń pè ní ìgànnìkó.', 'en': 'Whatever the ant is able to carry is what it says is its full measure.'}
{'yo': 'Ohun tí ìrẹ̀ẹ́ ṣe tó fi kán lápá, aláàńtèté ní kí wọ́n jẹ́ kí òun ó ṣe è.', 'en': 'That which the cricket attempted and broke a thigh, the aláàńtètè asks to be permitted to attempt.'}
{'yo': 'Ohun tí kò tó okòó kì í jẹ àgbà níyà.', 'en': 'A thing that is not worth the least amount of money should not prove a hardship for an elder.'}
{'yo': 'Ohun tí wèré fi ń s̩e ara ẹ̀, ó pọ̀ ju ohun tó fi ń ṣẹ ọmọ ẹlòmíràn lọ.', 'en': 'What the imbecile does to himself is far worse than what he does to others.'}

{'yo': '"Ohun tó ṣeé faga là ń faga sí; èwo ni,""Ìwòyí àná mo ti na ànaà mi fága-fàga""?"', 'en': '"One boasts only about things proper to boast about; whoever heard of the boast, ""By this time yesterday I had given my parent-in-law the beating of his life.""?"'}
{'yo': 'Ojú àlejò la ti ń jẹ gbèsè; ẹ̀yìn-in ẹ̀ là ń san án.', 'en': "It is in a visitor's presence that one gets into debt; it is in her absence that one repays the debt."}
{'yo': 'Ojú baba ara; awọ́n bí ojú; aṣòró dà bí àgbà.', 'en': 'The eye, father of the body; nothing is as valuable as the eye; nothing is as difficult to achieve as the status of elder.'}
{'yo': 'Ojú iná kọ́ lewùrà ń hurun.', 'en': 'It is not in the presence of the flame that water-yam grows hair.'}

{'yo': 'Ojú kì í pọ́n ẹdun kó dẹni ilẹ̀; ìṣẹ́ kì í ṣẹ́ igún kó di ojúgbà adìẹ.', 'en': 'The colobus monkey is never so reduced in circumstances that it becomes a land-hugging creature; the vulture is never so badly off that it becomes the equal of a chicken.'}
{'yo': 'Ojú kì í pọ́n baálé ilé kó fọwọ́ gbálẹ̀ ilé ẹ̀.', 'en': 'A head of a household is never so hard up that he sweeps his compound with his bare hands.'}
{'yo': 'Ojú kì í pọ́n babaláwo kó bèèrè ẹbọ àná.', 'en': "An Ifá diviner-priest is never so hard up that he asks for yesterday's sacrifice."}
{'yo': 'Ojú kì í pọ́n òkú ọ̀run kó ní kí ará ayé gba òun.', 'en': 'A dead person cannot be so desperate as to appeal to a living person for deliverance.'}
{'yo': 'Ojú kì í pọ́nni ká fàbúrò ẹni ṣaya.', 'en': "One should not become so desperate that one takes one's younger sister as wife."}
{'yo': 'Ojú kì í pọnni ká fàkísà bora.', 'en': 'One should never be so benighted that one covers oneself in rags.'}
{'yo': 'Ojú kì í pọ́nni ká pọ́n léyín.', 'en': "One's circumstances do not so deteriorate that one becomes red in teeth."}
{'yo': 'Ojú ò rọ́lá rí; ó bímọ ẹ̀ ó sọ ọ́ ní Ọláníyọnu.', 'en': 'A person only newly acquainted with wealth; he has a son and names him Ọlaniyọnu.'}
{'yo': 'Ojú ò ti oníṣègùn, ó ní àna òun ń kú lọ.', 'en': 'The medicine man lacks all shame, he announces that his parent-in-law is dying.'}
{'yo': 'Ojú ti agbọ́ń agbọ́n láfà kò léro.', 'en': 'Shame upon the wasp; the wasp has a nest but no honey.'}

{'yo': 'Òkété pẹ̀lú ọmọ ẹ̀ẹ́ di ọgbọọgba sínú ihò; nígba tí ìyá ń feyín pàkùrọ́, ọmọ náà ń feyín pa á pẹ̀lú.', 'en': 'The giant bush rat and its child become equals in their hole; the mother cracks palm-nuts with its teeth, and the child does the same thing.'}
{'yo': '"Òkùnkùn ò mẹni ọ̀wọ̀; ó dÍfá fún ""Ìwọ́ tá nìyẹn""?"', 'en': '"Darkness does not know who deserves deference; it consulted the oracle Ifá for ""Who might you be?"""'}
{'yo': 'Olóbìnrin kan kì í pagbo ìja.', 'en': 'A person who has only one wife does not form a circle for a fight.'}
{'yo': 'Olójúkan kì í tàkìtì òró.', 'en': 'A one-eyed person does not attempt standing somersaults.'}
{'yo': 'Olómele kì í sọ pé igi yó dàá lóde lọ́la.', 'en': 'The omele drummer does not vow that there will be an earth-shaking performance on the morrow.'}

{'yo': 'Olówó jẹun jẹ́jẹ́; òtòṣì jẹun tìpà-tìjàn; òtòṣì tí ń bá ọlọ́rọ̀ rìn, akọ ojú ló ń yá.', 'en': 'The rich man eats slowly and at leisure; the poor person eats fast and with anxiety; the poor man who keeps company with a wealthy man is exceeding his station.'}
{'yo': 'Olówó ní ń bá ọlọ́rọ̀ọ́ rìn; ẹgbẹ́ ní ń bá ẹgbẹ́ ṣeré.', 'en': 'It is a rich person that keeps company with a wealthy person; only people of equal standing play together.'}
{'yo': 'Olówó ní ń jẹ iyán ẹgbàá.', 'en': 'It is a rich person that eats pounded yams worth two thousand cowries.'}
{'yo': 'Olóyè kékeré kì í ṣe fáàárí níwájú ọba.', 'en': 'A minor chief should not act garrulously in the presence of a king.'}

{'yo': 'Òní, ẹtú jìnfìn, ọ̀la, ẹtú jìnfìn; ẹtu nìkan lẹran tó wà nígbó?', 'en': 'Today, the antelope falls into the ditch; tomorrow, the antelope falls into the ditch; is the antelope the only animal in the forest?'}

{'yo': 'Oníbàjẹ́ ò mọra; oníbàjẹ́ ń lọ sóko olè ó mú obìnrin lọ; ọkọ́ kó akọṣu, ìyàwó kó ewùrà.', 'en': 'The shameless person does not know what is fitting; the shameless person is off to raid a farm, and he takes his wife along; the husband steals staple yams, the wife steals wateryams.'}
{'yo': '"Oníbàtá kì í wọ mọ́ṣáláṣí kó ní ""Lèmámù ńkọ́?"""', 'en': '"The bàtá drummer does not enter a mosque and ask ""Where is the Imam?"""'}
{'yo': 'Onífunra àlejò tí ń tètè ṣe onílé pẹ̀lẹ́.', 'en': '"The excessively attentive visitor ""who"" extends hospitality greetings to the host."'}

{'yo': 'Onígẹ̀gẹ́ fìlẹ̀kẹ̀ dọ́pọ̀; onílẹ̀kẹ̀ ìbá gbowo, ko rọ́rùn fìlẹ̀kẹ̀ so.', 'en': 'The person with goitre offers a ridiculously low price for beads; were the beads seller to accept her offer she would have no neck to string the beads around.'}
{'yo': 'Onílé ń jẹ èso gbìngbindò; alèjòó ní kí wọ́n ṣe òun lọ́wọ́ kan ẹ̀wà.', 'en': 'The host is eating the fruits of the gbìngbindo tree; the visitor asks to be treated to some black-eyed peas.'}
{'yo': 'OníṢàngó tó jó tí kò gbọn yẹ̀rì: àbùkùu Ṣàngó kọ́; àbùkù ara ẹ̀ ni.', 'en': 'The Ṣàngó worshipper who dances and does not shake his skirt: he does not disgrace Ṣàngó but himself.'}
{'yo': 'Ipa Facebook nínú Brexit - àti ìdẹ́rùbà rẹ̀ sí ìjọba àwarawa.', 'en': "Facebook's role in Brexit - and the threat to democracy."}

{'yo': '"Nítorí náà, ní ọjọ́ kejì lẹ́yìn ìbo Brexit, ní oṣù Òkúdù ọdún 2016, nígbà tí orílẹ̀-ède Brítain jí sí ìjayà mímọ̀ wí pé à ń kúrò Àjọ-Ìgbìmọ Ilẹ̀-Europe sílẹ̀, olóòtú mi ní ìwé-ìròyin ""Observer"" ní orílẹ̀-ède UK sọ fún mi wí pé kí n padà sí South Wales, níbi tí mo ti ṣe kékeré, kí n sì kọ ìjábọ̀."', 'en': '"So, on the day after the Brexit vote, in June 2016, when Britain woke up to the shock of discovering that we\'re leaving the European Union, my editor at the ""Observer"" newspaper in the UK asked me to go back to South Wales, where I grew up, and to write a report."'}
{'yo': 'Mo bá lọ sí ìlú kan tí wọ́n ń pè ní Ebbw Vale.', 'en': 'And so I went to a town called Ebbw Vale.'}
{'yo': 'Òun rè é.', 'en': 'Here it is.'}
{'yo': '"Ó wà ní South Wales Valleys, t""ó jẹ́ ibi àkànṣe tí ó pa lọ́wọ́ báyìí."', 'en': "It's in the South Wales Valleys, which is this quite special place."}

{'yo': 'Nítorí náà ó ti ní àṣà ọ̀wọ́-òṣìṣẹ́, ibi ọrọ̀, ó sì gbajúmọ̀ fún ohùn àwọn ẹgbẹ́ akọrin olóhùn ọkùnrin Welsh àti bọ́ọ̀lù àláfọwọ́-fẹsẹ̀ gbá àti èédú rẹ̀.', 'en': "So it's had this very, sort of rich, working-class culture, and it's famous for its Welsh male voice choirs and rugby and its coal."}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n nígbà tí mo wà ni ọ̀gọ̀ṣọ́, ìwakùsà èédú àti iṣẹ́-ọnà irinlílọ̀ di títìpa, tí gbogbo agbègbè náà sì ti bàjẹ́.', 'en': 'But when I was a teenager, the coal mines and the steelworks closed, and the entire area was devastated.'}
{'yo': '"Nígbà tí mo sì lọ síbẹ̀ nítorí ó ní ọ̀kan lára ìbo ""Kúrò"" tó pọ̀jù lọ ní orílẹ̀-èdè náà."', 'en': '"And I went there because it had one of the highest ""Leave"" votes in the country."'}
{'yo': '"Ìdá méjì-lé-lọ́gọ́ta àwọn ènìyàn níbí l""ó dìbò láti fi Àjọ-Ìgbìmọ Ilẹ̀ Europe sílẹ̀."', 'en': 'Sixty-two percent of the people here voted to leave the European Union.'}
{'yo': 'Mo sì fẹ́ mọ ìdí rẹ̀.', 'en': 'And I wanted to know why.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí mo débẹ̀, ó yà mí lẹ́nu díẹ̀, nítorí ìgbà tí mo lọ sí Ebbw Vale kẹ́yìn, ó rí báyìí.', 'en': 'When I got there, I was just a bit taken aback, because the last time I went to Ebbw Vale, it looked like this.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n nísìnyìí, ó rí báyìí.', 'en': 'And now, it looks like this.'}

{'yo': 'Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ gíga oní owó pọ́ùn àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ 33 tuntun fún ìtẹ̀síwájú ètò-ẹ̀kọ́ tí púpọ̀ nínú owó yẹn wá láti ọwọ́ Àjọ-Ìgbìmọ Ilẹ̀ Europe.', 'en': 'This is a new 33-million-pound college of further education that was mostly funded by the European Union.'}

{'yo': 'Ibi eré-ìdárayá tuntun rè é tí ó wà láàárín iṣẹ́ àkànṣe ìsọdọ̀tun oní àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ 350 owó pọ́ùn tí Àjọ-Ìgbìmọ Ilẹ̀ Europe ń ṣe onígbọ̀wọ rẹ̀.', 'en': "And this is the new sports center that's at the middle of 350-million-pound regeneration project that's being funded by the European Union."}

{'yo': 'Èyí ni ètò àtúnṣe ọ̀nà tuntun oní owó póùn àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ 77, ojú ọ̀nà ọkọ̀-ojú-irin tuntun náà wà, ibùdókọ̀ àwọn ọkọ̀ ojúurin tuntun, tí ó jẹ́ wí pé Àjọ-Ìgbìmọ Ilẹ̀ Europe ló ń ṣe onígbọ̀wọ gbogbo rẹ̀.', 'en': "And this is the new 77-million-pound road-improvement scheme, and there's a new train line, a new railway station, and they're all being funded by the European Union."}

{'yo': 'Kì í sì ṣe wí pé ìkankan nínú àwọn wọ̀nyìí jẹ́ àṣìírí, nítorí àwọn àpẹẹrẹ ǹlá bí èyí wà káàkiri.', 'en': "And it's not as if any of this is a secret, because there's big signs like this everywhere."}
{'yo': '[Owó Ìgbọ̀wọ́ EU: ìdókòwò nínú Wales].', 'en': '[EU Funds: Investing in Wales]'}
{'yo': 'Mò ti ní ìmọ̀lára àjòjì yìí nípa àìjóòótọ́ bí mo ṣe ń rìn káàkiri ìlú náà.', 'en': 'I had this sort of weird sense of unreality, walking around the town.'}
{'yo': 'Ó wá sími lórí nígbà tí mo pàde ọ̀dọ́mọkùnrin kan níwáju ibi eré ìdárayá náà.', 'en': 'And it came to a head when I met this young man in front of the sports center.'}

{'yo': 'Ó sọ fún mi wí pé òún ti dìbò láti kúrò, nítorí Àjọ-ìgbìmọ Ilẹ̀ Europe ò ṣe nǹkankan fún òun.', 'en': 'And he told me that he had voted to leave, because the European Union had done nothing for him.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ti sú u.', 'en': 'He was fed up with it.'}
{'yo': 'Yíká gbogbo ìlú, oun kan náà ni àwọn ènìyàn ń sọ fún mi.', 'en': 'And all around town, people told me the same thing.'}
{'yo': '"Wọ́n ní àwọn fẹ́ gba ìṣàkóso padà, èyí t""ó jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára ìpèdè nínú ìpolongo náà."', 'en': 'They said that they wanted to take back control, which was one of the slogans in the campaign.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n sọ fún mi wí pé ti àwọn àṣíkiri àti àwọn ogúnléndé ni ó tojú sú àwọn jù.', 'en': 'And they told me that they were most fed up with the immigrants and with the refugees.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọ́n ti rí tó.', 'en': "They'd had enough."}
{'yo': 'Léyìí tó ṣájòjì.', 'en': 'Which was odd.'}
{'yo': 'Torí bí mo ṣe rìn káàkiri, mi ò rí àṣíkiri tàbí ogúnléndé kankan.', 'en': "Because walking around, I didn't meet any immigrants or refugees."}
{'yo': 'Mo pàde arábìnrin ọmọ Poland kan tí ó sọ fún mi wí pé òun nìkan ni àjòjì tó wà nínú ìlú náà.', 'en': 'I met one Polish woman who told me she was practically the only foreigner in town.'}

{'yo': '"Nígbà tí mo wo iye rẹ̀, mo rí i wí pé Ebbw Vale ní ọ̀kan lára ìgbéléwọ̀n ìṣílọ-sí-ìlú-òkèèrè-mìíràn t""ó kéré jùlọ ní orílẹ̀-èdè náà."', 'en': 'And when I checked the figures, I discovered that Ebbw Vale actually has one of the lowest rates of immigration in the country.'}

{'yo': 'Ó fa ìpòrúru ọkàn díẹ̀ fún mi, nítorí mi ò ní ò ye ibi tí àwọn ènìyán ti ń gba ìfitónilétí wọn.', 'en': "And so I was just a bit baffled, because I couldn't really understand where people were getting their information from."}

{'yo': '"Nítorí ìwé-ìroyìn apá-ọ̀tun l""ó ṣe àtẹ̀jáde gbogbo ìròyìn nípa ìṣílọ-sí-ìlú-òkèèrè-mìíràn wọ̀nyí."', 'en': 'Because it was the right-wing tabloid newspapers which printed all these stories about immigration.'}
{'yo': 'Tí èyí sì fi púpọ̀ wà ní sàkání apá-òsì Iṣẹ́-ṣíṣe.', 'en': 'And this is a very much left-wing Labour stronghold.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n lẹ́yìn tí àpilẹ̀kọ náà jáde, obìnrin yìí kàn sí mi.', 'en': 'But then after the article came out, this woman got in touch with me.'}
