{'yo': '"Ó wá láti Ebbw Vale, ó sọ fún mi nípa gbogbo àwọn nǹkan yìí t""ó ti rí lórí Facebook."', 'en': "And she was from Ebbw Vale, and she told me about all this stuff that she'd seen on Facebook."}
{'yo': '"Mo béèrè wí pé, ""nǹkan wo?"', 'en': '"I was like, ""What stuff?"'}

{'yo': '"""Ó sọ wí pé gbogbo àwọn nǹkan abanilẹ́rù yìí nípa ìṣílọ-sí-ìlú-òkèèrè-mìíràn, pàápàá jùlọ nípa orílẹ̀-èdeTurkey."', 'en': '""" And she said it was all this quite scary stuff about immigration, and especially about Turkey."'}
{'yo': 'Torí náà mo gbìyànjú láti sàwárí rẹ̀.', 'en': 'So I tried to find it.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n kò sí nǹkankan níbẹ̀.', 'en': 'But there was nothing there.'}

{'yo': 'Nítorí kò sí àká ti ìpolówó tí àwọn ènìyán ti rí tàbí ǹnkan tí wọ́n ti tì sí ìkànnì afúnni níròyin wọn.', 'en': "Because there's no archive of ads that people had seen or what had been pushed into their news feeds."}
{'yo': 'Kò sí ìtọsẹ̀ nǹkankan, ó ti dúdú pátápátá.', 'en': 'No trace of anything, gone completely dark.'}

{'yo': 'Ìbò yìí tí yóò nípa ńlá lára Britain títí-láyé -- ó wulẹ̀ ti nípa ńlá: àwọn ará Japan tí wọ́n ń ṣe ọkọ̀ ilẹ̀ tà tí wọ́n wá sí orílẹ̀-èdè Wales àti àríwá ìlà-oòrùn láti rọ́pò iṣẹ́ ìwakùsà -- wọ́n ti ń lọ nítorí Brexit.', 'en': "And this referendum that will have this profound effect forever on Britain -- it's already had a profound effect: the Japanese car manufacturers that came to Wales and the north east to replace the mining jobs -- they are already going because of Brexit."}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo ìbò yìí wáyé nínú òkùnkùn, nítorí ó wáyé lórí Facebook.', 'en': 'And this entire referendum took place in darkness, because it took place on Facebook.'}

{'yo': 'Nǹkan tó bá sì ṣẹlẹ̀ lórí Facebook yóò dúró sórí Facebook, nítorí ìwọ nìkan lò ń rí afúnni níròyin rẹ, yóó sì di ofò, nítórí náà kò ṣe é ṣe láti ṣèwádìí nǹkankan.', 'en': "And what happens on Facebook stays on Facebook, because only you see your news feed, and then it vanishes, so it's impossible to research anything."}

{'yo': 'Torí náà a ò mọ̀ ẹni tí ó rí irú ìpolówó tàbí ipa tí wọ́n ní, tàbí ìwífún-alálàyé tí ó jẹ́ lílò láti darí ìpolówó sí àwọn ènìyàn wọ̀nyí.', 'en': 'So we have no idea who saw what ads or what impact they had, or what data was used to target these people.'}

{'yo': '"Tàbí ta ni ẹni t""ó fi ìpolówó náà síbẹ̀, tàbí èélòó lowó tí wọ́n ná, tàbí ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè tí wọ́n jẹ́."', 'en': 'Or even who placed the ads, or how much money was spent, or even what nationality they were.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n Facebook mọ̀.', 'en': 'But Facebook does.'}
{'yo': 'Facebook ní àwọn ìdáhùn wọ̀nyí, ó sì kọ̀ láti kó wọn fún wa.', 'en': "Facebook has these answers, and it's refused to give them to us."}

{'yo': 'Àwọn aṣòfin wa ti sọ fún Mark Zuckerberg lọ́pọ̀ ìgbà pé kó wá sí orílẹ̀-èdè Britain láti wá fún wa ní àwọn ìdáhùn wọ̀nyí.', 'en': 'Our parliament has asked Mark Zuckerberg multiple times to come to Britain and to give us these answers.'}
{'yo': 'Ní àsìkò kọ̀ọ̀kan, ó kọ̀ jálẹ̀.', 'en': "And every single time, he's refused."}
{'yo': '"Tí ènìyàn sì ní láti wòye oun t""ó fa sábàbí"', 'en': 'And you have to wonder why.'}

{'yo': 'Nítorí nǹkan tí èmi àti àwọn akọ̀ròyìn mìíràn ti wú jáde ni wí pé ọ̀kẹ́ àìmọye ìwà-ọ̀daràn ló wáyé lásíkò ìbò náà.', 'en': 'Because what I and other journalists have uncovered is that multiple crimes took place during the referendum.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n sì wáyé lórí Facebook.', 'en': 'And they took place on Facebook.'}
{'yo': 'Ìdí ni wí pé ní ilẹ̀ Britain, a fi gbèdéke sí iye owó tí ènìyàn lè ná nínú ìbò.', 'en': "It's because in Britain, we limit the amount of money that you can spend in an election."}

{'yo': '"Ìdí sì ni wí pé ní ọ̀rún-ọdún 19, láwòmọ lítírésọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn máa ń rìn káàkiri pẹ̀lú kẹ̀kẹ́-akẹ́rù-ẹlẹ́sẹ̀-kan t""ó kún fún owó láti ra àwọn olùdìbò."', 'en': "And it's because in the 19th century, people would walk around with literally wheelbarrows of cash and just buy voters."}
{'yo': '"Torí náà a ṣé àwọn òfin t""ó múná wọ̀nyí láti dẹ́kun ìyẹn kí ó má wáyé."', 'en': 'So we passed these strict laws to stop that from happening.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n àwọn òfin wọ̀nyẹn kò ṣiṣẹ́ mọ́.', 'en': "But those laws don't work anymore."}
{'yo': 'Ìbò yìí wáyé lápapọ̀ lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélukára-bí-ajere.', 'en': 'This referendum took place almost entirely online.'}

{'yo': 'Ènìyàn sì lè ná owó iye-kí-ye lórí Facebook tàbí lórí Google tàbí ìpolówó lórí YouTube tí ẹnikẹ́ni ò ní mọ̀, nítorí àwọn ohun tí ó fara sin ni wọ́n.', 'en': "And you can spend any amount of money on Facebook or on Google or on YouTube ads and nobody will know, because they're black boxes."}
{'yo': '"Ohun t""ó ṣẹlẹ̀ rè é."', 'en': 'And this is what happened.'}
{'yo': 'A ò ní ìmọ̀ kankan nípa bó ṣe tó ní kíkún.', 'en': "We've actually got no idea of the full extent of it."}

{'yo': '"Ṣùgbọ́n a mọ̀ wí pé ní àwọn ọjọ́ t""ó kẹ́yìn kí ìbò Brexit ó tó bẹ̀rẹ̀, ìpolongo gangan ""Dìbo Kúrò"" fẹ́rẹ̀ẹ́ kó ìdá mẹ́ta àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ owó póùn kan mì nípasẹ̀ ìpolongo mìíràn tí àjọ elétò ìdìbò wa ti pàṣẹ pé kò bófinmu, tí ó sì tari rẹ̀ sí akoto àwọn ọlọ́pàá."', 'en': '"But we do know that in the last days before the Brexit vote, the official ""Vote Leave"" campaign laundered nearly three quarters of a million pounds through another campaign entity that our electoral commission has ruled was illegal, and it\'s referred it to the police."'}
{'yo': '"Pẹ̀lú owó tí ò bófinmu yìí, ""Dìbo Kúrò"" ṣe ìtúsílẹ̀ ọ̀pá ìpaná ìfitónilétí-aṣinilọ́nà."', 'en': '"And with this illegal cash, ""Vote Leave"" unleashed a fire hose of disinformation."'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ìpolówó bí èyí.', 'en': 'Ads like this.'}
{'yo': '[Àádọ́ta-Ọ̀kẹ́ 76 àwọn ènìyan orílẹ̀-èdè Turkey tí wọ́n ń darapọ̀ mọ́ EU].', 'en': "[Turkey's 76m people joining the EU]"}
{'yo': 'Irọ́ ni èyí, irọ́ pátápátá ni.', 'en': "This is a lie, it's a total lie."}
{'yo': 'Orílẹ̀-èdè Turkey ò darapọ̀ mọ́ Àjọ-Ìgbìmọ Ilẹ̀ Europe.', 'en': 'Turkey is not joining the European Union.'}
{'yo': 'Kò ti ẹ̀ sí ìjíròrò kankan nípa rẹ̀ pé ó fẹ́ darapọ̀ mọ́ Àjọ-Ìgbìmọ Ilẹ̀ Europe.', 'en': "There's not even any discussions of it joining the European Union."}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ wa, a ò rí ìpolówó yìí rárá, nítorí àwa kọ́ ni wọ́n ń darí rẹ̀ sí.', 'en': 'And most of us, we never saw these ads, because we were not the target of them.'}

{'yo': '"""Dìbo Kúrò"" ṣèdámọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn díẹ̀ t""ó ṣèdámọ̀ wọn gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹni tí a lè yí-lọ́kàn-padà, wọ́n sì rí wọn."', 'en': '"""Vote Leave"" identified a tiny sliver of people who it identified as persuadable, and they saw them."'}

{'yo': 'Ìdí kan pàtó tí a ṣe ń rí àwọn wọ̀nyí nísisìyí ni wí pé àwọn aṣòfin ti fipá mú Facebook láti kó wọn sílẹ̀.', 'en': 'And the only reason we are seeing these now is because parliament forced Facebook to hand them over.'}
{'yo': '"Bóyá o rò wí pé, "" Dáradára, ìnákúnàá díẹ̀ ni ó jẹ́."', 'en': '"And maybe you think, ""Well, it was just a bit of overspending."'}
{'yo': 'Irọ́ díẹ̀ ni.', 'en': "It's a few lies."}
{'yo': '""" Ṣùgbọ́n èyí ni ìbo jìbìtì t""ó tóbi jù nílẹ̀ Britain láàárín 100 ọdún."', 'en': '""" But this was the biggest electoral fraud in Britain for 100 years."'}
{'yo': 'Ní ìbò ẹ̀kan-láàrín-ìran-kan tó gbára lé ìdá kan ṣoṣo àwọn olùdìbò.', 'en': 'In a once-in-a-generation vote that hinged upon just one percent of the electorate.'}
{'yo': '"Ó jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àwọn ìwà-ọ̀daràn t""ó wáyé nínú ìdìbò náà."', 'en': 'And it was just one of the crimes that took place in the referendum.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹgbẹ́ kan tún wà, tí ọkùnrin yìí jẹ́ olórí wọn, Nigel Farage, èyí tó wà lápá ọ̀tun Trump.', 'en': 'There was another group, which was headed by this man, Nigel Farage, the one to the right of Trump.'}
{'yo': '"Ẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀, ""Kúrò ní EU"" -- òun náà rúfin bákan náà."', 'en': '"And his group, ""Leave."'}
{'yo': 'Ó rúfin ètò-ìdìbo ilẹ̀ Britain àti ìwífún-alálàyé òfin Britain, wọ́n sì ń ṣe ìtọ́kasí rẹ̀ fún àwọn ọlọ́pà.', 'en': '"EU"" -- it also broke the law."'}
{'yo': 'Ọkùnrin yìí, Arron Banks, òun ló ṣe onígbọ̀wọ́ ìpolongo yìí.', 'en': "It broke British electoral laws and British data laws, and it's also being referred to the police."}

{'yo': 'Ní ọ̀rọ̀ tó yátọ̀ gédéngbé, wọ́n ń ṣe ìtọ́kasí rẹ̀ fún àwọn Àjọ tó ń rí sí Ìwà-ọ̀daràn Àpapọ̀ wa, tọ̀dọ tiwa tó ṣe déédéé FBI, nítorí àjọ elétò ìdìbo wa ti sọ wí pé àwọn ò mọ ibi tí owó rẹ̀ ti wá.', 'en': 'And this man, Arron Banks, he funded this campaign.'}

{'yo': 'Tàbí tó bá ṣe wí pé ọmọ ilẹ̀ Britain ni.', 'en': "And in a completely separate case, he's being referred to our National Crime Agency, our equivalent of the FBI, because our electoral commission has concluded they don't know where his money came from."}
{'yo': 'Mi ò ti ẹ̀ ní mẹ́nu ba àwọn irọ́ tí Arron Banks ti sọ nípa àjọṣepọ̀ ìkọ̀kọ rẹ̀ pèlú ìjọba orílẹ̀-ède Russia.', 'en': 'Or if it was even British.'}

{'yo': 'Àbí asìkò àjòji ìpàde Farage pẹ̀lú Julian Assange àti pẹ̀lu ọ̀rẹ́ Trump, Roger Stone, tí wọ́n ti fẹ̀sùn kàn, lẹ́sẹ̀kẹsẹ̀ ṣíwáju kí Wikileak tó ṣe àgbéjáde méjì ṣànkò-ṣànkò, léyìí tí méjééjì ṣe àǹfààní fún Trump.', 'en': "And I'm not even going to go into the lies that Arron Banks has told about his covert relationship with the Russian government."}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n mà á sọ fún ọ wí pé Brexit àti Trump jọ wọnú arawọn ni.', 'en': "Or the weird timing of Nigel Farage's meetings with Julian Assange and with Trump's buddy, Roger Stone, now indicted, immediately before two massive WikiLeaks dumps, both of which happened to benefit Donald Trump."}
{'yo': 'Okùnrin yìí sọ fúnmi wí pé Brexit ni àwokòtò-ìṣàyẹ̀wò fún Trump.', 'en': 'But I will tell you that Brexit and Trump were intimately entwined.'}

{'yo': 'A sì mọ̀ wí pé àwọn ènìyàn yìí kan náà, àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ kan náà, ìwífún-alálàyé kan náà, ìlànà-ìṣe kan náà, ìṣàmúlò ìkórìra àti ìbẹ̀rù kan náà ni.', 'en': 'This man told me that Brexit was the petri dish for Trump.'}
{'yo': 'Nǹkan tí wọ́n ń fi sóri Facebook nìyí.', 'en': "And we know it's the same people, the same companies, the same data, the same techniques, the same use of hate and fear."}
{'yo': 'Mi ò sì fẹ́ pe èyí gan-an nírọ́.', 'en': 'This is what they were posting on Facebook.'}

{'yo': '[ìṣílọ-sí-ìlú-òkèèrè-mìíràn láìsí ìgbaniwọlé túmọ̀ sí ìdótì] Nítorí ó jọ ìwà-ọ̀daràn ju ìkórìra lọ sí mi.', 'en': "And I don't even want to call this a lie, [Immigration without assimilation equals invasion] because it feels more like a hate crime to me."}

{'yo': 'Mi ò ní láti sọ fún yín wí pé ìkórìra àti ìbẹ̀rù ní wọ́n ń gbìn sórí ẹ̀rọ ayélukára káàkiri ayé.', 'en': "I don't have to tell you that hate and fear are being sown online all across the world."}

{'yo': 'Kì í ṣe ní orílẹ̀-ède Britain àti America nìkan, ṣùgbọ́n ní orílẹ̀-ède France àti Hungary àti Brazil àti Myanmar àti New Zealand.', 'en': 'Not just in Britain and America, but in France and in Hungary and Brazil and Myanmar and New Zealand.'}
{'yo': 'A sì mọ̀ pé omi dúdú tó ń ṣàn kan wà tó ń so gbogbo wa pọ̀ lágbàyé.', 'en': 'And we know there is this dark undertow which is connecting us all globally.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ṣì ń ṣàn lórí àwọn gbàgede ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ.', 'en': 'And it is flowing via the technology platforms.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n díẹ̀ nínú nǹkan tó ń lọ lókè là ń rí.', 'en': "But we only see a tiny amount of what's going on on the surface."}

{'yo': '"Mo rí nǹkankan nípa òkùnkùn tó wà lábẹ́-inú yìí torí mo ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí í wo àjọṣepọ̀ t""ó wà láàárín Trump àti Farage ni, sínú ilé-iṣẹ́ kan tí wọ́n ń pè ní Cambrige Analytica."', 'en': "And I only found out anything about this dark underbelly because I started looking into Trump's relationship to Farage, into a company called Cambridge Analytica."}
{'yo': 'Mo lo àìmọye oṣù tí mò ń tọpa òṣìṣẹ́-fẹ̀yìntì kan, Christopher Wiley.', 'en': 'And I spent months tracking down an ex-employee, Christopher Wiley.'}

{'yo': '"Ó sì sọ fún mi bí ilé-iṣẹ́ yìí, t""ó ṣiṣẹ́ fún Trump àti Brexit, ti ṣe àkọsílẹ̀ àwọn ènìyàn ní ti òṣèlú láti lè lóye ìbẹ̀ru ẹnìkọ̀ọ̀kan wọn, láti lè darí ìpolówó Facebook sí wọn."', 'en': 'And he told me how this company, that worked for both Trump and Brexit, had profiled people politically in order to understand their individual fears, to better target them with Facebook ads.'}

{'yo': 'Ó sì ṣe èyí nípasẹ̀ kíkórè ìsọfúnni àwọn ènìyàn àádọ́ta-okẹ́ 87 lórí Facebook ní ọ̀nà àìbófinmu.', 'en': 'And it did this by illicitly harvesting the profiles of 87 million people from Facebook.'}
{'yo': 'Ó gba iṣẹ́ odidi ọdún kan gbáko láti lè mú Christopher sórí àkọsílẹ̀.', 'en': "It took an entire year's work to get Christopher on the record."}
{'yo': 'Mo sì ní láti sọ ara mi di olùjábọ̀ ìwádìí ìtọpinpin láti akọ̀ròyìn láti lè ṣe é.', 'en': 'And I had to turn myself from a feature writer into an investigative reporter to do it.'}

{'yo': '"Òun náà sì ní ìgboyà aláìlẹ́gbẹ́, nítorí Robert Mercer ni ó ni ilé-iṣẹ́ náà, ọlọ́rọ̀ t""ó ṣe onígbọ̀wọ fún Trump, ó sì dúkokò láti pè wá lẹ́jọ́ ní ọ̀pọ̀ ìgbà, láti dá àtẹ̀jáde wa dúró."', 'en': 'And he was extraordinarily brave, because the company is owned by Robert Mercer, the billionaire who bankrolled Trump, and he threatened to sue us multiple times, to stop us from publishing.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n a pàpà dé ibẹ̀, ó ku ọjọ́ kan kí á ṣe àtẹ̀jáde.', 'en': 'But we finally got there, and we were one day ahead of publication.'}
{'yo': 'A gba ìdúkokò ìpẹ̀lẹ́jọ́ mìíràn.', 'en': 'We got another legal threat.'}
{'yo': 'Kì í ṣe láti Cambridge Analytica lásíkò yìí, ṣùgbọ́n láti Facebook.', 'en': 'Not from Cambridge Analytica this time, but from Facebook.'}
{'yo': 'Ó sọ fún wa wí pé tí a bá ṣe àtẹ̀jáde, wọ́n máa pè wá ní ẹjọ́.', 'en': 'It told us that if we publish, they would sue us.'}
{'yo': 'A ṣáà ṣe é ṣá.', 'en': 'We did it anyway.'}
{'yo': 'Facebook, ihà tí ò dára nínú ìtàn ni o wà nínú ìyẹn.', 'en': 'Facebook, you were on the wrong side of history in that.'}

{'yo': 'O sì wà ní ihà tí ò dára nínú ìtàn èyí -- látàrí kíkọ̀ jálẹ̀ láti fún wa ní àwọn ìdáhùn tí a nílò.', 'en': 'And you were on the wrong side of history in this -- in refusing to give us the answers that we need.'}
{'yo': 'Ìdí nìyẹn tí mo fi wà níbí.', 'en': 'And that is why I am here.'}
{'yo': 'Láti báa yín sọ̀rọ̀ tààrà, àwọn òòṣa ti Silicon Valley.', 'en': 'To address you directly, the gods of Silicon Valley.'}

{'yo': 'Mark Zuckerberg àti Sheryl Sandberg àti Larry Page àti Sergy Brin àti Jack Dorsey, àti àwọn òṣìṣẹ yín àti àwọn olùdókoòwò yín, bákan náà.', 'en': 'Mark Zuckerberg and Sheryl Sandberg and Larry Page and Sergey Brin and Jack Dorsey, and your employees and your investors, too.'}
{'yo': '"Nítorí 100 ọdún sẹ́yìn, ewu t""ó tóbi jù ní àwọn ìwa èédú ní South Wales ni afẹ́fẹ́ ìdáná."', 'en': 'Because 100 years ago, the biggest danger in the South Wales coal mines was gas.'}
{'yo': 'Dákẹ́ rọ́rọ́ àti tí-ń-ṣekú-pani tí a kò lè rí sójú.', 'en': 'Silent and deadly and invisible.'}
{'yo': 'Ìdí nìyí tí wọ́n fi rán àwọn ẹyẹ ìbákà lọ sínú ilẹ̀ láti kọ́kọ́ lọ yẹ afẹ́fẹ́ náà wò.', 'en': "It's why they sent the canaries down first to check the air."}

{'yo': 'Nínú àyèwo orí ẹ̀rọ ayélukára ti àgbàyé tí ó tóbi tí à ń là kọjá lọ́wọ́ yìí, awa tí a wà ní orílẹ̀-ède Britain ni ẹyẹ ìbákà.', 'en': 'And in this massive, global, online experiment that we are all living through, we in Britain are the canary.'}

{'yo': '"Àwa ni ohun t""ó ṣẹlẹ̀ sí ìjọba àwarawa ní ihà-ìwọ̀-oòrùn nígbà tí ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ti ṣe ìdíwọ́ fún òfin ètò-ìdìbo ọgọ́run ọdún."', 'en': 'We are what happens to a western democracy when a hundred years of electoral laws are disrupted by technology.'}

{'yo': '"Ìjọba àwarawa ti fọ́ yángá, àwọn òfin wa ò ṣiṣẹ́ mọ́, èmi kọ́ ni mò ń sọ èyí, àwọn aṣòfin wa ni wọ́n tẹ àtẹ̀jáde ìhìn t""ó ń sọ èyí."', 'en': "Our democracy is broken, our laws don't work anymore, and it's not me saying this, it's our parliament published a report saying this."}
{'yo': 'Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tí o ti ṣàpilẹ̀ṣe rẹ̀ yìí yanilẹ́nu.', 'en': 'This technology that you have invented has been amazing.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n báyìí, ọ̀gangan-ibi-ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ìwà-ọ̀daran ni.', 'en': "But now, it's a crime scene."}
{'yo': 'O sì ní ẹ̀rí.', 'en': 'And you have the evidence.'}
{'yo': 'Kò sì tó láti sọ wí pé o ó ṣe dáadáa lọ́jọ́ iwájú.', 'en': 'And it is not enough to say that you will do better in the future.'}
{'yo': 'Torí láti ní ìrètí kankan nípa dídáwọ́ èyí dúró láti má ṣẹlẹ̀ mọ́, a ní láti mọ òtítọ́.', 'en': 'Because to have any hope of stopping this from happening again, we have to know the truth.'}
{'yo': '"Bóyá o sì ń rò, ""Ó dáa, àwọn ìpolówó díẹ̀ náà ni."', 'en': '"And maybe you think, ""Well, it was just a few ads."'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ènìyán sì gbọ́n ju ìyẹn lọ, àbí?', 'en': 'And people are smarter than that, right?'}
{'yo': '"Ní èyí tí mo máa sọ wí pé, ""kòngẹ́ ire pẹ̀lú ìyẹn."', 'en': '""" To which I would say, ""Good luck with that."'}
{'yo': 'Nítorí nǹkan tí ìbo Brexit ṣàpèjúwe rẹ̀ ni wí pé ẹ̀tọ̀ ìjọba àwarawa ti fọ́.', 'en': '""" Because what the Brexit vote demonstrates is that liberal democracy is broken."'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀yin lẹ si sì fọ́ ọ.', 'en': 'And you broke it.'}

{'yo': '"Èyí kì í ṣe ìjọba àwarawa -- fífọ́n irọ́ ká nínú ọ̀kùnkùn, tí wọ́n fi owó tí ò bófinmu san, láti ibi t""ó jẹ́ pé Ọlọ́run ló mọ̀."', 'en': 'This is not democracy -- spreading lies in darkness, paid for with illegal cash, from God knows where.'}
{'yo': 'Ìyípo ni, ẹ̀yin lẹ sì ṣe àtìlẹyìn fún un.', 'en': "It's subversion, and you are accessories to it."}

{'yo': '"Ilé aṣòfin wa jẹ́ àkọ́kọ́ ní gbogbo àgbáyé t""ó gbíyànjú láti mú u ọ ṣàláyé nǹkan tí ẹ ṣe, ó sì kùnà."', 'en': "Our parliament has been the first in the world to try to hold you to account, and it's failed."}

{'yo': 'Ẹ ti kọjá àrọ́wọ́tó òfin ilẹ̀ Britain - kì í ṣe òfin Britain nìkan, ọ̀wọ́ aṣòfin mẹsàn-án rè é, orílẹ̀-èdè mẹ́sàn-án ni ó ní aṣojú níbí, tí Mark Zukerberg kọ̀ jálẹ̀ láti wá fi ẹ̀rí fún.', 'en': 'You are literally beyond the reach of British law -- not just British laws, this is nine parliaments, nine countries are represented here, who Mark Zuckerberg refused to come and give evidence to.'}
{'yo': 'Nǹkan tí ò sì yé e yín ni wí pé èyí tóbi jù ẹ̀yin gan-an lọ.', 'en': "And what you don't seem to understand is that this is bigger than you."}
{'yo': 'Ó sì tóbi ju ẹnìkànkan wa lọ.', 'en': "And it's bigger than any of us."}
{'yo': '"Kì í ṣe nípa òsì tàbí ọ̀tún tàbí ""Kúrò"" tàbí ""Dúró"" tàbí Trump tàbí ẹlòmíràn."', 'en': '"And it is not about left or right or ""Leave"" or ""Remain"" or Trump or not."'}
{'yo': 'Ó jẹ́ nípa bóyá ó ṣe é ṣe láti ní ètò-ìdìbò tí yóò lọ ní ìrọwọ́-rọṣẹ̀ mọ́.', 'en': "It's about whether it's actually possible to have a free and fair election ever again."}
{'yo': 'Tórí bó ṣe rí yìí, mi ò rò bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': "Because as it stands, I don't think it is."}
{'yo': 'Ìbéèrè mi síi yín ni, ṣe nǹkan tí ẹ fẹ́ rèé?', 'en': 'And so my question to you is, is this what you want?'}

{'yo': 'Ṣé bí ẹ ṣe fẹ́ kí ìtàn ó rántíi yín rè é: gẹ́gẹ́ bi olùrànlọ́wọ́ fún ìjọba apàṣẹ wàá tó ń dìde káàkiri gbogbo àgbáyé?', 'en': 'Is this how you want history to remember you: as the handmaidens to authoritarianism that is on the rise all across the world?'}
{'yo': 'Nítorí ẹ bẹ̀rẹ̀ láti so àwọn ènìyàn pọ̀ ni.', 'en': 'Because you set out to connect people.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ sì ń kọ̀ láti gbà pé ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ yìí kan náà ń pín wa níyà.', 'en': 'And you are refusing to acknowledge that the same technology is now driving us apart.'}

{'yo': 'Ìbéèrè mi sí gbogbo ènìyàn tókù ni pé, ṣé nǹkan tí a fẹ́ rè é: láti jẹ́ kí wọ́n mú u jẹ, ka sì jókòó ka máa fi ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ wa ṣeré, bí òkùnkùn yìí ṣe ń kù?', 'en': 'And my question to everybody else is, is this what we want: to let them get away with it, and to sit back and play with our phones, as this darkness falls?'}
{'yo': 'Ìtan South Wales Valleys jẹ́ ti ìjà fún ẹ̀tọ́.', 'en': 'The history of the South Wales Valleys is of a fight for rights.'}
{'yo': 'Èyí kìí ṣe ìbáwí -- kókó àyípada ni.', 'en': "And this is not a drill -- it's a point of inflection."}

{'yo': 'Ìjọba àwarawa ò dájú, kò sì ṣe é fẹ́kù, a ní láti jà a sì ní láti borí a ò lè jẹ́ kí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ní agbára tí ò ṣe é yẹ̀ lọ́wọ́ wọ̀ yìí.', 'en': 'Democracy is not guaranteed, and it is not inevitable, and we have to fight and we have to win and we cannot let these tech companies have this unchecked power.'}
{'yo': 'Ó dọwọ́ọ wa -- ìwọ, èmi àti gbogbo wa.', 'en': "It's up to us -- you, me and all of us."}
{'yo': 'Àwa la ní láti gba ìṣàkóso padà.', 'en': 'We are the ones who have to take back control.'}
{'yo': 'Bí a ṣe lè jẹ́ kí agbára rọjú fún àwọn ẹbí tí owó tí ìpawó wọ̀lé wọn kéré.', 'en': 'How we can make energy more affordable for low-income families.'}
{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọmọdé, mo máa ń lo gbogbo àsìkò mi ní ilé ìyá-àgbà ìyá mi.', 'en': "So, as a child, I used to spend all of my time at my great-grandmother's house."}

{'yo': 'Ní àwọn ọjọ́ tó bá gbóná, lásìkò ooru, mo máa sáré kọjá nílẹ̀ ma sì gbójú mi síwájú ẹ̀rọ amúlétutù wọn kan ṣoṣo.', 'en': 'On hot, humid, summer days, I would dash across the floor and stick my face in front of her only air conditioner.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n mi ò mọ̀ pé ìrírí kékeré yẹn, bó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ péréte, jẹ́ àǹfààní kan ní àwùjọ wa.', 'en': "But I didn't realize that that simple experience, though brief, was a privileged one in our community."}

{'yo': '"Nígbà tí mò ń dàgbà, ìtan àwọn aládùgbo nílé-kejì tí wọ́n ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ayédèrú àpò àṣùwọn agbára tàbí tí wọ́n ní láti jí agbára jẹ́ nǹkan t""ó tọ́ sí mi."', 'en': 'Growing up, stories of next-door neighbors having to set up fake energy accounts or having to steal energy seemed normal to me.'}

{'yo': 'Lásíkò òtútù, títiraka láti jẹ́ kí ará lọ́, àwọn aládùgbò mi ò ní àǹfààní kankan ju wí pé kí wọ́n pẹ́ mítà kọjá lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n bá ti pa oru wọn, láti lè fi ará dẹ ẹbí wọn fún ọjọ́ kan sí i.', 'en': 'During the winter, struggling to get warm, my neighbors would have no choice but to bypass the meter after their heat was shut off, just to keep their family comfortable for one more day.'}

{'yo': 'Irú àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ tó léwu wọ̀nyí lè gbilẹ̀ nígbà tí àwọn ènìyàn bá ń kojú àwọn àǹfààní yíyàn tí ò ṣe é ṣe.', 'en': 'These kinds of dangerous incidents can take root when people are faced with impossible choices.'}
{'yo': 'Ní orílẹ̀-ède US, ọ̀gbọ̀ ọmọ ilẹ̀ America máa ń ná ìdá mẹ́ta owó tí wọ́n ń gbà lórí agbára.', 'en': 'In the US, the average American spends three percent of their income on energy.'}

{'yo': 'Ní ìdàkejì, ìpawó wọlé tó kéré àti iye àwọn ènìyàn nígbèríko lè ná ìda ogún, kódà ọgbọ̀n nínú owó tí wọ́n ń gbà lórí agbára.', 'en': 'In contrast, low-income and rural populations can spend 20, even 30 percent of their income on energy.'}

{'yo': 'Ní ọdún 2015, èyí jẹ́ kí àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ mẹ́ẹ̀dọ́gbọ̀n ènìyàn fi ebi panú láti pèse agbára ní ilé wọn.', 'en': 'In 2015, this caused over 25 million people to skip meals to provide power to their homes.'}
{'yo': 'Àsìkò yìí ni agbára di ìṣòro.', 'en': 'This is when energy becomes a burden.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ìṣòro agbára pọ̀ gan-an ju iye kan lọ.', 'en': 'But energy burdens are so much more than just a number.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n máa ń ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ àwọn ẹ̀yàn tí ò ṣe é ṣe tó jẹ́ abéwudé: Ṣé wàá mú ọmọọ̀ rẹ lọ gba òògùn àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èémí rẹ̀, àbí kí o bọ́ ọ?', 'en': 'They present impossible and perilous choices: Do you take your child to get her flu medicine, or do you feed her?'}
{'yo': 'Àbí ṣé kí o jẹ́ kí ara rẹ̀ máa lọ́?', 'en': 'Or do you keep her warm?'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀yàn tí ò ṣe é ṣe ni, ó sì fẹ́rẹ̀ẹ́ jẹ́ pé lóṣooṣù, àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ méje ènìyàn máa ń yàn láàárín òògùn àti agbára.', 'en': "It's an impossible choice, and nearly every month, seven million people choose between medicine and energy."}
{'yo': '"Èyí ń tú àṣìírí ọ̀rọ̀ t""ó tóbi tó sì gba ètò."', 'en': 'This exposes a much larger and systemic issue.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ẹbí tí wọ́n ní ìṣòro agbára tó ga ni àwọn ènìyàn aláwọ̀ dúdú, tí wọ́n máa ń náwó ju ìwọn ẹsẹ̀ kan yàtọ̀ sí àwọn akẹgbẹ́ wọn tí wọ́n jẹ́ aláwọ̀ funfun.', 'en': 'Families with high energy burdens are disproportionately people of color, who spend more per square foot than their white counterparts.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n àwọn olùtọ́-ilé-ìwòsàn, àwọn àgbà-ọ̀jẹ̀ àti àwọn olùkọ́ nílé-ẹ̀kọ́ wà nínú àwọn àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ mẹ́tà-dín-lógójì ènìyàn lọ́dún tí wọn ò níkàpá agbára fún àwọn ohun èlo kòṣe é má nìí jùlọ wọn.', 'en': "But it's also nurses, veterans and even schoolteachers who fall into the mass of 37 million people a year who are unable to afford energy for their most basic needs."}

{'yo': 'Nítorí èyí, àwọn tí wọ́n ní ìṣòra agbára tó ga ṣe é ṣe kí wọ́n ní àwọn àrùn bi àrùn ọkàn àti àrun séèémí-séèémí.', 'en': 'As a result, those with high energy burdens have a greater likelihood of conditions like heart disease and asthma.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ wòó - pẹ̀lú bàlú ayáraféfé wa tó lọ sí máásì àti AI tí ò ju àpò lọ, a ní àwọn irinṣẹ́ láti yanjú àwọn kùdiẹ̀-kudiẹ ètò wọ̀nyí.', 'en': 'Look -- given our rockets to Mars and our pocket-sized AI, we have the tools to address these systemic inequities.'}
{'yo': 'Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ náà wà débi.', 'en': 'The technology is here.'}

{'yo': 'Iye owó ìsọdọ̀tun, bíbo oru, àkójọpọ̀ agbára àti imọ̀-ẹ̀rọ agbára inú-ilé gbogbo ti ń dínkù.', 'en': 'Cost of renewables, insulation, microgrids and smart home technology are all decreasing.'}

{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀, pẹ̀lu bí a ṣe ń súmọ́ ìdọ́gba iye owó, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ti wọ́n ní agbára ìtọ̀sán-oòrùn ń pawó ju ọ̀pọ ọmọ ilẹ̀ America lọ.', 'en': 'However, even as we approach cost parity, the majority of those who own solar earn much more than the average American.'}
{'yo': 'Ìdí nìyí, nígbà tí mo wà lọ́mọdún méjì-lé-lógún, mo dá ilé-iṣẹ́ àìjère RETI sílẹ̀.', 'en': 'This is why, when I was 22, I founded the nonprofit RETI.'}

{'yo': 'Afojúsùn wa ni láti sọ ìṣòro agbára di fúfúyẹ́ nípa ìṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú àwọn àwùjọ, àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ tó ń pèse agbára àti àwọn aṣojú ìjọba bákan náà láti pèse àǹfààní adọ́gba sí agbára aláìléwu, àdínkù agbára àti ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ agbára.', 'en': 'Our mission is to alleviate energy burdens by working with communities, utilities and government agencies alike to provide equitable access to clean energy, energy efficiency and energy technology.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n kò sí ọ̀nà kan ṣoṣo láti yanjú èyí.', 'en': "But there's no one way to solve this."}
{'yo': 'Mo nígbàgbọ́ nínú agbára ní àwọn àwùjọ agbègbè, nínú àyípadà ipa àjọṣepọ̀.', 'en': 'I believe in the power of local communities, in the transforming effect of relationships.'}
{'yo': 'A bẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀lu ṣíṣe iṣẹ́ tààrà pẹ̀lú àwọn àwùjọ tí wọ́n ní ìṣòro agbára tó gajù.', 'en': 'So we start by working directly with the communities that have the highest energy burdens.'}

{'yo': 'A ṣe ìpàdé àkànṣe-iṣẹ́ àti àwọn ètò fún àwọn àwùjọ láti kọ́ nípa òṣi agbára, àti bí ṣíṣe ìsọdọ̀tun kékeré sí ilé-wọn bíi bíbo-oru fún ojú fèrèsé àti amómi-gbóná ṣe lè ṣe púpọ̀ láti ṣàmúlo àdínkù agbára.', 'en': 'We host workshops and events for communities to learn about energy poverty, and how making even small updates to their homes like better insulation for windows and water heaters can go a long way to maximize efficiency.'}

{'yo': 'À ń so àwọn agbègbè mọ́ agbára ìtọ̀sán-òrùn àwùjọ a sì ń léwájú ìwádìí ìgbésẹ̀-àwùjọ lórí ilé aládàṣe àti àwọn èto ṣíṣe àtò láti lè bá àwọn ẹbí mú owó agbára wálè.', 'en': "We're connecting neighborhoods to community solar and spearheading community-led smart home research and installation programs to help families bring down their energy bills."}

{'yo': 'A tún ṣiṣẹ́ tààrà pẹ̀lú àwọn aṣojú tí wọ́n fíbò yàn, tí à ń jà fún owo adọ́gba, nítori láti jẹ́ kí ìran agbára adọ́gba àti aláìléwu kẹ́sẹjárí, a ní láti ṣiṣẹ́ papọ̀ pẹ̀lú ìfọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀.', 'en': "We're even working directly with elected officials, advocating for more equitable pricing, because to see this vision of energy equity and resilience succeed, we have to work together sustainably."}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, orílẹ̀-ède US ń ná ju bílíọ́nù mẹ́ta lọ́dún lórí ìrànlọ́wọ́ sísan owó agbára.', 'en': 'Now, the US spends over three billion a year on energy bill payment assistance.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ètò wọ̀nyí máa ń ran àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ ènìyàn lọ́wọ́, ṣùgbọ́n apá kan nínú àwọn aláìní ni wọ́n lè pèsè ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún.', 'en': "And these programs do help millions of people, but they're only able to help a fraction of those in need."}

{'yo': 'Lóòótọ́, bílíọ́nù mẹ́tà-dín-láàdọ́ta àlàfo ìníkápá agbára-ilé ló wà, nítorí náà ìrànlọ́wọ́ nìkan ò tó.', 'en': 'In fact, there is a 47-billion-dollar home-energy affordability gap, so assistance alone is not sustainable.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n pẹ̀lu ìṣẹ̀da agbára adọ́gba àti aláìléwu nínú àwùjọ wa, a lè ṣe ìdánilójú àǹfààní adọ́gba àti aláìṣègbè sí agbára tí ò léwu, tó ṣe é gbáralé tó sì rọjú.', 'en': 'But by building energy equity and resilience into our communities, we can assure fair and impartial access to energy that is clean, reliable and affordable.'}

{'yo': 'Lórí ìwọ̀n, ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ àkójọpọ̀ agbára, ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ aláìléwu àti àdínkù agbára máa ń mú ìdàgbàsókè bá ìlera gbogbogbò bí eré.', 'en': 'At scale, microgrid technology, clean technology and energy efficiency dramatically improve public health.'}

{'yo': 'Fún àwọn tí wọ́n ní ìṣòro agbára tó ga, ó lè bá wọn gbá ìda ogún owó tí wọ́n ń gbà padà -- ìda ogún owó tí ènìyàn ń gbà tó ń tiraka láti wá oúnjẹ òjọ́.', 'en': "And for those with high energy burdens, it can help them reclaim 20 percent of their income -- 20 percent of a person's income who's struggling to make ends meet."}
{'yo': 'Èyí ń yí ìgbésíayé padà.', 'en': 'This is life-changing.'}
{'yo': 'Àǹfààní rèé fún àwọn ẹbí láti lo àdínkù owó-agbára láti ṣe ìgbọ̀wọ́ ọjọ́-iwájú wọn.', 'en': 'This is an opportunity for families to use their energy savings to sponsor their future.'}

{'yo': 'Mo máa ń ronú padà sí ìyá àgbà ìyá mi àti àwọn alájọgbé wọn, àwọn àǹfààní yíyàn tí ò ṣe é ṣe tí wọ́n ní láti ṣe àti ipa tó ní lórí gbogbo àwùjọ.', 'en': 'I think back to my great-grandmother and her neighbors, the impossible choices that they had to make and the effect it had on our whole community.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n èyí kìí ṣe nípa wọn nìkan.', 'en': 'But this is not just about them.'}
{'yo': 'Àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ lágbàyé ni wọ́n ń ṣe irú àǹfààní yíyàn tí ò ṣe é ṣe yìí kan náà lónì.', 'en': 'There are millions nationwide having to make the same impossible choices today.'}

{'yo': 'Mo mọ̀ pé ìṣòro agbára ńlá jẹ́ wàhálà kan tó pọ̀ láti borí, ṣùgbọ́n nípasẹ̀ àjọṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn àwùjọ àti ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ, a ní àwọn ọ̀nà láti borí wọn.', 'en': 'And I know high energy burdens are a tremendous barrier to overcome, but through relationships with communities and technology, we have the paths to overcome them.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà tí a bá sì ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀, gbogbo wa ni ara wá máa túbọ̀ le sí i', 'en': 'And when we do, we will all be more resilient.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ṣeun.', 'en': 'Thank you.'}
{'yo': 'Ǹjẹ́ a lè dá àyípadà ojú ọjọ́ dúró pẹ̀lu yíyọ CO2 kúrò nínú afẹ́fẹ́?', 'en': 'Can we stop climate change by removing CO2 from the air?'}
{'yo': 'Láti dènà àyípadà ojú ọjọ́ tó léwu, a máa nílò láti gé ìtúsílẹ̀ kù kíákíá.', 'en': "To avoid dangerous climate change, we're going to need to cut emissions rapidly."}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹ́n gbọ́dọ̀ jẹ́ ọ̀rọ̀ tí ò mú awuyewuye dání, ní ìdánilójú pẹ̀lú àwọn olùgbọ́ yìí.', 'en': 'That should be a pretty uncontentious statement, certainly with this audience.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n nǹkankan rèé tó lè fa awuyewuye díẹ̀ lọ́wọ́: kò ní tó.', 'en': "But here's something that's slightly more contentious: it's not going to be enough."}

{'yo': 'A máa rápálá wáyè kọjá ìṣúná èédú tókù fún àléfà kan àtàbọ̀ ní ọdún tó kéré díẹ̀, àti ìṣúná àléfà méjì ní bíi èwá-ọdún méjì.', 'en': 'We will munch our way through our remaining carbon budget for one and a half degrees in a few short years, and the two degree budget in about two decades.'}

{'yo': 'A ò nílò láti gé ìtúsílẹ̀ kù kíákíá nìkan, a tún nílò láti mú òyì-èédú kúrò ní òyì ojú-ayé.', 'en': 'We need to not only cut emissions extremely rapidly, we also need to take carbon dioxide out of the atmosphere.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ṣeun.', 'en': 'Thank you.'}

{'yo': 'Mo ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lu ṣíṣe àyẹ̀wo ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ìlànà tí wọ́n dálábàá wọ̀nyí láti wò ó bóyá wọ́n lè ṣiṣẹ́.', 'en': 'I work assessing a whole range of these proposed techniques to see if they can work.'}

{'yo': 'A lè lo àwọn nǹkan ọ̀gbìn láti mú CO2 kúrò, ká sì tọ́jú wọn sínú igi, inú iyẹ̀pẹ̀, lábẹ́ ilẹ̀ tàbí inú omi-òkun.', 'en': 'We could use plants to take CO2 out, and then store it in trees, in the soil, deep underground or in the oceans.'}

{'yo': 'A lè ṣẹ̀dá àwọn ẹ̀rọ ǹlá-ńlá, àwọn tí wọ́n ń pè ní igi àtọwọ́dá, tí yóò nu CO2 kúrò nínú afẹ́fẹ́.', 'en': 'We could build large machines, so-called artificial trees, that will scrub CO2 from the air.'}

{'yo': 'Kí àwọn èrò wọ̀nyí lè ṣe é ṣe, a nílò láti mọ̀ bóyá a lè ṣàmúlò wọ́n lórí ìwọ̀n ńlá lọ́nà tí ò fi ní séwu, tí yóò sì jẹ́ gbígbà fún ọrọ̀-ajé àti àwùjọ.', 'en': 'For these ideas to be feasible, we need to understand whether they can be applied at a vast scale in a way that is safe, economic and socially acceptable.'}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo èrò wọ̀nyí ló wá pẹ̀lú kùdìẹ̀kudiẹ.', 'en': 'All of these ideas come with tradeoffs.'}
{'yo': 'Kò sí ìkankan nínú wọn tó pé tán, ṣùgbọ́n ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ nínú wọn ló ṣe é ṣe.', 'en': 'None of them are perfect, but many have potential.'}
{'yo': 'Kò dájú pé ìkakan nínú wọn lè yanjú rẹ̀ lóun nìkan.', 'en': "It's unlikely that any one of them will solve it on its own."}

{'yo': 'Kò sí idán Kankan, ṣùgbọ́n bóyá lápapọ̀, wọ́n lè pidán tí a nílò láti dá àyípadà ojú-ọjọ́ dúró ní orípa rẹ̀.', 'en': 'There is no silver bullet, but potentially together, they may form the silver buckshot that we need to stop climate change in its tracks.'}

{'yo': 'Mò ń ṣiṣẹ́ àdáṣe lórí èrò kan tó ń lo òyì-àtilẹ̀tu láti pèse iná-mànàmáná ní ọ̀nà tí yóò mú òyì-èédú kúrò nínú afẹ́fẹ́.', 'en': "I'm working independently on one particular idea which uses natural gas to generate electricity in a way that takes carbon dioxide out of the air."}
{'yo': 'Báwo ni iyẹ́n ṣe ń ṣiṣẹ́?', 'en': 'How does that work?'}
{'yo': 'Ìgbésẹ̀ Agbara Iná-mànàmáná Origen máa ń fi afẹ́fẹ́-ìdáná àtilẹ̀tu sínú pádi epo-rọ̀bì.', 'en': 'So the Origen Power Process feeds natural gas into a fuel cell.'}

{'yo': 'Bíi àbọ agbára kẹ́míkà ní yóò yípadà di iná-mànàmáná, àwọn ìyókù yóò sì di ooru, tí wọ́n ń lò láti sọ òkúta-ẹfun di ẹfun àti òyì-èédú.', 'en': 'About half the chemical energy is converted into electricity, and the remainder into heat, which is used to break down limestone into lime and carbon dioxide.'}
{'yo': 'Níbi tí a dé yìí, bóyá ẹ̀ ń rò ó wí pé orí mi ò pé.', 'en': "Now at this point, you're probably thinking that I'm nuts."}
{'yo': 'Ó ń ṣẹ̀da òyì-èédú lóòótọ́.', 'en': "It's actually generating carbon dioxide."}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n Kókó ibẹ̀ ni wí pé, gbogbo òyì-èédú tó ń ṣẹdá, láti inu pádi epo-rọ̀bì àti ààro ẹfun, ló mọ́ gaara, ìyẹn sì ṣe pàtàkì, nítorí ó túmọ̀ sí wí pé ẹ lè lo yálà òyì-èédú yẹn tàbí kí ẹ kó o pamọ́ sábẹ́ ilẹ̀ lówó kékeré.', 'en': "But the key point is, all of the carbon dioxide generated, both from the fuel cell and from the lime kiln, is pure, and that's really important, because it means you can either use that carbon dioxide or you can store it away deep underground at low cost."}

{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn náà ẹfun tí ẹ ti ṣẹ̀dá yẹn lè di lílò fún ìpèsè nǹkan nílé-iṣẹ́, àti lílò ó, ó máa ń nu CO2 kúrò nínú afẹ́fẹ́.', 'en': 'And then the lime that you produce can be used in industrial processes, and in being used, it scrubs CO2 out of the air.'}
{'yo': 'Lápapọ̀, ìgbésẹ̀ náà kì í pèse òyì-èédú.', 'en': 'Overall, the process is carbon negative.'}
{'yo': 'Ó máa ń yọ òyì-èédú kúrò nínú afẹ́fẹ́ ni.', 'en': 'It removes carbon dioxide from the air.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ẹ bá ń ṣẹ̀da iná mànàmáná látara òyì-àtilẹ̀tu dáadáa, bíi irinwó gírámu CO2 ni è ń gbé jáde sínu afẹfẹ́ fún gbogbo wákàti kílówáátì kọ̀ọ̀kan.', 'en': 'If you normally generate electricity from natural gas, you emit about 400 grams of CO2 into the air for every kilowatt-hour.'}
{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú ìgbésẹ̀ yìí, fígọ̀ yẹn jẹ́ pẹ̀lú àyọkúrò ẹgbẹ̀ta.', 'en': 'With this process, that figure is minus 600.'}

{'yo': 'Lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí, ìpèse agbára ló ń ṣe okùnfa bíi ìdá kan nínú ìdá mẹ́rin gbogbo ìtúsílẹ̀ òyì-èédú.', 'en': 'At the moment, power generation is responsible for about a quarter of all carbon dioxide emissions.'}

{'yo': 'Ní àbá, tí ẹ bá rọ́pò gbogbo ìpèse agbára pẹ̀lú ìgbésẹ̀ yìí, ẹ ò ní yọ gbogbo àwọn ìtúsílẹ̀ látara ìpèse agbára nìkan ṣùgbọ́n ẹ ó bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí yọ àwọn ìtúsílẹ̀ ní àwọn ẹ̀ka mìíràn bákan náà, gígé ìda ọgọ́ta gbogbo ìtúsílẹ̀ èédú.', 'en': 'Hypothetically, if you replaced all power generation with this process, then you would not only eliminate all of the emissions from power generation but you would start removing emissions from other sectors as well, potentially cutting 60 percent of overall carbon emissions.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ lè tún lo ẹfun náà láti dàápọ̀ mọ́ omi-ọ̀sà tààrà láti mú àdínkù bá ẹ̀kan omi-òkun, ọ̀kan nínú àwọn wàhálà mìíràn tí CO2 ń fà nínú òyì ojú-ayé.', 'en': 'You could even use the lime to add it directly to seawater to counteract ocean acidification, one of the other issues that is caused by CO2 in the atmosphere.'}
{'yo': 'Lóòótọ́, ẹ ó gbà ju iye tí ẹ fi sílẹ̀ lọ̀.', 'en': 'In fact, you get more bang for your buck.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ máa gba bíi ìlọ́po méjì òyì-èédú sára nígbà tí ẹ bá dàápọ̀ mọ́ omi-ọ̀sà ju tí ẹ bá lò ó nílé-iṣẹ́ lọ.', 'en': 'You absorb about twice as much carbon dioxide when you add it to seawater as when you use it industrially.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ibí yìí ló ti máa ń di àmúdijú gidi gan-an.', 'en': 'But this is where it gets really complicated.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí mímú àdínkù bá ẹ̀kan omi-òkun jẹ́ nǹkan tó dára, a ò nímọ̀ kíkún nípa nǹkan tí àbájáde rẹ̀ láwùjọ jẹ́, nítorí náà a nílò láti ṣàyèwò bóyá ìtọ́jú yìí dára lóòótọ́ ju àrùn tó fẹ́ wósàn lọ.', 'en': "While counteracting ocean acidification is a good thing, we don't fully understand what the environmental consequences are, and so we need to assess whether this treatment is actually better than the disease that it is seeking to cure."}
{'yo': 'A nílò láti ṣèto ìdarí lẹ́sẹẹsẹ fún àwọn ìdánwò láti ṣe àyẹ̀wò yìí láìséwu.', 'en': 'We need to put in place step-by-step governance for experiments to assess this safely.'}

{'yo': 'Ìwọn rẹ̀: láti dèna àyípadà ojú-ọjọ́ tó léwu, a máa nílò láti yọ tírílíọ́nù - bẹ́ẹ̀ni, tírílíọ́nù nìyẹn pẹ̀lú T --tírílíọ́nu tọ́ọ́nu òyì-èédú kúrò nínú òyi-ojú-ayé ní èwá-ọdún tó wà níwájú.', 'en': "And the scale: to avoid dangerous climate change, we are going to need to remove trillions -- and yes, that's trillions with a T -- trillions of tons of carbon dioxide from the atmosphere in the decades ahead."}

{'yo': 'Ó máa ná wa ní ìda GDP díẹ̀ -- bóyá owó-nàá ológun, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àmúṣe-iṣẹ́ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àti àwọn àyọrísí mìíràn tó léwu tá ò lè fẹ́kù.', 'en': 'It will cost a few percent of GDP -- think defense-sized expenditure, lots of industrial activity and inevitably harmful side effects.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n tí ìwọn náà bá tóbi, nítorí ìwọ̀n ìṣòro tí a ń wá láti yanjú nìkan ni.', 'en': 'But if the scale seems enormous, it is only because of the scale of the problem that we are seeking to solve.'}
{'yo': 'Ó sì tóbi bákan náà.', 'en': "It's enormous as well."}
{'yo': 'A ò lè ma pẹ́ àwọn ìṣòro tó lágbára wọ̀nyí mọ́', 'en': 'We can no longer avoid these thorny issues.'}

{'yo': 'À ń kọjú ewu ní gbogbo ibi tí a bá yíjú sí: ilé-ayé tí àyípadà ojú-ọjọ́ ti yí padà tàbí ilé-ayé tí àyípadà ojú-ojú ti yí padà àti ìgbìyànju wa láti tako àyípadà ojú-ọjọ́.', 'en': 'We face risks whichever way we turn: a world changed by climate change or a world changed by climate change and our efforts to counter climate change.'}

{'yo': 'Ó wùn mí kí ó má rì í bẹ́ẹ̀, ṣùgbọ́n a ò lè dijúu wa, dí etí wa, kí á má sọ la-la-la mọ́.', 'en': 'Would that it were not so, but we can no longer afford to close our eyes, block our ears, and say la-la-la.'}
{'yo': 'A nílò láti dàgbà sókè ká sì kojú àbájáde àwọn ìwa wa.', 'en': 'We need to grow up and face the consequences of our actions.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé ọ̀rọ̀ nípa ìwòsan àyípadà ojú ọjọ́ ń dèna ìpinnu láti gé ìtúsílẹ̀ ni?', 'en': 'Does talk of curing climate change undermine the will to cut emissions?'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀dun ọkàn tòótọ́ ni èyí, nítorí náà a nílò láti tẹnu mọ́ pàtàki mímú àdínkù bá ìtúsílẹ̀ àti bí àwọn èrò wọ̀nyí ṣe jẹ́ àhesọ-ọ̀rọ̀.', 'en': 'This is a real concern, so we need to emphasize the paramount importance of reducing emissions and how speculative these ideas are.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n lẹ́yìn tí a ti ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀, a ṣì nílò láti ṣe àyẹ̀wo wọn.', 'en': 'But having done so, we still need to examine them.'}
{'yo': 'Ǹjẹ́ a lè ṣe ìwòsan àyípadà ojú-ọjọ́?', 'en': 'Can we cure climate change?'}
{'yo': 'Mi ò mọ̀, ṣùgbọ́n a ò lè mọ̀ tí a ò bá gbíyànjú.', 'en': "I don't know, but we certainly can't if we don't try."}
{'yo': 'A nílò ìpinnu láìsí ìgbéraga.', 'en': 'We need ambition without arrogance.'}

{'yo': 'A nílò ìpinnu láti ṣe àdápadà òyì-ojú-ayé, láti fa òyì-èédú wálẹ̀ padà sí ìpele tí ó wà ní ìbámu pẹ̀lu ojú-ọjọ́ tí kò yí pada àti omi-òkun tó lálàáfíà.', 'en': 'We need the ambition to restore the atmosphere, to draw down carbon dioxide back to a level that is compatible with a stable climate and healthy oceans.'}
{'yo': 'Iṣẹ́ tó pọ̀ ni eléyìí máa jẹ́.', 'en': 'This will be an enormous undertaking.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ lè ṣàpèjúwe rẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bi iṣẹ́-àkànṣe ọjọ́-iwájú.', 'en': 'You could describe it as a cathedral project.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn tí wọ́n lọ́wọ́ nínú rẹ̀ láti ìbẹ̀rẹ́ lè ya àwòran rẹ̀ kí wọ́n sì ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ rẹ̀, ṣùgbọ́n wọn ò ní gbé e dé òkè ténté.', 'en': 'Those involved at the outset may draft the plans and dig the foundations, but they will not raise the spire to its full height.'}
{'yo': 'Iṣẹ́ yẹn, àǹfààní yẹn, àwọn tí a ṣẹ̀ sílẹ̀ ni wọ́n ni í.', 'en': 'That task, that privilege, belongs to our descendants.'}

{'yo': 'Kò sí ẹnikẹ́ni nínú wa tí yóò rí ọjọ́ náà, ṣùgbọ́n a gbọdọ̀ bẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ìrètí pé àwọn iran ọjọ́-iwájú máa lè parí iṣẹ́ náà.', 'en': 'None of us will see that day, but we must start in the hope that future generations will be able to finish the job.'}
{'yo': 'Nítorí náà, ṣe ẹ fẹ́ mú àyípadà bá ilé-ayé?', 'en': 'So, do you want to change the world?'}
{'yo': 'Mi ò fẹ́.', 'en': "I don't."}
{'yo': 'Mi ò wá láti mú àyípadà bá ilé-ayé, ṣùgbọ́n láti fi sí bó ṣe yẹ kó wà.', 'en': "I do not seek the change the world, but rather keep it as it's meant to be."}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ṣeun.', 'en': 'Thank you.'}
{'yo': 'Chris Anderson: Ẹ ṣeun.', 'en': 'Chris Anderson: Thanks.'}
{'yo': 'Mo kọ̀ fẹ́ bi yín ní àwọn ìbéèrè mìíràn bi mélòó kan ni.', 'en': 'I just want to ask you a couple of other questions.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ sọ díẹ̀ si fúnwa nípa èro fífi ẹfun sínú omi-òkun.', 'en': 'Tell us a bit more about this idea of putting lime in the ocean.'}

{'yo': 'Mò ń sọ nípa pé, bóṣe rí lójú, ó ń fanimọ́ra -- atako ẹ̀kan omi òkun -- tó sì ń gba ọ̀pọ̀ CO2 móra.', 'en': "I mean, on the face of it, it's pretty compelling -- anti-ocean acidification -- and it absorbs more CO2."}
{'yo': 'Ẹ sọ̀rọ̀ nípa pé, a nílò láti ṣe ìdánwò lórí èyí.', 'en': 'You talked about, we need to do an experiment on this.'}
{'yo': 'Báwo ni ìdánwò tó ṣe é gbáralé ṣe máa ri?', 'en': 'What would a responsible experiment look like?'}

{'yo': 'Tim Kruger: mo rò wí pé ẹ nílò láti ṣe ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìdánwò, ṣùgbọ́n ẹ nílò láti ṣe wọ́n ní kékeré nípele-ìpele.', 'en': 'Tim Kruger: So I think you need to do a series of experiments, but you need to do them just very small stage-by-stage.'}

{'yo': 'Ní ìlànà kan náà, nígbà tí ẹ bá ń ṣe àyẹ̀wò oògùn tuntun, ẹ ò kò ní lọ sí àyẹ̀wò lára ènìyan tààrà.', 'en': "In the same way, when you're trialing a new drug, you wouldn't just go into human trials straight off."}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ó ṣe ìdánwò kékeré.', 'en': 'You would do a small experiment.'}

{'yo': 'Nítorí náà nǹkan àkọ́kọ́ láti ṣe ni ìdánwò lórí ilẹ̀, nínú abọ́ àkànṣe, kúrò láàárín agbègbè.', 'en': 'And so the first things to do are experiments entirely on land, in special containers, away from the environment.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà tó bá ti dáa yín lójú pé eyí ṣe é ṣe láìséwu, ẹ ó sì tẹ̀síwájú sí ipele tó kàn.', 'en': 'And then once you are confident that that can be done safely, you move to the next stage.'}
{'yo': 'Bí kò bá dáa yín lójú, ẹ ò ní ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': "If you're not confident, you don't."}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ní ìpele-ìpele.', 'en': 'But step by step.'}
{'yo': 'CA: tani yóò ṣe onígbọ̀wọ́ irú ìdánwò bẹ́ẹ̀?', 'en': 'CA: And who would fund such experiments?'}
{'yo': 'Nítorí wọ́n nípa lára gbogbo àgbáyé ní àwọn ìpele kan.', 'en': 'Because they kind of impact the whole planet at some level.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé ìdí nìyẹn tí nǹkankan ò ṣe tíì ṣẹlẹ̀ nípa eléyìí?', 'en': 'Is that why nothing is happening on this?'}

{'yo': 'TK: mo rò wí pé ẹ lè ṣe ìdánwò oníwọ̀n-kékeré nínú àwọn omi orílẹ̀-èdè, nígbà náà bóyá àwọn onígbọ̀wọ́ orílẹ̀-èdè nìkan ni yóò nílò láti ṣe ìyẹn.', 'en': "TK: So I think you can do small-scale experiments in national waters, and then it's probably the requirement of national funders to do that."}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n nígbẹ́yìn, tí ẹ bá fẹ́ tako ẹ̀kan omi-òkun lórí ìwọ̀n àgbáyé lọ́nà yìí, ẹ máa nílò láti ṣe é nínú omi ilẹ̀ òkèèrè, ẹ ó sì nílò láti ní àwọn orílè-èdè àgbáyé láti ṣiṣẹ́ lórí rẹ̀.', 'en': 'But ultimately, if you wanted to counter ocean acidification in this way on a global scale, you would need to do it in international waters, and then you would need to have an international community working on it.'}
{'yo': 'CA: kódà nínú àwọn omi orílẹ̀-èdè, ẹ mọ̀, àwọn omi-òkun náà jápọ̀.', 'en': "CA: Even in national waters, you know, the ocean's all connected."}
{'yo': 'Ẹfun yẹn máa jáde síta yẹn.', 'en': 'That lime is going to get out there.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ènìyán sì máa ń bínú gan-an nípa ṣíṣe ìdánwò nínú ayé, bí a ṣe ti gbọ́.', 'en': "And people feel outraged about doing experiments on the planet, as we've heard."}
{'yo': 'Báwo lẹ ó ṣe tako ìyẹn?', 'en': 'How do you counter that?'}
{'yo': 'TK: mo rò wí pé ẹ mẹ́nu ba nǹkankan tó ṣe pàtàkì púpọ̀', 'en': 'TK: I think you touch on something which is really important.'}
{'yo': 'Nípa ìfàyègbà àwùjọ láti ṣiṣẹ́ ni.', 'en': "It's about a social license to operate."}

{'yo': 'Mo rò pé ó lè jẹ́ wí pé kò ṣe é ṣe láti ṣe é, ṣùgbọ́n a nílò láti ní ìgboyà láti gbìyànjú, láti sún èyí síwájú, láti rí nǹkan tí a lẹ̀ ṣe, ká sì sọ̀rọ̀ ní gbangba.', 'en': 'And I think it may be that it is impossible to do, but we need to have the courage to try, to move this forward, to see what we can do, and to engage openly.'}
{'yo': 'A sì nílò láti bá àwọn ènìyàn sọ̀rọ̀ lọ́nà tó hàn kedere.', 'en': 'And we need to engage with people in a transparent way.'}
{'yo': 'A nílò láti bi wọ́n ṣíwájú.', 'en': 'We need to ask them beforehand.'}

{'yo': '"Mo sì rò wí pé tí a bá bi wọ́n, a ní láti ṣi ọkàn wa sílẹ̀ pé ó ṣe é ṣe kí ìdáhùn náà máa padà wá ní, ""Rárá, má ṣe é."', 'en': '"And I think if we ask them, we have to be open to the possibility that the answer will come back, ""No, don\'t do it."'}
{'yo': 'CA: Ẹ ṣeun púpọ̀.', 'en': 'CA: Thanks so much.'}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹ́n fanimọ́ra gigi gan-an.', 'en': 'That was really fascinating.'}
{'yo': 'TK: Ẹ ṣeun.', 'en': 'TK: Thank you.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́, ìdáhùn ajẹmọ́ agbègbè sí COVID-19.', 'en': 'A comprehensive, neighborhood-based response to COVID-19'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ káalẹ́.', 'en': 'Good evening.'}

{'yo': '"Ìbùkún ni ó jẹ́ láti ṣiṣẹ́ ní Harlem Children\'s Zone, ilé-iṣẹ́ tí àwọn Ọmọ Ilẹ̀-Adúláwọ́ àti America ń léwájú t""ó ti ṣínà ẹ̀ka ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́ iṣẹ́ ajẹmọ́-àyè, láti ọmọ-ọwọ́ débi iṣẹ́."', 'en': "It is such a blessing to work at the Harlem Children's Zone, an African-American-led organization that has pioneered the field of comprehensive place-based services, from cradle to career."}
{'yo': '"Ọ̀rọ̀ yẹn, ""ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́"" ṣe pàtàkì sí nǹkan tí à ń ṣe."', 'en': '"And that word, ""comprehensive,"" is so key to what we do."'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ mọ̀, ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ìdásí máa ń kojú mọ́ ayò àmúdijú, ńlá kan ni.', 'en': 'You know, most interventions focus on one piece of a complicated, giant puzzle.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ìyẹn ò tó láti wá ìyanjú sí ayò náà.', 'en': "But that's not enough to solve the puzzle."}

{'yo': 'Ẹ ò lè yanjú ètò-ẹ̀kọ́ láìnímọ̀ nípa ọ̀gangan-ipò ilé tàbí ayíká ilé àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ kékèèké.', 'en': "You don't solve education without understanding the home context or the home environment of our young scholar."}
{'yo': 'Tàbí ọ̀gangan-ipò ìlera tó fẹjú, ìṣaralóore tàbí ìdájọ́ ìwà-ọ̀daràn.', 'en': 'Or the broader context of health, nutrition or criminal justice.'}
{'yo': 'Ìwọn àyípadà fún wa kì í ṣe ọmọ kọ̀ọ̀kan, gbogbo àdúgbò ni.', 'en': "The unit of change for us is not the individual child, it's the entire neighborhood."}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ní láti ṣe ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ nǹkan lẹ́ẹ̀kan náà.', 'en': 'You have to do multiple things at the same time.'}
{'yo': 'A ní dátà ogún ọdún láti fi ṣẹ̀rí pé èyí ń ṣiṣé.', 'en': 'And we have 20 years of data to prove that this works.'}

{'yo': 'A ti ní ẹgbẹ̀rún méje àwọn àkẹ́kọ̀ọ́jáde ní ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ ìkókó wa, a ti pana àlàfo àṣeyọrí dúdú àti funfun ní ilé-ẹ̀kọ wa.', 'en': "We've had 7,000 graduates of our baby college, we've eliminated the Black-white achievement gap in our schools."}

{'yo': 'A ti mú àdínkù bá ìṣọwọ́-sanra nínú àwọn ètò ìlera wa sì ní tó ẹgbẹ̀rún kan àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tí wọ́n ti forúkọsílẹ̀ ní ilé-ẹ̀kọ wa.', 'en': "We've reduced obesity rates in our health programs and have close to 1,000 students enrolled in college."}
{'yo': 'A hun àwọ̀n iṣẹ́ papọ̀ dọindọin, kí ẹnikẹ́ni má bá à jábọ́ níbi tó ti lanu.', 'en': 'We weave together a net of services so tightly, so that no one will fall through the cracks.'}
{'yo': 'A ti ṣe ìwúrí fún àwọn tó ń ṣe é lágbàáyé.', 'en': "And we've inspired global practitioners."}

{'yo': 'A ti ní àwọn àwùjọ tó lé láàdọ́ta káàkiri orílẹ̀-ède US àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tó lé láàdọ́rin ni wọ́n máa ń wá yọjú síwa láti kọ́ àwòṣe wa.', 'en': "We've had over 500-plus communities across the US and 70-plus countries come and visit us to learn our model."}

{'yo': 'Ṣẹ́ ẹ rí i, àwọn ìṣòro àgbáyé, àti àwọn ìṣòro ilé-ayé ni wọn ò bomi rin dáadáa.', 'en': 'You see, the problems of the globe, and the problems of the world are not neatly siloed into buckets.'}
{'yo': 'Nítorí náà àwọn ìyanjú náà gbọ́dọ̀ jẹ́ ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́, wọ́n gbọ́dọ̀ jẹ́ lápapọ̀.', 'en': 'So therefore the solutions must be comprehensive, they must be holistic.'}
{'yo': 'Nísisìyí a wà nínú àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn káríayé.', 'en': "And now we're in the midst of a global pandemic."}
{'yo': 'COVID-19 ti fi àwọn nǹkan ti a ti mọ̀ tẹ́lẹ̀ pé òótọ́ ni hàn wá.', 'en': 'COVID-19 has revealed to us what we always knew to be true.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn tí wọ́n kúṣẹ̀ jùlọ láàárín wa ni wọ́n ń san ẹ̀jẹ́ tó pọ̀jù pẹ̀lú èmi wọn àti ọ̀nà ìwá ìjẹ-ìmu wọn.', 'en': 'The poorest among us pay the highest price with their lives and their livelihood.'}

{'yo': 'Ìyẹ́n sì ń ṣẹlẹ̀ lójoojúmọ́ ní àwùjọ àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ní orílẹ̀-ède America, níbi tó ti ṣe é ṣe kí COVID pa wa ní ìlọ́po mẹ́rìn-dín-lọ́gbọ̀n ju àwọn akẹgbẹ́ wa tí wọ́n jẹ́ aláwò funfun lọ.', 'en': "And that's playing out every day in the African American community, where we're 3.6 times more likely to die of COVID than our white counterparts."}

{'yo': 'À ń rí àwọn ìyàtọ̀ ìlera wọ̀nyẹn lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀ ní New York City, níbi tó ti àrùn yìí ti wọ́pọ̀ jùlọ lórílẹ̀-ède wa.', 'en': "We're seeing those health disparities on the ground in New York City, our nation's epicenter."}

{'yo': 'Láti sọ ipa ìyàtọ̀ ìlera náà di púpọ̀, ìpalára ọrọ̀ ajé tó fojú hàn wà, níbi tí ọ̀kan nínú mẹ́rin àwọn ẹbíi wa ní Harlem ti ń jábọ̀ àìróúnjẹ jẹ, ti ìda mẹ́tà-dín-lọ́gọ́ta ń jábọ̀ ìpàdánù owó-oṣù tàbí ìpàdánù iṣẹ́ wọn.', 'en': "And to compound the impact of the health disparities, there's significant economic devastation, where one in four of our families in Harlem report food insecurity, and 57 percent report a loss of income or a loss of their job."}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n láti túbọ̀ ní ìmọ̀ nípa iṣẹ́ tí Harlem Children Zone ń ṣe, mo fẹ́ sọ ìtàn kan fún yín, nípa akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ilé-ìwé alákọ̀ọ́bẹ́rẹ̀ kejì tí orúkọ rẹ̀ ńjẹ́ Sean.', 'en': "But to better understand the work of the Harlem Children's Zone, I want to share a story with you, about a second-grade scholar named Sean."}
{'yo': 'Sean jẹ́ ọmọdékùnrin aláwọ̀-dúdú to rewà tí ẹ̀rin rẹ̀ máa ń mú ìdùnnú wọ inú yàrá tó bá wà ni.', 'en': "Sean is a beautiful Black boy whose smile would light up any room that he's in."}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí ìyàsọ́tọ̀ bẹ́rẹ̀ ní oṣù Ẹ̀rẹnà, a ṣàkíyèsí wí pé Sean ò kín wá sí ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ orí ẹ̀rọ ayélukára.', 'en': "And when quarantine began in March, we noticed that Sean wasn't attending virtual school."}
{'yo': 'Léyìn ìwádìí díẹ̀, a wá mọ̀ wí pé ìya Sean wà nílé-ìwòsàn nítorí COVID.', 'en': "And after some investigation, we've come to learn that Sean's mom was hospitalized due to COVID."}

{'yo': 'Òún wà nílé pẹ̀lu ìyá-àgba rẹ̀ àti àbúro rẹ̀ kékeré, tó ṣe pé òun nìkan náà ni alátìlẹyìn fun, nígbà tó jẹ́ wí pé wọ́n ti fi baba Sean sẹ́wọ̀n.', 'en': "So he was at home with grandma and his baby sibling, who was his only viable support system, since Sean's father is incarcerated."}
{'yo': 'Ìyá-àgbà ń tiraka ni.', 'en': 'Grandma was struggling.'}

{'yo': 'Kò sí oúnjẹ púpọ̀ ní ilé náà, ìlédì díẹ̀, Sean náà ò wulẹ̀ ní ẹ̀rọ-ayárabíàṣá kankan.', 'en': "There wasn't much food in the household, limited diapers, and Sean didn't even have a computer."}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí wọ́n tú ìya rẹ̀ sílẹ̀ nílé-ìwòsàn, ìdojúko wọ́n túbọ̀ fẹjú síi, nítorí wọn ò lè gbépọ̀ pẹ̀lú ìyá-àgba wọn mọ́, nítorí ipọ̀-ilere àtẹ̀yìnwá rẹ̀.', 'en': 'When mom was released from the hospital, their challenges deepened, because they could no longer stay with grandma, due to her preexisting health conditions.'}
{'yo': 'Nitorí náà Sean, àbúro rẹ̀ kékeré àti ìya rẹ̀ ní láti lọ sílé àwọn aláìní.', 'en': 'So Sean, his baby sibling and his mom had to go to a shelter.'}
{'yo': "Ìtan Sean kìí ṣe ní Harlem Children's Zone nìkan.", 'en': "Sean's story is not atypical at the Harlem Children's Zone."}

{'yo': 'A mọ wí pé Sean àti àwọn àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ bíi tiẹ̀ káàkiri orílẹ̀-èdè náà lẹ́tọ̀ọ́ láti ní gbogbo nǹkan tí ayé yìí ní láti fúnni, láìjẹ́pé àìdọ́gda yóò ma jàwọ́n lólè irú àǹfààní yẹn.', 'en': 'We know Sean and millions like him all across the country deserve to have everything that this world has to offer, without inequality robbing them of that opportunity.'}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo èsi ẹlẹ́yàmẹyà ìtàn àti ètò àìdókòwò ti wá papọ̀ mọ́ COVID-19.', 'en': 'All the result of racism and historical and systemic underinvestment are now compounded by COVID-19.'}
{'yo': "Èkúnrẹ́rẹ́ àwòṣe wa gbé Harlem Children's Zone sínu ìjàgùdu COVID lọ́nà ọ̀tọ̀.", 'en': "Our comprehensive model uniquely positions the Harlem Children's Zone in the fight of COVID."}

{'yo': 'Àṣeyọrí tí a ní lọ́pọ̀ ní Harlem sọ ó di pàtàkì, ojúṣe wa sì ni láti sọ ohun tí a mọ̀ pé ó ṣiṣe fún orílè-èdè.', 'en': 'The success that we have on the ground in Harlem makes it imperative, and it is our responsibility to share what we know works with the country.'}

{'yo': 'A ti ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́ ìdáhùn sí ìdẹ̀rùn àti ìpadàbọ̀-sípò COVID-19 fún àwùjọ wa, tí ó jẹyọ ní àwùjọ wa, tó dálé àwọn kókó nǹkan kòṣeémánìí márùn-ún, a sì ń ṣe àtìlẹyìn fún àwọn ẹbí bíi ti Sean.', 'en': "We have developed a comprehensive COVID-19 relief and recovery response for our community, that was surfaced from our community, focused on five primary areas of need, and already servicing families like Sean's."}
{'yo': 'Àwọn náà rè é.', 'en': 'They are the following.'}
{'yo': 'Àkọ́kọ́, owó ìdẹ̀run pàjáwírì.', 'en': 'One, emergency relief funds.'}
{'yo': 'A mọ̀ wí pé àwọn ẹbí wa nílò owó lọ́wọ́ wọn lásíkò yìí.', 'en': 'We know that our families need cash in their hands right now.'}
{'yo': 'Ìkejì, dídáààbò bo àwọn akọ́gun-séwujù wa.', 'en': 'Two, protecting our most vulnerable.'}
{'yo': 'A mọ̀ wí pé àwọn ẹbí wa nílò àǹfààní sí àwọn ohun-èlo-kòṣeémánì àti ìfitónilétí.', 'en': 'We know our families need access to essential goods and information.'}
{'yo': 'Oúnjẹ nìyẹn, ìbòmú nìyẹn, àkójọpọ̀ ohun-èlò àti ìpolongo ìlera gbogbogbò.', 'en': "So that is food, that's masks, that's a curated resource list and public health campaigns."}
{'yo': 'Ìkẹ́ta, dídí àlàfo àìdọ́gba àrọ́wọ́tó ẹ̀rọ- ayélukára.', 'en': 'Three, bridging the digital divide.'}
{'yo': 'A nígbàgbọ́ wí pé ẹ̀tọ kòṣeémánì ni ẹ̀rọ̀-ayélukára jẹ́.', 'en': 'We believe that internet is a fundamental right.'}

{'yo': 'A ní láti ríi dájú wí pé àwọn ẹbí wa ní ìsopọ̀ mọ́ ẹ̀rọ-ayélukára, bákan náà gbogbo àwọn ọmọ tí ọjọ́-orí wọ́n wà lábẹ́ ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ní ilé kan ni wọ́n ní ohun-èlò ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tó tọ́.', 'en': 'So we need to ensure our families have connectivity, and also all school-age children in a household have the proper learning devices.'}
{'yo': 'Ìkẹ́rin, àìpàdánù ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́.', 'en': 'Four, zero learning loss.'}

{'yo': 'A mọ̀ wí pé àwọn ìran akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ kan wà tí wọ́n wà nínú ewu ìpàdánù gbogbo ọdún ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ wọn.', 'en': "We know that there's a generation of students at risk of losing an entire year of their education."}

{'yo': 'A nílò láti ríi wí pé à ń pèsè ètò ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ẹrọ-ayélukára tó lágbára, ní àfikún sí ṣíṣe ètò ìpadàwọlé aláìléwu fún ìpadàwọlé ilé-ẹ̀kọ́.', 'en': 'We need to make sure that we are providing high-quality virtual programing, in addition to having safe reentry planned for school reentry.'}
{'yo': 'Ìkarùn-ún, mímú àdínkù bá àrùn ọpọlọ.', 'en': 'And five, mitigating the mental health crisis.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ìran kan wà nínú ewu níní PTSD, nítorí àpọ̀jù májèlé ti láàláà.', 'en': "There's a generation at risk of having PTSD, due to the massive amounts of toxic stress."}

{'yo': 'A nílò láti ríi dájú pé àwọn ẹbí wa ní àǹfààní sí ètò-ìlera orí ẹ̀rọ ayélukára àti àwọn ìrànlọ́wọ́ orí ẹ̀rọ-ayélukára mìíràn.', 'en': 'We need to ensure that our families have access to telehealth and other virtual supports.'}

{'yo': 'A ní àwọn alájọṣepọ̀ tó dantọ́ mẹ́fà káàkiri àwọn ìletò mẹ́fà ní orílẹ̀-ède United States tí wọ́n ń tẹ̀lé àwòṣe wa fún ọ̀gangan-ipò tiwọn ní àwùjọ wọn.', 'en': 'We have six amazing partners across six cities in the United States that are adopting our model for their own context in their community.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn náà ni Oakland, Minneapolis, Chicago, Detroit, Newark àti Atlanta.', 'en': 'They are Oakland, Minneapolis, Chicago, Detroit, Newark and Atlanta.'}

{'yo': 'Ní àfikún sí àwọn alájọṣepọ̀ wọ̀nyẹn, a ní àwọn alájọṣepọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè mẹ́ta, tí wọ́n yóò ma pín àwòṣe wa àti àwọn èto wa lórí ìkàni wọn, ní àfikún sí pípariwo ipa wa pẹ̀lú àtìlẹ́yìn ìpinnu.', 'en': 'In addition to those partners, we have three national partners, who will be sharing our model and sharing our strategies through their network, in addition to amplifying our impact by policy advocacy.'}
{'yo': 'A máa ní ipa ní ìpele mẹ́ta.', 'en': 'We will have impact on three levels.'}

{'yo': 'Ipa ẹnìkọ̀ọ̀kan lọ́pọ̀ ní Harlem, káàkiri iye àwọn àbájáde nínú ètò-ẹ̀kọ́, nínú ètò-ìlera, nínú ọrọ̀-ajé, kíkànsí ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́nà 30 àwọn ènìyàn.', 'en': 'Individual impact on the ground in Harlem, across a number of outcomes in education, in health, in economics, reaching 30,000 people.'}

{'yo': 'Ipa ìpele àwùjọ náà wà káàkiri àwọn ìletò mẹ́fà, bákan náà nípasẹ̀ àwọn alájọṣepọ̀ wa tó dántọ́, tí wọ́n yóò kàn sí àfikún ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́nà 70 àwọn ènìyàn.', 'en': "There's community-level impact across six cities, again through our amazing partners, that will reach an additional 70,000 people."}

{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn náà ipa lórí orílẹ̀ èdè, kì í ṣe nípa ìgbawí ìlànà-ìṣe nìkan, ṣùgbọ́n nípasẹ̀ mím ìronilagbara de ojú ìwọ̀n.', 'en': 'And then national impact, not only through policy advocacy, but through capacity building at scale.'}

{'yo': 'Ìdáhùn wa sí COVID-19, àìnírètí àti àìdọ́gba tó ń bá àwùjọ wa jà, ń dojú kọ àwọn àdúgbò pẹ̀lú ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́ iṣẹ́.', 'en': 'Our answer to COVID-19, the despair and inequities plaguing our communities, is targeting neighborhoods with comprehensive services.'}
{'yo': 'A ò tíì sọ ìrètí nù rárá.', 'en': 'We have certainly not lost hope.'}
{'yo': 'A sì ń pè yín láti darapọ̀ mọ́ wa níwáju ogun yìí.', 'en': 'And we invite you to join us on the front lines of this war.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ṣeun.', 'en': 'Thank you.'}
{'yo': 'Ìdí tí ìyà ṣe máa ń jẹ àwọn ará-ìlú gan-an nígbà tí ogún bá ti parí.', 'en': 'Why civilians suffer more once a war is over'}
{'yo': 'Ǹjẹ́ o ti rò ó tẹ́lẹ̀ rí pé báwo ló ṣe máa rí tí enìyán bá ń gbé níbi tí kò sí òfin.', 'en': 'So have you ever wondered what it would be like to live in a place with no rules?'}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹ́n dùn gbọ́.', 'en': 'That sounds pretty cool.'}

{'yo': 'O jí láàrọ̀ ọjọ́ kan, ẹ̀wẹ̀, ẹ wá rí i wí pé ìdí tí kò fi sí òfin ni wí pé kò sí ìjọba, kò sì sí òfin.', 'en': "You wake up one morning, however, and you discover that the reason there are no rules is because there's no government, and there are no laws."}
{'yo': 'Lóòótọ́, gbogbo ilé-iṣẹ́ àwùjọ ti pòórá.', 'en': 'In fact, all social institutions have disappeared.'}

{'yo': 'Nítorí náà Kò sí ilé-ẹ̀kọ́, kò sí ilé-ìwòsàn, kò sí ọlọ́pàá, kò sí ilé-ìfowópamọ́, kò sí àwọn ẹgbẹ́ eléré-ìdárayá, kò sí ohun-èlò.', 'en': "So there's no schools, there's no hospitals, there's no police, there's no banks, there's no athletic clubs, there's no utilities."}

{'yo': 'Ó dáa. Mo mọ díẹ̀ nípa bí èyí ṣe rí, torí nígbà tí mo jẹ́ akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ìmọ̀-ìṣègùn ní odún 1999, mo ṣiṣẹ́ ní ìpàgọ́ àwọn atìpó ní Balkans lásìko ogun Kosovo.', 'en': 'Well, I know a little bit about what this is like, because when I was a medical student in 1999, I worked in a refugee camp in the Balkans during the Kosovo War.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí ogun náà parí, mo gba ìyànda -- sí ìyàlẹ́nu -- láti ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ ìmọ̀-ìṣègùn mi láti lọ sinmi kí n sì tẹ̀lé àwọn ẹbí tí mo ti bá dọ́rẹ̀ẹ́ ní ìpàgọ́ náà padà sí abúlé wọn ní Kosovo, kí n mo bí wọn yóò ṣe lo ìgbésí-ayé ní ibùdó léyìn ogun yìí.', 'en': 'When the war was over, I got permission -- unbelievably -- from my medical school to take some time off and follow some of the families that I had befriended in the camp back to their village in Kosovo, and understand how they navigated life in this postwar setting.'}

{'yo': 'Kosovo léyìn ogun jẹ́ ibìkan tó dùn nítorí àwọn ọmọ-ogun NATO wà níbẹ̀, láti rí i pé ogun ò tún ṣẹ́yọ mọ́.', 'en': "Postwar Kosovo was a very interesting place because NATO troops were there, mostly to make sure the war didn't break out again."}

{'yo': '"Ṣùgbọ́n yàtọ̀ sí ìyẹn, àyè tí ò l""ófin ni, ó fẹ́rẹ̀ jẹ́ pé gbogbo ilé-iṣẹ́ àwùjọ, ti ìjọba àti aládàni, ni wọ́n ti bàjẹ́."', 'en': 'But other than that, it was actually a lawless place, and almost every social institution, both public and private, had been destroyed.'}

{'yo': 'Nítorí náà mo lè sọ fún yín wí pé tí ẹ bá wọ ọ̀kan nínú àwọn ipò àti ibùdó yìí, ó máa ń panilẹ́rìn-ín fún bíi ọgbọ̀n ìṣẹ́jú, torí bó ṣe máa ń pẹ́ tó nìyẹn kí ẹ tó wà ní ipò tí ẹ ó fi mọ bí ẹ ṣe kángun-séwu sí.', 'en': "So I can tell you that when you go into one of these situations and settings, it is absolutely thrilling for about 30 minutes, because that's about how long it takes before you run into a situation where you realize how incredibly vulnerable you are."}

{'yo': 'Fún èmi, àkókò náà wá nígbà tí mo ní láti kọjá ẹnu-ibodè àkọ́kọ́, bí mo ṣe wa ọkọ̀ síwájú ni mo ti mọ̀ wí pé mo máa ṣe ìdúnàádúrà kíkọjá ẹnu-ibodè yìí pẹ̀lú ẹnìkàn tó dìhá ogun tó ṣe pé, tó bá pinnu láti yìnbọ mọ́mi lásíkò yẹn àti níbẹ̀ yẹn, kò ní tíì ṣe nǹkan tí ò bófinmu.', 'en': "For me, that moment came when I had to cross the first checkpoint, and I realized as I drove up that I would be negotiating passage through this checkpoint with a heavily armed individual who, if he decided to shoot me right then and there, actually wouldn't be doing anything illegal."}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n òye ìkángun-séwu tí mo ní kò tó nǹkan sí ìkángun-séwu àwọn ẹbí tí mo mò ní ọdún yẹn.', 'en': 'But the sense of vulnerability that I had was absolutely nothing in comparison to the vulnerability of the families that I got to know over that year.'}

{'yo': '"Ṣẹ ẹ rí i, ìgbe-ayé láwùjọ tí kò sí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àwùjọ ń kojú ewu àti àìdájú, àti àwọn ìbéèrè tó rọrùn bíi, ""kí la máa jẹ lálẹ́ yìí? ""jẹ́ àmúdijú láti dáhùn."', 'en': '"You see, life in a society where there are no social institutions is riddled with danger and uncertainty, and simple questions like, ""What are we going to eat tonight?"" are very complicated to answer."'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ìbéèrè nípa ààbò, nígbà tí kò bá sí ètò ààbò, máa ń bani lẹ́rù.', 'en': "Questions about security, when you don't have any security systems, are terrifying."}

{'yo': 'Ṣé èdè-àìyedè yẹn tí mo ní pẹ̀lu aráalé mi tó wà nísálẹ̀ ò ní di rògbòdìyàn tí yóò gba èmí mi tàbí èmi ẹbí mi?', 'en': "Is that altercation I had with the neighbor down the block going to turn into a violent episode that will end my life or my family's life?"}
{'yo': 'Ìrònú nípa ìlere nígbà tí kò bá sí ètò-ìlera náà ń bani lẹ́rù.', 'en': 'Health concerns when there is no health system are also terrifying.'}

{'yo': '"Mo ń tẹ́ti bí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ẹbí ṣe ní láti yanjú àwọn ìbéèrè bi, ""ìkókó mi ní ààrun ibà."', 'en': '"I listened as many families had to sort through questions like, ""My infant has a fever."'}
{'yo': 'Kíni mo fẹ́ ṣe?', 'en': 'What am I going to do?'}
{'yo': '""" ""Àbúrò mi lóbìrin, tó lóyún, ń da ẹ̀jẹ̀."', 'en': '""" ""My sister, who is pregnant, is bleeding."'}
{'yo': 'Kíni kí n ṣe?', 'en': 'What should I do?'}
{'yo': 'Tani kí n kọjú sí?', 'en': 'Who should I turn to?'}
{'yo': '""" ""Àwọn oníṣégùn-òyìnbó dà, àwọn olùtọ́-ilé-ìwòsàn dà?"', 'en': '""" ""Where are the doctors, where are the nurses?"'}
{'yo': 'Tí mo bá lè ri ọ̀kan, ṣé wọ́n ṣe é gbàgbọ́?', 'en': 'If I could find one, are they trustworthy?'}
{'yo': 'Báwo ni màá ṣe sanwó fún wọn?', 'en': 'How will I pay them?'}
{'yo': 'Irú owó wo ni màá fi sanwó fún wọn?', 'en': 'In what currency will I pay them?'}
{'yo': '""" ""Tí mo bá nílò òògùn, níbo ni màá ti rí wọn?"', 'en': '""" ""If I need medications, where will I find them?"'}
{'yo': 'Bí mo bá lo àwọn òògùn wọ̀nyẹn, ṣé ayédèrú niwọ́n lóòótọ́?', 'en': 'If I take those medications, are they actually counterfeits?'}
{'yo': '""" Àti bẹ́ẹ̀ àti bẹ́ẹ̀."', 'en': '""" And on and on."'}

{'yo': 'Fún ìgbé-ayé ní àwọn ibùdó wọ̀nyí, kókó ọ̀rọ̀ tó gbajúmọ̀ jù, àwòmọ́ ìgbeayé tó gbajúmọ̀ jù, ni ìkángun-séwu tí àwọn ènìyàn ní láti mójútó lójoojúmọ́, torí àìsí àwọn ètò àwùjọ.', 'en': 'So for life in these settings, the dominant theme, the dominant feature of life, is the incredible vulnerability that people have to manage day in and day out, because of the lack of social systems.'}

{'yo': 'Ó padà jẹyọ wí pé àwòmọ́ ìgbe-ayé yìí ṣòro púpọ̀ láti ṣàlàyé àti láti mọ̀ fún àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n ń gbé níta rẹ̀.', 'en': 'And it actually turns out that this feature of life is incredibly difficult to explain and be understood by people who are living outside of it.'}
{'yo': 'Mo mọ èyí nígbà tí mo kúrò ní Kosovo.', 'en': 'I discovered this when I left Kosovo.'}

{'yo': 'Mo padà wá sí Boston, mo di alágbàwò, mo di oníṣẹ́ ìwádìí ìpinnu ìlera gbogbogbò lágbàyé.', 'en': 'I came back to Boston, I became a physician, I became a global public health policy researcher.'}

{'yo': 'Mo darapọ̀ mọ́ ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ ìṣègun Havard àti Brigham àti ẹ̀ka ilé-ìwòsàn àwọn obìnrin ti ìlera àgbáyé.', 'en': "I joined the Harvard Medical School and Brigham and Women's Hospital Division of Global Health."}
{'yo': 'Èmi, gẹ́gẹ́ bí oníṣẹ́ ìwádìí, fẹ́ bẹ́rẹ̀ iṣẹ́ lórí ìṣòro yìí lẹ́sẹ̀kẹsẹ̀.', 'en': 'And I, as a researcher, really wanted to get started on this problem right away.'}

{'yo': '"Mo ń rò ó wí pé, ""Báwo ni a ṣe lè mú àdínkù bá ìkángun-séwu àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n ń gbé ní àwọn ibùdó ẹlẹgẹ́ wọ̀nyí?"', 'en': '"I was like, ""How do we reduce the crushing vulnerability of people living in these types of fragile settings?"'}

{'yo': 'Ǹjẹ́ ọ̀nà kankan wà tí a lè bẹ̀rẹ̀ síní ronú nípa bí a ṣe lè pèse ìdáààbòbo àti ìpadàbọ̀sípò lọ́gán àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n ṣe pàtàkì fún ìmóríbọ́, bí ètò ìlera?', 'en': 'Is there any way we can start to think about how to protect and quickly recover the institutions that are critical to survival, like the health system?'}
{'yo': '""" Mo sì gbọ́dọ̀ sọ wí pé, mo ní àwọn akẹgbẹ́ tó dántọ́."', 'en': '""" And I have to say, I had amazing colleagues."'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n nǹkan kan tó panilẹ́rìn nípa rẹ̀ ni wí pé, àwọn ìbéèrè àjòjì ni èyí jẹ́ fún wọn.', 'en': 'But one interesting thing about it was, this was sort of an unusual question for them.'}

{'yo': '""" Wọ́n rò ó wí pé, ""Oh, tí ẹ bá ṣiṣẹ́ nínú ogun, ṣé ìyẹ́n ò túmọ̀ sí wí pé ẹ ṣiṣẹ́ ní ìpàgọ́ àwọn atìpó ni, ẹ sì ń ṣiṣẹ́ lórí àkọsílẹ̀ ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ìwa-ìbàjẹ́?"" -- tó ṣe wí pé, lápá kan, ó ṣe pàtàkì gigi gaan."', 'en': '"They were kind of like, ""Oh, if you work in war, doesn\'t that mean you work on refugee camps, and you work on documenting mass atrocities?"" -- which is, by the way, very, very, very important."'}

{'yo': 'Ó gbàmí lásíkò díẹ̀ láti ṣàlàye ìdí tí mo fi nífẹ̀ sí ọrọ̀ yìí, títí di bí ọdún mẹ́fà sẹ́yìn.', 'en': 'So it took me a while to explain why I was so passionate about this issue, until about six years ago.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbà náà ni ìwádìí aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ yìí tó ṣe ìbojúwò àti àpèjúwe èt ò ìlera gbogbogbò àbájáde ogun di títẹ̀ jáde.', 'en': "That's when this landmark study that looked at and described the public health consequences of war was published."}
{'yo': '"Wọ́n ṣe ìfẹnukò tó yani lẹ́nu t""ó sì bíni nínú."', 'en': 'They came to an incredible, provocative conclusion.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn oníṣẹ́ ìwádìí wọ̀nyí fẹnukò pé ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ikú àti ìsọnidaláààbọ̀-ara látara ogun máa ń ṣẹlẹ̀ lẹ́yìn tí ìkọlura bá ti dópin.', 'en': 'These researchers concluded that the vast majority of death and disability from war happens after the cessation of conflict.'}

{'yo': '"Àsìkò t""ó léwu jù láti jẹ́ ènìyàn tó ń gbé ní orílẹ̀-èdè tó ní ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀-ìkọlura ni lẹ́yìn tí ogun bá ti dópin; lẹ́yìn tí àdéhùn àlàáfíà bá ti di bíbuwọ́lù ni."', 'en': "So the most dangerous time to be a person living in a conflict-affected state is after the cessation of hostilities; it's after the peace deal has been signed."}
{'yo': 'Ìgbà tí ọ̀nà-àbáyọ òṣèlú yẹn bá ti di ṣíṣe.', 'en': "It's when that political solution has been achieved."}

{'yo': 'Ìyẹn dàbi ẹní rújú, ṣùgbọ́n bẹ́ẹ̀ ni kò rí bẹ́ẹ̀, nítorí ogun máa ń pa àwọn ènìyàn nípa jíjà wọ́n lólè àwọn ilé-ìwòsan alábọ́ọ́dé wọn, àwọn ilé-ìwòsan wọn, àti ìpínkárí àwọn ẹrù-ọjà wọn.', 'en': "That seems so puzzling, but of course it's not, because war kills people by robbing them of their clinics, of their hospitals, of their supply chains."}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n máa ń dájúsọ àwọn oníṣègùn-òyìnbo wọn, wọ́n ń gba ẹ̀míi wọ́n; wọ́n ti sá lọ̀.', 'en': "Their doctors are targeted, are killed; they're on the run."}

{'yo': 'Èyí àìhàn dáadáa tí ò tún sì ń ṣekú pani jù ni ìparun àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ tó ń darí ètò ìlera àti àwọn ìṣúná owó wọn.', 'en': 'And more invisible and yet more deadly is the destruction of the health governance institutions and their finances.'}
{'yo': 'Torí náà èyí kò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ yà mí lẹ́nu rárá.', 'en': 'So this is really not surprising at all to me.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n nǹkan tó yani lẹ́nu tó sì bani lọ́kan jẹ́, ni ipa kékeré tí òye yìí ní, nípa bí a ṣe ń ronú nípa ìnira àwọn ènìyàn àti ogun.', 'en': 'But what is surprising and somewhat dismaying, is how little impact this insight has had, in terms of how we think about human suffering and war.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ jẹ́ kí n fún yín ní àwọn àpẹẹrẹ bíi mélòó kan.', 'en': 'Let me give you a couple examples.'}
{'yo': 'Lọ́dún tó kọjá, ẹ lè rántí, Ebólà kọlu orílẹ̀-ède Liberia ti Ìwò-oòrùn Ilẹ̀-Adúláwọ̀.', 'en': 'Last year, you may remember, Ebola hit the West African country of Liberia.'}

{'yo': '"Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìròyìn l""ó wà nípa ẹgbẹ́ yìí, Àwọn Oníṣégùn-Òyìnbó Láìsí Ààlà, tí wọ́n ń kébòsí tí wọ́n sì ń pè fún ìrànlọ́wọ́ àti àtìlẹyìn."', 'en': 'There was a lot of reporting about this group, Doctors Without Borders, sounding the alarm and calling for aid and assistance.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n kì í ṣe gbogbo ìjábọ̀ ìròyìn yẹn ni ó dáhùn ìbéèrè náà: kín ni ìdí tí Àwọn Oníṣégùn-Òyìnbó Láìsí Ààlà ṣe wà ní orílẹ̀-ède Liberia?', 'en': 'But not a lot of that reporting answered the question: Why is Doctors Without Borders even in Liberia?'}

{'yo': '"Àwọn Oníṣégùn-Òyìnbó Láìsí Ààlà jẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ aláràagbàídá, tí gbékalẹ̀ t""ó sì ní ìfọkànsìn láti pèse ìtọ́júu pàjáwírì ní àwọn agbègbe ogun."', 'en': 'Doctors Without Borders is an amazing organization, dedicated and designed to provide emergency care in war zones.'}

{'yo': 'Ogun abẹ́lé orílẹ̀-ède Liberia ti dópin ní ọdún 2003 - ìyẹn jẹ́ ọdún 11 kí arun Ebola ó tó bẹ́ sílẹ̀.', 'en': "Liberia's civil war had ended in 2003 -- that was 11 years before Ebola even struck."}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí Ebola bẹ́ sílẹ̀ ní orílẹ̀-ède Liberia, àwọn oníṣégùn-òyìnbó tó dín ní 50 ni wọ́n wà ní gbogbo orílẹ̀-èdè tí ó ní àwọn ènìyàn bí ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́nà-ẹgbẹ̀rún 4.5.', 'en': 'When Ebola struck Liberia, there were less than 50 doctors in the entire country of 4.5 million people.'}

{'yo': '"Àwọn Oníṣégùn-Òyìnbó Láìsí Ààlà wà ní orílẹ̀-ède Liberia nítorí Liberia ò tíì fi bẹ́ẹ̀ ní ètò ìlera tó ń ṣiṣẹ́ b""ó ṣe yẹ, lẹ́yìn ọdún 11."', 'en': "Doctors Without Borders is in Liberia because Liberia still doesn't really have a functioning health system, 11 years later."}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí ìṣẹ́lẹ̀ kọlu Haiti ní ọdún 2010, àwọn àtìlẹyìn tó ń wọlé láti ilẹ̀-òkèèrè kàmàmà.', 'en': 'When the earthquake hit Haiti in 2010, the outpouring of international aid was phenomenal.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ṣé ẹ mọ̀ wí pé ìdá méjì ìgbọ̀wọ́ yẹn ló lọ sí kíkọ́ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ìjọba gbogbogbò Haiti, tó fi mọ́ ẹ̀ka ìlera rẹ̀?', 'en': 'But did you know that only two percent of that funding went to rebuild Haitian public institutions, including its health sector?'}
{'yo': 'Láti ojú-ìwòye yẹn, àwọn Ọmọ Haiti sì ń tẹ̀síwájú láti kú nítorí ìjì-ilẹ̀ pàápàá dòní.', 'en': 'From that perspective, Haitians continue to die from the earthquake even today.'}
{'yo': 'Mo pàde arákùnrin yìí láìpẹ́ yìí.', 'en': 'I recently met this gentleman.'}
{'yo': 'Onímọ̀-ìṣègùn Nezar Ismet rè é.', 'en': 'This is Dr. Nezar Ismet.'}
{'yo': 'Òun ni Alákòso fún Ètò-Ìlera ní agbègbè olómìnira àríwá orílẹ̀-èdè Iraq, ní Kurdistan.', 'en': "He's the Minister of Health in the northern autonomous region of Iraq, in Kurdistan."}

{'yo': 'Òun rè é tó ń kéde pé ní oṣù mẹ́sàn sẹ́yìn, orílẹ̀-ède rẹ̀, agbègbe rẹ̀, ti lékún láti ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́nà-ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́rin ènìyàn sí ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́nà-ẹgbẹ̀rún márùn-ún ènìyàn.', 'en': 'Here he is announcing that in the last nine months, his country, his region, has increased from four million people to five million people.'}
{'yo': 'Àfikún ìdá 15 nìyẹn.', 'en': "That's a 25 percent increase."}
{'yo': 'Àìmọye ẹgbẹ̀rún nínú àwọn ṣẹ̀ṣẹdé wọ̀nyí ní wọ́n ti ní ìrìrí ìpòrúru-ọkàn tí-kò-ṣe-é-gbàgbọ́.', 'en': 'Thousands of these new arrivals have experienced incredible trauma.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn oníṣégùn-òyìnbo rẹ̀ ń ṣiṣẹ́ fún wákàtí 16 lójúmọ́ láìgbowó.', 'en': 'His doctors are working 16-hour days without pay.'}

{'yo': 'Ìṣúná rẹ̀ ò tíì lékún pẹ̀lú ìdá 25; ó ti dínkù pẹ̀lú ìdá 20, gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìgbọ̀wọ́ ṣe ti ṣàn sí ìrònú nípa ètò-ààbò àti ìgbìyànjú ìràlọ́wọ́ onígbà kúkúrú.', 'en': 'His budget has not increased by 25 percent; it has decreased by 20 percent, as funding has flowed to security concerns and to short-term relief efforts.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí ẹ̀ka-ìlera rẹ̀ bá kùnà -- tí ìtàn bá ṣe é tẹ̀lé, yóò rí bẹ́ẹ̀ -- báwo ni ẹ ṣe rò wí pé ìyẹn ṣe lè nípa lórí ṣíṣe ìpinnu fún ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́nà-ẹgbẹ̀rún márùn-ún àwọn ènìyàn tó wà ní agbègbe rẹ̀ bí wọ́n ṣe ń ronú nípa bóyá kí àwọ́n sá fún irú ipò ìgbéayé ìkágun-séwu bẹ́ẹ̀?', 'en': "When his health sector fails -- and if history is any guide, it will -- how do you think that's going to influence the decision making of the five million people in his region as they think about whether they should flee that type of vulnerable living situation?"}

{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹ ṣe rí i, kókó-ọ̀rọ̀ tó ń dani láàmù ni èyí jẹ́ fún mi, mo sì gbìyànjú gan-an láti ní òye pé: kí ló ń fa ìsún-sẹ́yìn láti pèsè ìdáààbòbò àti ṣíṣe àtìlẹyìn ètò-ìlera ẹni àti ètò ààbò?', 'en': 'So as you can see, this is a frustrating topic for me, and I really try to understand: Why the reluctance to protect and support indigenous health systems and security systems?'}
{'yo': 'Mo máa ń ní àníyàn méjì, àríyànjiyàn méjì.', 'en': 'I usually tier two concerns, two arguments.'}

{'yo': 'Àníyàn àkọ́kọ́ ni nípa ìwà-ìbàjẹ́, àti àníyàn wí pé àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n wà ní àwọn ibùdó wọ̀nyí níwà ìbàjẹ́ wọn ò sì ṣe é gbàgbọ́.', 'en': 'The first concern is about corruption, and the concern that people in these settings are corrupt and they are untrustworthy.'}

{'yo': 'Mo máa gbà wí pé mo ti pàdé àwọn oníwà-ìbàjẹ́ ti wọ́n ń ṣiṣẹ́ ní ẹ̀ka-ìlera ní àwọn ipò wọ̀nyí.', 'en': 'And I will admit that I have met unsavory characters working in health sectors in these situations.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n mo máa sọ fún-un yín pé òótọ́ ni ìdàkejì jẹ́ nínú gbogbo nǹkan tí mo ti ṣiṣẹ́ lé lorí, láti orílẹ̀-ède Afganistan dé Libya, dé Kosovo, dé Haiti, dé Liberia -- mo ti pàdé àwọn ènìyàn tó n fúnni ní ìmísí, tó ṣe wí pé, nígbà tí ìṣòro tó lágbára bá ṣẹlẹ̀ sí orílẹ̀-ède wọn, wọn máa ń ṣe gbogbo nǹkan láti dóólà àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ìlera wọn.', 'en': 'But I will tell you that the opposite is absolutely true in every case I have worked on, from Afghanistan to Libya, to Kosovo, to Haiti, to Liberia -- I have met inspiring people, who, when the chips were down for their country, they risked everything to save their health institutions.'}

{'yo': 'Ọgbọ́n fún àwọn aráàta tí wọ́n fẹ́ ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ ni láti tọ́ka ẹni tí àwọn ènìyàn wọ̀nyẹn ń ṣe, kí wọ́n sì pèsè ojú-ọ̀nà fún wọn láti ṣíwájú.', 'en': 'The trick for the outsider who wants to help is identifying who those individuals are, and building a pathway for them to lead.'}
{'yo': 'Nǹkan tó ṣẹlẹ̀ ní orílẹ̀-ède Afganistan gaan nìyẹn.', 'en': 'That is exactly what happened in Afghanistan.'}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀kan lára àwọn ìtàn àṣeyọrí ìgbìyànju kíkọ́-orílẹ̀-èdè Afganistan wa tí wọn ò sì gbóríyìn nípa rẹ̀ ni ti ìdókòwò ńlá Ilé-ìfowópamọ́ Àgbáyé ní ọdún 2002 láti ṣèdámọ̀, ṣíṣe ìkọ́ni àti àgbéga àwọn adarí ẹ̀ka ètò-ìlera Afgani.', 'en': 'One of the unsung and untold success stories of our nation-building effort in Afghanistan involved the World Bank in 2002 investing heavily in identifying, training and promoting Afghani health sector leaders.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn adarí ẹ̀ka ètò-ìlera wọ̀nyí ti ṣe àṣeyọrí tó pọ̀ ní Afganistan.', 'en': 'These health sector leaders have pulled off an incredible feat in Afghanistan.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ti fi ìkanra ṣe àfikún àǹfààní sí ìtọ́jú ìlera fún ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ará-ìlú.', 'en': 'They have aggressively increased access to health care for the majority of the population.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n mú ìyàtọ̀ tó dáa bá ipò ìlera àwọn ènìyan Afghan, tó jẹ́ wí pé oun ló burú jùlọ lágbàáyé tẹ́lẹ̀.', 'en': 'They are rapidly improving the health status of the Afghan population, which used to be the worst in the world.'}

{'yo': 'Lóòótọ́, ilé-iṣẹ́ tó ń rí sí ètò-ìlera ní Afghan ń ṣe àwọn nǹkan tí yóò wùn mí ká ṣe é ní orílẹ̀-ède America.', 'en': 'In fact, the Afghan Ministry of Health does things that I wish we would do in America.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ń lo àwọn nǹkan bí ìwífúni-alálàyé láti ṣe ìpinnu.', 'en': 'They use things like data to make policy.'}
{'yo': 'Ó lágbára.', 'en': "It's incredible."}

{'yo': '"Àníyàn kejì tí mo máa ń gbọ́ nípa rẹ̀ gan-an ni: ""Ó ti ga ju ara lọ, a ò ní owó rẹ̀."', 'en': '"The other concern I hear a lot about is: ""We just can\'t afford it, we just don\'t have the money."'}
{'yo': 'Kò ṣe é tẹ̀síwájú.', 'en': "It's just unsustainable."}

{'yo': '""" Mo máa jábọ̀ fun yín pé nǹkan tó ń ṣẹlẹ̀ lọ́wọ́ àti ètò tí a ní lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ ló wọ́n jù, ohun sì ni ètò tí ò ṣiṣẹ́ tí a lè ronú rẹ̀ lọ."', 'en': '""" I would submit to you that the current situation and the current system we have is the most expensive, inefficient system we could possibly conceive of."'}
