{'yo': 'Nǹkan tó ń ṣẹlẹ̀ lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ ni wí pé nígbà tí àwọn ìjọba bíi ti orílẹ̀-ède US -- tàbí, ká sọ wí pé, àkójọpọ̀ àwọn ìjọba tí wọ́n jọ parapọ̀ di Àjọ-Ìgbìmọ Ilẹ̀ Europe -- lọ́dọọdún, wọ́n ń ná bílíọ́nù mẹ́ẹ̀dógún dọ́là lórí ìdẹ̀rùn àánú ọmọnìyàn àti pàjáwírì àti àjálù jákè-jákò àgbánlá-ayé.', 'en': "The current situation is that when governments like the US -- or, let's say, the collection of governments that make up the European Commission -- every year, they spend 15 billion dollars on just humanitarian and emergency and disaster relief worldwide."}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹn kìí ṣe nǹkankan nípa ìrànwọ́ ilẹ̀-òkèèrè, ìdẹ̀rùn àjálù nìkan nìyẹn o.', 'en': "That's nothing about foreign aid, that's just disaster relief."}

{'yo': 'Ìdá márún-lè-láàdọ́rùn nínú rẹ̀ ni ó ń lọ sí àwọn Àjọ ìdẹ̀rùn ilẹ̀ òkèèrè, tí wọ́n ní láti kó àwọn ohun-èlò wọlé sí àwọn àgbègbè yìí, tí wọn ó sì hun àwọn ètò ìlera onígbà díẹ̀ papọ̀, ká sọ wí pé, tí wọ́n yóò wá tú u ká tí wọn yóò sì lé wọn dànù nígbà tí owó bá tán.', 'en': "Ninety-five percent of it goes to international relief agencies, that then have to import resources into these areas, and knit together some type of temporary health system, let's say, which they then dismantle and send away when they run out of money."}
{'yo': 'Nítorí náà iṣẹ́ wa, bó ṣe rí, hàn kedere.', 'en': 'So our job, it turns out, is very clear.'}

{'yo': 'Àwa, gẹ́gẹ́ bi àgbà-ọ̀jẹ̀ nínú ìpinnu àwùjọ ìlera àgbáyé, àkọ́kọ́ iṣẹ́ wa ni láti di àgbà-ọ̀jẹ̀ nínú bí a ṣe ń mójútó okun àti ìkọ́gun-séwu ètò ìlera ní ipò ewu.', 'en': 'We, as the global health community policy experts, our first job is to become experts in how to monitor the strengths and vulnerabilities of health systems in threatened situations.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbà náà ni à ń rí àwọn oníṣègùn-òyìnbó tí wọ́n ń sálọ, nígbà tí à ń rí àwọn ohun-èlò ìlera tó ń gbẹ, nígbà tí à ń rí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n ń wó -- pàjáwírì náà nìyẹn.', 'en': "And that's when we see doctors fleeing, when we see health resources drying up, when we see institutions crumbling -- that's the emergency."}
{'yo': 'Nígbà náà ni a gbọ́dọ̀ kébòsí kí a sì juwọ́ wa.', 'en': "That's when we need to sound the alarm and wave our arms."}
{'yo': 'Kì í ṣe nísìyìí.', 'en': 'Not now.'}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo ènìyàn ló lè ri wí pé pàjáwírì nìyẹn, wọn ò nílò wa láti sọ ìyẹn fún wọn.', 'en': "Everyone can see that's an emergency, they don't need us to tell them that."}

{'yo': 'Ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì: àwọn ibi tí mo ti ṣiṣẹ́ bíi ní Havard nílò láti kọ́ ẹ̀kọ́ látara ìrírí Ilé-Ìfowópamọ́ Àgbáyé ní orílẹ̀-ède Afganistan, a sì ní láti -- a sì máa -- kọ́ àwọn igbàgede láti ṣe ìrànwọ́ fún àwọn adarí ẹ̀ka ètò-ìlera bí àwọn wọ̀nyí.', 'en': 'Number two: places like where I work at Harvard need to take their cue from the World Bank experience in Afghanistan, and we need to -- and we will -- build robust platforms to support health sector leaders like these.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ènìyàn wọ̀nyí ń fi ẹ̀mi ara wọn wéwu.', 'en': 'These people risk their lives.'}
{'yo': 'Mo rò wí pé a lè bá akínkanjú wọn dọ́gba pẹ̀lú àwọn ìrànlọ́wọ́ kọ̀ọ̀kan.', 'en': 'I think we can match their courage with some support.'}
{'yo': '"Ẹ̀lẹ́ẹ̀kẹ́ta: a nílò láti jáde síta k""á sì ṣe àwọn àjọṣepọ̀ tuntun."', 'en': 'Number three: we need to reach out and make new partnerships.'}

{'yo': 'Ní àwọn ibi ìlera àgbáyé wa, a ti ṣe ìkójáde ètò tuntun pẹ̀lú NATO àti àwọn aṣèpinnu ètò-àbò mìíràn láti rìnrìn àjò pẹ̀lúu wọn ohun tí wọ́n lè ṣe láti dáààbòbo àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ètò ìlera lásíkò ìṣiṣẹ́.', 'en': 'At our global health center, we have launched a new initiative with NATO and other security policy makers to explore with them what they can do to protect health system institutions during deployments.'}

{'yo': 'A fẹ́ kí wọ́n rí i wí pé dídáààbò bo ètò ìlera àti àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àwùjọ mìíràn jẹ́ ọ̀kan pàtàkì lára iṣẹ́ wọn.', 'en': 'We want them to see that protecting health systems and other critical social institutions is an integral part of their mission.'}
{'yo': 'Kì í ṣe kí ènìyán máa sá fún ìba nǹkan jẹ́ àwọn ológun nìkan; ó jé láti borí pẹ̀lú àlááfíà.', 'en': "It's not just about avoiding collateral damage; it's about winning the peace."}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n alájọṣe tó ṣe pàtàkì jùlọ tí a nílò láti bá sọ̀rọ̀ ni ẹ̀yin, ẹ̀yin ènìyan ilẹ̀ America, àti lóòótọ́, ẹ̀yin ènìyàn àgbáyé.', 'en': 'But the most important partner we need to engage is you, the American public, and indeed, the world public.'}

{'yo': 'Nítorí àyàfi tí ẹ bá ní òye ìwúlò àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àwùjọ, bí ètò ìlera ní àwọn ibùdó ẹlẹgẹ́ wọ̀nyí, ẹ ò ní ṣe àtìlẹyìn fún ìgbìyànjú láti dóòlà wọn.', 'en': "Because unless you understand the value of social institutions, like health systems in these fragile settings, you won't support efforts to save them."}

{'yo': '"Ẹ ò ní gbọ́wọ́lé átíkù yẹn tó ń sọ nípa ""Hey, gbogbo àwọn oníṣégùn-òyìnbó yẹn ti ń sá kúrò ní orílẹ̀-ède X."', 'en': '"You won\'t click on that article that talks about ""Hey, all those doctors are on the run in country X."'}
{'yo': 'Mo wòye ohun tí èyí túmọ̀ sí.', 'en': 'I wonder what that means.'}

{'yo': 'Mo wòye nǹkan tí ìyẹn túmọ̀ sí fún ìkápá ètò ìlera yẹn láti, ká sọ wí pé, kẹ́fín àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-òpónà-èémí.', 'en': "I wonder what that means for that health system's ability to, let's say, detect influenza."}
{'yo': '""" ""Hmm, bóyá kò dára."', 'en': '""" ""Hmm, it\'s probably not good."'}
{'yo': '""" Nǹkan tí màá sọ fún yín nìyẹn."', 'en': '""" That\'s what I\'d tell you."'}

{'yo': 'Lókè lójú agbòjí, mo ti fi àwọn àwọn ààyò mi mẹ́ta tí wọ́n jẹ́ aláábò tí wọ́n sì kọ́ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ilẹ̀ America.', 'en': "Up on the screen, I've put up my three favorite American institution defenders and builders."}

{'yo': 'Níbí yìí ni George C. Marshall, òun ni ọkùnrin tó dábàá ìpinnu Marshall láti dóóla gbogbo ilé-iṣẹ́ ọrọ̀-ajé ilẹ̀ Europe lẹ́yìn Ogun Àgbáyé II.', 'en': "Over here is George C. Marshall, he was the guy that proposed the Marshall Plan to save all of Europe's economic institutions after World War II."}
{'yo': 'Eleanor Roosevelt nìyí.', 'en': 'And this Eleanor Roosevelt.'}

{'yo': 'Iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ lórí ẹ̀tọ́ ọmọ-ènìyàn ṣiṣẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bi ìpìlẹ̀ fún gbogbo àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ẹ̀tọ́ ọmọ-ènìyàn wa lágbàyé.', 'en': 'Her work on human rights really serves as the foundation for all of our international human rights organizations.'}

{'yo': 'Ben Franklin ni ààyò mi tó tóbi jù, tí ó ṣe oríṣiríṣi nǹkan nípa ṣíṣe ìdásílẹ̀ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́, ṣùgbọ́n to jẹ́ agbẹ̀bí ninú ìwé-òfin wa.', 'en': 'Then my big favorite is Ben Franklin, who did many things in terms of creating institutions, but was the midwife of our constitution.'}

{'yo': 'Mà á sì sọ fún yín wí pé àwọn wọ̀nyí ni àwọn tí, nígbà tí orílẹ̀-èdè wa wà nínú ewu, tàbí tí ilé-àyé wa wà nínú ewu, wọn ò sá.', 'en': "And I would say to you that these are folks who, when our country was threatened, or our world was threatened, they didn't retreat."}
{'yo': 'Wọn ò sọ nípa kíkọ́ àwọn ògiri.', 'en': "They didn't talk about building walls."}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n sọ̀rọ̀ nípa kíkọ́ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ láti dáààbò bo ètò-àbo ọmọ ènìyàn, fún ìran wọn àti fún tiwa.', 'en': 'They talked about building institutions to protect human security, for their generation and also for ours.'}
{'yo': 'Mo sì rò wí pé ìran tiwa náà gbọdọ̀ ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': 'And I think our generation should do the same.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ṣeun.', 'en': 'Thank you.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ẹ̀kọ́ látara àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èémí ọdún 1918.', 'en': 'Lessons from the 1918 flu'}
{'yo': 'Ìbéèrè àkọ́kọ́ ni, kíni ìdí tí a fi nílò láti ronú nípa ewu àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn káríayé?', 'en': 'So the first question is, why do we need to even worry about a pandemic threat?'}
{'yo': 'Kíni nǹkan náà tí à ń ronú nípa rẹ̀?', 'en': "What is it that we're concerned about?"}
{'yo': '"Bí mo bá sọ wí pé ""àwa,"" mo wà ní Àjọ-ìgbìmọ̀ tó ń rí sí àjọṣepọ̀ ilẹ̀-òkèèrè."', 'en': '"When I say ""we,"" I\'m at the Council on Foreign Relations."'}

{'yo': 'A dá lórí àwùjọ ètò-ààbò orílẹ̀-èdè, bẹ́ẹ̀ ni àwùjọ ẹ̀kọ́ nípa ẹ̀dá àti àwùjọ ìlera gbogbogbò.', 'en': "We're concerned in the national security community, and of course in the biology community and the public health community."}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí kárí-ayé tí ṣe àfikún sí ìrìnàjò, ó ti jẹ́ kó rọrùn pé kí gbogbo ènìyàn wà níbi gbogbo, nígbà gbogbo, káàkiri àgbáyé.', 'en': "While globalization has increased travel, it's made it necessary that everybody be everywhere, all the time, all over the world."}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹn túmọ̀ sí wí pé ààrun wíwá ọkọ̀-ọ̀fẹ́ẹ̀ rẹ ti ń tẹ̀lé ẹ.', 'en': 'And that means that your microbial hitchhikers are moving with you.'}

{'yo': 'Àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn kan ní Surat, India kò ní jẹ́ ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àìrí, ṣùgbọ́n ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ káríayé -- ìrònú káríayé tó ti ṣe àyípadà iye ewu.', 'en': 'So a plague outbreak in Surat, India becomes not an obscure event, but a globalized event -- a globalized concern that has changed the risk equation.'}

{'yo': 'Katrina fi hàn wá wí pé a ò lè gbọ́kàn lé ìjọba pátápátá láti wà ní ìmúrasílẹ̀ lọ́gán, láti lè ní ìkápá ìṣàkóso nǹkan.', 'en': 'Katrina showed us that we cannot completely depend on government to have readiness in hand, to be capable of handling things.'}
{'yo': 'Lóòótọ́, àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn kan yóò di ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ Katrina lẹ́ẹ̀kan ṣoṣo.', 'en': 'Indeed, an outbreak would be multiple Katrinas at once.'}

{'yo': 'Ìrònu wa tó tóbi jù lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí ni kòkòrò kan tí wọ́n ń pè ní àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èémí H5N1 -- àwọn kan nínú yín máa ń pè é ní kọ́ọ́lí -- tí ó kọ́kọ́ ṣẹ́yọ ní gúúsù orílẹ̀-ède China, ní àárín 1990, ṣùgbọ́n a ò gbọ́ nípa rẹ̀ àfi ọdún 1997.', 'en': "Our big concern at the moment is a virus called H5N1 flu -- some of you call it bird flu -- which first emerged in southern China, in the mid-1990s, but we didn't know about it until 1997."}
{'yo': 'Ní ìparí ọdún Kérésì tó kọjá àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè mẹ́tàlá nìkan ni wọ́n ti rí H5N1.', 'en': 'At the end of last Christmas only 13 countries had seen H5N1.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n a ti to orílẹ̀-èdè márùn-ún-lé-láàdọ́ta ní àgbáyé báyìí, tí kòkòrò yí ti ṣẹ́yọ, yálà lára ẹranko-abìyẹ́, tàbí ènìyàn tàbí méjéèjì.', 'en': "But we're now up to 55 countries in the world, have had this virus emerge, in either birds, or people or both."}

{'yo': '"Nínú àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn ẹranko-abìyẹ́ náà a lè ri báyìí pé ó fẹ́rẹ̀ẹ́ jẹ́ gbogbo àgbáyé l""ó ti rí kòkòrò yìí àyàfi àwọn ará ilẹ̀ America nìkan."', 'en': 'In the bird outbreaks we now can see that pretty much the whole world has seen this virus except the Americas.'}
{'yo': 'Màá sì wọnú ìdi rẹ̀ tó fi dáwasí láìpẹ́.', 'en': "And I'll get into why we've so far been spared in a moment."}
{'yo': 'Lára àwọn ohun-ọ̀sìn abìyẹ́, pàápàá jùlọ adìyẹ, ìda ogọ́rùn ni ìṣekúpani rẹ̀.', 'en': "In domestic birds, especially chickens, it's 100 percent lethal."}

{'yo': 'Ó jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àwọn nǹkan tó lè ṣekúpani tí a ti rí tó wà káàkiri àgbáyé ní àwọn ọ̀rún-ọdún láìpẹ̀ yìí.', 'en': "It's one of the most lethal things we've seen in circulation in the world in any recent centuries."}

{'yo': 'A ti kojú rẹ̀ pẹ̀lu pípa ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn adìyẹ, ó sì ṣeni láànú pé lọ́pọ̀ ìgbà wọn kìí sanwó rẹ̀ padà fún àwọn àgbè olókoòwò kékèké pèlú èsì wí pé ìbòjú wà níbẹ̀.', 'en': "And we've dealt with it by killing off lots and lots and lots of chickens, and unfortunately often not reimbursing the peasant farmers with the result that there's cover-up."}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n tún gbé e lórí bátánì aṣíkiri àwọn ẹyẹ omi ìgbẹ́ tí wọ́n máa ń ṣí kiri.', 'en': "It's also carried on migration patterns of wild migratory aquatic birds."}
{'yo': 'Irú ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ìgbàkóso yìí ti wáyé ní àyè kan tí wọ́n ń pè ní Lake Chenghai, ní orílẹ̀-ède China.', 'en': 'There has been this centralized event in a place called Lake Chenghai, China.'}

{'yo': 'Ní ọdún méjì sẹ́yìn àwọn ẹyẹ aṣíkiri ní ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ níbi tí àwọn ẹgbẹ̀rún ti kú nítorí àyípadà tó ń sẹlẹ̀ sí kòkòrò náà, tó jẹ kí òdiwọ̀n ọ̀wọ́ wọn tóbi sí i bí eré.', 'en': 'Two years ago the migrating birds had a multiple event where thousands died because of a mutation occurring in the virus, which made the species range broaden dramatically.'}

{'yo': 'Kí àwọn ẹyẹ tí wọ́n ń lọ sí Siberia, sí Europe àti sí ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ gbé kòkòrò náà, èyí tí ò ṣe é ṣe tẹ́lẹ̀.', 'en': 'So that birds going to Siberia, to Europe, and to Africa carried the virus, which had not previously been possible.'}

{'yo': 'A wá ń rí àjàkakẹ̀ àrùn náà láàárín àwọn ọmọ-ènìyàn nísiyín -- lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́, orí báwa ṣé, àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ kékèèké, àwọn àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn tó kéré, ìṣùpọ̀ lẹ́ẹ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan.', 'en': "We're now seeing outbreaks in human populations -- so far, fortunately, small events, tiny outbreaks, occasional clusters."}

{'yo': 'Kòkòrò náà ti yí padà bi eré láàárín ọdún méjì sẹ́yìn láti di ẹbí méjì ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀, tí ẹ bá máa ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀, ti igi kòkòro H5N1 pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹ̀ka nínú wọn, pẹ̀lú àwọn àwòmọ́ ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ tí ò fini lọ́kàn balẹ̀.', 'en': 'The virus has mutated dramatically in the last two years to form two distinct families, if you will, of the H5N1 viral tree with branches in them, and with different attributes that are worrying.'}
{'yo': 'Torí náà kí ló ń mú wa ronú?', 'en': "So what's concerning us?"}

{'yo': 'Ó dáa, àkọ́kọ́ ná, kò sí ìgbà kankan nínú ìtàn tí a ṣàṣeyọrí níbi ṣíṣe àkànṣe òògùn àjẹsára lásíkò fún ọ̀tà-lé-nígba ènìyán lé.', 'en': 'Well, first of all, at no time in history have we succeeded in making in a timely fashion, a specific vaccine for more than 260 million people.'}
{'yo': 'Kò ní ṣewá ní àǹfààní tó pọ̀ nígbà tí àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn káríayé bá ṣẹ̀.', 'en': "It's not going to do us very much good in a global pandemic."}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ti gbọ́ nípa òògùn àjẹsára tí à ń kó pamọ́ lọ́pọ̀.', 'en': "You've heard about the vaccine we're stockpiling."}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n kò sẹ́ni tó gbàgbọ́ wí pé yóò ṣiṣẹ́ tí a bá ní àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn tòótọ́.', 'en': 'But nobody believes it will actually be particularly effective if we have a real outbreak.'}

{'yo': 'Ìrònú kan ni wí pé: lẹ́yin 9/11, nígbà tí wọ́n ti pápákọ̀ òfuurufú, àsìko àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èémí wa ní ìdádúró fún òsẹ̀ méjì.', 'en': 'So one thought is: after 9/11, when the airports closed, our flu season was delayed by two weeks.'}

{'yo': 'Ìrònú náà ni wí pé, hey, bóyá nǹkan tó yẹ ká ṣe máa jẹ́ lẹ́sẹ̀kẹsẹ̀ -- a gbọ́ pé H5N1 kan wà tó ń ràn látara ènìyàn sí ènìyàn, kòkòrò náà ti yípadà láti di àkóràn ènìyàn sí ènìyàn -- ẹ jẹ́ ká ti pápákò òfuurufú pa.', 'en': "So the thought is, hey, maybe what we should do is just immediately -- we hear there is H5N1 spreading from human to human, the virus has mutated to be a human-to-human transmitter -- let's shut down the airports."}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀wẹ̀, ìtúpalẹ̀ ẹ̀rọ-ayárabíàsá alágbára ńlá, tí wọ́n ṣe nípa bí èyí ṣe lágbára sí, fi hàn pé kò ní fún wa ní àsìkò púpọ̀ rárá.', 'en': "However, huge supercomputer analyses, done of the likely effectiveness of this, show that it won't buy us much time at all."}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni yóò ṣe ìdíwọ́ ńlá fún àwọn ètò ìmúrasílẹ̀.', 'en': 'And of course it will be hugely disruptive in preparation plans.'}
{'yo': 'Fún àpẹẹrẹ, China ni wọ́n ti ń ṣe gbogbo ìbòmú.', 'en': 'For example, all masks are made in China.'}
{'yo': 'Báwo lẹ ṣe fẹ́ pín wọn káàkiri àgbáyé tí ẹ bá ti gbé gbogbo pápákọ̀ òfuurufú tìpa.', 'en': "How do you get them mobilized around the world if you've shut all the airports down?"}

{'yo': 'Báwo lẹ ṣe fẹ́ gbé àwọn òògùn àjẹsára náà káàkiri àgbáyé àti gbígbé àwọn òògùn náà, àti àwọn nǹkan tó bá wà tàbí tí ò sí tí yóò ṣiṣẹ́.', 'en': 'How do you get the vaccines moved around the world and the drugs moved, and whatever may or not be available that would work.'}
{'yo': 'Ó padà jẹ́ wí pé gbígbé àwọn pápákọ̀ òfuurufú tìpa ò fún wa lésì tí a fẹ́.', 'en': 'So it turns out that shutting down the airports is counterproductive.'}

{'yo': 'Ọkàn wa ò balẹ̀ nítorí kòkòrò yìí, yàtọ̀ sí àwọn àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èémí mìíràn tí a ti ṣe ìwádìí rẹ̀, lè di àkóràn pẹ̀lú jíjẹ ẹran tútù àwọn ẹranko tí wọ́n ti kó o.', 'en': "We're worried because this virus, unlike any other flu we've ever studied, can be transmitted by eating raw meat of the infected animals."}

{'yo': 'A ti rí àkóràn sí àwọn ológbò ìgbẹ́ àti àwọn ológbò òsìn, lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí bákan náà àwọn ọ̀sin ajá.', 'en': "We've seen transmission to wild cats and domestic cats, and now also domestic pet dogs."}

{'yo': 'Nínú ìdánwò bíbọ́ eku àti ehoro, a rí i wí pé àwọn ẹranko náà ń ṣàfihàn àwọn àmì àìsàn tí a ò rírí pẹ̀lú àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èémí: gìrì, àìṣedédé gbùngbùn ìṣàkóso ara, ìrọlápá-rọlẹ́sẹ̀ díẹ̀.', 'en': 'And in experimental feedings to rodents and ferrets, we found that the animals exhibit symptoms never seen with flu: seizures, central nervous system disorders, partial paralysis.'}
{'yo': '"Èyí kì í ṣe irú àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èémí t""ó wà nínú ọgbà yín."', 'en': 'This is not your normal garden-variety flu.'}

{'yo': 'Ó ń sín nǹkan tí a ti wá mọ̀ nípa ṣíṣe àtúnkọ́ kòkòro afàáfé ọdún 1918, àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn káriayé tó lágbára gbẹ̀yìn, tí ohun náà fò tààrà látara ẹranko abìyẹ́ sí ènìyàn.', 'en': 'It mimics what we now understand about reconstructing the 1918 flu virus, the last great pandemic, in that it also jumped directly from birds to people.'}

{'yo': 'A ní ìtìranya bí ìgbà ṣe ń gorí ìgbà, àti ìṣọwọ́ kú àwọn ọmọ-ènìyàn tó yanilẹ́nu yìí: ìdá márùn-ún-dìn-láàdọ́ta àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n ti kó H5N1 ti, lóòótọ́, juwọọ́lẹ̀.', 'en': 'We had evolution over time, and this unbelievable mortality rate in human beings: 55 percent of people who have become infected with H5N1 have, in fact, succumbed.'}
{'yo': 'A ò sì ní ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n kó o tí wọn ò ní àrùn rárá.', 'en': "And we don't have a huge number of people who got infected and never developed disease."}

{'yo': 'Nínú ìdánwò bíbọ́ àwọn ọ̀bọ ẹ lè rí i wí pé ó ń yí aṣàkóso ètò àjẹsára kan sílẹ̀.', 'en': 'In experimental feeding in monkeys you can see that it actually downregulates a specific immune system modulator.'}

{'yo': '"Èsì náà ni wí pé nǹkan t""ó ń pa yín kì í ṣe kòkòrò náà tààrà, ṣùgbọ́n ètò àjẹsára rẹ t""ó ń ṣe àṣejù, tí ó ń sọ wí pé ""nǹkan-kí-nǹkan tí àjòjì yìí ì bá à jẹ́ mà á bínú."', 'en': '"The result is that what kills you is not the virus directly, but your own immune system overreacting, saying, ""Whatever this is so foreign I\'m going berserk."'}

{'yo': '"""Èsi rẹ̀: ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ikú tí ó ti wáyé ti jẹ́ nínú àwọn ènìyàn lábẹ́ ọgbọ̀n ọdún, àwọn ọ̀dọ́ onílera pípé."', 'en': '""" The result: most of the deaths have been in people under 30 years of age, robustly healthy young adults."'}

{'yo': 'A ti rí àkóràn ènìyàn sí ènìyàn ní ó kéré jù ìṣùpọ̀ mẹ́ta -- orí báwa ṣe ó ní ṣe pẹ̀lú àkóràn tímọ́tímọ́, tí kò fi gbogbo ayé lápapọ̀ sínú ewu kankan.', 'en': 'We have seen human-to-human transmission in at least three clusters -- fortunately involving very intimate contact, still not putting the world at large at any kind of risk.'}
{'yo': 'Ó dára, mo ti dẹ́rù bàyín.', 'en': "Alright, so I've got you nervous."}
{'yo': 'Báyì ẹ ń rò ó, ìjọba máa ṣe nǹkan sí i.', 'en': 'Now you probably assume, well the governments are going to do something.'}
{'yo': 'A sì ti náwó tó pọ̀.', 'en': 'And we have spent a lot of money.'}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìnàwó nínú ìṣàkóso Bush tan mọ́ èsi kòkòrò áńtíráásì àti ewu lílo kẹ́míkà gẹ́gẹ́ bi ohun-ìjà.', 'en': 'Most of the spending in the Bush administration has actually been more related to the anthrax results and bio-terrorism threat.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ owó ni wọ́n ti gbé jáde ní ìpele ìjọba ìbílẹ̀ àti ìpele ìjọba àpapọ̀ láti wo àwọn àrùn ríràn.', 'en': 'But a lot of money has been thrown out at the local level and at the federal level to look at infectious diseases.'}

{'yo': 'Èsì ìgbẹ̀yìn: ìpínlẹ̀ mẹ́ẹ̀dógún ti gba ìdánilójú láti lè ṣe ìpín òògùn àjẹsára àti àwọn òògùn lọ́pọ̀ lásíkò àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn káriayé.', 'en': 'End result: only 15 states have been certified to be able to do mass distribution of vaccine and drugs in a pandemic.'}
{'yo': 'Àbọ̀ àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ ni kò ní ní àyè nílé-ìwosàn ní ọ̀sẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́, bóyá ọ̀sẹ̀ méjì.', 'en': 'Half the states would run out of hospital beds in the first week, maybe two weeks.'}
{'yo': 'Ìpínlẹ̀ ogójì ti ní àdínkù àwọn olùtọ́-ilé-ìwòsàn gidi.', 'en': 'And 40 states already have an acute nursing shortage.'}
{'yo': 'Nínú ewu àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn káríayé, ẹ ti wọ wàhálà ńlá.', 'en': "Add on pandemic threat, you're in big trouble."}
{'yo': 'Kí wá ni àwọn ènìyàn ti ń fowó ṣe?', 'en': 'So what have people been doing with this money?'}
{'yo': 'Eré-ìdárayá, gbígbánìyàn síṣẹ́, káàkiri àgbáyé.', 'en': 'Exercises, drills, all over the world.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ jẹ́ ká dọ́gbọ́n pé àjàkalẹ̀ àrùn káríayé wà.', 'en': "Let's pretend there's a pandemic."}
{'yo': 'Ẹ jẹ́ kí gbogbo ènìyàn sáré káàkiri kí ẹ sì kó ipa yín.', 'en': "Let's everybody run around and play your role."}
{'yo': 'Èsì gangan ni wí pé ìpòrúru-ọkàn ti wà.', 'en': 'Main result is that there is tremendous confusion.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn wọ̀nyí ò mọ̀ nǹkan tí iṣẹ́ wọn yóò jẹ́.', 'en': "Most of these people don't actually know what their job will be."}

{'yo': 'Kókó ibẹ̀ ni wí pé, kókó nǹkan tó ti ṣẹlẹ̀ nínú gbogbo ìgbanisíṣẹ́ kọ̀ọ̀kan ni wí pé: kò sẹ́ni tó mọ ẹni tó wà nídi rẹ̀.', 'en': "And the bottom line, major thing that has come through in every single drill: nobody knows who's in charge."}
{'yo': 'Kò sẹ́ni ti mọ okùn àṣẹ.', 'en': 'Nobody knows the chain of command.'}

{'yo': 'Tó bá jẹ́ Los Angeles ni, ṣé olórí agbègbè ni, gómínà, Ààrẹ orílẹ̀-ède United States, olórí ẹ̀ka ètò-ààbò lábẹ́lé?', 'en': 'If it were Los Angeles, is it the mayor, the governor, the President of the United States, the head of Homeland Security?'}

{'yo': 'Lóòótọ́, ìjọba apapọ̀ sọ wí pé okùnrin kan tí wọ́n ń pè ní Aṣojú Ìlàna Ìjọba Àpapọ̀ni, tó wà pẹ̀lu TSA.', 'en': "In fact, the federal government says it's a guy called the Principle Federal Officer, who happens to be with TSA."}

{'yo': 'Ìjọbá sọ wí pé ojúṣe àpapọ̀ ní pàtàkì jùlọ yóò jẹ́ nípa ìgbìyànjú láti dèna kòkòrò náà, tí gbogbo wa mọ̀ wí pé kò ṣe é ṣe, àti láti dèna kókó ipa rẹ̀ lórí ọrọ̀-ajé wa.', 'en': 'The government says the federal responsibility will basically be about trying to keep the virus out, which we all know is impossible, and then to mitigate the impact primarily on our economy.'}
{'yo': 'Èyí tókù dọwọ́ àwùjọ ìbílẹ̀ yín.', 'en': 'The rest is up to your local community.'}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo rẹ jẹ́ nípa àgbègbe yín, tí ẹ̀ ń gbé.', 'en': 'Everything is about your town, where you live.'}

{'yo': 'Bí àjọ-ìgbìmọ agbègbè tí ẹ ní ṣe dára sí, bí olórí-agègbè tí ẹ ní ṣe dára sí -- ẹni tí yóò wà ní ìṣàkóso nìyẹn.', 'en': "Well how good a city council you have, how good a mayor you have -- that's who's going to be in charge."}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ohun-èlò agbègbè máa jìjàgùdù láti gbìyànjú àti dáwọ́ wọn lé ọ̀kan nínú àkójọ òògùn àpapọ̀ tí wọ́n ń pè ní Tamiflu, tó lè tàbí kó má ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ -- màá sọ nípa ìyẹn -- àwọn òògùn àjẹsára tó wà, àti àwọn ìtọ́jú mìíràn, àti ìbòjú, àti èyíkéyì nǹkan tí wọ́n ti tọ́jú pamọ́.', 'en': "Most local facilities would all be competing to try and get their hands on their piece of the federal stockpile of a drug called Tamiflu, which may or may not be helpful -- I'll get into that -- of available vaccines, and any other treatments, and masks, and anything that's been stockpiled."}
{'yo': '"Ẹ ó sì ní ìfigagbága t""ó pọ̀."', 'en': "And you'll have massive competition."}
{'yo': 'Báyìí a ra òògùn àjẹsára lóòótọ́, gbogbo yín lẹ lè ti gbọ́ nípa ẹ̀, tí Sanofi-Aventis ṣe.', 'en': "Now we did purchase a vaccine, you've probably all heard about it, made by Sanofi-Aventis."}
{'yo': 'Ó ṣeni láàánú pé wọ́n ṣe é tako ìrísí H5N1 lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí ni.', 'en': "Unfortunately it's made against the current form of H5N1."}
{'yo': 'A mọ̀ wí pé kòkòrò náà yóò yí padà.', 'en': 'We know the virus will mutate.'}
{'yo': 'Ó máa di kòkòrò tó yátọ̀.', 'en': 'It will be a different virus.'}
{'yo': 'Òògùn àjẹsára náà lè má wùló.', 'en': 'The vaccine will probably be useless.'}
{'yo': 'Ibí ni ìpinnu náà ti máa wọlé.', 'en': "So here's where the decisions come in."}
{'yo': 'Ìwọ ni olórí agbègbè ìbílẹ̀ rẹ.', 'en': "You're the mayor of your local town."}
{'yo': 'Ẹ jẹ́ ká wò ó, ṣe ká pàṣẹ wí pé kí a tọ́jú gbogbo àwọn ẹranko sínú ilé ni?', 'en': "Let's see, should we order that all pets be kept indoors?"}

{'yo': 'Orílẹ̀-ède Germany ṣe èyí nígbà tí H5N1 ṣẹ́yọ ní Germany lódún tí ó kọjá, láti lè mú àdínkù bá ìtànká rẹ̀ láàárín àwọn ológbò ilé sí ilé, ajá àti bẹ́ẹ̀bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ.', 'en': 'Germany did that when H5N1 appeared in Germany last year, in order to minimize the spread between households by household cats, dogs and so on.'}

{'yo': 'Kí la fẹ́ ṣe nígbà tí a ò bá ní yàrá ìkó nǹkan sí pẹ̀lú atẹ́gùn afẹ̀yìnrìn tí yóò jẹ́ kí àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ìlera ṣe ìtọ́jú àwọn aláìsàn?', 'en': "What do we do when we don't have any containment rooms with reverse air that will allow the healthcare workers to take care of patients?"}
{'yo': 'Àwọn wọ̀nyí wà ní Hong Kong; a ò ní nǹkan tó jọ bẹ́ẹ̀ níbí.', 'en': 'These are in Hong Kong; we have nothing like that here.'}
{'yo': 'Ìyàsọ́tọ̀ ńkọ́?', 'en': 'What about quarantine?'}
{'yo': 'Lásíkò àjàkálẹ̀ ààrun SARS ní Beijing ìyàsọ́tọ̀ dàbi ẹní ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́.', 'en': 'During the SARS epidemic in Beijing quarantine did seem to help.'}
{'yo': 'A ò ní ìpinnu tó dọ́gba nípa ìyàsọ́tọ̀ ní orílẹ̀-ède United States.', 'en': 'We have no uniform policies regarding quarantine across the United States.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ kan ní ìpinnu ọ̀tọ̀, orílẹ̀-èdè sí orílẹ̀-èdè.', 'en': 'And some states have differential policies, county by county.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n àwọn nǹkan tí ò mú ọpọlọ dání ńkọ́?', 'en': 'But what about the no-brainer things?'}
{'yo': '"Ṣé k""á ti gbogbo ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ pa ni?"', 'en': 'Should we close all the schools?'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ńkọ́ nígbà náà?', 'en': 'Well then what about all the workers?'}
{'yo': 'Wọn ò ní lọ síbi iṣẹ́ tí àwọn ọmọ wọn ò bá sí nílé-ẹ̀kọ́.', 'en': "They won't go to work if their kids aren't in school."}
{'yo': 'Ṣíṣe àtìlẹyìn fún ẹrọ-ìbáraẹnisọ̀rọ̀?', 'en': 'Encouraging telecommuting?'}
{'yo': 'Kí ló ń ṣiṣẹ́?', 'en': 'What works?'}
{'yo': 'Ìjọba ilẹ̀ Britain ṣe àwòṣe ẹrọ-ìbáraẹnisọ̀rọ̀ kan.', 'en': 'Well the British government did a model of telecommuting.'}
{'yo': 'Òsẹ̀ mẹ́fà ni wọ́n fi ní kí àwọn ènìyàn ní ẹ̀ka ìfowópamọ́ díbọ́n pé àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn ti ń bọ̀.', 'en': 'Six weeks they had all people in the banking industry pretend a pandemic was underway.'}

{'yo': 'Nǹkan tí wọ́n rí ni wí pé, àwọn iṣẹ́ pàtàkì -- ẹ mọ̀ pé ẹ sì ní ilé-ìfowópamọ́, ṣùgbọ́n è ò lè rí àwọn ènìyàn tí yóò fi owó sínú ẹ̀rọ ATM.', 'en': "What they found was, the core functions -- you know you still sort of had banks, but you couldn't get people to put money in the ATM machines."}
{'yo': '"Kò sẹ́ni t""ó ń ṣe ike-pélébé-ìsanwó-sí-lórí."', 'en': 'Nobody was processing the credit cards.'}
{'yo': 'Sísan owó ìdójútófò rẹ ò lọ.', 'en': "Your insurance payments didn't go through."}
{'yo': 'Pàtàkì jùlọ ọrọ̀-ajé yóò wà nínú àjálù ńlá.', 'en': 'And basically the economy would be in a disaster state of affairs.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn oníṣẹ́ẹ ọ́físì nìkan nìyẹn o, àwọn òṣìṣé ilé-ìfowópamọ́.', 'en': "And that's just office workers, bankers."}
{'yo': 'A ò mọ bí ọwọ́ fífọ̀ ṣe ṣe pàtàkì sí àrùn ayokẹ́lẹ́ sí -- lẹ́jàá fùú.', 'en': "We don't know how important hand washing is for flu -- shocking."}
{'yo': 'A gbà pé èrò tó dára ni láti máa fọwọ́ wa lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀.', 'en': "One assumes it's a good idea to wash your hands a lot."}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ní àwùjọ àwọn onímọ̀-ìjìlẹ̀ àríyànjiyàn wà nípa kíni ìdá iye àkóràn àrùn ayokẹ́lẹ́ láàárín àwọn ènìyàn láti ara sínsín àti ikọ́ kí sì ni ìdá tó wà lọ́wọ́ọ̀ rẹ.', 'en': 'But actually in scientific community there is great debate about what percentage of flu transmission between people is from sneezing and coughing and what percentage is on your hands.'}
{'yo': 'Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ ìmọ̀-ìṣègùn gbíyànjú láti wo ìbéèrè ìbòmú.', 'en': 'The Institute of Medicine tried to look at the masking question.'}

{'yo': 'Ǹjẹ́ a lè wá ọ̀nà kan, nígbà tí a ò mọ wí pé a ò ní ìbòmú tó tó nítorí a ò kín ṣe é ní ilẹ̀ America mọ́, orílẹ̀-ède China ni wọ́n ti ń ṣe gbogbo rẹ̀ -- ǹjẹ́ a nílò N95?', 'en': "Can we figure out a way, since we know we won't have enough masks because we don't make them in America anymore, they're all made in China -- do we need N95?"}
{'yo': 'Ìbòmú tó bá ìgbà mu, tó ń léwájú, tí yóò bá ojúù rẹ mu?', 'en': 'A state-of-the-art, top-of-the-line, must-be-fitted-to-your-face mask?'}
{'yo': 'Àbí ṣé a lè lo oríṣiríṣi ìbòmú?', 'en': 'Or can we get away with some different kinds of masks?'}

{'yo': 'Lásíkò àjàkalẹ̀ àrun SARS, a kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ní Hong Kong pé ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àkóràn wáyé nítorí pé àwọn ènìyàn ń yọ ìbòju wọn lọ́nà tí ò tọ́.', 'en': 'In the SARS epidemic, we learned in Hong Kong that most of transmission was because people were removing their masks improperly.'}
{'yo': 'Ọwọ́ọ wọn máa ń ní àkóràn pẹ̀lú ìta ìbòmú náà, wọ́n sì ń ra imú wọn.', 'en': 'And their hand got contaminated with the outside of the mask, and then they rubbed their nose.'}
{'yo': 'Yègèdè! Wọ́n ti ní SARS.', 'en': 'Bingo! They got SARS.'}
{'yo': 'Kì í ṣe àwọn kòkòrò àìfojúrí tó ń fò.', 'en': "It wasn't flying microbes."}
{'yo': 'Bí ẹ bá lọ sórí ẹ̀rọ-ayélukára nísìyìí, e ó rí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ afitóni aṣinilọ́nà.', 'en': "If you go online right now, you'll get so much phony-baloney information."}
{'yo': 'E ó sì padà rà á -- èyí ni wọ́n ń pè ní ìbòju N95.', 'en': "You'll end up buying -- this is called an N95 mask."}

{'yo': 'A ò ní àwòkọ́ṣe fún nǹkan tó yẹ kó jẹ́ ohun-èlò ìdáààbòbò fún àwọn aléwájú ìṣẹ̀lẹ pàjáwírì, àwọn ènìyàn tí wọn yóò ṣíwájú ogun.', 'en': "We don't actually have a standard for what should be the protective gear for the first responders, the people who will actually be there on the front lines."}
{'yo': 'Àti Tamiflu.', 'en': 'And Tamiflu.'}
{'yo': 'Bóyá ẹ ti gbọ́ nípa òògùn yìí, tí Hoffmann-La Roche ṣe, òògùn tó gba iwé-àṣẹ ni.', 'en': "You've probably heard of this drug, made by Hoffmann-La Roche, patented drug."}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ìtọ́kasí kan wà pé ó lè ra àsìkò díẹ̀ fun yín láàárín àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn.', 'en': 'There is some indication that it may buy you some time in the midst of an outbreak.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣé kí ẹ lo Tamiflu fún ìgbà pípẹ́, ó dáa, ọ̀kan nínú àwọn àyọrísí mìíràn ni èrò ìgbẹ̀mi ara ẹni.', 'en': 'Should you take Tamiflu for a long period of time, well, one of the side effects is suicidal ideations.'}

{'yo': 'Ìtọpinpin ìlera gbogbogbò ṣe ìtúpalẹ̀ àyọrísí tí lílo Tamiflu lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀ lè ní, fi hàn pé ó ṣiṣẹ́ tako òṣùwọn ìlera gbogbogbò, tó jẹ́ kí ọ̀rọ̀ túbọ̀ burú sí i.', 'en': 'A public health survey analyzed the effect that large-scale Tamiflu use would have, actually shows it counteractive to public health measures, making matters worse.'}

{'yo': 'Nǹkan mìíràn tó tún panilẹ́rìn ni pé: nígbà tí ọmọ ènìyàn bá lo Tamiflu, ìdá ogún ni yóò yòrò dáadáa láti ṣiṣẹ́ nínú ọmọ ènìyàn.', 'en': 'And here is the other interesting thing: when a human being ingests Tamiflu, only 20 percent is metabolized appropriately to be an active compound in the human being.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn tókù yóò padà di nǹkan tí ò yípadà, tí yóò móríbọ́ níbi sísẹ́ sínu èto omi, tí yóò sí ṣe àgbéjáde ẹyẹ omi gan-an tí yóò gbé àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èémí náà tí yóò sì fún wọn ní àǹfààní láti ṣe ìtọ́jú àwọn ẹ̀yà àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èémí àtakò.', 'en': 'The rest turns into a stable compound, which survives filtration into the water systems, thereby exposing the very aquatic birds that would carry flu and providing them a chance to breed resistant strains.'}

{'yo': 'Ní báyìí a ti rí ẹ̀ya àtakò-Tamiflu báyìí nínú àkóràn ènìyàn sí ènìyàn ní Vietnam, àti ní orílẹ̀-ède Egypt àkóràn ènìyàn sí ènìyàn.', 'en': 'And we now have seen Tamiflu-resistant strains in both Vietnam in person-to-person transmission, and in Egypt in person-to-person transmission.'}

{'yo': 'Mo ń rò ó lọ́kàn ara mi pé okùn ẹ̀mi Tamiflu gẹ́gẹ́ bi òògùn tó ń ṣiṣẹ́ ní gbèdéke -- ó ní gbèdéke lóòótọ́.', 'en': 'So I personally think that our life expectancy for Tamiflu as an effective drug is very limited -- very limited indeed.'}

{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀ ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ìjọba ti gbé gbogbo àwọn ìlànà-ìṣe àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èémí wọn lórí ìkójọ òògun Tamiflu.', 'en': 'Nevertheless most of the governments have based their whole flu policies on building stockpiles of Tamiflu.'}
{'yo': 'Orílẹ̀-ède Russia ti ṣe ìkójọ èyí tí yóò tó fún ìdá 95 gbogbo àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-ède Russia.', 'en': 'Russia has actually stockpiled enough for 95 percent of all Russians.'}
{'yo': 'A ti ṣe ìkójọ èyí tí yóò tó fún ìdá 30.', 'en': "We've stockpiled enough for 30 percent."}
{'yo': 'Bí mo bá sọ wí pé èyí tó tó, èyí tí yóò tó fún ọ̀sẹ̀ méjì ni.', 'en': "When I say enough, that's two weeks worth."}
{'yo': 'O ti ku ìwọ nìkan o torí àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn náà yóò tó bí oṣù 18 sí oṣù 24.', 'en': "And then you're on your own because the pandemic is going to last for 18 to 24 months."}

{'yo': 'Àwọn kan nínú àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tí wọ́n ti ní ìrírí tó pọ́jù pẹ̀lú H5N1 ti ṣe àkójọ òògùn; wọ́n sì ti bàjẹ́.', 'en': "Some of the poorer countries that have had the most experience with H5N1 have built up stockpiles; they're already expired."}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ti kọjá ìgbà wọn.', 'en': 'They are already out of date.'}
{'yo': 'Kí la mọ̀ láti ọdún 1918, àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn alágbára tó ṣẹlẹ̀ gbẹ̀yìn?', 'en': 'What do we know from 1918, the last great pandemic?'}
{'yo': 'Ìjọba àpapọ̀ ti gbé ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ojúṣe rẹ̀ jù sílẹ̀.', 'en': 'The federal government abdicated most responsibility.'}
{'yo': 'Nítorí náà a pàpà wá ní àlẹ̀lu-iṣẹ́ òfin yìí káàkiri ilẹ̀ America.', 'en': 'And so we ended up with this wild patchwork of regulations all over America.'}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo agbègbè, orílẹ̀-èdè, àti ìpínlẹ̀ ń ṣe nǹkan tiwọn.', 'en': 'Every city, county, state did their own thing.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn òfin àti ètò ìgbàgbọ́ ni wọn ò jọra wọn.', 'en': 'And the rules and the belief systems were wildly disparate.'}
{'yo': 'Ní àwọn ọ̀ràn kọ̀ọ̀kan gbogbo ilé-ẹ̀kọ́, gbogbo ilé-ìjọ́sìn àwọn kìrìstẹ́nì, àwọn agbègbè ìlú ni wọ́n gbétì.', 'en': 'In some cases all schools, all churches, all public venues were closed.'}
{'yo': 'Àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn náà tàn-yíká nígbà mẹ́ta ní oṣù 18 láìsí ìrìna ọkọ̀ òfuurufú ajèrè.', 'en': 'The pandemic circulated three times in 18 months in the absence of commercial air travel.'}
{'yo': 'Ìjì kejì yípadà, ìjì aṣekúpani-ńlá.', 'en': 'The second wave was the mutated, super-killer wave.'}
{'yo': 'Ní ìjì àkọ́kọ́ a ní àwọn oṣìṣẹ́ ìlera tí ó tó.', 'en': 'And in the first wave we had enough healthcare workers.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n nígbà tí ìjì kejì fi jà ó mú púpọ̀ lára àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ìlera lọ tí a pàdánù àwọn òníṣégùn-òyìnbó àti àwọn olùtọ́-ilé-ìwòsàn wa tí wọ́n léwájú náà.', 'en': 'But by the time the second wave hit it took such a toll among the healthcare workers that we lost most of our doctors and nurses that were on the front lines.'}
{'yo': 'Lápapọ̀ a pàdánù ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́nà 700 àwọn ènìyàn.', 'en': 'Overall we lost 700,000 people.'}
{'yo': 'Kòkòrò náà fi ìdá 100 ṣekúpa àwọn obìnrin aláboyún a ò sì mọ ìdí rẹ̀.', 'en': "The virus was 100 percent lethal to pregnant women and we don't actually know why."}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àkọsílẹ̀ ikú jẹ́ eni ọdún 15 sí 40 ọdún -- àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tí ìlera wọ́n péye.', 'en': 'Most of the death toll was 15 to 40 year-olds -- robustly healthy young adults.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n fi-wé àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn náà.', 'en': 'It was likened to the plague.'}
{'yo': '"A ò mọ iye ènìyàn t""ó kú pàtó."', 'en': "We don't actually know how many people died."}
{'yo': 'Ìdíyelé náà tí ò ṣe é gbójúlé jẹ́ àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ 35.', 'en': 'The low-ball estimate is 35 million.'}
{'yo': 'Èyí wá láti ara ìwífúni-alálàyé ti ilẹ̀ Europe àti North America.', 'en': 'This was based on European and North American data.'}

{'yo': 'Ìwádìí tuntun tí Chris Murray ṣe ní Havard fi hàn pé tí ẹ bá wo àká-ìwífúni-alálàyé tí àwọn Brits ní orílẹ̀-ède India tọ́jú, ìlọ́po 31 òdiwọ̀n ikú láàárín àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-ède India ló wà.', 'en': 'A new study by Chris Murray at Harvard shows that if you look at the databases that were kept by the Brits in India, there was a 31-fold greater death rate among the Indians.'}
{'yo': 'Ìgbàgbọ́ tó lágbára wà wí pé ní àwọn agbegbè oloṣì àkọsílẹ̀ ikú tún pọ̀ púpọ̀.', 'en': 'So there is a strong belief that in places of poverty the death toll was far higher.'}

{'yo': '"Àti wi pé ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àkọsílẹ̀ tó ṣe é ṣe wà láàárín àdúgbó àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ 80 sí àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ 100 ènìyàn k""á tó ní ètò ìrìnàjò ọkọ̀-òfuurufú tí í ṣe ti òwò."', 'en': 'And that a more likely toll is somewhere in the neighborhood of 80 to 100 million people before we had commercial air travel.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé a ti ṣetán?', 'en': 'So are we ready?'}
{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bí orílẹ̀-èdè, a ò ṣe tán.', 'en': "As a nation, no we're not."}

{'yo': 'Mo sì rò ó wí pé àwọn tó wà nípò aṣíwájú máa sọ wí pé bó ṣe rí nìyẹn, pé ọ̀na wá ṣì jìn.', 'en': 'And I think even those in the leadership would say that is the case, that we still have a long ways to go.'}
{'yo': 'Kíni ìyẹn túmọ̀ sí fun yín?', 'en': 'So what does that mean for you?'}

{'yo': '"Nǹkan àkọ́kọ́ ni wí pé, mi ò ní bẹ́rẹ̀ síní ṣe ìkójọ àdáni ohunkóhun - tìkaraàrẹ, ẹbíi rẹ, tàbí àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ""ẹ-- àyàfi tí ẹ bá ti ṣe iṣẹ́ àṣetiléwáa yín."', 'en': "Well the first thing is, I wouldn't start building up personal stockpiles of anything -- for yourself, your family, or your employees -- unless you've really done your homework."}
{'yo': 'Ìbòmú wo ló ń ṣiṣẹ́, ìbòmú wo ni ò ṣiṣẹ́.', 'en': "What mask works, what mask doesn't work."}
{'yo': 'Ìbòmú mélòó la nílò?', 'en': 'How many masks do you need?'}
{'yo': 'ìwádìí ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ ìmò-ìṣègùn rò ó wí pé ẹ ò lè ṣe àtúnṣe ìbòmú.', 'en': 'The Institute of Medicine study felt that you could not recycle masks.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ẹ bá rò wí pé yóò tó oṣù 18, ṣé ẹ ó ra ìbòmú tí yóò tó oṣù 18 fún ẹnìyàn kọ̀ọ̀kan ninú ẹbíi yín ni?', 'en': "Well if you think it's going to last 18 months, are you going to buy 18 months worth of masks for every single person in your family?"}

{'yo': 'A ò mọ̀ -- pẹ̀lu Tamiflu lẹ́ẹ̀kan síi, àyọrísí mìíràn àkọ́kọ́ tí Tamiflu ní ni àmì àìsàn afarajọ-àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èèmì.', 'en': "We don't know -- again with Tamiflu, the number one side effect of Tamiflu is flu-like symptoms."}

{'yo': '"Báwo lẹ ṣe lè mọ ènìyàn náà nínú ẹbíi yín t""ó ní àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èémí tí gbogbo wọn bá ń lo Tamiflu?"', 'en': 'So then how can you tell who in your family has the flu if everybody is taking Tamiflu?'}

{'yo': 'Bí ẹ bá fẹjú ìyẹn síta láti ronú nípa gbogbo àwùjọ, tàbí gbogbo àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ní ilé-iṣẹ́ yín, ẹ ó bẹ́rẹ̀ síní mọ gbèdéke bí ẹ̀yan Tamiflu ṣe lè rí.', 'en': 'If you expand that out to think of a whole community, or all your employees in your company, you begin to realize how limited the Tamiflu option might be.'}

{'yo': 'Gbogbo ènìyàn ti wá bá mi tí wọ́n sì sọ wí pé, a máa ṣe ìkópamọ́ omi tàbí, màá ṣe ìkópamọ́ oúnjẹ, tàbí nǹkan mìíràn.', 'en': "Everybody has come up to me and said, well I'll stockpile water or, I'll stockpile food, or what have you."}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ṣé lóòótọ́?', 'en': 'But really?'}
{'yo': 'Ǹjẹ́ ẹ ní àyè láti ṣe ìkópamọ́ọ oúnjẹ fún oṣù méjì-dín-lógún?', 'en': 'Do you really have a place to stockpile 18 months worth of food?'}
{'yo': 'Oúnjẹ tó tó oṣù mẹ́rìn-dín-lógún?', 'en': 'Twenty-four months worth of food?'}

{'yo': 'Ṣé ẹ fẹ́ fojú wo ewu àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn bí àwọn ènìyàn ní àsìko 1950 ṣe fojú wo ọ̀rọ ààbo ara-ẹni, kí ẹ sì kọ́ ibòji àdo-olóró kékeré fún àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èèmì?', 'en': 'Do you want to view the pandemic threat the way back in the 1950s people viewed the civil defense issue, and build your own little bomb shelter for pandemic flu?'}
{'yo': 'Mi ò rò wí pé ìyẹ́n bá ìrònú mu.', 'en': "I don't think that's rational."}

{'yo': 'Mo rò wí pé ó níṣe pẹ̀lú ìgbaradì gẹ́gẹ́ bí àwùjọ, kìí ṣe gẹ́gẹ́ bí ènìyàn -- wíwà nígbaradì gẹ́gẹ́ bí orílẹ̀-èdè, wíwà nígbaradì gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìpínlẹ̀, wíwà nígbaradì gẹ́gẹ́ bí agbègbè.', 'en': "I think it's about having to be prepared as communities, not as individuals -- being prepared as nation, being prepared as state, being prepared as town."}
{'yo': '"Lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ báyìí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìgbaradì l""ó ní akùdé t""ó fẹjú."', 'en': 'And right now most of the preparedness is deeply flawed.'}

{'yo': '"Mo sì lérò wí pé mo ti yíi yín lọ́kàn padà, tó túmọ̀ sí wí pé ojú iṣẹ́ gangan ni kí ẹ jáde kí ẹ sì sọ fún àwọn adarí ìbílẹ̀ yín, àti àwọn adarí àpapọ̀ yín, ""kí ló dé tí ẹ ò ṣe tíì yanjú àwọn ìṣòro wọ̀nyí?"', 'en': '"And I hope I\'ve convinced you of that, which means that the real job is go out and say to your local leaders, and your national leaders, ""Why haven\'t you solved these problems?"'}
{'yo': 'Kí ló dé tí ẹ ṣì ń ronú pé àwọn ẹ̀kọ́ nípa Katrina ò wúlò fún àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èémí?', 'en': 'Why are you still thinking that the lessons of Katrina do not apply to flu?'}
{'yo': '""" kí ẹ sì gbé agbára lé ibi tó yẹ kí ẹ gbé agbára lé."', 'en': '""" And put the pressure where the pressure needs to be put."'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n mo rò wí pé nǹkan mìíràn tó yẹ ká fi kún-un ni pé, tí ẹ bá ní àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ lóòótọ́, tí ẹ sì ní ilé-iṣẹ́ lóòótọ́, mo rò wí pé ẹ ní àwọn ojúṣe kọ̀ọ̀kan láti ṣàfihàn wí pé ẹ̀ ń ronú síwájú fún wọn, ẹ sì ń gbìyànjú láti ṣètò.', 'en': 'But I guess the other thing to add is, if you do have employees, and you do have a company, I think you have certain responsibilities to demonstrate that you are thinking ahead for them, and you are trying to plan.'}
{'yo': 'Ní akérépin èto ìfowópamọ́ Britain fi hàn pé ìbáraeni-sọ̀rọ̀ lè ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́.', 'en': 'At a minimum the British banking plan showed that telecommuting can be helpful.'}

{'yo': 'Ó lè ṣe àdínkù àgbéjáde nítorí àwọn ènìyàn ò wọnu ibi-iṣẹ́ kí wọ́n máa wúkọ́ síra wọn lára, tàbí fọwọ́ kan nǹkan àjọni àti pínpín-in nípasẹ ọwọ́ wọn.', 'en': 'It probably does reduce exposure because people are not coming into the office and coughing on each other, or touching common objects and sharing things via their hands.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ṣe ẹ lè ṣe ìtẹ̀síwájú ilé-iṣẹ́ yín báyẹn?', 'en': 'But can you sustain your company that way?'}
{'yo': 'Tí ẹ bá ní ẹ̀rọ-ayélukára, bóyá ẹ lè ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': 'Well if you have a dot-com, maybe you can.'}
{'yo': 'Yàtọ̀ sí ìyẹn ẹ ti wọ wàhálà.', 'en': "Otherwise you're in trouble."}
{'yo': 'Imú mi dùn láti gba ìbéére yín.', 'en': 'Happy to take your questions.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀kan lára ònwòran: Àwọn nǹkan wo ló lè sọ iye àkókò àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn kan?', 'en': 'Audience member: What factors determine the duration of a pandemic?'}
{'yo': 'Laurie Garret: àwọn nǹkan wo ló lè sọ iye àkókò àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn kan, a ò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ mọ̀.', 'en': "Laurie Garret: What factors determine the duration of a pandemic, we don't really know."}
{'yo': 'Mo lè fun yín ní àkójọpọ̀ ìṣí, èyí, ìyẹn, àti òmíràn.', 'en': 'I could give you a bunch of flip, this, that, and the other.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n màá sọ wí pé lódodo a ò mọ̀.', 'en': "But I would say that honestly we don't know."}

{'yo': 'Kókó ibẹ̀ ni wí pé kòkòrò náà máa ń ní àdínkù okun, ó sì máa ń dẹ́kun láti di kòkòrò aṣekúpani fún ènìyàn, ó sì máa ń wá agbàrùn mìíràn.', 'en': 'Clearly the bottom line is the virus eventually attenuates, and ceases to be a lethal virus to humanity, and finds other hosts.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n a ò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ mọ bó ṣe ń ṣẹlẹ̀ àti ìdí tó fi ń ṣẹlẹ̀.', 'en': "But we don't really know how and why that happens."}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀kọ́ nípa àjọṣepọ̀ láàárín ènìyàn àti àwùjọ tó jẹ́ àmúdijú ni.', 'en': "It's a very complicated ecology."}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀kan lára ònwòran: irú aṣokùnfà wo lẹ̀ ń wá?', 'en': 'Audience member: What kind of triggers are you looking for?'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ nímọ̀ ju ẹnìkan kan wa lọ.', 'en': 'You know way more than any of us.'}
{'yo': 'Láti sọ pé ahh, tí èyí bá ṣẹlẹ̀ a máa ní àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn?', 'en': 'To say ahh, if this happens then we are going to have a pandemic?'}
{'yo': 'LG: ìgbà tí ẹ bá ti ń rí èri àkóràn ènìyàn sí ènìyàn tó lágbára.', 'en': 'LG: The moment that you see any evidence of serious human-to-human to transmission.'}

{'yo': 'Kìí ṣe tímọ́tímọ́ láàárín mọ̀lẹ́bí tí wọ́n ń ṣe ìtọ́jú àbúrò lóbìnrin tàbí àbúrò lọ́kùnrin tó ń ṣàìsàn nìkan, ṣùgbọ́n àkóràn láàárín àwùjọ -- ìfọ́nká láàárín ilé-ẹ̀kọ́, àkóràn láàárín ọ̀dẹ̀dẹ̀, irú nǹkan báyẹn.', 'en': 'Not just intimately between family members who took care of an ailing sister or brother, but a community infected -- spread within a school, spread within a dormitory, something of that nature.'}

{'yo': 'Mo sì rònú wí pé àdéhùn àgbáyé ti wà báyìí, ní WHO títí dé ìsàlẹ̀: ẹ fi ìfitóni ránṣẹ́ síta.', 'en': 'Then I think that there is universal agreement now, at WHO all the way down: Send out the alert.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀kan lára òǹwòran: àwọn ìwádìí kan ti fi hàn pé àwọn òògùn ọ̀rá inú ẹ̀jẹ̀ ń lè ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́.', 'en': 'Audience member: Some research has indicated that statins can be helpful.'}
{'yo': 'Ǹjẹ́ ẹ lè sọ̀rọ̀ nípa ìyẹ̀n?', 'en': 'Can you talk about that?'}
{'yo': 'LG: bẹ́ẹ̀ni.', 'en': 'LG: Yeah.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn èrí kan wà pé Lipitor àti àwọn òògùn ọ̀rá inú ẹ̀jẹ̀ tókù lè ṣe àdínkù ìkángun-séwu àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-òpónà-èèmì.', 'en': 'There is some evidence that taking Lipitor and other common statins for cholesterol control may decrease your vulnerability to influenza.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n a ò mọ ìdi rẹ̀ rárá.', 'en': 'But we do not completely understand why.'}
{'yo': 'Ètò náà ò hàn kedere.', 'en': "The mechanism isn't clear."}

{'yo': 'Mi ò sì mọ̀ wí pé ọ̀nà kankan wà tó tọ́ fún ènìyàn láti bẹ̀rẹ̀ síní fún àwọn ọmọ wọn lógùn pẹ̀lú Lipitor àdáni tàbí nǹkan tó jọ bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': "And I don't know that there is any way responsibly for someone to start medicating their children with their personal supply of Lipitor or something of that nature."}
{'yo': 'A ò nímọ̀ Kankan nípa nǹkan tí ìyẹ́n máa ṣe.', 'en': 'We have absolutely no idea what that would do.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ lè máa fa àbájáde abéwudé sí ọmọ yín lára, pẹ̀lú ṣíṣe nǹkan bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': 'You might be causing some very dangerous outcomes in your children, doing such a thing.'}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀kan lára òǹwòran: báwo la ṣe súmọ́ mímọ̀ bóyá ẹnìkan ń gbé e kiri, bóyá ẹnìkan ní èyí kí àwọn àmì àìsàn náà tó fojú-hàn.', 'en': 'Audience member: How far along are we in being able to determine whether someone is actually carrying, whether somebody has this before the symptoms are full-blown?'}
{'yo': 'LG: ó dáa.', 'en': 'LG: Right.'}
{'yo': 'Mo ti sọ nígbà pípẹ́ pé nǹkan tí a nílò ni ìdámọ̀ àìsàn kánkán.', 'en': 'So I have for a long time said that what we really needed was a rapid diagnostic.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn àyè fún ìdènà àrùn wa ti sàmì sí àyèwò kan tí wọ́n ṣe ìdámọ̀ àìsàn kánkán.', 'en': 'And our Centers for Disease Control has labeled a test they developed a rapid diagnostic.'}

{'yo': 'Ó máa ń gbà tó wákátì mẹ́rìn-lé-lógún ní àyè fún ìmọ̀-ìjìnlẹ̀ tó ti dàgbàsókè gan-an, ní ọwọ́ àwọn tí wọ́n mọ̀ọ́ ṣe gan-an.', 'en': 'It takes 24 hours in a very highly developed laboratory, in highly skilled hands.'}
{'yo': 'Mò ń ronú jinlẹ̀.', 'en': "I'm thinking dipstick."}
{'yo': 'Ẹ lè ṣe é fún àwọn ọmọ yín.', 'en': 'You could do it to your own kid.'}
{'yo': 'Ó máa ń pa àwọ̀ dà.', 'en': 'It changes color.'}
{'yo': 'Ó máa sọ fún yín bóyá ẹ ní H5N1.', 'en': 'It tells you if you have H5N1.'}

{'yo': 'Nípa ibi tí a wà nínú ìmọ̀-ìjìnlẹ̀ pẹ̀lu ìkápáa ìdánimọ̀ DNA àti bẹ́ẹ̀bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ, a ò jìnà púpọ̀.', 'en': "In terms of where we are in science with DNA identification capacities and so on, it's not that far off."}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n a ò tíì débẹ̀.', 'en': "But we're not there."}
{'yo': 'Kò sì tíì sí irú ìdókòwò tó lè gbé wa débẹ̀.', 'en': "And there hasn't been the kind of investment to get us there."}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀kan lára ònwòran: Ní afàáfẹ̀ ọdún 1918 ó yémi wí pé wọ́n pèse tíọ́rì pé àwọn àdínkù okun kòkòrò náà ṣẹlẹ̀ nígbà tó fò wọnú ènìyàn.', 'en': 'Audience member: In the 1918 flu I understand that they theorized that there was some attenuation of the virus when it made the leap into humans.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé ìyẹn ṣe é ṣe, ṣé ẹ rò bẹ́ẹ̀, níbí?', 'en': 'Is that likely, do you think, here?'}
{'yo': 'Mò ń sọ nípa pé ìda ogọ́rùn àpapọ̀ ikú pọ̀ púpọ̀.', 'en': 'I mean 100 percent death rate is pretty severe.'}
{'yo': 'LG: Um bẹ́ẹ̀ni.', 'en': 'LG: Um yeah.'}

{'yo': 'A ò mọ̀ bí ìṣekúpani kòkòro odún 1918 ṣe tó sí àwọn ẹyẹ igbó kó tó fò látara ẹyẹ sí ènìyàn.', 'en': "So we don't actually know what the lethality was of the 1918 strain to wild birds before it jumped from birds to humans."}

{'yo': 'Ó ṣàjòjì pé kò sí ẹ̀rí ìkú lọ́pọ̀ nípa àwọn adìyẹ tàbí àwọn ẹyẹ inú-ilé káàkiri ilẹ̀ America kí àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn náà tó ṣẹlẹ̀ sí ènìyàn.', 'en': "It's curious that there is no evidence of mass die-offs of chickens or household birds across America before the human pandemic happened."}

{'yo': 'Ìyẹn lè jẹ́ nítorí àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ yẹn ń ṣẹlẹ̀ ní òdì kejì àgbáyé níbi tí ẹnìkankan ò ti fọkàn si.', 'en': 'That may be because those events were occurring on the other side of the world where nobody was paying attention.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n kòkòrò náà ní kedere lọ lẹ́ẹ̀kan káàkiri àgbáyé ní ẹ̀dà tó le tí àwọnn ọmọ-ogun Britain nínú ogun àgbáyé àkọ́kọ́ fi ọwọ́ rẹ̀ sọ̀yà pé kìí ṣe ewu kò sì ní ṣe ìdíwọ́ fú àbájáde ogun.', 'en': 'But the virus clearly went through one round around the world in a mild enough form that the British army in World War I actually certified that it was not a threat and would not affect the outcome of the war.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà tó sì lọ yípo àgbáyé ó padà wá ní ẹ̀da aṣekúpani tó le.', 'en': 'And after circulating around the world came back in a form that was tremendously lethal.'}
{'yo': 'Kíni ìdá àwọn ènìyàn tó kó o tí ó páwọ́n?', 'en': 'What percentage of infected people were killed by it?'}
{'yo': 'Lẹ́ẹ̀kan sí i a ò mọ̀ lóòótọ́.', 'en': "Again we don't really know for sure."}

{'yo': 'Ó fojú hàn pé tí ẹ bá lókun fún ìbẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀, ẹ ní ètò àjẹsára tó lẹ, ẹ ń gbé nínú ìṣẹ́ ní orílẹ̀-ède India tàbí ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀, ìṣe é ṣe yín láti kú pọ̀ gidi gan-an.', 'en': "It's clear that if you were malnourished to begin with, you had a weakened immune system, you lived in poverty in India or Africa, your likelihood of dying was far greater."}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n a ò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ mọ̀.', 'en': "But we don't really know."}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀kan lára òmwòran: ọ̀kan lára àwọn nǹkan tí mo ti gbọ́ ni wí pé okùnfa ikú gangan nígbà tí ènìyán bá ní àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èémí ni òtútù àyà tó rọ̀ mọ, àti wí pé òògùn àjẹsára òtútù-ẹ̀gbẹ́ lè fún yín ní ìdá àádọ́ta àǹfààní àrùlà.', 'en': "Audience member: One of the things I've heard is that the real death cause when you get a flu is the associated pneumonia, and that a pneumonia vaccine may offer you 50 percent better chance of survival."}

{'yo': 'LG: fún ìgbà pípẹ́, àwọn oníṣẹ́ ìwádìí nínú àrùn tuntun ò kọbiara sí ewu àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-òpónà-èèmì pẹ̀lú àwíjàre wí pé ní odún 1918 wọn ò ní òògùn apa kòkòrò àìfojúrí.', 'en': "LG: For a long time, researchers in emerging diseases were kind of dismissive of the pandemic flu threat on the grounds that back in 1918 they didn't have antibiotics."}

{'yo': 'Àti wí pé ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn tí wọn kú ikú àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èémí ojoojúmọ́ -- tó ṣe wí pé ní ọdún afàáfẹ̀ ojoojúmọ́ bíi ẹgbẹ̀rún lọ́nà ọ̀tà-lé-lọ́ọ̀dúnrún ènìyàn káàkiri àgbánlá-ayé, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn àgbàlagbà -- wọ́n sì kú kìí ṣe nítorí afàáfẹ̀ ṣùgbọ́n nítorí àrùn-ọlọ́jẹ̀-ọ̀nà-èémí náà ti fa ewu sí ètò àjẹsára àìfaragbàìsàn-láàyè wọn ní.', 'en': 'And that most people who die of regular flu -- which in regular flu years is about 360,000 people worldwide, most of them senior citizens -- and they die not of the flu but because the flu gives an assault to their immune system.'}

{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú rẹ ni òtútù-ẹ̀gbẹ́ tàbí kòkòrò-àìfojúrí mìíràn, kòkòro amúnkandobu, ó fọ́n ká, wọ́n ti ní kòkòrò-àìfojúrí òtútù-ẹ̀gbẹ́.', 'en': 'And along comes pneumococcus or another bacteria, streptococcus and boom, they get a bacterial pneumonia.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ó ṣẹlẹ̀ wí pé ní ọdún 1918 bí ọ̀rọ́ ṣe rí kọ́ nìyẹn rárá.', 'en': 'But it turns out that in 1918 that was not the case at all.'}

{'yo': 'Di àsìkò yìí ní ti ọ̀rọ H5N1 nínú ènìyàn, irú àkóràn kòkòrò-àìfojúrí bẹ́ẹ̀ kò ní wàhálà rárá.', 'en': 'And so far in the H5N1 cases in people, similarly bacterial infection has not been an issue at all.'}

{'yo': 'Nǹkan aṣèdíwọ́ fún ètò àjẹsára àìfaragbàìsàn-láàyè tó yátọ̀ pátápátá yìí ni kọ́kọ́rọ́ sí ìdí tí àwọn ènìyan fi ń kú látara kòkòrò yìí.', 'en': "It's this absolutely phenomenal disruption of the immune system that is the key to why people die of this virus."}
{'yo': 'Mo sì ma ṣe àfikún pé a rí nǹkan kan náà pẹ̀lu SARS.', 'en': 'And I would just add we saw the same thing with SARS.'}

{'yo': '"Nǹkan tó ń ṣẹlẹ̀ níbí ni wí pé ara yín ń sọ wí pé, kí ètò àjẹsára àìfaragbàìsàn-láàyè yín ń rán gbogbo aṣàfihàn àrùn rẹ̀ kó sì sọ wí pé, ""mi ò mọ ohun tí èyí jẹ́."', 'en': '"So what\'s going on here is your body says, your immune system sends out all its sentinels and says, ""I don\'t know what the heck this is."'}
{'yo': 'A ò tíì rí nǹkankan kódà díẹ̀ tó dàbí èyí rí tẹ́lẹ̀.', 'en': "We've never seen anything even remotely like this before."}

{'yo': 'Kò ní ṣe àǹfààní kankan láti mú àwọn atamátàsé wọlé nítorí àwọn agbógunti-àrùn ara yẹn ò sí níbí.', 'en': '""" It won\'t do any good to bring in the sharpshooters because those antibodies aren\'t here."'}

{'yo': 'Kò sì ní ṣe àǹfààní kankan láti mú àwọn ọkọ̀-ìjagun àti ìbọn ńlá wọlé nítorí àwọn pádi-T ò da mọ̀ pẹ̀lú.', 'en': "And it won't do any good to bring in the tanks and the artillery because those T-cells don't recognize it either."}

{'yo': 'A máa nílò láti jáde tán pẹ̀lú ìdáhùn àgọ́ gbígbóná, ìgún ní kẹ́sẹ́ gbogbo àtòpọ amú-ìlera ara-ṣedéédé.', 'en': "So we're going to have to go all-out thermonuclear response, stimulate the total cytokine cascade."}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo ètò àjẹsára àìfaragbàìsàn-láàyè ti lúwẹ̀ wọnú ẹ̀dọ̀fóóró.', 'en': 'The whole immune system swarms into the lungs.'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni wọ́n kú, wọ́n rì sínú oje ara wọn, ti òtútù-ẹ̀gbẹ́.', 'en': 'And yes they die, drowning in their own fluids, of pneumonia.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n kì í ṣe kòkòrò-àìfojúrí òtútù-ẹ̀gbẹ́.', 'en': "But it's not bacterial pneumonia."}
{'yo': 'Kì í ṣe òtútù-ẹ̀gbẹ́ ni yóò dáhùn sí òògùn ìbupá.', 'en': "And it's not a pneumonia that would respond to a vaccine."}
{'yo': 'Mo rò wí pé àkókò mí ti tó.', 'en': 'And I think my time is up.'}
{'yo': 'Mo dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ gbogbo yín fún àkíyèsí yín.', 'en': 'I thank you all for your attention.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ogúnléndé ni ẹ̀tọ́ sí ìdáààbòbò.', 'en': 'Refugees have the right to be protected'}
{'yo': 'Bruno Giusani: kọmíṣọ́nà, ẹ ṣeun ti ẹ wá sí TED.', 'en': 'Bruno Giussani: Commissioner, thank you for coming to TED.'}
{'yo': 'António Guterres: ìdùnnú mi ni.', 'en': 'António Guterres: Pleasure.'}
{'yo': 'BG: ẹ jẹ́ ká bẹ́rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ònkà.', 'en': "BG: Let's start with a figure."}

{'yo': 'Lásìkò ọdún 2015, ó fẹ́rẹ̀ẹ́ tó àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ kan àwọn atìpó àti àwọn aṣíkiri tí wọ́n dé sílẹ̀ Europe láti orílẹ̀-èdè lóríṣìiríṣi, bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, láti Syria àti Iraq, ṣùgbọ́n bákan náà láti Afghanistan àti Bangladesh àti Eritrea àti ibòmíràn.', 'en': 'During 2015, almost one million refugees and migrants arrived in Europe from many different countries, of course, from Syria and Iraq, but also from Afghanistan and Bangladesh and Eritrea and elsewhere.'}

{'yo': 'Irúfẹ́ àwọn èsì méjì ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ ló ti wà: àwọn tí wọ́n ń gba àlejò wọlé àti àwọn ògiri ẹnubodè.', 'en': 'And there have been reactions of two different kinds: welcoming parties and border fences.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n mo fẹ́ wò ó díè pẹ̀lú ojú-ìwòye ìgbà-díẹ̀ àti ìgbà-pípẹ́.', 'en': 'But I want to look at it a little bit from the short-term and the long-term perspective.'}

{'yo': 'Ìbéèrè àkọ́kọ́ sì rọrùn gidi gan-an: kílódé tí ìrìnàjò àwọn atìpó ṣe lékún síi láti bí oṣù mẹ́fà sẹ́yìn?', 'en': 'And the first question is very simple: Why has the movement of refugees spiked so fast in the last six months?'}

{'yo': 'AG: Ó dáa, mo rò ó, ní pàtàkì jùlọ, pé nǹkan tó ṣokùnfa àfikún ńlá yìí ni ẹgbẹ́ àwọn atìpó orílẹ̀-ède Syria.', 'en': 'AG: Well, I think, basically, what triggered this huge increase was the Syrian refugee group.'}

{'yo': 'Àlékún ti wà nínú ìr̀nàjò lọ sílẹ̀ Europe láti ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀, láti Asia, ṣùgbọ́n tó ń dàgbà díẹ̀díẹ̀, lójijì a ní àfikún tó pọ̀ ní oṣù àkọ́kọ́ ọdún yìí.', 'en': 'There has been an increased movement into Europe from Africa, from Asia, but slowly growing, and all of a sudden we had this massive increase in the first months of this year.'}
{'yo': 'Okùnfà mẹ́ta ni mo rò wí pé ó fà á, àwọn tìgbà-pípẹ́ méjì àti okùnfa ẹ̀.', 'en': 'I think there are three reasons, two long-term ones and the trigger.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn tìgbà-pípẹ́, ní ìbátan pẹ̀lú àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ Syria, ni wí pé ìrètí kéré kò sì hànde púpọ̀ fún àwọn ènìyàn.', 'en': 'The long-term ones, in relation to Syrians, is that hope is less and less clear for people.'}

{'yo': 'Mò ń sọ nípa pé, wọ́n ń wo orílẹ̀-ède wọn wọn ò sì rí ìrètí púpọ̀ láti padà sílé, nítorí kò sí ọ̀nà-àbáyọ òṣèlú, torí náà kò sí ìmọ́lẹ̀ lẹ́yìn òkùnkùn.', 'en': "I mean, they look at their own country and they don't see much hope to go back home, because there is no political solution, so there is no light at the end of the tunnel."}

{'yo': 'Ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì, ìgbésí ayé àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-ède Syria tí wọ́n wà ní àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tó súmọ́ ti ń polúkú-muṣu.', 'en': 'Second, the living conditions of the Syrians in the neighboring countries have been deteriorating.'}

{'yo': 'A ṣè ṣe ìwádìí pẹ̀lu Ilé-ìfowópamọ́ Àgbáyé ni, ìdá mẹ́tà-dín-láàdọ́rùn àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-ède Syria ní Jordan àti ìdá mẹ́tà-lé-láàdọ́rùn àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-ède Syria ní Lebanon ni wọ́n ń gbé lábẹ́ ilà òṣì àpapọ̀.', 'en': 'We just had research with the World Bank, and 87 percent of the Syrians in Jordan and 93 percent of the Syrians in Lebanon live below the national poverty lines.'}

{'yo': 'Ìdajì nínú àwọn ọmọ ni wọ́n ń lọ ilé-ẹ̀kọ́, tó túmọ̀ sí wí pé àwọn ènìyàn ń gbé ìgbeayé tí ò da.', 'en': 'Only half of the children go to school, which means that people are living very badly.'}

{'yo': 'Kìí ṣe wí pé wọ́n jẹ́ atìpó nìkan, tí wọn ò nílé, kìí ṣe wí pé wọ́n ti jìyà tí wọ́n jẹ nìkan, ṣùgbọ́n wọ́n ń gbé ní ipò tó bani nínú jẹ́.', 'en': 'Not only are they refugees, out of home, not only have they suffered what they have suffered, but they are living in very, very dramatic conditions.'}
{'yo': 'Okùnfà náà ni ìgbà tó jẹ́ wí pé lójijì, ìrànwọ́ látókèrè dínkù.', 'en': 'And then the trigger was when all of a sudden, international aid decreased.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n pọn-ọ́n ní dandan fún Èto Oúnjẹ Àgbáyé, fún àìsí ohun-èlò, láti gé ìdá ọgbọ̀n ìrànwọ́ oúnjẹ fún àwọn atìpó ọmọ orílẹ̀-ède Syria.', 'en': 'The World Food Programme was forced, for lack of resources, to cut by 30 percent food support to the Syrian refugees.'}

{'yo': '"Wọn ò gbà wọ́n lááyè láti ṣiṣẹ́, nítorí náà wọn gbáralé ìrànwọ́ láti ilẹ̀-òkèèrè pátápátá, wọ́n dè ń rò ó wí pé, ""gbogbo ayé ti ń pawá tì."', 'en': '"They\'re not allowed to work, so they are totally dependent on international support, and they felt, ""The world is abandoning us."'}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹn, ní èróngbà tèmi, ni okùnfa rẹ̀.', 'en': '""" And that, in my opinion, was the trigger."'}

{'yo': 'Lójijì, ìrọ́gìrí wà, àwọn ènìyán dẹ̀ bẹ̀rẹ̀ síní gbéra níye wọn àti, kí sọ òdodo, tí mo bá wà ní irú ipò bẹ́ẹ̀ tí mo sì ní ìgboyà láti ṣe é, mo rò wí pé èmi náà ì bá ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': 'All of a sudden, there was a rush, and people started to move in large numbers and, to be absolutely honest, if I had been in the same situation and I would have been brave enough to do it, I think I would have done the same.'}

{'yo': 'BG: ṣùgbọ́n mo rò wí pé nǹkan tó ya ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ènìyàn lẹ́nu ni wí pé ṣé kò tíì yá jù, ṣùgbọ́n kò yẹ kí ó yá.', 'en': "BG: But I think what surprised many people is it's not only sudden, but it wasn't supposed to be sudden."}
{'yo': 'Ogun tó wà ní orílẹ̀-ède Syria ti ń ṣẹlẹ̀ fún ọdún márùn-ún.', 'en': 'The war in Syria has been happening for five years.'}
{'yo': 'Àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ àwọn atìpó wà ní ìpàgọ́ àti àwọn abúlé àti àwọn agbègbè tó yí orílẹ̀-ède Syria.', 'en': 'Millions of refugees are in camps and villages and towns around Syria.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n ti kìlọ̀ fún yín nípa ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà àti àpadàbọ ìdàrúdápọ̀ ní orílẹ̀-ède Libya, fún àpẹẹrẹ, síbẹ̀ ilẹ̀ Europe dàbi ẹni tí ò tíì ṣetán.', 'en': 'You have yourself warned about the situation and about the consequences of a breakdown of Libya, for example, and yet Europe looked totally unprepared.'}

{'yo': 'AG: Ó dáa, aìmúrasílẹ̀ nítorí ìpínyà, tí ẹ bá d sì ẹ̀ ti pínyà, ẹ ò ní fẹ́ rí òótọ́.', 'en': "AG: Well, unprepared because divided, and when you are divided, you don't want to recognize the reality."}
{'yo': 'Ó máa tẹ́ ẹ yín lọ́rùn láti sún ìpinnu síwájú, nítorí ẹ ò ní ìkápá láti ṣewọ́n.', 'en': 'You prefer to postpone decisions, because you do not have the capacity to make them.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀rí ni wí pé kódà nígbà tí àlékún náà ṣẹlẹ̀, ilẹ̀ Europe ṣì pín síbẹ̀ wọn ò sì ní ànfànní láti ṣètò tí yóò mójú tó ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà.', 'en': 'And the proof is that even when the spike occurred, Europe remained divided and was unable to put in place a mechanism to manage the situation.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ sọ̀rọ̀ nípa ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́na-ẹgbẹ̀rún kan ènìyàn.', 'en': 'You talk about one million people.'}

{'yo': 'Ó jọ bi ẹní pọ̀, ṣùgbọ́n àpapọ̀ ènìyàn ni Àjọ-ìgbìmọ Ilẹ̀ Europe jẹ́ ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́na-ẹgbẹ̀rún ọ̀tà-dín-léwà-dín-lẹ́gbẹ̀ta àwọn ènìyàn, tó túmọ̀ sí wí pé à ń sọ̀rọ̀ nípa ọ̀kan nínú gbogbo [ọ̀tà-dín-léwà-dín-lẹ́gbẹ̀ta] àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ Europe.', 'en': 'It looks enormous, but the population of the European Union is 550 million people, which means we are talking about one per every [550] Europeans.'}
{'yo': 'Báyìí, ní Lebanon, a ní atìpó kan nínú ọmọ orílẹ̀ ède Lebanon mẹ́ta.', 'en': 'Now, in Lebanon, we have one refugee per three Lebanese.'}
{'yo': 'Orílẹ̀-ède Lebanon ńkọ́?', 'en': 'And Lebanon?'}
{'yo': 'Ó ń tiraka, bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, ṣùgbọ́n ó ń gbìyànjú.', 'en': "Struggling, of course, but it's managing."}

{'yo': 'Nítorí náà, ìbéèrè náà ni wí pé: nǹkan yìí ni wọn ò bá ti ṣàmójútó rẹ̀ tó bá ṣe wí pe -- láìmẹ́nu ba nǹkan tó ṣe pàtàkì jùlọ, tí ò bá ti yanjú okùnfa ìpìlẹ rẹ̀, ṣùgbọ́n ká gbàgbé nípa okùnfà ìpìlẹ rẹ̀ báyì, bí a ṣé ń wo nǹkan náà bó ṣe rí yìí -- tí ilẹ̀ Europe bá lè parapọ̀ ní ìṣọ̀kan láti pèse àyè ìgbàlejò tó péye ní àwọn ọ̀nà àbáwọlé ńkọ́?', 'en': 'So, the question is: is this something that could have been managed if -- not mentioning the most important thing, which would have been addressing the root causes, but forgetting about root causes for now, looking at the phenomenon as it is -- if Europe were able to come together in solidarity to create an adequate reception capacity of entry points?'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́ fún ìyẹn, àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tó wà ní àwọn ọ̀nà àbáwọlé nílò ìràlọ́wọ́ tó pọ̀, àti ṣíṣe àyẹ̀wò fún àwọn ènìyàn náà pẹ̀lú àyẹ̀wò ajẹmọ́-ààbò àti gbogbo àwọn ètò míràn, pínpín àwọn tí wọ́n ń wọ gbogbo orílẹ̀-èdè Europe, gẹ́gẹ́ bi aṣe é ṣe orílẹ̀-èdè kọ̀ọ̀kan.', 'en': 'But for that, the countries at entry points need to be massively supported, and then screening the people with security checks and all the other mechanisms, distributing those that are coming into all European countries, according to the possibilities of each country.'}

{'yo': 'Mò ń sọ nípa pé, tí ẹ bá wo ètò ìṣípòpadà tí Àjọ náà fọwọ́sí, ó ń kéré jù ó ń pẹ́ jù ní gbogbo ìgbà, tàbí látọ́dọ̀ Àjọ náà, ó ń kéré jù ó ń pẹ́ jù.', 'en': 'I mean, if you look at the relocation program that was approved by the Commission, always too little too late, or by the Council, too little too late --'}
{'yo': 'BG: Ó ti ń dẹnukọlẹ̀.', 'en': "BG: It's already breaking down."}
{'yo': 'AG: ó yẹ kí orílẹ̀-èdè mi gba ẹgbẹ̀rún merin.', 'en': 'AG: My country is supposed to receive four thousand.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́rin ní orílẹ̀-ède Portugal ò túmọ̀ sí nǹkankan.', 'en': 'Four thousand in Portugal means nothing.'}

{'yo': 'Èyí ṣe é mójútó dáadáa tí wọ́n bá mójúto, ṣùgbọ́n pẹ̀lú nǹkan tó ń ṣẹlẹ̀ lọ́wọ́, ọ̀nà àbáwọlé ni ìṣòro wà, lẹ́yìn náà, bí àwọn ènìyàn ṣe ń rìn lọ́nà ìdàrúdápọ̀ sí Balkan, tí wọ́n sì wá sí orílẹ̀-ède Germany, Sweden, ní pàtàkì jùlọ, àti Austria.', 'en': 'So this is perfectly manageable if it is managed, but in the present circumstances, the pressure is at the point of entry, and then, as people move in this chaotic way through the Balkans, then they come to Germany, Sweden, basically, and Austria.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ni orílẹ̀-èdè mẹ́ta tí, nígbẹ́yìn, wón ń gba àwọn atìpó náà.', 'en': 'They are the three countries that are, in the end, receiving the refugees.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ará ilẹ̀ Europe tókù ń wò láìṣe nǹkankan.', 'en': 'The rest of Europe is looking without doing much.'}
{'yo': 'BG: e jẹ́ kí n bèrè ìbéèrè mẹ́ta, kí ń ṣe ìṣe alátakò.', 'en': "BG: Let me try to bring up three questions, playing a bit devil's advocate."}
{'yo': 'Màá gbìyànjú láti bère wọn, láti sọ ojú abẹ níkò.', 'en': "I'll try to ask them, make them blunt."}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n mo rò wí pé àwọn ìbéèrè náà wà ní ọkàn ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn nílẹ̀ Europe lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ báyìí, àkọ́kọ́, bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, nípa iye wọn.', 'en': 'But I think the questions are very present in the minds of many people in Europe right now, the first, of course, is about numbers.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ ní ọ̀tà-dín-léwà-dín-lẹ́gbẹ̀ta kojú ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́nà-ẹgbẹ̀rún kan ti pọ̀jù, ṣùgbọ́n lóòótọ́, ènìyàn mélòó ni ilẹ̀ Europe lè gbà?', 'en': 'You say 550 million versus one million is not much, but realistically, how many people can Europe take?'}
{'yo': 'AG: Ó dára, ìbéèrè tí ò ní ìdáhùn nìyẹn, nítorí àwọn atìpó ní ẹ̀tọ́ sí ìdáààbòbò.', 'en': 'AG: Well, that is a question that has no answer, because refugees have the right to be protected.'}

{'yo': '"Nǹkan tó jọ bí òfin ilẹ̀ òkèré wà, nítorí náà kò sí ọ̀nà tí ẹ lè fi sọ wí pé, ""Mo mú ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́wà ìyen sì ti tán."', 'en': '"And there is such a thing as international law, so there is no way you can say, ""I take 10,000 and that\'s finished."'}

{'yo': '""" Mo rán-an yín létí nǹkankan: ní orílẹ̀-ède Turkey, ní ìbẹ̀rẹ rògbòdìyàn náà, mo rántí alákòso kan tó ń sọ wí pé, ""orílẹ̀-ède Turkey máa lè gbà tó ẹgbẹ̀rún lónà ọgọ́rùn ènìyàn."', 'en': '""" I remind you of one thing: in Turkey, at the beginning of the crisis, I remember one minister saying, ""Turkey will be able to receive up to 100,000 people."'}

{'yo': '""" Orílẹ̀-ède Turkey ti ní ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́nà-ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́ta àti ẹgbẹ̀rún lọ́nà ọ̀rìn-dín-nírinwó tàbí nǹkan tó jọ bẹ́ẹ̀, tí ẹ bá ka gbogbo àwọn atìpó náà."', 'en': '""" Turkey has now two million three-hundred thousand or something of the sort, if you count all refugees."'}
{'yo': 'Torí náà mí ò rò wí pé ó bójúmu láti sọ wí pé mélòó ni a lè gbà.', 'en': "So I don't think it's fair to say how many we can take."}

{'yo': 'Nǹkan tó bójúmu láti sọ ni wí pé: báwo la ṣelè ṣèto arawa láti gba ojúṣe ilẹ̀-òkère wa?', 'en': 'What it is fair to say is: how we can we organize ourselves to assume our international responsibilities?'}

{'yo': 'Ilẹ̀ Europe kò tíì rí ìyẹn ṣe, nítorí ní pàtàkì, ilẹ̀ Europe ti pín nítorí kò sí ìṣọ̀kan nínú iṣẹ́-àkàṣe ilẹ̀ Europe.', 'en': 'And Europe has not been able to do so, because basically, Europe is divided because there is no solidarity in the European project.'}
{'yo': 'Kì í ṣe nípa àwọn atìpó nìkan; àwọn àyè míràn tún wà.', 'en': "And it's not only about refugees; there are many other areas."}
{'yo': 'Ẹ jẹ́ ká sọ òdodo, àsìkò náà rè é tó ṣe wí pé a nílò ọ̀pọ Europe yàtọ̀ sí díẹ̀ Europe.', 'en': "And let's be honest, this is the moment in which we need more Europe instead of less Europe."}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n bí àwọn ará ìlú ṣe ń ní ìgbàgbọ́ tó kéré nínú àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ilẹ Europe, ní àsìkò kọ̀ọ̀kan yìí náà ló máa ń nira láti yí àwọn ará-ìlú lọ́kàn padà pé a nílò ọ̀pọ ilẹ̀-europe láti yanjú àwọn ìṣòro wọ̀nyìí.', 'en': 'But as the public less and less believes in European institutions, it is also each time more difficult to convince the public that we need more Europe to solve these problems.'}

{'yo': 'BG: Ó jọ bí ẹni wí pé a ti dé ibi tí nọ́ḿbà náà ti yí padà di àyípadà òṣèlú, pàápàá jùlọ lábẹ́lé.', 'en': 'BG: We seem to be at the point where the numbers turn into political shifts, particularly domestically.'}

{'yo': 'A tún rí i lópin ọ̀sẹ̀ yìí lórílẹ̀-ède France, ṣùgbọ́n a ti rí i láìmọye ìgbà ní ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè: ní Poland àti ní Denmark àti ní Switzerland àti ibòmíràn, níbi tí ìmúlára ti yípadà nítorí nọ́ḿbà, bó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ wí pé wọn ò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ ṣe pàtàkì nínú gbogbo oǹkà.', 'en': 'We saw it again this weekend in France, but we have seen it over and over in many countries: in Poland and in Denmark and in Switzerland and elsewhere, where the mood changes radically because of the numbers, although they are not very significant in absolute numbers.'}
{'yo': 'Olórí ìgbìmọ̀ ìjọba ti --', 'en': 'The Prime Minister of --'}

{'yo': 'AG: ṣùgbọ́n, tí mo bá lè, lórí àwọn wọ̀nyí: mò ń sọ nípa pé, kíni ọmọ ilẹ̀ Europe ń rí nílé ní abúlé níbi tí kò sí àwọn aṣíkiri?', 'en': 'AG: But, if I may, on these: I mean, what does a European see at home in a village where there are no migrants?'}

{'yo': 'Nǹkan tí ọmọ ilẹ̀ Europe ń rí ni, lórí ẹ̀rọ amóhùn-máwòrán, lójoojúmọ́, ní oṣù díẹ̀ sẹ́yìn, ṣíṣí ìròyìn ní ọjọ́ kọ̀ọ̀kan, àwọn èrò tó ń bọ̀, láì ní ìdarí, tí wọ́n ń lọ láti ibodè sí ibodè, àwọn àwòrán lórí ẹ̀rọ amóhùn-máwòrán jẹ́ ti àwọn ẹgbẹ̀rún lọ́nà ọgọ́rùn àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n ń lọ.', 'en': 'What a European sees is, on television, every single day, a few months ago, opening the news every single day, a crowd coming, uncontrolled, moving from border to border, and the images on television were of hundreds or thousands of people moving.'}

{'yo': 'Èrò wa ni wí pé kò sí ẹni tó ń ṣe àmójútó rẹ̀ -- èyí ń ṣẹlẹ̀ láìsí àmójútó kankan.', 'en': 'And the idea is that nobody is taking care of it -- this is happening without any kind of management.'}
{'yo': '"Nítorí náà èro wọn ni wí pé, ""Wọ́n ń bọ̀ wá sí abúlé mi."', 'en': '"And so their idea was, ""They are coming to my village."'}

{'yo': '""" Èro irọ́ pátápátá yìí wà wí pé wọ́n ń kógun ja ilẹ̀ Europe àti wí pé àṣa wa máa yí padà, gbogbo nǹkan náà ló máa rí bẹ́ẹ̀ -- ìṣòro náà ni wí pé tí wọ́n bá ti mójútó o dáadáa ni, tí wọ́n bá gba àlejò àwọn ènìyàn bó ṣe tọ́ ni, tí wọ́n gbà wọ́n, tí wọ́n fún wọn lórùlé ní enu àbáwọlé, tí wọ́n ṣe àyẹ̀wo wọn ní ẹnu àbáwọlé, tí wọ́n sì fi ọkọ̀ òfuurufú gbé wọn lọ sí oríṣiríṣi orílẹ̀-ède ilẹ̀ Europe, èyí ò bá ti má dẹ́rùba àwọn ènìyàn."', 'en': '""" So there was this completely false idea that Europe was being invaded and our way of life is going to change, and everything will -- And the problem is that if this had been properly managed, if people had been properly received, welcomed, sheltered at point of entry, screened at point of entry, and the moved by plane to different European countries, this would not have scared people."'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n, ó ṣeni láànú, a dẹ́rùba ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn, nítorí ilẹ̀ Europe ò ní àǹfààní láti ṣiṣẹ́ náà bó ṣe yẹ.', 'en': 'But, unfortunately, we have a lot of people scared, just because Europe was not able to do the job properly.'}

{'yo': 'BG: ṣùgbọ́n àwọn abúlé kan wà ní orílẹ̀-ède Germany pẹ̀lu ọ̀rìn-dín-nírinwó àwọn olùgbé àti ẹgbẹ̀rún kan àwọn ogúnléndé.', 'en': 'BG: But there are villages in Germany with 300 inhabitants and 1,000 refugees.'}
{'yo': 'Nítorí náà, kíni ipò yín?', 'en': "So, what's your position?"}
{'yo': 'Báwo lẹ ṣe rò wí pé àwọn ènìyàn yìí ṣe ń húwà?', 'en': 'How do you imagine these people reacting?'}

{'yo': 'AG: Tí àmójútó tó bójúmu bá wà fún ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà àti pínpín àwọn ènìyàn káàkiri ilẹ̀ Europe lónà tó bójúmu, e ó máa ní ìdá tí mo mẹ́nubà ní gbogbo ìgbà: ẹyọkan nínú ẹgbẹ̀rún méjì.', 'en': 'AG: If there would be a proper management of the situation and the proper distribution of people all over Europe, you would always have the percentage that I mentioned: one per each 2,000.'}

{'yo': 'Nítorí pé wọn ò ṣàmójútó nǹkan lónà tó yẹ nígbẹ́yìn lafi ní ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ tí kò ṣe é ṣe láti gbé pẹ̀lú rárá, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni tí ẹ bá ní abúlé kan -- ní orílẹ̀-ède Lebanon, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn abúlé ló wà tí wọ́n ní ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-ède Syria ju ọmọ orílẹ̀-ède Lebanon lọ; orílẹ̀-ède Lebanon ti ń gbé pẹ̀lú ìyẹn.', 'en': 'It is because things are not properly managed that in the end we have situations that are totally impossible to live with, and of course if you have a village -- in Lebanon, there are many villages that have more Syrians than Lebanese; Lebanon has been living with that.'}

{'yo': 'Mi ò sọ wí pé kí irú rẹ̀ ṣẹlẹ̀ ní ilẹ̀ Europe, fún gbogbo àwọn abúlé nílẹ̀ Europe láti ní atìpó ju àwọn olùgbé lọ.', 'en': "I'm not asking for the same to happen in Europe, for all European villages to have more refugees than inhabitants."}

{'yo': 'Nǹkan tí mò ń bèrè ni kí ilẹ̀ Europe ṣe iṣẹ́ náà bó ṣe tọ́, láti lè ṣe àtúntò ara rẹ̀ láti gba àwọn ènìyàn gẹ́gẹ́ bi wọ́n ṣe fipá mú àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè míràn lágbàyé láti ṣe é sẹ́yìn.', 'en': 'What I am asking is for Europe to do the job properly, and to be able to organize itself to receive people as other countries in the world were forced to do in the past.'}
{'yo': 'BG: nítorí náà, tí ẹ bá wo ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà lágbàyé tí kìí ṣe ilẹ̀ Europe nìkan --', 'en': 'BG: So, if you look at the global situation not only at Europe --'}
{'yo': 'BG: bẹ́ẹ̀ ni!', 'en': 'BG: Yes!'}

{'yo': 'BG: Tí ẹ bá wo ìṣẹ̀lẹ náà lágbàyé, nítorí, kìí ṣe ní ilẹ̀ Europe nìkan, mo mọ̀ wí pé ẹ lè ṣe àkójọpọ̀ àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tí wọn ò gbéra sọ, ṣùgbọ́n mo nífẹ̀ nínú apá kejì -- ǹjẹ́ ènìkán wà tó ń ṣe nǹkan tó yẹ?', 'en': "BG: If you look at the global situation, so, not only at Europe, I know you can make a long list of countries that are not really stepping up, but I'm more interested in the other part -- is there somebody who's doing the right thing?"}
{'yo': 'AG: Ó dára, ìdá 86 àwọn ogúnléndé tó wà lágbàyé ni wọ́n wà ní àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tó ń dágbà sókè.', 'en': 'AG: Well, 86 percent of the refugees in the world are in the developing world.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ẹ bá wo àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè bi Ethiopia -- Ethiopia ti gba àwọn ogúnléndé tó ju ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́nà 600 lọ.', 'en': 'And if you look at countries like Ethiopia -- Ethiopia has received more than 600,000 refugees.'}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo ibodè Ethiopia ló wà ní ṣíṣí sílè.', 'en': 'All the borders in Ethiopia are open.'}

{'yo': '"Wọ́n sì ní, gẹ́gẹ́ bi ìpinnu, tí wọ́n ń pè ní ìpinnu ""ènìyàn sí ènìyàn"" wí pé gbogbo ogúnléndé gbọ́dọ̀ di gbígbà wọlé."', 'en': '"And they have, as a policy, they call the ""people to people"" policy that every refugee should be received."'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n sì ní àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-ède South Sudan, wọ́n ní àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-ède Sudan, wọ́n ní àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-ède Somalia.', 'en': 'And they have South Sudanese, they have Sudanese, they have Somalis.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ní gbogbo àwọn alájọgbé.', 'en': 'They have all the neighbors.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ní àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-ède Eritrea.', 'en': 'They have Eritreans.'}

{'yo': 'Làpapọ̀, àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè Adúláwò ń gba àwọn atìpó tó ń bọ̀ gidi gan-an, mà á sì sọ wí pé ní Àárín Gbùngbun Ìlà Oòrùn àti ní Asia, a ti rí aṣe é ṣe fún ibodè láti di ṣíṣí sílẹ̀.', 'en': 'And, in general, African countries are extremely welcoming of refugees coming, and I would say that in the Middle East and in Asia, we have seen a tendency for borders to be open.'}

{'yo': 'Báyìí à rí àwọn ìṣòro kọ̀ọ̀kan pẹ̀lú ìṣẹ̀lẹ orílẹ̀-ède Syria, bí ìṣẹ̀lẹ orílẹ̀-ède Syria ṣe yípadà di rògbòdìyan ètò-ààbò ńlá, ṣùgbọ́n òótọ́ ibẹ̀ ni wí pé fún ìgbà pípẹ́, gbogbo ibodè tó wà ní Àárín Gbùngbun Ìlà Oòrùn wà ló wà ní ṣíṣí sílẹ̀.', 'en': 'Now we see some problems with the Syrian situation, as the Syrian situation evolved into also a major security crisis, but the truth is that for a large period, all borders in the Middle East were open.'}

{'yo': 'Òtítọ́ ibẹ̀ ni wí pé fún àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-ède Afghan, àwọn ibóde Pakistan àti Iran wà ní ṣíṣí fún, ní gbogbo ìgbà, àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ mẹ́fà ọmọ orílẹ̀-ède Afghan tó bá wá.', 'en': 'The truth is that for Afghans, the borders of Pakistan and Iran were open for, at the time, six million Afghans that came.'}

{'yo': 'Mà á sọ wí pé kódà lónìí, ìṣesí ní àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tó ń dàgbàsókè ni láti jẹ́ kí àwọn ibodè wà ní ṣíṣí sílẹ̀.', 'en': 'So I would say that even today, the trend in the developing world has been for borders to be open.'}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀nà tuntun náà ní àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tó ti dágbàsókè ni fún àwọn ìbéèrè wọ̀nyí láti túbọ̀ díjú síi, pàápàá jùlọ nígbà tí, ní ìpinnu àwọn ará ìlú, àdàpọ ìjírórò láàárín ààbò ogúnléndé ní apá kan àti àwọn ìbéèrè ààbò -- ní tèmi, àṣìtú ìmọ̀ -- ní apá kejì.', 'en': 'The trend in the developed world is for these questions to become more and more complex, especially when there is, in the public opinion, a mixture of discussions between refugee protections on one side and security questions -- in my opinion, misinterpreted -- on the other side.'}

{'yo': 'BG: A máa padà sí ìyẹn náà, ṣùgbọ́n ẹ mẹ́nuba gígé ìgbọ̀wọ́ àti ìwé-ìgba-nǹkan-ọ̀fẹ́ láti Èto Oúnjẹ Àgbáyé.', 'en': "BG: We'll come back to that too, but you mentioned the cutting of funding and the vouchers from the World Food Programme."}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹn ṣe àgbéjáde àìrígbòwọ́ àpapọ̀ àwọn àjọ tó ń ṣiṣẹ́ lórí àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ wọ̀nyí.', 'en': 'That reflects the general underfunding of the organizations working on these issues.'}

{'yo': 'Báyìí tódàbi wí pégbogbo àgbáye ti jí, ṣé ń ń rí ìgbọ̀wọ́ àti àtìlẹyìn sí i, àbí bákan náà ni?', 'en': "Now that the world seems to have woken up, are you getting more funding and more support, or it's still the same?"}
{'yo': 'AG: à ń rí altìlẹyìn si.', 'en': 'AG: We are getting more support.'}
{'yo': 'Màá sọ wí pé à ń sún mọ́ ìpele ọdún tó kọjá.', 'en': 'I would say that we are coming close to the levels of last year.'}
{'yo': 'Ó burú jáì lásìko ooru.', 'en': 'We were much worse during the summer.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ìyẹn ò tó láti yanjú ohun-èlò àwọn ènìyàn náà àti láti yanjú ohun-èlò àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tí wọ́n ń ṣe àtìlẹyìn fún àwọn ènìyàn náà.', 'en': 'But that is clearly insufficient to address the needs of the people and address the needs of the countries that are supporting the people.'}

{'yo': 'Níbí a ní àtúnyẹ́wò ìpìlẹ fún òṣùwọ̀n, èròngbà, àti pàtàki ìdàgbàsókè ìfọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ tí a fẹ́.', 'en': 'And here we have a basic review of the criteria, the objectives, the priorities of development cooperation that is required.'}
{'yo': 'Fún àpẹẹrẹ, orílẹ̀-ède Lebanon àti Jordan jẹ́ àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tí ìpawówọlé wọn wà lágbede méjì.', 'en': 'For instance, Lebanon and Jordan are middle-income countries.'}

{'yo': 'Nítorí wọ́n jẹ́ orílẹ̀-èdè tí ìpawówọlé wọn wà lágbede méjì, wọn ò lè gba ẹ̀yáwó tàbí owó-ìrànwọ́ láti ilé-ìfowópamọ́ àgbáyé.', 'en': 'Because they are middle-income countries, they cannot receive soft loans or grants from the World Bank.'}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, lónì èyí ò mọ́pọ̀lọ dáni, nítorí wọ́n ń ṣe ìpèse dáadáa gbogbogbò àgbáyé.', 'en': "Now, today this doesn't make any sense, because they are providing a global public good."}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n ní ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́nà-ẹgbẹ̀rún àwọn ogúnléndé níbẹ̀, ká sọ òdodo, àwọn ni òpó ìdúró ṣinṣin ní ẹkùn náà, pẹ̀lú gbogbo ìdojúkọ tí wọ́n ń kojú, àti aléwájú àtìlẹyìn ètò-ààbò àjọni wa.', 'en': 'They have millions of refugees there, and to be honest, they are pillars of stability in the region, with all the difficulties they face, and the first line of defense of our collective security.'}

{'yo': 'Torí náà kò mọ́pọlọ dání wí pé àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè wọ̀nyí kọ́ ni pàtàkì àkọ́kọ́ nínú àwọn ìpinnu ìfọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ ìdàgbàsókè.', 'en': "So it doesn't make sense that these countries are not a first priority in development cooperation policies."}
{'yo': 'Àwọn kọ́.', 'en': 'And they are not.'}

{'yo': 'Kìí ṣe pé àwọn ogúnléndé ń gbé ní ipò tó bani nínújẹ́ nínú àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè wọ̀nyí nìkan, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn àwùjọ ìbílẹ̀ fúnra wọn náà ń jíyà, nítorí owó-oṣù tí wálẹ̀, nítorí àwọn tí ò níṣẹ́ ti pọ̀, nítorí owó-nǹkan àti owó-ilé ti lọ sókè.', 'en': 'And not only do the refugees live in very dramatic circumstances inside those countries, but the local communities themselves are suffering, because salaries went down, because there are more unemployed, because prices and rents went up.'}
