{'yo': 'Lápapọ̀, àwọn ọmọ-ilú rẹ̀ ń ṣe iṣẹ́ àti eré papọ̀.', 'en': 'By and large, its citizens work and play well together.'}
{'yo': 'Ó wà láàárín ipò àkọ́kọ́ sí ìkẹ́rin ní àtò ìdùnú orílẹ̀-èdè.', 'en': "It's typically numbered between first and fourth in rankings of national happiness."}
{'yo': 'Saudi Arabia jẹ́ ilú ọlọ́ba tí àwọn ọmọ-ìlú rẹ̀ ò ní ònà sí ìtẹ̀síwájú araẹni.', 'en': 'Saudi Arabia is an absolute monarchy in which many citizens lack a path for personal advancement.'}

{'yo': 'Ó wà nípò karùn-lé-lọ́gbọ̀n nínú àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tí wọ́n wà nínú ìdùnnú, tí ó kéré fún irú orílẹ̀-èdè tó lọ́rọ̀ bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': "It's typically ranked 35th among nations in happiness, which is low for such a wealthy nation."}
{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú ṣíṣe àfiwé lásán, orílẹ̀ ède US wà nípò kejìlá tàbí ìkẹtàlá.', 'en': 'Just by way of comparison, the US is typically ranked around 12th or 13th.'}

{'yo': 'Ìyàtọ̀ tó wà láàárín àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè méjì yìí kì í ṣe ọrọ̀ wọn kì í sì í ṣe ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ wọn.', 'en': "The difference between these two countries is not their wealth and it's not their technology."}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ilé iṣẹ́ wọn ni.', 'en': "It's their institutions."}
{'yo': 'Norway ti dókòwò láti kọ́ àwùjọ tó ní àǹfààní àti àgbékiri ọrọ̀-ajé.', 'en': 'Norway has invested to build a society with opportunity and economic mobility.'}

{'yo': 'Saudi Arabia ti ṣe àfikún sí afiṣòdiwọ̀n ìgbeayé nígba tí wọ́n ń wàhálà ọ̀pọ̀ ìgbìyànjú àwọn ènìyàn mìíràn.', 'en': 'Saudi Arabia has raised living standards while frustrating many other human strivings.'}
{'yo': 'Orílẹ̀-èdè méjì, tí wọ́n lọ́rọ̀, tí ọrọ̀ wọn ò dọ́gba.', 'en': 'Two countries, both wealthy, not equally well off.'}
{'yo': 'Èyí ló mú mi wá síbi ìdojúkọ tí à ń kojú lónì, ìdojúkọ tí àdáṣe ń ṣe fún wa.', 'en': 'And this brings me to the challenge that we face today, the challenge that automation poses for us.'}
{'yo': 'Ìdojúkọ náà kìí ṣe wí pé kò sí iṣẹ́.', 'en': "The challenge is not that we're running out of work."}
{'yo': 'Orílẹ̀-ède US tí ṣe àfikún àádọ́ta-ọ̀kẹ́ mẹ́rìnlá iṣẹ́ láti ìgbà òpin òjòjo ọrọ̀-ajé tó lágbára.', 'en': 'The US has added 14 million jobs since the depths of the Great Recession.'}

{'yo': 'Ìdojúkọ ibẹ̀ ni wí pé ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn iṣẹ́ wọ̀nyẹn kìí ṣe iṣẹ́ rere, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ará ìlú ò sì peregedé fún iṣẹ́ gidi tí wọ́n pésè.', 'en': 'The challenge is that many of those jobs are not good jobs, and many citizens cannot qualify for the good jobs that are being created.'}

{'yo': 'Ìdàgbàsókè ìgbanisíṣẹ́ ní orílẹ̀-ède United States àti ní ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn orílẹ́ èdè tí wọ́n ti gòkè àgbà dà bi irin tí wọ́n ń ṣe àfikún ìgbérin ní ìpẹ̀kun irin méjééjì.', 'en': 'Employment growth in the United States and in much of the developed world looks something like a barbell with increasing poundage on either end of the bar.'}

{'yo': 'Ní apá kan, ẹ ní ẹ̀kọ́ gíga, àwọn iṣẹ́ tí owó-iṣẹ́ wọ́n ga bíi oníṣégùn òyìnbó àti àwọn olùtọ́-ilé-ìwòsàn, àwọn onímọ̀ nípa kọ̀mpúta àti àwọn onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ, ìtajà àti àwọn alámòjútó ìtajà.', 'en': 'On the one hand, you have high-education, high-wage jobs like doctors and nurses, programmers and engineers, marketing and sales managers.'}
{'yo': 'Ìgbanisíṣẹ́ pọ̀ nínú àwọn iṣẹ́ yìí, ìdàgbàsókè ìgbanisíṣẹ́.', 'en': 'Employment is robust in these jobs, employment growth.'}

{'yo': 'Bákan náà, ìdàgbàsókè ìgbanisíṣẹ́ pọ̀ nínú àwọn iṣẹ́ oní ìmọ́ọ́ṣe-kékeré, àti ẹ̀kọ́ kékeré bíi iṣẹ́ oúnjẹ, agbálẹ̀, elétò ààbò, ìralnwọ́ ìlera inú-ilé.', 'en': 'Similarly, employment growth is robust in many low-skill, low-education jobs like food service, cleaning, security, home health aids.'}

{'yo': 'Lásíkò kan náà, ìgbanisíṣẹ́ ń rù ní ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ẹ̀kọ́ tó wà lágbede méjì, owó-iṣẹ́ agbedeméjì, àwọn iṣẹ́-agbedeméjì, bi ìṣiṣẹ́ amojú-ẹ̀rọ àti iṣẹ́ alákọ̀wé àti ìtajà.', 'en': 'Simultaneously, employment is shrinking in many middle-education, middle-wage, middle-class jobs, like blue-collar production and operative positions and white-collar clerical and sales positions.'}
{'yo': 'Ìdí tí àárín yìí fi ń há yìí kìí ṣémò.', 'en': 'The reasons behind this contracting middle are not mysterious.'}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe agbedeméjì máa ń lo àwọn òfin àti ìlànà tí ó yéni yéké tí wọ́n lè gbé sínú ohun-èlo ẹ̀rọ-ayárabíàṣá tí ò ṣe é fọwọ́ kàn tí wọ́n lè lò lórí ẹ̀rọ-ayárabíàṣá.', 'en': 'Many of those middle-skill jobs use well-understood rules and procedures that can increasingly be codified in software and executed by computers.'}

{'yo': 'Ìdojúkọ tí nǹkan yìí ń dásílẹ̀, nǹkan tí àwọn onímọ̀ nípa ọrọ̀-ajé ń pè ní ìpín sí méjì ìgbanisíṣẹ́, ni wí pé ó máa ń já àwọn àkàsọ nínú àkàba ọrọ̀-ajé, ó máa n jóro ìwọn àwọn tí wọ́n wà lágbedeméjì ó sì ń dúkokò láti sọ àwùjọ wa di onípele.', 'en': 'The challenge that this phenomenon creates, what economists call employment polarization, is that it knocks out rungs in the economic ladder, shrinks the size of the middle class and threatens to make us a more stratified society.'}

{'yo': 'Ní apá kan, ọ̀wọ́ àwọn tí wọ́n ń gbowó geere, àwọn akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ tí wọ́n kàwé tí wọ́n ń ṣe iṣẹ́ tó rọrùn, lápá kejì, ogunlọ́gbọ̀n àwọn ará-ìlú tí wọ́n ń ṣiṣẹ́ tí owó iṣẹ́ wọn kéré tí ojúṣe wọn gangan jẹ́ láti rí sí ìdẹ̀rùn àti ìlèra àwọn ọlọ́rọ̀.', 'en': 'On the one hand, a set of highly paid, highly educated professionals doing interesting work, on the other, a large number of citizens in low-paid jobs whose primary responsibility is to see to the comfort and health of the affluent.'}
{'yo': 'Èyí kìí ṣe àfojúsùn ìlọsíwájú mi, mo sì ń ṣeyè méjì pé tiyín nìyẹn.', 'en': 'That is not my vision of progress, and I doubt that it is yours.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ìròyìn tó wúnilórí nìyí.', 'en': 'But here is some encouraging news.'}

{'yo': 'A ti kojú àwọn àsìkò àyípadà ọrọ̀-ajé sẹ́yìn, a sì ti rí ọ̀nà àbáyọ kúrò nínú wọn láṣeyọrí.', 'en': 'We have faced equally momentous economic transformations in the past, and we have come through them successfully.'}

{'yo': 'Ní ìpẹ̀kun àsìkò 1800 àti ìbẹ̀rẹ àsìko 1900, nígbà tí ìdáṣiṣẹ́ ń pa ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn iṣẹ́ àgbẹ̀ -- ẹ rántí ọkọ̀-katakata-ìdáko? ipò àwọn oko náa kojú ewu aìníṣẹ́lọ́wọ́ tó pọ̀, ìran àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tí a ò nílò lórí oko ṣùgbọ́n tí wọn ò ṣetán fún ilé-iṣẹ́.', 'en': 'In the late 1800s and early 1900s, when automation was eliminating vast numbers of agricultural jobs -- remember that tractor?-- the farm states faced a threat of mass unemployment, a generation of youth no longer needed on the farm but not prepared for industry.'}

{'yo': 'Kíkojú àwọn ìdojúkọ yìí, wọ́n gbé ìgbésẹ̀ akin fún pípè fún gbogbo àwọn ọ̀dọ́ láti dúró sí ilé-ẹ́kọ kí wọ́n sì tẹ̀sìwájú ẹ̀kọ wọn títí tí wọn ó fi bàlágà di ọmọ ọdún mẹ́rìn-dín-lógún.', 'en': 'Rising to this challenge, they took the radical step of requiring that their entire youth population remain in school and continue their education to the ripe old age of 16.'}
{'yo': 'Èyí ni wọ́n pè ní ìtẹ̀síwájú ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ gíga, ó sì jẹ́ nkan tó wọ́n láti ṣe.', 'en': 'This was called the high school movement, and it was a radically expensive thing to do.'}

{'yo': 'Kìí ṣe pé wọ́n ní láti dókòwò nínú àwọn ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ nìkan, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ọmọ wọ̀nyẹn ò lè ṣe iṣẹ́ wọn.', 'en': "Not only did they have to invest in the schools, but those kids couldn't work at their jobs."}
{'yo': '"Ó padà di ọ̀kan nínú àwọn ìdókòwò t""ó dára jù tí orílẹ̀-ède US ti ṣe ní ọ̀rún ọdún ogún."', 'en': 'It also turned out to be one of the best investments the US made in the 20th century.'}

{'yo': 'Ó fún wa ní ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe tó pọ̀ jù, àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ tí wọ́n lè yípadà jù tí wọ́n sì ń ṣiṣẹ́ jù lágbàáyé.', 'en': 'It gave us the most skilled, the most flexible and the most productive workforce in the world.'}

{'yo': 'Láti lè rí bí èyí ṣe ṣiṣẹ́ sí, ẹ wòye mímú àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ odún 1899 ká mú wọn wá sí àsìkò lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí.', 'en': 'To see how well this worked, imagine taking the labor force of 1899 and bringing them into the present.'}

{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú ẹ̀yìn líle àti ìwà rere wọn, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ wọn ò ní ìmọ̀ ìpìlẹ̀ àti ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe ònkà láti ṣe gbogbo rẹ̀ ṣùgbọ́n àwọn iṣẹ́ tí ò múnú ẹni dùn.', 'en': 'Despite their strong backs and good characters, many of them would lack the basic literacy and numeracy skills to do all but the most mundane jobs.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀pọ̀ nínú wọn ni ò ní ṣe é gbà síṣẹ́.', 'en': 'Many of them would be unemployable.'}

{'yo': 'Nǹkan tí àpẹẹrẹ yìí tọ́ka sí ni pàtàkì àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ wa, pàápàá jùlọ àwọn ilé-ẹ̀kọ wa, láti gbàwá láyè láti kórè ìlọsíwájú ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ wa.', 'en': 'What this example highlights is the primacy of our institutions, most especially our schools, in allowing us to reap the harvest of our technological prosperity.'}
{'yo': 'Ìwà òpònú ni láti sọ wí pé kò sí nǹkankan láti bẹ̀rù.', 'en': "It's foolish to say there's nothing to worry about."}
{'yo': 'Ó hàn gbangba pé a lè ṣi eléyí.', 'en': 'Clearly we can get this wrong.'}

{'yo': 'Bí orílẹ̀-ède US bá ti dókòwò nínú àwọn ilé-ẹ̀kọ rẹ̀ àti ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe rẹ̀ láti bíi ọ̀rún ọdún sẹ́yìn pẹ̀lú ìtẹ̀síwájú ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ gíga ni, a ó ní lámìlaka púpọ̀, a ò ní sún káàkiri púpọ̀ àti bóyá àwùjọ tí ò ní ìdùnnú púpọ̀.', 'en': 'If the US had not invested in its schools and in its skills a century ago with the high school movement, we would be a less prosperous, a less mobile and probably a lot less happy society.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ìwà òpònú tún ni bákan náà láti sọ wí pé wọ́n ti parí kádára wa.', 'en': "But it's equally foolish to say that our fates are sealed."}
{'yo': 'Kì í ṣe àwọn ẹ̀ro ni yóò ṣe ìyẹn.', 'en': "That's not decided by the machines."}
{'yo': 'Kì í ṣe ọjà gan-an ni yóò ṣe é.', 'en': "It's not even decided by the market."}
{'yo': 'Àwa àti àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ wa la máa ṣe ìyẹn.', 'en': "It's decided by us and by our institutions."}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, mo bẹ̀rẹ̀ atótónu yìí pẹ̀lú ajọ̀ró-ṣòótọ́.', 'en': 'Now, I started this talk with a paradox.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ẹ̀rọ wa ń ṣe iṣẹ́ wa fún wa lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀.', 'en': 'Our machines increasingly do our work for us.'}
{'yo': 'Kí ló dé tí ìyẹn ò ṣe sọ àwọn òṣìṣẹ wa di aláìwúlò, kí ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe wa sì lélẹ̀?', 'en': "Why doesn't that make our labor superfluous, our skills redundant?"}

{'yo': 'Ṣé kò fojú hàn pé ojú ọ̀nà sí àpadì ọrọ̀-ajé àti àwùjọ wa ti di ṣíṣí látara ìṣẹ̀da ńlá wa?', 'en': "Isn't it obvious that the road to our economic and social hell is paved with our own great inventions?"}
{'yo': 'Ìtàn ti ń fún wa ní ìdáhùn sí ajọ̀ró-ṣòótọ́ yẹn ní tẹ̀lé-ń-tẹ̀lé.', 'en': 'History has repeatedly offered an answer to that paradox.'}

{'yo': 'Abala àkọ́kọ́ ìdáhùn náà ni wí pé ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ti ṣe àfikún agbára wa, ti ṣe àfikún sí ìwúlò àwọn àgbà-ọ̀jẹ wa, ìdájọ́ wa àti ọgbọ́n àtinúdá wa.', 'en': 'The first part of the answer is that technology magnifies our leverage, increases the importance, the added value of our expertise, our judgment and our creativity.'}
{'yo': 'Òrùka-O náà nìyẹn.', 'en': "That's the O-ring."}

{'yo': 'Apá kejì ìdáhùn náà ni pé ìṣẹ̀dá àìlópin wa àti ìfẹ́ tí ò nípẹ̀kun túmọ̀ sí wí pé kòtó, kòtó.', 'en': 'The second part of the answer is our endless inventiveness and bottomless desires means that we never get enough, never get enough.'}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo ìgbà ni iṣẹ́ tuntun máa ń wà láti ṣe.', 'en': "There's always new work to do."}

{'yo': 'Ìsúrakì sí ọ̀pọ eré àyípadà ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ ti pèse ìdojúkọ tòótọ́ sílẹ̀, tí à ń rí kedere lọ́pọ̀ nínú ìsọdi méjì ọjà àwọn òṣìṣẹ wa àti ewu tó ń fà fún ìlọsíwájú ọrọ̀-ajé.', 'en': 'Adjusting to the rapid pace of technological change creates real challenges, seen most clearly in our polarized labor market and the threat that it poses to economic mobility.'}
{'yo': 'Ìdìde sí ìdojúkọ yìí kìí ṣe àdáṣe.', 'en': 'Rising to this challenge is not automatic.'}
{'yo': 'Kìí ṣe pé kò ní náni lówó.', 'en': "It's not costless."}
{'yo': 'Kò rọrùn.', 'en': "It's not easy."}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ó ṣe é ṣe.', 'en': 'But it is feasible.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ìròyìn tó ń fún ni ní ìwúrí rèé.', 'en': 'And here is some encouraging news.'}
{'yo': 'Nítorí ìṣiṣẹ́ wa, a ti dolówó.', 'en': "Because of our amazing productivity, we're rich."}

{'yo': 'Lóòótọ́ a lówó láti dókòwò nínú ara wa àti àwọn ọmọ wa gẹ́gẹ́ bí orílẹ̀-ède America ṣe ṣe ní ọgọ́rùn ọdún sẹ́yìn pẹ̀lú ìtẹ̀síwájú àwọn ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ gíga.', 'en': 'Of course we can afford to invest in ourselves and in our children as America did a hundred years ago with the high school movement.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ṣe é jiyàn, a ò lè tẹ̀tì láti má ṣe é.', 'en': "Arguably, we can't afford not to."}

{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, ẹ lè máa rò ó wí pé, ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Autor ti sọ ìtàn atunilára fún wa nípa ìgbà pípẹ́, ìgbà tí ò tíì pẹ́, bóyá lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí, ṣùgbọ́n bóyá kì í ṣe nípa ọjọ́ iwájú.', 'en': 'Now, you may be thinking, Professor Autor has told us a heartwarming tale about the distant past, the recent past, maybe the present, but probably not the future.'}
{'yo': 'Nítorí gbogbo ènìyàn ló mọ̀ wí pé àsìkò yìí yátọ̀.', 'en': 'Because everybody knows that this time is different.'}
{'yo': 'Ǹjẹ́ àsìkò yìí yátọ̀?', 'en': 'Is this time different?'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni àsìkò yìí yátọ̀.', 'en': 'Of course this time is different.'}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo àsìkò ló yátọ̀.', 'en': 'Every time is different.'}

{'yo': 'Lọ́pọ̀ ìgbà ní igba ọdún sẹ́yìn, àwọn òmọ̀wé àti àwọn ajàfẹ́tọ̀ ti kébòsí pé a ò ní iṣẹ́ mọ́ a sì ń sọ ara wa di aláìwúlò: fún àpẹẹrẹ, àwọn onímọ̀-ẹrọ ní ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ àsìko 1800; akọ̀wé àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ fún orílẹ̀-ède US james Davis ní àárín àsìko 1920; onímọ̀ nípa ọrọ̀-ajé tó tún gba ẹ̀bùn Wassily Leontief ní ọdún 1982; bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ọ̀mọ̀wé, ayànàná, àwọn onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ àti àwọn agbóhùn-sáfẹ́fẹ́ lónìí.', 'en': 'On numerous occasions in the last 200 years, scholars and activists have raised the alarm that we are running out of work and making ourselves obsolete: for example, the Luddites in the early 1800s; US Secretary of Labor James Davis in the mid-1920s; Nobel Prize-winning economist Wassily Leontief in 1982; and of course, many scholars, pundits, technologists and media figures today.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn àsọtẹ́lẹ̀ wọ̀nyí bàmi bí onígbèraga.', 'en': 'These predictions strike me as arrogant.'}

{'yo': '"Àwọn tí wọ́n sọra wọn di òòṣà wọ̀nyí tí wọ́n ń sọ wí pé, ""tí mi ò bá lè ronú nípa nǹkan tí àwọn ènìyàn máa ṣe láti ríṣẹ́ lọ́jó iwájú, ìwọ, èmi àti àwọn ọmọ wa ò ní ronú nípa rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú."', 'en': '"These self-proclaimed oracles are in effect saying, ""If I can\'t think of what people will do for work in the future, then you, me and our kids aren\'t going to think of it either."'}
{'yo': '""" Mí o lọ́kàn láti ta tẹ́tẹ́ yẹn tako ọgbọ́n inú ọmọ ènìyàn."', 'en': '""" I don\'t have the guts to take that bet against human ingenuity."'}

{'yo': 'È wò ó, mi ò lè sọ nǹkan tí àwọn ènìyàn máa ṣe láti ríṣẹ́ ní ọgọ̀rùn ọdún sí àsìkò yìí fún yín.', 'en': "Look, I can't tell you what people are going to do for work a hundred years from now."}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ọjọ́ iwájú ò gbára lé ìrònú mi.', 'en': "But the future doesn't hinge on my imagination."}

{'yo': '"Bí mo bá jẹ́ àgbẹ̀ ní lowa ní ọdún 1900, tí àwọn onímọ̀ nípa ọrọ̀-ajé ọ̀rún odún kankàn-lé-lógún wá jáde sóri ilẹ̀ mi tó wá sọ pé, ""ìwọ, ṣé o mọ nǹkan, àgbẹ̀ Autor, ní ogọ́rùn ọdún tó ń bọ̀, ìgbanisíṣẹ́ àgbẹ̀ máa dínkù láti ìdá ogójì gbogbo iṣẹ́ sí ògéré ìdá méjì nítorí ìṣiṣẹ́ tó ń lọ sókè."', 'en': '"If I were a farmer in Iowa in the year 1900, and an economist from the 21st century teleported down to my field and said, ""Hey, guess what, farmer Autor, in the next hundred years, agricultural employment is going to fall from 40 percent of all jobs to two percent purely due to rising productivity."'}
{'yo': 'Kí lẹ rò wí pé ìdá méjì-dín-lógójì àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ yóò máa ṣe?', 'en': 'What do you think the other 38 percent of workers are going to do?'}
{'yo': '""" mi ò bà má sọ pé, ""Óh, a mọ èyí."', 'en': '""" I would not have said, ""Oh, we got this."'}
{'yo': 'A máa ṣe ìpèse àwọn ohun-èlò, àwọn ẹ̀rọ ayàwòrán-ara fún ìṣègùn, ìkọ́ni ní yógà, Bitmojì.', 'en': "We'll do app development, radiological medicine, yoga instruction, Bitmoji."}
{'yo': 'Mi ò bá ti má nì ìmọ̀ kankan.', 'en': "I wouldn't have had a clue."}

{'yo': '"Ṣùgbọ́n mo lérò wí pé màá ní ọgbọ́n láti sọ wí pé, ""Wow, àdínkù ìdá márùn-ún-lé láàdọ́rùn nínú ìgbanisíṣẹ́ oko láìsí àdínkù oúnjẹ."', 'en': '"But I hope I would have had the wisdom to say, ""Wow, a 95 percent reduction in farm employment with no shortage of food."'}
{'yo': 'Ìtẹ̀síwájú tó yanilẹ́nu nìyẹn.', 'en': "That's an amazing amount of progress."}
{'yo': 'Mo lérò wí pé àwọn ọmọ ènìyàn yóò rí nǹkan gidi láti ṣe pẹ̀lú gbogbo ìlàmìlaka yẹn.', 'en': 'I hope that humanity finds something remarkable to do with all of that prosperity.'}
{'yo': 'Lápapọ̀, màá sọ wí pé ó ti rí bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': 'And by and large, I would say that it has.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ṣeun púpọ̀.', 'en': 'Thank you very much.'}
{'yo': 'Àjọ̀dún irun àmútọ̀run wá.', 'en': 'A celebration of natural hair'}

{'yo': 'Mo wá láti Apá Gúúsù orílẹ̀-ède Chicago, mo sì wà ní ìpele kéje, mo ní ọ̀rẹ́dénú kan tí orúkọ rẹ̀ ń jẹ́ Jenny tó ń gbé ní Apá Gúúsù-ìwọ̀-oòrùn orílẹ̀-ède Chicago.', 'en': 'I am from the South Side of Chicago, and in seventh grade, I had a best friend named Jenny who lived on the Southwest Side of Chicago.'}

{'yo': 'Jenny jẹ́ aláwọ̀ funfun, tí ẹ bá sì mọ nǹkankan nípa àwọn àyè tí wọ́n yà sọ́tọ̀ ní orílẹ̀-ède Chicago, ẹ mọ̀ wí pé àwọn ènìyàn dúdú ò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ gbé ní Apá Gúúsù-ìwọ̀-oòrùn orílẹ̀-ède Chicago.', 'en': 'Jenny was white, and if you know anything about the segregated demographics of Chicago, you know that there are not too many black people who live on the Southwest Side of Chicago.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n Jenny ní arábìnrin mi nítorí náà a máa ń jáde papọ̀ lọ́pọ̀ ìgbà lẹ́yìn tí a bá jáde ní ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ àti ní òpin ọ̀sẹ̀.', 'en': 'But Jenny was my girl and so we would hang out every so often after school and on the weekends.'}

{'yo': 'Ní ọjọ́ kan a jọ wà ní yàrá ìgbàlejò wọn, tí à ń sọ̀rọ̀ nípa àwọn nǹkan ọmọ ọdún mẹ́tàlá, àbúro Jenny lóbìnrin Rosie wà nínú yàrá náà pẹ̀lú wa, ó jókòó lẹ́yìn mi tí ó ń fi irun mi ṣeré, mi ò sì ronú púpọ̀ nípa nǹkan tí ó ń ṣe.', 'en': "And so one day we were hanging out in her living room, talking about 13-year-old things, and Jenny's little sister Rosie was in the room with us, and she was sitting behind me just kind of playing in my hair, and I wasn't thinking too much about what she was doing."}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n nígbà tí a dánu dúró díẹ̀ nínú ìfọ̀rọ̀jomitoro náà, Rosie fọwọ́ tọ́mi léjìká.', 'en': 'But at a pause in the conversation, Rosie tapped me on the shoulder.'}
{'yo': '"Ó wí pé. ""Ǹjẹ́ mo lè bi ọ́ ní ìbéèrè kan."', 'en': '"She said, ""Can I ask you a question?"'}
{'yo': '"Mo ní, ""bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, Rosie."', 'en': '"I said, ""Yeah, Rosie."'}
{'yo': '"""Ṣé aláwọ̀ dúdú ni ọ́ ni?"', 'en': '"""Are you black?"'}
{'yo': 'Yàrá náà tutù.', 'en': 'The room froze.'}
{'yo': 'Ìya Jenny àti Rosie ò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ jìnọ̀ sí wa.', 'en': "Jenny and Rosie's mom was not too far away."}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n wà nínú ilé-ìdáná wọ́n sì ń gbọ́ ọ̀rọ wa, ojú tìwọ́n.', 'en': 'She was in the kitchen and she overheard the conversation, and she was mortified.'}
{'yo': '"Wọ́n ní, ""Rosie! O ò lè ma bère irú ìbéèrè báyẹn lọ́wọ́ àwọn ènìyàn."', 'en': '"She said, ""Rosie! You can\'t ask people questions like that."'}
{'yo': '""" Jenny jẹ́ ọ̀rẹ́ mi, mo sì mọ̀ wí pé ojú tìí gidi gan-an."', 'en': '""" And Jenny was my friend, and I know she was really embarrassed."'}
{'yo': 'Inú mi bájẹ́ nítorí tiẹ̀, ṣùgbọ́n kò ṣẹ̀mí.', 'en': 'I felt kind of bad for her, but actually I was not offended.'}

{'yo': '"Mo rí I wí pé kìí ṣẹ ẹjọ́ọ Rosie pé ní odún kékeré rẹ̀ bíi mẹ́wà t""ó ti lò láyé, t""ó sì ń gbé ní Apá Gúúsù-ìwọ̀-oòrun orílẹ̀-ède Chicago, kò ní ìdánilójú tó pé ìda ọgọ́rùn bí ènìyàn dúdú ṣe rí."', 'en': "I figured it wasn't Rosie's fault that in her 10 short years on this earth, living on the Southwest Side of Chicago, she wasn't 100 percent sure what a black person looked like."}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹn dára.', 'en': "That's fair."}

{'yo': '"Ṣùgbọ́n nǹkan t""ó jọmí lójú jù ni pé, ní gbogbo àsìkò tí mo ti lò pẹ̀lú ẹbí Jenny àti Rosie -- tí mò ń jáde pẹ̀lú wọn, tí mò ń báwọn ṣeré, tí mo sì ń bá wọn sọ̀rọ̀ lójúkojú -- àfi ìgbà tí Rosie fi ọwọ́ kan irun mi ni ó tó béèrè bóyá aláwọ̀ dúdú ni mí."', 'en': "But what was more surprising to me was, in all of this time I had spent with Jenny and Rosie's family -- hanging out with them, playing with them, even physically interacting with them -- it was not until Rosie put her hands in my hair that she thought to ask me if I was black."}

{'yo': '"Ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ nìyẹn tí mo máa mọ ipa ńlá tí ìrísí irun mi lè kó láti sọ ìran mi, pé ó tùn lè kó ipa tó ṣe pàtàkì sí bí àwọn ènìyan t""ó kù láwùjọ ṣe ń wò mi."', 'en': "That was the first time I would realize how big of a role the texture of my hair played in confirming my ethnicity, but also that it would play a key role in how I'm viewed by others in society."}

{'yo': 'Garrett A. Morgan àti Madame CJ Walker ni wọ́n ṣe ìdásílẹ̀ ìtójú-irun dúdú àti ilé-iṣẹ́ ìṣaralóoge ní ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ àsìko ọdún 1900.', 'en': 'Garrett A.Morgan and Madame CJ Walker were pioneers of the black hair-care and beauty industry in the early 1900s.'}

{'yo': 'A mọ̀ wọ́n sí olùṣẹ̀dá àwọn ìparun oní kẹ́míkà àti àwọn irinṣẹ́ ìforu na nǹkan tí wọ́n ṣe láti ṣe àyídà ìrísí irun dúdú fún gbére tàbí fúngbà díẹ̀.', 'en': "They're best known as the inventors of chemically-based hair creams and heat straightening tools designed to permanently, or semipermanently, alter the texture of black hair."}

{'yo': '"Nígbà míràn nígbà tí a bá ronú nípa ìtàn àwọn aláwọ̀ dúdú ní ilẹ̀ America, a máa ń ronú nípa àwọn ìwà burúkú àti ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àìṣedédé tí a kojú gẹ́gẹ́ bi aláwọ̀ dúdú nítorí àwọ ara wa, nígbà tó sì jẹ́ pé lóòótọ́, léyìn ogun abẹ́lé ilẹ̀ America, irun ọmọ ilẹ̀ America aláwọ̀-dúláwọ̀ lọ́kùnrin tàbí lóbìnrin ni wọ́n mọ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bi ""àwòmọ́ asọ̀rọ̀"" ìjẹ́ aláwọ̀ dúdú, ju àwọ ara lọ."', 'en': '"Oftentimes when we think about the history of blacks in America, we think about the heinous acts and numerous injustices that we experienced as people of color because of the color of our skin, when in fact, in post-Civil War America, it was the hair of an African-American male or female that was known as the most ""telling feature"" of Negro status, more so than the color of the skin."'}

{'yo': 'Nítorí náà kí wọ́n tó di àsopọ̀ ilé-iṣẹ́ aṣerun lóge ọlọ́pọ̀ ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́nà-ẹgbẹ̀rún dọ́là, àgbọ́kàn le wa lórí àwọn irinṣẹ́ àti ohun-èlò, bíi ọsẹ-irun àti ìyarun, ni à ń lò fún ìmóríbọ́ àti ìlọsíwájú gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìran kan lẹ́yìn ìkónilẹ́rú nílẹ̀ America.', 'en': 'And so before they were staples of the multibillion-dollar hair-care industry, our dependency on tools and products, like the hair relaxer and the pressing comb, were more about our survival and advancement as a race in postslavery America.'}

{'yo': 'Láti bí àìmọye ọdún, à ń dágbà sí mímọ èrò yìí pé irun tó nà tó sì gùn túmọ̀ sí dídára ó sì máa ń rẹwà si.', 'en': 'Over the years, we grew accustomed to this idea that straighter and longer hair meant better and more beautiful.'}
{'yo': '"A sọ́ èrò yìí di àṣà níní nǹkan tí a fẹ́ràn láti máa pè ní ""irun gidi."', 'en': '"We became culturally obsessed with this idea of having what we like to call ""good hair."'}
{'yo': '""" Ní pàtàkì èyí túmọ̀ sí wí pé: bí bátàni lílọ́ bá ṣe sì sí, ni irún ṣe máa dára sí."', 'en': '""" This essentially means: the looser the curl pattern, the better the hair."'}

{'yo': 'A jẹ́ kí àwọn ìwòye àwùjọ wọ̀nyí di ọpọlọ ìpele àgbékà tí ò yẹ tí yóò máa sọ ohun tí a mọ̀ sí ìsọ̀rí irun gidi àti èyí tí ò ṣẹ.', 'en': 'And we let these institutionalized ideas form a false sense of hierarchy that would determine what was considered a good grade of hair and what was not.'}

{'yo': '"Nǹkan t""ó tún burú jù ni wí pé a jẹ́ kí àwọn èro báyéṣerí tí ò yẹ wọ̀nyí ń kógun ja èro wa nípa ara wa, wọ́n sì ń tẹ̀síwájú láti kóbá àṣà ìdánimọ̀ wa gẹ́gẹ́ bi obìnrin Ọmọ-ilẹ̀ America Adúláwọ̀ lónìí."', 'en': "What's worse is that we let these false ideologies invade our perception of ourselves, and they still continue to infect our cultural identity as African-American women today."}
{'yo': 'Torí náà kí la ṣe?', 'en': 'So what did we do?'}

{'yo': 'A lọ sí ilé ìṣerunlóge ní ọ̀sẹ̀ méfà-mẹ́fà sí mẹ́jọ-mẹ́jọ, láìyẹ̀, láti jọ̀wọ awọ-orí wa fún àwọn èròjà ti kì í ṣe ti ẹ̀dá amúrunnà tí ó lágbára bẹ̀rẹ̀ láti ọjọ́ orí kékeré -- nígbà mìíràn odún mẹ́jọ, 10 -- èyí yóò yorí sí irun jíjá, pípárí, nígbà mìíràn egbò lè wà lórí awọ-orí.', 'en': 'We went to the hair salon every six to eight weeks, without fail, to subject our scalps to harsh straightening chemicals beginning at a very young age -- sometimes eight, 10 -- that would result in hair loss, bald spots, sometimes even burns on the scalp.'}

{'yo': '"À ń yan irun wa pẹ̀lú oru ti òdiwọ̀n rẹ̀ t""ó 450 tàbí jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ lójoojúmọ́, láti jẹ́ k""ó nà síbẹ̀."', 'en': 'We fry our hair at temperatures of 450 degrees Fahrenheit or higher almost daily, to maintain the straight look.'}

{'yo': '"Tàbí kí á kàn bo irun wa pẹ̀lú irun-àdàborí àti ẹ̀hun, láti lè jẹ́ kí gbòngbò orí wa lè mí níbi tí ẹnìkankan ò ti ní mọ nǹkan t""ó ń ṣẹlẹ̀ nísálẹ̀ ńbẹ̀."', 'en': "Or we simply cover our hair up with wigs and weaves, only to let our roots breathe in private where no one knows what's really going on under there."}

{'yo': '"A gba àwọn ìṣesí yìí ní àwùjọ tiwa, kò yàni lẹ́nu ìdí t""ó fi jẹ́ pé lónìí àfojúsùn akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ obìnrin aláwọ̀ dúdú, pàápàá jùlọ ní America àwọn alákọ̀wé, lè rí báyìí, yàtọ̀ sí báyìí."', 'en': "We adopted these practices in our own communities, and so it's no wonder why today the typical ideal vision of a professional black woman, especially in corporate America, tends to look like this, rather than like this."}
{'yo': 'Ó dájú pé kò rí báyìí.', 'en': "And she certainly doesn't look like this."}

{'yo': 'Ní oṣù Ọ̀wẹwẹ̀ odún yìí, ilé ẹjọ́ àpapọ̀ kan pà á láṣẹ fún ilé-iṣẹ́ kan láti má ṣe ẹlẹ́yàmẹyà nípa ìgbanisíṣẹ́ lórí bóyá ẹni náà lókùrin tàbí lóbìnrin ṣerun dàda.', 'en': 'In September of this year, a federal court ruled it lawful for a company to discriminate against hiring an employee based on if she or he wears dreadlocks.'}

{'yo': '"Ní ti ọ̀rọ náà, gbígba alámòjútó sí ilé-iṣẹ́ ẹ̀rọ-ìbáraẹni-sọ̀rọ̀, wọ́n gba ohùn Alabama sílẹ̀ tó ń sọ wí pé, ""mi ò sọ wí pé tiyín dọ̀tí, ṣùgbọ́n ẹ mọ nǹkan tí mò ń sọ nípa ẹ̀."', 'en': '"In the case, the hiring manager in Mobile, Alabama is on record as saying, ""I\'m not saying yours are messy, but you know what I\'m talking about."'}
{'yo': '""" Ó dáa, kínni nǹkan t""ó ń sọ nípa ẹ̀?"', 'en': '""" Well, what was she talking about?"'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé ó rò wí pé wọ́n burẹ́wà ni?', 'en': 'Did she think that they were ugly?'}
{'yo': 'Àbí bóyá wọ́n ń ṣe bí ọmọ ilẹ̀ adúláwọ̀ díẹ̀ ni tí wọ́n dàbí aláwọ̀ dúdú ju bó ṣe fẹ́ lọ.', 'en': 'Or maybe they were just a little too Afrocentric and pro-black-looking for her taste.'}

{'yo': '"Tàbí bóyá kì í ṣe nípa Ìṣe-bí-ọmọ-adúláwọ̀, t""ó sì jẹ́ nítorí wọ́n jẹ́ ""ìgboro"" díẹ̀ fún àwùjọ àwon akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́."', 'en': '"Or maybe it\'s not about Afrocentricity, and it\'s more just about it being a little too ""urban"" for the professional setting."'}

{'yo': '"Bóyá ó ní ìrònú t""ó tọ́ nípa pé ìrísí wọ́n ""banilẹ́rù"" wọn ó sì máa dẹ́rùba àwọn alájọṣe àti ẹgbẹ́ àwọn oníbàráà wọn."', 'en': '"Perhaps she had a genuine concern in that they looked ""scary"" and that they would intimidate the clients and their customer base."'}

{'yo': '"Gbogbo àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ wọ̀nyí jẹ́ àwọn t""ó jọ mọ́ ìdẹ́yẹsí tí ó sopọ̀ mọ́ àṣà irun àmútọ̀runwá."', 'en': 'All of these words are ones that are too often associated with the stigma attached to natural hairstyles.'}
{'yo': 'Èyí sì ní láti yípadà.', 'en': 'And this has got to change.'}

{'yo': 'Ní ọ̀dún 2013, ìwé àpilẹ̀kọ ìjọba tí Deloitte Leadership Center for Inclusion tẹ̀ jáde, ṣe àyẹ̀wo ẹgbẹ̀rún 3 àwọn ènìyàn ti wọ́n wà nípò adárí ìjọba lórí èro bíbòrí níbi iṣẹ́ lórí ìrísí, ìgbàwí, ilé-iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n wà àti ẹgbẹ́.', 'en': 'In 2013, a white paper published by the Deloitte Leadership Center for Inclusion, studied 3,000 individuals in executive leadership roles on the concept of covering in the workplace based on appearance, advocacy, affiliation and association.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí ẹ bá ń ronú nípa bíbòri tó níṣe pẹ̀lú ìrísí, ìwádìí náà fi hàn pé ìdá mẹ́tà-dín-láàdọ́rin àwọn obìnrin tí wọ́n jẹ́ aláwọ̀ dúdú ni wọ́n ń borí níbi iṣẹ́ nítorí ìrísí wọn.', 'en': 'When thinking about appearance-based covering, the study showed that 67 percent of women of color cover in the workplace based on their appearance.'}

{'yo': 'Nínú àpapọ̀ àwọn abẹ́nà-ìmọ̀ tí wọ́n gbà fún ìborí nípa ìrísí, ìdá méjì-lé-lọ́gọ́rin sọ wí pé ó ṣe pàtàkì púpọ̀ fún wọn láti ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀ nítorí ìlọsíwájú ìkọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ wọn.', 'en': 'Of the total respondents who admitted to appearance-based covering, 82 percent said that it was somewhat to extremely important for them to do so for their professional advancement.'}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, Ursula Burns rè é', 'en': 'Now, this is Ursula Burns.'}

{'yo': 'Òun ni aláṣẹ àti olùdarí ọmọ ilẹ America tó jẹ́ obìnrin adúláwọ̀ fún ilé-iṣẹ́ Fortune 500 -- ti Xerox', 'en': 'She is the first African-American female CEO of a Fortune 500 company -- of Xerox.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ènìyán mọ̀ ọ́ fún ìrísí rẹ̀, èyí tí ẹ̀ rí níbí.', 'en': "She's known by her signature look, the one that you see here."}
{'yo': 'Irun ilẹ̀ Adúláwò tó kéré, tí wọ́n gé dọ́gba dáadáa, tó rí ìtọ́jú gidi.', 'en': 'A short, nicely trimmed, well-manicured Afro.'}
{'yo': '"Burns ni a fẹ́ràn láti má ape ""ọmọbìnrin tó jẹ́ abínibí."', 'en': '"Burns is what we like to call a ""natural girl."'}

{'yo': '""" Ó ń lánà ó sì ń ṣàfihàn nǹkan tó ṣe é ṣe fún àwọn obìnrin ọmọ ilẹ̀ America tó jẹ́ adúláwọ̀ tí wọ́n ń wá láti gun àkàba alákọ̀wé, ṣùgbọ́n tó wùn wọ́n láti gbé irun abínibí wọn."', 'en': '""" And she is paving the way and showing what\'s possible for African-American women seeking to climb the corporate ladder, but still wishing to wear natural hairstyles."'}

{'yo': 'Sùgbọ́n lénì púpọ̀ nínú àwọn obìnrin ọmọ ilẹ̀ America tó jẹ́ adúláwọ̀ tí a ṣì ń wò gẹ́gẹ́ bí aṣíwájú, akọni àti àwòkọ́ṣe, ṣì ń lọ fún irun nínà.', 'en': 'But today the majority of African-American women who we still look to as leaders, icons and role models, still opt for a straight-hair look.'}

{'yo': 'Nísìnyìí, bóyá nítorí pé wọ́n fẹ́ ẹ bẹ́ẹ̀ ni -- bó ṣe wùn wọ́n jùlọ nìyí -- ṣùgbọ́n bóyá -- mo sì mọ̀ -- apá kan nínú wọn yóò dàbi wí pé wọ́n ní láti ṣe é láti dé ipele àṣeyọrí tí wọ́n ti dé lónì.', 'en': "Now, maybe it's because they want to -- this is authentically how they feel best -- but maybe -- and I bet -- a part of them felt like they had to in order to reach the level of success that they have attained today."}

{'yo': 'Ìtẹ̀síwájú irun àmútọ̀runwá kan wà tó ń lọ káàkiri orílẹ̀-èdè náà àti ní àwọn àyè kọ̀ọ̀kan nílẹ̀ Europe.', 'en': 'There is a natural hair movement that is sweeping the country and also in some places in Europe.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́nà-ẹgbẹ̀rún àwọn obìnrin ni wọ́n wo nǹkan tó jọ láti ta kọ́sọ́ sí irun àmútọ̀runwá, wọ́n sì ń gé irun àtọdún-mọ́dún tó ti gbẹ, tí owó rẹ̀ ti bàjẹ́ láti ṣe àdápadà bátánì lílọ́ àmútọ̀runwá', 'en': "Millions of women are exploring what it means to transition to natural hair, and they're cutting off years and years of dry, damaged ends in order to restore their natural curl pattern."}

{'yo': 'Mo mọ̀ nítorí pé mo ti jẹ́ agbẹnusọ àti aṣojú fún ìtẹ̀síwájú yìí fún àpapọ̀ ọdún mẹ́ta.', 'en': 'I know because I have been an advocate and an ambassador for this movement for roughly the last three years.'}

{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn ọdún mẹ́tà-dín-lọ́gbọ̀n ọ̀pọ̀ oru àti kẹ́míkà tó lágbára, irun mi ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ síní ṣàfihàn bíbàjẹ́ àti jíjá.', 'en': 'After 27 years of excessive heat and harsh chemicals, my hair was beginning to show extreme signs of wear and tear.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ń já danù, ó ń tu, ó gbẹ ó sì le gidi gan-an.', 'en': 'It was breaking off, it was thinning, looking just extremely dry and brittle.'}

{'yo': 'Gbogbo ọdún tí a fi ń lé àwòran ẹwà ojoojúmọ́ tí a rí níbẹ́rẹ̀ ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ síní ní ìpadàbọ̀.', 'en': 'All those years of chasing that conventional image of beauty that we saw earlier was finally beginning to take its toll.'}

{'yo': '"Mo fẹ́ ṣe nǹkan nípa rẹ̀, nítorí náà ni mo ṣe bẹ̀rẹ nǹkan tí mop è ní ""ìpèníjà kò sí oru,"" níbi tí mo ti máa jáwọ́ nínú lílo àwọn irinṣẹ́ oru sí irun mi fún oṣù mẹ́fà."', 'en': '"I wanted to do something about it, and so I started what I called the ""No Heat Challenge,"" where I would refrain from using heat styling tools on my hair for six months."'}
{'yo': 'Bíi ẹgbẹ̀rún ọdún tó dára, mo ṣe àkójọpọ̀ rẹ̀ sórí ẹ̀rọ ayélukára', 'en': 'And like a good millennial, I documented it on social media.'}
{'yo': 'Mo ṣe àkójọpọ̀ rẹ̀ bí mo ṣe ń lọ́ tíkọ̀ láti gé ínṣì mẹ́ta sí mẹ́rin irun mi tí mo fẹ́ràn.', 'en': 'I documented as I reluctantly cut off three to four inches of my beloved hair.'}

{'yo': 'Mo ṣe àkójọpọ̀ bí mo ṣe ń tiraka láti mọ àwọn ìṣọwọ́ ṣerun àmútọ̀runwa wọ̀nyí, àti bí mo ṣe ń tiraka láti gbàwọ́n mọ́ra àti láti ronú wí pé wọ́n dára', 'en': 'I documented as I struggled to master these natural hairstyles, and also as I struggled to embrace them and think that they actually looked good.'}
{'yo': 'Mo sì ṣe àkójọpọ̀ bí ìrísí irun mi ṣe bẹ̀rẹ̀ síní yí padà.', 'en': 'And I documented as my hair texture slowly began to change.'}

{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú sísọ ìrìnàjò yí síta, mo kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ wí pé èmi nìkan kọ́ ni obìnrin tó ń la èyí kọjá àti wí pé lóòótọ́ ẹgbẹ̀rún àti ẹgbẹ̀rún àwọn obìnrin mìíràn ni wọ́n wà tí wọ́n ń fojú sọ́nà láti ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': 'By sharing this journey openly, I learned that I was not the only woman going through this and that in fact there were thousands and thousands of other women who were longing to do the same.'}

{'yo': '"Wọ́n máa ń kàn sími wọ́n a sì sọ wí pé, ""Cheyenne, báwo loṣe ṣe ìṣọwọ́ ṣerun tí mo rí pẹ̀lú rẹ lọ́jọ́sí yẹn?"', 'en': '"So they would reach out to me and they would say, ""Cheyenne, how did you do that natural hairstyle that I saw you with the other day?"'}

{'yo': 'Èròjà tuntun wo lo ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ síní lò tó lè tún dára fún ìrísí irun mi bó bá ṣe ń yípadà?', 'en': 'What new products have you started using that might be a little better for my hair texture as it begins to change?'}

{'yo': '""" Tàbí, ""kíni àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ irun àmútọ̀runwá tí mo gbọ́dọ̀ bẹ̀rẹ̀ síní ṣe láti ṣe àdápadà ìlera irun mi díẹ̀díẹ̀?"', 'en': '""" Or, ""What are some of the natural hair routines that I should begin to adopt to slowly restore the health of my hair?"'}

{'yo': '""" Ṣùgbọ́n mo tún rí i wí pé ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn obìnrin ló wà tí wọ́n ń kọ̀jálẹ̀ láti gbé ìgbésẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́ yẹn nítorí pé ìbẹ̀rù ti sọwọ́n di aláìlè dìde."', 'en': '""" But I also found that there were a large number of women who were extremely hesitant to take that first step because they were paralyzed by fear."'}
{'yo': 'Ìbẹ̀ru ohun tó lè ṣẹlẹ̀ -- báwo ni àwọ́n ṣe fẹ́ rí?', 'en': 'Fear of the unknown -- what would they now look like?'}
{'yo': 'Báwo ni àwọ́n ṣe máa rí ara àwọn pẹ̀lú ìṣọwọ́ ṣerun àmútọ̀run wá wọ̀nyí?', 'en': 'How would they feel about themselves with these natural hairstyles?'}
{'yo': 'Nǹkan tó ṣe pàtakì sí wọn jù, irú ojú wo ni àwọn tókù yóò ma fi wò wọ́n?', 'en': 'And most importantly to them, how would others view them?'}

{'yo': 'Láti bí ọdún mẹ́ta tí mo ti ń ní àsọgbà tó pọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ mi àti àwọn aráata jákèjádò àgbáyé, mo ti kọ́ àwọn nǹkan tó ṣe pàtàkì púpọ̀ nípa bí àwọn obìnrin ọmọ ilẹ̀ America tó jẹ́ adúláwọ̀ ṣe ń di mímọ̀ pẹ̀lú irun wọn.', 'en': 'Over the last three years of having numerous conversations with friends of mine and also complete strangers from around the world, I learned some really important things about how African-American women identify with their hair.'}

{'yo': '"Nígbà tí mo bá ronú padà sí gbígba alámòjútó sí Mobile, Alabama, màá sọ wí pé, ""ní pátàkì, rárá."', 'en': '"And so when I think back to that hiring manager in Mobile, Alabama, I\'d say, ""Actually, no."'}
{'yo': 'A ò mọ nǹkan tí ẹ̀ ń sọ.', 'en': "We don't know what you're talking about."}
{'yo': '""" Ṣùgbọ́n àwọn nǹkan tí a mọ̀ rèé."', 'en': '""" But here are some things that we do know."'}

{'yo': 'A mọ̀ wí pé tí àwọn obìnrin adúláwọ̀ bá gba ìfẹ wọn fún irun àmútọ̀runwá wọn, ó máa ṣe ìrànwọ́ láti ṣe àyọkúrò iran ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ wí pé aláwọ̀ dúdú nípò abínibí ò rẹwà, tàbí nǹkan tó yẹ kọ́ fi pamọ́ tàbí kí wọ́n bò.', 'en': 'We know that when black women embrace their love for their natural hair, it helps to undo generations of teaching that black in its natural state is not beautiful, or something to be hidden or covered up.'}

{'yo': 'A mọ̀ wí pé àwọn obìnrin adúláwọ̀ ń ṣàfihàn ìmọ̀lára àdáni àti ìrírí nípa ìrónilágbára pẹ̀lú ṣíṣe àyẹ̀wò pẹ̀lú oríṣiríṣi ìṣọ̀wọ́ ṣerun ní gbogbo ìgbà.', 'en': 'We know that black women express their individuality and experience feelings of empowerment by experimenting with different hairstyles regularly.'}

{'yo': 'A sì mọ̀ wí pé nígbà tí wọ́n bá pè wá láti gbé irun àmútọ̀runwa wa wá síbi iṣẹ́, ó máa ń ṣe ìwúrí wí pé wọ́n mọyì wa gan-an yóò sì ràn wá lọ́wọ́ láti dàgbàsókè àti láti tẹ̀síwájú gẹ́gẹ́ bi akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́.', 'en': "And we also know that when we're invited to wear our natural hair in the workplace, it reinforces that we are uniquely valued and thus helps us to flourish and advance professionally."}
{'yo': 'Màá fiyín sílẹ̀ pẹ̀lú èyí.', 'en': 'I leave you with this.'}

{'yo': 'Lásíkò ẹlẹ́yàmẹ̀yà àti àìnífọ́kànbalẹ̀ àwùjọ, gbígba ìtẹ̀síwájú yìí àti àti àwọn mìíràn bí èyí máa ń rànwá lọ́wọ́ láti gorí ìfúnpinpin bí a ṣe wà.', 'en': 'In a time of racial and social tension, embracing this movement and others like this help us to rise above the confines of the status quo.'}

{'yo': 'Nítorí náà tí ẹ bá rí obìnrin kan pẹ̀lú irun kíkó tàbí dàda tó gùn dé ẹ̀yin rẹ̀, tàbí ẹ ṣe àkíyèsí akẹgbẹ́ yín tó ti dáwọ́ nína irun rẹ̀ wá síbi iṣẹ́ dúró, ẹ má kàn lọ bá a kí ẹ má yìn ín àti kí ẹ béèrè bóyá ẹ lè fọwọ́ kàn-án nìkan -- Ẹ mọ ríri rẹ̀.', 'en': 'So when you see a woman with braids or locks draping down her back, or you notice your colleague who has stopped straightening her hair to work, do not simply approach her and admire and ask her if you can touch it -- Really appreciate her.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ṣá a ní àtẹ́wọ́.', 'en': 'Applaud her.'}
{'yo': 'Kásàà, kódà ẹ bọ̀ ọ́ lọ́wọ́ tí ó bá ṣe wí pé nǹkan tí ẹ̀mí darí yín láti ṣe nìyẹn.', 'en': "Heck, even high-five her if that's what you feel so inclined to do."}
{'yo': 'Nítorí èyí -- èyí ju nípa ìṣọwọ́ ṣerun lọ.', 'en': 'Because this -- this is more than about a hairstyle.'}
{'yo': 'Nípa ìfẹ́ràn ara ẹni àti ìmọyì ara ẹni ni.', 'en': "It's about self-love and self-worth."}
{'yo': 'Nípa níní ìgboyà láti má kàá sábẹ́ ipá ìrètí àwọn tókù ni.', 'en': "It's about being brave enough not to fold under the pressure of others' expectations."}

{'yo': 'Nípa mímọ̀ pé ṣíṣe ìpinnu láti yàbàrà láti àṣà náà ò ṣàpèjúwe irú èni tí a jẹ́, ṣùgbọ́n yóò ṣàfihàn irú èni tí a jẹ́.', 'en': 'And about knowing that making the decision to stray from the norm does not define who we are, but it simply reveals who we are.'}
{'yo': 'Ní ìparí, níní ìgboyà rọrùn nígbà ti a bá lè gbáralé ìkáàánú àwọn tó kù.', 'en': 'And finally, being brave is easier when we can count on the compassion of others.'}
{'yo': 'Nítorí náà lẹ́yìn ònìí, mo lérò wí pé a lè gbáralé e yín.', 'en': 'So after today, I certainly hope that we can count on you.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ṣeun.', 'en': 'Thank you.'}
{'yo': 'Òntẹ̀-ìka yín ń ṣàfihàn nǹkan ju bí ẹ ṣe lérò lọ', 'en': 'Your fingerprints reveal more than you think'}

{'yo': '"Ǹjẹ́ ẹ ti ẹ̀ ti dúró kí ẹ sì ronú, lásíkò oúnjẹ-alẹ́ ìpẹ̀kínrẹ̀kí-olólùfẹ́ kan, ""mo ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ fi òntẹ̀-ìka mi sí gbogbo ara ife-aláwòjìjí ọtí mi ni."', 'en': '"Do you ever stop and think, during a romantic dinner, ""I\'ve just left my fingerprints all over my wine glass."'}

{'yo': 'Àbí ṣe ẹ rò ó rí, nígbà tí ẹ bá lọ kí ọ̀rẹ yín kan, nípa fífi oríkè díẹ̀ lára yín sílẹ̀ ní gbogbo àyè tí ẹ ti fọwọ́ kàn?', 'en': 'Or do you ever worry, when you visit a friend, about leaving a little piece of you behind on every surface that you touch?'}
{'yo': 'Kódà lálẹ́ yìí, ǹjẹ́ ẹ ti ṣe àkíyèsí jíjókò láì fi ọwọ́ kan nǹkankan?', 'en': 'And even this evening, have you paid any attention to sit without touching anything?'}
{'yo': 'Ó dáa, ẹ ò dá wà.', 'en': "Well, you're not alone."}
{'yo': 'Ìkúnfúnọpẹ́, àwọn ọ̀daràn ń ṣàfojúdi agbára òntẹ̀-ìka, bákan náà.', 'en': 'Thankfully, criminals underestimate the power of fingerprints, too.'}
{'yo': 'Mi ò sọ̀ nípa àwọn ilà lílọ́pọ̀ tí wọ́n jẹ́ kí òntẹ̀-ìka wá yátọ̀ gédéngbé nìkan.', 'en': "And I'm not just talking about the twisted parting of lines that make our fingerprint unique."}

{'yo': '"Mò ń sọ nípa odidi àgbáramúramú ìfitóni t""ó sá pamọ́ sára nǹkan kékeré, tí ò ṣe é fojú rí lọ́pọ̀ ìgbà."', 'en': "I'm talking about an entire world of information hiding in a small, often invisible thing."}

{'yo': 'Ní òótọ́, òntẹ̀-ìka jẹ́ àpapọ̀ àwọn ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ tí wọ́n wà ní ẹ̀ka mẹ́ta: ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ àágùn tí à ń ṣẹ́ ní iye ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ tó yátọ̀ tí à ń lò sínú ara wa tí a bá sì làágùn síta àti àwọn ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ tí ó ń ṣàkóbá etí ọmọ-ìka wa tí a bá ṣe alábàpádè àwọn nǹkan bí ẹ̀jẹ̀, ọ̀dà, gírísì, àti àwọn nǹkan àìfojúrí.', 'en': 'In fact, fingerprints are made up of molecules that belong to three classes: sweat molecules that we all produce in very different amounts molecules that we introduce into our body and then we sweat out and molecules that we may contaminate our fingertips with when we come across substances like blood, paint, grease, but also invisible substances.'}
{'yo': 'Ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ jẹ́ asọ̀tàn nípa irú ẹni tí à ń ṣe àti àti nǹkan tí a ti ṣe.', 'en': "And molecules are the storytellers of who we are and what we've been up to."}
{'yo': 'A kọ̀ nílò láti ní ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tó tọ́ láti jẹ́ kí wọ́n sọ̀rọ̀ ni.', 'en': 'We just need to have the right technology to make them talk.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ jẹ́ kí n múu yín rin ìrìnàjò ìkápá aláìlérò kan.', 'en': 'So let me take you on a journey of unthinkable capabilities.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n ti fipá bá Katie lájọṣepọ̀ wọ́n sì ti rí òku rẹ̀ nínú igbó, lẹ́yìn ọjọ́ mẹ́ta tí ó pòórá.', 'en': 'Katie has been raped and her lifeless body has been found in the woods three days later, after her disappearance.'}

{'yo': 'Awọn ọlọ́pàá ń tọpa àwọn afurasí mẹ́ta, lẹ́yìn ìgbà tí wọ́n mú ìtọpa ìwádìí àwọn afurasí wọn wálẹ̀ láti 20 ọkùnrin tí wọ́n ti rí ní agbègbè náà lọ́jọ́ yẹn náà.', 'en': 'The police is targeting three suspects, having narrowed down the search from over 20 men who had been seen in that area on the same day.'}

{'yo': 'Èrí kan ṣoṣo ni òntẹ̀-ìka méjì tí kò hàn rere, àgbélérawọn lórí àjábùlẹ̀ tí wọ́n wé mọ́ ọrùn Katie tí wọ́n rí.', 'en': "The only piece of evidence is two very faint, overlapping fingerprints on the tape that was found wrapped around Katie's neck."}

{'yo': '"Lọ́pọ̀ ìgbà, òntẹ̀-ìka tí kò hàn rere, t""ó wà lórí ara wọn kò lè ran àwọn ọlọ́pàá lọ́wọ́ láti ṣe ìdánimọ̀."', 'en': 'Often, faint and overlapping fingerprints cannot help the police to make an identification.'}

{'yo': 'Àfi láìpẹ́ yìí, èyí ò bá ti jẹ òpin ọ̀nà, ṣùgbọ́n ibí tí a ti lè ṣe àtúnṣe nìyí.', 'en': 'And until recently, this might have been the end of the road, but this is where we can make the difference.'}

{'yo': '"Wọ́n fi àjábùlẹ̀ náà ránṣẹ́ sí àyè fún ìmọ̀-ìjìnlẹ̀ wa, níbi tí wọ́n ti ní k""á lo ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ wa láti ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún ìtọpinpin náà."', 'en': "The tape is sent to our labs, where we're asked to use our cutting-edge technology to help with the investigation."}

{'yo': 'Níbí, a lo ẹ̀dà ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ àṣàwòrán ẹ̀rọ igbọ̀n agbọ̀n ńlá tó wà nílẹ̀ tí a ti ṣe ìdàgbàsókè rẹ̀ síwájú síi tí a ṣe ní àdáyanrí fún ìyànàna ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ àti àwòran òntẹ̀-ìka.', 'en': 'And here, we use an existing form of mass spectrometry imaging technology that we have further developed and adapted specifically for the molecular and imaging analysis of fingerprints.'}

{'yo': '"Ní pàtàkì, a bẹ́ná ìtànṣán UV sí òntẹ̀ náà, a sì mú kí ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ náà ó yọ kúrò lára òntẹ̀ náà, t""ó ti ṣe tán láti di yíya pẹ̀lú ẹ̀rọ òdiwọ̀n-ìbìlù àkópọ̀."', 'en': 'In essence, we fire a UV laser at the print, and we cause the desorption of the molecules from the print, ready to be captured by the mass spectrometer.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ̀rọ òdiwọ̀n-ìbìlù àkópọ̀ máa dìwọ̀n ìwúwo ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ náà -- tàbí bí a ṣe sọ, ìwọn àkópọ̀ -- àti àwọn oǹkà tí ẹ̀ ń wò níbẹ̀ yẹn, wọ́n ń ṣàfihàn ìwọ̀n àkópọ̀ yẹn.', 'en': 'Mass spectrometry measures the weight of the molecules -- or as we say, the mass -- and those numbers that you see there, they indicate that mass.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ní pàtàkì jùlọ, wọ́n ń ṣàfihàn ẹni tí àwọn ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ wọ̀nyí jẹ́ -- bóyá mò ń rí paracetamol tàbí nǹkan tó tún léwu jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ, tí a bá ń sọ̀rọ̀ nílàna ìmọ̀-ìjìnlẹ̀.', 'en': "But more crucially, they indicate who those molecules are -- whether I'm seeing paracetamol or something more sinister, forensically speaking."}

{'yo': 'A sàmúlò ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ yìí sí èrí tí a ní a dè rí ìdúró ìmúdiyíyọ̀ rọ́bà ìdáààbòbò.', 'en': 'We applied this technology to the evidence that we have and we found the presence of condom lubricants.'}

{'yo': 'Lóòótọ́, a ti ṣe ìdàgbàsókè ìlànà-àátẹ̀lé tí yóò fún wa ní àǹfààní láti dábàá irú rọ́bà ìdáààbòbò tí wọ́n lò.', 'en': "In fact, we've developed protocols that enable us to even suggest what brand of condom might have been used."}

{'yo': 'A fi afitóni yìí ránṣẹ́ sí àwọn ọlọ́pàá, tí wọ́n, láímọ̀, ti gba àṣẹ láti túlé wọ́n sì ti rí irú rọ́bà idáààbòbò yìí kan náà ní àyíká ilé Dalton.', 'en': "So we pass this information to the police, who, meanwhile, have obtained a search warrant and they found the same brand of condom in Dalton's premises."}

{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú pé Dalton àti Thomson tún ní àkọsílẹ̀ ìfipábánilòpọ̀, a jẹ́ wí pé Chapman ló lè di ẹni tí a lè má furasí púpọ̀', 'en': 'And with Dalton and Thomson also having records for sexual assaults, then it is Chapman that may become the less likely suspect.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ṣe afitóni yìí tó láti fi àṣẹ ọba mú?', 'en': 'But is this information enough to make an arrest?'}
{'yo': 'Rárá, wọ́n sì sọ fún wa pé ká túṣu désálẹ̀ ìkòkò pẹ̀lú ìwádìí wa.', 'en': 'Of course not, and we are asked to delve deeper with our investigation.'}
{'yo': 'A ṣàwárí rẹ̀, bákan náà, ìdúró àwọn ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ méjì tó yanilẹ́nu.', 'en': 'So we found out, also, the presence of other two very interesting molecules.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀kan jẹ́ apa-ìrẹ̀wẹ̀sì-ọkàn, ọ̀kan sì jẹ́ ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ molecule tó yátọ̀ gidi gan-an.', 'en': 'One is an antidepressant, and one is a very special molecule.'}
{'yo': 'Ó máa ń dì sára nígbà tí ẹ bá mu ọtí tàbí lo oògùn-olóró lásíkò kan náà.', 'en': 'It only forms in your body if you drink alcohol and consume cocaine at the same time.'}

{'yo': '"A sì mọ ọtí pé ó máa ń ṣe ìrólágbára fún ipa oògùn-olóró, nítorí náà níbí, a ti ní afitóni nípa ipò ẹ̀mí ẹni náà nígbà t""ó ń hu ìwà ọ̀daràn náà."', 'en': 'And alcohol is known to potentiate the effects of cocaine, so here, we now have a hint on the state of mind of the individual whilst perpetrating the crime.'}

{'yo': 'A fi afitóni yìí ránṣẹ́ sí àwọn ọlọ́pàá, wọ́n ṣàwárí rẹ̀ pé, lóòótọ́, Thomson kúndùn oògùn-olóró, ó sì ní àkọsílẹ̀ ìwòsàn agàná, fún èyì tó ṣe wí pé bóyá torí rẹ̀ ni wọ́n ṣe ṣe àṣàyàn apa-ìrẹ̀wẹ̀sì-ọkàn.', 'en': 'We passed this information to the police, and they found out that, actually, Thomson is a drug addict, and he also has a medical record for psychotic episodes, for which presumably the antidepressant was prescribed.'}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí Thomson ti di afurasí tó ṣe é ṣe.', 'en': 'So now Thomson becomes the more likely suspect.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbón òdodo ibẹ̀ ni wí pé mi ò tíì mọ ibi tí àwọn ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ wọ̀nyí ti ń wá, láti òntẹ̀-ìka wo, àti eni tí àwọn òntẹ̀-ìka méjì yìí jẹ́ tirẹ̀.', 'en': "But the reality is that I still don't know where these molecules are coming from, from which fingerprint, and who those two fingerprints belong to."}
{'yo': 'Ẹ má bẹ́rù.', 'en': 'Fear not.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀rọ igbọ̀n agbọ̀n ńlá lè ràn wá lọ́wọ́ síwájú síi.', 'en': 'Mass spectrometry imaging can help us further.'}

{'yo': 'Lódodo, ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ náà lágbára gidi gan-an débi wí pé a lè rí ibi tí àwọn ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ wọ̀nyí wà lórí òntẹ̀-ìka.', 'en': 'In fact, the technology is so powerful that we can see where these molecules are on a fingerprint.'}

{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹ ṣe rí i nínú fọ́rán yìí, ọ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan àwọn tí wọ́n gajù wọ̀nyẹn túmọ̀ sí ìwọ̀n-okun, ìwọ̀n-okun kọ̀ọ̀kan sí ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ kan, a sì lè fi ọ̀rọ̀ wá ohun-èlo ẹ̀rọ-ayárabíàṣá tí ò ṣe é fọwọ́ kàn náà lẹ́nu wò, pẹ̀lú mímú ìkọ̀ọ̀kan àwọn ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ wọ̀nyẹn, nípa ibi tí wọ́n wà lórí àpá-ìka náà.', 'en': 'Like you see in this video, every single one of those peaks corresponds to a mass, every mass to a molecule, and we can interrogate the software, by selecting each of those molecules, as to where they are present on a fingermark.'}
{'yo': "Àwọn àwòràn kan ò kí ń f'ara hàn dáadáa, àwọn kan dára, àwọn kan dára gidi gan-an.", 'en': 'And some images are not very revealing, some are better, some are really good.'}

{'yo': 'A ṣẹ̀dá ọ̀pọ̀ àwòrán àpá kan náà -- ní tíọ́rì, ọgọ́rùn àwòran òntẹ̀-ìka kan náà -- fún gbogbo iye ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ tí a ti rí.', 'en': 'And we can create multiple images of the same mark -- in theory, hundreds of images of the same fingerprint -- for as many of the molecules that we have detected.'}

{'yo': '"Ìgbésẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́ fún òntẹ̀-ìka tó gorí ara wọn, àǹfààní ni pé, pàápàá jùlọ tí wọ́n bá wá látara oríṣiríṣi ènìyàn, pé ìṣẹ̀da ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ náà kò jọra wọn, nítorí náà ẹ jẹ́ k""á béèrè lọ́wọ́ ohun-èlo ẹ̀rọ-ayárabíàṣá tí ò ṣe é fọwọ́ kàn láti wo àwọn ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ aṣèyàtò tó wà nínú òntẹ̀-ìka kan tí ò sí ní ìkejì."', 'en': "So step one for overlapping fingerprints, chances are, especially if they come from different individuals, that the molecular composition is not identical, so let's ask the software to visualize those unique molecules just present in one fingermark and not in the other one."}
{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú ṣíṣe bẹ́ẹ̀, bí a ṣe lè ṣe ìyàsọ́tọ̀ bátánì etíi méjééjì nìyẹn.', 'en': "By doing so, that's how we can separate the two ridge patterns."}

{'yo': 'Èyí sì ṣe pàtàkì nítorí àwọn ọlọ́pàá lè tọ́ka sí ọ̀kan nínú òntẹ̀-ìka méjééjì báyìí, tó bá ti Katie mu.', 'en': 'And this is really important because the police now are able to identify one of the two fingerprints, which actually corresponds to Katie.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n ti lè sọ bẹ́ẹ̀ nítorí pé wọ́n ti fi àwòrá méjì ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ náà wéra wọn pẹ̀lú ìkan tí wọ́n mú látara òku Katie.', 'en': "And they've been able to say so because they've compared the two separate images with one taken posthumously from Katie."}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, a lè gbájúmọ́ òntẹ̀-ìka kan ṣoṣo -- tó jẹ́ ti aṣekúpani yẹn.', 'en': "So now, we can concentrate on one fingerprint only -- that of the killer's."}
{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn náà, ìgbésẹ̀ kejì àwọn ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ mẹ́ta wọ̀nyí tí mo ti rí yìí dà?', 'en': "So then, step two where are these three molecules that I've seen?"}

{'yo': '"Ó dáa, ẹ jẹ́ k""á fi ọ̀rọ̀ wá ohun-èlo ẹ̀rọ-ayárabíàṣá tí ò ṣe é fọwọ́ kàn náà lẹ́nu wò -- fi ibi tí wọ́n wà hàn mí."', 'en': "Well, let's interrogate the software -- show me where they are."}
{'yo': '"Pẹ̀lú ṣíṣe èyí, apá kan àwòrán òntẹ̀-ìka aṣekúpani náà nìkan l""ó hàn."', 'en': "And by doing this, only portions of the image of the killer's fingerprint show up."}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹn ni wí pé, àwọn nǹkan wọ̀nyẹn wà nínú òntẹ̀ aṣekúpani náà nìkan ni.', 'en': "In other words, those substances are only present in the killer's print."}

{'yo': 'Ní báyìí aṣàwárí ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ wa bẹ́rẹ̀ síní bá ìwádìí àwọn olọ́pà nípa Thomson mu dáadáa, tí ó bá jẹ́ wí pé òun ló ni òntẹ̀-ìka yẹn.', 'en': 'So now our molecular findings start matching very nicely the police intelligence about Thomson, should that fingerprint belong to him.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n òtítọ́ ibẹ̀ ni wí pé ọ̀ntẹ̀ yẹn ò tíì dára tó láti ṣe ìdánímọ̀.', 'en': 'But the reality is that that print is still not good enough to make an identification.'}

{'yo': 'Ìgbésẹ̀ kẹ́ta: nígbà tó jé wí pé a lè ṣẹ̀da ọgọ́rùn àwòrán òntẹ̀ ìka kan náà, kí ló dé tí a ò gbé wọn sórí ara wọn, tí a bá ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀, ká gbìyànjú láti ṣe àfikún bátánì ìtẹ̀síwájú àti ìfojúhàn tó kún?', 'en': "Step three: since we can generate hundreds of images of the same fingerprint, why don't we superimpose them, and by doing so, try to improve the rich pattern of continuity and clarity?"}
{'yo': 'Èsì náà nìyẹn.', 'en': "That's the result."}

{'yo': 'A ti wá ní àwòrán òntẹ̀-ìka tó hàn kedere àwọn ọlọ́pàá sì le lò ó lórí àká-ìwífún-alálàyé.', 'en': 'We now have a very clear image of the fingerprint and the police can run it through the database.'}
{'yo': 'Ìbámu náà jáde sí ti Thomson.', 'en': 'The match comes out to Thomson.'}
{'yo': 'Thomson ni aṣekúpani wa.', 'en': 'Thomson is our killer.'}

{'yo': 'Katie, afurasí náà àti àwọn nǹkan tó rọ̀ mọ́ ìwà-ọ̀daràn náà kìí ṣe tòótọ́, ṣùgbọ́n ìtàn náà ní àwọn ọmọlẹ̀ iṣẹ́-ìwádìí ọlọ́pàá tòótọ́ tí a ti kojú rẹ̀, ó sì jẹ́ ẹ̀ka ìwádìí tí a lè pèsè -- tí a ti pèsè fún àwọn olọ́pàá.', 'en': "Katie, the suspects and the circumstances of the crime aren't real, but the story contains elements of the real police casework we've been confronted with, and is a composite of the intelligence that we can provide -- that we have been able to provide the police."}

{'yo': 'Inú mi sì ń dùn gidi gan-an pé lẹ́yìn ọdún mẹ́sàn ìwádìí alágbára, ní ọdún 2017, a ní àǹfààní láti dásí ìtọpinpin àwọn ọlọ́pàá.', 'en': "And I'm really, really thrilled that after nine years of intense research, as of 2017, we are able to contribute to police investigations."}
{'yo': 'Tèmi kìí ṣe àlá mọ́; ìpinnu ni.', 'en': "Mine is no longer a dream; it's a goal."}

{'yo': 'A máa ṣe èyí ní fífẹ̀ àti fífẹ̀, ńlá àti ńlá, a sì ma nímọ̀ si nípa afurasí náà, a sì ma ṣẹ̀dá ẹ̀rọ-ìdánimọ̀.', 'en': "We're going to do this wider and wider, bigger and bigger, and we're going to know more about the suspect, and we're going to build an identikit."}
{'yo': 'Mo nígbàgbọ́ pé ìgbà ọ̀tun ni èyí fún ṣíṣe àkọsílẹ̀ ìwà-ọ̀daràn.', 'en': 'I believe this is also a new era for criminal profiling.'}

{'yo': 'Iṣẹ́ ìwádìí ìwà ọ̀daràn máa ń lo ìdámọ̀ àgbà-ọ̀jẹ̀ nípa bátánì ìhùwàsí tí wọ́n ti ṣàkíyèsí tẹ́lẹ̀ pé ó jẹ́ ti ẹ̀yà kan, sí àkọsílẹ̀ kan.', 'en': 'The work of the criminologist draws on the expert recognition of behavioral patterns that have been observed before to belong to a certain type, to a certain profile.'}

{'yo': 'Ní àtakò sí àgbà-ọ̀jẹ̀ yìí ṣùgbọ́n ní aṣègbè ìgbéléwọ̀n, à ń gbìyànjú láti ṣe nǹkan kan náà, ṣùgbọ́n látara ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ tó papọ̀ di òntẹ̀-ìka, méjééì sì lè ṣiṣẹ́ papọ̀.', 'en': "As opposed to this expert but subjective evaluation, we're trying to do the same thing, but from the molecular makeup of the fingerprint, and the two can work together."}

{'yo': 'Mo sọ wí pé àwọn ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ jẹ́ asọ̀tàn, nítorí náà àwọn afitóni nípa ìlera yín, ìṣesí yín, ìgbeayé yín, iṣẹ́ yín, gbogbo wọn ló wà níbẹ̀, tó ṣe é wò nínú òntẹ̀-ìka kan.', 'en': "I did say that molecules are storytellers, so information on your health, your actions, your lifestyle, your routines, they're all there, accessible in a fingerprint."}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ìdá-kékééké-nǹkan-tí-ó-ṣù-pọ̀ jẹ́ asọ̀tàn nípa àṣírí wa pẹ̀lú ìfọwọ́kàn kan.', 'en': 'And molecules are the storytellers of our secrets in just a touch.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ seun.', 'en': 'Thank you.'}
{'yo': ' (Àwọn ònwòran) Wow.', 'en': ' (Audience) Wow.'}
{'yo': 'Asọgbà ìwọlé látókère wa ti fọ́ - bí a ṣe lè ní èyí tó dára rè é.', 'en': "Our immigration conversation is broken - here's how to have a better one"}
{'yo': 'A máa ń gbọ́ lọ́pọ̀ ìgbà lásíkò yìí pé èto ìwọlé látókèèrè ti fọ́.', 'en': 'We often hear these days that the immigration system is broken.'}

{'yo': 'Mo fẹ́ ṣe ìpẹ̀jọ́ lónì pé àsọgbà ìwọlé látókèère wa ti fọ́ àti láti dábàá àwọn ọ̀nà tí, lápapọ̀, a lè pèsè èyí tó dára.', 'en': 'I want to make the case today that our immigration conversation is broken and to suggest some ways that, together, we might build a better one.'}

{'yo': 'Láti lè ṣe ìyẹn, màá dábàá àwọn ìbéèrè tuntun nípa ìwọlé látókèèrè, orílẹ̀-ède United States àti àgbáyé, àwọn ìbéèrè tí ó lè sún àríyànjiyàn ibodè ìwọlé látókèrè.', 'en': "In order to do that, I'm going to propose some new questions about immigration, the United States and the world, questions that might move the borders of the immigration debate."}

{'yo': 'Mi ò ní bẹ́rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú àríyànjiyàn tó ń ṣòjòjò tí à ń ní lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí, kódà bí ìgbéayé àti ìgbáyégbádùn àwọn aṣíkiri ṣe ń wà nínú ewu ní enu-ibodè orílẹ̀-ède US àti jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ.', 'en': "I'm not going to begin with the feverish argument that we're currently having, even as the lives and well-being of immigrants are being put at risk at the US border and far beyond it."}

{'yo': 'Dípò bẹ́ẹ̀, màá bẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ara mi ní ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ akẹ́kọ̀ọ́-jáde ní New Jersey ní àrín àsìko 1990, tí mò ń kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ nípa ìtan orílẹ̀-ède US, tó jẹ́ nǹkan tí mò ń kọ́ lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bi ọjọ̀gbọ́n ní fásitì Vanderbilt ní Nashville, Tennessee.', 'en': "Instead, I'm going to begin with me in graduate school in New Jersey in the mid-1990s, earnestly studying US history, which is what I currently teach as a professor at Vanderbilt University in Nashville, Tennessee."}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí mi ò bá kẹ́kọ̀ọ́, nígbà míràn láti sá fún kíkọ àpilẹ̀kọ àbọ̀ ìwádìí mi, èmi àti àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ mi máa wọ ìgboro lọ láti lọ fún àwọn ènìyàn ní ìwé-ìléwọ́ alárà-n-bara àwọ̀, tó ń fi èhónú han sí òfin tó ń dúkokò láti gba ẹ̀tọ́ àwọn aṣíkiri.', 'en': "And when I wasn't studying, sometimes to avoid writing my dissertation, my friends and I would go into town to hand out neon-colored flyers, protesting legislation that was threatening to take away immigrants' rights."}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ìwé ìléwọ́ wa ṣòótọ́, wọ́n nítumọ̀ gidi, wọ́n péye ní òtítọ́.', 'en': 'Our flyers were sincere, they were well-meaning, they were factually accurate.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ó wá yémi báyìí, wọ́n tún fẹ́ẹ̀ jẹ́ oríṣi wàhálà kan.', 'en': 'But I realize now, they were also kind of a problem.'}

{'yo': '"Nǹkan tí wọ́n sọ rè é: ""ẹ má gba ẹ̀tọ́ àwọn aṣíkiri sí ẹ̀kọ́ gbogbogbò, sí ètò ìlere, sí àwọ̀n ààbò àwùjọ."', 'en': '"Here\'s what they said: ""Don\'t take away immigrant rights to public education, to medical services, to the social safety net."'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ń ṣiṣẹ́ kárakára.', 'en': 'They work hard.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ń sanwó-orí.', 'en': 'They pay taxes.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ń tẹ̀lé òfin.', 'en': "They're law-abiding."}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ò lo àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àwùjọ tó bí àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ America ṣe ń lò ó.', 'en': 'They use social services less than Americans do.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n nífẹ̀ láti kọ́ ède gẹ̀ẹ́sì, àwọn ọmọ wọn sì ń sìnrú-ìlú nínú ikọ̀ ọmọ-ogun orílẹ̀-ède US káàkiri àgbáyé.', 'en': "They're eager to learn English, and their children serve in the US military all over the world."}
{'yo': '""" Báyìí, àwọn wọ̀nyí ni, bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, àwọn àríyànjiyàn tí à ń gbọ́ lójoojúmọ́."', 'en': '""" Now, these are, of course, arguments that we hear every day."'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn aṣíkiri àti àwọn agbẹnusọ wọn ń lò wọ́n láti fi kojú àwọn tí wọn yóò fi ẹ̀tọ́ àwọn aṣíkiri dú wọ́n tàbí tí wọ́n fẹ́ yọ wọ́n kúrò nínú àwùjọ.', 'en': 'Immigrants and their advocates use them as they confront those who would deny immigrants their rights or even exclude them from society.'}

{'yo': 'Dé ìpele kan, ó mú ọpọlọ dání pé àwọn wọ̀nyí yóò jẹ́ irú àwíjàre tí àwọn tí wọ́n ń gbè lẹ́yìn àwọn aṣíkiri máa kọjú sí.', 'en': "And up to a certain point, it makes perfect sense that these would be the kinds of claims that immigrants' defenders would turn to."}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n nígbà pípẹ́, àti bóyá lásíkò díẹ̀, mo rò wí pé àwọn àríyànjiyàn wọ̀nyí lè díra wọn lọ́wọ́.', 'en': 'But in the long term, and maybe even in the short term, I think these arguments can be counterproductive.'}
{'yo': 'Torí ogun tó lágbára ló máa ń jẹ́ láti gbèja ara yín ní agbègbe alátakò yín.', 'en': "Because it's always an uphill battle to defend yourself on your opponent's terrain."}

{'yo': 'pẹ̀lú àìmọ̀kan, ìwé-ìléwọ́ tí èmi àti àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ mi ń fún àwọn ènìyàn àti ẹ̀dà àwọn àríyànjiyàn wọ̀nyí tí à ń gbọ́ lóni ń tayò atako-aṣíkiri ni.', 'en': 'And, unwittingly, the handouts my friends and I were handing out and the versions of these arguments that we hear today were actually playing the anti-immigrants game.'}

{'yo': 'À ń ta ayò yẹn lóríkè pẹ̀lú ojú-ìwòye pé aráàta ni àwọn aṣíkiri, yàtọ̀ sí pé, bí mo ṣe ń lérò láti dá lábà ní ìṣẹ́jú díẹ̀, àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n ti, ní àwọn ọ̀nà tó ṣe pàtàkì, wà nínú ilé tẹ́lẹ̀.', 'en': "We were playing that game in part by envisioning that immigrants were outsiders, rather than, as I'm hoping to suggest in a few minutes, people that are already, in important ways, on the inside."}

{'yo': 'Àwọn tí wọ́n ń dẹ́yẹsí àwọn aṣíkiri, àwọn alátìlẹyìn ọmọ-ìlú, tí wọ́n ti ṣàṣeyọrí níbi síso àríyànjiyàn ìwọlé látókèrè mọ́ kókó ìbéèrè mẹ́ta.', 'en': "It's those who are hostile to immigrants, the nativists, who have succeeded in framing the immigration debate around three main questions."}
{'yo': 'Àkọ́kọ́, ìbéèrè kán wà nípa bóyá àwọn aṣíkiri lè di irinṣẹ́ tó wúlò.', 'en': "First, there's the question of whether immigrants can be useful tools."}
{'yo': 'Báwo la ṣe lè lo àwọn aṣíkiri?', 'en': 'How can we use immigrants?'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé wọ́n máa jé ká lówó ká sì tún lágbára síi?', 'en': 'Will they make us richer and stronger?'}

{'yo': 'Ìdáhùn àwọn alátìlẹyìn ọmọ ìlú sí ìbéèrè yìí ni rárá, àwọn aṣíkiri ní díẹ̀ tàbí wọn ò ní nǹkankan láti fún wa.', 'en': 'The nativist answer to this question is no, immigrants have little or nothing to offer.'}
{'yo': 'Ìbéèrè kejì ni wí pé bóyá àwọn aṣíkiri jẹ́ àwọn tókù.', 'en': 'The second question is whether immigrants are others.'}
{'yo': 'Ǹjẹ́ àwọn aṣíkiri lè di ara wa?', 'en': 'Can immigrants become more like us?'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé wọ́n níkàpá láti dàbi wa?', 'en': 'Are they capable of becoming more like us?'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé wọ́n níkàpá láti farajọwá?', 'en': 'Are they capable of assimilating?'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé wọ́n ṣe tán láti farajọwá?', 'en': 'Are they willing to assimilate?'}

{'yo': 'Níbí, lẹ́ẹ̀kan síi, ìdáhùn àwọn alátìlẹyìn ọmọ-ìlú ni rárá, àwọn aṣíkiri yátọ̀ pátápátá sí wa wọ́n sì kéré síwa.', 'en': 'Here, again, the nativist answer is no, immigrants are permanently different from us and inferior to us.'}
{'yo': 'Ìbéèrè kẹ́ta ni bóyá àwọn aṣíkiri jẹ́ ajọ̀fẹ́.', 'en': 'And the third question is whether immigrants are parasites.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé wọ́n léwu fún wa?', 'en': 'Are they dangerous to us?'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé wọ́n máa gbọ́n ohun-àlùmọ́nì wa gbẹ?', 'en': 'And will they drain our resources?'}

{'yo': 'Níbí, ìdáhùn àwọn ọmọ ìlú ni bẹ́ẹ̀ ni àti bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, àwọn aṣíkiri lè fa ewu wọ́n sì ń gbọ́n ọrọ̀ọ wa gbẹ.', 'en': 'Here, the nativist answer is yes and yes, immigrants pose a threat and they sap our wealth.'}

{'yo': 'Máa dá a lábà wí pé àwọn ìbéèrè mẹ́ta wọ̀nyí àti ìpinnu àwọn alátìlẹyin ọmọ-ìlú tó wà lẹ́yìn wọn ti ṣe aṣeyọrí níbi ṣíṣe àwọn igun ńlá nípa àríyànjiyàn ìwọlé látókèrè.', 'en': 'I would suggest that these three questions and the nativist animus behind them have succeeded in framing the larger contours of the immigration debate.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ìbéèrè wọ̀nyí jẹ́ atako-àwọn aṣíkiri àti àwọn alátìlẹyìn ọmọ ìlú paraku, tí wọ́n sopọ̀ mọ́ ìpín onípele àgbékà àwọn arálé àti aráàta, àwa àti àwọn, tó jẹ́ wí pé àwa la ṣe pàtàkì jùlọ, tí àwọn ò sì rí bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': "These questions are anti-immigrant and nativist at their core, built around a kind of hierarchical division of insiders and outsiders, us and them, in which only we matter, and they don't."}

{'yo': 'Nǹkan tó ń fún àwọn ìbéèrè wọ̀nyí ní òkìkí àti agbára tayọ ẹgbẹ́ àwọn alátìlẹyìn ọmọ-ìlú tí wọ́n ní àfọkànsìn ni bí wọ́n ṣe ń pín nínú òye àjọgbépọ̀ àpapọ̀ ojoojúmọ́ tí ò léwu tí wọ́n sì ń ṣàmúlò rẹ̀, tí wọ́n ń gbé e sókè tí wọ́n sì ń fún-un lágbára.', 'en': 'And what gives these questions traction and power beyond the circle of committed nativists is the way they tap into an everyday, seemingly harmless sense of national belonging and activate it, heighten it and inflame it.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn alátìlẹyìn ọmọ-ìlú ti jọ̀wọ́ ara wọn fún ṣiṣe ìyàtọ̀ tó fojú hàn láàárín aráalé àti aráàta.', 'en': 'Nativists commit themselves to making stark distinctions between insiders and outsiders.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ìyàtọ̀ náà fún ra rẹ̀ wà ní gbùngun ọ̀nà tí àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè ń gbà ṣe àpèjúwe ara wọn.', 'en': 'But the distinction itself is at the heart of the way nations define themselves.'}

{'yo': 'Ìyàtọ̀ tó wà láàárín inú àti ìta, to ṣe wí pé lọ́pọ̀ ìgbà o máa ń sá wọ ojú ọ̀nà ìran àti ẹ̀sìn, máa ń wà níbẹ̀ láti jinú àti láti di àmúlò.', 'en': 'The fissures between inside and outside, which often run deepest along lines of race and religion, are always there to be deepened and exploited.'}

{'yo': 'Ìyẹn sì ń fún àwọn alátìlẹyìn ọmọ ìlú ní ọ̀nà-ìmúṣe alátapadà tayọ àwọn tí wọ́n ríra wọn bíi atako àwọn aṣíkiri, àti lílù lọ́gọ-ẹnu, kódà láàárín àwọn kan tí wọ́n ríra wọn gẹ́gẹ́ bi alátìlẹyìn àwọn aṣíkiri.', 'en': 'And that potentially gives nativist approaches resonance far beyond those who consider themselves anti-immigrant, and remarkably, even among some who consider themselves pro-immigrant.'}

{'yo': 'Fún àpẹẹrẹ, nígbà tí àwọn alátìlẹyìn ìwé-òfin àwọn aṣíkiri dáhùn àwọn ìbéèrè tí àwọn alátìlẹyin ọmọ-ìlú ń gbé jáde wọ̀nyí, wọ́n mú wọn lọ́kùkúdùn.', 'en': 'So, for example, when Immigrants Act allies answer these questions the nativists are posing, they take them seriously.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n sọ àwọn ìbéèrè wọ̀nyí di òfin àti, dé àwọn àyè kan, ìmọ̀ọ́nú àwọn atako-aṣíkiri tí wọ́n wà lẹ́yìn wọn.', 'en': 'They legitimate those questions and, to some extent, the anti-immigrant assumptions that are behind them.'}

{'yo': 'Bí a bá mú àwọn ìbéèrè wònyí lọ́kùnkúndùn láìnímọ̀ nípa ẹ̀, à ń ṣe ìwúrí fún títì, àyọkúrò àsọgbà ibodè ìwọlé látókèrè.', 'en': "When we take these questions seriously without even knowing it, we're reinforcing the closed, exclusionary borders of the immigration conversation."}
{'yo': 'Torí náà báwo la ṣe débí?', 'en': 'So how did we get here?'}
{'yo': 'Báwo ni àwọn wọ̀nyí ṣe di ònà tó ń léwájú tí a fi ń sọ̀rọ̀ nípa ìwọlé látókèrè?', 'en': 'How did these become the leading ways that we talk about immigration?'}
{'yo': 'Níbí, a nílò àwọn ìtàn-ìpìlẹ̀, tó jẹ́ ibi tí ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ ìtàn mi yóò ti wọlé.', 'en': 'Here, we need some backstory, which is where my history training comes in.'}

{'yo': 'Lásíkò ọrún ọdún àkọ́kọ́ ipò orílẹ̀-ède US gẹ́gẹ́ bi orílẹ̀-ède olómìnira, ó ṣe díẹ̀ láti ṣe ìdíwọ́ ìwọlé látókèrè ní ìpele orílẹ̀-èdè.', 'en': "During the first century of the US's status as an independent nation, it did very little to restrict immigration at the national level."}

{'yo': 'Ní tòótọ́, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn aṣòfin àti àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ń ṣiṣẹ́ kárakára láti gba àwọn aṣíkiri láti ṣẹ̀dá ilé-iṣẹ́ àti láti ṣiṣẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bi atẹ̀dó, láti gba ẹkùn náà.', 'en': 'In fact, many policymakers and employers worked hard to recruit immigrants to build up industry and to serve as settlers, to seize the continent.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n lẹ́yìn ogun abẹ́lé, ohùn àwọn alátìlẹyìn ọmọ-ìlú gókè ní yíyí àti ní agbára', 'en': 'But after the Civil War, nativist voices rose in volume and in power.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ilẹ̀ Asia, Latin America, Caribbean àti àwọn aṣíkiri ilẹ̀-Europe tí wọ́n gbé kòtò-ìdaminù àwọn ọmọ-ilẹ̀ America, tí wọ́n ń dáná alẹ́ wọn, tí wọ́n ń jagun wọn tí wọ́n sì ń rẹ àwọn ọmọ wọn tẹ́ lálẹ́ ni wọ́n ṣe alábàápàde ìbẹ̀ru aráàta tuntun tó le, tó pín àwọn aṣíkiri gẹ́gẹ́ bi aráàta pátápátá tí wọn ò gbọdọ̀ gbà láyè láti di aráalé.', 'en': "The Asian, Latin American, Caribbean and European immigrants who dug Americans' canals, cooked their dinners, fought their wars and put their children to bed at night were met with a new and intense xenophobia, which cast immigrants as permanent outsiders who should never be allowed to become insiders."}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí yó fi di àrín àsìko 1920, àwọn alátìlẹyìn ọmọ-ìlú ti borí, gbígbé òfin ẹlẹ́yàmẹ̀yà dìde ṣe agbétìsíta iye àwọn aṣíkiri tó kọ́gun-séwu àti àwọn ogúnléndé tí wọn ò sọ síta.', 'en': 'By the mid-1920s, the nativists had won, erecting racist laws that closed out untold numbers of vulnerable immigrants and refugees.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn aṣíkiri àti àwọn alátìlẹyìn wọn sapá wọn láti jà padà, ṣùgbọ́n wọ́n bára wọn lẹ́ni tó ń ṣe àtìlẹyìn, wọ́n káwọn ní àwọn ọ̀nà kọ̀ọ̀kan nínú ìṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún àwọn alátìlẹyin ọmọ-ìlú.', 'en': "Immigrants and their allies did their best to fight back, but they found themselves on the defensive, caught in some ways in the nativists' frames."}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí àwọn alátìlẹyin ọmọ-ìlú sọ wí pé àwọn aṣíkiri ò wúlò, àwọn alátìlẹyìn wọn ní bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, wọ́n wúlò.', 'en': "When nativists said that immigrants weren't useful, their allies said yes, they are."}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí àwọn alátìlẹyìn ọmọ-ìlú fi ẹ̀sùn kan àwọn aṣíkiri wí pé àwọn tókù niwọ́n, àwọn alátìlẹyìn wọn ṣe àdéhùn pé wọ́n máa fara jọwọ́n.', 'en': 'When nativists accused immigrants of being others, their allies promised that they would assimilate.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí àwọn alátìlẹyin ọmọ-ìlú fẹ̀sùn kàn wọn pé àwọn aṣíkiri jẹ́ ajọ̀fẹ́ tó léwu, àwọn alátìlẹyìn wọn ṣe ìfirinlẹ̀ ìjólóòótọ́ wọn, ìgbọ́ràn wọn, ìṣiṣẹ́ kára wọn àti àìnáwó-nínàkúnà wọn.', 'en': 'When nativists charged that immigrants were dangerous parasites, their allies emphasized their loyalty, their obedience, their hard work and their thrift.'}

{'yo': 'Kódà bí àwọn agbẹnusọ ṣe ń gba àwọn aṣíkiri mọ́ra, ọ̀pọ́ ṣì ń ka àwọn aṣíkiri sí aráàta tó yẹ kí wọ́n káànú, tó yẹ kí wọ́n dóòlà, tó yẹ kí wọ́n gbéga kí wọ́n sì gbà mọ́ra, ṣùgbọ́n tí wọn ò ní mú wọlé gẹ́gẹ́ bi adọ́gba ní ẹ̀tọ́ àti ọ̀wọ̀.', 'en': 'Even as advocates welcomed immigrants, many still regarded immigrants as outsiders to be pitied, to be rescued, to be uplifted and to be tolerated, but never fully brought inside as equals in rights and respect.'}

{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn ogun àgbáyé kejì, pàápàá jùlọ láti àrín àsìko 1960 yàtọ̀sí àìpẹ́ yìí, àwọn aṣíkiri àti àwọn alátìlẹyìn wọn ń fa ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ padà sẹ́yìn, tí wọ́n fẹ́ ti ìdíwọ́ ọ̀rún ọdún àrín-ogún ṣubú àti ìborí dípo ètò tuntun tí yóò gbájúmọ́ ìkójọpọ̀ àwọn ẹbi, gbígba àwọn ogúnléndé àti gbígba àwọn tí wọ́n ní ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe tó yátọ̀.', 'en': 'After World War II, and especially from the mid-1960s until really recently, immigrants and their allies turned the tide, overthrowing mid-20th century restriction and winning instead a new system that prioritized family reunification, the admission of refugees and the admission of those with special skills.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n nígbà náà, wọn ò ṣàṣeyọrí nínú ṣíṣe àyípadà ìpìlẹ̀ àwọn àdéhùn àríyànjiyàn náà, nítorí náà ẹ̀tò-ìgbésẹ̀ iṣẹ́ náà dúró, tó ṣetán láti di lílò padà ní àsìko ìparí titi wa.', 'en': "But even then, they didn't succeed in fundamentally changing the terms of the debate, and so that framework endured, ready to be taken up again in our own convulsive moment."}
{'yo': 'Àsọgbà yẹn ti fọ́.', 'en': 'That conversation is broken.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ìbéèrè àtijọ́ náà léwu àti ìpínyà.', 'en': 'The old questions are harmful and divisive.'}

{'yo': 'Báwo la ṣe fẹ́ kúrò láti àsọgbà yẹn sí èyí tó lè múwa súmọ́ ilẹ̀-àgbáyé kan tó jẹ́ oní déédé, tó jẹ́ adọ́gba, tí ò léwu púpọ̀?', 'en': "So how do we get from that conversation to one that's more likely to get us closer to a world that is fairer, that is more just, that's more secure?"}

{'yo': 'Mo fẹ́ dábàá wí pé nǹkan tí a ní láti ṣe jẹ́ ọ̀kan nínú àwọn nǹkan tó le tí àwùjọ kankan lè ṣe: láti ṣe àtúnyà àwọn enu-àlà ẹni tó ṣe pàtàkì, tí ìgbésí ayé rẹ̀, tí ẹ̀tọ rẹ̀ àti ìdàgbàsókè ṣe pàtàkì.', 'en': 'I want to suggest that what we have to do is one of the hardest things that any society can do: to redraw the boundaries of who counts, of whose life, whose rights and whose thriving matters.'}
{'yo': 'A nílò láti ṣe àtúnyà àwọn enu-àlà náà', 'en': 'We need to redraw the boundaries.'}
{'yo': 'A nílò láti ṣe àtúnyà àwọn ibodè wa.', 'en': 'We need to redraw the borders of us.'}

{'yo': 'Láti lè ṣe ìyẹn, a nílò láti kọ́kọ́ gbájúmọ́ ojú-ìwòye tí àwọn ènìyàn ní ṣùgbọ́n tí wọ́n ti ní akùdé gidi gan-an.', 'en': "In order to do that, we need to first take on a worldview that's widely held but also seriously flawed."}

{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bi ojú-ìwòye yẹn, inú àwọn enu-àlà àpapọ̀ wa, nínú orílẹ̀-èdè náà, tó jẹ́ ibi tí à ń gbé, tí a tí ń ṣiṣẹ́ tí a sì ń mọ̀wọn arawa.', 'en': "According to that worldview, there's the inside of the national boundaries, inside the nation, which is where we live, work and mind our own business."}
{'yo': 'Ìta rẹ̀ náà wà; ibi gbogbo náà wà.', 'en': "And then there's the outside; there's everywhere else."}

{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bi ojú-ìwòye yìí, nígbà tí àwọn aṣíkiri bá ta kọ́sọ́ sí orílẹ̀-èdè náà, wọ́n ń gbéra láti ìta sínú ilé, sùgbọ́n wọn ó ṣì jẹ́ aráàta.', 'en': "According to this worldview, when immigrants cross into the nation, they're moving from the outside to the inside, but they remain outsiders."}
{'yo': 'Èyíkéyìí agbára tàbí ohun-èlò tí wọ́n bá gbà gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹ̀bùn látọ̀dọ wa yàtọ̀sí àwọn ẹ̀tọ wọn', 'en': 'Any power or resources they receive are gifts from us rather than rights.'}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, kò ṣòro láti rí èrèdí tí èyí fi jẹ́ irú ojú-ìwòye tí àwọn ènìyàn ní tọ wọ́pọ̀.', 'en': "Now, it's not hard to see why this is such a commonly held worldview."}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n ṣe ìwúrí fún-un ní àwọn ọ̀nà ojoojúmọ́ bí a ṣe ń sọrọ̀ àti bí a ṣe ń ṣe àti bí a ṣe ń húwà, débi àwòrán ẹnubodè tí a fi kọ́ sókè nínú àwọn yàra-ilé-ẹ̀kọ wa.', 'en': "It's reinforced in everyday ways that we talk and act and behave, down to the bordered maps that we hang up in our schoolrooms."}

{'yo': 'Ìṣòro tó wà pẹ̀lú ojú-ìwòye yìí ni wí pé kò papọ̀ mọ́ ònà tí ilẹ̀ àgbáyé ń gbà ṣiṣẹ́, àti ọ̀nà tí ó ti gbà ṣiṣẹ́ sẹ́yìn.', 'en': "The problem with this worldview is that it just doesn't correspond to the way the world actually works, and the way it has worked in the past."}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, àwọn òṣìṣẹ ilẹ̀ America ti pèsè ọrọ̀ ní àwùjọ.', 'en': 'Of course, American workers have built up wealth in society.'}

{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ náà ni àwọn aṣíkiri, pàtàkì jùlọ ní apá kan ọrọ̀-ajé ilẹ̀ America tí ò ṣe é fẹ́kù àti ibi tí díẹ̀ nínú àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ America ti ń ṣiṣẹ́, bíi iṣẹ́ àgbẹ̀.', 'en': 'But so have immigrants, particularly in parts of the American economy that are indispensable and where few Americans work, like agriculture.'}

{'yo': 'Látígbà tí wọ́n ti dá orílẹ̀-èdè náà sílẹ̀, ni àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ America ti wà nínú ẹgbẹ́-òṣìṣẹ́ ilẹ̀ America.', 'en': "Since the nation's founding, Americans have been inside the American workforce."}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ America ti kọ́ àwọn ilé-isẹ́ sínú àwùjọ tó ń ṣe ìdánilójú ẹ̀tọ́.', 'en': 'Of course, Americans have built up institutions in society that guarantee rights.'}
{'yo': 'Bẹ́ẹ̀ náà ni àwọn aṣíkiri.', 'en': 'But so have immigrants.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n ti wà níbẹ̀ lásíkò kókó ìtẹ̀síwájú àwùjọ, bíi ẹ̀tọ́ ará-ìlú àti ẹgbẹ́ àwọn òṣìṣẹ́, tí a ti jà láti fẹ ẹ̀tọ́ lójú nínú àwùjọ fún gbogbo ènìyan.', 'en': "They've been there during every major social movement, like civil rights and organized labor, that have fought to expand rights in society for everyone."}
{'yo': 'Nítorí náà àwọn aṣíkiri ti wà nínú ìjà fún ẹ̀to, ìjọba àwarawa àti òmìnira', 'en': 'So immigrants are already inside the struggle for rights, democracy and freedom.'}

{'yo': 'Lákòtán, àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ America àti àwọn àwọn ọmọ-ìlú tókù ní Global North ò mọ̀wọn ara wọn, wọn ò sì tíì dúró sáàrín ibódè tiwọn.', 'en': "And finally, Americans and other citizens of the Global North haven't minded their own business, and they haven't stayed within their own borders."}
{'yo': 'Wọn ò tíì ní ìbọ́wọ̀ fún enubodè àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tókù.', 'en': "They haven't respected other nations' borders."}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n ti jáde lọ sínú ayé pẹ̀lú àwọn ọmọ-ogun wọn, wọ́n ti gba ìṣàkóso àwọn ilẹ̀ àti ohun àlùmọ́nì, wọ́n sì ti yọ èrè tó pọ̀ lára orílẹ̀-èdè púpọ̀ tí àwọn aṣíkiri ti wá.', 'en': "They've gone out into the world with their armies, they've taken over territories and resources, and they've extracted enormous profits from many of the countries that immigrants are from."}
{'yo': 'Ni ti èyí, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn aṣíkiri kulẹ̀ ti wà nínú agbára ilẹ̀ America tẹ́lẹ̀.', 'en': 'In this sense, many immigrants are actually already inside American power.'}

{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú àwòrán inú àti ìta orílẹ̀-èdè lẹ́mi wọn, ìbéèrè náà kìí ṣe wí pé bóyá gbígba àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè wọ̀nyí yóò jẹ́ kí àwọn aṣíkiri ó wọlé.', 'en': "With this different map of inside and outside in mind, the question isn't whether receiving countries are going to let immigrants in."}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n kulẹ̀ ti wọlé.', 'en': "They're already in."}

{'yo': 'Ìbéèrè náà ni pé bóyá orílẹ̀-ède United States àti àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tókù máa fún àwọn aṣíkiri ní àn àǹfààní fàní sí àwọn ẹ̀tọ́ àti ohun àlùmọ́nì tí iṣẹ́ wọn, ìjàfẹ́tọ̀ọ́ wọn àti àwọn orílẹ̀-ède wọn ti kó ipa pàtàkì nínú ìṣẹ̀da rẹ̀.', 'en': 'The question is whether the United States and other countries are going to give immigrants access to the rights and resources that their work, their activism and their home countries have already played a fundamental role in creating.'}

{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú àwòran orílẹ̀-èdè tuntun yìí lọ́kàn, a lè kọjú sí sẹ́ẹ́tì àwọn ìbéèrè líle, tuntun, tí a nílò kíákíá, tó yátọ̀ gédéngbé sí àwọn tí a ti bẹ̀rè tẹ́lẹ̀ -- àwọn ìbéèrè tó lè ṣe àyípadà àríyànjiyàn enubodè ìwọlé látókèrè.', 'en': "With this new map in mind, we can turn to a set of tough, new, urgently needed questions, radically different from the ones we've asked before -- questions that might change the borders of the immigration debate."}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ìbéèrè mẹ́ta wa jẹ́ nípa ẹ̀tọ́ àwọn òṣìṣẹ́, nípa ojúṣe àti nípa ìdọ́gba.', 'en': "Our three questions are about workers' rights, about responsibility and about equality."}
{'yo': 'Àkọ́kọ́, a nílò láti máa bèrè nípa ẹ̀tọ́ àwọn òṣìṣẹ́.', 'en': "First, we need to be asking about workers' rights."}

{'yo': 'Báwo ni àwọn ìpinnu tó wà nílẹ̀ ṣe ń jẹ́ kó le fún àwọn aṣíkiri láti gbèja arawọn kó sì rọrùn fún wọn láti lò wọn nílò-kulò, wíwa owó-iṣẹ́ wálẹ̀, ẹ̀tọ́ àti ìdáààbòbò fún gbogbo ènìyàn?', 'en': 'How do existing policies make it harder for immigrants to defend themselves and easier for them to be exploited, driving down wages, rights and protections for everyone?'}

{'yo': 'Mo ti kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ pé tí a bá gbájúmọ́ ẹ̀kọ́ àwọn obìnrin, a máa mú ìyàtọ̀ bá ìgbeayé wọn gidi gan, bákan náà ni àlàáfíà àwùjọ wọn.', 'en': "I have learned that if we focus on women's education, we improve their life positively as well as the well-being of their community."}
{'yo': 'Ìdí nìyí tí mo fi jọ̀wọ́ ayé mi fún ètò-ẹ̀kọ́.', 'en': 'This is why now I dedicate my life to education.'}

{'yo': 'Èyí wà ní ìṣọ̀kan pẹ̀lú ìrònú mi nípa ìdọ́gba àti lílé dédé àwùjọ, nítorí tí ẹ bá fẹ́ ṣe àfikún ànfàní sí ètò-ìlera, ẹ nílò láti kọ́kọ́ ṣe àfikún ànfàní sí ìmọ̀ ìlera.', 'en': 'And this is totally aligned with my sense of equity and my pursuit of social justice, because if you want to increase access to health services, you need first to increase access to health education.'}

{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ ati àwọn alájọṣe, à ń kọ́ fásitì tó rẹwà ní ìgbèríko àríwá orílẹ̀-ède Rwanda.', 'en': 'So with friends and partners, we are building a beautiful university in the rural north of Rwanda.'}

{'yo': 'À ń kọ́ àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ wa láti pèse ojúlówó, adọ́gba, ìtọ́jú àpapọ̀ fún gbogbo ènìyàn, láìyọ ẹnìkẹ́ni sílẹ̀, gbígbájúmọ́ àwọn tó kọ́gun séwu, pàápàá jùlọ àwọn obìnrin àti àwọn ọmọdé, tó ṣe pé nínú ìtàn àwọn ni ẹni ìgbẹ̀yìn láti gba ìtọ́jú.', 'en': 'We educate our students to provide quality, equitable, holistic care to everyone, leaving no one out, focusing on the vulnerable, especially women and children, who are historically the last to be served.'}
