{'yo': 'A ṣe àyípadà wọn sí aṣíwájú a sì fún wọn ní ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe ìṣàmójútó àti ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe ìjẹ́ agbẹnusọ kí wọ́n lè ṣe àyípadà tó dán mọ́rán ní àwùjọ tí wọ́n máa wà, kí wọ́n lè pèse ètò ìlera tí yóò gbà wọ́n láyè láti ṣètọ́jú àwọn tó kọ́gun séwu níbi tí wọ́n wà.', 'en': 'We transform them into leaders and give them managerial skills and advocacy skills for them to be smooth changemakers in the society where they will be, so that they can build health systems that allow them to care about the vulnerable where they are.'}
{'yo': 'Ó sì ti mú àyípadà wá.', 'en': "And it's really transformative."}

{'yo': 'Torí lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí, ètò-ẹ̀kọ́ ìmọ̀-ìṣègùn, fún àpẹẹrẹ, ni wọ́n ń kọ́ ní àwọn ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ tó wà nígboro, tó gbájúmọ́ ojúlówó ètò-ìlera àti ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe, ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe ajẹmọ́-ìtọ́jú, tí yóò di gbígbà ní àwọn ilé-ẹ̀kọ́.', 'en': 'Because currently, medical education, for example, is given in institutions based in cities, focused on quality health services and skills, clinical skills, to be given in institutions.'}

{'yo': 'A tún gbájúmọ́ ojúlówó ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe ajẹmọ́-ìtọ́jú sùgbọ́n pẹ̀lú ọ̀nà-ìmúṣe àjọṣepọ̀ ìwà àti àwùjọ sí ipò-ìlera àwọn aláìsàn, láti lè ṣe ìtọ́jú ní àwùjọ tí àwọn ènìyàn ń gbé, pẹ̀lú gbígbé lọ sí ilé ìwòsàn nígbà tó bá pọn dandan nìkan.', 'en': 'We also focus on quality clinical skills but with biosocial approach to the condition of patient, for care to be given in communities where the people live, with hospitalization only when necessary.'}

{'yo': 'Bákan náà, lẹ́yìn odún mẹ́rin sí méje ètò-ẹ̀kọ́ ajẹmọ́-ìwòsàn nígboro, àwọn ọ̀dọ́ akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ jáde ò fẹ́ padà sí àwọn ìgbèríko.', 'en': "And also, after four to seven years of clinical education in cities, young graduates don't want to go back to rural area."}

{'yo': 'Ìdí nìyí tí a fi kọ́ Fásitì Ìdọ́gba Ètò-Ìlera Àgbáyé, ìgbésẹ̀ àwọn alájọṣepọ̀ nínú ètò-ìlera, tí wọ́n pè ní UGHE, ní ìgbèríko àríwá orílẹ̀-ède Rwanda.', 'en': 'So this is why we have built the University of Global Health Equity, an initiative of Partners in Health, called UGHE, in the rural north of Rwanda.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ wa wà láti mú àyípadà bá àgbáyé.', 'en': 'Our students are meant to go and change the world.'}

{'yo': 'Wọn yóò wá láti ibi gbogbo -- fásitì àgbáyé ni -- wọn yóò sì gba ètò-ẹ̀kọ́ ìmọ̀-ìṣègùn lọ́fẹ̀ẹ́ lábẹ́ àdéhùn kan: wọ́n ní láti ṣe ìtọ́jú àwọn tó kọ́gun séwu jákèjádò àgbáyé láàrín ọdún mẹ́fà sí mẹ́sàn-án.', 'en': "They will come from all over -- it's a global university -- and will get the medical education for free at one condition: they have to serve the vulnerable across the world during six to nine years."}

{'yo': 'Wọn yóò tọ́jú owo iṣẹ́ náà fún ara wọn àti àwọn ẹbí wọn ṣùgbọ́n wọn yóò yí ẹ̀kọ́ tí a fún wọn padà sí ojúlówó iṣẹ́ ajẹmọ́-ìwòsàn, pàápàá jùlọ fún àwọn akọ́gun-séwu.', 'en': 'They will keep the salary for themselves and their families but turn the education we give in quality clinical services, especially for the vulnerable.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣíṣe eyí, wọn yóò tọwọ́ bọ ìwé àdéhùn ní ìbẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀pẹ̀ pé wọn yóò ṣe ìyẹn, àdéhùn òfin ni.', 'en': 'And doing so, they sign an agreement at the start that they will do that, a binding agreement.'}
{'yo': 'A ò fẹ́ owó.', 'en': "We don't want money."}
{'yo': 'A ní láti lọ pín owó náà yíká.', 'en': 'We have to go and mobilize the money.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n wọn yóò sọ èyí di ìjábọ̀ iṣẹ́ fún gbogbo ènìyàn.', 'en': 'But they will turn this in quality service delivery for all.'}
{'yo': 'Fún èyí, bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, a nílò ètò ìdọ́gba láàrín ọkùnrin àti obìnrin tó lágbára.', 'en': 'For this, of course, we need a strong gender equity agenda.'}
{'yo': 'Ní gbogbo yàrá ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ wa, abala ẹ̀kọ́ oyè ìjìnlẹ̀, ó kéré jù ìdá àdọ́ta àwọn obìnrin.', 'en': "And in all our classes, master's course, minimum of 50 percent of women."}

{'yo': 'Inú mi dùn láti sọ pé fún ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ ìmọ̀-ìṣègùn tó bẹ́rẹ̀ ní oṣù márùn-ún sẹ́yìn, a ti gba ìdá àdọ́rin àwọn ọmọdébìnrin.', 'en': "And I'm proud to say that for the medical school that started five months ago, we have enrolled 70 percent girls."}

{'yo': 'Èyí jẹ́ èsì tako àìdọ́gba lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ fún àwọn obìnrin láti ní ànfàní sí ètò-ẹ̀kọ́ ìmọ̀-ìṣègùn ní ẹkùn wa.', 'en': 'This is a statement against the current inequity for women to access medical education in our continent.'}
{'yo': 'Mo nígbàgbọ́ nínu ètò-ẹ̀kọ́ àwọn obìnrin.', 'en': "I believe in women's education."}

{'yo': 'Ìdí nìyí tí mo fi gbóríyìn fún àwọn obìnrin nílẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ tí wọ́n ń lọ káàkiri àgbáyé láti ṣe àfikún sí ẹ̀kọ́ wọn, ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe wọn àti ìmọ wọn.', 'en': 'This is why I applaud African ladies who go all over the world to increase their education, their skills and their knowledge.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n mo lérò wí pé wọn yóò mú ìyẹn padà wá sílẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ láti jẹ́ kí ẹkùn náà gbóórò kí wọn sì sọ ẹkùn náà di agbègbe alágbára, nítorí ó dámi lójú pé ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ tó lágbára yóò sọ orílẹ̀-èdè àgbáyé di alágbára.', 'en': "But I hope they will bring that back to Africa to build the continent and make the continent a strong continent, because I'm sure a stronger Africa will make the world stronger."}

{'yo': 'Ọdún mẹ́tà-lé-lógún sẹ́yìn, mo padà lọ sí orílẹ̀-ède Rwanda, sí orílẹ̀-ède Rwanda tó ti túká, tó ṣì jẹ́ orílẹ̀-èdè tó kúṣẹ̀ẹ́ ṣùgbọ́n tó ń tàn pẹ̀lú ọjọ́-iwájú rere.', 'en': 'Twenty-three years ago, I went back to Rwanda, to a broken Rwanda, that now is still a poor country but shining with a bright future.'}

{'yo': 'Mo kún fún ayọ̀ láti padà wá, kódà tí àwọn ọjọ́ kan bá le koko, tó sì jẹ́ wí pé àwọn ọjọ́ kan mo ní ìrẹ̀wẹ̀sí, nítorí mi ò rí ọ̀nà àbáyọ àwọn ènìyán sì ń kú, tàbí ǹkan ò lọ dáadáa.', 'en': "And I am full of joy to have come back, even if some days were very difficult, and even if some days I was depressed, because I didn't find a solution and people were dying, or things were not moving enough."}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n inú mi dùn láti lọ́wọ́ sí àyípadà àwùjọ mi.', 'en': "But I'm so proud to have contributed to improve my community."}
{'yo': 'Èyí sì ń jẹ́ kí n kún fáyọ̀.', 'en': 'And this makes me full of joy.'}
{'yo': 'Nítorí náà, àwọn obìnrin ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ láti ilẹ̀-òkèrè, tí ẹ bá ń gbọ́mi, má gbàgbe iléè rẹ.', 'en': 'So, African women from the diaspora, if you hear me, never forget your homeland.'}
{'yo': 'Tí ẹ bá ti ṣetán, ẹ padà wálé.', 'en': 'And when you are ready, come back home.'}
{'yo': 'Mo ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': 'I did so.'}
{'yo': 'Ó ti jẹ́ kí ayé mi ní àṣeyọrí.', 'en': 'It has fulfilled my life.'}
{'yo': 'Nítorí náà, ẹ padà wálé.', 'en': 'So, come back home.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ṣeun.', 'en': 'Thank you.'}
{'yo': 'Bí ìkópamọ́ tí àwùjọ léwájú rẹ̀ ṣe lè dóólà àwọn ẹranko igbó.', 'en': 'How community-led conservation can save wildlife'}
{'yo': 'Mo jẹ́ olùkópamọ́ kìnìhún.', 'en': "I'm a lion conservationist."}
{'yo': 'O dùn-ún gbọ́, àbí bẹ́ẹ̀ kọ́?', 'en': "Sounds cool, doesn't it?"}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ènìyàn kan lè má nì òye ǹkan tí èyí túmọ̀ sí.', 'en': 'Some people may have no idea what that means.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ó dámi lójú wí pé gbogbo yín lẹ ti gbọ́ nípa Cecil kìnìhún náà.', 'en': "But I'm sure you've all heard about Cecil the lion."}
{'yo': '[Cecil kìnìhún náà (2002-2015) ].', 'en': '[Cecil the Lion (2002-2015) ]'}
{'yo': ' (kìnìhún tó ń bú ramú-ramù).', 'en': ' (Lion roaring) '}
{'yo': 'Kò bú ramú-ramù mọ́', 'en': 'He roars no more.'}

{'yo': 'Ní ọjọ́ kejì oṣù Agẹmọ, ọdún 2015, wọ́n dá ẹ̀mi rẹ̀ légbodò nígbà tí ọdẹ apẹranko igbó kan pa á.', 'en': 'On the second of July, 2015, his life was cut short when he was killed by a trophy hunter.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n sọ wí pé ẹ lè fẹ́ràn ẹranko tí ẹ̀ ń kọ́ nípa rẹ̀.', 'en': 'They say that you can become attached to the animals you study.'}

{'yo': 'Bí ó ṣe rí fúnmi àti Cecil kìnìhún náà nìyẹn, lẹ́yìn tí mo ti mọ̀ ọ́ tí mo sì ti mọ̀wa rẹ̀ fún ọdún mẹ́ta ní ààyè-ìgbafẹ́ apapọ̀ Hwange.', 'en': 'That was the case for me with Cecil the lion, having known him and studied him for three years in Hwange National Park.'}
{'yo': 'Ikúu rẹ̀ bàmí lọ́kàn jẹ́.', 'en': 'I was heartbroken at his death.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ǹkan rere kan tó jáde lati ibi àjálù burúkú yìí ni àkíyèsí tí ìtàn yìí múwá nípa ẹ̀hónú àwọn ẹranko igbó tí wọ́n wà nínú ewu.', 'en': 'But the good thing to come out of this tragedy is the attention that the story brought towards the plight of threatened wild animals.'}

{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn ikú Cecil, mo bẹ̀rẹ̀ síní bi ara mi ní àwọn ìbéérè wọ̀nyí: ti ó bá jẹ wí pé àwùjọ tí wọ́n ń gbé lẹ́gbẹ kìnìhún náà lọ́wọ́ sí ààbo rẹ̀ ńkọ́?', 'en': "After Cecil's death, I began to ask myself these questions: What if the community that lived next to Cecil the lion was involved in protecting him?"}
{'yo': 'Tó bá ṣe wí pé mo ti mọ Cecil nígbà ti mo wà ní ọmọ ọdún mẹ́wà, yàtọ̀ sí ọmọ ọdún mọ́kàn-dín-lọ́gbọ̀n ńkọ́?', 'en': 'What if I had met Cecil when I was 10 years old, instead of 29?'}
{'yo': 'Ǹjẹ́ èmi tàbí àwọn akẹgbẹ́ẹ̀ mi ní yàrá ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ìbá ti yí àyànmọ rẹ̀ padà bí?', 'en': 'Could I or my classmates have changed his fate?'}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn ń ṣiṣẹ́ láti dẹ́kun kí kìnìhún ó má pòórá mọ́, ṣùgbọ́n díẹ̀ nínú àwọn ènìyàn wọ̀nyí ni wọ́n jẹ́ ọmọ onílù sí àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè wọ̀nyí tàbí láti àwùjọ tí ọ̀rọ́ kàn jù.', 'en': 'Many people are working to stop lions from disappearing, but very few of these people are native to these countries or from the communities most affected.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n àwọn àwùjọ tí wọ́n ń gbé pẹ̀lú àwọn kìnìhún náà ni wọ́n wà ní ipò tó dára jù láti ran àwọn kìnìhún náà lọ́wọ́.', 'en': 'But the communities that live with the lions are the ones best positioned to help lions the most.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ọmọ onílù ló yẹ kí wọ́n léwájúu wíwá ìyanjú sí àwọn ìpèníjà tó ń kojú àwọn ẹranko igbó.', 'en': 'Local people should be at the forefront of the solutions to the challenges facing their wildlife.'}

{'yo': 'Nígbà míràn, àyípadà yóò wáyé nígbà tí àwọn ènìyàn tí ọ̀rọ́ kàn tó sì nípa lára wọn jùlọ bá gbà á.', 'en': 'Sometimes, change can only come when the people most affected and impacted take charge.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn àwùjọ ìgbèríko ń kópa pàtàkì láti kojú pípa àti òwo ẹranko igbo lọ́nà àìbófinmu, tí wọ́n jẹ́ olórí ewu tó ń dàmú àwọn kìnìhún àti àwọn ẹranko igbó mìíràn.', 'en': 'Local communities play an important role in fighting poaching and illegal wildlife trade, which are major threats affecting lions and other wildlife.'}

{'yo': 'Pé mo jẹ́ obìnrin aláwọ̀-dúdú ọmọ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ nínú ìmọ̀-ìjìnlẹ̀, àwọn ènìyàn tí mo máa ń pàdá máa ń nífẹ̀ láti mọ̀ bóyá ó wùnmí láti jẹ́ olùkó pamọ́ ni, nítorí wọn kìí pàdé àwọn olùkópamọ́ tí wọ́n jọmi lọ̀pọ̀lọpò.', 'en': "Being a black African woman in the sciences, the people I meet are always curious to know if I've always wanted to be a conservationist, because they don't meet a lot of conservationists who look like me."}
{'yo': 'Nígbà tí mò ń dàgbà, mi ò tiẹ̀ mọ̀ wí pé iṣẹ́-ìṣe ni ìkópamọ́ àwọn ẹranko igbó.', 'en': "When I was growing up, I didn't even know that wildlife conservation was a career."}

{'yo': 'Ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ tí mo rí ẹranko igbó ní orílẹ̀-èdè mi nígbà tí mo wà lọ́mọ ọdún mẹ́ẹ̀dọ́gbọ̀n, bó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ wí pé kìnìhún àti àwọn ajá igbó ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ń gbé ní ibùsọ̀ díẹ̀ sí ilé mi.', 'en': 'The first time I saw a wild animal in my home country was when I was 25 years old, even though lions and African wild dogs lived just a few miles away from my home.'}

{'yo': 'Èyí wọ́pọ̀ ní orílẹ̀-ède Zimbabwe, nítorí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn ò lajú sí ẹranko igbó, bó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ wí pé ó wà lára àṣa wa.', 'en': "This is quite common in Zimbabwe, as many people are not exposed to wildlife, even though it's part of our heritage."}
{'yo': 'Nígbà tí mò ń dàgbà, mi ò tilẹ̀ mọ̀ wí pé kìnìhún ń gbé lẹ́yìn ilé mi.', 'en': "When I was growing up, I didn't even know that lions lived in my backyard."}

{'yo': 'Nígbà tí mo dásẹ̀ wọ Savé Valley Conservancy ní àárọ̀ ọlọ́gínìtì kan ní ọdún mẹ́wà sẹ́yìn láti kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ nípa àwọn ajá igbó ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ fún iṣẹ́ ìwádì oyè ìjìnlẹ̀ mi, ẹwà àti ìdákẹ́rọ́rọ́ tó yími ká fàmí mọ́ra.', 'en': "When I stepped into Sav├® Valley Conservancy on a cold winter morning 10 years ago to study African wild dogs for my master's research project, I was mesmerized by the beauty and the tranquility that surrounded me."}
{'yo': 'Ó dàbi ẹni pé mo ti rí ohun tí mo nífẹ̀ sí àti àyànmọ́ mi nílé ayé.', 'en': 'I felt like I had found my passion and my purpose in life.'}
{'yo': 'Mo ṣe ìpinnu lọ́jọ́ náà pé màá fi gbogbo ayé mi dáábò bo àwọn ẹranko.', 'en': 'I made a commitment that day that I was going to dedicate my life to protecting animals.'}

{'yo': 'Mo ronú nípa àwọn ìgbà tí mo wà ní ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ èwe ní orílẹ̀-ède Zimbabwe àti àwọn ọmọ tókù tí a jọ wà ní ilé-ẹ̀kọ́.', 'en': 'I think of my childhood school days in Zimbabwe and the other kids I was in school with.'}

{'yo': 'Bóyá tí a bá ti ní ànfàní láti farakínra pẹ̀lú ẹranko igbó ni, ọ̀pọ̀ nínú àwọn akẹgbẹ́ mi ní yàrá ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ni a ó jọ máa ṣiṣẹ́ báyìí.', 'en': 'Perhaps if we had a chance to interact with wildlife, more of my classmates would be working alongside me now.'}

{'yo': 'Àyàfi tí àwọn àwùjọ ìgbèríko bá fẹ́ dáábòbò tí wọ́n sì fẹ́ gbé pẹ̀lú ẹranko igbó, gbogbo ìgbìyànjú olùkópamọ́ lè já sásán.', 'en': 'Unless the local communities want to protect and coexist with wildlife, all conservation efforts might be in vain.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn wọ̀nyí ni àwùjọ tí wọ́n ń gbé pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹranko igbó náà ní àyíká kan náà tí wọ́n sì ń fara gbá ṣíṣe bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': 'These are the communities that live with the wild animals in the same ecosystem and bear the cost of doing so.'}

{'yo': 'Tí wọn ò bá ní àjọṣepọ̀ tààrà tàbí ànfàní látara àwọn ẹranko náà, wọn ò ní ìdí kankan láti dáábò bò wọ́n.', 'en': "If they don't have a direct connection or benefit from the animals, they have no reason to want to protect them."}

{'yo': 'Tí àwọn àwùjọ ìgbèríko ò bá dáábò bo ẹranko igbó wọn, kò sí iye ìdásí láti ìta tí yóò ṣiṣẹ́.', 'en': "And if local communities don't protect their wildlife, no amount of outside intervention will work."}
{'yo': 'Nítorí náà kí la nílò láti ṣe?', 'en': 'So what needs to be done?'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn olùkópamọ́ gbọ́dọ̀ mú ètò-ẹ̀kọ́ agbègbè lọ́kùkúdùn kí wọ́n sì ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ láti gbòòro ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe àwùjọ láti ṣe ìpamọ́ àwọn ẹranko igbó wọn.', 'en': "Conservationists must prioritize environmental education and help expand the community's skills to conserve their wildlife."}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ọmọ ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ àti àwùjọ gbọ́dọ̀ di mímú lọ sí àwọn àyè-ìgbafẹ́ àpapọ̀, kí wọ́n lè ní ànfàní láti ní ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú ẹranko igbó.', 'en': 'Schoolchildren and communities must be taken to national parks, so they get a chance to connect with the wildlife.'}

{'yo': 'Fún gbogbo ìgbìyànjú àti gbogbo ìpele, ìkópamọ́ gbọ́dọ̀ pẹ̀lu ọrọ̀-ajé àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n jìjọ ń pín ilẹ̀ lò pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹranko igbó.', 'en': 'At every effort and every level, conservation must include the economies of the people who share the land with the wild animals.'}

{'yo': 'Ó tún ṣe pàtàkì pé kí àwọn olùkópamọ́ agbègbè wà lára gbogbo ìgbìyànjú ìkópamọ́, tí a bá fẹ́ kí wọ́n gbà wá gbọ́ tí a sì fẹ́ fi ìkópamọ́ rinlẹ̀ sí àwùjọ lóòtọ́.', 'en': 'It is also critical that local conservationists be part of every conservation effort, if we are to build trust and really embed conservation into communities.'}

{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bi olùkópamọ́ agbègbè, a máa ń kojú ìṣòro tó pọ̀, láti ibi ẹlẹ́yàmẹ̀yà sí àwọn ìṣòro nítorí àṣà àti ìṣe.', 'en': 'As local conservationists, we face many hurdles, from outright discrimination to barriers because of cultural norms.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n mi ò ní jáwọ́ ìgbìyànjú mi láti mú àwọn ènìyàn àwùjọ wọlé láti ja ìjà yìí fún ìmóríbọ́ àgbáyé wa.', 'en': 'But I will not give up my efforts to bring indigenous communities to this fight for the survival of our planet.'}
{'yo': 'Mò ń pè yín láti wá darapọ̀ pẹ̀lú mi.', 'en': "I'm asking you to come and stand together with me."}

{'yo': 'A gbọ́dọ̀ jọ tú àwọn ìṣòro tí a ti ṣèdá ká, tó ń yọwọ́ àwọn ọmọ-ìlú kúrò nínu ìgbìyànjú ìkópamọ̀.', 'en': 'We must actively dismantle the hurdles we have created, which are leaving indigenous populations out of conservation efforts.'}
{'yo': 'Mo ti jọ̀wọ ayé mi fún ìdáábò bo kìnìhún.', 'en': "I've dedicated my life to protecting lions."}

{'yo': 'Mo dẹ̀ mọ̀ pé àwọn alájọgbé mi yóò ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀, bákan náà, ìbá ṣe wí pé wọ́n mọ àwọn ẹranko tí ó ń gbé ní ẹ̀gbẹ wọn ni.', 'en': 'And I know my neighbor would, too, if only they knew the animals that lived next door to them.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ṣeun.', 'en': 'Thank you.'}
{'yo': 'Bí àwọn hóró àìsan jẹjẹrẹ ṣe ń sọ̀rọ̀ - àti bí a ṣelè mú wọn wálẹ̀.', 'en': 'How cancer cells communicate - and how we can slow them down'}
{'yo': 'Ààrùn tó ń bani láye jẹ́ ni tó sì ń bani lọ́kàn jẹ́.', 'en': "It's a devastating disease that takes an enormous emotional toll."}
{'yo': 'Kìí se fún aláìsàn nìkan, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn olólùfẹ aláìsàn náà, bákan náà.', 'en': "Not only on the patient, but the patient's loved ones, as well."}
{'yo': 'Ogun tí ìran ọmọ ènìyàn ti ń jà fún àìmọye ọ̀rún-ọdún ni.', 'en': 'It is a battle that the human race has been fighting for centuries.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà tí a ti ṣe àwọn ìtẹ̀síwájú kan, a ò tíì ṣẹ́gun rẹ̀.', 'en': "And while we've made some advancements, we still haven't beaten it."}
{'yo': 'Méjì nínú ènìyàn márùn-ún ní orílẹ̀-ède US ni yóò ní àìsan jẹjẹrẹ ní ìṣẹ̀mi wọn.', 'en': 'Two out of five people in the US will develop cancer in their lifetime.'}
{'yo': 'Nínú àwọn wọ̀nyí, ìdá àdọ́rùn (90%) yóò juwọ́lẹ̀ fún ààrùn yìí nítorí ìtànka rẹ̀.', 'en': 'Of those, 90 percent will succumb to the disease due to metastases.'}

{'yo': 'Ìtànká jẹ́ ìfọ́nká àìsan jẹjẹrẹ láti àyè ìpìlẹ̀ sí àyè míràn, nípasẹ̀ ètò ìṣàn-ẹ̀jẹ̀ tàbí ètò omi-ara.', 'en': 'Metastasis is a spread of cancer from a primary site to a distal site, through the circulatory or the lymphatic system.'}

{'yo': 'Fún àpẹẹrẹ, obìnrin aláìsàn pẹ̀lu àìsan jẹjẹrẹ ọyàn kìí juwọ́lẹ̀ fún ààrùn náà nítorí ó pọ̀ lórí ọyàn rẹ̀.', 'en': "For instance, a female patient with breast cancer doesn't succumb to the disease simply because she has a mass on her breast."}

{'yo': 'Ó juwọ́lẹ̀ fún ààrùn náà nítorí ó ń tàn lọ sí ẹ̀dọ̀-fóró, ẹ̀dọ̀, asẹ́ omi-ara, ọpọlọ, egungun, níbi tí kò ní ṣe é fi iṣẹ́ abẹ yọ tàbí ṣeé tọ́jú.', 'en': 'She succumbs to the disease because it spreads to the lungs, liver, lymph nodes, brain, bone, where it becomes unresectable or untreatable.'}
{'yo': 'Ìtànká jẹ́ ìgbésẹ̀ àmúdijú.', 'en': 'Metastasis is a complicated process.'}
{'yo': 'Èyí tí mo ti ń kọ́ nípa rẹ̀ fún àìmọye ọdún báyìí.', 'en': "One that I've studied for several years now."}

{'yo': 'Ǹkan tí èmi àti ikò mi ṣàwárí láìpẹ́ yìí ni wí pé àwọn hóró àìsan jẹjẹrẹ máa ń bá ara wọn sọ̀rọ̀ wọ́n sì máa ń dari ètò ìgbésẹ̀ wọn, lóri bí wọ́n ṣe súnmọ́ra wọn nínu agbègbè-àìfojúrí kókó.', 'en': 'And something that my team and I discovered recently was that cancer cells are able to communicate with each other and coordinate their movement, based on how closely packed they are in the tumor microenvironment.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n máa ń bára wọn sọ̀rọ̀ nípasẹ̀ mólékù afúnilọ́wọ́ méjì tí wọ́n ń pè ní Interleukin-6 àti Interleukin-8.', 'en': 'They communicate with each other through two signaling molecules called Interleukin-6 and Interleukin-8.'}

{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, bí ǹkan mìíràn nínu ẹ̀dá, tí ǹkan bá fún díẹ̀, ó máa ń ran àmì náà lọ́wọ́, tí yóó sì mú kí àwọn hóró àìsan jẹjẹrẹ náà yára sún kúrò láti àyè-ìpìlẹ̀ kí wọ́n sì fọ́nká sí àyè tuntun.', 'en': 'Now, like anything else in nature, when things get a little too tight, the signal is enhanced, causing the cancer cells to move away faster from the primary site and spread to a new site.'}

{'yo': 'Nítorí náà, tí a bá dí àmì yìí, pèlu lílo ògun kan tí a pèsè, a lè dá ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ láàrín àwọn hóró àìsan jẹjẹrẹ dúró ká sì mú àdínkù bá ìfọ́nká àìsan jẹjẹrẹ.', 'en': 'So, if we block this signal, using a drug cocktail that we developed, we can stop the communication between cancer cells and slow down the spread of cancer.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ jẹ́ kí n dánu dúró díẹ̀ fún ìṣẹ́jú àyá kan kí n sì mu yín padà sí ìgbà tí gbogbo èyí bẹ̀rẹ̀ fún mi ní ọdún 2010, nígbà tí mo jẹ́ akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ odún kejì ní ilé-ìwé gíga.', 'en': 'Let me pause here for a second and take you back to when this all began for me in 2010, when I was just a sophomore in college.'}

{'yo': 'Mo ṣẹ̀ bẹ̀rẹ̀ síní ṣiṣẹ́ ní àyè fún àyẹ̀wo ìmọ̀-ìjìnlẹ̀ omímọ̀ ìṣègùn Danny Wirtz ní fásitì John Hopkins ni.', 'en': "I had just started working in Dr Danny Wirtz's lab at Johns Hopkins University."}

{'yo': 'Màá dẹ̀ ṣe òótọ́: mo jẹ́ ọ̀dọ́, aláìmọ̀kan, ọmọdébìnrin Sri Lankan, tí ò ní ìrírí ìwádìí àtẹ̀yìnwá Kankan.', 'en': "And I'll be honest: I was a young, naive, Sri Lankan girl, who had no previous research experience."}

{'yo': 'Iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n gbé fún mi ni láti wo bí àwọn hóró ààrun jẹjẹrẹ ṣe ń rìn ní 3D collagen I matrix tó máa ń ṣàfihàn, nínu abọ́ kan, ipò tí àwọn hóró ààrun jẹjẹrẹ ń kojú lára wa.', 'en': 'And I was tasked to look at how cancer cells move in a 3D collagen I matrix that recapsulated, in a dish, the conditions that cancer cells are exposed to in our bodies.'}

{'yo': 'Èyí jẹ́ tuntun ó sì ń fún mi láyò, nítorí àwọn iṣẹ́ àtẹ̀yìnwá ni wọ́n ti ṣe lóri 2D, pẹlẹbẹ, abọ́ oníke tí wọn kìí fi bẹ́ẹ̀ ṣe àgbéjáde ǹkan tí àwọn hóró ààrun jẹjẹrẹ ń kojú lára wa.', 'en': "This was new and exciting for me, because previous work had been done on 2D, flat, plastic dishes that really weren't representative of what the cancer cells are exposed to in our bodies."}

{'yo': 'Nítorí, ẹ jẹ́ ká dojú kọ ọ́, àwọn hóró ààrun jẹjẹrẹ nínú ara wa kìí dúró lórí àwọn abọ́ oníke.', 'en': "Because, let's face it, the cancer cells in our bodies aren't stuck onto plastic dishes."}

{'yo': 'Ní àsìkò yìí ni mo lọ sí sẹminá tí Oníṣégùn-òyìnbó Bonnie Bassler láti fásitì Princeton gbé kalẹ̀, níbi tó ti sọ̀rọ̀ nípa bí àwọn hóró alámọ̀ ṣe ń bára wọn sọ̀rọ̀, lóri iye àgbáríjọpọ̀ wọn, tí wọ́n sì ń ṣe àwọn iṣẹ́ kan pàtó.', 'en': 'It was during this time that I attended a seminar conducted by Dr Bonnie Bassler from Princeton University, where she talked about how bacteria cells communicate with each other, based on their population density, and perform a specific action.'}

{'yo': '"Àsìkò yìí ni iná kan dédé kú lórí mi, mo wá rò ó, ""Wow, mo máa ń rí èyí nínu hóró ààrun jẹjẹrẹ mi lójoojúmọ́, tí a bá ń sọ nípa ìgbésẹ̀ wọn."', 'en': '"It was at this moment that a light bulb went off in my head, and I thought, ""Wow, I see this in my cancer cells every day, when it comes to their movement."'}
{'yo': 'Èro iṣẹ́-àkànṣe mi bá di bíbí.', 'en': 'The idea for my project was thus born.'}

{'yo': 'Mo ṣe àròsọ pé àwọn hóró ààrun jẹjẹrẹ máa ń bára wọn sọ̀rọ̀ wọ́n sì máa ń darí ìgbésẹ̀ wọn, lóri bí wọ́n ṣe jọ wà papọ̀ ní àwùjọ-àìfojúrí kókó.', 'en': 'I hypothesized that cancer cells are able to communicate with each other and coordinate their movement, based on how closely packed they are in the tumor microenvironment.'}
{'yo': 'Mo bẹ̀rẹ̀ síní ronú pẹ̀lu ìṣiṣẹ́ tọ àròsọ yìí.', 'en': 'I became obsessed with pursuing this hypothesis.'}
{'yo': 'Orí bámi ṣé, mò ń ṣisẹ́ fún ẹnìkan tó ṣetán láti ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú èrò tó ń sín mi níwín.', 'en': 'And fortunately, I work for someone who is open to running with my crazy ideas.'}
{'yo': 'Nítorí náà, mo jura mi sínu iṣẹ́-àkànṣe yìí.', 'en': 'So, I threw myself into this project.'}
{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀, mi ò lè dáṣe é fúnra mi.', 'en': "However, I couldn't do it by myself."}
{'yo': 'Mo nílò ìrànlọ́wọ́.', 'en': 'I needed help.'}
{'yo': 'Mo nílò ìrànlọ́wọ́ lóòtọ́.', 'en': 'I definitely needed help.'}

{'yo': 'A gba àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tí wọn ò tíì kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ jáde, àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́-jáde, àwọn ọ̀mọ̀wé àti àwọn ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n láti ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ lóríṣiríṣi àti oríṣiríṣi ẹ̀ka láti parapọ̀ ṣiṣẹ́ lórí èrò yìí tí mo lóyún rẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bi akẹ́kẹ̀ọ́ odún kejì nílé-ẹ̀kọ́ gíga.', 'en': 'So we recruited undergraduate students, graduate students, postdoctoral fellows and professors from different institutions and multiple disciplines to come together and work on this idea that I conceived as a sophomore in college.'}

{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn àìmọye odún tí a tí ń ṣe ìdánwò papọ̀ tí a sì ń pa oríṣiríṣi èrò àti òye pọ̀, a ṣàwárí orípa ìṣàmì tuntun tó ń daríi bí àwọn hó', 'en': 'After years of conducting experiments together and merging different ideas and perspectives, we discovered a new signaling pathway that controls how cancer cells communicate with each other and move, based on their cell density.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn kan nínu yín lè ti gbọ́ èyí, nítorí ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ìkànì ìbánidọ́rẹ̀ mọ̀ ọ́ sí ipa Hasini.', 'en': 'Some of you might have heard this, because most of social media knows it as the Hasini effect.'}
{'yo': 'A ò dẹ̀ tíì ṣetán.', 'en': "And we weren't done yet."}

{'yo': 'A wá pinnu wí pé a fẹ́ dí orípa ìsàmì ká wá wò ó bóyá a lè mú àdínkù bá ìfọ́nká ààrun jẹjẹrẹ.', 'en': 'We then decided that we wanted to block this signaling pathway and see if we could slow down the spread of cancer.'}
{'yo': 'Tí a dẹ̀ ṣe, ní àwòṣe ìtọ́jú ṣíwáju àyẹ̀wò lára ẹranko.', 'en': 'Which we did, in preclinical animal models.'}

{'yo': 'A pèsè òògùn aládálù kan tó ní tocilizumab, tí a ń lò lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ láti tọ́jú làkúrégbè, àti reparixin, tí à ń lò lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ fún ìwádìí ajẹmọ́-ìtọ́jú ààrun jẹjẹrẹ ọyàn.', 'en': 'We came up with a drug cocktail consisting of tocilizumab, which is currently used to treat rheumatoid arthritis, and reparixin, which is currently in clinical trials against breast cancer.'}

{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lú ìdùnú, nkan tí a rí ni wí pé òògun aládálù yìí kò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ nípa lára ìdàgbàsókè kókó, ṣùgbọ́n ó dojúkọ ìtànká tààrà.', 'en': 'And interestingly, what we found was that this cocktail of drugs really had no effect on tumor growth, but directly targeted metastases.'}

{'yo': 'Èyí jẹ́ àbájáde tó ṣe pàtàkì, torí lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí, kò sí òògun FDA kankan tó gbàṣẹ tó ń kojú ìtànká ààrun jẹjẹrẹ tààrà.', 'en': "This was a significant finding, because currently, there aren't any FDA-approved therapeutics that directly target the spread of cancer."}
{'yo': 'Lóòtọ́, ìtànká ààrun jẹjẹrẹ, títànká, ní wọ́n ń ri gẹ́gẹ́ bi èròjà ìdàgbàsókè kókó.', 'en': 'In fact, the spread of cancer, metastasis, is thought of as a byproduct of tumor growth.'}
{'yo': 'Níbi tí èrò náà wà, tí a bá lè dènà ìdàgbàsókè kókó, a lè dèna ìtànká kókó.', 'en': 'Where the idea is, if we can stop the tumor from growing, we can stop the tumor from spreading.'}
{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ wa mọ̀ wí pé èyí kìí ṣe òótọ́.', 'en': 'However, most of us know that this is not true.'}

{'yo': 'Àwa, nídà kejì, pèse ògùn olómi kan tó ń kojú ìtànká tí kìí ṣe pẹ̀lú ìdojúkọ ìdàgbàsókè kókó, ṣùgbọ́n pẹ̀lú ìdojúkọ ìṣẹ̀dá tó gbóórò tó ń darí rẹ̀, nípasẹ̀ kíkojú ipa Hasini.', 'en': 'We, on the other hand, came up with the drug cocktail that targets metastasis not by targeting tumor growth, but by targeting the complex mechanisms that govern it, through the targeting of the Hasini effect.'}

{'yo': '"Wọ́n ṣe àtẹ̀jáde iṣẹ́ yìí láìpẹ́ yìí nínu ""Nature Communications,"" èmi àti àwọn ikò mi dẹ̀ gba èsì tó pọ̀ káàkiri àgbáyé."', 'en': '"This work was recently published in ""Nature Communications,"" and my team and I received an overwhelming response from around the world."'}
{'yo': 'Kò sí ẹnìkẹ́ni nínu ikọ̀ mi tó lè sọ àsọtẹ́lẹ̀ irú àwọn èsì yìí.', 'en': 'Nobody on my team could have predicted this sort of response.'}
{'yo': 'Ó jọ bí ẹni pé a ti kan ǹkan.', 'en': 'We seem to have struck a nerve.'}

{'yo': 'Wíwo ẹ̀yìn, mo ń dúpé gidi gan fún àwọn èsì gidi tí mo rí gbà, kìí ṣe láti ẹ̀ka ètò-ẹ̀kọ́ nìkan, ṣùgbọ́n láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn aláìsàn, àti àwọn ènìyàn káàkiri àgbáyé tí ààrùn burúkú yìí ń bájà.', 'en': 'Looking back, I am extremely grateful for the positive response that I received, not only from academia, but also patients, and people around the world affected by this terrible disease.'}

{'yo': 'Bí mo ṣe ń nípa lóri àṣeyọrí tí mo bá pàdé pẹ̀lu ipa Hasini, mo tún padà wá bá àwọn ènìyàn tí mo ní ànfàní láti ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú.', 'en': "As I reflect on this success I've encountered with the Hasini effect, I keep coming back to the people that I was fortunate enough to work with."}

{'yo': 'Àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tí wọn ò tíì kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ jáde tí wọ́n fi agbára àkàndá ènìyàn hàn nípasẹ̀ iṣẹ́ takun-takun àti ìfọkànsin wọn.', 'en': 'The undergraduate students who demonstrated superhuman powers through their hard work and dedication.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́-jáde àti àwọn ọ̀mọ̀wé, àwọn akẹgbẹ́ mi olùkọ̀yà, tí wọ́n kọ́ mi ní àwọn ọgbọ́n tuntun tí wọ́n sì ríi dájú pé mo wà lójú ọ̀nà.', 'en': 'The graduate students and the postdoctoral fellows, my fellow Avengers, who taught me new techniques and always made sure I stayed on track.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ọ̀jọ̀gọ́n, àwọn Yoda àti Obi-Wan Kenobid mi, tí wọ́n mú ìmọ òjìni wọn wá láti jẹ́ kí iṣẹ́ yìí di ǹkan tó dà lónì.', 'en': 'The professors, my Yodas and my Obi-Wan Kenobis, who brought their expertise into making this work into what it is today.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ alátìlẹyìn, àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ àti ẹbí, àwọn ẹnìyàn tí wọ́n gbé orí mi sókè, tí wọn ò jẹ́ ká jákàn lóri ìgbìyànjú ìpinnu wa.', 'en': 'The support staff, the friends and family, people who lifted our spirits, and never let us give up on our ambitious endeavors.'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn kẹ́sẹ́ tó dára jù tí a lè bèrè fún.', 'en': 'The best kind of sidekicks we could have asked for.'}
{'yo': 'Ó gba abúlé kan láti bá mi ṣàyẹ̀wo ìtànká.', 'en': 'It took a village to help me study metastasis.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ gbàmígbọ́, láìsí abúlé mi, mi ò ní sí níbí.', 'en': "And believe me, without my village, I wouldn't be here."}

{'yo': 'Lónì, ikọ̀ wa ti dàgbà, a sì ń lo ipa Hasini láti pèse àkójọpọ̀ òògùn tó máa kojú ìdàgbàsókè kókó àti ìtànká.', 'en': 'Today, our team has grown, and we are using the Hasini effect to develop combination therapies that will effectively target tumor growth and metastases.'}

{'yo': 'À ń ṣe èto òògun atako-jẹjẹrẹ, láti ṣe àdínkù oró àti láti mú àdínkù bá ìtako òògùn.', 'en': 'We are engineering new anticancer therapeutics, to limit toxicity and to reduce drug resistance.'}

{'yo': 'A ń sè àwọn ètò tí yóò nípa tí yóò sì ṣe ìrànwọ́ fún ìdàgbàsóke ìwádìí ajẹmọ́-ìtọ́jú lára ènìyàn dáadáa.', 'en': 'And we are developing groundbreaking systems that will help for the development of better human clinical trials.'}

{'yo': 'Ó múnú mi dùn láti ronú wí pé gbogbo èyí, iṣẹ́ aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ tí mò ń ṣiṣẹ tọ̀ - àti ìjẹ́ òótọ́ pé mo dúró níbí, báa yín sọ́rọ̀ lónì -- gbogbo rẹ̀ wá látara èrò kékeré tí mo ní nígbà tí mo jókò lẹ́yìn ní sẹminá nígbà tí mo wà lọ́mọ ogún ọdún.', 'en': "It blows my mind to think that all this, the incredible work that I'm pursuing -- and the fact that I'm standing here, talking to you today -- all came from this tiny idea that I had when I was sitting at the back of a seminar when I was just 20 years old."}

{'yo': 'Mo mọ ìyẹn nísinyìí, mo wà lóri ìrìn-àjò aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ yìí tó fún mi ní ànfàní láti ṣiṣẹ́ tọ iṣẹ́ tí mo nífẹ̀ sí, àti ǹkan tó máa ń bọ́ ìmọ̀ mi lójoojúmọ́.', 'en': 'I recognize that right now, I am on this incredible journey that allows me to pursue work that I am extremely passionate about, and something that feeds my curiosity on a daily basis.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n mo gbọ́dọ̀ sọ pé, èyí tí mo fẹ́ràn jù nínu gbogbo èyìí -- yàtọ̀ sí, bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, wíwà níbí, bí báa yín sọ́rọ̀, lónì -- ni pé mo ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú oríṣiríṣi ẹ̀yà ènìyàn, tí wọ́n jẹ́ kí iṣẹ́ mi lágbára, kó dára kó sì rọrùn púpọ̀.', 'en': 'But I have to say, my favorite part of all of this -- other than, of course, being here, talking to you, today -- is the fact that I get to work with a diverse group of people, who make my work stronger, better and just so much more fun.'}
{'yo': 'Torí èléyìí, mo ní láti sọ wí pé àjọṣepọ̀ ni agbára àkàndá-ènìyàn tí mo fẹ́ràn jù.', 'en': 'And because of this, I have to say that collaboration is my favorite superhuman power.'}
{'yo': 'Nkan tí mo sì fẹ́ràn nípa agbára yìí ni wí pé èmi nìkan kọ́ ni mo ní i.', 'en': "And what I love about this power is that it's not unique to me."}
{'yo': 'Ó wà nínu gbogbo wa.', 'en': "It's within all of us."}

{'yo': 'Iṣẹ́ mi fi hàn pé kódà àwọn hóró ààrun jẹjẹrẹ má ń lo àjọṣepọ̀ láti kógun ja àgọ-ara wa àti láti fọ́n ìbínú wọn ká.', 'en': 'My work shows that even cancer cells use collaboration to invade our bodies and spread their wrath.'}

{'yo': 'Fún àwa ènìyàn, agbára-àkàndá náà ti pèse àwọn àwárí aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ ní ẹ̀ka ìmọ̀-ìṣègùn àti ìmọ̀-ìjìnlẹ̀.', 'en': 'For us humans, it is a superpower that has produced incredible discoveries in the medical and scientific field.'}

{'yo': 'Agbára-àkàndá náà ni gbogbo wá lè kọjú sí láti ṣe kóríyá fún wa láti ṣe ǹkan tó tóbi ju àwa fúnra wa lọ, ìyẹn yóò sì ràn wá lọ́wọ́ láti sọ ilé-ayé di àyè tó dára.', 'en': 'And it is the superpower that we can all turn to to inspire us to create something bigger than ourselves, that will help make the world a better place.'}
{'yo': 'Àjọṣepọ̀ ni agbára-àkàndá tí mo kọjú sí, láti bá mi jagún ààrun jẹjẹrẹ.', 'en': 'Collaboration is the superpower that I turn to, to help me fight cancer.'}
{'yo': 'Mo dẹ̀ ní ìdánilójú pé pẹ̀lú àjọṣepọ̀ tó tọ́, a máa ṣègun ààrùn burúkú yìí.', 'en': 'And I am confident that with the right collaborations, we will beat this terrible disease.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ṣeun.', 'en': 'Thank you.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ lè máa dókówò sí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ sìgá láìmọ̀.', 'en': 'You may be accidentally investing in cigarette companies'}
{'yo': 'Ní ọdún 2001, mo jẹ́ oníṣégùn-òyìnbó tuntun àyọ́rán, tó ń dán, tó ń gbérò láti gba ayé là.', 'en': 'In 2001, I was a brand new, shiny doctor, planning to save the world.'}
{'yo': 'Iṣẹ́ mi àkọ́kọ́ ni ṣíṣé iṣẹ́ fún oṣù mẹ́ta ní ẹ̀ka ààrun jẹjẹrẹ ẹ̀dọ̀fóró.', 'en': 'My first job was working for three months on a lung cancer unit.'}

{'yo': 'Ó fẹ́rẹ̀ jẹ́ wí pé gbogbo aláìsàn mi ni wọ́n ń mu sìgá tàbí ti mu sìgá rí, ọ̀pọ wọn sì ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí mu sìgá nígbà tí wọ́n wà lọ́mọdé tàbí láti bíi ọmọdún mẹ́tàlá.', 'en': 'Nearly all of my patients were smokers or ex-smokers, and most of them had started smoking when they were children or in their early teens.'}

{'yo': 'Pẹ̀lu pé wọ́n ń gbé ní orílẹ̀-ède tó rẹwà, tó rọrọ̀, pẹ̀lú ànfàní sí àwọn òògùn tó lágbára jù, ó fẹ́rẹ̀ jẹ́ wí pé ìkànkan gbogbo àwọn aláìsàn mi ni wọ́n kú tán.', 'en': 'And despite living in a beautiful, wealthy country, with access to the most sophisticated medicines, nearly every single one of my patients died.'}

{'yo': 'Gbogbo ènìyàn ló mọ̀ wí pé kùkúyè ò dára, ṣùgbọ́n tí ẹ bá rí ipa rẹ̀ tààrà, tọ́jọ́ ń gorí ọjọ́, ó máa ń fi ipa tó kẹnú sílẹ̀.', 'en': 'Everyone knows tobacco is bad, but when you see the impact firsthand, day-by-day, it leaves a very deep impression.'}
{'yo': 'Lẹ́yìn ọdún mẹ́wà, onímọ̀ nípa ìtàn ikókó ni mí, tó mọ̀ nípa ìnira tí kùkúyè ń fà.', 'en': "Ten years later, I'm a radiation oncologist, fully aware of the suffering caused by tobacco."}

{'yo': 'Mo jókòó sí ilé-oúnjẹ ilé-ìwòsàn, mò ń ṣe ìpàdé mi àkọ́kọ́ pẹ̀lú aṣojú kan láti ilé-iṣẹ́ owó-ìfẹ̀yìntì mi.', 'en': "I'm sitting at the hospital cafeteria, having my first ever meeting with a representative from my superannuation fund."}
{'yo': 'Ó múnú mi dùn, ó dámi lójú pé ẹ lè wòye rẹ̀.', 'en': "It was thrilling, I'm sure you can imagine."}
{'yo': 'Ó sọ fún mi pé mo wà ní ẹ̀yàn ìpìlẹ̀.', 'en': "He tells me I'm in the default option."}
{'yo': '"Mo ní, ""Ẹ̀yàn?"', 'en': '"And I said, ""Option?"'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé ìyẹn túmọ̀ sí wí pé àwọn ànfàní yíyàn míràn tún wà?', 'en': 'Does that mean there are other options?'}

{'yo': '"Ó wò mí, ó yí ojú rẹ̀, ó sì wí pé, ""yíyàn ìdáábò bo àwùjọ kan báyìí wà fún àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n ní ìṣòro ìdókówò nínú ìwa-kùsà, ọtí-líle tàbí kùkúyè."', 'en': '"He looked at me, rolled his eyes, and said, ""Well, there is this one greenie option for people who have a problem with investing in mining, alcohol or tobacco."'}
{'yo': '"Mo ní, ""Ǹjẹ́ o dárúkọ kùkúyè?"', 'en': '"I said, ""Did you just say tobacco?"'}
{'yo': 'Ó ní, bẹ́ẹ̀ ni.', 'en': '"He said, ""Yes."'}
{'yo': '"Mo ni, ""báyìí, ṣé ò ń sọ fúnmi wí pé mò ń dókówò nínu kùkúyè lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí?"', 'en': '"I said, ""So, are you telling me I\'m currently investing in tobacco?"'}
{'yo': '"Ó ní, ""oh, bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, gbogbo ènìyàn sì ni."', 'en': '"And he said, ""Oh, yes, everyone is."'}
{'yo': 'Tí o bá dókówò ní ilé-iṣẹ́ kan, o ti ní díẹ̀ lára ilé-iṣẹ́ yẹn.', 'en': 'When you invest in a company, you own part of that company.'}
{'yo': 'O fẹ́ kí ilé-iṣẹ́ yẹn gbòòrò kó ṣe àṣeyọrí kó sì gbèrú.', 'en': 'You want that company to grow and succeed and thrive.'}

{'yo': 'O fẹ́ kí ilé-iṣẹ́ yẹn fa ojú àwọn oníbàárà tuntun mọ́ra, o fẹ́ kí ilé-iṣẹ́ yẹn ta ọ̀pọ̀ nínu àwọn èròjà rẹ̀.', 'en': 'You want that company to attract new customers, you want that company to sell more of its products.'}
{'yo': 'Tí ó bá sì jẹ́ ti kùkúyè, mi ò lè ronú ǹkankan tí mo fẹ́ tó yátọ̀.', 'en': "And when it comes to tobacco, I couldn't think of anything that I wanted less."}

{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, mo mọ̀ wí pé ẹnikan tó dúró lóri àmì pupa yìí nìkan ni ẹ̀ ń rí, lórí ìtàgé ńlá yìí.', 'en': 'Now, I know you can only see one person standing here on this big red dot, on this enormous stage.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n dípo bẹ́ẹ̀, màá fẹ́ kí ẹ rò ó wí pé ẹ̀ ń wo mílíọ́nù méje ènìyàn tí wọ́n fúnpò ní ẹ̀gbẹ́ mi níbí lónì.', 'en': "But instead, I would like you to imagine that you're looking at seven million people crammed up here beside me today."}
{'yo': 'Mílíọ́nù méje ènìyàn káàkirí àgbáyé ti kú nítorí kùkúyè ní ọdún tó kọjá nìkan.', 'en': 'Seven million people across the world have died as a result of tobacco in the past year alone.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ kọ̀ rò ó wò, tí wọ́n bá ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ilé-iṣẹ́ tuntun àyánrán kan lónì, ní ìparí oṣù Òkudù tó ń bọ̀, àwọn èròja ilé-iṣẹ́ yẹn ti pa mílíọ́nù méje ènìyàn.', 'en': "Just imagine, if a brand new industry were launched today, and by the end of next June, that industry's products had killed seven million people."}
{'yo': 'Ṣé ìkankan nínu wa máa dókówò ní ilé-iṣẹ́ tuntun, aṣekúpani yẹn?', 'en': 'Would any of us invest in that new, deadly industry?'}

{'yo': 'Kùkúyè jẹ́ ọ̀kan nínú àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ tó ń fẹ́ àmójútó jù ní àsìkò wa, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ wa sì lọ́wọ́ nínú wàhálà náà ju bóṣe yéwa lọ.', 'en': 'Tobacco is one of the most pressing global issues of our time, and most of us are far more complicit in the problem than we may realize.'}

{'yo': 'Nítorí náà, aṣojú owó ńlá ṣàlàyé fún mi wí pé màá rí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè ní àyẹ̀ ìpín-ìdókówò ilẹ̀-òkèrè mi.', 'en': 'So, the super fund representative explained to me that tobacco companies would be found in the international shares portion of my portfolio.'}
{'yo': '"Mo bi í léérè, ""ó dáa, ìpín-ìkókówò ilẹ̀-òkèrè wo ni mo ni?"', 'en': '"So I asked him, ""Well, which international shares do I have?"'}

{'yo': '""" Ó kàn sí mi lẹ́yìn òsẹ̀ méjì pẹ̀lú ìwé yìí: ìdókówò mi àkọ́kọ́ nínú ìpín ìdókówò ilẹ̀-òkèrè jẹ́ ti British America Tobacco."', 'en': 'He got back to me two weeks later with this list: my number one holding in international shares was British American Tobacco.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì, Imperial Tobacco.', 'en': 'Number two, Imperial Tobacco.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kẹ́rin, Philip Morris.', 'en': 'Number four, Philip Morris.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹlẹ́ẹ̀karùn, ilé-isẹ́ Swedish Match.', 'en': 'And number five, the Swedish Match company.'}

{'yo': 'Mẹ́rin nínú àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ márùn tó wà lókè ténté jẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè, ìdókówò tèmi, onímọ̀ nípa ààrun jẹjẹrẹ.', 'en': 'Four of the top five companies were tobacco companies, my investments, an oncologist.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà náà ni mo mọ̀ wí pé kìí ṣe èmi nìkan.', 'en': "And then I realized it wasn't just me."}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ owó ńlá mi ni.', 'en': 'It was all members of my super fund.'}
{'yo': 'Nígbà náà ni mo mọ̀ wí pé kìí ṣe owó ńlá mi nìkan, gbogbo wọn ni.', 'en': "And then I realized it wasn't just my super fund, it was all of them."}

{'yo': 'Nígbà náà ni mo mọ̀, kìí ṣe ilé-iṣẹ́ owó ìfẹ̀yìntì nìkan, àwọn ilé-ìfowópamọ́, abánidójútòfò àti àwọn alámòjútó owó.', 'en': "And then I realized, it wasn't just superannuation funds, it was banks, insurers and fund managers."}
{'yo': 'Mo wá mọ̀ wí pé kìí ṣe orílẹ̀-ède Australia nìkan.', 'en': "And then I realized it wasn't just Australia."}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo ẹ̀ka owó lágbàyé ni, wọ́n sopọ̀ pátápátá mọ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè.', 'en': 'It was the entire global finance sector, completely tangled up with the tobacco industry.'}
{'yo': 'Ilé-iṣẹ́ tó ń pèsè èròjà tó ń pa mílíọ́nù méje ènìyàn lọ́dọọdún.', 'en': 'The industry that makes products that kill seven million people every year.'}

{'yo': 'Mo bẹ̀rẹ̀ síní jírórò nípa ọ̀rọ̀ náà pẹ̀lú ilé-iṣẹ́ owó-ìfẹ̀yìntì mi, mo dẹ̀ ti ń sọ ọ́ látígbà náà.', 'en': "So I started discussing the issue with my superannuation fund, and I've been discussing it ever since."}
{'yo': 'Àwọn adarí owó ní oríṣiríṣi ìpeníjà láti kojú, lásíkò yìí.', 'en': 'Finance leaders have many challenging issues to deal with, these days.'}

{'yo': 'Mo dá a lábà pé kí wọ́n lo ètò-ìgbésẹ̀ kan tí yóò sọ ìdí tí ó fi bá ìrònú mu láti gbé ìgbésẹ̀ tó le lóri kùkúyè.', 'en': 'So I suggest they adopt a framework that clearly articulates why it is reasonable to take a strong position on tobacco.'}

{'yo': 'Mo dá a lábà pé kí àwọn adarí bérè àpapọ̀ ìbéérè mẹ́ta nípa àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n lè ti kó owóo wa sí.', 'en': 'I suggest finance leaders ask a suite of three questions of any company in which they might invest our money.'}
{'yo': 'Ìbéérè àkọ́kọ́: Ǹjẹ́ èròjà tí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ń pèsè lè di lílò láìséwu?', 'en': 'Question one: Can the product made by the company be used safely?'}
{'yo': '"""Rárá"" ni ìdáhùn fún àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè."', 'en': 'No is the answer for tobacco companies.'}
{'yo': 'Òdo nìkan ni iye àìléwu sìgá fún ọmọ ènìyàn.', 'en': 'Zero is the only safe number of cigarettes for a human being.'}
{'yo': 'Kò lè ju dúdú àti funfun lọ.', 'en': 'It could not be more black and white.'}

{'yo': 'Ìbéérè kejì: Ǹjẹ́ wàhálà tí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ń dá sílẹ̀ nípa ní ìpele àgbáyé débi pé ó wà lábẹ́ àdéhùn tàbí àpérò UN?', 'en': 'Question two: Is the problem caused by the company so significant on a global level that it is subject to a UN treaty or convention?'}
{'yo': '"""Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni"" ni ìdáhùn fún kùkúyè."', 'en': 'Yes is the answer for tobacco.'}
{'yo': 'Lóòtọ́ àdéhùn kùkúyè UN kan wà tí àwọn orílẹ̀-ède bi ọgọ́sàn ti fọwọ́ sí.', 'en': 'Indeed there is a UN tobacco treaty that has been ratified by 180 countries.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ṣẹ̀da àdéhùn náà nítorí ipa ewu kùkúyè lágbàyé.', 'en': 'The treaty was created because of the catastrophic global impact of tobacco.'}

{'yo': 'Àsọtẹ́lẹ̀ lọ́wọ́ ni wí pé orílẹ̀-èdè àgbáyé ń wà lójú ọ̀nà fún bílíọ́nù kan ikú tó tan mọ́ kùkúyè ní ọ̀rún odún yìí.', 'en': 'The current forecast is that the world is on track for one billion tobacco-related deaths this century.'}
{'yo': 'Bílíọ́nù ikú kan.', 'en': 'One billion deaths.'}
{'yo': 'Bílíọ́nù méje péré niwa.', 'en': "There's only seven billion of us."}
{'yo': 'Ìbéérè kẹ́ta tan mọ́ èro ìsọ̀rọ̀-papọ̀.', 'en': 'Question three relates to the concept of engagement.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ owó ni wọ́n fẹ́ di ọmọ-ìlú gidi lóòtó.', 'en': 'Many financial organizations genuinely want to be good corporate citizens.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n fẹ́ lo agbára ìpín-ìdókówò wọn láti jókòó pẹ̀lú àoẉn ilé-iṣẹ́, bá wọn sọ̀rọ̀, kí wọ́n sì ṣe ìwúrí fún wọn láti ṣe ǹkan gidi.', 'en': 'They want to use their shareholder power to sit down with companies, engage with them, and encourage them to do better things.'}
{'yo': 'Ìbéérè náà ni wí pé: Ǹjẹ́ sísọ́rọ̀ papọ̀ pẹ̀lú ilé-iṣẹ́ náà lè jẹ́ àtẹ̀gùn fún àyípadà?', 'en': 'So the question is: Can engagement with the company be an effective lever for change?'}
{'yo': '"""Rárá"" ni ìdáhùn fún àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè."', 'en': 'No is the answer for tobacco companies.'}
{'yo': 'Sísọ́rọ̀ papọ̀ pẹ̀lú ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè ò le so èso rere.', 'en': 'Engagement with the tobacco industry is futile.'}
{'yo': 'Àbájáde tó ṣe é gbà ni tí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè bá dáwo ́òwò ìpìlẹ wọn gangan dúró.', 'en': 'The only acceptable outcome would be if tobacco companies ceased their primary business.'}
{'yo': 'Lóòtọ́, sísọ́rọ̀ papọ̀ pẹ̀lú ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè ò tíì yọrí sí àdínkù ikú ọmọ ènìyàn rí.', 'en': 'In fact, engagement with the tobacco industry has never led to less human death.'}

{'yo': 'Tí a bá wo ètò-ìgbésẹ̀ yẹn, ìbéérè tó rọrùn mẹ́ta, a lè ri wí pé ó bá ìrònú mu ó sì ṣe é dúró tì láti gbé ìgbésẹ̀ alágbára ká sì yọ ìdókówò nínu ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè kúrò.', 'en': 'When we consider that framework, three simple questions, we can see that is reasonable and defensible to take a strong position and exclude investment in the tobacco industry.'}

{'yo': 'Ní àfikún sí àdéhùn kùkúyè UN, lóòtọ́, àdéhùn àgbáyé mìíràn wà tó pè fún gbígbé ìgbésẹ̀ lóri kùkúyè.', 'en': 'In addition to the UN tobacco treaty, there is, in fact, another global treaty that demands that we act on tobacco.'}
{'yo': 'Ní ọdún 2015, UN gba àwọn ìpinnu ìdàgbàsókè alálòpẹ́ wọlé.', 'en': 'In 2015, the UN adopted the Sustainable Development Goals.'}

{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, à ń sọ̀rọ̀ nípa kùkúyè, mo dè mọ̀ pé e máa fò tààrà sí ẹléèkẹ́ta ni: ìlera tó dára àti wíwà lálàáfíà.', 'en': "Now, we're talking about tobacco, and I know you're going to jump straight to number three: good health and well-being."}

{'yo': 'Lóòtọ́, ìrólágbára òfin tó ń darí kùkúyè ṣe pàtàkì tí a bá fẹ́ kí ìpinnu yẹn di ṣíṣe.', 'en': "And indeed, ramping up tobacco control regulation is essential if we're going to achieve that goal."}

{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀, ẹ fi ojú inú wò ó díẹ̀ si, ẹ ó sì ri wí pé ìpinnu mẹ́tàlá nínu mẹ́tà-dín-lógún ò lè di ṣíṣe àyàfi tí àtúntò tó lágbára bá débá ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè.', 'en': 'However, look a bit more deeply, and you will find that 13 of the 17 goals cannot be achieved unless there is a major shake-up of the tobacco industry.'}
{'yo': 'Fún èmi, ìpinnu kẹtà-dín-lógún ni mo fẹ́ràn jù: àjọṣepọ̀ fún ìpinnu náà.', 'en': 'Personally, my favorite goal is number 17: partnerships for the goals.'}

{'yo': 'Lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí, a ní gbogbo ẹ̀ka ìlera àgbáyé tí wọ́n ń ṣe gbogbo ǹkan tí wọ́n lè ṣe láti ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn aláìsàn tí wọ́n ńjẹ̀ rora ìpadàbọ kùkúyè.', 'en': 'At present, we have the entire global health sector doing everything it can to help the tidal wave of patients suffering as a result of tobacco.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n lẹ́yìn tí a ti sọ èyí, ní ọdún tó lọ nìkan, mílíọ́nù méje ènìyàn ti kú, kedere ni, ìyen ò tó.', 'en': 'But that said, in the past year alone, seven million people have died, so clearly, that is not enough.'}

{'yo': 'A ní àwọn ìjọba tí wọ́n tò sẹ́yìn kùkúyè, ọgọ́sàn nínu wọn, tí wọ́n ń gbìyànjú láti ṣàmúlò ìpèsè àdéhun kùkúyè UN.', 'en': 'We also have governments aligned on tobacco, 180 of them, busily trying to implement the provisions of the UN tobacco treaty.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ìyẹn, bákan náà, kò tó.', 'en': 'But that, too, is not enough.'}

{'yo': 'Tí ẹ̀ka owó lágbàyé bá tẹ̀síwájú láti máa yá àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè lówó, láti dókówò nínu kùkúyè, tó sì ń gbìyànjú láti jèrè lára ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè, à ń ṣiṣẹ́ tako arawa ni.', 'en': 'If the global finance sector continues to lend money to tobacco companies, to invest in tobacco companies, and to strive to profit from tobacco companies, we are working against each other.'}

{'yo': '"Ní báyìí, tí a bá fẹ́ ṣe ìdíwọ́ fún ǹkan tí àwọn oníṣégùn-òyìnbó pè ní ""àjàkálẹ̀ ààrun kùkúyè lágbàyé,"" a nílò kí gbogbo ẹka láwùjọ dúró fẹ̀gbẹ́-kẹ́gbẹ̀ kí wọ́n wà lára ìyanjú náà."', 'en': '"Now, if we are going to disrupt what doctors call ""the global tobacco epidemic,"" we need every sector of society to stand side by side and be part of the solution."'}
{'yo': 'Mò ń pe gbogbo adarí ẹ̀ka owó láti ṣe àmúlò ètò-ìgbésẹ̀ kan láti gbógun ti ọ̀rọ̀ ńlá yìí.', 'en': 'So I call on finance leaders to implement a framework to deal with sensitive issues.'}
{'yo': 'Mo dẹ̀ ń kesí wọn láti ṣiṣẹ́ tọ àwọn àpérò àgbáyé.', 'en': 'And I call on them to uphold global conventions.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ní àfikún, ewu ìṣòwò wà níbẹ̀.', 'en': 'But in addition, there are business risks.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ewu owó aláìlábúlà, tó níṣe pẹ̀lú ìdókówò ní ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè fún ìgbà pípẹ́, mo sì ń rọ àwọn adarí ẹ̀ka-owó láti bojú wò wọ́n.', 'en': 'Pure financial risks, associated with being invested in the tobacco industry over the long term, and I ask finance leaders to consider them.'}

{'yo': 'Ewu àkọ́kọ́ ni wí pé àwọn ènìyàn díẹ̀díẹ̀ ni yóò ma mu sìgá, gẹ́gẹ́ bi àbájáde ṣíṣe àfikún òfin kùkúyè.', 'en': 'The first risk is that fewer and fewer people will smoke, as a result of increasing tobacco regulation.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n máa ń kẹ́fín òfin, òfin máa ń ṣe àdínkù ìlo rẹ̀, a sì ní ọgọ́sàn (180) orílẹ̀-èdè tí wọ́n ṣetán láti ṣe ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ òfin.', 'en': 'Regulation gets noticed, regulation reduces consumption, and we have 180 countries committed to more regulation.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ jẹ́ ká sọ nípa ìgbésẹ̀ òfin àti ewu tó lè fà.', 'en': "Let's talk about litigation and the risk that presents."}
{'yo': 'Lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí, àto òwo ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè ni à ń takò.', 'en': "At present, it's the business model of the tobacco industry that is being challenged."}
{'yo': 'Lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí, ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè ń ṣe àyọkúrò gbogbo ewu ìlera tó tan mọ́ kùkúyè.', 'en': 'Currently, the tobacco industry externalizes all of the health costs associated with tobacco.'}
{'yo': 'Ìjọbá ń san, àwùjọ ń san, ìwọ́ ń san, èmí ń san.', 'en': 'Governments pay, communities pay, you pay, I pay.'}

{'yo': 'Ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè ń ṣe àyọkúrò gbogbo ìnáwò yìí, pẹ̀lú apapọ̀ tírílíọ́nù kan dọ́là orílẹ̀-ède US lọ́dún kànkan.', 'en': 'The tobacco industry externalizes all those costs, with an estimated one trillion US dollars per year.'}
{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀ wọ́n ń ṣe àpasílé àti àdáni àwọn èrè.', 'en': 'Yet they internalize and privatize the profits.'}

{'yo': 'Ní ọdún 2015, ní agbègbe Quebec, ilé-ẹjọ́ pinnu pé ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè ni wọ́n ṣe okùnfa àwọn ìnáwó ìlera wọ̀nyẹn, wọ́n sì pàṣẹ fún wọn láti san bílíọ́nù mẹ́ẹ̀dógún dọ́là orílẹ̀-ède US.', 'en': 'In 2015, in Quebec province, the courts determined that the tobacco industry was indeed responsible for those health costs, and ordered them to pay 15 billion US dollars.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹjọ́ yẹn wà ní ilé-ẹjọ́ kò tẹ́milọ́rùn.', 'en': 'That case is under appeal.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ó ń bèrè ìbérè pé, kí ló dé tí ìkankan nínu wa, ní èyíkéyìí orílẹ̀-èdè, máa sanwó fún ewu ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè?', 'en': 'But it begs the question, why should any of us, in any country, be paying for the costs of the tobacco industry?'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ jẹ́ ká tẹ̀síwájú lọ sí okùn ìtajà àti ewu tó wà níbẹ̀.', 'en': "Let's move on to supply chain and the risk there."}
{'yo': 'Kò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ jẹ́ mímọ̀ wí pé ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè gbára lé fífi ọmọ ṣọ̀wo ẹrú.', 'en': 'It is not well known that the tobacco industry significantly relies on child labor.'}

{'yo': '"Ní oṣù Ẹrẹnà ọdún 2017, Àjọ àwọn Òṣìṣẹ́ Lágbàyé ṣe àgbéjáde ìjábọ̀ kan tó sọ wí pé: ""Ní àwọn agbègbè tí wọ́n ti ń gbin kùkúyè, fífi ọmọ ṣọ̀wo ẹrú wọ́pọ̀."', 'en': '"In March 2017, the International Labour Organization issued a report which stated: ""In tobacco-growing communities, child labor is rampant."'}

{'yo': '""" Ẹ̀ka òṣìṣẹ́ orílẹ̀-ède US lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí ti ka àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè mẹ́rín-dìn-lógún tí wọ́n ń lo àwọn ọmọdé láti pèse ewé kùkúyè."', 'en': 'The US Department of Labor currently lists 16 countries that use children to produce tobacco leaf.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣíṣe àyèwò okùn ìtajà fínífíní lágbára, ìyẹn ò sì lè tẹ̀síwájú láti máa fo àkíyèsi gbogbogbò.', 'en': 'Scrutiny of supply chains is intensifying, and that cannot continue to escape public attention.'}

{'yo': 'Lákòtán, ewu ìjẹ́-ọmọlúwàbí wà níbẹ̀ láti bojúwò fún àwọn ènìyàn àti ilé-iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n ń tẹ̀síwájú láti máa ní àjọṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè.', 'en': 'Finally, there is also reputation risk to consider for individuals and organizations that continue to maintain an affiliation with the tobacco industry.'}

{'yo': 'Nínú àìmọye iṣẹ́-ìwádì, ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè ló gba ipò gẹ́gẹ́ bi ilé-iṣẹ́ tí ijẹ́-ọmọlúwàbí rẹ̀ kéré jùlọ.', 'en': "In countless surveys, the tobacco industry ranks as the world's least reputable industry."}
{'yo': 'Ẹ jẹ́ ká kọ̀ wo ipa rẹ̀ lára àwọn ọmọdé.', 'en': "Let's just look at the impact on children."}

{'yo': 'Káàkiri àgbáyé, ní ọjọ́ kánkan, wọ́n ṣẹ́ ẹ wí pé ẹgbẹ̀rún lọ́na ọgọ́rùn ọmọ ní wọ́n máa ń bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí mu kùkúyè.', 'en': 'Globally, every single day, it is estimated that 100,000 children start smoking.'}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹ́n jẹ́ iye ọmọ tí yóò kún inú pápá-ìṣeré bọ́ọ́lù aláfigigbá Melbourne.', 'en': "That's enough children to fit inside the Melbourne Cricket Ground."}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ọmọ wọ̀nyẹn ni wọ́n wá láti àwọn àwùjọ tó kúṣẹ̀ẹ́ jùlọ lóri ilẹ̀-eèpẹ̀.', 'en': 'And most of those children are from the poorest communities on earth.'}

{'yo': 'Ní orílẹ̀-èdè Australia níbí, àròpin ọjọ́-orí tí àwọn ènìyàn ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ síní mu kùkúyè ni ọdún mẹ́rìn-dín-lógún àti oṣù méjì.', 'en': 'Here in Australia, the average age that people start smoking is 16 years and two months.'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n kéré púpọ̀ lójú mi, ṣùgbọ́n ǹkan tó burú jù níbí ni wí pé a ò ní dátà láti gbogbo orílẹ̀-èdè tó wà lóri ilẹ̀-eèpẹ̀, a gbàgbọ́ wí pé ọjọ́-orí tó dágbà jùlọ nìyẹn.', 'en': "They look pretty young to me, but the worst thing here is that while we don't have data from every country on earth, we believe that is the oldest age."}
{'yo': 'Ní gbogbo àyè mìíràn ó kéré.', 'en': 'Everywhere else is younger.'}
{'yo': 'Níbáyì fún ìròyin ayọ̀.', 'en': 'Now for the good news.'}
{'yo': 'Ǹkan ti ń yátọ̀.', 'en': 'Things are changing.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀ka owó náà ti ń darapọ̀.', 'en': 'The finance sector is coming to the party.'}

{'yo': 'Lẹ́yin bí ẹgbẹ̀rún méjì ìpàdé pẹ̀lú àwọn adarí ẹ̀ka-owó, ní ilé-ìjẹun Melbourne àti Sydney àti London àti Paris àti New York àti káàkiri àgbáyé, agbára, yíyẹ̀ kúrò níbi ìdókówò nínu ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè, ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ síní gbéra.', 'en': 'After around 2,000 meetings with finance leaders, primarily in the caf├®s of Melbourne and Sydney and London and Paris and New York and all across the globe, momentum, moving away from investment in the tobacco industry, is starting to snowball.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn adarí ẹ̀ka-owó ti mọ̀ nígbà tí wọ́n pésè èrí fún wọn, àti lọ́pọ̀, wọ́n fẹ́ darapọ̀ mọ́ ònà-àbáyọ náà.', 'en': "Finance leaders are alarmed when they're presented with the facts, and overwhelmingly, they want to be part of the solution."}

{'yo': 'Níbí, ní orílẹ̀-ède Australia, a ti ní mílíọ́nù mẹ́wà lé àwọn apò ifówópamọ́ owó-ìfẹ̀yìntì tí kò ní kùkúyè.', 'en': 'Here, in Australia, we now have 10,636,101 superannuation accounts that are tobacco-free.'}
{'yo': 'Ìyẹn ni tèmi, lápá kan.', 'en': 'That one is mine, by the way.'}

{'yo': '"Iṣẹ́ ṣì pọ̀ láti ṣe, ṣùgbọ́n mo ti rí bí ọ̀rọ̀ náà ṣe ń lọ láti ""ṣé kí ó má sì kùkúyè mọ́ ni? ""sí ""kí ló dé tí a ò ṣe tíì ṣe é?"', 'en': '"There is still a lot of work to be done, but I\'ve watched the conversation go from ""Should we go tobacco-free? to Why haven\'t we done it yet?"'}

{'yo': '""" Ní ọdún tó kọjá nìkan, àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ kòsí-kùkúyè ti di ṣíṣe ní àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ owó tí wọ́n ń léwájú ní àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè mẹ́jọ ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀."', 'en': 'In the past year alone, major tobacco-free moves have been made by leading financial organizations in eight different countries.'}

{'yo': 'Ní orílẹ̀-ède Australia, New Zealand, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, France, Ireland àti USA.', 'en': 'In Australia, New Zealand, the Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, France, Ireland and the USA.'}

{'yo': 'Látọ́dọ̀ àwọn olómìnira owó ìrànwọ́, àwọn alámojútó owó, àwọn owó-ìfẹ̀yìntì, ilé-ìfowopamọ́, abáni-dójútófò àti atún-báni-dójútófò.', 'en': 'By sovereign wealth funds, fund managers, pension funds, banks, insurers and reinsurers.'}

{'yo': 'Láti ìgbà tí àpò-ìfowópamọ́ tí kò ní kùkúyè ti bẹ̀rẹ̀, ó lé ní bílíọ́nù mẹ́fà dọ́là ni wọ́n ti darí kúrò nínu ìdókówò ní ilé-iṣẹ́ kùkúyè.', 'en': 'Since tobacco-free portfolios began, more than six billion dollars has been redirected away from investment in the tobacco industry.'}
{'yo': 'Àgbéyẹ́wò náà dára wọ́n sì jẹ́wọ́ rẹ̀ lóòtọ́.', 'en': 'The case study is well and truly proven.'}

{'yo': '"Nígbà tí à ń ṣe ìkéde kòsí-kùkúyè ní oṣù Ẹ̀rẹnà odún yìí, aláṣe àti olùdarí AMP Capital sọ wí pé, ""a ò ṣetán láti ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ àdápadà èrè ìdókówò tí yóò pa àwùjọ lára lọ́nà kọnà."', 'en': '"When making the tobacco-free announcement in March this year, the CEO of AMP Capital said, ""We are not prepared to deliver investment returns at any cost to society."'}
{'yo': 'Ìbéérè tí a ní láti bi ara wa nìyẹn.', 'en': 'And that is the question we need to ask ourselves.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣé kò sí gbèdéke àwòkọ́ṣe tó jẹ́ wí pé a ò ní kọjá rẹ̀ láti jèrè ni?', 'en': 'Is there no baseline standard below which we will not sink to make profit?'}
{'yo': 'Lójú ọ̀nà náà, mo ti ní ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìrànlọ́wọ́ àti àtìlẹ́yìn alágbára.', 'en': "Along the way, I've had a lot of help and incredible support."}

{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, tí o bá ń gbìyànjú láti ṣe ǹkan, mo rọ̀ yín pé kí ẹ ní ọmọba-bìnrin nínú ikọ̀ọ yín.', 'en': "Now, if you're trying to do something, I highly recommend that you have a princess on your team."}
{'yo': 'Aláyélúwà, ọmọba-bìnrin Dina Mired, ni aṣojú wa káàkiri àgbáyé fún iṣẹ́ yìí.', 'en': 'Her Royal Highness, Princess Dina Mired, is the global ambassador for this work.'}

{'yo': 'A tún ni olúwa, oníbìníran, olórí orílẹ̀-èdè nígbà kan rí, alákòso ìjọba àpapọ̀ nígbàkan rí àti àgbáríjọpọ̀ àwọn aláṣẹ àti olùdarí ilé-iṣẹ́.', 'en': 'We also have a lord, a knight, a former premier, a former federal minister and a stack of CEOs.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ìkápá láti yí ǹkan padà kò sí lórí àwọn ènìyàn pàtàkì wọ̀nyìí nìkan.', 'en': 'But the capacity to change things does not rest exclusively with these highly influential people.'}
{'yo': 'Agbára láti ṣe ìyẹn wà lọ́dọ gbogbo wa.', 'en': 'The power to do that is with all of us.'}
{'yo': 'Gbogbo wa níbí lè darapọ̀ mọ́ ìyanjú yìí.', 'en': 'Everyone here can be part of the solution.'}
{'yo': 'Lóòtọ́, gbogbo wa níbí ni a gbọ́dọ̀ darapọ̀ mọ́ ìyanjú náà.', 'en': 'In fact, everyone here must be part of the solution.'}

{'yo': 'Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ènìyàn nínu yàrá yìí ni ó ní ilé-iṣẹ́ nípasẹ̀ owó-ìfẹ̀yìnti wọn, ilé-ìfowópamọ́ wọn àti abánidójútófo wọn.', 'en': 'Most people in this room own companies via their superannuation funds, their banks and their insurers.'}

{'yo': 'Àsìkó ti tó láti bi wọ́n: ṣé wọ́n ń fi owóo wa dókówò ní àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n ń ṣe èròjà tó ń pa mílíọ́nù méje ènìyàn lọ́dọọdún?', 'en': 'And it is time for us to ask them: Are they investing our money in companies that make products that kill seven million people every year?'}
{'yo': 'Owóo yín ni.', 'en': "It's your money."}
{'yo': 'Owó mi ni, owóo wa ni.', 'en': "It's my money, it's our money."}
{'yo': 'Ìbéérẹ̀ tó sì mú ọpọlọ dání nìyẹn.', 'en': 'And that is a very reasonable question.'}
{'yo': 'Mo fún pọ̀ níbí, pẹ̀lu mílíọ́nù méje ènìyàn ní ẹ̀gbẹ́ mi lónì.', 'en': 'Pretty cramped up here, with seven million people beside me today.'}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n tí a ò bá gbé ìgbésẹ̀ nísinyìí, ká sì jọ ṣiṣẹ́ papọ̀, a máa nílò láti ṣínà fún bílíọ́nù kan ènìyàn kí ọ̀rún ọdún yìí tó parí.', 'en': "But if we don't act now, and act together, we'll need to make way for one billion people before the end of this century."}
{'yo': 'Ìtàgé tó tóbi gan ni èyí.', 'en': 'And this is a very big stage.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n kò sí àyè mọ́.', 'en': 'But there is no more room.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ṣeun.', 'en': 'Thank you.'}
{'yo': 'Bí fọ́rán ayédèrú ṣe ń ṣe ìdíwọ́ fún òtítọ́ tó sì ń dúkokò mọ́ ìjọba àwarawa.', 'en': 'How deepfakes undermine truth and threaten democracy'}
{'yo': '[ìjírórò yìí kún fún àwọn àkòónú fún àgbàlagbà].', 'en': '[This talk contains mature content]'}

{'yo': 'Rana Ayyub jẹ́ akọ̀ròyìn ní orílẹ̀-ède India tí iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ ti tú àṣírí ìwà-ìbàjẹ́ ìjọba àti títẹ ẹ̀tọ ọmọ ènìyàn lójú mọ́lẹ̀.', 'en': 'Rana Ayyub is a journalist in India whose work has exposed government corruption and human rights violations.'}
{'yo': 'Fún àìmọye ọdún, àwọn èèbú àti awuyewuye tí ó yí iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ ká ti mọ́ ọ lára.', 'en': "And over the years, she's gotten used to vitriol and controversy around her work."}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n kò sí ìkankan nínu rẹ̀ tó ṣe ìgbaradì rẹ̀ fún ǹkan tí ojúu rẹ̀ kàn ní oṣù Igbe ọdún 2018.', 'en': 'But none of it could have prepared her for what she faced in April 2018.'}

{'yo': 'Ó jókòó ní ilé-ìjẹun pẹ̀lú ọ̀rẹ rẹ̀ kan nígbà tí ó kọ́kọ́ rí i: fọ́rán oníṣẹ́jú méjì àti ogún ìṣẹ́jú ààyá ara rẹ̀ tó ń ní ìbálópò.', 'en': 'She was sitting in a café with a friend when she first saw it: a two-minute, 20-second video of her engaged in a sex act.'}
{'yo': 'Kò lè gbàgbọ́ ohun tí ojú rẹ̀ rí.', 'en': "And she couldn't believe her eyes."}
{'yo': 'Kò ṣe fọ́rán ìbálòpọ̀ kankan rí.', 'en': 'She had never made a sex video.'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n ó ṣeni láànú, ẹgbẹ̀rún lónà ẹgbẹ̀rún àwọn ènìyàn yóò gbàgbọ́ pé òun ni.', 'en': 'But unfortunately, thousands upon thousands of people would believe it was her.'}

{'yo': 'Mo ṣe ìfòrọ̀wánilẹ́nuwò fún Ms. Ayyub ní bíi oṣù mẹ́ta ṣéyìn, ní ìsopọ̀ pẹ̀lú ìwé mi lóri kọ̀kọ̀ ìbálópọ̀.', 'en': 'I interviewed Ms. Ayyub about three months ago, in connection with my book on sexual privacy.'}
{'yo': 'Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n nípa òfin nimí, agbẹjọ́rò àti ajàfẹ́tọ ọmọ ènìyàn.', 'en': "I'm a law professor, lawyer and civil rights advocate."}
{'yo': 'Ó ń bíni nínú láti mọ̀ wí pé lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí, díẹ̀ ni òfin lè ṣe láti ràn-án lọ́wọ́.', 'en': "So it's incredibly frustrating knowing that right now, law could do very little to help her."}
{'yo': 'Bí a ṣe ń sọ́rọ̀, ó ṣálàyé wí pé ó yẹ kí òun ti rí i wí pé fọ́rán ìbálópò ayédèrú náà ń bọ̀.', 'en': 'And as we talked, she explained that she should have seen the fake sex video coming.'}

{'yo': '"Ó ní, ""Fẹ̀kàn tẹ́lẹ̀ náà, ìbálópọ̀ ni wọ́n máa ń lò lọ́pọ̀ ìgbà láti ṣá obìnrin mẹ́rẹ̀ àti láti dójúti obìnrin, pàápàá jùlọ àwọn obìnrin kékèké, àti pàápàá àwọn obìnrin kékèké tí wọ́n bá ní ìgboyà láti kojú àwọn okùnrin alágbára,"" bó ṣe wà nínu iṣẹ́ rẹ̀."', 'en': '"She said, ""After all, sex is so often used to demean and to shame women, especially minority women, and especially minority women who dare to challenge powerful men,"" as she had in her work."'}
{'yo': 'Fọ́rán ìbálópọ̀ ayédèrú náà lọ káàkiri fún wákàtí mẹ́jì-dín-láàdọ́ta (48).', 'en': 'The fake sex video went viral in 48 hours.'}

{'yo': 'Gbogbo ìkàni ayélukára rẹ̀ ló kún fún àwòran fọ́rán náà, pẹ̀lu àwòran ìfipábánilòpọ̀ àti ìdúkokò ikú pẹ̀lu èébú nípa ìgbàgbọ mùsùlùmi rẹ̀.', 'en': 'All of her online accounts were flooded with screenshots of the video, with graphic rape and death threats and with slurs about her Muslim faith.'}
{'yo': '"Àwọn àtẹ̀jáde lórí ẹrọ ayélukára dá a lábà wí pé ó ""ṣí sílẹ̀"" fún ìbálópọ̀."', 'en': '"Online posts suggested that she was ""available"" for sex."'}

{'yo': 'Wọ́n wọnú àká rẹ̀, èyí tó túmọ̀ sí wí pé àdírẹ̀si ilée rẹ̀ àti nọ́mbà ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ rẹ̀ ni wọ́n fọ́nká orí ìkàni alátagbà.', 'en': 'And she was doxed, which means that her home address and her cell phone number were spread across the internet.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ṣe àtagbà fọ́rán náà ju ìgba ogójì ẹgbẹ̀rún (40,000) lọ.', 'en': 'The video was shared more than 40,000 times.'}

{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, tí wọ́n bá dojú kọ ẹnìkan pẹ̀lú irú àwọn èébú ìkàni ayélukára yìí, àkóbá rẹ̀ máa ń pọ̀ gan.', 'en': 'Now, when someone is targeted with this kind of cybermob attack, the harm is profound.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n da ìgbésíayé Ranna Ayyub kodò.', 'en': "Rana Ayyub's life was turned upside down."}
{'yo': 'Fún àìmọye ọ̀sẹ̀, tipá-tipá ló fi ń jẹun tàbí sọ̀rọ̀.', 'en': 'For weeks, she could hardly eat or speak.'}

{'yo': 'Ó dáwọ kíkọ dúró ó sì ti gbogbo ìkàni ìbánidọ́rẹ rẹ̀ pa, tó jẹ́, ẹ mọ̀, ǹkan tó lágbára láti ṣe tí o bá jẹ́ akọ̀ròyìn.', 'en': "She stopped writing and closed all of her social media accounts, which is, you know, a tough thing to do when you're a journalist."}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀rú sì ń bà á láti jáde kúrò ní ilẹ́ àwọn mọ̀lẹ́bíi rẹ̀.', 'en': "And she was afraid to go outside her family's home."}
{'yo': 'Tí àwọn tí wọ́n ń dúkokò bá mú ìlérí wọn ṣe ńkó?', 'en': 'What if the posters made good on their threats?'}
{'yo': 'Àjọ-ìgbìmọ UN tó ń rí sí ẹ̀tọ ọmọ ènìyàn fẹsẹ̀ rẹ̀ múlẹ̀ wí pé oríi rẹ̀ ò dàrú.', 'en': "The UN Council on Human Rights confirmed that she wasn't being crazy."}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n fi ohùn léde wí pé ọkàn àwọn ò balẹ̀ nípa ààbo rẹ̀.', 'en': 'It issued a public statement saying that they were worried about her safety.'}

{'yo': 'Ǹkan tí Rana Ayyub kojú ni fọ́rán ayédèrú: ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́-ẹ̀rọ tó máa ń ṣe ayédèrú tàbí àyídà àkálẹ̀ ohùn àti àwòrán láti ṣàfihàn àwọn ènìyàn tó ń ṣe tó sì ń sọ ohun tí wọn ò ṣe tàbí sọ.', 'en': 'What Rana Ayyub faced was a deepfake: machine-learning technology that manipulates or fabricates audio and video recordings to show people doing and saying things that they never did or said.'}

{'yo': 'Fọ́rán ayédèrú má ń dàbí aṣégbáralé o dẹ̀ máa ń jọ tòótọ́, ṣùgbọ́n wọn ò rí bẹ́ẹ̀; irọ́ pátápáta niwọ́n.', 'en': "Deepfakes appear authentic and realistic, but they're not; they're total falsehoods."}
{'yo': 'Bó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ wí pé ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ṣì ń dàgbà sókè nínú ìmọ̀ rẹ̀, ó wà káàkiri.', 'en': 'Although the technology is still developing in its sophistication, it is widely available.'}

{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, àkíyèsí sí fọ́rán ayédèrú dìde láìpẹ́ yìí, bí oríṣiríṣi ǹkan ṣe ń ṣe lórí ìkàni ayélukára, pẹ̀lú sinimá ìbálópọ̀.', 'en': 'Now, the most recent attention to deepfakes arose, as so many things do online, with pornography.'}

{'yo': 'Ní ìbẹ̀rẹ ọdún 2018, ẹnìkan fi irinṣẹ́ kan léde lóri Reddit láti fún àwọn aṣàmúlo rẹ̀ ní ànfàní láti gbé ojú sí fọ́rán ìbálópọ̀.', 'en': 'In early 2018, someone posted a tool on Reddit to allow users to insert faces into porn videos.'}

{'yo': 'Ǹkan tó tẹ̀le èyí ni ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn fọ́rán ìbálópọ̀ ayédèrú tó ń ṣàfihàn àwọn ẹni-iyì lóbìnrin tí wọ́n jẹ́ ààyò àwọn ènìyàn.', 'en': "And what followed was a cascade of fake porn videos featuring people's favorite female celebrities."}

{'yo': 'Lónì, ẹ lè lọ sórí YouTube kí ẹ wo àwọn ẹ̀kọ́ tí kò ṣe é kà pẹ̀lú ìkọ́ni lẹ́sẹẹsẹ lóri bí o ṣelè ṣe fọ́rán ayédèrú lóri kọ̀mpútà alápò tíì rẹ.', 'en': 'And today, you can go on YouTube and pull up countless tutorials with step-by-step instructions on how to make a deepfake on your desktop application.'}
{'yo': 'Láìpẹ́ a lè ma ṣéwọ́n lórí àwọn ẹ̀rọ-ìbánisọ̀rọ wa.', 'en': 'And soon we may be even able to make them on our cell phones.'}

{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, àjọṣepọ̀ láìrín àwọn kùdìè-kudiẹ ọmọ ènìyàn àti àwọn irinṣẹ́ ojú-òpó ayélukára ni ó lè sọ fọ́rán ayédèrú di ohun-ìjà.', 'en': "Now, it's the interaction of some of our most basic human frailties and network tools that can turn deepfakes into weapons."}
{'yo': 'Ẹ jẹ́ kí n ṣàlàyé.', 'en': 'So let me explain.'}
{'yo': 'Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọmọ ènìyàn, a máa ń fi ẹran-ara fèsì sí ohùn àti àwòrán.', 'en': 'As human beings, we have a visceral reaction to audio and video.'}

{'yo': 'A gbàgbọ́ pé òótọ́ ni wọ́n, pẹ̀lú ìgbàgbọ́ wí pé bẹ́ẹ̀ ni ẹ lè nígbàgbọ́ nínu ǹkan tí ojú àti etí yín bá ń sọ fún yín.', 'en': "We believe they're true, on the notion that of course you can believe what your eyes and ears are telling you."}
{'yo': 'Ẹ̀ya ara yẹn náà ni ó lè ṣe ìdíwọ́ fún ìgbàgbọ wa nípa òótọ́.', 'en': "And it's that mechanism that might undermine our shared sense of reality."}
{'yo': 'Bó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ wí pé a gbàgbọ́ pé òótọ́ ni fọ́rán ayédèrú, wọn kò rí bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': "Although we believe deepfakes to be true, they're not."}
{'yo': 'A máa ń fà sí ìbàjẹ́, abíni-nínú.', 'en': "And we're attracted to the salacious, the provocative."}
{'yo': 'A máa ń gbàgbọ́ à dẹ̀ máa ń ṣe àtagbà àwọn afitóni tí ò da àti àròsọ.', 'en': "We tend to believe and to share information that's negative and novel."}

{'yo': 'Àwọn oníṣẹ́-ìwádìí ti rí i pé ìrọ́ máa ń yára fọ́nká nígbà mẹ́wàá ju àwọn ìtàn tó péye lọ.', 'en': 'And researchers have found that online hoaxes spread 10 times faster than accurate stories.'}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, a máa ń fà sí àwọn afitóni tó papọ̀ mọ́ èro wa.', 'en': "Now, we're also drawn to information that aligns with our viewpoints."}
{'yo': '"Àwọn onímọ̀ iṣẹ́-ọkàn pe ìwà yẹn ní ""ìfẹsẹ̀múlẹ̀ aṣègbè."', 'en': '"Psychologists call that tendency ""confirmation bias."'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn ìkànì ìbánidọ́rẹ̀ ayélukára ń ṣe àfikún ìwà yẹn, pẹ̀lu ànfàní láti ṣe àtagbà àwọn afitóni tó bá ojú-ìwòye wa mu lẹ́sẹ̀kẹsẹ̀ àti káríayé.', 'en': 'And social media platforms supercharge that tendency, by allowing us to instantly and widely share information that accords with our viewpoints.'}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, fọ́rán ayédèrú ní ànfàní láti fa ewu tó lágbára fún ènìyàn àti àwùjọ.', 'en': 'Now, deepfakes have the potential to cause grave individual and societal harm.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ wòye fọ́rán ayédèrú tó ń ṣàfihàn ọmọ ogun ilẹ̀ America ní orílẹ̀-ède Afganistan tó ń dáná sun ọmọ orílẹ̀-ède korea.', 'en': 'So, imagine a deepfake that shows American soldiers in Afganistan burning a Koran.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ lè wòye pé fọ́rán ayédèrú yẹn máa fa rògbòdìyàn tako àwọn ọmọ ogun wọ̀nyẹn.', 'en': 'You can imagine that that deepfake would provoke violence against those soldiers.'}

{'yo': 'Tó bá ṣe wí pé lọ́jọ́ kejì gangan fọ́rán ayédèrú mìíràn tún jáde, tó ń ṣàfihàn ìmáámù ilú-mọ̀ọ́ká kan tó ń gbé ní London tó wá ń gbóríyìn fún ìkọlù àwọn ọmọ ogun wọ̀yẹn ńkọ́?', 'en': "And what if the very next day there's another deepfake that drops, that shows a well-known imam based in London praising the attack on those soldiers?"}

{'yo': 'A lè rí rògbòdìyàn àti ìfẹ̀hónúhàn, kìí ṣe ní orílẹ̀-ède Afganistan àti United kingdom nìkan, ṣùgbọ́n káàkiri gbogbo àgbáyé.', 'en': 'We might see violence and civil unrest, not only in Afganistan and the United Kingdom, but across the globe.'}
{'yo': '"Ẹ dẹ̀ lè sọ fúnmi wí pé, ""wá, Danielle, ìyen ò ṣe é ṣe."', 'en': '"And you might say to me, ""Come on, Danielle, that\'s far-fetched."'}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n kò rí bẹ́ẹ̀.', 'en': "But it's not."}

{'yo': 'A ti rí bí irọ́ ṣe ń tànká lórí ìkàni WhatsApp àti àwọn ìkànì àtẹ̀jíṣẹ́ mìíràn lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélukára ṣe ń yọrí sí rògbòdìyàn tako àwọn ìran kékèké.', 'en': "We've seen falsehoods spread on WhatsApp and other online message services lead to violence against ethnic minorities."}
{'yo': 'Àtẹ̀jíṣẹ́ lásán nìyẹn -- ẹ wòye pé tó bá jẹ́ wí pé fọ́rán aláwòrán ni.', 'en': 'And that was just text -- imagine if it were video.'}

{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, fọ́rán ayédèrú ní ànfàní láti ba ìgbàgbọ́ tí a ní nínu orílẹ̀-ède olómìnira jẹ́.', 'en': 'Now, deepfakes have the potential to corrode the trust that we have in democratic institutions.'}
{'yo': 'Nítorí náà, ẹ wòye alẹ́ ìbó kọ̀la.', 'en': 'So, imagine the night before an election.'}

{'yo': 'Tí fọ́rán ayédèrú kan wá ń ṣàfihàn ìkan nínú àwọn adíje-dupò lábẹ́ ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú ńlá kan tí ara rẹ̀ ò yá gidi gan.', 'en': "There's a deepfake showing one of the major party candidates gravely sick."}
{'yo': 'Fọ́rán ayédèrú náà lè sún ìbò náà kó sì gbo ọpọlọ wa pé ìdìbó bófin mu.', 'en': 'The deepfake could tip the election and shake our sense that elections are legitimate.'}

{'yo': 'Ẹ wòye tó bá jẹ́ wí pé alẹ́ẹ ó kọ̀la tí ilé-ìfowópamọ́ àgbáyé ńlá kan fẹ́ ta ìpín ìdókówò síta, fọ́rán ayédèrú kan wá ń ṣàfihàn aláṣẹ àti olùdarí ilé-ìfowópamọ́ náà tó ń sọ àwọn tíọ́rì àgbélẹ̀rọ lẹ́yìn tó ti yó.', 'en': "Imagine if the night before an initial public offering of a major global bank, there was a deepfake showing the bank's CEO drunkenly spouting conspiracy theories."}

{'yo': 'Fọ́rán ayédèrú náà lè bo títa ìpín ìdókówò náà mọ́lẹ̀, tó tún burú, gbo ọpọlọ wa pé àwọn ọjà owó náà dúró ṣiṣin.', 'en': 'The deepfake could tank the IPO, and worse, shake our sense that financial markets are stable.'}

{'yo': 'Fọ́rán ayédèrú lè ṣàmúlò kó sì sọ àìnígbàgbọ́ tí a ti ní tẹ́lẹ̀ nínú àwọn olóṣèlú, àwọn adarí òwò àti àwọn adarí míràn tó nífọ̀n di ńlá.', 'en': 'So deepfakes can exploit and magnify the deep distrust that we already have in politicians, business leaders and other influential leaders.'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n máa ń wá àwọn ònwòran tí wọ́n ti dúró láti gbà wọ́n gbọ́.', 'en': 'They find an audience primed to believe them.'}
{'yo': 'Ìṣiṣẹ́ tọ òtítọ́ náà wà nínú ewu bákan náà.', 'en': 'And the pursuit of truth is on the line as well.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ń retí wí pé pẹ̀lú ìtẹ̀síwájú nínu AI, láìpẹ́ ó lè ṣòro tàbí kó má ṣe é ṣe láti sọ ìyàtọ̀ láàrín fọ́rán aláwòrán gidi àti ayédèrú.', 'en': 'Technologists expect that with advances in AI, soon it may be difficult if not impossible to tell the difference between a real video and a fake one.'}
{'yo': 'Báwo ni òtítọ́ ṣe lè jẹyọ ní ọjà òye tí fọ́rán ayédèrú ń dà láàmú?', 'en': 'So how can the truth emerge in a deepfake-ridden marketplace of ideas?'}

{'yo': 'Ṣe a ó kò tẹ̀síwájú ní ọ̀nà àìṣe é gbáralé àti ìgbàgbọ ohun tí a fẹ́ gbàgbọ́, ká ṣépè fún òtítọ́?', 'en': 'Will we just proceed along the path of least resistance and believe what we want to believe, truth be damned?'}
{'yo': 'Kìí ṣe wí pé a lè gba ayédèrú gbọ́ nìkan, a lè bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí sọ ìgbàgbọ́ nù nínu òtítọ́.', 'en': 'And not only might we believe the fakery, we might start disbelieving the truth.'}

{'yo': 'A ti rí àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n lo fọ́rán ayédèrú láti sọ àríyànjiyàn sí èrí gidi nípa àṣìṣe wọn.', 'en': "We've already seen people invoke the phenomenon of deepfakes to cast doubt on real evidence of their wrongdoing."}

{'yo': '"A ti gbọ́ tí àwọn olóṣèlú sọ nípa fọ́rán ọ̀rọ wọn tó bani lọ́kàn jẹ́, ""Ẹ wá, ìròyìn ayédèrú nìyẹn."', 'en': '"We\'ve heard politicians say of audio of their disturbing comments, ""Come on, that\'s fake news."'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ò lè gba ǹkan tí ojú àti etí yín ń sọ fún yín gbọ́.', 'en': "You can't believe what your eyes and ears are telling you."}

{'yo': '""" Ewu yẹn ni èmi àti ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Robert Chesney pè ní ""ère onírọ́"": ewu pé àwọn onírọ́ lè lo fọ́rán ayédèrú láti sá fún ìjíyìn àṣìṣe wọn."', 'en': '"And it\'s that risk that professor Robert Chesney and I call the liar\'s dividend"": the risk that liars will invoke deepfakes to escape accountability for their wrongdoing."'}
{'yo': 'Wọ́n ti pín iṣẹ́ wa fún wa, kò sí iyèméjì nípa rẹ̀.', 'en': "So we've got our work cut out for us, there's no doubt about it."}

{'yo': 'A máa nílò ọ̀nà àbáyọ látọ̀dọ̀ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ, àwọn aṣòfin, àwọn agbófinró àti ilé-iṣẹ́ ìròyìn.', 'en': "And we're going to need a proactive solution from tech companies, from lawmakers, law enforcers and the media."}
{'yo': 'A máa nílò ìfaradà àwùjọ ní ìwọn aláìléwu.', 'en': "And we're going to need a healthy dose of societal resilience."}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, a ti wà nínú àpérò gbogbogbò nípa ojúṣe àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ.', 'en': "So now, we're right now engaged in a very public conversation about the responsibility of tech companies."}

{'yo': 'Ìmọ̀ran mi fún àwọn ìkànì ìbánidọ́rẹ̀ ni láti ṣe àyípadà àdéhun iṣẹ́ wọn àti ìlànà ìtọ́sọ́nà àwùjọ láti fi òfin de fọ́rán ayédèrú tó lè fa ewu.', 'en': 'And my advice to social media platforms has been to change their terms of service and community guidelines to ban deepfakes that cause harm.'}
{'yo': 'Ìpinnu yẹn, yóò gba ìdájọ́ ọmọ ènìyàn, ó dẹ̀ wọ́n.', 'en': "That determination, that's going to require human judgment, and it's expensive."}

{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n a nílò kí àwọn ènìyán wo àkónú àti ọ̀gangan ipòo fọ́rán ayédèrú láti ṣàwárí rẹ̀ bóyá ayédèrú ènìyàn tó léwu ni tàbí dípò bẹ́ẹ̀, tí ó bá jẹ́ pé èébú tó níye lóri ni, ọgbọ́n àtinúdá tàbí ẹ̀kọ́.', 'en': "But we need human beings to look at the content and context of a deepfake to figure out if it is a harmful impersonation or instead, if it's valuable satire, art or education."}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, òfin ńkọ́?', 'en': 'So now, what about the law?'}
{'yo': 'Olùdánilẹ́kọ̀ wa ni òfin jẹ́.', 'en': 'Law is our educator.'}
{'yo': 'Ó máa ń kọ́wa nípa ǹkan tó léwu àti ǹkan tí ò tọ́.', 'en': "It teaches us about what's harmful and what's wrong."}

{'yo': 'Ó máa ń ṣàtúnṣe ìwà ó máa ń dènà ìwà-ìbàjẹ́ pẹ̀lú fífi ìyà jẹ oníwà ìbàjẹ́ àti wíwá àtúnṣe fún àwọn tọ́rọ̀ ṣẹlẹ̀ sí.', 'en': 'And it shapes behavior it deters by punishing perpetrators and securing remedies for victims.'}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, òfin ò kápá fọ́rán ayédèrú.', 'en': 'Right now, law is not up to the challenge of deepfakes.'}

{'yo': 'Káàkiri àgbáyé, a ò ní òfin tó dúróo re tí wọn yóò ṣe lọ́jọ̀ láti tako ayédèrú ènìyan díjítà tó ń tú ìkọ̀kọ̀ ìbálópọ̀, tó ń ba ọmọlúwàbí ènìyàn jẹ́ tó sì ń fa ìnira inú ọpọlọ.', 'en': 'Across the globe, we lack well-tailored laws that would be designed to tackle digital impersonations that invade sexual privacy, that damage reputations and that cause emotional distress.'}
{'yo': 'Ǹkan tí ó ṣẹlẹ̀ sí Ranna Ayyub túbọ̀ ń ṣẹlẹ̀ si lemọ́-lemọ́.', 'en': 'What happened to Rana Ayyub is increasingly commonplace.'}

{'yo': 'Síbẹ̀, nígbà tó lọ sí ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn agbófinró ní Delhi, wọ́n sọ fún un wí pé kò sí ǹkan tí wọ́n lè ṣe.', 'en': 'Yet, when she went to law enforcement in Delhi, she was told nothing could be done.'}
{'yo': 'Òótọ́ tó bani lọ́kàn jẹ́ ni wí pé ǹkan kan náà ni yóò ṣẹlẹ̀ ní Amẹ́ríkà àti ilẹ̀ Yúróòpù.', 'en': 'And the sad truth is that the same would be true in the United States and in Europe.'}
{'yo': 'A ní àlàfo òfin tó nílò dídí.', 'en': 'So we have a legal vacuum that needs to be filled.'}

{'yo': 'Èmi àti akẹgbẹ́ mi Dr. Mary Anne Franks ń ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú àwọn aṣòfin orílẹ̀-ède US láti ṣe òfin tí yóò fòfin de ayédèrú ènìyan díjítà tó léwu tó dọ́gba pẹ̀lú jíjí ìdánimọ̀.', 'en': 'My colleague Dr. Mary Anne Franks and I are working with US lawmakers to devise legislation that would ban harmful digital impersonations that are tantamount to identity theft.'}
{'yo': 'A sì ti ri irú àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ bẹ́ẹ̀ ní orílẹ̀-ède Iceland, UK àti Australia.', 'en': "And we've seen similar moves in Iceland, the UK and Australia."}
{'yo': 'Ṣùgbọ́n bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, oríkè kékeré nìyẹn nínu ayò òfin náà.', 'en': "But of course, that's just a small piece of the regulatory puzzle."}
{'yo': 'Ní báyìí, mo mọ̀ wí pé òfin kìí ṣe gbogbo nìṣe.', 'en': 'Now, I know law is not a cure-all.'}
{'yo': 'Irinṣẹ́ tó kúnu ni.', 'en': "It's a blunt instrument."}
{'yo': 'A dẹ̀ ní láti fi ọgbọ́n lò ó.', 'en': "And we've got to use it wisely."}
{'yo': 'Ó tún ní àwọn ìdíwọ́ àṣeémúlò kànkan.', 'en': 'It also has some practical impediments.'}
{'yo': 'Ẹ ò lè lo agbára òfin tako àwọn ènìyàn tí ẹ ò dámọ̀ tí ẹ ò lè rí.', 'en': "You can't leverage law against people you can't identify and find."}

{'yo': 'Tí oníwà-ìbàjẹ́ kan bá ń gbé ní ìta orílẹ̀-èdè níbi tí ẹni tọ́rọ̀ ṣẹlẹ̀ sí ń gbé, ẹ lè má lè takú wí pé kí oníwà-ìbàjẹ́ náà wá sí ilé-ẹjọ́ agbègbè láti kojú òfin.', 'en': 'And if a perpetrator lives outside the country where a victim lives, then you may not be able to insist that the perpetrator come into local courts to face justice.'}
{'yo': 'A máa nílò ìdáhùn láti ilẹ̀-òkèrè tó létò.', 'en': "And so we're going to need a coordinated international response."}
{'yo': 'Ètò-ẹ̀kọ́ ní láti wà lára ìdáhùn wa bákan náà.', 'en': 'Education has to be part of our response as well.'}

{'yo': 'Àwọn agbófinró ò ní lo òfin tí wọn ò mọ̀ nípa rẹ̀ kọ́ sì gba àwọn wàhálà tí ò yé wọn.', 'en': "Law enforcers are not going to enforce laws they don't know about and proffer problems they don't understand."}

{'yo': 'Nínu iṣẹ́-ìwádìí mi lóri ìdúkokò lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélukára, mo rí i wí pé ìgbófinró ò ní ìkọ́ni láti mọ àwọn òfin tó wà nílẹ̀ fún wọn àti wàhálà èébú lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélukára.', 'en': 'In my research on cyberstalking, I found that law enforcement lacked the training to understand the laws available to them and the problem of online abuse.'}
{'yo': '"Ní ọ̀pọ̀ ìgbà wọ́n máa ń sọ fún àwọn tó lúgbàdì pé, ""kọ̀ pa ẹ̀rọ kọ̀mpútà rẹ."', 'en': '"And so often they told victims, ""Just turn your computer off."'}
{'yo': 'Mójú kúrò níbẹ̀.', 'en': 'Ignore it.'}
{'yo': 'Ó máa lọ.', 'en': "It'll go away."}
{'yo': 'A dẹ̀ rí ìyẹn nínú ìgbẹ̀jọ́ọ Rana Ayyub.', 'en': "And we saw that in Rana Ayyub's case."}
{'yo': '"Wọ́n sọ fún-un pé, ""Wá, ó ń sọ ǹkan yìí di bàbàrà."', 'en': '"She was told, ""Come on, you\'re making such a big deal about this."'}
{'yo': 'Àwọn ọmọkùnrin ni wọ́n ń ṣìṣe ọmọkùnrin.', 'en': "It's boys being boys."}
{'yo': 'A nílò láti ṣe àsopọ̀ òfin tuntun pẹ̀lú ìgbìyànjú ìfikọ́ra.', 'en': 'And so we need to pair new legislation with efforts at training.'}
{'yo': 'A gbọ́dọ̀ dojú ètò-ẹ̀kọ́ kọ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ìròyìn bákan náà.', 'en': 'And education has to be aimed on the media as well.'}
