{'ig': '', 'en': "So, people must stand for the country, and we commend a major organisation like PUNCH for standing for the country.     “All of them should be sanctioned, so long as you are serving under this government because it is supposed to be a democracy.     “The moment it is no longer a democracy, it’s either you are part of the autocratic and disruptive element or you are not part of it. And if you are not part of it, you would have to quit.     “So, anybody who was in doubt before and continues to be part of the government after what happened in the court should be sanctioned.”     Sowore: DSS' Incompetence And The Docility Of The National Assembly By Martin White-Ufuah     We are presently under the attack of cyber espionages, but because the DSS do not have the structural competence to checkmate the economic security threat of foreign espionages in our country's internet space, they do not know the danger their activities portend for our country.     With DSS' bold outlaw, subnormal intelligence, defective disposition, and outright violation of different court orders, it has become indisputably clear that Nigeria's democracy has been militarised.     The 9th rubber-stamp National Assembly that is supposed to restrain the overreaching extents of the executive has openly obliged to doing the bidding of the executive.     Obviously, the legislative arm of government in Nigeria has transformed itself into a branch of the executive.     Today, the only distinguishing characteristic of our bogus democracy from the military dictatorship is that we waste tax payers’ money to service an institution (National Assembly) that is tractable to executive rascality.     Our democracy is a charade!     If it isn't, the illegal detention of Omoyele Sowore and other Nigerians by the DSS should have been a topical discourse in the National Assembly to check the excesses of the executive.     Nigeria is currently perplexed, bedevilled and overwhelmed by the lethality of human right abuses that ridicules and exposes our own brand of democracy as a fraud.     Instead of a vibrantly energetic and engaging legislature that imposes a legislative sanction on the DSS' boss and the country's attorney-general over the illegal detention of Omoyele Sowore and Olawale Bakare, they are vigorously pursuing bills on hate speech and social media regulation.     The National Assembly is sleeping on duty!     The DSS should be publicly condemned for its chronic law-breaking antecedence.     By the unlawful gestapo arrest, clandestine and illegal detention and persecution of Omoyele Sowore, the Department of State Service, has shown that it is markedly subnormal in function, flawed in intelligence and rascal in behaviour.     The criminal-classed elements sponsored by state actors that took up arms against the Nigerian state during the Kogi and Bayelsa elections were never seen to have committed treasonable felony.     But Omoyele Sowore who only sued for peace by calling on Nigerians to pour out in their numbers to protest against misrule and corruption is being accused of plotting to unseat the government.     What a joke of a country!     Obviously, the DSS is merely a political stooge that react against voices of truth that attempt to call the government to order.     Instead of a vibrantly energetic and engaging domestic intelligence agency that functions as the source of reliable information for mitigating our various internal security challenges, our moribund DSS is all about the pettiness of political arrests and illegal detentions of honourable citizens.     The calculated use of violence against our country by Fulani herdsmen, Boko Haram members and other criminal groups with felonious intent have never for once been comprehended by the radar coverage of our so-called DSS domestic intelligence.     Isn't that a big shame?     The DSS has shown that it does not have the structural competence and expertise for espionages and information gathering. That is why the agency relies on online gossips and maliciously divulged information to clamp on citizens.     Domestic intelligence service is also supposed to be responsible for identifying foreign spies employed by foreign services against a country.     Every day we hear of other countries exposing and apprehending foreign spies and agents employed by foreign intelligence services against their government.     Please, how many has the DSS caught? None! Why? They think their job is to go after Omoyele Sowore.     If the DSS understand the danger foreign espionages poses to our country, they'd resign from their pettiness and become serious for once.     Some foreign espionages have access to our country's internet space without anyone knowing their identity.     They are sometimes the ones spreading propagandas and disinformation on our local internet space to cause dissension and unrest.     We are presently under the attack of cyber espionages, but because the DSS do not have the structural competence to checkmate the economic security threat of foreign espionages in our country's internet space, they do not know the danger their activities portend for our country.     I'm writing this to tell the DSS to release Omoyele Sowore right now with an apology to him because he is not a terrorist.     Martin White-Ufuah, a writer and columnist, writes from Abuja. He is the publisher, Ecumenical Review     Sowore: Government Has Ordered Investigation Into Invasion Of Court By DSS -Malami     Sowore was arrested in the court by the DSS less than 24 hours after he was released on bail after a third order by the court.     Attorney-General of the Federation and Minister of Justice, Abubakar Malami (SAN), has revealed that the Nigerian Government has ordered an investigation into the invasion of the Federal High Court, Abuja, by operatives of the Department of State Services to rearrest Omoyele Sowore.     Sowore was arrested in the court by the DSS less than 24 hours after he was released on bail after a third order by the court.     Malami was questioned by reporters when he was seen at the premises of the Federal High Court, Abuja.     When asked why he was in court, Malami said he did not come because of Sowore but to congratulate the judge on being confirmed as the substantive Chief Judge of the court.     He however, revealed that the government had instituted a panel to investigate the invasion of the court.     Asked if he was not appalled by the DSS’ conduct, Malami said, “Whatever affects the integrity of the court is a worrisome issue for us.     “I can never be preemptive of an incident over which I was not a live witness to.     “But one thing I am certain of is that the government has put in place mechanism for investigation of the reported incident.     “So, I would not like to be preemptive in terms of a conclusion, one way or the other, without allowing the consummation and conclusion of the investigation process.”     Sowore: Nigeria Has A Way Of Punishing The Innocent, Says Banky W     “Nigeria has a way of punishing the innocent and trampling on the rights, dreams and hopes of the regular citizens."}

Sowore: Sultan Of Sokoto Tells Buhari To Obey Court Orders     Abubakar said nobody can decide to disregard the court at will, adding that it would be detrimental to national development.     The Sultan of Sokoto, Alhaji Sa’ad Abubakar, has told President Muhammadu Buhari and all those in his regime to obey court orders because according to him failure to do so holds dire consequences.     The Sultan gave the warning while speaking at the 2019 fourth quarter meeting of the Nigeria Inter-religious Council in Abuja.     Abubakar said nobody can decide to disregard the court at will, adding that it would be detrimental to national development.     He said, “We must regularly obey and respect the laws of our land.     We should never disregard the laws to avoid the consequences.'}

According to a recent report by the AFP, in no year since the upsurge of conflicts in the North East have Nigerian troops been exposed to the level of casualties inflicted on them by the insurgents in 2018 alone. With an enlarged war chest, a strategic control of the economic mainstay of the Chad Basin cross cutting fishing, all season farming, water and control of cross border trade routes, the insurgents are looking formidable.'}

{'ig': "o kwela nghọta, ha nabatara ndị agha ọhụrụ ma ndị mba na-asụ Bekee na French na mba ndị gbara gburugburu dịka Cameroon, Chad, Niger na Naịjirịa.Ozi nke batara site n'aka ndị ISWAP gosiri ịma aka n'ihu nye ndị ọchịchị na ndị agha n'ijide obodo. ISWAP na-ewe mpaghara Ugwu na Etiti Borno dịka nke dị ha n'aka. Npụta ndị agha nke Naịjirịa na ọdọ ndị agha bụ nke ewerela dịka nke ndị ewerela n'ike site n'aka ndị agha. ", 'en': 'No wonder, they have recently scaled up recruitment of new fighters across both English and French speaking countries in the surrounding countries of Cameroon, Chad, Niger and Nigeria. Information gleaned from contacts within the fold of ISWAP paint an insight that seems to have challenged the position of politicians and the military in respect of holding territory. ISWAP always considered the territories of Northern and Central Borno their Caliphate territories. The presence of the Nigerian troops and particularly military bases were considered invasion by the military.'}

{'ig': "Idote oge ha rue na ha enweta ngwaọgụ tinyere ndị agha ebulili mmụọ ha iji kpochapụ ọgbaaghara, ndị otu ahụ dị njikere ịnọ na nnyocha ọtụtụ afọ tutu ha zọpụ ije. Nchekwube ha bịara na mmezu n'afọ 2018. Ha anọrọla n'inye nsogbu n'afọ 2018 niile. Atụmatụ ndị ISWAP bụ ime ka ihe niile dị ka npụta ndị agha na mpaghara ndị ahụ ha werela dịka nke ndị agha agaghị ewereli. ISWAP ewerela mpaghara Ugwu na Etiti Borno dịka nke aka ha na mpaghara ha na mezie dịka iwu ịchụ iwe niile dị n'obodo.", 'en': 'Bidding their time until they had adequate ammunition with additional army of motivated fighters to unleash new wave of violence the group was willing to stay under the radar for a few years before drawing the line on the sand. Their long wait paid off in 2018. They have been on the offensive all of 2018. The ISWAP’s strategy is to put everything available to ensure that military presence in those territories they consider part of their caliphate is made ever untenable. ISWAP considers all parts of north and central Borno as its caliphate and territory and therefore obligated by doctrines and commandment to repel every external aggression within the territory.'}

{'ig': "Nke a bụ agbanyeghị ihe ọbụla ndị ndọrọndọrọ na ndị agha na-ekwu banyere ọnọdụ dị na mpaghara ndị ahụ. N'ezie, iwu nke Boko Haram/ISWAP ijide mpaghara dị iche iche gbanwere n'ihi ndaghachi azụ ha nwere ọtụtụ oge mgbe ana akwado ime nhọpụta nke Naịjirịa n'afọ 2014. Ha achọghịzi ijide mpaghara dị iche iche dịka ha siri kwado, kama ime na ndị agha anọghị na mpaghara. Ịga n'ihu, ISWAP na-agba mbọ ime ka ndị obodo nwe ntụkwasị na nchekwa ha karịa nke ndị agha. Nkea bụ atụmatụ ha.", 'en': 'This is irrespective of whatever politicians and the military claim is the situation within those territories. In fact, Boko Haram / ISWAP policy with respect to physically holding territories changed after the steady losses they suffered in the run up to general elections in Nigeria in 2014. They do not want to physically hold unto territories anymore than they are determined to ensure that the military does not have any sustainable presence in the territories. Furthermore, ISWAP is paying more premium to wooing local communities to feel more secure with them than they could ever be with the military. That is their strategy.'}

{'ig': "ha echekwabala ụzọ azụmahịa n'obodo ndị ha ji. mba nke Lake Chad abụrụla nke ala ya dị mma nye ndị ọrụ ugbo na azụmahịa nke azụ. Ha emebiela ahịa azụ na yabasị nke ukwu na Maiduguri. Na nnọchi ya, ha emepeela azụmahịa na mba azụmahịa dịka Kinchandi, na Niger Republic na ọzọ na obodo Kusiri, na Cameroon. Ndị ahịa nke Naịjirịa nwere nchekwube n'ahịa nke  Kusiri, Cameroon site na Mubi, na Adamawa dị. Nke ọzọ dị na Kinchandi, na Niger Republic. Aha nke Naịjirịa dị na Hadeja, steeti Jigawa nwere nnukwu nchekwube n'ahịa nke Niger Republic.", 'en': 'They have secured the economic lines in the territories they control. The Lake Chad territories have become more fertile for famers and more viable for commercial fishing activities. They have largely crippled the fish and onions markets in Maiduguri. In its stead, they have opened secured trading locations in Kinchandi, in Niger Republic and another in Kusiri, in Cameroon. Nigerian traders rely on the market in Kusiri, Cameroon through Mubi, in Adamawa. The other in Kinchandi, in Niger Republic. The Nigerian market in Hadeja, Jigawa state depend heavily on the market in Niger Republic.'}

{'ig': "Ndị agha pụrụ ịnara ndị ahịa ngwaahịa ha, nara ha anụ ọzụzụ ha ma nyejue onwe ha afọ karịa iwepụta ụzọ ha ga-esi guzogide azụmaahịa nke ha. Ọ dịzi ka eziokwu ka ọtụtụ obodo esonyeere ISWAP karịa ndị agha.ISWAP chọrọ ime ka ọ hapụ ịdị mma n'anya ma dịkwa oke ọnụ site n'ọnụọgụgụ nke mmadụ na ofufu nke ngwaọgụ nke ndị agha ga-eji chekwa obodo ndị ahụ. Ha agbakọọla ma kwubie na dịka ha gana awakpo ndị agha nke ga-eme ka ha na ala azụ nkwado, nke ga-eme ka ndị obodo kwenye na ha ga-enwe nchekwa n'okpuru ha karịa n'okpuru ndị agha Naịjirịa.", 'en': 'Nigerian troops apparently would rather confiscate a trader’s wares, forcibly take their livestock for their feeding than device any system of commercial comfort that would help them grow their business. It therefore seems not far-fetched that several local communities appear to cooperate better with ISWAP than with the Nigerian troops. ISWAP want to primarily make it unattractive and too expensive in terms of body count and loss of hardware for the military to maintain a base in any of these territories. They calculate that as long as they continually target and attack military formations, forcing them to beat a retreat so long would it be easier for local communities to accept that they are more secure in the territories under them than under the cover of Nigerian troops.'}

{'ig': "etu ọ dị, ha ekwubiela na ha ga- anọsi ike ịlụghachi agha nye ndị agha rue na ọ dịghịrịrị ha bụ ndị obi jụrụla oyi mfe ịchụ ha n'oge n'adịghị anya . Ụzọ ọrụ na njegharị nke afọ 2018 ndị agha, ọ na-arụ ọrụ? Ihe ama nke gbara banyere mwakpo ụlọ ndị agha site n'aka ndị ISWAP n'afọ 2018 n'ebe ha nọ n'ụbara dị pasentị iri asaa. ihe nkea pụtara bụ na n'ime ụlọ ndị agha dị iri abụọ, ISWAP achụpụla maọbụ mechie ọrụ ndị agha n'ụlọ agha dị iri na anọ naanị n'afọ 2018. Naanị mgbe ọnụọgụgụ dị etua n'afọ 2018 merela bụ n'afọ 2014. ka afọ 2015 kwụsịrị, e nweela pasentị iri ise mmeri, nke mechara datue n'afọ 2016 na 2017, ma nwee nke ọjọọ ya n'afọ 2018.", 'en': 'Moreover, they envisage that for as long as they sustain the push back against the military for so long will it be difficult for the demoralized troops to muster confidence to put them at tactical disadvantage anytime soon. Is the 2018 military strategy and campaign working? The facts based on the number of military formations successfully attacked and overran by ISWAP in 2018 in the areas of its dominance is 70 percent. What this translates into is that out of 20 military bases in these territories, ISWAP have either sacked by overrunning or forced the military to shut down a total of 14 bases in 2018 alone. The only time this ratio of attacks and takeovers came close to the 2018 numbers was in 2014. By the end of 2015 it was below 50% success ratio, which further dropped in 2016 and 2017, only to witness a sharp surge in 2018.'}

{'ig': "Ngosi na maapụ nke mpụtara agha dị egwu. mpaghara ndị mebere Ugwu Borno bụ okpuru ọchịchị iri dị n'Ugwu Maiduguri ma nwekwa oke n'etiti mba atọ ndị gunyere Niger Republic, Chad na Cameroon. ISWAP anọrọla sie ike na mba ndịa. Mpaghara ndị mebere Etiti Borno dị okpuru ọchịchị asatọ, ma ISWAP ma Boko Haram nọ sie ike na mpaghara ndị a. Ndịda Borno bụ nke okpuru ọchịchị iteghete mebere nke nwere ntakịrị mmetụta, ma ewepụ obodo dịka Gwoza, Damboa na Chibok. Ka ọ fọdụrụ ihe dịka ụbọchị irianọ na ise ka emee nhọpụta nke onyeisi ala, ọ dị ka enwere nchekwa n'isi ọrụ maka ikpuchi ọnọdụ ọjọọ ahụ kama ịnabata ya. ", 'en': 'The outlook of the map in the battle theatres is grim. The territories that constitute Northern Borno are 10 Local Government Areas lying north of Maiduguri and bearing natural land borders with three countries namely Niger Republic, Chad and Cameroon. ISWAP have full sway in these territories currently. The territories that constitute Borno Central are made up of eight Local Government Areas, and both ISWAP and Boko Haram have significant footholds in these territories. Southern Borno, made up of nine Local Government Areas, is the least affected, with the exception of flashpoints such as Gwoza, Damboa and Chibok. With barely 45 days to presidential election in Nigeria there seems to be more energy at official quarters to cover up the tragic situation than acknowledging it.'}

{'ig': "Ndị agha ekwuola kpọmkwem na ISWAP nwere ike ma ya ejideghị isi ọrụ ebe ha kpaworo ike, tụmadị n'obodo Baga. ISWAP, n'aka nke ya, kwuru eziokwu ma ọ sị na ha achụọla ndị agha n'ebe ha wakporola gunyere Baga. Ma ndị agha,  ma ndị omekome enweghị ike ijide ma chịkwaa nnukwu ala ahụ. Ma ka ha achọghị ịrụ ụlọ anya na-ahụ n'ebe ahụ dị ha mma, ISWAP ejeela n'ụzọ ga-esiri ndị agha ike ịchọta. N'aka nke ọzọ, site n'ikwu na ndị ọrụ ya ji obodo, ndị agha emeriela naanị site ime ka ha bụrụ ọbọgwụ ma dị mfe ndị iro ịwakpo. ", 'en': 'The military have rightly stated that ISWAP may not be holding most of the territories where it overran its bases, especially the town of Baga. ISWAP, on its part, is also right when it says it has sacked soldiers from the areas it attacked, including Baga. Neither the military nor the insurgents have the manpower and capacity to hold and govern over these large expanse of land sustainably. But in desisting from building visible administrative and military structures in the areas of their primary interest ISWAP have evolved in a way that is difficult for Nigerian troops to track. On the other hand, by being fixated with claim of control of territories the military have only succeeded in making its troops sitting ducks and easy targets of the enemy.'}

{'ig': "Ido anya nke ọma, ISWAP enweghịzi mmasị iwere ụlọ ndị agha dịka nke dị na Baga ma nọrọ ebe ahụ. Ebe ahụ adịghị atụmatụ ha mma ma ọlị. Ihe masịrị ha nke ukwu bụ iwere ngwaọgụ dị n'ebe ndị ahụ ma na etinye ụjọ n'ime ndị agha ahụ nke mere ka ọ ghara ịdịrị ndị agha mfe ikwado ọgụ. Ọmụmatụ, ka ụbọchị abụọ gasịrị ka awakposịrị ụlọ agha dị na Baga, ndị ISWAP pụrụ ebe ahụ ma buru ngwaọgụ ha pụọ. site n'ọwa ozi kwesiri ntụkwasị obi, ebumnobi ha abụghị ijide ma were ụlọ agha, ndị na-amasị ndị ISWAP bụ ịdị na-achụpụ ndị agha n'ebe ọrụ ha rue ngafe ogbe Chad.", 'en': 'More clearly, ISWAP is no longer showing interest in taking a formidable military base such as was in Baga and staying put there. It doesn’t apparently serve their tactical and strategic interest well. They are more interested in taking over military hardware and ammunition in those bases while instilling fear on the troops and making it extremely difficult for the military to have the comfort to plan and launch attacks. For instance, two days after overrunning the military base in Baga, the ISWAP moved out of location with military hardware and ammunition. According to knowledgeable sources, the objective is not to necessarily capture and hold new territories, what is far more strategic to ISWAP is to continually “unsettle the military in their bases across the Lake Chad region.”'}

{'ig': "enweghị ezigbo ihe ngosi nke ụzọ aghụghọ ndị ISWAP nwere megide ndị agha karịa ịhụ na ndị agha Naịjirịa nọ n'ebe ndị enwere ọgbaaghara ka ha hapụ inwe ike rụọ ọrụ ha. kama, ha nọ ebe dị iche iche na-eche ụbọchị mwakpo ọzọ. nsogbu dị na ya bụ ipe mpe ndị agha n'ebe ndị ahụ. ọmụmatụ, na naanị n'otu ebe ndote ndị ejidere na Jos, steeti Plateau, enwere ihe karịrị ọdọ ndị agha nke ahapụrụla na jide. N'otu aka ahụ, ndị agha chọrọ ịgbapụ bụ ndị nke ejiderela site na ngwaọrụ ndị agha na mba. n'oke ihere nke ọnọdụ na-eweta, ndị isi agha na-ezochi ihe ndị dị etu a. ", 'en': 'There is no better indication to the effectiveness of the tactical approach of ISWAP against the military than seeing that Nigerian troops in the troubled locations are unable to undertake patrol duties. {'ig': "Onye agha nke nọ n'ụlọọgwụ kwara arịrị na ndị agha abụrụla ndị efu. O kwuru na ọtụtụ ndị agha eriela mbọmbọ n'ọrụ ha n'ihi ndị Boko Haram. {'ig': 'Onyeisi kpata kpata Ibrahim Idris, dịka ndị Premium TImes siri kwu n\'ụbọchị nke iriabụọ na asatọ n\'ọnwa DIsemba n\'afọ 2018, kwuru maka mgbasa. "Ndị uweojii nwere obi ọma n\'ebe ndị isi ha nọ maka ịchụla ha, anyị abụghị ndị chi ọma maka na mgbe anyị chọrọ izopụ, anwụchiri anyị na ekpeghị anyị ikpe ọtụtụ ọnwa," ka otu onye agha ejidere n\'otu Special Task Force (STF) na Jos. {'ig': 'Otu onye ọchị agha nke obi siri ike n\'ihu ọgụ nke gwara ndị nta akụkọ anyị okwu banyere ọnọdụ ha toro ndị agha ha maka idi ike ha ọtụtụ oge. N\'okwu ya, enwere ọtụtụ mwakpo n\'ụlọ ndị agha site n\'aka ndị oyiegwu ahụ achụrụ karịa ndị ahụ nọ n\'ebe akwariri. "Ndị oyiegwu ji onyoonyo eje n\'ihu ọgụ, ebe anyị, dịka iwu si dị , anaghị eme etu a." He said that unlike the terrorists, the military do not carry cameras into the battlefront to record gun exchanges. {'ig': 'ọtụtụ n\'ime mwakpo dị ukwu nke na ọtụtụ ọdọ ndị agha bụ nke imirikiti meruru ahụ. site n\'aka ọtụtụ ndị ụlọ mgbasa ozi, opekata mpe ndị agha otu puku abụrụla ndị egburu n\'afọ 2018. Ndị a nwụrụ agụrụ ọnụ agụnyeghị ndị egburu na Niger Republic, Yobe, Adamawa na Ọdịda Borno. N\'ezie, o nwebeghị afọ egburu ndị agha dịka egburu n\'afọ 2018, ọ bụghị n\'afọ 2013 na 2014 nke anyị ahụghị ụdị ogbugbu anyị hụrụ ugbua,"ka otu onye agha bụ dibịa bekee kwuru na Maiduguri. Nke ka njọ nye ndị agha, site n\'aka ndị ISWAP, bụ ihe mmaja dị iche iche bụ ndị agha adọọrọ n\'agha ka ha zukiere ha etu esi eji ngwaọgụ ọgbara ọhụrụ alụ ọgụ tutu ha emee ha ohu maọbụ gbuo ha. ', 'en': 'Some of these attacks were so overwhelming that the bases were overrun with hundreds of casualties. According to multiple media reports, not less than 1,000 soldiers were killed in 2018. These casualty figures do not include soldiers killed in Niger Republic, Yobe, Adamawa and in Southern Borno. “In fact, there has never been a year soldiers were killed more than in 2018; not even 2013 and 2014 did we see the kind of casualties we experienced today,” said another soldier who doubles as a medical doctor in Maiduguri. More traumatizing for soldiers, according to ISWAP sources, are the humiliating experience of scores of abducted soldiers compelled to tutor the insurgents on new weapons handling before they are enslaved or executed.'}

{'ig': "Ụzọ ozi ziri ezi kwuru na ọgbọ agha dị na Monguno bụ naanị nke na-arụ ọrụ n'ezi Maiduguri enwebeghị nsogbu. Anọ maọbụ ise dị na Gajiram, Gajiganna, Gubio, Kareto, ebe Damasak bụ ndị agha jikọrọ ọnụ nọ na ya tinyere ndị Niger republic. dịka onyeisi agha nọ n'ụlọọgwụ, 'ndị agha  nọ n'ọgbọ ndị ahụ agbaala ọsọ ndụ ma ha enweghị ike njegharị  maọbụ mwakpo ọbụla'.", 'en': 'Informed sources state that the military facility in Monguno is probably the only larest operational base outside of Maiduguri presently that is unaffected. Four or five are in Gajiram, Gajiganna, Gubio, Kareto, while Damasak is manned by the Multi-National Joint Task Force at the border with Niger republic. According to a serving military officer currently hospitalized, “the soldiers in most of these bases have all taken up defensive positions to protect their turfs and can hardly venture outside to patrol or engage in any offensive attack”.'}

{'ig': 'dịka ndị ọrụ na-apụ, ụlọ agha n\'onwe ya ewezugala echiche \'alaghị azụ, akwụsịghị ọgụ\' abụrụla ndị lara azụ n\'ọdọ agha dị iche iche. Izuụka olenaole gara aga, ha mechiri ụlọ agha abụọ na Gudumbali na Kukawa. "Anyị gbagara na Monguno tutu awakpo Baga. Ugbua, ọtụtụ ndị agha na ndị mmadụ na-agbapụ na Monguno jee Maiduguri," ka onye agha n\'ụlọ obibi ọnụ ala nke Shagari na Maiduguri kwuru. O kwuru enweghị enyemaka ndị agha. Nke dị njọ bụ etu ndị ISWAP si agba mbọ ịhụ na anyị matara nkwado ha maka ime mwakpo. O nweghị mwakpo ọbụla mere nke anyị ahụghị tutu o mee, agbanyeghị nkea, anyị enweghị enyemaka," ka o kwuru n\'olu akwa.', 'en': 'Just like the officers deserting, the Military itself has long abandoned any mentality of “no retreat, no surrender,’ having steadily been on the retreat from several military bases. Weeks ago, they shut down two bases in Gudumbali and Kukawa. “We retreated to Monguno before Baga was attacked. Now, some soldiers and residents are running away from Monguno to Maiduguri,” reported a soldier in Shagari Low Cost Housing Estate in Maiduguri. He highlights the utter helplessness of the soldiers: what is disturbing is the effrontery of “ISWAP in making sure that we are fully made aware of their plans ahead of any attack. There was never an attack that we don’t see in advance, yet we are helpless,” he lamented.'}

{'ig': 'n\'etiti ndaghachi azụ a, ndị agha na-eriju afọ n\'oge ọgụ ahụ. ISSA, otu nke gọọmentị enweghị dị na Washington nke nwere ikike n\'aka mba ụwa n\'ihe banyere nchekwa mba ụwa kwuru na ihe mpụ dị n\'etiti ndị ọchị agha nke Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari bụ ihe mere na Naịjirịa na-ada n\'agha megide ndị Boko Haram.', 'en': 'In the midst of these setbacks, military fat cats are feeding exceedingly well on account of the war. {'ig': 'Site na mkpesa, naanị agha bara uru ndị agha Naịjirịa na-alụ bụ \'ịkwụsị igbasa ozi maka mpụ, nke ruru ọtụtụ ijeri dọla, iji zụta ihe nye ndị isi ọchị agha na ihe erimeri ndị agha." nke karịrị ihe ọbụla, achọpụtala na ndị ọgụ Lake Chad na ndị ahịa nke mba ahụ nọ n\'okpuru ISWAP ndị na-agba mbọ ka ndị achụpụrụ n\'ụlọ ha laghachi n\'ụlọ ha. mana, maka ndị ọzọ,ọ bụ ibu agha ma ọtụtụ oge , merie site n\'aka ndị agha bụ nke mere ka ọtụtụ chọọ ibanye. Onye anabatara ọhụrụ ma bụrụkwa onye mba French kwuru "okwu agamniihu nke ISWAP pụtara naanị otu ihe, Allah nonyere anyị." Onye ọzọ nke gbahapụrụ nnukwu azụmahịa nke ezinaụlọ ya na Kano ịbụ onye ọgụ kwuru, "Enweghị m uche abụọ na ndụ mmụọ ozi so anyị alụ ọgụ a, ma ọbụghị ya, enweghị ihe ọzọ pụrụ ịkọwa mmeri anyị."', 'en': "According to the report, the only significant engagement which the Nigerian military leadership seems determined to fight “is to stop the leakage of information about massive corruption, running into the equivalent of several billions of dollars, in the purchase by senior military officers of major military capital goods and military consumables, including the troops’ own food.” More than anything, it is the noticeable resurgence of the Lake Chad and the commercial viability of the territories under ISWAP that present the greatest pull on individuals in the Internally Displaced Persons (IDP) camps to return to their villages. But for others, it is their ability to put out a good fight and sometimes win with an Army that enjoys global support, that is the biggest inspiration that makes many want to join. A recent recruit and a Francophone citizen said, “ISWAP's fortunes only means one thing, Allah with us.” Another who abandoned his rich family business in Kano to become a fighter said, “I have no doubt Angels are fighting with us, otherwise there is nothing that explains our victories.”"}

{'ig': "N'ihe emume ndị a, ndị agha Naịjirịa aga aga n'ihu n'usoro ọgụgụisi nke ga-ebute ọdịda ihere? {'ig': "N'agbanyeghị mgbasa ozi nke mba ụwa  banyere ọgbaghara nke Naịjirịa, nke amaara nke ọma bụ Global Terrorism Index n'afọ 2018 nke Naịjirịa gbọrọ mba nke atọ n'ihe gbasara iyi egwu, mana ndị agha na ndị ọchịchị emeela ka ọ bụ na ọ gbasaghị ha. {'ig': 'Ị hụrụ, Olemilekan nwere nne nke na-ahụ ọdịnịihu. Ọ nwere nghọta n\'ihe banyere ime nke ọma. Agbanyeghị na ọ bụ onye ụbịam, o kpughị isi. {'ha': 'Ana haɓaka yawan haɗarin cutar coronavirus (COVID-19) a cikin Tarayyar Turai/Tatalin Arzikin Yankin Turai da Ingila, ran 1 ga watan Janairu zuwa ran 15 watan Maris 2020', 'en': ' Rapidly increasing cumulative incidence of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in the European Union/European Economic Area and the United Kingdom, 1 January to 15 March 2020 '}

{'ha': 'Lamarin da ya haifar da cututtukan Coronavirus (COVID-19) yana nuna irin wannan yanayin a cikin Tarayyar Turai/Yankin tattalin arzikin Turai da Ingila da ke tabbatar da cewa, yayin da a wani matakin daban dangane da ƙasar, cutar ta COVID-19 tana ci gaba cikin sauri a duk ƙasashe.', 'en': ' The cumulative incidence of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) cases is showing similar trends in European Union/European Economic Area countries and the United Kingdom confirming that, while at a different stage depending on the country, the COVID-19 pandemic is progressing rapidly in all countries. '}

{'ha': 'Dangane da shaida daga Italiya, ƙasashe, asibitoci da rukunin kulawa mai zurfi ya kamata su ƙara shiryawar su don karuwar marasa lafiyar COVID-19 waɗanda zasu buƙaci kiwon lafiya, kuma musamman kulawa mai zurfi.', 'en': ' Based on the experience from Italy, countries, hospitals and intensive care units should increase their preparedness for a surge of patients with COVID-19 who will require healthcare, and in particular intensive care. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 31 ga watan Disamba 2019, an ba da rahoton wani tarin cututtukan huhu da ba a san ilimin halittar sa ba a Wuhan, Lardin Hubei, kasar Sin.', 'en': ' On 31 December 2019, a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown aetiology was reported in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 9 ga watan Janairu shekara 2020, Cibiyar Kula da Cututtuka da Rigakafin Cuta ta kasar Sin ta ba da rahoton wakili da ke kawo sabon cutar coronavirus ne wanda aka mai da shi a matsayin cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsananin coronavirus 2 (SARS-COV-2).', 'en': ' On 9 January 2020, the China Center for Disease Control and Prevention reported the causative agent as being a novel coronavirus now referred to as severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2). '}

{'ha': 'Tun daga wannan lokacin, cutar da ke haifar da kamuwa da cutar SARS-CoV-2 an sanya mata suna cutar coronavirus (COVID-19).', 'en': ' Since, the illness resulting from SARS-CoV-2 infection has been named coronavirus disease (COVID-19). '}

{'ha': 'Shaida zuwa yau ita ce ca 80% na mutane tare da COVID-19 suna da cuta mai laushi, wato kamuwa da cutar hanyoyin numfashi tare da ko ba tare da cutar huhu ba, kuma yawancin waɗannan suna samun sauki.', 'en': ' Evidence to date is that ca 80% of individuals with COVID-19 have a mild disease, i.e. a respiratory tract infection with or without pneumonia, and most of these recover. '}

{'ha': 'A cikin kashi 14% masu cututtuka, COVID-19 yana haɓaka cikin mummunan cutar da ke buƙatar kwana a asibiti yayin da raguwar kashi 6% suna fuskantar mummunan cutar da ke buƙatar kulawa mai zurfi.', 'en': ' In ca 14% cases, COVID-19 develops into a more severe disease requiring hospitalisation while the remaining 6% cases experience critical illness requiring intensive care. '}
{'ha': 'Yawan mutuwar marasa lafiya a asibiti sakamakon COVID-19 ya kai ca kashi 4%.', 'en': ' The mortality of patients hospitalised due to COVID-19 is ca 4%. '}

{'ha': 'A cikin wannan binciken, muna tantance sauye-sauye game da abin da ya faru na COVID-19 a cikin kowace Europeanasashen Turai / Yankin Turai na Yankin Turai (EU/EEA) da Kingdomasar Ingila (Birtaniya) tare da kwatanta su da na lardin Hubei, Sin.', 'en': ' In this study, we assess the trends in the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 in each European Union/European Economic Area (EU/EEA) country and the United Kingdom (UK) and compare them to that of Hubei Province, China. '}

{'ha': 'Hakanan muna kwatanta adadin masu kamuwa da cutarbCOVID-19 a kasachen EU/EEA da UK tare da na Italiya lokacin ranar 31 ga watan Janairu - ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020.', 'en': ' We also compare the current number of COVID-19 cases in EU/EEA countries and the UK with that in Italy during 31 January–15 March 2020. '}
{'ha': 'Lamuran cutar COVID-19 a kasashen EU / EEA da UK', 'en': ' COVID-19 cases in EU/EEA countries and the UK '}

{'ha': 'Bayan kasar Sin, COVID-19 ya ci gaba da yaduwar kasashe daban-daban da kuma saurin annban COVID-19 a cikin sauran duniya a halin yanzu tana bin wannan kasar.', 'en': ' Subsequent to China, COVID-19 underwent further geographical spread and the dynamic of the COVID-19 pandemic in the rest of the world currently follows that of this country. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 11 ga watan Maris 2020, Darakta Janar na Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO) ya ayyana COVID-19 a matsayin annoba.', 'en': ' On 11 March 2020, the Director General of the World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a pandemic. '}

{'ha': 'A cikin fitowar ta ranar 5 ga watan Maris na Eurosurveillance 2020, Spiteri et al. wanda aka ba da rahoto game da Turai ta farko ta tabbatar da lamarin cutar COVID-19 bisa ga bayyanar lamarin WHO.', 'en': ' In the 5 March issue of Eurosurveillance 2020, Spiteri et al. reported on the first European confirmed COVID-19 cases according to the WHO case definition. '}

{'ha': 'A cikin EU/EEA, Faransa ta gabatar da farko lamarin cutar guda uku a ranar 24 ga watan Janairu 2020 a cikin mutanen da suka dawo daga Wuhan, Lardin Hubei, Kasar Sin.', 'en': ' In the EU/EEA, the first three confirmed cases were reported by France on 24 January 2020 in persons returning from Wuhan, Hubei Province, China. '}

{'ha': 'Kamar yadda yake a ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020, an gano lamarin cutar COVID-19 a cikin dukkan ƙasashe 30 na EU/EEA da UK, inda tsakanin ranar 31 ga watan Disamba 2019 kuma wannan ranar ta haɗa, masun kamu da cutar 39,768 da mutuwar mutane 1,727 wanda aka ruwaito, tare da lamarin 17,750. da mutuwar mutane 1,441 daga Italiya kadai.', 'en': ' As at 15 March 2020, COVID-19 cases had been detected in all 30 EU/EEA countries and the United Kingdom (UK), whereby between 31 December 2019 and that date included, 39,768 cases and 1,727 deaths had been reported, with 17,750 cases and 1,441 deaths from Italy alone. '}
{'ha': 'Samun lambar tarawa da tarawar abin da ya faru na masun cututtukar COVID-19', 'en': ' Obtaining cumulative number and cumulative incidence of COVID-19 cases '}

{'ha': "A Cibiyar Yaki da Cututtuka ta Yankin Turai (ECDC), an sanar da ƙididdigar COVID-19 a cikin kowace ƙasa a duniya, wanda aka samo daga kawai kafofin hukuma kamar ma'aikatar lafiya ta ƙasashe, hukumomin kiwon lafiya na ƙasa da na WHO da WHO, ana sabunta su. kowace rana da karfe 8:00 na safe.", 'en': ' At the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC), the notified COVID-19 case counts in each country worldwide, obtained from only official sources such as the countries’ Ministry of Health, national and regional health authorities and the WHO, are updated each day at 8:00 a.m. '}

{'ha': 'An yi amfani da waɗannan bayanan don tantance halaye na COVID-19 a EU/EEA da UK, da kwatanta su da na Italiya.', 'en': ' These data were used for assessing the trends of COVID-19 in EU/EEA and the UK, and comparing them to that in Italy. '}

{'ha': 'A matsayin wakili na abubuwan da ke faruwa na lamuran COVID-19, mun kirga kwanaki 14 tarawar abin da ya faru da aka yanke na lamurar COVID-19, don haka yin la’akari da tafarkin COVID-19, a cikin kowace kasar EU/EEA da Ingila, tsakanin ranar 1 ga watan Janairu - 15 Maris 2020.', 'en': ' As a proxy of the prevalence of active COVID-19 cases, we calculated the 14-day truncated cumulative incidence of COVID-19 cases, thus taking into account the natural course of COVID-19, in each EU/EEA country and the UK, during the 1 January–15 March 2020 period. '}

{'ha': 'Mun kuma gabatar da tarawar lambar sanarwa game da lamarin kamuwa da cutan a kowace kasa a ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020 8:00 na safe idan aka kwatanta da na Italiya a ranar 31 ga watan Janairu - ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020.', 'en': ' We also presented the cumulative number of notified cases of each country as at 15 March 2020 8:00 a.m. compared with that of Italy for the 31 January–15 March 2020 period. '}
{'ha': 'Hanyar COVID-19 cikin kasachen EU/EEA da Ingila', 'en': ' Trends of COVID-19 in EU/EEA countries and the UK '}

{'ha': 'Sauye a cikin kwanaki 14 tarawar tsayar da abin da ya faru na lamarin cutar COVID-19 a cikin ƙasashen EU/EEA da UK gaba ɗaya sun bi ta lardin Hubei (Sin) (Siffa 1).', 'en': ' The trends in the 14-day truncated cumulative incidence of COVID-19 cases in EU/EEA countries and the UK generally followed that of Hubei Province (China) (Figure 1). '}

{'ha': 'Don EU/EEA da Ingila gaba ɗaya, yawan abin da ya faru na COVID-19 ya fara ƙaruwa kusan ran 21 ga watan Fabrairu sannan kuma ya karu sosai a kusa da ranar 28 ga watan Fabrairu 2020 (kayan kari abubuwa).', 'en': ' For the EU/EEA and the UK overall, the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 started to increase around 21 February and then increased sharply around 28 February 2020 (Supplementary material). '}

{'ha': 'Wannan ya jawu ta yawan saurin karuwa cikin lambar rahoton lamarin cutar daga Italiya, amma duk sauran kasashen EU/EEA da Birtaniya sun nuna irin wannan yanayin na kara yawan abubuwan COVID-19 (Karin kaya).', 'en': ' This was mostly driven by the rapid increase in the number of reported cases from Italy, but all other EU/EEA countries and the UK showed similar increasing trends of the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 (Supplementary material). '}

{'ha': 'Siffa 2 yana nuna lamarin cutar COVID-19, a cikin EU/EEA da UK idan aka kwatanta da wannan a Italiya na ranar 31 ga watan Janairu - ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020.', 'en': ' Figure 2 shows the cumulative number of COVID-19 cases, in EU/EEA countries and the UK compared with that in Italy for the 31 January–15 March 2020 period. '}

{'ha': 'Yana nuna cewa, kamar yadda a ranar 15 ga watan Maris kafe 8:00 na safe, wasu ƙasashe EU/EEA 15 da Ingila sun riga sun bayar da rahoton masu kamuwa da cutar kwatanta da na Italiya kafin makonni 3 da suka shige ko ƙasa da haka.', 'en': ' It highlights that, as at 15 March 8:00 a.m., 15 other EU/EEA countries and the UK had already reported a total number of cases comparable to that of Italy just 3\u2009weeks prior or less. '}

{'ha': 'Sakamakon binciken mu ya nuna cewa lambar masu kamuwa da cutar COVID-19 yana karuwa cikin hanzari a cikin EU/EEA da UK.', 'en': ' Our results indicate that the number of notified cases of COVID-19 is rapidly increasing in the EU/EEA and the UK. '}

{'ha': 'Abubuwan lura da aka gani a cikin abin da ya faru na COVID-19 sun ba da shawarar cewa annobar ta ci gaba da sauri a cikin sauri a duk ƙasashe.', 'en': ' The observed trends in the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 suggest that the pandemic is progressing at a comparable speed in all countries. '}

{'ha': "Wannan duk da cewa ƙasashe sun kasance a matakai daban-daban, a cikin martanin lafiyar jama'a na ƙasa, kuma mai yiwuwa ƙararraki daban-daban a cikin ƙasashe da ƙa'idodi daban-daban don zaɓar marasa lafiya waɗanda dole ne a gwada su don tabbatar da COVID-19, gami da samun gwaji.", 'en': ' This is despite countries being at different stages, variations in national public health responses, and possibly different case definitions in countries and different protocols for selecting patients that must be tested for confirmation of COVID-19, including catch-up testing. '}

{'ha': 'A farkon Maris 2020, likitoci a yankuna da abin ya shafa na Italiya sun baiyana halin da ake ciki inda ca 10% na marasa lafiya da COVID-19 suka buƙaci kulawa mai zurfi kuma kafofin watsa labaru sun ba da rahoton cewa asibitoci da rukunin kulawa mai zurfi a cikin waɗannan yankuna sun riga sun kai iyakar ƙarfin su.', 'en': ' Early March 2020, doctors in the affected regions of Italy described a situation in which ca 10% of patients with COVID-19 required intensive care and media sources reported that hospitals and intensive care units in these regions had already reached their maximum capacity. '}

{'ha': 'Bayanai game da kai marasa lafiya a asibiti don COVID-19 da/ko sashin kulawa mai zurfi a halin yanzu akwai a matakin EU/EEA don kawai kashi 6% da kashi 1% lamarin cutar, bi da bi (bayanan ba su nuna ba).', 'en': ' Data on admission of COVID-19 cases in a hospital and/or an intensive care unit are currently available at EU/EEA level for only 6% and 1% cases, respectively (data not shown). '}

{'ha': 'Yakamata, duk da haka, a tattara su ta hanyar tsari don dacewa da bayanan sa ido na halin yanzu wanda ya mayar da hankali kan rahoton masu kamu da cutar da kuma yawan mutuwa.', 'en': ' They should, however, be collected in a systematic fashion to complement current surveillance data that focus on the number of reported cases and the number of deaths. '}

{'ha': 'Nazarin da aka yi a shekara ta 2010 zuwa 11 ya nuna babban bambanci a cikin kasancewar kulawa mai zurfi da gadaje na kulawa a Turai, kama daga 29.2 a Jamus zuwa gadaje 4.2 ga yawan jama’a 100,000 a Portugal.', 'en': ' A study performed in 2010–11 showed a large variation in the availability of intensive care and intermediate care beds in Europe, ranging from 29.2 in Germany to 4.2 beds per 100,000 population in Portugal. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan yana nufin cewa ƙasashe na iya samun albarkatu ko ƙasa fiye da Italiya (12.5 kulawa mai zurfi da gadaje na kulawar dai-dai da cikin yawan jama’a 100,000 cikin 2010-11).', 'en': ' This means that countries may have more or less resources than Italy (12.5 intensive care and intermediate care beds per 100,000 population in 2010–11). '}

{'ha': 'Yanayin tsarafawa wanda ya danganta ga cikawar cibiyoyin kiwon lafiya, da ƙididdigar kowace ƙasar EU/EEA da UK da mamayar zaman asibiti domin lamarin cutar COVID-19 wanda ya hadu da > > 90% da hadarin fi yawan gadon kulawa, an samar da su a sabuntawa ta shida na ECDC saurin kimantawar hadari kan COVID-19.', 'en': ' Modelling scenarios related to healthcare capacity saturation, with estimates for each EU/EEA country and the UK of the prevalence of hospitalised COVID-19 cases associated with a >\u200990% risk of exceeding intensive care bed capacity, are provided in the sixth update of the ECDC rapid risk assessment on COVID-19. '}

{'ha': 'Tunda yake masun kamuwa da cutan a tare cikin wasu yakin kasashen EU/EEA da UK, da asibitoci da kuma rukunin kulawa mai zurfin yawancin lokaci na taimaki jama’ar yankin da aka sani, bayanai game da lamarin cututtuka da gadajen kulawa zai fi dacewa a samo su a matakin Nomenclature na raka’ar yankunan ƙasa don ƙidaya 2 (NUTS-2) mataki.', 'en': ' Since cases have so far clustered in certain regions in EU/EEA countries and the UK, and hospitals and intensive care units usually serve a defined regional catchment population, information about cases and intensive care beds should preferably be made available at the Nomenclature of territorial units for statistics 2 (NUTS-2) level. '}

{'ha': 'Koyi daga Italiya da abubuwan da ake samu a halin yanzu a wasu ƙasashe sun nuna cewa annobar COVID-19 tana ci gaba cikin sauri a cikin EU/EEA da Ingila.', 'en': ' The experience from Italy and the current trends in other countries show that the COVID-19 pandemic is progressing rapidly in the EU/EEA and the UK. '}

{'ha': "Kasashe, asibitoci da rukunin kulawa mai zurfi ya kamata su shirya kansu don yanayin watsawar al'umma na SARS-CoV-2 da karuwa a yawan masu haƙuri da COVID-19 waɗanda ke buƙatar kiwon lafiya, da kuma kulawa ta musamman, kamar wanda ke faruwa. a cikin yankunan da Italiya ta shafa.", 'en': ' Countries, hospitals and intensive care units should thus prepare themselves for a scenario of sustained community transmission of SARS-CoV-2 and an increase in the number of patients with COVID-19 requiring healthcare, and in particular intensive care, such as the one occurring in the affected regions of Italy. '}

{'ha': 'Kamar yadda aka nuna a cikin ƙididdigar haɓakar haɗari na ECDC na baya-bayan nan, saurin aiki, cikakken aiki da cikakken tsari yana da mahimmanci don jinkirta yaduwar SARS-COV-2, tare da canzawa daga haɓakawa zuwa tsarin ragewa, kamar yadda saurin karuwa a yawan masu kamuwa da cutar ba zai iya samar da masun bada shawara da cikaken lokaci ma asibitoci domin fahimta, karba da daidaita hanyar aiwatarwa kafin lokacin.', 'en': ' As pointed out in the recent ECDC rapid risk assessment, a rapid, proactive and comprehensive approach is essential to delay the spread of SARS-COV-2, with a shift from a containment to a mitigation approach, as the anticipated rapid increase in the number of cases may not provide decision makers and hospitals enough time to comprehend, accept and adapt their response accordingly if not implemented ahead of time. '}

{'ha': "Binciken saurin haɗari ya kuma lissafa matakan kiwon lafiyar jama'a don rage tasirin annoban.", 'en': ' The rapid risk assessment also lists the public health measures to mitigate the impact of the pandemic. '}

{'ha': 'Akwai gajeriyar tagar dama a yayin da ƙasashe ke da damar ƙara yawan ƙoƙarinsu na sarrafawa don rage yaduwar SARS-CoV-2 da rage matsin kiwon lafiya.', 'en': ' There is a short window of opportunity during which countries have the possibility to further increase their control efforts to slow down the spread of SARS-CoV-2 and decrease the pressure on healthcare. '}

{'ha': 'Fadar da wannan, wataƙila tsarin kiwon lafiyar na wasu ƙasashe EU/EEA zai iya fuskantar yawan marasa lafiya waɗanda ke buƙatar kulawa mai zurfi a cikin kwanaki masu zuwa ko makonni masu zuwa.', 'en': ' Failing this, it is likely that the healthcare systems of other EU/EEA countries will face a surge of patients that require intensive care within the coming days or weeks. '}

{'ha': 'Barkewar cutar Coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19), wanda ya haifar da cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani (SARS) coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), ya zuwa yanzu ya kashe mutane fiye da 3,000 kuma ta kama fiye da mutane 80,000 a kasar Sin da sauran wurare a duniya, ya zama masifa ne ga mutane.', 'en': ' The outbreak of Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), has thus far killed over 3,000 people and infected over 80,000 in China and elsewhere in the world, resulting in catastrophe for humans. '}

{'ha': "Mai kama da kwayar cutar guda ɗaya, SARS-CoV, wanda ya haifar da SARS a cikin dubban mutane a 2003, SARS-CoV-2 Hakanan za'a iya watsa shi daga jemage kuma yana haifar da alamun irin wannan ta irin wannan hanyar tsarin.", 'en': ' Similar to its homologous virus, SARS-CoV, which caused SARS in thousands of people in 2003, SARS-CoV-2 might also be transmitted from the bats and causes similar symptoms through a similar mechanism. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, COVID-19 yana da ƙananan rauni da kisa fiye da SARS amma yafi watsawa kuma yana rinjayar yawancin tsofaffi fiye da matasa kuma maza fiye da mata.', 'en': ' However, COVID-19 has lower severity and mortality than SARS but is much more transmissive and affects more elderly individuals than youth and more men than women. '}

{'ha': 'Saboda martani ga yawan lambar wallafewa cikin sauri a kan cutar da ke kunno kai, wannan labarin yayi ƙoƙarin samar da ingantaccen nazari game haɓaka batun bincike mai sauri.', 'en': ' In response to the rapidly increasing number of publications on the emerging disease, this article attempts to provide a timely and comprehensive review of the swiftly developing research subject. '}

{'ha': 'Za mu koyi tushe game da epidemiology, etiology, virology, bincike, jinya, hangar zuwan cutar (Prognosis), da kuma hanawar cutan.', 'en': ' We will cover the basics about the epidemiology, etiology, virology, diagnosis, treatment, prognosis, and prevention of the disease. '}

{'ha': 'Kodayake tambayoyin da yawa har yanzu suna buƙatar amsoshi, muna fatan wannan bita ta taimaka a cikin fahimta da kawar da cutar mai barazanar.', 'en': ' Although many questions still require answers, we hope that this review helps in the understanding and eradication of the threatening disease. '}

{'ha': 'Bikin bazara a ranar 25 ga Janairu, 2020 ya zama abin tunawa wanda ba a iya mantawa da shi ba ga duk Sinawa da aka nemi su kasance a gida a duk wannan hutu da kuma makonni da yawa bayan barkewar cutar.', 'en': ' The Spring Festival on January 25, 2020 has become an unprecedented and unforgettable memory to all Chinese who were urged to stay indoors for all the holiday and for many weeks after due to the outbreak of a novel viral disease. '}

{'ha': 'Kwayar cutar ta yi kama sosai da coronavirus (CoV) wacce ta haifar da barkewar cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani (SARS) a cikin shekarar 2003; don haka, Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO) ta ba shi suna SARS-CoV-2 a ranar 11 ga Fabrairu, 2020, kuma aka ba cuta mai haduwa da ita suna CoV Cutar-19 (COVID-19).', 'en': ' The virus is highly homologous to the coronavirus (CoV) that caused an outbreak of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) in 2003; thus, it was named SARS-CoV-2 by the World Health Organization (WHO) on February 11, 2020, and the associated disease was named CoV Disease-19 (COVID-19). '}

{'ha': 'Annobar ta fara ne a Wuhan, kasar Sin, kuma cikin hanzari ya bazu cikin kasar baki daya kuma zuwa kusan wasu 50 a duk duniya.', 'en': ' The epidemic started in Wuhan, China, and quickly spread throughout the entire country and to near 50 others all over the world. '}

{'ha': 'Tun daga watan Maris 2, 2020, kwayar cutar ta haifar da fiye da lamari 80,000 da aka tabbatar da yanayin kamuwa da cutar COVID-19, da marasa lafiya fiye da 40,000 suka sami sauki kuma fiye da marasa lafiya 3,000 suka mutu.', 'en': ' As of March 2, 2020, the virus has resulted in over 80,000 confirmed cases of COVID-19, with more than 40,000 patients discharged and over 3,000 patients who died. '}

{'ha': 'WHO tayi kashedin cewa COVID-19 shine "lambar 1 na abokin gaba ta jama\'a" kuma mai iya karfi fiye da ta\'addanci.', 'en': ' WHO warns that COVID-19 is “public enemy number 1” and potentially more powerful than terrorism. '}

{'ha': 'Dangane da PubMed (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/), a cikin ƙasa da watanni biyu, an buga fiye da 200 takardu akan COVID-19 ciki har da virology, epidemiology, etiology, ganewar asali, da magani tun daga rahoton farko a Janairu 7, 2020 wanda ya kayyade jerin cutar ta ware daga marasa lafiya da yawa.', 'en': ' According to PubMed (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/), in less than two months, over 200 papers have been published on COVID-19 including its virology, epidemiology, etiology, diagnosis, and treatment since the first report on January 7, 2020 that determined the sequence of the virus isolated from multiple patients. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan bita tana ƙoƙarin taƙaita ci gaban bincike a cikin sabo da kuma mai saurin bunkasa taken wuri.', 'en': ' This review attempts to summarize the research progress in the new and swiftly developing subject area. '}

{'ha': 'Duk lokacin da zai yiwu, zamuyi kokarin kwatanta COVID-19 tare da SARS da kuma wani CoV wanda ya haifar da cutar, cutar numfashi na gefen larabawa (barkewar MERS, a 2012).', 'en': ' Whenever possible, we will try to compare COVID-19 with SARS and another CoV-caused disease, Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS, an outbreak in 2012). '}

{'ha': 'Hakanan zamu tattauna abin da muka koya zuwa yanzu game da rigakafin da haifar da cutar da kuma wasu tambayoyin da suka rage.', 'en': ' We will also discuss what we have learned so far regarding the prevention and prognosis of the disease as well as some remaining yet urgent questions. '}

{'ha': "An dauki CoVs a al'adance cutar marasa guba ga mutane, akasarinsu yana haifar da kusan kashi 15% a mura 4.", 'en': ' CoVs have been traditionally considered nonlethal pathogens to humans, mainly causing approximately 15% of common colds 4. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, a cikin wannan karni, mun ci karo da cutar mutum ta mutum sau biyu, watau SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV, wanda ya haifar da asalin yaduwar a kasar Sin a shekarar 2003 da Saudi Arabia a cikin shekarar 2012, bi da bi, kuma nan da nan ya watsu cikin sauran ƙasashe tare da mummunan tashin hankali da mutuwa.', 'en': ' However, in this century, we have encountered highly pathogenic human CoVs twice, i.e., SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, which caused an outbreak originally in China in 2003 and Saudi Arabia in 2012, respectively, and soon spread to many other countries with horrible morbidity and mortality. '}

{'ha': 'Sabili da haka, COVID-19 na yanzu shine yaduwar CoV na uku a cikin tarihi da aka ajiye na mutum.', 'en': ' Therefore, the current COVID-19 is the third CoV outbreak in the recorded history of humans. '}

{'ha': 'Kamar yadda aka nuna a cikin siffa. 1,1, an fara samun cuwayoyin cutar huhu da ba ta da asasi da suka fara daga Wuhan a ranar 31 ga watan Disamba, 2019 ga Hukumar Lafiya ta Kasar Sin.', 'en': ' As shown in Fig. \u200bFig.1,1, clusters of pneumonia that had unknown origins were first reported from Wuhan on December 31, 2019 to the China National Health Commission. '}
{'ha': 'Kwana bakwai daga baya an sake bin jerin hanyoyin CoV.', 'en': ' Seven days later the sequence of the CoV was released. '}
{'ha': 'A ranar 15 ga watan Janairu, 2020 an fara bayar da rahoton karar farko daga Wuhan.', 'en': ' On January 15, 2020 the first fatal case from Wuhan was reported. '}

{'ha': 'A halin da ake ciki, cutar ta bulla cikin hanzari zuwa garuruwan makwabta, larduna, da kasashe.', 'en': ' Meanwhile, the epidemic rapidly spread to the neighboring cities, provinces, and countries. '}

{'ha': "A ranar 20 ga watan Janairu, an ba da rahoton ma'aikatan kiwon-lafiya, sun bayar da shawarar cewa yadawar mutum-zuwa-mutum abu mai yiwuwa ne.", 'en': ' On January 20, the infection of health-care providers was reported, suggesting that human-to-human transmission was possible. '}
{'ha': "A ranar 23 ga watan Janairu, an kulle birnin Wuhan tare da dakatar da jigilar jama'a.", 'en': ' On January 23, the city of Wuhan was locked down with all its public transportation stopped. '}

{'ha': "A ranar 24 ga Janairu, binciken farko na asibiti game da cutar ya ba da rahoton cewa, a cikin mutane 41 da aka tabbatar da lamuran cutan, mutane 21 kawai suna da hulɗa kai tsaye tare da kasuwar cin abincin teku na Wuhan wanda aka yi la'akari da farkon wurin kamuwa da cuta daga asalin dabba.", 'en': ' On January 24 the first clinical study on the disease reported that, out of 41 patients with confirmed cases, only 21 had direct contact with the Wuhan seafood market that was considered the starting site of the infection from an unknown animal source. '}
{'ha': 'A ranar 30 ga watar Janairu, WHO ta ba da sanarwar barkewar cutar ta gaggawa a duniya.', 'en': ' On January 30, WHO declared the outbreak a global health emergency. '}

{'ha': 'Ya zuwa lokacin hada wannan rahoto, cutar ta riga ta yadu a cikin kasar Sin da kuma kusan wasu kasashe 50 a duniya baki daya (Fig. (Fig. 2).2)', 'en': ' By the time of this report, the disease has already spread throughout China and near 50 other countries all over the world (Fig. \u200b(Fig.2).2). '}

{'ha': 'Yayin da yanayin ke gudana cikin hanzari, yanayin ƙarewa da tsananin yaduwar ya kasance za a gano.', 'en': ' As the situation is rapidly evolving, the final scope and severity of the outbreak remain to be determined. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 11 ga watan Fabrairu, 2020, wani bincike na cibiyar kan marasa lafiya 8,866 ciki har da 4,021 sun tabbatar da marassa lafiyar COVID-19 an gabatar da wani sabon bayanin da aka samu game da annoban kamar haka (https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/UlBi-HX_rHPXa1qHA2bhdA).', 'en': ' On February 11, 2020, a multi-center study on 8,866 patients including 4,021 confirmed COVID-19 patients presented a more updated illustration of the epidemic as follows (https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/UlBi-HX_rHPXa1qHA2bhdA). '}
{'ha': "Cutar SARS tana kama mutane masu kowanne irin shekaru, amma ta fi kama 'yan shekara 30-65.", 'en': ' SARS-CoV-2 infected people of all ages, but mainly at the age of 30-65. '}

{'ha': 'Kusan rabin kashi (47.7%) na mutanen da ke kamuwa da cutar sun wuce shekaru 50, kaɗan kalilan ba su kasa da shekara 20 ba, kuma mutane 14 ne kawai suka kamu da cutar waɗanda ke ƙarƙashin shekara 10.', 'en': ' Almost half (47.7%) of the infected individuals were over 50 years old, very few were under 20, and only 14 infected individuals were under the age of 10. '}
{'ha': 'SARS-CoV-2 sun fi kama maza (0.31 / 100,000) fiye da mata (0.27 / 100,000).', 'en': ' SARS-CoV-2 infected more men (0.31/100,000) than women (0.27/100,000). '}
{'ha': 'COVID-19 ya fadada cikin gungura a ciki da kewayen Hubei.', 'en': ' COVID-19 expanded in clusters mainly in and around Hubei. '}
{'ha': 'COVID-19 ya ɗauki tsawon kwanaki 5 (2-9) daga farko zuwa binciken ganewar sa.', 'en': ' COVID-19 took an average of 5 (2-9) days from onset to diagnosis. '}
{'ha': 'Matsakaicin lokacin girman cutan shine kwanakin 4.8 (3.0-7.2).', 'en': ' The average incubation period was 4.8 (3.0-7.2) days. '}
{'ha': 'Matsakaicin lokacin daga farko zuwa mutuwa ya kasance kwanaki 9.5 (4.8-13)', 'en': ' The average time from onset to death was 9.5 (4.8-13) days. '}

{'ha': 'Lambar asali ta haihuwa (R0) ya kasance 3.77 (95% CI: 3.51-4.05), kuma daidaitawar R0 shine 2.23-4.82.', 'en': ' The basic reproductive number (R0) was 3.77 (95% CI: 3.51-4.05), and the adjusted R0 was 2.23-4.82. '}

{'ha': 'Yawan masu kamuwa da cutar sun karu sosai kafin ranar 23 ga Janairu 2020, wanda ya yi daidai da lokacin da ake daukar jigilar kayayyaki kafin bikin bazara a kasar Sin.', 'en': ' The number of infected people increased exponentially before 23 Jan. 2020, matching the time of massive transportation before the Spring Festival in China. '}

{'ha': 'Yawan mutuwar marasa lafiya wanda aka tabbata da lamura kamu da cutan ya kai kashi 1.44% (95% CI: 1.10-1.86%), kuma daidaitawar mutuwar duk marasa lafiya shine kashi 3.06% (95% CI: 2.02-4.59%).', 'en': ' The mortality of patients with confirmed cases was 1.44% (95% CI: 1.10-1.86%), and the adjusted mortality of all the patients was 3.06% (95% CI: 2.02-4.59%). '}

{'ha': "Manyan dalilan haɗarin uku don COVID-19 sun kasance jima'i (namiji), shekaru (≥60), da matsananciyar ciwon huhu.", 'en': ' Three major risk factors for COVID-19 were sex (male), age (≥60), and severe pneumonia. '}

{'ha': "CoVs dan rashen iyali ne na babban ambulaf ƙwayoyin cuta wanda ke dauke da ma'anar RNA guda daya.", 'en': ' CoVs are a subfamily of large and enveloped viruses containing a single strand of sense RNA. '}

{'ha': 'Ana iya rarrabasu gida uku, i.e., alpha, beta, gamma, da delta, waɗanda alpha- da beta-CoVs an san su don kamuwa da ɗan adam.', 'en': ' They can be divided into four genera, i.e., alpha, beta, gamma, and delta, of which alpha- and beta-CoVs are known to infect humans. '}

{'ha': 'Ambulaf ta kara daurin (S) glycoprotein a masu karɓar kwayar halittar sa angiotensin-mai canza enzyme 2 (ACE2) da pepeididly peptidase 4 (DPP4) don SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV, bi da bi, sannan kuma hadawar membrane yana faruwa.', 'en': ' The envelope spike (S) glycoprotein binds to its cellular receptors angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) and dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4) for SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, respectively, and then membrane fusion occurs. '}

{'ha': 'An saki kwayar cutar RNA a cikin cytoplasm; bayan sake fasaltar kwayar halittar, RNA genomic rufe baya da ambulaf na glycofurotin da sunadarai na nucleocapsid suna samar da virion-dauke da vesicles, wanda sai ya hadu da membrane na plasma don sakin kwayar cutan.', 'en': ' The viral RNA genome is released into the cytoplasm; after replication of the viral genome, genomic RNA accompanied by envelope glycoproteins and nucleocapsid proteins forms virion-containing vesicles, which then fuse with the plasma membrane to release the virus. '}
{'ha': 'An bayar da rahoton jerin kwayoyin halitta na farko na SARS-CoV-2 a ran 10 ga watan Janairu, 2020.', 'en': ' The first genomic sequence of SARS-CoV-2 was reported on January 10, 2020. '}

{'ha': "An gano SARS-CoV-2 wani sabon nau'in beta-CoV ne tare da fiye da kashi 99.98% asalin kwayoyin halitta tsakanin samfuran 10 da aka tattara daga asalin yaduwar, Kasuwar abincin teku ta Huanan a Wuhan.", 'en': ' SARS-CoV-2 was found to be a new type of beta-CoV with more than 99.98% genetic identity among 10 sequenced samples collected from the original site of the outbreak, the Huanan Seafood Market in Wuhan. '}
{'ha': 'SARS-CoV-2 ya fi kamani da SARS-CoV fiye da MERS-CoV.', 'en': ' SARS-CoV-2 is genetically more similar to SARS-CoV than to MERS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'Ta hanyar watsa microscopy na wutar lantarki, an samo barbashi na SARS-CoV-2 a sassan iskar jikin mutum na epithelium.', 'en': ' Through transmission electron microscopy, SARS-CoV-2 particles were found in ultrathin sections of human airway epithelium. '}
{'ha': 'An samo ACE2 na mutum a matsayin mai karɓa wa SARS-CoV-2 kazalika da SARS-CoV.', 'en': ' Human ACE2 was found to be a receptor for SARS-CoV-2 as well as SARS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, furotin S na SARS-CoV-2 ya danganta ga ACE2 na ɗan adam fiye da na SARS-CoV, wanda ya zo daidai da gaskiyar cewa SARS-CoV-2 yana haifar da ƙarancin kamuwa da cuta a cikin marasa lafiya fiye da SARS-CoV.', 'en': ' However, the S protein of SARS-CoV-2 binds to human ACE2 more weakly than that of SARS-CoV, which is coincident with the fact that SARS-CoV-2 causes less severe infection in patients than SARS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'SARS-CoV-2 na iya samar da gajeriyar sunadarin furotin da aka shigar ta orf3b da wani furotin da ke rufe da orf8.', 'en': ' SARS-CoV-2 can also form a novel short protein encoded by orf3b and a secreted protein encoded by orf8. '}

{'ha': 'orf3b na SARS-CoV-2 na iya taka rawa a cikin bada kwayar cuta da kuma hana bayyanar IFNβ; kodayake, orf8 ba ya da wani yanki da aka sani aiki ko motif.', 'en': ' The orf3b of SARS-CoV-2 may play a role in the viral pathogenicity and inhibit the expression of IFNβ; however, orf8 does not contain any known functional domain or motif. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 18 ga watan Fabrairu, 2020, Zhou, et al, sun ba da rahoton tsarin cryo-EM na cikakken ACE2 na dan adam a ƙudurin 2.9 Å ƙuduri cikin hadadden mai ɗaukar amino acid B0AT1.', 'en': ' On February 18, 2020, Zhou, et al., reported the cryo-EM structure of the full-length human ACE2 at 2.9 Å resolution in complex with the amino acid transporter B0AT1. '}

{'ha': 'Sun gano cewa hadadden, wanda an gano aka bude kuma an rufe, an taru a matsayin sinadari dimer kuma hadadden ACE2-B0AT1 na iya daurar sinadarai biyu na S furotin, wanda ke ba da shaida don ganewar CoV da kamuwa da cuta.', 'en': ' They found that the complex, which had open and closed conformations, was assembled as a dimer and the ACE2-B0AT1 complex can bind two S proteins, which provides evidence for CoV recognition and infection. '}

{'ha': 'B0AT1 na iya zama makasudin warkewa don gwajin magunguna don murƙushe kamuwa da cutar SARS-CoV-2.', 'en': ' B0AT1 may become a therapeutic target for drug screening to suppress SARS-CoV-2 infection. '}
{'ha': 'Asalin da kuma tsakiyar mazaman cutar.', 'en': ' The origin and intermediate host '}

{'ha': 'An san cewa SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV sun samo asali ne daga jemagu kuma ana watsa su ga mutane ta hanyar kuliyoyi da raƙuma.', 'en': ' It has been known that both SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV originated from bats and were transmitted to humans via civet cats and camels, respectively. '}

{'ha': 'Ta hanyar kwatancen fitowar cututtukan na SARS-CoV-2 tare da sauran CoVs, an yi la’akari cewa jemage ne mazaunin SARS-CoV-2 kamar yadda sabon ƙwayar cuta ya kasance kashi 96% zuwa mai kamar-SARS CoVs biyu daga jemagu da ake kira bat-SL-CoVZX45 da jemage-SL-CoVZX21.', 'en': ' Through a phylogenetic comparison of SARS-CoV-2 with other CoVs, bats were considered the native host of SARS-CoV-2 as the new virus is 96% identical to two SARS-like CoVs from bats called bat-SL-CoVZX45 and bat-SL-CoVZX21. '}

{'ha': "Duk da haka, wande mazaman tsakiya mai taimaka wa kwayar cutar ta keta shingen nau'ikan don kama mutane har yanzu ba a san shi ba, kuma har yanzu ba a fara sanin hanyar yada cutar ba.", 'en': ' However, what intermediate host helped the virus cross the species barrier to infect humans remains unknown, and the transmission route is yet to be elucidated. '}

{'ha': "Ji, et al., Sun gabatar da macizai a matsayin jigilar kwayar cutar daga jemagu zuwa mutane wanda ke da alaƙar yin ma'amala tsakanin S furotin.", 'en': ' Ji, et al., proposed snakes as a carrier of the virus from bats to humans which involved homologous recombination within the S protein. '}

{'ha': 'Dangane da wani bincike, masu bincike a Guangzhou, China, sun ba da shawarar cewa pangolins - dogon-hanci da baki, dabbobi masu cin kyashi an cikia amfani da su cikin al’adar maganin Sinawa - su ne mazama SARS-COV-2 da ke yiwu wa bisa ga kashi 99% kwayar halitta a cikin wani CoV wanda aka gano a cikin pangolins da SARS-CoV-2.', 'en': ' According to a study, researchers in Guangzhou, China, suggested that pangolins - long-snouted, ant-eating mammals often used in traditional Chinese medicine - are the potential intermediate host of SARS-CoV-2 based on 99% genetic homology in a CoV discovered in pangolins and SARS-CoV-2. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka bambancin kashi 1% ya bazu akan kwayoyin halitta guda biyu har yanzu babban bambanci ne; don haka, ana jiran sakamako na ƙarshe don tabbataccen hujja (Fig.(Fig.33).', 'en': ' However, 1% difference spread all over two genomes is still a big difference; thus, conclusive results for concrete evidence are awaited (Fig. \u200b(Fig.33). '}
{'ha': 'Sunadarain kimiyyar kadarorin SARS-CoV-2 har yanzu ba a san su ba.', 'en': ' The physicochemical properties of SARS-CoV-2 are largely not yet known. '}

{'ha': 'SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV zasu iya rayuwa cikin kwalban gwaji na tsawon awanni 48 a cikin busheshen yanayin har zuwa kwanaki 5 a ƙarƙashin 20 ° C da danshi kashi 40% -50%.', 'en': ' SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV can survive in vitro for 48 hours in a dry environment and up to 5 days under 20 °C and 40%-50% humidity. '}
{'ha': 'SARS-CoV-2 na iya mallakar kaddarorin iri daya.', 'en': ' SARS-CoV-2 may possess similar properties. '}

{'ha': 'An ba da rahoton cewa SARS-CoV-2 yana kula da haskoki na zafin rana da zafi a 56 ° C na minti 30; kashi 75% ethanol, chlorine-mai dauke da sinadarai, sinadarin peracetic acid, chloroform, da sauran abubuwan rage kiba, amma ba chlorhexidine ba, na iya lalata kwayar ta yadda ya kamata.', 'en': ' It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 is sensitive to ultraviolet rays and heat at 56 °C for 30 minutes; ether, 75% ethanol, chlorine-containing disinfectant, peracetic acid, chloroform, and other fatty solvents, but not chlorhexidine, can effectively inactivate the virus. '}

{'ha': 'Yawan mutane gabaɗaya sun rasa garkuwa ga SARS-CoV-2 kuma saboda haka ana iya kamuwa da sabuwar ƙwaya cutan.', 'en': ' The entire human population generally lacks immunity to SARS-CoV-2 and hence is susceptible to the novel virus. '}

{'ha': 'A halin yanzu, babu cikakken binciken da aka bayar da rahoton game da amsawar rigakafi ga SARS-CoV-2.', 'en': ' Currently, no detailed study has been reported regarding the immunological response to SARS-CoV-2. '}

{'ha': 'Don haka, zamu iya komawa ne kawai ga binciken da muka gabata akan wasu CoVs, musamman SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV (Fig. (Fig. 4).4).', 'en': ' Thus, we can only refer to previous studies on other CoVs, especially SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV (Fig. \u200b(Fig.4).4). '}

{'ha': "Gabaɗaya, bayan da kwayar cutar ta mamaye mai watsa shiri, an fara gane ta hanyar rigakafin garkuwar jiki ta hanyar karɓa (PRRs) gami da masu karɓa na nau'in irin-C, kamar-Toll mai karɓa (TLR), mai karɓar kamar-NOD mai karɓa (NLR) , da kamar-RIG-I mai karɓa (RLR).", 'en': ' In general, after a virus invades the host, it is first recognized by the host innate immune system through pattern recognition receptors (PRRs) including C-type lectin-like receptors, Toll-like receptor (TLR), NOD-like receptor (NLR), and RIG-I-like receptor (RLR). '}

{'ha': "Ta hanyar hanyoyi daban-daban, kwayar cutar ta haifar da bayyanar da abubuwan da ke haifar da kumburi, matattarar ƙwayoyin dendritic, da haɓaka nau'in I interferons (IFNs) waɗanda ke iyakance yaduwar ƙwayar cuta kuma suna haɓaka matakan ƙwayoyin cuta na ƙwayoyin cuta.", 'en': ' Through different pathways, the virus induces the expression of inflammatory factors, maturation of dendritic cells, and synthesis of type I interferons (IFNs) which limit the spreading of the virus and accelerate macrophage phagocytosis of viral antigens. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, sinadarin furotin N na SARS-CoV zai iya taimakawa kwayar cutar ta tsere daga amsawar garkuwan jiki.', 'en': ' However, the N protein of SARS-CoV can help the virus escape from the immune responses. '}
{'ha': 'Ba da daɗewa ba, amsar rigakafin ƙwayar cuta ta shiga cikin yaƙi da ƙwayar cuta.', 'en': ' Soon, the adaptive immune response joins the fight against the virus. '}

{'ha': 'T lymphocytes ciki har da CD4 + da CD8 + T tantanin halitta suna taka muhimmiyar rawa a cikin tsaron.', 'en': ' T lymphocytes including CD4+ and CD8+ T cells play an important role in the defense. '}

{'ha': 'Tantanin halita CD4 + T suna motsa ƙwayoyin B don samar da ƙayyadaddun rigakafin ƙwayoyin cuta, kuma sel CD8 + T tantanin halita na kashe kwayoyin cutar da suka kamu da ciwo kai tsaye.', 'en': ' CD4+ T cells stimulate B cells to produce virus-specific antibodies, and CD8+ T cells directly kill virus-infected cells. '}

{'ha': 'Mai taimakon tantanin halita T ta samar da cytokines na kumburi don taimakawa kwayoyin da ke kare su.', 'en': ' T helper cells produce proinflammatory cytokines to help the defending cells. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, CoV zai iya hana ayyukan tantanin halita T ta hanyar gabatar da apoptosis na tantanin halita T.', 'en': ' However, CoV can inhibit T cell functions by inducing apoptosis of T cells. '}

{'ha': 'Rigakafin ƙwaƙwalwar ciki har da haɗi kamar C3a da C5a da ƙwayoyin garkuwar jiki suna da mahimmanci don yaƙar kamuwa da cuta.', 'en': ' The humoral immunity including complements such as C3a and C5a and antibodies is also essential in combating the viral infection. '}

{'ha': 'Alal misali, warewar kwayoyin garkuwar jiki daga wani mara lafiya mai warkewa ya watsar da MERS-CoV.', 'en': ' For example, antibodies isolated from a recovered patient neutralized MERS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'A gefe guda, wuce gona da iri na tsarin rigakafi yana haifar da babban adadin radadi kyauta a cikin gida wanda zai iya haifar da lahani ga huhu da sauran gabobin, kuma, a cikin mummunan yanayin, gazawar ƙwayoyin cuta da dama har ma da mutuwa.', 'en': ' On the other hand, an overreaction of the immune system generates a large number of free radicals locally that can cause severe damages to the lungs and other organs, and, in the worst scenario, multi-organ failure and even death. '}

{'ha': 'Kamuwa da cutar SARS-CoV-2, wanda aka nuna ta hanyar haɗuwa, yana yuwuwar kama tsofaffi masun zama da wasu cututtuka da mata masu juna biyu.', 'en': ' The SARS-CoV-2 infection, featured by clustering onset, is more likely to affect elderly people with comorbidities and pregnant women. '}

{'ha': 'Abu ne gama gari cewa ga mutanen da ke kamuwa da ɗimbin ƙwayoyin cuta ko waɗanda aka keɓance ayyukan su, suna da damar da za su kamu da ita fiye da sauran.', 'en': ' It is common that for people who are exposed to a large number of viruses or whose immune functions are compromised, they have higher chance to be infected than others. '}

{'ha': 'An kiyasta cewa lokacin girman SARS-CoV-2 shine ranakun 1-14, yawancin kwanaki 3-7 bisa ya danganta ga binciken farkon mutane 425 wanda suka kamu da cutar cikin Wuhan.', 'en': ' The estimated mean incubation period of SARS-CoV-2 is 1-14 days, mostly 3-7 days based on a study of the first 425 cases in Wuhan. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, binciken akan mutane 1,099 masu cutan ya nuna cewa kwanakin haifarwa shine kwana 3 a matsakaita kuma daga ranakun 0 zuwa 24.', 'en': ' However, a study on 1,099 cases demonstrates that the incubation period was 3 days on average and ranged from 0 to 24 days. '}

{'ha': 'Wani ƙarin binciken da aka yi kwanan nan, ya nuna cewa lokacin shiryawa ya kasance kwanaki 4.8 (3.0-7.2) kwanaki bisa ga tarihin kamuwar mutane 8,866.', 'en': ' A more recent study, as described above, demonstrates that the incubation period was 4.8 (3.0-7.2) days based on the demography of 8,866 cases. '}

{'ha': 'Yana da matukar muhimmanci ga hukumomin kiwon lafiya su daidaita lokacin keɓancewa daidai gwargwado lokacin shiryayye, don haka hana kamuwa da cuta amma mutanen da ba su da kwayar cutar kwayar cutar ga wasu.', 'en': ' It is very important for health authorities to adjust the effective quarantine time based on the most accurate incubation period, thus preventing infected but symptomless people from transmitting the virus to others. '}

{'ha': 'A matsayin al’adar yau da kulum, mutanen da ke a fili, ko masu kamuwa da cutar, yawanci ana buƙatar ware kansu na kwanaki 14.', 'en': ' As a common practice, individuals exposed to, or infected by, the virus are usually required to be quarantined for 14 days. '}
{'ha': 'Shin yakamata a tsawan lokacin keɓewa zuwa kwanaki 24?', 'en': ' Should the quarantine time be extended to 24 days? '}

{'ha': "Zazzabi shine babban kuma farkon nuna alamar COVID-19, wanda za'a iya haɗa shi ba tare da wata alama ba ko wasu alamomi kamar bushewar tari, gajeruwar numfashi, ciwon jijiyoyi, matsanancin ƙarfi, ciwon kai, ciwon makogwaro, rhinorrhea, ciwon kirji, zawo, tashin zuciya, da amarwa.", 'en': ' Fever is often the major and initial symptom of COVID-19, which can be accompanied by no symptom or other symptoms such as dry cough, shortness of breath, muscle ache, dizziness, headache, sore throat, rhinorrhea, chest pain, diarrhea, nausea, and vomiting. '}
{'ha': 'Wasu marasa lafiya sun sami dyspnea da / ko hypoxemia mako guda bayan farkon cutar.', 'en': ' Some patients experienced dyspnea and/or hypoxemia one week after the onset of the disease. '}

{'ha': 'A cikin mawuyacin hali, marasa lafiya sun sami saurin don haɓaka cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani, girgizawar jijiyoyin jiki, acidosis metabolic, da coagulopathy.', 'en': ' In severe cases, patients quickly progressed to develop acute respiratory syndrome, septic shock, metabolic acidosis, and coagulopathy. '}

{'ha': 'Marasa lafiya da zazzabi da/ko alamomin hanyoyin numfashi da zazzabi mai tsanani, koda ba tare da alamun cutar huhun ciki ba, yakamata a bincika kwayar cutan don gano shi da sauri.', 'en': ' Patients with fever and/or respiratory symptoms and acute fever, even without pulmonary imaging abnormalities, should be screened for the virus for early diagnosis. '}

{'ha': 'Wani binciken alƙaluma a ƙarshen Disamba na 2019 ya nuna cewa kashiɗarin bayyanar cututtuka sun kasance kashi 98% ga zazzabi, kashi 76% don bushewar bushe, kashi 55% don dyspnea, da kashi 3% don zawo; 8% na marasa lafiya suna buƙatar tallafin iska.', 'en': ' A demographic study in late December of 2019 showed that the percentages of the symptoms were 98% for fever, 76% for dry cough, 55% for dyspnea, and 3% for diarrhea; 8% of the patients required ventilation support. '}

{'ha': 'An bayar da rahoton irin daya a cikin binciken biyu na kwanan nan game da tarin iyali da kuma tari wanda ya haifar ta hanyar watsawa daga mutum mai nunin alamar ciwon.', 'en': ' Similar findings were reported in two recent studies of a family cluster and a cluster caused by transmission from an asymptomatic individual. '}

{'ha': 'A kwatancewa, a binciken mutane a shekarar 2012 ya nuna cewa masu cutar MERS-CoV suma suna da zazzabi kashi (98%), bushewar tari kashi (47%), da dyspnea kashi (55%) a matsayin babban alamun su.', 'en': ' Comparably, a demographic study in 2012 showed that MERS-CoV patients also had fever (98%), dry cough (47%), and dyspnea (55%) as their main symptoms. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, kashi 80% daga cikinsu suna buƙatar tallafin shakar iska, fiye da marasa lafiyar COVID-19 kuma sun dace da mafi girmar kamuwar MERS fiye da na COVID-19.', 'en': ' However, 80% of them required ventilation support, much more than COVID-19 patients and consistent with the higher lethality of MERS than of COVID-19. '}
{'ha': 'An kuma lura da zawo kashi (26%) da ciwon makogwaro kashi (21%) tare da marasa lafiyar MERS.', 'en': ' Diarrhea (26%) and sore throat (21%) were also observed with MERS patients. '}

{'ha': 'A cikin marasa lafiya na SARS, an nuna cewa zazzabi kashi (99% -100%), tari mai bushewar kashi (29% -75%), dyspnea kashi (40% -42%), zawo kashi (20-25%), da ciwon makogwaro kashi (13 -25%) sune manyan alamu kuma ana buƙatar tallafin iska don kusan kashi 14% -20% na marasa lafiya.', 'en': ' In SARS patients, it has been demonstrated that fever (99%-100%), dry cough (29%-75%), dyspnea (40%-42%), diarrhea (20-25%), and sore throat (13-25%) were the major symptoms and ventilation support was required for approximately 14%-20% of the patients. '}

{'ha': 'Ya zuwa ranar 14 ga watan Fabrairu, mutuwar COVID-19 ya zama kashi 2% lokacin da aka tabbatar da masu kamuwa da chutar sun kai 66,576 a duk duniya.', 'en': ' By February 14, the mortality of COVID-19 was 2% when the confirmed cases reached 66,576 globally. '}

{'ha': 'Kwatancen, mutuwa don SARS daga Nuwamba 2002 shine kashi 10% na mutane 8,096 wanda aka tabbatar da kamuwa da cutar.', 'en': ' Comparably, the mortality of SARS by November 2002 was 10% of 8,096 confirmed cases. '}

{'ha': 'Ga MERS, dangane da binciken alƙaluma a watan Yuni na 2012, mutuwa ta kasance kashi 37% daga cikin 2,494 lamari da aka tabbatar.', 'en': ' For MERS, based on a demographic study in June 2012, the mortality was 37% of 2,494 confirmed cases. '}

{'ha': 'Wani binciken da aka yi a baya ya ba da rahoton cewa R0 na SARS-CoV-2 ya yi sama da 6.47 tazarar amintace na kashi 95% (CI) na 5.71-7.23, yayin da R0 na SARS-CoV ya jera daga 2 zuwa 4 kawai.', 'en': ' An earlier study reported that the R0 of SARS-CoV-2 was as high as 6.47 with a 95% confidence interval (CI) of 5.71-7.23, whereas the R0 of SARS-CoV only ranged from 2 to 4. '}

{'ha': 'An gabatar da kwatancen SARS-CoV-2 tare da MERS-CoV da SARA-CoV dangane da alamomin su, mace-mace, da kuma R0 a cikin Tebur Tebur1.1.', 'en': ' A comparison of SARS-CoV-2 with MERS-CoV and SARA-CoV regarding their symptoms, mortality, and R0 is presented in Table \u200bTable1.1. '}

{'ha': 'Abubuwan da ke sama suna ba da shawara cewa SARS-CoV-2 suna da iko mafi girma don yadawa fiye da MERS-CoV da SARS-CoV, amma ba shi da kasala fiye da na ƙarshen biyu.', 'en': ' The above figures suggest that SARS-CoV-2 has a higher ability to spread than MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV, but it is less lethal than the latter two. '}

{'ha': 'Don haka, ya fi fuskantar kalubale sosai wajen shawo kan cutar SARS-CoV-2 fiye da MERS-CoV da SARS-CoV.', 'en': ' Thus, it is much more challenging to control the epidemic of SARS-CoV-2 than those of MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'Gungura wuri daya yakan faru sau dayawa ne a cikin dangi guda ɗaya ko daga taro guda ɗaya ko abin hawa kamar jirgin ruwan.', 'en': ' Clustered onset often happens in the same family or from the same gathering or vehicle such as a cruise ship. '}

{'ha': 'Marasa lafiya galibi suna da tarihin tafiya ko zama a Wuhan ko wasu wuraren da cutar ta shafa ko kuma hulɗa da masu kamuwa da cuta ko kuma marasa lafiya a cikin makwanni biyu da suka gabata kafin an fara.', 'en': ' Patients often have a history of travel or residence in Wuhan or other affected areas or contact with infected individuals or patients in the recent two weeks before the onset. '}
