{'ha': 'Duk da haka, an ba da rahoton cewa mutane na iya ɗaukar kwayar cutar ba tare da alamu fiye da makonni biyu ba sannan kuma warkewar marasa lafiyar da aka kwantar da su daga asibitoci na iya ɗaukar cutar ta sake, wanda ke aika ƙararrawa don ƙara lokacin keɓewa.', 'en': ' However, it has been reported that people can carry the virus without symptoms longer than two weeks and cured patients discharged from hospitals can carry the virus again, which sends out an alarm to increase the time for quarantine. '}

{'ha': 'Marasa lafiya suna da daidai ko rage lambar yanki farin jini (musamman cututtukan lymphocytes) a farkon matakin.', 'en': ' Patients have normal or reduced number of peripheral white blood cells (especially lymphocytes) at the early stage. '}

{'ha': 'Alal misali, lymphopenia tare da yawan farin jinin tantanin halita <4 × 109/L hade da yawan lymphocyte <1×109/L, kuma an daga matakan asotate aminotransferase da viremia a marasa lafiya guda 1,099 wanda suka kamu da COVID-19.', 'en': ' For example, lymphopenia with white blood cell count < 4×109/L including lymphocyte count < 1×109/L, and elevated aspartate aminotransferase levels and viremia were found in 1,099 COVID-19 patients. '}

{'ha': 'Matakin hanta da jijiyar enzymes da myoglobin sun karu a cikin jinin wasu marasa lafiya, kuma an karuwar furotin C-mai martani da dalakawarr erythrocyte a cikin jinin na yawancin marasa lafiya.', 'en': ' The levels of liver and muscle enzymes and myoglobin were increased in the blood of some patients, and C-reactive protein and erythrocyte sedimentation were increased in the blood of most patients. '}

{'ha': 'A cikin marasa lafiya da ke da tsananin cuta, matakin D-dimer, samfurin fibrin mai lalatawa da ke akwai cikin jini, ya haɓaka, kuma an rage adadin ƙwayar cutar ta lymphocyte.', 'en': ' In patients with severe cases, the level of D-dimer, a fibrin degradation product present in the blood, was elevated, and lymphocyte count was progressively reduced. '}

{'ha': 'Rashin lafiya cikin hoton rediyon kirji ana samun shi a cikin mafi yawan marasa lafiya na COVID-19 kuma an nuna su ta hanyar inuwa biyu na inuwa ko kuma gilashin ƙasa a cikin huhu.', 'en': ' Abnormalities in chest radiography are found in most COVID-19 patients and featured by bilateral patchy shadows or ground glass opacity in the lungs. '}

{'ha': 'Yawanci marasa lafiya kan haifar da ciwon huhu, raunin huhu mai tsanani, da cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani (ARDS).', 'en': ' Patients often develop an atypical pneumonia, acute lung injury, and acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS). '}

{'ha': 'Lokacin da ARDS ta faru, kumburin da ba a sarrafa shi ba, tara ruwa, da fibrosis mai ci gaba sun lalata mummunar musayar gas sosai.', 'en': ' When ARDS happens, uncontrolled inflammation, fluid accumulation, and progressive fibrosis severely compromise the gas exchange. '}

{'ha': "Rashin daidaituwa na nau'in-I da nau'in-II na pneumocytes yana rage matakin surfactant kuma yana kara tashin hankali, ta haka ne rage ikon fadadar huhun da kara hadarin rushewar huhu.", 'en': ' Dysfunction of type-I and type-II pneumocytes decreases the surfactant level and increases surface tension, thus reducing the ability of the lungs to expand and heightening the risk of lung collapse. '}

{'ha': 'Sabili da haka, binciken mafi munin hoton zuciya sau da yawa suna kama da mafi girman yanayin cutar.', 'en': ' Therefore, the worst chest radiographic findings often parallel the most severe extent of the disease. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 18 ga watan Fabrairu, 2020, bincike na farko na COVID-19 ya nuna rashin cancanci na pneumocytes, hyaline membrane, da kuma ƙwayar cuta ta mahaifa, da tantanin halita da yawa na ƙwayoyin cuta a cikin huhun masu cuta wanda ya mutu da cutar, ya yi daidai da yanayin kamuwar cutar makamacin ARDS da marasa lafiyar SARS da MERS.', 'en': ' On February 18, 2020, the first pathological analysis of COVID-19 demonstrated the desquamation of pneumocytes, hyaline membrane formation, and interstitial lymphocyte infiltration, and multinucleated syncytial cells in the lungs of a patient who died of the disease, consistent with the pathology of viral infection and ARDS and similar to that of SARS and MERS patients. '}

{'ha': "Ganowar SARS-CoV-2 RNA ta hanyar juyawar sarkar polymerase wato (reverse-transcriptase) (RT-PCR) anyi amfani da shi azaman manyan ka'idojin gwajin cutar COVID-19.", 'en': ' The detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA via reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) was used as the major criteria for the diagnosis of COVID-19. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, saboda kiyatsa girman babu-rashi, wanda zai iya hanzartawar annoban, an fara amfani da alamun bayyanar asibiti don ganewar asali (wanda bai dogara ga RT-PCR ba) kadai ba a kasar Sin a ranar 13 ga Fabrairu, 2020.', 'en': ' However, due to the high false-negative rate, which may accelerate the epidemic, clinical manifestations started to be used for diagnosis (which no longer solely relied on RT-PCR) in China on February 13, 2020. '}
{'ha': 'Hakanan irin wannan yanayin ya faru tare da bayyanar cutar SARS.', 'en': ' A similar situation also occurred with the diagnosis of SARS. '}

{'ha': 'Sabili da haka, haɗuwa da tarihin cutar, bayyanar asibiti, dakin gwaji da kuma binciken radiyo yana da mahimmanci kuma wajibi ne don yin ingantaccen bincike.', 'en': ' Therefore, a combination of disease history, clinical manifestations, laboratory tests, and radiological findings is essential and imperative for making an effective diagnosis. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 14 ga Fabrairu, 2020, kungiyar Feng Zhang ta ba da bayanin wata hanyar yin amfani da fasahar SHERLOCK ta CRISPR don gano SARS-CoV-2, wanda ke gano ƙwayoyin SARS-CoV-2 RNA roba a 20 × 10-18 mol / L zuwa 200 × 10-18 mol / L (10-100 kwafa ta microliter na shigar) ta amfani da dipstick a cikin ƙasa da awa ɗaya ba tare da buƙatar bayyanin kayan aikin ba.', 'en': ' On February 14, 2020, the Feng Zhang group described a protocol of using the CRISPR-based SHERLOCK technique to detect SARS-CoV-2, which detects synthetic SARS-CoV-2 RNA fragments at 20 × 10-18 mol/L to 200 × 10-18 mol/L (10-100 copies per microliter of input) using a dipstick in less than an hour without requiring elaborate instrumentation. '}

{'ha': 'Da fatan, sabuwar dabarar za ta iya bunkasa hankali da kwanciyar hankali matukar an tabbatar cikin samfuran asibiti.', 'en': ' Hopefully, the new technique can dramatically enhance the sensitivity and convenience if verified in clinical samples. '}

{'ha': 'Saboda ƙarancin ƙwarewa tare da sabon labari na CoV, likitoci na iya samar da kulawa ta musamman ga marasa lafiyar COVID-19, yayin da ake ƙoƙarin hanyoyin jiyya da dama waɗanda aka yi amfani da su ko aka gabatar dasu don jiyyar wasu CoV kamar SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV da sauran cututtukan (Tebur 2).2).', 'en': ' Due to the lack of experience with the novel CoV, physicians can mainly provide supportive care to COVID-19 patients, while attempting a variety of therapies that have been used or proposed before for the treatment of other CoVs such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV and other viral diseases (Table \u200b(Table2).2). '}

{'ha': 'Wadannan hanyoyin jinya na yanzu da kuma yiwuwar jiyya tare da magungunan rigakafi, da immunosuppressants, steroids, plasma daga majinyatan da suka sami sauki, magungunan Sinawa, da tallafin tunani.', 'en': ' These therapies include current and potential treatments with antiviral drugs, immunosuppressants, steroids, plasma from recovered patients, Chinese medicine, and psychological support. '}
{'ha': 'Ko da plasma daga majinyatan da sun samu sauki an gabatar dasu ne domin ayi amfani dasu don jiyya.', 'en': ' Even plasma from recovered patients was proposed to be used for treatment. '}

{'ha': 'Kamfanonin magunguna suna yin tsere don haɓaka ƙwayoyin garkuwa da alluran rigakafin kan kwayar cutan.', 'en': ' Pharmaceutical companies are racing to develop antibodies and vaccines against the virus. '}

{'ha': 'SARS-CoV-2 suna kai hari sosai a huhu a farawa kuma mai yiwuwa kuma suna kaiwa hari, zuwa ƙarancin ƙima, sauran gabobin da ke bayyana ACE2, kamar tsarin gastrointestinal da kodan.', 'en': ' SARS-CoV-2 mainly attacks the lungs in the beginning and probably also attacks, to a lesser degree, other organs that express ACE2, such as the gastrointestinal system and the kidneys. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, lalatawar hanyar numfashi da gazawa sune babbar haɗari ga marasa lafiya da babban dalilin mutuwa.', 'en': ' Nevertheless, respiratory dysfunction and failure are the major threat to the patients and the major cause of death. '}

{'ha': 'Saboda haka, tallafawar hanya numfashi yana da mahimmanci don sauƙaƙe bayyanar cututtuka da kuma ceton rayuka kuma ya haɗa duk jiyya ta iska, iska mai saurin motsawa, samun iska daga na’ura, ya danganta ga tsananin cutar.', 'en': ' Thus, respiratory support is critical to relieve the symptoms and save lives and includes general oxygen therapy, high-flow oxygen, noninvasive ventilation, and invasive mechanical ventilation depending on the severity of the disease. '}

{'ha': 'Marasa lafiya da bayyanar cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani dole ne a tallafa su da karin isaka (ECMO), wani ingantaccen dabarar bugun zuciya wanda aka yi amfani dashi don maganin cututtukan zuciya masu haɗari ko gazawar hanyoyin numfashi.', 'en': ' Patients with severe respiratory symptoms have to be supported by extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), a modified cardiopulmonary bypass technique used for the treatment of life-threatening cardiac or respiratory failure. '}

{'ha': "Bugu da kari, da daidaitawar ma'aunin electrolyte, rigakafin da lura da kamuwa da cuta da sakin jiki, da kuma kariya daga ayyukan gabobin jiki ma suna da matukar muhimmanci ga marasa lafiya na SARS-CoV-2.", 'en': ' In addition, the maintenance of electrolyte balance, the prevention and treatment of secondary infection and septic shock, and the protection of the functions of the vital organs are also essential for SARS-CoV-2 patients. '}

{'ha': 'An san cewa guguwar cytokine tana faruwa ne sakamakon wuce gona da iri na tsarin rigakafi a cikin marasa lafiyar SARS da MERS.', 'en': ' It has been known that a cytokine storm results from an overreaction of the immune system in SARS and MERS patients. '}

{'ha': "Guguwar Cytokine wani nau'i ne na yanayi amsar tsarin kumburi wanda aka gabatar ta hanyar jerin cytokines da suka hada da TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, da MCP-1.", 'en': ' Cytokine storm is a form of systemic inflammatory response featured by the release of a series of cytokines including TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, and MCP-1. '}

{'ha': 'Waɗannan cytokines tare da tantanin halita mai garkuwa su saki ɗimbin kwayoyi mara canzawa waɗanda sune babban dalilin ARDS da kuma gazawar gabobin jiki da yawa.', 'en': ' These cytokines induce immune cells to release a vast number of free radicals which are the major cause of ARDS and multiple organ failure. '}

{'ha': 'Danna rigakafi yana da muhimmanci a lura da guguwar cytokine, musamman a cikin majinyata masu rauni sosai.', 'en': ' Immunosuppression is essential in the treatment of cytokine storms, especially in severe patients. '}

{'ha': 'Corticosteroids da tocilizumab, anti-IL6 monoclonal garkuwar jiki, an yi amfani dasu don magance guguwar cytokine.', 'en': ' Corticosteroids and tocilizumab, an anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, have been used to treat cytokine storm. '}

{'ha': 'Sauran jiyya danna rigakafi don guguwa ta cytokine sun hada da daidaitawa da amsawa kai tsaye na rigakafin tantanin halita T; toshewar IFN-γ, IL-1, da TNF; JAK hanawa; blinatumomab; mai danna alamar cytokine 4; da HDAC masu hanawa.', 'en': ' Other immunosuppression treatments for cytokine storm include the modulation of T cell-directed immune response; the blockade of IFN-γ, IL-1, and TNF; JAK inhibition; blinatumomab; suppressor of cytokine signaling 4; and HDAC inhibitors. '}

{'ha': 'Maganin Steroids, kamar immunosuppressants, aka yi amfani da su sosai a cikin lura da SARS don rage tsananin lalacewa kumburi.', 'en': ' Steroids, as immunosuppressants, were widely used in the treatment of SARS to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage. '}

{'ha': "Duk da haka, shan steroids sosai ba su da fa'ida ga mummunan raunin huhu a cikin marasa lafiyar SARS da COVID-19.", 'en': ' However, steroids at high dosages were not beneficial to severe lung injury in SARS and COVID-19 patients. '}

{'ha': 'Madadin haka, suna iya haifar da mummunar illa, musamman cututtukan osteonecrosis, da ke haifar da tasirin cutar.', 'en': ' Instead, they may cause severe side effects, especially avascular osteonecrosis, dramatically affecting the prognosis. '}

{'ha': 'Kodayake, gajerun darussan na corticosteroids a ƙarancin-zuwa-matsakaitan allurai an bada shawarar ayi amfani dasu da hankali don marasa lafiya COVID-19 marasa lafiya.', 'en': ' Nevertheless, short courses of corticosteroids at low-to-moderate doses have been recommended to be used prudently for critically ill COVID-19 patients. '}
{'ha': 'A lokacin rubutu, babu ingantaccen maganin rigakafi da aka tabbatar.', 'en': ' At the time of writing, no effective antiviral therapy has been confirmed. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, badawa ta jijiya da remdesivir, wani nucleotide na analog, ana samun inganci a cikin marasa lafiyar COVID-19 na Amurka.', 'en': ' However, intravenous administration with remdesivir, a nucleotide analog, has been found to be efficacious in an American patient with COVID-19. '}

{'ha': 'Remdesivir wata sabon maganin rigakafin ƙwayoyin cuta ne wanda Gidiyon ta kirkiro da farko don jiyyar cututtukan da cutar Ebola da Marlburg suka haifar.', 'en': ' Remdesivir is a novel antiviral drug developed by Gilead initially for the treatment of diseases caused by Ebola and Marlburg viruses. '}

{'ha': 'Daga baya, sakatariya ya kuma nuna yiwuwar hana sauran kwayoyin cutar RNA guda da suka hada da kwayoyin cututtukar MERS da SARS.', 'en': ' Later, remdesivir also demonstrated possible inhibition of other single stranded RNA viruses including MERS and SARS viruses. '}

{'ha': 'Dangane da waɗannan, Gidiyon ya ba wa mahaɗin zuwa China don gudanar da gwaji guda biyu a kan mutane masu kamuwa da cutar SARS-CoV-2, kuma ana sa ran samun sakamako sosai.', 'en': ' Based on these, Gilead has provided the compound to China to conduct a pair of trials on SARS-CoV-2-infected individuals, and the results are highly anticipated. '}

{'ha': 'Bugu da ƙari, an ba da shawarar baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, da ribavirin a matsayin hanyoyin kwantar da hankalin marasa lafiya wanda ke da cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani.', 'en': ' In addition, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, and ribavirin have been suggested as potential therapies for patients with acute respiratory symptoms. '}

{'ha': 'Zawo, tashin zuciya, amai, lalacewar hanta, da sauran raunin azaba na iya faruwa bayan an haɗawar jinyar tare da lofinavir/ritonavir.', 'en': ' Diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, liver damage, and other adverse reactions can occur following combined therapy with lopinavir/ritonavir. '}

{'ha': 'Hulɗawar waɗannan jiyya tare da wasu magunguna da aka yi amfani da su a cikin marasa lafiya ya kamata a sa ido sosai.', 'en': ' The interaction of these treatments with other drugs used in the patients should be monitored carefully. '}
{'ha': 'Plasma daga marasa lafiya da suka samu sauki da garkuwar jiki.', 'en': ' Plasma from recovered patients and antibody generation '}

{'ha': 'Tarin jini daga marasa lafiyar da suka murmure daga wata cuta mai yaduwa don yi wa wasu marasa lafiya da ke fama da wannan cuta ko kuma kare lafiyar mutane daga kamuwa da cutar yana da dogon tarihi.', 'en': ' The collection of the blood from patients who recovered from a contagious disease to treat other patients suffering from the same disease or to protect healthy individuals from catching the disease has a long history. '}

{'ha': 'Tabbas, mara lafiyar da aka dawo dasu galibi suna da babban matakin kariya daga kwayar cuta a cikin jinin su.', 'en': ' Indeed, recovered patients often have a relatively high level of antibodies against the pathogen in their blood. '}

{'ha': 'Garkuwar jiki sune rigakafi immunoglobulin (Ig) wanda aka samar daga B lymphocytes don yaƙar ƙwayoyin cuta da sauran abubuwa na ƙasashen waje kuma suna sane da kwayoyi na musamman a cikin cututtukan da ke cikin su.', 'en': ' Antibodies are an immunoglobulin (Ig) produced by B lymphocytes to fight pathogens and other foreign objects and they recognize unique molecules in the pathogens and neutralize them directly. '}

{'ha': 'Dangane da wannan, an karɓo plasma daga jinin gungun masu haƙuri waɗanda suka warke daga COVID-19 kuma an saka shi cikin marasa lafiya 10 mara lafiya sosai.', 'en': ' Based on this, plasma was collected from the blood of a group of patients who recovered from COVID-19 and was injected into 10 seriously ill patients. '}

{'ha': "Alamar cutar su ta inganta cikin sa'o'i 24, tare da rage kumburi da rahusa da kuma inganta jijiyar oxygen a cikin jini.", 'en': ' Their symptoms improved within 24 hours, accompanied by reduced inflammation and viral loads and improved oxygen saturation in the blood. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, tabbatarwa da bayani wajibi ne don gabatar da hanyar don babban amfani kafin takamaiman hanyoyin kwantar da hankali ba su inganta ba.', 'en': ' However, verification and clarification are necessary to propose the method for large-scale use before specific therapies are not yet developed. '}

{'ha': 'Bugu da kari, da aka ba da tasirin warkewa, za a yi la’akari da wasu kasala da ke da alaƙa da plasma a hankali.', 'en': ' In addition, given the therapeutic effects, some disadvantages associated with the plasma should be considered carefully. '}

{'ha': 'Alal misali, cututtukan rigakafi na iya wuce gona da iri kan hanyar kariya kuma suna haifar da sakin alamar alcytokine, wanda ke iya zama haɗarin rayuwa.', 'en': ' For example, antibodies can overstimulate the immune response and cause cytokine release syndrome, which is potentially a life-threatening toxicity. '}

{'ha': 'Taruwar garkuwar jiki cikin jini yawancin lokuta na ƙadan, kuma buƙatun plasma yana da yawa don kula da marasa lafiya da ke fama da rashin lafiya.', 'en': ' The concentration of antibodies in the blood is usually low, and the demand for the plasma is large to treat critically ill patients. '}

{'ha': 'Yana da wuya a haɓaka da samar da takamaiman ƙwayoyin rigakafi cikin hanzari don yaƙi da annobar duniya.', 'en': ' It is difficult to develop and produce specific antibodies rapidly enough to fight against a global epidemic. '}

{'ha': 'Don haka, abu mafi mahimmanci ne kuma mai kyawu ne a kebe tantanin halittar jikin B (B cells) daga marassa lafiyar da suka warke kuma gano lambobin kwayar halitta wadanda ke hade da ingantattun garkuwar jiki ko duba garkuwa musamman a kan muhimman furotin na kwayan cutar.', 'en': ' Thus, it is more critical and practical to isolate B cells from recovered patients and identify the genetic codes encoding effective antibodies or screen for effective antibodies against essential proteins of the virus. '}
{'ha': 'Ta wannan hanyar, zamu iya haɓaka samar da magungunan garkuwar jiki.', 'en': ' This way, we can readily scale up the production of the antibodies. '}
{'ha': 'An yi amfani da TCM don magance wasu cututtuka da yawa a kasar Sin har tsawon dubunnan shekaru.', 'en': ' TCM has been used to treat a variety of diseases in China for thousands of years. '}

{'ha': "Duk da haka, tasirin sa ya dogara ne akan haɗakar abubuwan haɗin da yawa a cikin tsari wanda ya bambanta dangane da binciken cutar da aka yi la'akari da tunanin TCM.", 'en': ' However, its effects largely rely on a combination of multiple components in a formula that varies depending on the diagnosis of a disease based on the theories of TCM. '}

{'ha': "Yawancin ingantattun abubuwanda ake aiki dasu ba'a san su ba ko kuma marasa fahimta ne saboda yana da wahalar cirewa da tabbatar da irin waɗannan abubuwan haɗin ko abubuwan haɗin su.", 'en': ' Most of the effective components remain unknown or are vague as it is difficult to extract and verify such components or their optimal combinations. '}

{'ha': 'A halin yanzu, saboda rashin inganci da takamaiman jiyyar COVID-19, TCM ya zama ɗayan daga cikin hanyoyin jiyyan marasa lafiya tare da haske zuwa alamu na matsakaicin alama ko ga waɗanda suka warke daga matsanancin matakai.', 'en': ' Currently, due to the lack of effective and specific therapy for COVID-19, TCM has become one of the major alternative treatments for patients with light to moderate symptoms or for those who have recovered from severe stages. '}

{'ha': 'Alal misali, maganin kawan Shu Feng Jie Du da maganin kawan Lian Hua Qing Wen an samu sun dace don jinyar COVID-19.', 'en': ' For example, Shu Feng Jie Du capsules and Lian Hua Qing Wen capsules were found to be effective for COVID-19 treatment. '}

{'ha': 'Babban warkarwa marasa lafiyar COVID-19 a cikin larduna da yawa na kasar Sin wadanda ke amfani da TCM a cikin kashi 87% bisa dari na marasa lafiyar su, ciki har da Gansu kashi (63.7%), Ningxia kashi (50%), da Hunan kashi (50%), yayin da lardin Hubei, wanda ya yi amfani da TCM a kusan kashi 30% na masu cutar COVID-19, suna da mafi ƙarancin warkewa kashi (13%).', 'en': ' Top cure rates in the treatment of COVID-19 patients were observed in several provinces in China that used TCM in 87% of their patients, including Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%), and Hunan (50%), whereas Hubei province, which used TCM in only approximately 30% of its COVID-19 patients, had the lowest cure rate (13%). '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, wannan ya zama kwatanci mara kyau kamar yadda sauran dalilai masu tasiri kamar lamba da tsananin marasa lafiya yakamata a saka su cikin kimantawa.', 'en': ' However, this is quite a rough comparison as many other impact factors such as the number and severity of the patients should be included in the evaluation. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 18 ga watan Fabrairu, 2020, Boli Zhang da abokan aikin ta sun buga wani bincike don kwatanta magani na yamma (WM) jinyar shi kaɗai tare da haɗin maganin WM da TCM.', 'en': ' On February 18, 2020, Boli Zhang and coworkers published a study to compare western medicine (WM) treatment alone with combined treatment of WM and TCM. '}

{'ha': 'Sun gano cewa lokutan da ake buƙata don murmurewar yanayin jiki, ɓarnawar alama, da kuma asibiti mafi ƙaranci a cikin rukunin WM + TCM fiye da ƙungiyar cikin WM ƙungiyar kawai.', 'en': ' They found that the times needed for body temperature recovery, symptom disappearance, and hospitalization were remarkably shorter in the WM+TCM group than in the WM only group. '}

{'ha': "Mafi ban sha'awa, rauni da yake ƙaruwa da cuta (daga haske zuwa mai tsanani) ya kasance ƙarancin ƙungiyar WM + TCM fiye da na ƙungiyar WM kawai kashi (7.4% kusa da 46.2%) kuma yawan mutuwa ya kasance ƙasa a cikin rukunin WM + TCM fiye da WM kawai rukuni kashi (8.8% a kan 39%).", 'en': ' Most impressively, the rate for symptomatic worsening (from light to severe) was remarkably lower for the WM+TCM group than for the WM only group (7.4% versus 46.2%) and the mortality was lower in the WM+TCM group than WM only group (8.8% versus 39%). '}

{'ha': 'Koyaya, inganci da lafiyar TCM har yanzu suna jiran ƙarin gwaji da aka sarrafa sosai a sikeli mafi girma da kuma a cikin ƙarin cibiyoyin.', 'en': ' Nevertheless, the efficacy and safety of TCM still await more well-controlled trials at larger scales and in more centers. '}

{'ha': "Hakanan zai zama mai ban sha'awa don sanin yanayin ayyukan da bayyana ingantattun kayan aikin jiyya na TCM ko haɗinsu idan zai yiwu.", 'en': ' It would also be intriguing to characterize the mechanism of actions and clarify the effective components of TCM treatments or their combinations if possible. '}

{'ha': 'Marasa lafiya da ake zargi ko aka tabbatar da COVID-19 yawan lokuta suna fuskantar babbar fargaba game da cutar mai yaduwa har ma da kisa, kuma mutanen da ke keɓewa kuma suna fuskantar bacin rai, kadaici, da fushi.', 'en': ' Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 mostly experience great fear of the highly contagious and even fatal disease, and quarantined people also experience boredom, loneliness, and anger. '}

{'ha': 'Bayan haka, alamomin kamuwa da cuta kamar zazzabin, cututtukan rashin iska, da tari kazalika da illa dabam-dabam na jinyar kamar cutar rashin bacci wanda corticosteroids ke hadasa na iya haifar da ƙarin damuwa da damuwa ta hankali.', 'en': ' Furthermore, symptoms of the infection such as fever, hypoxia, and cough as well as adverse effects of the treatments such as insomnia caused by corticosteroids can lead to more anxiety and mental distress. '}

{'ha': 'A farkon barkewar cutar ta SARS, an sami dumbin cututtukan kwakwalwa da suka hada da ci gaba da damuwa, damuwa, fargaba, tashin hankali, alamomin tabin hankali, tashin hankali, har ma da kashe kansa.', 'en': ' In the early phase of the SARS outbreak, a range of psychiatric morbidities including persistent depression, anxiety, panic attacks, psychomotor excitement, psychotic symptoms, delirium, and even suicidality were reported. '}

{'ha': "M lamba tuntuɓe da keɓe masu ciwo, a matsayin wani ɓangare na martanin lafiyar jama'a game da yaduwar COVID-19, zai iya sa mutane su zama masu yawan damuwa da masu laifi game da sakamakon yaduwar, keɓewa, da ki kan iyali da abokai.", 'en': ' Mandatory contact tracing and quarantine, as a part of the public health responses to the COVID-19 outbreak, can make people more anxious and guilty about the effects of the contagion, quarantine, and stigma on their families and friends. '}

{'ha': "Don haka, ya kamata a ba da kulawa ta lafiyar kwakwalwa ga marasa lafiya na COVID-19, waɗanda ake zargi, da mutanen da ke hulɗa da su da kuma sauran jama'a waɗanda ke da buƙata.", 'en': ' Thus, mental health care should be provided to COVID-19 patients, suspected individuals, and people in contact with them as well as the general public who are in need. '}

{'ha': "Taimakon tunani ya kamata ya haɗa da kafa ƙungiyoyin kiwon lafiyar masu tunani iri-iri, bayyanannun sadarwa tare da sabuntawa na yau da kullun game da fitowar SARS-CoV-2 da tsare-tsaren kulawa da kuma amfani da na'urorin lantarki da aikace-aikace don guje wa kusanci da juna.", 'en': ' The psychological support should include the establishment of multidisciplinary mental health teams, clear communications with regular and accurate updates about the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak and treatment plans and the use of professional electronic devices and applications to avoid close contact with each other. '}

{'ha': 'Magungunan rigakafi suna da mahimmanci don katse hanyoyin yadawa daga jikin dabbobi da kuma kamuwar mutane zuwa masu bada cutar a saukake kuma galibi suna taimakawa ga maganin jinyar garkuwar kwayoyin cuta don magancewar anoba wanda ƙwayoyin cuta masu tasowa ke haifar.', 'en': ' Effective vaccines are essential for interrupting the chain of transmission from animal reservoirs and infected humans to susceptible hosts and are often complementary to antiviral treatment in the control of epidemics caused by emerging viruses. '}

{'ha': 'An yi ƙoƙari don haɓaka alluran rigakafin mai-furotin S don samar da magungunan rigakafi na dogon lokaci da kuma watsewar garkuwa jiki da/ko kariya daga garkuwar kariya daga cutar SARS-CoV.', 'en': ' Efforts have been made to develop S protein-based vaccines to generate long-term and potent neutralizing antibodies and/or protective immunity against SARS-CoV. '}
{'ha': 'An kimanta allurar rigakafi masu rai cikin samfurin dabbobi SARS.', 'en': ' Live-attenuated vaccines have been evaluated in animal models for SARS. '}

{'ha': 'Koyaya, ingancin waɗannan maganin alurar rigakafi a cikin tsofaffi mutane da samfuran ƙarancin cuta da kariyarsu game da kamuwa da cutar ƙwayar cutar zoonotic har yanzu ba a ƙaddara su ba kafin fara nazarin asibiti.', 'en': ' However, the in vivo efficacy of these vaccine candidates in elderly individuals and lethal-challenge models and their protection against zoonotic virus infection have yet to be determined before a clinical study is initiated. '}

{'ha': 'Wataƙila saboda SARS ya mutu ƙasa 17 da suka wuce kuma ba a sake samun wani sabon mai kamuwa ba.', 'en': ' This is probably because SARS died down 17 years ago and no new case has been reported since. '}

{'ha': 'A hanya daban, lamari masu lalacewa da kuma gungu na MERS suna ci gaba da faruwa a Gabas ta Tsakiya kuma suka watsu zuwa wasu yankuna sakamakon dorewar hanyoyin zoonotic a cikin wurare masu cutarwa.', 'en': ' In contrast, sporadic cases and clusters of MERS continue to occur in the Middle East and spread to other regions owing to the persistence of zoonotic sources in endemic areas. '}

{'ha': 'An tsara dabarun yin rigakafi don MERS ta amfani da ƙwayar cuta mara ƙarfi, abubuwan plasmids na DNA, ƙwayoyin cuta na viral, abubuwan nanoparticles, kamar-ƙwayoyin cuta barbashi da ƙananan abubuwan gina jiki da aka kimanta su kuma a wasu samfuran dabbobi.', 'en': ' Vaccination strategies have been developed for MERS by using inactivated virus, DNA plasmids, viral vectors, nanoparticles, virus-like particles and recombinant protein subunits and some have been evaluated in animal models. '}

{'ha': 'Haɓaka ingantaccen maganin rigakafi daga SARS-CoV-2 ga mutane marasa garkuwa abu ne mai gaggawa da mahimmanci don magance annoba da ke ci gaba.', 'en': ' The development of a safe and effective vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 for non-immune individuals is an urgent and critical task for controlling the ongoing epidemic. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, yana da ƙalubale don shawo kan wahalar saboda tsawon lokaci (aƙalla watanni 18) da ake buƙata don haɓaka maganin alurar rigakafi da bambancin canji na CoVs.', 'en': ' However, it is challenging to overcome the difficulty because of the long period of time (averaged 18 months) needed for vaccine development and the dynamic variations of CoVs. '}

{'ha': 'A matsayin sabon cuta, COVID-19 ya fara bayyana cikakkiya a matsayin ciwon asibiti ta wurin dubban masu kamuwa da cutar.', 'en': ' As a novel disease, COVID-19 has just started to manifest its full clinical course throughout thousands of patients. '}
{'ha': 'A mafi yawacin alamari, marasa lafiya na iya murmurewa a hankali ba tare da sequelae ba.', 'en': ' In most cases, patients can recover gradually without sequelae. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, mai kama da SARS da MERS, COVID-19 shima yana da alaƙa da mutuwa sosai a cikin marasa lafiya da suke da tsananin lamarin cutan.', 'en': ' However, similar to SARS and MERS, COVID-19 is also associated with high morbidity and mortality in patients with severe cases. '}

{'ha': 'Don haka, kirkirar tsarin tsinkaye game da cutar yana da mahimmanci ga hukumomin kiwon lafiya don ba da fifikon ayyukanta, musamman a wuraren da ake wahalar samar da albarkatu.', 'en': ' Therefore, building a prognosis model for the disease is essential for health-care agencies to prioritize their services, especially in resource-constrained areas. '}

{'ha': 'Dangane da binciken asibiti wanda aka ruwaito har zuwa yanzu, abubuwan da ke ƙasa na iya shafar ko kuma za a iya danganta su da haɓakar marasa lafiya na COVID-19 (Tebur (Tebur33)):', 'en': ' Based on clinical studies reported thus far, the following factors may affect or be associated with the prognosis of COVID-19 patients (Table \u200b(Table33): '}

{'ha': 'Shekaru: Shekaru shine mafi mahimmancin hangen nesa na SARS, wanda gaskiya ne ga COVID-19.', 'en': ' Age: Age was the most important factor for the prognosis of SARS, which is also true for COVID-19. '}

{'ha': 'COVID-19 ya faru ne sosai a cikin shekaru 30-65 tare da kashi 47.7% na waɗannan marasa lafiya sun fi 50 a cikin nazarin lamarin cutar 8,866 kamar yadda aka bayyana a sama.', 'en': ' COVID-19 mainly happened at the age of 30-65 with 47.7% of those patients being over 50 in a study of 8,866 cases as described above. '}

{'ha': 'Marasa lafiya waɗanda ke buƙatar tsananin kulawa sun fi iya samun wasu cututtuka na lokaci daya da rikitarwa kuma sun fi tsufa da waɗanda ba suyi (a cikin shekarun tsakiya na 66 da 51), suna ba da shawara ga shekarun a matsayin hangar zuwan cutar don sakamakon marasa lafiya na COVID-19.', 'en': ' Patients who required intensive care were more likely to have underlying comorbidities and complications and were significantly older than those who did not (at the median age of 66 versus 51), suggesting age as a prognostic factor for the outcome of COVID-19 patients. '}

{'ha': "Jima'i: SARS-CoV-2 ya fi kama maza fiye da mata (0.31 / 100,000 a kan 0.27 / 100,000), kamar yadda aka bayyana a sama.", 'en': ' Sex: SARS-CoV-2 has infected more men than women (0.31/100,000 versus 0.27/100,000), as described above. '}

{'ha': 'Rashin daidaituwa da wahala: Marasa lafiya tare da COVID-19 waɗanda ke buƙatar kulawa mai zurfi sun fi fuskantar wahala ga mummunan rauni na zuciya da arrhythmia.', 'en': ' Comorbidities and complications: Patients with COVID-19 who require intensive care are more likely to suffer from acute cardiac injury and arrhythmia. '}
{'ha': 'Aukuwar ciwon zuciya shima babban dalilin mutuwa a cikin masu cutar SARS.', 'en': ' Cardiac events were also the main reason for death in SARS patients. '}

{'ha': 'An ba da rahoton cewa SARS-CoV-2 na iya ɗaure zuwa ACL2-tabbatacce cholangiocytes, wanda zai haifar da rashin aikin hanta a cikin marasa lafiyar COVID-19.', 'en': ' It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 can also bind to ACE2-positive cholangiocytes, which might lead to liver dysfunctions in COVID-19 patients. '}

{'ha': 'Yana da mahimmanci a lura cewa shekaru da cutar na da dangantaka sosai kuma suna iya tsoma baki ga juna.', 'en': ' It is worth noting that age and underlying disease are strongly correlated and might interfere with each other. '}

{'ha': 'Binciken dakin gwaji wanda ba a hanya ba ne: C-reactive protein (CRP) mataki a jini yana nuna tsananin zafin kumburi ko raunin nama kuma an gabatar da shi don zama mai yuwuwar asarar cutar, amsar jin magani, da murmurewa ta ƙarshe.', 'en': ' Abnormal laboratory findings: The C-reactive protein (CRP) level in blood reflects the severity of inflammation or tissue injury and has been proposed to be a potential prognostic factor for disease, response to therapy, and ultimate recovery. '}

{'ha': 'Hulɗawar matakin CRP zuwa ga tsananin da kuma hangar zuwan cutar COVID-19 shi ma an shawarta.', 'en': ' The correlation of CRP level to the severity and prognosis of COVID-19 has also been proposed. '}

{'ha': 'Bugu da ƙari, ɗaukaka lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), da creatine kinase (CK) zasu iya taimakawa hango ko hasashen sakamakon.', 'en': ' In addition, elevated lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), and creatine kinase (CK) may also help predict the outcome. '}

{'ha': 'Ana nuna waɗannan ƙwayoyin enzyme a cikin gabobin da yawa, musamman a zuciya da hanta, kuma ana sake su yayin lalata nama.', 'en': ' These enzymes are expressed extensively in multiple organs, especially in the heart and liver, and are released during tissue damage. '}
{'ha': 'Don haka, su masun makin gargajiyar zuciya ko rashin aikin hanta da kyau.', 'en': ' Thus, they are traditional markers for heart or liver dysfunctions. '}

{'ha': 'Manyan alamun cututtukan asibiti: Hoto zuciya da ci gaban wucin gadin alamun asibiti na bayyanar cututtuka ya kamata a bincika tare da sauran maganganun don annabta sakamako da rikitarwar COVID-19.', 'en': ' Major clinical symptoms: Chest radiography and temporal progression of clinical symptoms should be considered together with the other issues for the prediction of outcomes and complications of COVID-19. '}

{'ha': 'Amfani da magungunan steroid: Kamar yadda aka bayyana a sama, steroids immunosuppressant ne da aka saba amfani da shi azaman hanyar haɗin kan jinyar cututtuka don rage tsananin lalacewa kumburi.', 'en': ' Use of steroids: As described above, steroids are immunosuppressant commonly used as an adjunctive therapy for infectious diseases to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage. '}

{'ha': 'Tunda yawan magungunan corticosteroids an yi amfani dashi sosai a cikin majinyata na SARS, da yawa daga waɗanda suka tsira suka sha wahala daga cututtukan osteonecrosis tare da nakasassu na rayuwa da ƙarancin rayuwa.', 'en': ' Since a high dosage of corticosteroids was widely used in severe SARS patients, many survivors suffered from avascular osteonecrosis with life-long disability and poor life quality. '}

{'ha': 'Don haka, idan ana buƙata, ya kamata a yi amfani da steroids don sha kadan kuma don ɗan gajeren lokaci a cikin marasa lafiya na COVID-19.', 'en': ' Thus, if needed, steroids should be used at low dosage and for a short time in COVID-19 patients. '}

{'ha': 'Tabin hankali: Kamar yadda aka bayyana a sama, lokacin barkewar COVID-19 yawancin marasa lafiya suna shan wahala daga matsananciyar damuwa yayin da suke jure tsawon lokaci na keɓancewa da matsanancin rashin tabbas kuma suna ganin mutuwar dangi da kuma abokan rashin lafiyar.', 'en': ' Mental stress: As described above, during the COVID-19 outbreak many patients have suffered from extraordinary stress as they often endured long periods of quarantine and extreme uncertainty and witnessed the death of close family members and fellow patients. '}

{'ha': 'Yana da mahimmanci a samar da shawarwari na tunani da tallafi na dogon lokaci don taimakawa waɗannan marasa lafiya su murmure daga damuwa kuma su koma rayuwan da aka saba yi.', 'en': ' It is imperative to provide psychological counseling and long-term support to help these patients recover from the stress and return to normal life. '}

{'ha': 'Dangane da binciken alƙalumma har ya zuwa yanzu, da alamar COVID-19 na da fasalin cututtukan annoba daban-daban daga SARS.', 'en': ' According to demographic studies so far, COVID-19 seems to have different epidemiological features from SARS. '}

{'ha': 'Bugu da kari ga maimaitawa cikin hanyar numfashi na kasa, SARS-CoV-2 na iya rabuwa sosai a cikin hanyar numfashi na sama kuma ya haifar da karama ko babu nuna alamun farkon kamuwa da cutar, mai kama da sauran CoVs waɗanda ke haifar da mura na yau da kullun.', 'en': ' In addition to replicating in the lower respiratory tract, SARS-CoV-2 can efficiently replicate in the upper respiratory tract and causes mild or no symptoms in the early phase of infection, similar to other CoVs that cause common colds. '}

{'ha': 'Sabili da haka, marasa lafiya masu kamuwa da cuta a farkon lokaci ko lokacin shiryawa na iya samar da adadin ƙwayar cuta lokacin ayyukan yau da kullun, yana haifar da babban wahala don magance annobar.', 'en': ' Therefore, infected patients at the early phase or incubation period can produce a large amount of virus during daily activities, causing great difficulty for the control of the epidemic. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, an dauke watsar da SARS-CoV na faru lokacin da marasa lafiya ke fama da rashin lafiya, yayin da yawancin watsawa basu faru ba a farkon lokaci.', 'en': ' However, the transmission of SARS-CoV was considered to occur when the patients are severely ill, while most transmission did not happen at the early phase. '}

{'ha': 'Don haka, barkewar COVID-19 na yanzu ya fi tsanani da wahala wajen sarrafawa fiye da barkewar SARS.', 'en': ' Thus, the current outbreak of COVID-19 is much more severe and difficult to control than the outbreak of SARS. '}

{'ha': "A yanzu haka ana ci gaba da yin kokari sosai a kasar Sin ciki har da kullewar Wuhan da biranen da ke kewayen ta da ci gaba da keɓaɓɓen jama'ar gaba ɗaya cikin fatan kawo ƙarshen yadawa kwayar cutar SARS-CoV-2.", 'en': ' Great efforts are currently underway in China including the lockdown of Wuhan and surrounding cities and continuous quarantine of almost the entire population in hopes of interrupting the transmission of SARS-CoV-2. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da cewa wadannan ayyukan sun lalata tattalin arzikin kasar da sauran bangarorin kasar, adadin sabbin masu cutar yana raguwa, yana nuna raguwar barkewar cutar.', 'en': ' Although these actions have been dramatically damaging the economy and other sectors of the country, the number of new patients is declining, indicating the slowdown of the epidemic. '}

{'ha': 'Kyakkyawan tsammanin shine barkewar zata ƙare a watan Maris kuma yanayin saukar ruwan zaiyi tsawon watanni 3-4.', 'en': ' The most optimistic estimate is that the outbreak will end by March and the downswing phase will last for 3-4 months. '}
{'ha': 'Duk da haka, wasu masana ba su da bege ba.', 'en': ' However, some other experts are not that optimistic. '}

{'ha': 'Paul Hunter, et al., Ya kiyasta cewa COVID-19, wanda alama yafi kamuwa da cutar fiye da SARS, ba zai ƙare a cikin 2020 ba.', 'en': ' Paul Hunter, et al., estimated that COVID-19, which seems substantially more infectious than SARS, will not end in 2020. '}

{'ha': "Ira Longini, et al., Sun kirkiro wani abin ƙira don ƙaddara game da sakamakon annobar kuma ya ba da shawarar SARS-CoV-2 na iya kamuwa da kashi biyu bisa uku na yawan jama'ar duniya.", 'en': ' Ira Longini, et al., established a model to predict the outcome of the epidemic and suggested that SARS-CoV-2 could infect two-thirds of the global population. '}

{'ha': 'Wata Kungiya daga Kanada ta ba da rahoton cewa an gano SARS-CoV-2 a cikin tsakiyar turbinate da makogwaron majinyacin da suka murmure kuma suka bar asibiti makonni 2 da suka gabata, wanda ke nuna cewa sabon kwayar cutar da ke nuna za ta iya zama wani abu mai kama da cutar mai kama da mura.', 'en': ' A Canadian group reported that SARS-CoV-2 was detected in both mid-turbinate and throat swabs of patients who recovered and left the hospital 2 weeks earlier, which indicates that the newly identified virus could become a cyclical episode similar to influenza. '}

{'ha': "Duk da haka, alamu suka bada alama sun faru a kasar Sin bisa la'akari da raguwar sabbin lamurra cutan, wanda ke nuna dabarun da yanzu ke iya aiki.", 'en': ' However, promising signs have occurred in China based on the declining number of new cases, indicating the current strategies might have been working. '}

{'ha': 'An riga an annabta cuta ta Ebola wanda zai iya haifar da lamarin cutar miliyan guda tare da mutuwa rabin miliyan.', 'en': ' Ebola was originally predicted to cause up to a million cases with half a million deaths. '}
{'ha': 'Duk da haka, ta hanyar keɓancewa da warewa, cutar ta ƙare a ƙarshe.', 'en': ' However, via strict quarantine and isolation, the disease has eventually been put under control. '}

{'ha': 'Mai yiyuwa ne, mai kama da SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2 na iya zama da rauni a cikin cuta kuma a ƙarshe ya mutu ko kuma ya zama ƙasa da kwayar cutar tare da mutane.', 'en': ' It is possible, similar to SARS-CoV, that SARS-CoV-2 might become weaker in infectivity and eventually die down or become a less pathogenic virus co-existent with humans. '}

{'ha': 'Ana ba da kwatancin annobar COVID-19 tare da na SARS da MERS yadda aka bada a ƙasa (Fig. (Fig. 55).', 'en': ' A comparison of the epidemic of COVID-19 with that of SARS and MERS is provided below (Fig. \u200b(Fig.55). '}

{'ha': 'Ana yada SARS-CoV-2 sosai ta hanyar tari ko atishawa, kuma na yiwu kuma ta hanyar saduwa kai tsaye da kayan da kwayar cutar ta gurbata.', 'en': ' SARS-CoV-2 is highly transmittable through coughing or sneezing, and possibly also through direct contact with materials contaminated by the virus. '}

{'ha': 'An kuma gano kwayar cutar a cikin kashi, wanda ke haifar da sabon yiwuwar yaduwar cutan daga kashi-zuwa-baki.', 'en': ' The virus was also found in feces, which raises a new possibility of feces-to-mouth transmission. '}

{'ha': "Wani binciken da aka yi kwana nan a kan lamarin masu kamuwa da cutan guda 138 ya ba da rahoton cewa kashi 41% daga cikin waɗannan cututtukan sun yiwu ne ta hanyar kamuwar nosocomial, ciki har da marasa lafiya 17 da wasu cututtukan baya da ma'aikacin kiwon lafiya guda 40.", 'en': ' A recent study on 138 cases reported that 41% of the cases were possibly caused by nosocomial infections, including 17 patients with other prior diseases and 40 health-care providers. '}

{'ha': "Don haka, ya kamata a yi amfani da babbar kariya don kare mutane, musamman ma’aikacin kiwon lafiya, ma'aikatan zamantakewa, membobin iyali, abokan aiki, har ma da masu hulɗa da marasa lafiya ko mutanen da suka kamu da cutar.", 'en': ' Thus, great precaution should be used to protect humans, especially health-care providers, social workers, family members, colleagues, and even bystanders in contact with patients or infected people. '}

{'ha': "Layin farko na kariya wanda za'a iya amfani dashi don rage hadarin kamuwa da cuta shine ta hanyar sanya fuskokin fuska; duka amfani da masks na tiyata da kuma nau'in mashin na numfashi N95 (jerin # 1860s) yana taimakawa wajen sarrafa yaduwar kwayar cututtuka.", 'en': ' The first line of defense that could be used to lower the risk of infection is through wearing face masks; both the use of surgical masks and N95 respirator masks (series # 1860s) helps control the spread of viruses. '}

{'ha': "Abin rufe fuska na tiyata na hana digan ruwa daga yiwuwar mutane da suka kamu da cuta daga tafiya cikin iska ko mannewa a saman kayayyaki, inda za'a watsa su ga wasu.", 'en': ' Surgical face masks prevent liquid droplets from a potentially infected individual from traveling through the air or sticking onto surfaces of materials, where they could be passed on to others. '}

{'ha': 'Koyaya, masai N95 (jerin # 1860s) abin rufe fuska zasu iya kare kai daga shaƙar virions da ke karami kamar 10 zuwa 80 nm, tare da kashi 5% na virions sun sami damar shiga gaba ɗaya; SARS-CoV-2 yana kama da SARS-CoV a girma kuma duka sunkai kusan 85 m.', 'en': ' However, only N95 (series # 1860s) masks can protect against the inhalation of virions as small as 10 to 80 nm, with only 5% of the virions being able to penetrate completely; SARS-CoV-2 is similar to SARS-CoV in size and both are approximately 85 nm. '}

{'ha': 'Tunda barbashi na iya shiga ko da abin rufe fuskar tiyata guda biyar wadanda aka hada kansu, ma’aikatan kiwon lafiya a cikin hulda kai tsaye tare da marassa lafiya dole ne su sanya N95 (jerin # 1860s) abin rufe fuska amma ba abin rufe fuska na tiyata ba.', 'en': ' Since particles can penetrate even five surgical masks stacked together, health-care providers in direct contact with patients must wear N95 (series # 1860s) masks but not surgical masks. '}

{'ha': 'Kari ga abin rufe fuska, ma’aikacin samar da kiwon lafiya yakamata su sanya rigunan kadaici don a kara rage hulɗa da ƙwayoyin cuta.', 'en': ' In addition to masks, health-care providers should wear fitted isolation gowns in order to further reduce contact with viruses. '}
{'ha': 'Kwayoyin cuta kuma na iya kama mutum ta hanyar idanu.', 'en': ' Viruses can also infect an individual through the eyes. '}

{'ha': 'A watan Janairu 22, 2020, likita ya kamu da SARS-CoV-2 duk da cewa ya sa abin rufe fuska N95; mai yiwuwa kwayar cutar ta shiga jikin sa ta kumburin idanuwan sa.', 'en': ' On January 22, 2020, a doctor was infected with SARS-CoV-2 although he wore an N95 mask; the virus might have entered his body through his inflammatory eyes. '}

{'ha': 'Don haka, ma’aikacin kiwon lafiya suma suna sanye da garkuwar fuska ko ƙyalli yayin da ana aiki tare da marasa lafiya.', 'en': ' Thus, health-care providers should also wear transparent face shields or goggles while working with patients. '}

{'ha': "Ga jama'a gaba daya a wuraren da abin ya shafa, ana bada shawara ga kowa da kowa ya wanke hannuwan sa tare da sabulun hanna yaduwar cutar mafi sau dayawa,yi ƙoƙarin zama a cikin gida don keɓancewar kai da taƙaita hulɗa da masu yiwuwar kamuwa da cutar.", 'en': ' For the general public in affected or potentially affected areas, it is highly suggested that everybody wash their hands with disinfectant soaps more often than usual, try to stay indoors for self-quarantine and limit contact with potentially infected individuals. '}

{'ha': 'An dauke kafa shida a matsayin nesa wanda ta dace mutane su zauna domin guje marasa lafiya.', 'en': ' Three feet is considered an appropriate distance for people to stay away from a patient. '}

{'ha': 'Wadannan ayyuka sune hanyoyin ingantattu don rage hadarin kamuwa da cutar tare da hana yaduwar kwayar cutar', 'en': ' These actions are effective methods to lower the risk of infection as well as prevent the spread of the virus. '}

{'ha': 'Kodayake SARS-CoV-2 ya zama sabon ƙwayar cuta ga duniyar ɗan adam, babban haɗarinsa ga SARS-CoV kamar yadda aka ruwaito a 7 Janairu 2020 Yakamata ya jawo babbar jijjiga ga kasar Sin dangane da zurfin tunaninta game da barkewar SARS a 2003.', 'en': ' Although SARS-CoV-2 came as a new virus to the human world, its high homology to SARS-CoV as reported on 7 January 2020 should have caused high alert to China based on her deep memory of the SARS outbreak in 2003. '}

{'ha': "Amma, har zuwa 19 ga Janairu 2020, darektan Cibiyar Kula da Cututtuka ta Wuhan ya ta'azantar da 'yan kasar ta hanyar cewa sabon littafin kwayar cutan na da karancin yaduwa da karancin haihuwa daga mutum zuwa mutum kuma ba matsala ba ne don hanawa da kuma tsayaya da cutar ba.", 'en': ' However, not until 19 January 2020 did the director of the Center of Disease Control of Wuhan comfort the citizens by saying that the novel virus has low contagiousness and limited reproductivity from human to human and that it is not a problem to prevent and contain the disease. '}

{'ha': "Wannan sakon ya shakata karar da jama'a ke yi, musamman lokacin da daukacin kasar ke shirye-shiryen bukukuwan bazara, kuma an dauki lokaci mai tsaho don dauke cutar a karancin sa a Wuhan.", 'en': ' This message remarkably relaxed the alarm of the public, especially when the entire country was preparing for the Spring Festival, and the critical time was missed to contain the disease at its minimal scale in Wuhan. '}

{'ha': 'Hukumomin kula da cutar a China na iya daukar wannan darasi tare da yin muhimmin ci gaba a nan gaba.', 'en': ' The disease control agencies in China may take this hard lesson and make critical improvements in the future. '}

{'ha': "Misali, wadannan hukumomin yakamata su kasance (1) mai da hankali sosai yayin yin sanarwar jama'a kamar yadda kowace kalma take yiwa 'yan kasa kuma yana iya canza halaye da yanke shawara; 2) mai saurin dimauta da mayar da hankali ga bayanan da ba a sani ba daga asibitoci maimakon jiran cikakken bayani daga likitoci ko jami'ai; (3) ƙarin hanawa don ɗaukar cutar annoba a farkon matakinsa maimakon ƙoƙarin ta'azantar da jama'a; da (4) mafi yawan lokuta don samar da ingantattun bayanai da kuma ingantattun hanyoyin domin kara wayar da kan jama'a game da cututtukan annoba da kuma gwadawa da inganta tsarin amsawar al'umma a wasu lokuta.", 'en': " For example, these agencies should be (1) more careful when making public announcements as every word counts to citizens and can change their attitude and decisions; (2) more sensitive and reactive to unusual information from clinics rather than waiting for formal reports from doctors or officials; (3) more restrictive to contain a potential epidemic at its early stage rather than attempting to comfort the public; and (4) more often to issue targeted and effective drills to increase the public's awareness about epidemic diseases and to test and improve the response system of the society periodically. "}

{'ha': 'Barkewar COVID-19 wanda ke haifar da ƙwayar cuta SARS-CoV-2 ya fara ne a ƙarshen watar Disamba 2019.', 'en': ' The outbreak of COVID-19 caused by the novel virus SARS-CoV-2 started in the end of December 2019. '}

{'ha': "Kasa da watanni biyu, ya bazu ko'ina cikin China da kusan sauran ƙasashe 50 a duniya a lokacin wannan rubutun.", 'en': ' In less than two months, it has spread all over China and near 50 other countries globally at the time of this writing. '}

{'ha': "Tunda kwayar cutar tana kama da SARS-CoV kuma alamomin ma suna kama ne tsakanin COVID-19 da SARS, fashewar COVID-19 ya haifar da ma'anar sake dawo da SARS.", 'en': ' Since the virus is very similar to SARS-CoV and the symptoms are also similar between COVID-19 and SARS, the outbreak of COVID-19 has created a sense of SARS recurring. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, akwai wasu bambance-bambance na ban mamaki tsakanin COVID-19 da SARS, waɗanda suke da mahimmanci don tsayarwa da annoban da kuma kula da marasa lafiya.', 'en': ' However, there are some remarkable differences between COVID-19 and SARS, which are essential for containing the epidemic and treating the patients. '}

{'ha': 'COVID-19 ya fi shafar tsofaffi fiye da matasa kuma maza fiye da mata, kuma ƙarancin mutuwa da yawan mutuwa sun fi girma a cikin tsofaffi mutum fiye da na matasa.', 'en': ' COVID-19 affects more elderly individuals than youth and more men than women, and the severity and death rate are also higher in elderly individual than in youth. '}
{'ha': 'SARS tana da mutuƙar nisan mutuwa fiye da COVID-19 kashi (10.91% a kan 1.44%).', 'en': ' SARS has higher mortality than COVID-19 (10.91% versus 1.44%). '}

{'ha': 'Marasa lafiyar COVID-19 na bada kwayar cutar koda kuwa ba ta da alamar sa yayin da marasa lafiyar SARS ke yin hakan yawanci lokacin da suke rashin lafiya mai ƙarfi, wanda ke haifar da babban wahala don ɗaukar yaduwar COVID-19 fiye da SARS.', 'en': ' COVID-19 patients transmit the virus even when they are symptomless whereas SARS patients do so usually when they are severely ill, which causes much greater difficulty to contain the spread of COVID-19 than SARS. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan wani bangare yana bayanin dalilin da yasa yadawar SARS-CoV-2 na da sauri da fadi fiye da SARS-CoV.', 'en': ' This partially explains why SARS-CoV-2 spread much faster and broader than SARS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'RNA na yau da kullun ba da tabbaci ga SARS-CoV-2 na iya zama mara kyau a wasu marasa lafiyar COVID-19.', 'en': ' The regular RNA assay for SARS-CoV-2 can be negative in some COVID-19 patients. '}
{'ha': 'A wata gefe guda, marasa lafiya da aka warke zasu iya zama tabbatacce ga sake cutar.', 'en': ' On the other hand, cured patients can be positive for the virus again. '}
{'ha': 'Wadannan binciken sun kara hadarin yadawa kwayar cutan.', 'en': ' These findings dramatically increase the risk of virus spreading. '}

{'ha': 'Ganin irin wannan saurin ci gaba a cikin binciken COVID-19, batutuwa masu mahimmancin gaske ana iya warware su, kamar haka:', 'en': ' Given such rapid progress in research on COVID-19, several critical issues remain to be solved, as follows: '}
{'ha': 'Daga ina SARS-CoV-2 ta fito?', 'en': ' Where did SARS-CoV-2 come from? '}

{'ha': 'Kodayake an samu kashi 96% na kwayoyin tsakanin SARS-CoV-2 da jemage biyu kamar-SARS CoVs, har yanzu ba za mu iya yanke hukuncin cewa SARS-CoV-2 daga jemagu bane.', 'en': ' Although 96% genetic homolog was found between SARS-CoV-2 and two bat SARS-like CoVs, we still cannot conclude that SARS-CoV-2 is from bats. '}

{'ha': 'Wace halitar dabba ce tsakiya ne don yada kwayar cutar daga ainihin mai mazaman cutar, cewa jemagu, ga mutane?', 'en': ' What animal was the intermediate species to transmit the virus from the original host, say bats, to humans? '}

{'ha': 'Ba tare da sanin amsoshin # 1 da na 2 ba, ba za mu iya yanke watsawar yadda yakamata ba, kuma barkewar na iya sake dawowa a kowane lokaci.', 'en': ' Without knowing answers to #1 and 2, we cannot efficiently cut the transmission, and the outbreak can relapse at any time. '}

{'ha': 'Kodayake samfurin ƙirar kwayoyin halitta da kuma tabbatarwar kwayoyin halitta sun nuna cewa SARS-CoV-2 yana ɗaurawa ACE2, ta yaya ne kwayar cutar ta ke shiga cikin hanya iskar tantanin halitar kuma ta haifar da canje-canjen cutar?', 'en': ' Although molecular modeling and biochemical assays have demonstrated that SARS-CoV-2 binds to ACE2, how exactly does the virus enter the airway cells and cause subsequent pathological changes? '}
{'ha': 'Shin kwayar cutar kuma tana ɗaukar ƙwayoyin bayyana ACE2 a cikin wasu gabobin?', 'en': ' Does the virus also bind ACE2-expressing cells in other organs? '}

{'ha': 'Idan ba tare da amsoshin waɗannan tambayoyin ba, ba za mu iya samun ingantacciyar hanyar bincike da kuma ingantaccen magani ba.', 'en': ' Without clear answers to these questions, we cannot achieve fast and accurate diagnosis and effective treatment. '}
{'ha': 'Har yaushe annobar zata kai ga karshe?', 'en': ' How long will the epidemic last? '}
{'ha': 'Ta yaya ƙwayar cutar ke canza yanayi halita lokacin bazawa tsakanin mutane?', 'en': ' How is the virus genetically evolving during transmission among humans? '}

{'ha': 'Shin zai iya zama annoba a duk duniya, ya mutu kamar SARS ko sake dawowa lokaci-lokaci kamar mura?', 'en': ' Will it become a pandemic worldwide, die down like SARS or relapse periodically like the flu? '}

{'ha': 'Yana da mahimmanci amma yana iya ɗaukar ɗan lokaci don bincika amsoshin tambayoyin da ke sama da sauran tambayoyi masu yawa.', 'en': ' It is essential but may take some time to search for answers to the above and many other questions. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, tare da kowane irin kuɗin da yake buƙata, ba mu da wani zaɓi amma tsayar da annoban da wuri kuma mu dawo da rayuwarmu yada aka saba.', 'en': ' However, with whatever expense it may demand, we have no other choice but to stop the epidemic as soon as possible and bring our life back to normal. '}
{'ha': 'Asalin zoonotic na coronaviruses na mutum', 'en': ' Zoonotic origins of human coronaviruses '}

{'ha': 'Maye gurbi da kuma daidaitawa ne suka haifar da juyin halittun coronaviruses (CoVs) da wajen zaman su, har ma da mutane, zuwa dubban shekaru.', 'en': ' Mutation and adaptation have driven the co-evolution of coronaviruses (CoVs) and their hosts, including human beings, for thousands of years. '}

{'ha': 'Kafin 2003, CoVs na mutum guda biyu (HCoVs) an san su don haifar da ciwo mara tsanani, kamar sanyi na yau da kullun.', 'en': ' Before 2003, two human CoVs (HCoVs) were known to cause mild illness, such as common cold. '}

{'ha': 'Barkewar cuta mai saurin kamuwar manufanshi da alamar (SARS) da cutar manufanshi ta Gabas ta Tsakiya (MERS) sun juya kuɗin don bayyana yadda ɓarkewar cutar HCoV zata iya zamawa.', 'en': ' The outbreaks of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) and the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) have flipped the coin to reveal how devastating and life-threatening an HCoV infection could be. '}

{'ha': 'Fitowar SARS-CoV-2 a tsakiyar ƙasar Sin a ƙarshen shekarar 2019 ya turo cuttutukar CoVs gaba kuma ya ba mu mamaki da cewa yana da sauƙin aikawa ga juna amma yawan ƙwayar cutar sun rage idan aka kwatanta da ‘yar uwarta SARS-CoV.', 'en': ' The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 in central China at the end of 2019 has thrusted CoVs into the spotlight again and surprised us with its high transmissibility but reduced pathogenicity compared to its sister SARS-CoV. '}
{'ha': 'Cutar HCoV ana samun sa ne daga dabbobi kuma fahimtar tushen HcoVs taimaka gaya.', 'en': ' HCoV infection is a zoonosis and understanding the zoonotic origins of HCoVs would serve us well. '}
{'ha': 'Galibin kwayoyin halittar HCoVs sun samo asali ne daga jemagu inda suka kasance ba masu cutarwa ba.', 'en': ' Most HCoVs originated from bats where they are non-pathogenic. '}
{'ha': "Ana sane da halittukan da ke rik'e wasu cututtukar HCoVs a tsakani suma.", 'en': ' The intermediate reservoir hosts of some HCoVs are also known. '}

{'ha': 'Gano ainihin dabbobin da ke dauke da cutar zai taimaka kai tsaye wajen kare mutane daga cutar.', 'en': ' Identifying the animal hosts has direct implications in the prevention of human diseases. '}

{'ha': 'Bincikar mu’amalar mai dauke da cutar CoV da dabbobi watakila zai taimaka wajen gano yaduwar kwayoyin halittar cutar CoV a jikin mutane.', 'en': ' Investigating CoV-host interactions in animals might also derive important insight on CoV pathogenesis in humans. '}

{'ha': 'A cikin wannan bita, mun gabatar da wani bayyani game da ilimin data kasance game da HCoV guda bakwai, tare da mai da hankali kan tarihin gano su da yadda aka samo asalin zoonotic da kuma yada jinsunan halittar.', 'en': ' In this review, we present an overview of the existing knowledge about the seven HCoVs, with a focus on the history of their discovery as well as their zoonotic origins and interspecies transmission. '}

{'ha': 'Muhimmin abu a nan shi ne, mu tantance banbanci tsakanin kwayar cutar HCoVs daga fahimtar yadda asalin kwayar cuta take rikada da kuma kwayoyin halitta suke rikida daga asalin tushensu.', 'en': ' Importantly, we compare and contrast the different HCoVs from a perspective of virus evolution and genome recombination. '}

{'ha': 'Cutar CoV da ake fama da ita a 2019 mai suna (COVID-19) wacce annoba ce, an yi bayani game da ita a nan.', 'en': ' The current CoV disease 2019 (COVID-19) epidemic is discussed in this context. '}

{'ha': 'Bugu da ƙari, an jaddada yadda abunda ake buƙata domin ƙwayar cutar ta samu nasarar masauka wanda ke sauyawa kuma anlmm jaddada sakamakon yadda juyin halittar kwayar cutar ke tsananta cutar.', 'en': ' In addition, the requirements for successful host switches and the implications of virus evolution on disease severity are also highlighted. '}

{'ha': 'Kwayoyin cutar Corona (CoVs) sun kasance dangin Coronaviridae, wanda ya hada da tabbatacciyar rukunin kwayoyin cututtukan RNA mai zare daya.', 'en': ' Coronaviruses (CoVs) belong to the family Coronaviridae, which comprises a group of enveloped, positive-sensed, single-stranded RNA viruses. '}

{'ha': 'Wadannan kwayoyin cututtukan sun kunsar da babban ma’adanin kwayar halittar kamaceceniya na RNA daga 26 zuwa 32 nasu, dalilin da yasa ake kiransu “CoVs” wanda ake iya gani a tabarau na microscope.', 'en': ' These viruses harbouring the largest genome of 26 to 32 kilobases amongst RNA viruses were termed “CoVs” because of their crown-like morphology under electron microscope. '}
{'ha': 'A gine dai, CoVs suna da kwayoyin halittar da ba a rarrabe su ba wanda ke da shiri kamar haka.', 'en': ' Structurally, CoVs have non-segmented genomes that share a similar organization. '}

{'ha': 'Kimanin kashi biyu bisa uku na halittar suna dauke da manyan furanni masu budewa biyu (ORF1a da ORF1b), wadanda ake fassara su cikin pp1a da pp1ab kwafin polyproteins.', 'en': ' Approximately two thirds of the genome contain two large overlapping open reading frames (ORF1a and ORF1b), which are translated into the pp1a and pp1ab replicase polyproteins. '}

{'ha': 'Ana ƙara aiwatar da polyproteins don samar da furotin 16 waɗanda ba na tsari ba, waɗanda aka tsara nsp1~16.', 'en': ' The polyproteins are further processed to generate 16 non-structural proteins, designated nsp1~16. '}

{'ha': 'Sauran bangaren tushen halittar mai dauke da ORFs domin abu mai gina jiki kamar su, nau‘in spike (S), envelope (E), membrane (M) and nucleoprotein (N).', 'en': ' The remaining portion of the genome contains ORFs for the structural proteins, including spike (S), envelope (E), membrane (M) and nucleoprotein (N). '}

{'ha': "Yawancin nau'ikan sinadaran zuriya, su ma ana lulluɓe su da wasu zuriyoyin CoVs daban.", 'en': ' A number of lineage-specific accessory proteins are also encoded by different lineages of CoVs. '}

{'ha': 'Dangane da bambanci a cikin jerin abubuwan gina jiki, ana rarraba CoVs zuwa abubuwa huɗu (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV da delta-CoV), tsakanin abin da beta-CoV ya ƙunshi yawancin HCoVs kuma an rarrabasu cikin kashi huɗu (A, B, C da D).', 'en': ' Based on the difference in protein sequences, CoVs are classified into four genera (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV and delta-CoV), among which the beta-CoV genera contains most HCoVs and is subdivided into four lineages (A, B, C and D). '}

{'ha': 'Hujjojin halittun dabbobi sun nuna cewa jemagu da dabbobin suna aiki a matsayin tushen asalin yawancin alpha-CoVs da beta-CoVs, yayin da tsuntsaye sune babban tafki na gamma-CoVs da delta-CoVs', 'en': ' Phylogenetic evidence has shown that bats and rodents serve as the gene source of most alpha-CoVs and beta-CoVs, while birds are the main reservoir of gamma-CoVs and delta-CoVs. '}

{'ha': 'Shekaru dubbai yanzu, CoVs sun shawo kan shingen jinsuna kuma wasu sun fito a matsayin mahimman ƙwayoyin cuta na mutane.', 'en': ' For thousands of years, CoVs have constantly crossed species barriers and some have emerged as important human pathogens. '}
{'ha': 'Har ya zuwa yau din nan, an san cututtukan na CoVs (HCoVs) nau’i bakwai ne a jikin dan adam.', 'en': ' To date, seven human CoVs (HCoVs) are known. '}
{'ha': 'Daga cikinsu HCoV-229E da HCoV-NL63 sune alpha-CoVs.', 'en': ' Among them HCoV-229E and HCoV-NL63 are alpha-CoVs. '}

{'ha': 'Sauran beta-CoV guda biyar sun hada da HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani na coronavirus (SARS-CoV), cutar numfashi na gefen larabawa coronavirus (MERS-CoV) da SARS-CoV-2.', 'en': ' The other five beta-CoVs include HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV), Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) and SARS-CoV-2. '}

{'ha': 'Cututtukan HCoV-229E da HCoV-OC43 da HCoV-HKU1 da kuma HCoV-NL63 galibi su kan haifar da alamomin cuta marasa karfi sosai kamar mura da ko kuma gudawa.', 'en': ' HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63 usually cause mild symptoms, like common cold and/or diarrhea. '}

{'ha': 'Saɓanin haka, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV da subuwar cutar SARS-CoV-2 da aka gano sune cututtuka masu mafi yaɗuwa da ke haifar da mummunan rauni na jijiyoyin jiki a marasa lafiya tare da babbar damar haɓaka ciwo mai rauni na rashin damuwa na jiki (ARDS) da bayyananniyar cututtuka.', 'en': ' In contrast, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and the newly-identified SARS-CoV-2 are highly pathogenic, causing severe lower respiratory tract infection in relatively more patients with a higher chance to develop acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and extrapulmonary manifestations. '}

{'ha': "Nau'in HCoV-229E na farko, B814, ya kasance mai rabuwa daga fitowar hancin marasa lafiya masu fama da murar yau da kullum a tsakiyar shekarun 1960.", 'en': ' The first HCoV-229E strain, B814, was isolated from the nasal discharge of patients with common cold in mid-1960s. '}

{'ha': 'Tun daga lokacin, ake ta samun ilimi kan HCoV-229E da kuma HCoV-OC43, ta hanyar zurfafa nazarin alamun cutar.', 'en': ' Since then, more knowledge was accumulated through extensive studies on HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, both of which cause self-limiting symptoms. '}

{'ha': "Tabbas, an yarda da ra'ayin cewa kamuwa da cutar HCoVs gaba daya ba shi da matsala har sai fashewar SARS.", 'en': ' Indeed, the concept had been widely accepted that infection with HCoVs is generally harmless until the outbreak of SARS. '}

{'ha': 'Barkewar cutar SARS da ta faru a cikin shekarar 2003, shi ne ɗaya mafi munin balaguro a cikin tarihin na yanzu, da ya kamu da mutane sama da 8,000 da ke cikin mummunan yanayin mutuwar kusan kashi 10%.', 'en': ' The SARS outbreak occurred in 2003 is one of the most devastating in current history, infecting over 8,000 people with a crude case fatality of approximately 10%. '}

{'ha': 'Shekaru goma bayan haka, barkewar cutar numfashi na gefen larabawa wato Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS) ya haifar da annoba na yau da kullum a Kasashen Larabawa tare da yaduwa zuwa sauran sassan duniya.', 'en': ' Ten years later, the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) outbreak resulted in a persistent epidemic in the Arabian Peninsula with sporadic spreading to the rest of the world. '}

{'ha': 'Sabuwar cutar HCoV ta shekarar 2019 (2019-nCoV), wanda daga baya aka sake masa suna SARS-CoV-2, shine wakili na abubuwanda ke faruwa na ci gaba da cutar coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19), wanda ya yi sanadiyar rayuka sama da 3,120 kuma ya kamu da mutane sama da dubu 91,000 a cikin watan Maris 3, 2020.', 'en': ' The 2019 novel HCoV (2019-nCoV), which has subsequently been renamed SARS-CoV-2, is the causative agent of the ongoing epidemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), which has claimed more than 3,120 lives and infected more than 91,000 people as of March 3, 2020. '}

{'ha': 'Ƙararrawar tana ta kaɗawa kuma dole duniya ta shirya akan annobar cutar SARS-CoV-2 da ke zuwa.', 'en': ' The alarm has been ringing and the world has to prepare for the coming pandemic of SARS-CoV-2. '}
{'ha': 'Dukkanin HCoV guda bakwai suna da asalin fitowa daga dabbobi kamar su jemagu, beraye ko dabbobin gida.', 'en': ' All seven HCoVs have a zoonotic origin from bats, mice or domestic animals. '}

{'ha': 'Bayanan shaida da yawa suna tallafawa asalin juyin halittar dukkanin HCoVs daga jemagu, inda ƙwayoyin cuta suke dacewa da kyau kuma ba masu bada ciwon ba ne amma na nuna babban bambancin kwayoyin halita.', 'en': ' Multiple lines of evidence support an evolutionary origin of all HCoVs from bats, where viruses are well adapted and non-pathogenic but show great genetic diversity. '}

{'ha': 'COVID-19 annobar cutar ta gabatar da babban kalubale na likita, kimiyya, zamantakewa da halin kirki ga kasar Sin da duniya.', 'en': ' The COVID-19 epidemic has presented enormous medical, scientific, social and moral challenges to China and the world. '}

{'ha': 'Binciken asalin dabbobin da suka janyo HCoVs yana ba da tsarin fahimtar tarihin halitta, ƙarfin tuƙi da abubuwan da ke hana ƙetare na tsallen jinsin.', 'en': ' Tracing the zoonotic origins of HCoVs provides a framework to understand the natural history, driving force and restriction factors of species jumping. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan na iya jagorantar ko sauƙaƙe bincika tafkin, matsakaici da haɓaka rundunar garken dabbobi (s) na SARS-CoV-2, tare da mahimmancin tasiri cikin karewar abin da ke dawowa nan gaba.', 'en': ' This might also guide or facilitate the search for the reservoir, intermediate and amplifying animal host(s) of SARS-CoV-2, with important implications in the prevention of future spillovers. '}

{'ha': 'A cikin wannan bitar, mun gabatar da wani taƙaitaccen bayani game da asalin cututtukar dabbobi (zoonotic), watsawarsu tsakanin nau’in jinsun kansu da gine-ginen HCoVs.', 'en': ' In this review we present an overview of the zoonotic origins, interspecies transmission and pathogenesis of HCoVs. '}

{'ha': 'Musamman ma, muna karin haske da bayani kan tushen kwayoyin cutar HCoVs ba wai sun samo asali ne daga kwayoyin halittar da basa haifar da cuta a jiki bayan sun shiga jikin wani na daban.', 'en': ' Particularly, we highlight and discuss the common theme that parental viruses of HCoVs are typically non-pathogenic in their natural reservoir hosts but become pathogenic after interspecies transmission to a new host. '}

{'ha': 'Mun kuma sake nazarin yanayin cigaban HCoV wanda karuwa a watsawa sau da yawa yana zuwa tare da raguwa a cikin mai bada kwayar cutan.', 'en': ' We also review the trend of HCoV evolution in which the increase in transmissibility often comes with the decrease in pathogenicity. '}
{'ha': 'Ana bayanin sakamakon da barkewar ita ma cutar SARS-CoV-2 a nan.', 'en': ' The outcome of the ongoing SARS-CoV-2 outbreak is also discussed in this context. '}
{'ha': 'An san CoV na dabbobi tun ƙarshen shekarun 1930.', 'en': ' Animal CoVs have been known since late 1930s. '}

{'ha': 'Kafin farkon warewar iri B814 na HCoV-229E daga zubar hancin wanda ya kamu da mura na yau da kullun, an ware CoVs a dabbobi daban-daban wanda suka kamu da cutar kamar tolotolo, ɓera, shanu, alade, kule da kare.', 'en': ' Before the first isolation of HCoV-229E strain B814 from the nasal discharge of patients who had contracted common cold, different CoVs had been isolated in various infected animals, including turkey, mouse, cow, pig, cat and dog. '}
{'ha': 'A shekara ashirin da suka gabata, an gano kwayoyin cuatr dangin HCoVs.', 'en': ' In the past decades, seven HCoVs have been identified. '}

{'ha': 'Takaitaccen tarihin gano cutar HCoV a jerin jadawalin farko na wannana teburi (Tebur 1) zai zama mai gamsarawa tare da bayar da cikakken bayani a kai.', 'en': ' A brief summary of the history of HCoV discovery in chronological order (Table \u200b1) would be informative and instructive. '}

{'ha': 'Rashin HCoV-229E na farko ya kasance a kebe daga cutar hanyar numfashi na marasa lafiya da cutar sama hanyar numfashi a shekarar 1966, daga baya ya sami karbuwa girma cikin layin tantanin halitar huhu WI-38.', 'en': ' The first HCoV-229E strain was isolated from the respiratory tract of patients with upper respiratory tract infection in the year of 1966, and was subsequently adapted to grow in WI-38 lung cell lines. '}

{'ha': 'Marasa lafiya waɗanda ke kamuwa da HCoV-229E da aka gabatar tare da alamun sanyi na yau da kullun, gami da ciwon kai, atishawa, rashin jin dadi, zazzabi da ciwon-makogwaro, da zazzabi da tari da aka gani cikin damu’oin kashi 10~20%.', 'en': ' Patients infected with HCoV-229E presented with common cold symptoms, including headache, sneezing, malaise and sore-throat, with fever and cough seen in 10~20% cases. '}

{'ha': 'Daga baya a shekarar 1967, an ware HCoV-OC43 daga hanyar binciken ‘organ culture’ da kuma hanyar renon cuta (serial passage) da zai biyo a kwakwalwar jariran ɓeraye.', 'en': ' Later in 1967, HCoV-OC43 was isolated from organ culture and subsequent serial passage in brains of suckling mice. '}

{'ha': 'Siffofin asibiti na kamuwa da HCoV-OC43 suna kama da waɗanda HCoV-229E ke haifar, waɗanda ke alammar nuna bambanci daga kamuwa da wasu cututtukan ƙwayoyin cuta kamar mura da ƙwayoyin cuta da kuma rhinoviruses.', 'en': ' The clinical features of HCoV-OC43 infection appear to be similar to those caused by HCoV-229E, which are symptomatically indistinguishable from infection with other respiratory tract pathogens such as influenza A viruses and rhinoviruses. '}

{'ha': 'Dukansu HCoV-229E da HCoV-OC43 na yaɗuwa a duk faɗin duniya, kuma galibi suna watsawa a lokacin bazara, a cikin yanayi marasa dumi ko sanyi.', 'en': ' Both HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 are distributed globally, and they tend to be predominantly transmitted during the season of winter in temperate climate. '}

{'ha': 'Yawanci dai, lokacin yaɗuwar waɗannan ƙwayoyin cututtuka guda biyu shi ne ƙasa da mako ɗaya, hakan na biye da sa rashin lafiyan kusan makonai 2.', 'en': ' Generally, the incubation time of these two viruses is less than one week, followed by an approximately 2-week illness. '}

{'ha': 'Dangane da binciken masu ba da agaji na ɗan adam, mutane masu lafiya waɗanda suka kamu da cutar HCoV-229E sun kamu da sanyi na yau da kullun.', 'en': ' According to a human volunteer study, healthy individuals infected with HCoV-229E developed mild common cold. '}

{'ha': 'Kalilan marasa lafiya wadan da garkuwar jikin sub ba karfi ne ke nuna tsananin kamuwa hanyar manufanshi da cuta.', 'en': ' Only a few immunocompromised patients exhibited severe lower respiratory tract infection. '}

{'ha': 'SARS, wanda kuma aka sani da "kwayar cutar huhu", shine farkon bayanan da aka samu na cutar HCoV-da ke haifar da ƙwayar cuta a cikin tarihin ɗan adam kuma wakili na etiological shine SARS-CoV, HCoV na uku da aka gano.', 'en': ' SARS, also known as “atypical pneumonia”, was the first well documented HCoV-caused pandemic in human history and the etiological agent is SARS-CoV, the third HCoV discovered. '}
{'ha': 'Ana iya gano kamuwar SARS ta farko zuwa karshen 2002 a lardin Guangdong na kasar Sin.', 'en': ' The first case of SARS can be traced back to late 2002 in Guangdong Province of China. '}

{'ha': 'Cutar ta SARS ta haifar da mutane 8,096 da aka ruwaito sun kamu da asarar rayuka 774, sun bazu cikin kasashe da nahiyoyi da yawa.', 'en': ' The SARS epidemic resulted in 8,096 reported cases with 774 deaths, spreading across many countries and continents. '}

{'ha': 'Ban da manyan gwaraza, an kiyasta hakan kowane damuwa na iya ba da kusan damu’oi biyu na, tare da lokacin shiryawa na kwanaki 4 zuwa 7 da gangar jikin kwayar cutar ta bayyana a ranar 10 ta rashin lafiya.', 'en': ' Apart from the super-spreaders, it was estimated that each case could give rise to approximately two secondary cases, with an incubation period of 4 to 7 days and the peak of viral load appearing on the 10th day of illness. '}

{'ha': 'Marasa lafiya waɗanda ke kamuwa da SARS-CoV da farko suna kasancewa tare da myalgia, ciwon kai, zazzabi, zazzabin cizon sauro da tsananin sanyi, biyo bayan dyspnea, tari da matsananciyar damuwa kamar bayyanar cututtuka.', 'en': ' Patients infected with SARS-CoV initially present with myalgia, headache, fever, malaise and chills, followed by dyspnea, cough and respiratory distress as late symptoms. '}

{'ha': 'Lymphopenia, gwajin aikin hanta, da haɓaka sinadarin creatine kinase abubuwa ne na gama-gari wurin gwaji na SARS.', 'en': ' Lymphopenia, deranged liver function tests, and elevated creatine kinase are common laboratory abnormalities of SARS. '}

{'ha': 'Diffuse alveolar damage (lalacewar huhu), epithelial cell proliferation (yaɗuwar ƙwayoyin halittar kan jiki), kuma an gano karuwar macrophages (ƙwayoyin halittar farin jini) a cikin marasa lafiyar SARS.', 'en': ' Diffuse alveolar damage, epithelial cell proliferation and an increase of macrophages are also observed in SARS patients. '}

{'ha': 'Aƙalla kashi 20-30% na marasa lafiya daga baya suna buƙatar kulawa mai zurfi da samun iska.', 'en': ' Approximately 20-30% of patients subsequently require intensive care and mechanical ventilation. '}

{'ha': 'Bayan hanyar numfashi ta ƙasa, gabobin cikin jiki da yawa, ciki har da na ciki, hanta da koda na iya kamuwa da cutar a cikin waɗannan mummunan yanayin cutar, yawanci tare da hadarin cytokine, wanda kan iya kashewa musamman ga marasa lafiya marasa kariyar lafiya.', 'en': ' In addition to lower respiratory tract, multiple organs including gastrointestinal tract, liver and kidney can also be infected in these severe cases, usually accompanied with a cytokine storm, which might be lethal particularly in immunocompromised patients. '}

{'ha': 'An fara ware kwayar cutar ne daga tarin kwayoyin cutar huhu na wani dan uwan mai cutar Ebola wanda ya tafi Hong Kong daga Guangzhou.', 'en': ' The virus was first isolated from the open lung biopsy of a relative of the index patient who travelled to Hong Kong from Guangzhou. '}
{'ha': 'Tun lokacin kuma ake ta kokarin nazari kan cutar HCoV.', 'en': ' Since then, tremendous efforts have been dedicated to HCoV research. '}
{'ha': 'HCoV-NL63 an ware shi daga wani yaro dan watanni 7 daga Netherlands a ƙarshen 2004.', 'en': ' HCoV-NL63 was isolated from a 7-month-old child from the Netherlands during late 2004. '}

{'ha': 'An samo shi ne da farko a cikin yara ƙanana, tsofaffi da marasa lafiyan mara garkuwa wato immunocompromised da cutan numfashi.', 'en': ' It was initially found to be prevalent in young children, the elderly and immunocompromised patients with respiratory illnesses. '}

{'ha': 'Gabatar coryza, conjunctivitis, zazzabi, da mashako ya zama ruwan dare a cikin cutar da HCoV-NL63 ta haifar.', 'en': ' Presentation of coryza, conjunctivitis, fever, and bronchiolitis is common in the disease caused by HCoV-NL63. '}

{'ha': 'Wani bincike mai zaman kansa ya bayyana warewar cutar guda daga samfurin hanci daga wani yaro dan watanni 8 da ke fama da ciwon huhu a Netherlands.', 'en': ' Another independent study described the isolation of the same virus from a nasal specimen from an 8-month-old boy suffering from pneumonia in the Netherlands. '}
{'ha': 'Ko da yake a gano ta ne a kasar Netherlands, amma tabbas dai an yada ta a duniya.', 'en': ' Although it was identified in Netherlands, it is actually distributed globally. '}
