{'ha': 'An yi kiyasin cewa kwayoyin halittar HCoV-NL63 sune keda alhakin akalla kashi 4.7 na cututtukan numfashi, kuma yana ganiyarsa a daidai shigar lokacin bazara da kaka da kuma hunturu.', 'en': ' It has been estimated that HCoV-NL63 accounts for approximately 4.7% of common respiratory diseases, and its peak incidence occurs during early summer, spring and winter. '}
{'ha': 'HCoV-NL63 yana da alaƙar da cutar kumburin beli mai toshewa, wanda kuma aka sani da croup.', 'en': ' HCoV-NL63 is associated with obstructive laryngitis, also known as croup. '}

{'ha': 'A shekara daya ce, cutar HCoV-HKU1 aka fara gano ta daga wani dattijo mai shekara 71 wanda aka garzaya da shi asibiti sakamakon cutar shakewar numfashi ta pneumonia da kuma cutar huhu a birnin Hong Kong.', 'en': ' In the same year, HCoV-HKU1 was isolated from a 71-year-old man who had been hospitalized with pneumonia and bronchiolitis in Hong Kong. '}

{'ha': "Bayan ciwon huhu da na hanyoyin huhu wadanda al'umma ke samu, an ruwaito cewa HCoV-HKU1 yana da alaƙa da matsanancin rashin lafiyar asma.", 'en': ' Besides community-acquired pneumonia and bronchiolitis, HCoV-HKU1 was reported to be associated with acute asthmatic exacerbation. '}

{'ha': 'Kama da HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E da HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 an samu a duk duniya, suna haifar da karamin cutan manufanci.', 'en': ' Similar to HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 was found worldwide, causing mild respiratory diseases. '}

{'ha': "Duk waɗannan HCoVs huɗu da al'umma suka samu wurin zama a mutane kuma galibi ba su da ikon canzawa don haifar da kwayoyin cututtuka sosai, kodayake hatsarori sun faru ne saboda dalilai da ba a san su ba kamar yadda a cikin mafi yawan yanayi mai kama da HCoV-NL63, wanda a kwanan nan aka ba da rahoton cewa yana haifar da cuta kasa hanyar numfashi mai tsanani a China.", 'en': ' All these four community-acquired HCoVs have been well adapted to humans and are generally less likely to mutate to cause highly pathogenic diseases, though accidents did occur for unknown reasons as in the rare case of a more virulent subtype of HCoV-NL63, which has recently been reported to cause severe lower respiratory tract infection in China. '}

{'ha': 'Gabaɗaya, lokacin da waɗannan HCoVs suka sami damar iya watsuwa yadda yakamata kuma su riƙe kansu gabaɗaya cikin ɗan-adam, su kuma suna zama ƙasa da ɓarna ko kuma cutarwa.', 'en': ' Generally, when these HCoVs acquire the abilities to transmit efficiently and to maintain themselves continuously within humans, they also become less virulent or pathogenic. '}

{'ha': 'An fara ware MERS-CoV ne a cikin 2012 a cikin huhu na wani mara lafiya mai shekaru 60 wanda ya kamu da matsananciyar cutar huhu da gazawar koda a Saudiya.', 'en': ' MERS-CoV was first isolated in 2012 from the lung of a 60-year-old patient who developed acute pneumonia and renal failure in Saudi Arabia. '}

{'ha': 'Ganin cewa mafi yawan kwayoyin da aka tabbatar da asali sun fito ne daga Gabas ta Tsakiya, an bayar da rahoton yaduwa ta biyu na gaba zuwa makusantan sadarwa a kasashe daban-daban na Turai da Tunusiya.', 'en': ' Whereas most of the laboratory-confirmed cases originate from the Middle East, imported cases with occasional secondary spreads to close contacts have been reported in various European countries and Tunisia. '}

{'ha': 'Wani fashewa ta sakandare ya faru a Koriya ta Kudu a cikin 2015 tare da tabbatarwan mutane 186 da cutar.', 'en': ' Another secondary outbreak occurred in South Korea in 2015 with 186 confirmed cases. '}

{'ha': 'Bayyanannin asibiti na MERS sun yi kama da na SARS, wanda ke nunawa da mummunan ciwon huhu.', 'en': ' Clinical manifestations of MERS resemble those of SARS, characterized by progressive acute pneumonia. '}

{'ha': 'Sai dai ba kamar cutar SARS ba, da dama daga cikin majinyatan murar ta MERS sun kuma gamu da matsalar ciwon koda, wanda ya zama babban dalili da ya sa banbanta cuatr ta MERS da kuma kwayoyin cututtukan da ke samuwa daga HCoV.', 'en': ' Unlike SARS, many patients with MERS also developed acute renal failure, which is thus far unique for MERS among HCoV-caused diseases. '}

{'ha': 'Fiye da kashi 30% na marasa lafiya da ke tare da alamun gastrointestinal, kamar gudawa da amai.', 'en': ' More than 30% of patients present with gastrointestinal symptoms, such as diarrhea and vomiting. '}

{'ha': 'Ya zuwa ranar 14 ga Fabrairu, 2020, kamuwa sama da 2500 da aka tabbatar a dakin gwaje-gwaje sun kasance tare da mutuwar kasha 34.4 cikin dari, wadda ya sa MERS-CoV ta zama daya daga cikin cututtukan da ke lalata mutane sosai da aka taba samu.', 'en': ' As of February 14, 2020, over 2500 laboratory confirmed cases were reported with a high case fatality of 34.4%, making MERS-CoV one of the most devastating viruses known to humans. '}

{'ha': 'Daidai lokacin tsakiyar watan Disamban 2019, an samu wasu marasa lafiya masu fama da shakewar numfashi ko pneumonia da a lokacin aka yi tunanin tana kama da cutar SARS-CoV-2 wandanda aka gano a birnin Wuhan, lardin Hubei, da ke kasar China.', 'en': ' During middle to late December 2019, clusters of pneumonia patients retrospectively known to be associated with SARS-CoV-2 infection were detected in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China. '}

{'ha': "Hukumar Kiwon Lafiya ta Duniya ta ba da sanarwar ci gaban barkewar cuta kasan hanyar manufanci wanda haifar da SARS-CoV-2 da shi wanda ya zama babban kalubale ga lafiyar Jama'a na Kasa da Kasa kuma ya sanya sunan cutar COVID-19.", 'en': ' World Health Organization declared the ongoing outbreak of lower respiratory tract infection caused by SARS-CoV-2 a Public Health Emergency of International Concern and also named the disease COVID-19. '}

{'ha': 'Ya zuwa ranar 3 ga watan Maris, 2020, as tabbatar da mutane masu kamuwa 90,053 a duniya, tare da yawan mutuwa saboda kamuwa wanda ya kai kashi 3.4%..', 'en': ' As of March 3, 2020, 90,053 cases have been confirmed worldwide, with a crude case fatality of 3.4%. '}

{'ha': 'Musamman ma, yawan wadanda suka mutu daga cutar a Hubei, China ya kai kashi 4.2 cikin dari, alhali wanda yake waje da can kashi 1.2 cikin dari ne.', 'en': ' Notably, the case fatality in Hubei, China is 4.2%, whereas the one outside of it is 1.2%. '}

{'ha': 'SARS-CoV-2 yana haifar da tsananin cutan numfashi kamar SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV, an gabatar da su azaman zazzabi, tari da dyspnea.', 'en': ' SARS-CoV-2 causes severe respiratory infection like SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, presented as fever, cough and dyspnea. '}
{'ha': 'Ana kuma ganin cutar gudawa a wasu marassa lafiyan.', 'en': ' Diarrhea is also seen in some patients. '}

{'ha': 'Cutar huhu na ɗaya daga cikin alamun bayyanar cututtuka kuma yana iya ci gaba cikin hanzari zuwa ciwo mai wahala na manumfashi.', 'en': ' Pneumonia is one of the most severe symptoms and can progress rapidly to acute respiratory distress syndrome. '}

{'ha': 'Kodayake SARS-CoV da SARS-CoV-2 suna da kama sosai saboda halayyar ƙwayoyin nucleotide na kasha 82%, suna curewa cikin rassa daban-daban a cikin bishiyar kwayoyin halittar.', 'en': ' Although SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are very similar due to high nucleotide sequence homology of 82%, they cluster into different branches in the phylogenetic tree. '}

{'ha': 'Idan aka kwatanta da SARS-CoV wadda yake da babban adadin maye gurbi, adadin maye gurbi na SARS-CoV-2 yana kasa sosai, wadda ke nuna girman matakin karbuwa ga mutane.', 'en': ' SARS-CoV-2 is apparently less pathogenic but more transmissible compared to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'Wani mai nuna alamar kamu da SARS-CoV-2 wanda aka bada rahoton iya ba da gudummawa ga saurin yaduwa a duniya.', 'en': ' Asymptomatic subjects infected with SARS-CoV-2 have been reported and might contribute to its rapid spreading around the world. '}

{'ha': 'Kwatantawa da kuma musanya SARS-CoV-2 tare da sauran HCoV guda shida suna nuna kamanni da bambance-bambance masu babban mahimmanci.', 'en': ' Comparing and contrasting SARS-CoV-2 with the other six HCoVs reveal similarities and differences of great interest. '}

{'ha': 'Na farko dai, lokacin kyankyasar cutar da kuma yadda cutar ta HCoV ke samuwa na kama da juna.', 'en': ' First, the incubation period and the duration of the course of HCoV disease are very similar. '}
{'ha': 'A wannan batun, SARS-CoV-2 yana bin yanayin gaba ɗaya na sauran HCoV guda shida.', 'en': ' In this regard, SARS-CoV-2 follows the general trend of the other six HCoVs. '}

{'ha': 'Na biyu shi ne zafin alamun cutar COVID-19 ya dogara ne tsakanin cutar SARS-CoV da kuma sauran ire-irensu guda hudu: HCoVs (i.e. HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63).', 'en': ' Second, the severity of symptoms of COVID-19 lies between SARS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs (i.e. HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63). '}

{'ha': "A bangare guda, kamuwa da cuta SARS-CoV-2 yana nuna fasali waɗanda aka fi ganinsu yayin kamuwa da cutar HCoVs, da al'umma ke samu, gami da gabatar da marasa takamaiman, mai saukin kai ko ma babu alamun su.", 'en': ' On one hand, SARS-CoV-2 infection exhibits features that are more commonly seen during infection with community-acquired HCoVs, including the presentation of non-specific, mild or even no symptoms. '}

{'ha': 'A gefe guda, ana iya ganin ƙaramin kashin tsananin kamuwa da COVID-19 kamar yadda ake ganin ta a kamuwa da cutar SARS-CoV, duk da haka kashin yana da karanci.', 'en': ' On the other hand, a small subset of severe cases of COVID-19 can also be seen as in the case of SARS-CoV infection, although the ratio is a bit lower. '}

{'ha': "Na uku, watsuwar SARS-CoV-2 kuma yana nuna alamun halayen ban sha'awa na samun HCoVs da al'umma kan yi da na SARS-CoV.", 'en': ' Third, the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 also shows interesting patterns characteristic of both community-acquired HCoVs and SARS-CoV. '}

{'ha': "A bangare guda, bazuwar SARS-CoV-2 ya yi daidai da na HCoVs wanda al'umma suka samu.", 'en': ' On one hand, the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 is at least as high as that of community-acquired HCoVs. '}

{'ha': 'A wata gefe guda, ya rage don tabbatar da ko yiwuwar rikicewar SARS-CoV-2 ya ragu bayan bayanan wurare a cikin mutane kamar yadda yake a yanayin SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV.', 'en': ' On the other hand, it remains to be verified whether the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 decreases after passages in humans as in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV. '}
{'ha': "A ƙarshe, daidai da sauran HCoVs, SARS-CoV-2 za'a iya gano su a cikin samfuran fecal.", 'en': ' Finally, same as the other HCoVs, SARS-CoV-2 can be detected in fecal samples. '}

{'ha': 'Nazarin cewa ko cutar SARS-CoV-2 ta yadu ta hanyar kashin da ya shiga ta baki ya taka muhimmiyar rawa wajen yada cutar SARS-CoV zai zama sai nan gaba za a tabbatar da haka a binciken da za a yi.', 'en': ' Whether fecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2 plays an important role as in the case of SARS-CoV at least under some circumstance remains to be clarified by future studies. '}

{'ha': "Hakanan yana da matukar sha'awar ganin ko SARS-CoV-2 na iya bayyanar da yanayi kamar yadda al'amuran al'umma suka samu HCoVs.", 'en': ' It is also of particularly great interest to see whether SARS-CoV-2 might exhibit seasonality as in the cases of community-acquired HCoVs. '}

{'ha': 'Koyaya, siffofin SARS-CoV-2 gami da wucewa, pathogenicity da ci gaba mai yadawa bayan wurare a cikin mutane zasu zama masu tasiri akan ƙarshen ƙaddarar barkewar COVID-19.', 'en': ' Nevertheless, the features of SARS-CoV-2 including its transmissibility, pathogenicity and sustainable spreading after passages in humans will be influential on the ultimate fate of the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19. '}

{'ha': "Dukkanin al'ummomin guda huɗu sun samo HCoVs waɗanda ke haifar da bayyanar cututtuka masu alaƙa sun daidaita ga mutane.", 'en': ' All four community-acquired HCoVs causing mild symptoms have been well adapted to humans. '}

{'ha': "Ta wata hanyar, zai iya zama gaskiya ne cewa 'yan Adam sun daidaita da waɗannan HCoVs huɗu.", 'en': ' From another perspective, it might also be true that humans have been well adapted to these four HCoVs. '}
{'ha': 'Ta wata hanyar, duka biyun zasu iya kasancewa daga rayuwar tsoffin anoban HCoV.', 'en': ' In other words, both could be the survivors of ancient HCoV pandemics. '}

{'ha': 'HCoVs waɗanda ke haifar da mummunan cututtuka a cikin mutane da mutane waɗanda suka kamu da mummunan cututtukan HCoV an kawar dasu.', 'en': ' HCoVs that cause severe diseases in humans and humans who developed severe HCoV diseases have been eliminated. '}

{'ha': 'Domin wannan ya faru, HCoVs na bukatar su rubanya a cikin mutane zuwa isasshen mataki don ba da damar tattaruwar maye gurbi da zai ci galabar dalilan ƙuntatawa na mafaka.', 'en': ' For this to happen, HCoVs have to replicate in humans to sufficient extent to allow the accumulation of adaptive mutations that counteract host restriction factors. '}

{'ha': 'Ta wannan hanyar, tsawon lokacin fashewa da SARS-CoV-2 ya ci gaba kuma mutane da yawa suna cutar dashi, mafi girma damar cewa zai cikakken daidaita da ga mutane.', 'en': ' In this sense, the longer the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak persists and the more people that it infects, the greater chance that it will fully adapt to humans. '}

{'ha': 'Idan har ta samu gindin zama sosai, yaduwarta tsakanin mutum zuwa mutum zai zama da matukar wahala ta hanyar killacewa ko kuma sauran matakan kare bazuwar cuta.', 'en': ' If it adapts well, its transmission in humans would be difficult to stop by quarantine or other infection control measures. '}

{'ha': "Shekaru da yawa, al'umma huɗu sun samo CoVs suna kewayawa cikin yawan mutane, yana haifar da sanyin mura cikin kwararun masun garkuwa.", 'en': ' For many years, the four community-acquired CoVs circulate in human populations, triggering common cold in immunocompetent subjects. '}
{'ha': 'Wadannan kwayoyin cutar basa bukatar zama a jikin mutum ko dabba.', 'en': ' These viruses do not need an animal reservoir. '}

{'ha': 'Sabanin haka, SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV masu sanya cuta ba su daidaita da mutane ba da kyau kuma yaduwarsu a mutane ba za a iya cigaba da shi ba.', 'en': ' In contrast, highly pathogenic SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV have not adapted to humans well and their transmission within humans cannot be sustained. '}

{'ha': 'Suna da bukatar ci gaba da rayuwa a jikin dabbobin da ke dauke da su domin su sami damar shiga jikin mutane ta hanyar mutum guda ko fiye da samo ta daga dabbobin.', 'en': ' They need to maintain and propagate in their zoonotic reservoirs and seek the chance to spillover to susceptible human targets, possibly via one or more intermediate and amplifying hosts. '}

{'ha': 'Cutar SARS-CoV-2 tana da kamanni irin na cutar SARS-CoV/MERS-CoV da kuma sauran masu dauke da nau’in cutar HCoVs.', 'en': ' SARS-CoV-2 has features that are similar to both SARS-CoV/MERS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs. '}

{'ha': "Wannan abu ne da za'a iya yaduwa sosai kamar kamuwar HCOVs a cikin al'umma, aƙalla a lokacin da muke a ciki.", 'en': ' It is highly transmissible like community-acquired HCoVs, at least for the time being. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, ya fi zaman mai daukar kwayar cuta fiye da al’uma da aka sami HCoVs kuma ƙasa da mai daukar kwayar cutan fiye da SARS-CoV ko MERS-CoV.', 'en': ' However, it is more pathogenic than community-acquired HCoVs and less pathogenic than SARS-CoV or MERS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'Ya rage a gani ko zai iya dacewa da mutane sosai kuma ya kewaya cikin mutane ba tare da wurin ajiya ba ko mafaka ta tsakiya a jikin dabbobi.', 'en': ' It remains to be seen whether it will adapt fully to humans and circulate within humans without a reservoir or intermediate animal host. '}

{'ha': 'Kafin tattauna asalin dabbobin dabbobi na HCoVs, zai taimaka mana sosai mu tattauna kan ma’anoni da halayen juyin halitta, na halitta, tafki, matsakaici da haɓaka mafakar HCoVs.', 'en': ' Before discussing the animal origins of HCoVs, it will serve us well to discuss the definitions and characteristics of evolutionary, natural, reservoir, intermediate and amplifying hosts of HCoVs. '}

{'ha': 'Dabba da ta zama wata mafaka ta juyin halitta ta HCoV idan ta tanadi asalin magabata mai kusanci wadda suke babban kama ta haɗin dangantaka a matakin jerin nucleotide.', 'en': ' An animal serves as the evolutionary host of an HCoV if it harbours a closely related ancestor sharing high homology at the level of nucleotide sequence. '}
{'ha': 'Kwayar cutar ta asali galibi ana rayuwa da ita kuma bata zama illa ga inda dama take rayuwa.', 'en': ' The ancestral virus is usually well adapted and non-pathogenic in this host. '}
{'ha': 'Hakanan, mai yin tafki mai tashar jiragen ruwa HCoV yana ci gaba kuma tsawon lokaci.', 'en': ' Likewise, a reservoir host harbours HCoV continuously and for long term. '}

{'ha': "A dukkan halayen, masu rukunin suna kamuwa da cuta ta dabi'a kuma sune ainihin rukunin HCoV ko ƙwayar mahaifa.", 'en': ' In both cases, the hosts are naturally infected and are the natural hosts of HCoV or its parental virus. '}

{'ha': 'Sabanin haka, idan sabon HCoV ya gabatar da sabon matsakaici a gabanin ko a kusa da gabatarwar sa ga mutane, ba a daidaita shi da sabon mai masaukin ba kuma yawanci shine pathogenic.', 'en': ' In contrast, if the HCoV is newly introduced to an intermediate host right before or around its introduction to humans, it is not well adapted to the new host and is often pathogenic. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan da kwayar cutar ta samu gindin zama jikinsa, zai iya zama tushen da cutar da za ta shafa kuma ya taka muhimmiyar rawa wajen bai wa kwayar cutar damar ta hayayyafa inda za ta iya harbin dan adam daga nan.', 'en': ' This intermediate host can serve as the zoonotic source of human infection and play the role of an amplifying host by allowing the virus to replicate transiently and then transmitting it to humans to amplify the scale of human infection. '}

{'ha': 'HCoV na iya yin gwajin cutar mutu-karshen idan har ba zai iya ci gaba da yada ta ba a cikin matsakaiciyar mai watsa shiri.', 'en': ' An HCoV can undergo a dead-end infection if it cannot sustain its transmission within the intermediate host. '}

{'ha': 'Sai dai wani abin da zai zama wanda ya saba da hakan, cutar HCoVs kan iya rayuwa jikin wani abu na daban kuma ya iya haifar da illar gaske da za ta dauki lokaci gabanin bayyanarta.', 'en': ' On the contrary, HCoVs can also adapt to the intermediate host and even establish long-term endemicity. '}

{'ha': 'A nan kuma, wanda cutar ta kasance a jikinsa na karshe to zai zama wanda ainihin inda cutar ta samo asali tun da farko.', 'en': ' In this case, the intermediate host becomes a natural reservoir host. '}

{'ha': 'Bayanan cututtukan dabbobi sun bayyana bita da kullun cewa yanayin binciken SARS yana da tarihin hulɗa tare da dabbobin wasa.', 'en': ' Epidemiological data revealed retrospectively that the index case of SARS had a contact history with game animals. '}

{'ha': "Binciken seroprevalence mai zuwa ya nuna cewa yan kasuwar dabbobi sun sami karuwar SARS-CoV IgG idan aka kwatanta da na sauran jama'a.", 'en': ' Subsequent seroprevalence investigations indicated that animal traders had a higher prevalence of anti-SARS-CoV IgG compared with that of the general population. '}

{'ha': 'Dabbobin civet masu rufaffen tafi (Paguma larvata) da karen racoon dake cikin kasuwancin dabbobi su ne aka fara ganowa suna ɗauke da ƙwayoyin cuta masu kama da wadanda suke kusan iri ɗaya ne ga SARS-CoV.', 'en': ' Masked palm civets (Paguma larvata) and a racoon dog in live animal markets were first identified to carry SARS-CoV-like viruses that are almost identical to SARS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan ya tallafawa kai tsaye ta hanyar cewa ba a sake samun ƙarin rahoton SARS ba bayan kashe duk wasu dabbobin Sivets cikin kasuwannin.', 'en': ' This was indirectly supported by the fact that no further SARS was reported after killing all civets in the markets. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, an ba da rahoton cewa dabban itacen giginya wato civets daga cikin daji ko gonaki ba tare da fuskantar kasuwannin dabbobi masu rai ba sun kasance da cutar SARS-CoV ba, wadda ke nunar da cewa civets masu rufaffen tafi watakila kawai su zama mafakar tsakiya mai fadadawa ga SARS-CoV amma ba mafakan sa ba.', 'en': ' However, it has been reported that masked palm civets from the wild or farms without exposure to the live animal markets were largely negative for SARS-CoV, suggesting that masked palm civets might only serve as the intermediate amplifying host but not the natural reservoir of SARS-CoV. '}

{'ha': "Musamman ma, tunda kashi 80% na dabbobi daban-daban a cikin kasuwanni a Guangzhou suna da rigakafin SARS-CoV da yiwuwar cewa yawancin nau'in kananan dabbobi masu shayarwa suma zasu iya zama matsakaicin fadada rundunonin SARS-CoV ba za'a iya cire su ba.", 'en': ' Notably, since 80% of the different animals in the markets in Guangzhou have anti-SARS-CoV antibodies, the possibilities that multiple species of small mammals might also serve as intermediate amplifying hosts of SARS-CoV cannot be excluded. '}
{'ha': 'Dukkanin wadannan sun kasance inda cutar SARS-CoV take mutuwa a jikinsu.', 'en': ' All of these appear to be dead-end hosts of SARS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'Bincike mai zuwa don rundunar dabba ta SARS-CoV sun nuna wata jemage mai zaman kusa da CoV da ake kira SARS-Jemagen Rhinolophus CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-JemageCoV HKU3), wanda yake a cikin jikunan dawakai na kasar Sin.', 'en': ' Subsequent search for the natural animal host of SARS-CoV unveiled a closely related bat CoV, termed SARS-related Rhinolophus bat CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3), which exists in Chinese horseshoe bats. '}

{'ha': 'Wadannan jemagun suna dauke da kwayoyin halitta masu maganin SARS-CoV da kwayoyin tsuhen halitta masu ajin SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3.', 'en': ' These bats are positive for anti-SARS-CoV antibodies and genome sequence of SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan da sauran CoVs na jemagu suna da nasaba kashi 88-92% ta jerin kwayoyin nucleotide tare da SARS-CoV.', 'en': ' This and other bat CoVs share 88-92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'Wadannan karatuttukan sun aza harsasai ga sabuwar manufar da jemagu ke karbar bakuncin cututtukan dan adam.', 'en': ' These studies have laid the foundation for the new concept that bats host emerging human pathogens. '}

{'ha': 'Yawancin CoVs (SL-CoVs) masu kama da SARS an kuma gano su daga jemagu, amma babu wani idan ba guda kawai da aka tsara WIV1 da za a iya warewa a zaman ƙwayar cuta mai rai.', 'en': ' Several SARS-like CoVs (SL-CoVs) have also been identified from bats, but none except for one designated WIV1 can be isolated as live virus. '}
{'ha': 'Kayan mutum wanda yake canza enzyme 2 (ACE2) an san shi mai karɓar SARS-CoV.', 'en': ' Human angiotensin converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is known to be the receptor of SARS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'Kwayar WIV1 da aka samo daga kashin jemagu an yi amfani da shi ne a jemagen da kyanwa da kuma ACE2 na mutum a matsayin masu karbar kwayar halittar.', 'en': ' WIV1 derived from fecal sample of bats was demonstrated to use bat, civet and human ACE2 as receptor for cell entry. '}
{'ha': "Abin ban sha'awa, fama da cutar SARS wanda suna samun sauki sun iya wargazawar WIV1.", 'en': ' Intriguingly, sera of convalescent SARS patients were capable of neutralizing WIV1. '}

{'ha': 'Har zuwa yau, WIV1 tana wakiltar asalin magabata na SARS-CoV a cikin jemage, yana kamanni mataki na 95% nucleotide jerin homology.', 'en': ' Thus far, WIV1 represents the most closely related ancestor of SARS-CoV in bats, sharing 95% nucleotide sequence homology. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, akwai babban tsarin alaƙa tsakanin waɗannan ƙwayoyin cuta guda biyu, gabaɗaya an yi imanin cewa WIV1 ba ƙwayar cuta ce ta iyaye na nan take na SARS-CoV kuma jemagu ba shine reshe na kai tsaye na SARS-CoV ba.', 'en': ' Albeit the high homology between these two viruses, it is generally believed that WIV1 is not the immediate parental virus of SARS-CoV and bats are not the immediate reservoir host of SARS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'Binciken ƙwayar Phylogenetic ta mahaɗar MERS-CoV zuwa rukuni guda na Jemage CoV-HKU4 da baton CoV-HKU5.', 'en': ' Phylogenetic analysis clusters MERS-CoV to the same group as bat CoV-HKU4 and bat CoV-HKU5. '}

{'ha': 'CoV-HKU4 na jemage da MERS-CoV suna yin amfani da mai karɓa guda, da dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4), don shigowar ƙwayar cutar virus.', 'en': ' Bat CoV-HKU4 and MERS-CoV utilize the same host receptor, dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4), for virus entry. '}

{'ha': 'Jerin kwayoyin halittar RNA-dependent da kuma na miyau RNA suna daga cutar MERS-CoV suna kama ne da jemagun da ake gani a nahiyar Turai da kuma Afirka.', 'en': ' RNA-dependent RNA polymerase sequences of MERS-CoV are phylogenetically closer to counterparts in bat beta-CoVs identified from Europe and Africa. '}
{'ha': 'Har ya zuwa maganan nan da muke yanzu, babu wata alamar kwayar cutar MERS-CoV da take rayuwa a jikin jemagun daji.', 'en': ' Up to now, no live MERS-CoV can be found in wild bats. '}

{'ha': 'Kwayar cutar MERS-CoV da kuma wacce tafi kama da ita ta jemage mai suna CoV-HKU25 suna da nasaba ta kashi 87% a kwayoyin halittarsu masu kamanceceniya da juna.', 'en': ' MERS-CoV and its closest relative bat CoV-HKU25 share only 87% nucleotide sequence homology. '}
{'ha': 'Don haka jemagu watakila ba sune ke dauke da kwayar cutar MERS-CoV.', 'en': ' Thus, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host of MERS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'A gefe guda, bincike a Gabas ta Tsakiya ya nuna cewa raƙuman masu tozo guda suna da matsalar virus ga ƙwayoyin magance ƙwayoyin cuta na MERS-CoV, daidai da raƙuman masu asalin daga gabas ta Tsakiya wadanda ke cikin ƙasashen Afirka da yawa.', 'en': ' On the other hand, studies in Middle East have shown that dromedary camels are seropositive for MERS-CoV-specific neutralizing antibodies, same as camels of Middle East origin in multiple African countries. '}

{'ha': 'MERS-CoV mai raye daidai ne da cutar da aka samu a cikin mutane an ware ta daga kwarfatar hanci na raƙuman maso tozo guda, wanda ke cigaba da nuna cewa rakuma suna aiki a matsayin taskar mafaka ta MERS-CoV.', 'en': ' Live MERS-CoV identical to the virus found in humans was isolated from the nasal swabs of dromedary camels, further indicating that camels serve as the bona fide reservoir host of MERS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'Hakanan abin lura ne cewa yawancin alamu masu saukin kai amma an lura da zubar da kwayar cutar a cikin raƙuma na gwaji yayin kamuwa da MERS-CoV.', 'en': ' It is also noteworthy that generally mild symptoms but massive virus shedding were observed in camels experimentally infected with MERS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'Musamman, raƙuma masu kamuwa da cuta suna zubar da ƙwayoyin cuta ba kawai ta hanyar numfashi ba amma har ma ta hanyar fecal-na baka, wanda kuma shine babban hanyar cutar zubar da kwari daga jemagu.', 'en': ' Notably, infected camels shed viruses not only through respiratory route but also through fecal-oral route, which is also the main route for virus shedding from bats. '}

{'ha': "Koyaya, tambayoyi har yanzu suna kasancewa tunda masu kamuwa da MERS su da yawa sun tabbatar da cewa ba su da tarihin hulɗa da raƙuma kafin farawa samun alamar cuta, wanda ake dangantawa watsuwa tskanin mutum-zuwa-mutum ko ta hanyoyi da ba a sani ba wadanda suka shafi nau'in dabbobi da ba a gano su ba wadanda suke dauke da MERS-CoV.", 'en': ' However, questions still remain since many confirmed cases of MERS have no contact history with camels prior to symptom onset, plausibly ascribed to human-to-human transmission or unknown transmission routes involving unrecognized animal species that harbour MERS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'SARS-CoV-2 na raba kashi 96.2% na nucleotide homology tare da wata bature CoV RaTG13 da aka ware daga jemagun affinis Rhinolophus.', 'en': ' SARS-CoV-2 shares 96.2% nucleotide homology with a bat CoV RaTG13 isolated from Rhinolophus affinis bats. '}

{'ha': 'Kamar yadda ya faru da SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV, rarrabewa tsakanin SARS-CoV-2 da RaTG13 ya yi girma da yawa don sanya dangantakar iyaye.', 'en': ' As in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is too great to assign parental relationship. '}

{'ha': 'Abin nufi shine, jemagu bazai kasance mai masaukin na kai tsaye na SARS-CoV-2 ba sai dai idan an samo kusan kwatankwacin batutuwan CoVs masu zuwa nan gaba.', 'en': ' That is to say, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host(s) of SARS-CoV-2 unless almost identical bat CoVs are found in future. '}

{'ha': "Wataƙila, rundunan dabbobi masu matsakaici na SARS-CoV-2 ya kamata ya kasance cikin nau'in namun daji da aka sayar kuma an kashe shi a Kasuwar sayar da abincin teku, wanda yawancin farkon damuwar COVID-19 suke da alaƙa, alamu ne na yiwuwar watsawar cutan daga dabbobi-zuwa-mutum.", 'en': ' Presumably, the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2 should be among the wildlife species sold and killed at the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, with which many of the initial cases of COVID-19 were associated, indicative of a probable animal-to-human transmission event. '}

{'ha': 'Yawancin binciken da aka yi kwanan nan dangane da jerin hanyoyin metagenomic sun nunar da wasu ƙananan dabbobi masu shayarwa dake haɗarin bata, wadanda aka sani da pangolins (Manis javanica) suna iya kasancewa masu dauke da magabata beta-CoVs wanda ya dangantaka da SARS-CoV-2.', 'en': ' Several recent studies based on metagenomic sequencing have suggested that a group of endangered small mammals known as pangolins (Manis javanica) could also harbour ancestral beta-CoVs related to SARS-CoV-2. '}

{'ha': 'Wadannan sabbin kwayoyin genome na pangolin CoV suna hadakar kwayoyin genomes 85-92% na tsarin kwayoyin nucleotide homology tare da SARS-CoV-2.', 'en': ' These novel pangolin CoV genomes share 85-92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV-2. '}

{'ha': 'Ko yaya, suna da alaƙa da RaTG13 da kusan kasha 90 bisa dari Asali a matakin nucleotide.', 'en': ' However, they are equally closely related to RaTG13 with about 90% identity at the level of nucleotide sequence. '}

{'ha': 'Suna tattaruwa cikin sassan biyu na SARS-CoV-2-kamar ƙwayoyin cuta a cikin bishiyar phylogenetic, ɗayan wanda ya raba yanki mai ɗaukar nauyi mai rikodin mai karɓa (RBD) tare da SARS-CoV-2, tare da 97.4% shaidar asalin jerin amino asid.', 'en': ' They cluster into two sub-lineages of SARS-CoV-2-like viruses in the phylogenetic tree, one of which share a more similar receptor binding domain (RBD) with SARS-CoV-2, with 97.4% amino acid sequence identity. '}

{'ha': 'Ko yaya dai, yawan maye gurbi RBDs na SARS-CoVs-2 da RaTG13 su na daban-daban kusan sau miliyan ne fiye da wanda ke daukar su.', 'en': ' In stark contrast, the RBDs of SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 are more divergent, albeit a higher degree of sequence homology genome-wide. '}

{'ha': 'Wani binciken da ya gabata a kan pangolins masu cutuka shi ma ya ba da labarin gano alamun kwayar cutar virus daga samfuran huhu, wanda ya yi kama da masu alaƙa da SARS-CoV-2.', 'en': ' An earlier study on diseased pangolins also reported the detection of viral contigs from lung samples, which turn out to be similarly related to SARS-CoV-2. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan binciken ya karɓi hanyoyi daban-daban na haɗuwa da kundin jagora don samar da jerin abubuwan genome wanda ya ƙunshi kimanin kashi 86.3% na cikakkiyar ƙwayoyin cuta ta genome.', 'en': ' This study adopted different assembly methods and manual curation to generate a partial genome sequence comprising about 86.3% of the full-length viral genome. '}

{'ha': 'Ba za mu kawar da yiwuwar cewa dabbar pangolin din tana daga cikin dabbobin da suke dauke da kwayar cutar SARS-CoV-2.', 'en': ' We cannot exclude the possibility that pangolin is one of the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, a halin yanzu babu wata shaida a cikin goyon bayan asalin pangolin kai tsaye na SARS-CoV-2 saboda rarrabewar jerin tsakanin SARS-CoV-2 da pangolin hadedeyar-SARS-CoV-2 da beta-CoVs.', 'en': ' However, currently there is no evidence in support of a direct pangolin origin of SARS-CoV-2 due to the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs. '}

{'ha': 'Kari akan haka, nisan da ke tsakanin SARS-CoV-2 da RaTG13 ya fi guntu fiye da wancan tsakanin SARS-CoV-2 da pangolin SARS-CoV-2 masu hade da beta-CoVs.', 'en': ' In addition, the distance between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is even shorter than that between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs. '}

{'ha': 'Rikidar cutar SARS-CoV-2 a jikin jemagu da kuma dabbobin pangolin da ma sauransu ya zama wani abi da za a kafa hujja kansa.', 'en': ' The evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in bats, pangolins and other mammals remains to be established. '}

{'ha': 'Ganin cewa mafi girman jerin kwayoyin an samo cikin RBDs tsakanin SARS-CoV-2 da pangolin, SARS-CoV-2-beta-CoVs, beta-CoVs masu alaka da SARS-CoV-2 da RaTG13 suna kama mafi girma a jerin kwayoyin halittar jini.', 'en': ' Whereas the highest sequence homology has been found in the RBDs between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin, SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 share the highest genome-wide sequence homology. '}

{'ha': 'Abun hasashe ne babba cewa girman matsayin dake kamance tsakanin RBDs na pangolin SARS-CoV-2-beta-CoV-beta da SARS-CoV-2 ana haifar da shi ne ta hanyar juyin halitta wanda yake rikidewa.', 'en': ' It is highly speculative that the high degree of similarity between the RBDs of pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs and SARS-CoV-2 is driven by selectivity-mediated convergent evolution. '}

{'ha': 'Neman shawara ya dace da sake hadewa tsakanin SARS-CoV-2 da aka hada da beta-CoV da RaTG13 a cikin dabbobin daji na uku.', 'en': ' A counter-proposal is in favour of a recombination between a pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoV and RaTG13 in the third wild animal species. '}

{'ha': 'A matsayin ƙarfin tuki a cikin juyin halitta, sake haɗa abubuwa da ke yaɗuwa sosai tsakanin beta-CoVs.', 'en': ' As a driving force in evolution, recombination is widespread among beta-CoVs. '}
{'ha': 'Har yanzu masu yanke hukunci suna kan asalin SARS-CoV-2 na zoonotic.', 'en': ' The jury is still out on the immediate zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2. '}

{'ha': 'Idan ka cire batun rikidar kwayar cutar HcoVs data samo asali daga jikin dabbobi an kuma nazarci na’ukan HCoV-229E da HCoV-OC43 da HCoV-NL63 da HCoV-HKU1.', 'en': ' Besides the highly pathogenic HCoVs, the zoonotic origin of HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-HKU1 have also been studied. '}

{'ha': 'Shaidar ilimin halittun dabbobi ya nuna cewa duka HCoV-NL63 da HCoV-229E za su iya samo asali ne daga jemage CoVs, yayin da aka sami ƙwayoyin cuta na iyaye na HCoV-OC43 da HCoV-HKU1 a cikin beraye.', 'en': ' Phylogenetic evidence indicated that both HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-229E might have originated from bat CoVs, while the parental viruses of HCoV-OC43 and HCoV-HKU1 have been found in rodents. '}

{'ha': 'An ba da rahoton cewa wata CoV ta jemage da ake kira ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) wacce aka gano a jemage mai kala uku a Arewacin Amurka ta sami dangantaka mai kusanci da HCoV-NL63.', 'en': ' It has been reported that a bat CoV termed ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) detected in North American tricolored bat displayed close relationship with HCoV-NL63. '}

{'ha': 'A wata gefe guda, HCoV-229E yana da alaƙar alaƙa da wani jigon CoV, ana kiran shi Hipposideros / GhanaKwam / 19/2008, wanda aka gano a Gana, yayin da kuma ana zargin raƙumin a matsayin mai ba da taimakon sa.', 'en': ' On the other hand, HCoV-229E was genetically related to another bat CoV, termed Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008, which was detected in Ghana, while camelids have also been suspected as its intermediate host. '}

{'ha': 'Don ba da haske, ilimin zamani game da asalin dabbobi na sananniyar HCoVs an taƙaita su a cikin Hoto na 1 da Tebur 2.', 'en': ' For clarity, the current knowledge on animal origins of known HCoVs is summarized in Figure \u200b1 and Table 2. '}

{'ha': 'Nazarin Phylogenetic ya ba da hujja ga abubuwan da suka faru na watsa abubuwan HCoV a cikin tarihin.', 'en': ' Phylogenetic analysis has provided evidence for interspecies transmission events of HCoVs in the history. '}

{'ha': 'Lokacin da HCoV-OC43 ya haɗu da jinsin don cutar da mutane daga dabbobin gida a shekarar 1890, an yi rikodin annoba ta numfashi.', 'en': ' When HCoV-OC43 crossed species to infect humans from domestic livestock around 1890, a pandemic of respiratory infection was recorded. '}
{'ha': 'Tarihin yaduwar cutar HCoV-229E ba wani karin haske sosai a kansa.', 'en': ' The interspecies transmission history of HCoV-229E is less clear. '}
{'ha': 'An gano kwayar cutar daga jemage CoVs wacce ta yi kama sosai da cutar HCoV-229E.', 'en': ' Bat alpha-CoVs closely related to HCoV-229E have been found. '}
{'ha': "Tsakanin su akwai alpha mai suna 'alpaca-CoV.", 'en': ' Between them there is an alpaca alpha-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'Akwai hujjoji da dama da suke nuna cewa cutar ta yadu ne daga jemagu kai tsaye zuwa jikin dan adam.', 'en': ' Several lines of evidence support the transmission of virus from bats to humans directly. '}

{'ha': 'Da farko, mutane amma ba almasas ba zasu iya hulɗa da jemagu a cikin raba kimiyyar muhalli.', 'en': ' First, humans but not alpacas might have contact with bats in a shared ecological niche. '}
{'ha': 'Maimakon haka, mutane suna kusanci da alpacas.', 'en': ' Instead, humans have close contact with alpacas. '}

{'ha': 'Na biyu, HCoV-229E mai hade da batutuwan al-CoVs suna da bambanci kuma marasa tsari a cikin jemagu, alhali kuwa Alpha-CoV ya haifar da barkewar cutar ta hanu a cikin dabbobi masu kamuwa.', 'en': ' Second, HCoV-229E-related bat alpha-CoVs are diverse and non-pathogenic in bats, whereas alpaca alpha-CoV caused an outbreak of respiratory disease in infected animals. '}
{'ha': 'A ƙarshe, ba a sami alpaca alpha-CoV ba a cikin dabbobin feral.', 'en': ' Finally, alpaca alpha-CoV has not been found in feral animals. '}

{'ha': 'Don haka, baza a kawar da tunanin yiyuwar cutar HCoV-229E ta samo asali ne daga kwayoyin halittar CoV daga dan jikin dan adam.', 'en': ' Thus, the possibility cannot be excluded that alpacas obtain the HCoV-229E-related alpha-CoV from humans. '}

{'ha': 'Hakika, jemagu sune tushen kai tsaye na ƙwayoyin cuta na mutum wanda ya haɗa da kwayar cutar rabies, ƙwayar cutar Ebola, ƙwayar cutar Nipah da ƙwayar cutar Hendra.', 'en': ' In fact, bats are the direct source of human pathogenic viruses including rabies virus, Ebola virus, Nipah virus and Hendra virus. '}
{'ha': 'Don haka ba abin mamaki bane cewa jemagu na iya yada HCoV-229E ga mutane kai tsaye.', 'en': ' It is therefore not too surprising that bats might transmit HCoV-229E to humans directly. '}

{'ha': 'A wata hanya, yayin da alpha-CoVs suna aiki ne a matsayin hanyar samar da hanyar HCoV-229E, alpacas da raƙuman ruwa na iya zama matsakaiciyar runduna waɗanda ke aika ƙwayoyin cuta ga mutane, daidai kamar yadda yake a cikin yanayin MERS-CoV.', 'en': ' Alternatively, whereas bat alpha-CoVs serve as the gene pool of HCoV-229E, alpacas and dromedary camels might serve as intermediate hosts that transmit viruses to humans, exactly as in the case of MERS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'MERS-CoV ya zama wani kyakkyawan misali game da watsa sadarwa daga jemage zuwa raƙuman dabbobi da kuma raƙumi zuwa ga mutane.', 'en': ' MERS-CoV serves as an excellent example of interspecies transmission from bats to dromedary camels and from dromedary camels to humans. '}

{'ha': 'Asalin juyin halitta na MERS-CoV daga jemagu an san shi a farkon ganowarsa kuma ya sami ƙarfafuwa sakamakon binciken da ya biyo baya.', 'en': ' The evolutionary origin of MERS-CoV from bats is known at its initial identification and has also been strengthened by subsequent findings. '}

{'ha': 'A fili take cewa jemagu sune matattarar da ke dauke da cututtukan da za su iya yada su daga dabbobi zuwa mutane.', 'en': ' It is obvious that bats provide a rich pool of virus species for interspecies exchange of genetic fragments and interspecies transmission. '}

{'ha': "Dogon lokaci, dauloli masu cike da tarin yawa, kusanci da zamantakewa da kuma karfin ƙarfi don tashi duka yanayi ne da ya dace da jemage don zama kyakkyawan 'mai yada kwayoyin cutar.", 'en': " Longevity, densely packed colonies, close social interaction and strong ability to fly are all favourable conditions for bats to be an ideal 'virus spreader'. "}
{'ha': 'A wata gefe guda, MERS-CoV an gabatar dashi ga raƙuman dromedary shekaru da yawa.', 'en': ' On the other hand, MERS-CoV has been introduced to dromedary camels for decades. '}

{'ha': "Ya dace da waɗannan raƙuma waɗanda suka juya daga matsakaici mai ban sha'awa zuwa barikin mai tsaro da na ɗabi'a na dabi'a.", 'en': ' It is well adapted to these camels that have turned from an intermediate host to a stable and natural reservoir host. '}

{'ha': 'MERS-CoV yana haifar da ciwo mai laushi kuma yana riƙe da ƙarancin maye gurbi a cikin waɗannan dabbobi.', 'en': ' MERS-CoV causes very mild disease and maintains a relatively low mutation rate in these animals. '}

{'ha': 'Bazuwarta zuwa mutane ya faru haka kwatsam kmua mutane sune inda cutar MERS-CoV ba za ta iya sake fita ba sakamakon yadda bai iya fita daga nan.', 'en': ' Its sporadic transmission to humans is an accident and humans remain a dead-end host of MERS-CoV as its transmission cannot be sustained. '}

{'ha': 'Ya bambanta da rawar raƙuma a cikin watsa MERS-CoV, rawar pangolins, idan akwai wani, a cikin watsawar SARS-CoV-2 ya bambanta.', 'en': ' In contrast to the role of camels in the transmission of MERS-CoV, the role of pangolins, if there is any, in the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 is different. '}
{'ha': 'Musamman ma kwayoyin cutar jemagen pangolin beta-CoVs wanda sun fi rayuwa a jikin jemagun pangolins.', 'en': ' Particularly, pangolin beta-CoVs are highly pathogenic in pangolins. '}

{'ha': 'Zasu iya zama mafakar karshe ga SARS-CoV-2-beta-CoVs masu dangantaka, da kama da dabbobin civets a yanayin SARS-CoV.', 'en': ' They might be a dead-end host for SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, similar to civets in the case of SARS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'Yawancin yuwuwar watsuwa tsakanin jinsuna na SARS-CoV-2 daga dabbobi zuwa mutane dole ne a yi watsi da su ko a amince da su a nazari gaba.', 'en': ' Several possibilities for interspecies transmission of SARS-CoV-2 from animals to humans have to be ruled in or ruled out in future studies. '}

{'ha': 'Na farko, jemagu za su iya zama babban reshin raunin da ke da alaƙa da ƙwayar SARS-CoV-2 kusan iri ɗaya ce ga SARS-CoV-2.', 'en': ' First, bats could be the reservoir host of a SARS-CoV-2-related virus almost identical to SARS-CoV-2. '}
{'ha': 'Yan-Adam na iya hadakar muhalli tare da jemagu ta hanyar yankan nama ko kuma hakar kwal.', 'en': ' Humans might share the ecological niche with bats through butchering or coal mining. '}

{'ha': 'Na biyu, pangolins na iya zama ɗayan tsaka-tsakin fadadawa wanda aka gabatar da sabon ƙwayar cuta ta SARS-CoV-2.', 'en': ' Second, pangolins could be one of intermediate amplifying host to which a SARS-CoV-2-related virus had been newly introduced. '}
{'ha': 'Yan-Adam suna kamuwa da kwayar cutar ta fannin yanka da cin naman dabba.', 'en': ' Humans contract the virus through butchering and consumption of game meat. '}

{'ha': 'Yana yiwuwa yawancin dabbobi masu shayarwa ciki har da dabbobin gida suna da saukin kamuwa da SARS-CoV-2.', 'en': ' It is possible that many mammals including domestic animals are susceptible to SARS-CoV-2. '}

{'ha': 'Lallai ne akwai bukatar gudanar da wani bincike kan dabbobin cikin gida da kuma na dawa/daji domin kariya ga jiki.', 'en': ' A survey of domestic and wild animals for antibodies is warranted. '}

{'ha': 'Na uku, kamar yadda aka ambata a sama, sake sakewa da daidaitawa da SARS-CoV-2 na iya faruwa a cikin jinsin na uku wanda ke da alaƙa tare da jemage da kuma pangolins.', 'en': ' Third, as mentioned above, recombination and adaptation of SARS-CoV-2 might have occurred in a third species that has contact with both bats and pangolins. '}
{'ha': 'Binciken asalin SARS-CoV-2 daga dabba har yanzu ana kan yi.', 'en': ' The search for the animal origins of SARS-CoV-2 is still on. '}

{'ha': 'Baya ga mabanbanta dabbobin da ke daukar cutar, akwai wasu ababuwa uku muhimmai game da cutar wajen tsallakawa da halittun CoVs daga masu hana su fita.', 'en': ' Apart from different types of the animal hosts, three major factors on the viral side are also important in facilitating CoVs to cross species barriers. '}
{'ha': 'Da farko dai, yawan adadin su na maye gurbi a cikin rabawar RNA.', 'en': ' First of all, their relatively high mutation rates in RNA replication. '}

{'ha': "Idan aka kwatanta da sauran ƙwayoyin RNA guda ɗaya, masu ƙididdigar adadin maye gurbi na CoVs za'a iya ɗauka su azaman “Matsakaici” zuwa “babba” tare da matsakaicin sauyawa mai aiki wanda ya zama ~ 10-4 sauyawa a kowace shekara ta rukunin yanar gizon 2, gwargwadon tsarin karbuwa na CoV zuwa runduna mai labari.", 'en': ' In comparison to other single-stranded RNA viruses, the estimated mutation rates of CoVs could be regarded as “moderate” to “high” with an average substitution rate being ~10-4 substitution per year per site 2, depending on the phase of CoV adaptation to novel hosts. '}

{'ha': 'CoVs suna da hujjar sake-karantar exoribonuclease, sharewa wanda yake haifar da babban rikitarwa sosai da rashiwa ko mara dorewa.', 'en': ' CoVs have a proof-reading exoribonuclease, deletion of which results in exceedingly high mutability and attenuation or even inviability. '}

{'ha': 'Sai dai abin sha’awa a nan, asalin halittar cutar wanda galibi yake takura kwayar CoV ta hanyar haduwa da miyau ta sinadaran RNA.', 'en': ' Interestingly, the nucleotide analogue Remdesivir is known to suppress CoV replication through inhibition of this exoribonuclease and the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase. '}

{'ha': 'Remdesivir yana daya daga cikin masu ba da rigakafin maganin SARS-CoV-2 da za a gwada su a gwajin asibiti.', 'en': ' Remdesivir is one of most promising anti-SARS-CoV-2 agents to be tested in clinical trials. '}

{'ha': 'Ko yaya dai, yawan maye gurbi na CoVs ya ninka sau miliyan sama da na ƙungiyar sojojinsu.', 'en': ' Nevertheless, mutation rates of CoVs are about a million times higher than those of their hosts. '}

{'ha': 'Bugu da kari, yawan maye gurbi yakan zama mafi girma yayin da CoVs ba su dace da mai zama da su ba.', 'en': ' In addition, mutation rate is often high when CoVs are not well adapted to the host. '}

{'ha': 'Idan aka kwatanta da SARS-CoV da babban maye gurbi, adadin maye gurbi na SARS-CoV-2 na kasa sosai, bayar da shawarar mafi girman matakin karbuwa ga mutane.', 'en': ' Compared to SARS-CoV with a high mutation rate, the mutation rate of SARS-CoV-2 is apparently lower, suggestive of a higher level of adaptation to humans. '}
{'ha': 'Wataƙila, an riga an saba da shi ga wata mai zama da cutar da ke kusa da mutane.', 'en': ' Presumably, it has already been adapted to another host close to humans. '}

{'ha': 'Baya ga SARS-CoV-2, wannan kuma ya shafi MERS-CoV, wanda ya dace da raƙuma masu tozo guda.', 'en': ' In addition to SARS-CoV-2, this also applies to MERS-CoV, which is well adapted to dromedary camels. '}

{'ha': 'A ka’idodi, ba lallai bane cewa tsaran kwayoyin halitta zai iya samar da alluran rigakafi da rigakafi akan SARS-CoV-2 marasa tasiri da sauri.', 'en': ' Theoretically, it is unlikely that genetic drift would render vaccines and antivirals against SARS-CoV-2 ineffective quickly. '}

{'ha': 'Na biyu kuma, babbar kwayar halittar RNA a jikin cutar CoVs ya nuna asalin sauyawa da rikida da tushen kwayoyin halitta suke yi, wanda hakan ke kara haifar da bazuwarsu tsakanin halittu wanda ya taimaka wajen bullar cututtukan CoVs masu shuhura a lokacin da suka samu dacewar yanayin da suke so.', 'en': ' Second, the large RNA genome in CoVs exerts extra plasticity in genome modification for mutations and recombination, thereby increasing the probability for interspecies co-evolution, which is advantageous for the emergence of novel CoVs when the conditions become appropriate. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan yana da goyan bayan yalwar budaddun faifan karatu na musamman da amfanin furotin mai lamba ta wurin ƙarshen 3′ na genome.', 'en': ' This is supported by the copious unique open reading frames and protein functions encoded towards the 3′ end of the genome. '}

{'ha': 'Na uku, Covs na iya canza jiki barkatai da akai-akai lokacin rabuwar RNA ta hanyar “kwafin-zabi” na musamman.', 'en': ' Third, CoVs randomly and frequently switch templates during RNA replication through a unique “copy-choice” mechanism. '}

{'ha': 'A cikin mafakar da take zama wurin gaurayuwa, canzawar sassa yana faruwa akai-akai a lokacin kwafar CoV RNA.', 'en': ' In a host that serves as the mixing vessel, strand switching occurs frequently during CoV RNA transcription. '}

{'ha': 'Cigaba da cikakken-tsawon da bangarn genomic na RNAs mai sake haduwa don samar da sabbin abubuwan CoV.', 'en': ' Highly homologous full-length and subgenomic RNAs could recombine to generate new CoVs. '}

{'ha': 'An samu shaidar asalin halitta daga yadda aka halicce take a jikin duka HCoV-HKU1 da kuma HCoV-OC43, har ma da jikin dabbobi CoVs kamar su jemagu SL-CoV da batCoV-HKU9.', 'en': ' Phylogenetic evidence of natural recombination has been found in both HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-OC43, as well as animal CoVs such as bat SL-CoV and batCoV-HKU9. '}
{'ha': 'Mu’amalar kwayar cuta daga inda take zama da kuma na yadda take bazuwa.', 'en': ' Virus-host interaction in relation to transmission '}

{'ha': 'Baya ga abubuwa guda uku da aka ambata a sama game da kwayar cutar, hulɗar kwayar cuta tare da mafaka mai karba wani abu ne dake tasiri akan watsuwa tsakanin jinsunar kwayar halittar.', 'en': ' Besides three viral factors stated above, viral interaction with host receptor is another key factor influential on interspecies transmission. '}

{'ha': "Anan, an sake haɗawa da SARS-CoV a zaman misali na yau da kullum, wanda kuma ya nuna tabbataccen zaɓi na ɗabi'a yayin watsuwa tsakanin jinsuna.", 'en': ' Herein, recombination of SARS-CoV is taken as a typical example, which also showed evidence of positive selection during interspecies transmission events. '}

{'ha': "Ta la'akari da gwajin kwatanci tsakanin keɓaɓɓun abu na SARS-CoVs din ɗan-adam da civet, Ana tunanin SARS-CoV zai iya yin saurin daidaituwa cikin mafaka daban-daban, musamman tare da maye gurbi a cikin furotin RBD na S.", 'en': ' Based on the comparative analysis between isolates of human and civet SARS-CoVs, SARS-CoV is thought to undergo rapid adaptation in different hosts, particularly with mutations at the RBD of the S protein. '}

{'ha': 'Gabaɗaya, RBD a cikin furotin na S na CoV yana hulɗa tare da tantanin halita mai karban sako da mai martini abin kare jiki.', 'en': ' Generally, the RBD in the S protein of a CoV interacts with the cellular receptor and is intensely selected by the host antibody response. '}

{'ha': 'A cikin SARS-CoV, RBD yana cikin 318th zuwa 510 na amino acid din akan gungun S1, wanda ya daure wa dan Adam ACE2 kazalika hade da mai karban don shigar kwayar cuta.', 'en': ' In SARS-CoV, the RBD is in the 318th to 510th amino acids on the S1 fragment, which binds to the human ACE2 as well as its coreceptors for viral entry. '}

{'ha': 'RBD na SARS-CoV yana da ikon sanin masu karɓar ACE2 na dabbobi daban-daban, gami da jemage, civet, bera da karen raccoon, wadda ke ba da izinin watsuwa tsakanin jinsuna kwayar cutar.', 'en': ' The RBD of SARS-CoV is capable of recognizing the ACE2 receptors of various animals, including bat, civet, mouse and raccoon dog, allowing interspecies transmission of the virus. '}

{'ha': 'A zahiri, amino acid guda 6 ne kawai da aka lura ya bambanta da na mutum kuma ƙwayar civet viral ta ware a cikin RBD kuma 4 daga cikinsu suna cikin motsi mai ɗaukar abubuwa don hulɗa da mai karɓar ACE2.', 'en': ' In fact, only 6 amino acid residues were observed to be different from human and civet viral isolates in the RBD and 4 of them locate in the receptor-binding motif for interaction with the ACE2 receptor. '}

{'ha': "SARS-CoV na dabba Sivet yana da rikice-rikicen K479N da S487T a cikin RBD, wanda zai iya ƙara kusancin hulɗa da ma'adinin furotin tare da mai karɓar ACE2 na mutum.", 'en': ' Civet SARS-CoV has K479N and S487T mutations in its RBD, which might increase the affinity of the interaction of spike protein with human ACE2 receptor. '}

{'ha': 'A takaice dai, wadannan maye gurbi na amino acid na iya zama mai matukar mahimmanci ga karbar kwayar cuta a jikin mutum.', 'en': ' In other words, these two amino acid substitutions might be critical to viral adaption to humans. '}

{'ha': 'Abin lura ne cewa SARS-CoV-2 yana raba tantanin halita mai karban sako (cellular receptor) iri daya da SARS-CoV.', 'en': ' It is noteworthy that SARS-CoV-2 shares the same cellular receptor with SARS-CoV. '}

{'ha': 'Bambanci kashi 30% tsakanin SARS-CoV-2 da SARS-CoV a cikin sashin S1 na furotin S yana nuna cewa ƙarshen dangantakar S furotin da dan adam ACE2 zai iya canzawa.', 'en': ' A 30% difference between SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV in the S1 unit of the S protein implicates that the binding affinity of its S protein with human ACE2 might have altered. '}

{'ha': 'Tabbas, binciken cryo-EM yana nuna dangantakar mafi girma ta 10 zuwa 20 daga wannan abin da aka ɗauka sama da wanda ke tsakanin ɗan adam na ACE2 da furotin na SARS-CoV S.', 'en': ' Indeed, a cryo-EM study indicates a 10- to 20-fold higher affinity of this binding than that between human ACE2 and SARS-CoV S protein. '}

{'ha': "Hakanan zai kasance mai ban sha'awa don sanin ko za a buƙaci kowane sauran abokin karba don watsuwar SARS-CoV-2.", 'en': ' It will also be of interest to determine whether any other coreceptor might be required for SARS-CoV-2 transmission. '}
{'ha': "Mai ban sha'awa, HCoV-NL63 kuma yana ɗaure wa ACE2 amma tare da wani sashi na S.", 'en': ' Intriguingly, HCoV-NL63 also binds to ACE2 but with a different part of S. '}

{'ha': 'Akwai sauran masu karɓar HCoV, kamar aminopeptidase N don HCoV-229E, da acid 9-O-acetylated sialic acid don HCoV-OC43.', 'en': ' There exist many other HCoV receptors, such as aminopeptidase N for HCoV-229E, and 9-O-acetylated sialic acid for HCoV-OC43. '}

{'ha': "Zasu iya dauka nauyin samun nasarar daidaita wadatar waɗannan CoVs a cikin mutane bayan watsa nau'in halittu daga wurin dakaru dabbobin su.", 'en': ' They might also account for successful adaptation of these CoVs in humans after interspecies transmission from their animal hosts. '}

{'ha': 'Baya ga tantanin halita mai karban sako, sakamakon watsuwar HCoVs ta tsakanin jinsuna shi ma ana sarrafa shi ta hanyar sauran abubuwan dogaro na mafaka da abubuwan ƙuntatawa.', 'en': ' In addition to cellular receptors, the outcome of interspecies transmission of HCoVs is also governed by other host dependency and restriction factors. '}

{'ha': "Rarraba waɗannan sunadaran masu kariya tsakanin ɗan adam da rarar halitta na rukunin HCoVs kamar jemagu, raƙumi da bera na iya zama cikas ga watsawar ma'amala.", 'en': ' The divergence of these host proteins between humans and natural reservoir hosts of HCoVs such as bats, dromedary camels and rodents might constitute a barrier to interspecies transmission. '}

{'ha': 'HCoVs dole su rinjayi dogaro kan mafaka sannan su fi karfin ƙuntatawar mafakarsu don nasarar watsuwa tsakanin jinsina daban-daban.', 'en': ' HCoVs have to usurp host dependency factors and subvert host restriction factors for a successful interspecies transmission. '}

{'ha': 'Dangane da wannan, masu fayyace kwayoyin halitta a wannan muhimmin fannin na hulɗar kwayar cuta da mafakarta sun kasance har yanzu ana gano su kuma za a iya sanin su.', 'en': ' In this regard, molecular determinants in this important area of virus-host interaction remain to be identified and characterized. '}

{'ha': 'Binciken yanayin rashin daidaituwa game da dogaro na mafaka da abubuwan ƙuntatawa don SARS-CoV-2 ta amfani da fasahar zamani ta CRISPR na iya zama mai amfani.', 'en': ' An unbiased genome-wide screening of host dependency and restriction factors for SARS-CoV-2 using the state-of-the-art technology of CRISPR might be fruitful. '}
{'ha': 'Fitowar HCoVs: Koma baya ga sifili', 'en': ' Emergence of novel HCoVs: back to ground zero '}
{'ha': 'Bambancin CoVs na jemage yana bayar da isasshe dama ga fitowar sabon HCoVs da ke daban.', 'en': ' The diversity of bat CoVs provides ample opportunities for the emergence of novel HCoVs. '}
{'ha': 'Bisa wannan hujjar, cututtukan jemage na CoVs sune tushen cututtukan HCoVs.', 'en': ' In this sense, bat CoVs serve as the gene pool of HCoVs. '}

{'ha': 'Bugu da kari, saurin maye gurbi da sake halittar gado shima yana fitar da cigaban HCoV kuma yana zama matakai biyu masu mahimmanci a wannan aikin.', 'en': ' In addition, rapid mutation and genetic recombination also drive HCoV evolution and serve as two important steps in this process. '}

{'ha': 'Alal misali, siyarwa ko asarar kwayoyin halittar furotin dana duniya suna da damar canza kwayar cutar kwayar halitta ta wata hanya.', 'en': ' For example, the acquisition or loss of novel protein-coding genes has the potential to drastically modify viral phenotypes. '}

{'ha': 'Daga cikin furotin na kariya na SARS-CoV, ORF8 ana tsammanin yana da mahimmanci a cikin dacewa da mutane, kamar yadda SARS-CoV masu hade da ƙwayoyin cuta jemage wanda aka keɓancewa amma an sami sinadarai masu bambam da furotin na ORF8.', 'en': ' Among SARS-CoV accessory proteins, ORF8 has been thought to be important in adaptation to humans, as SARS-CoV-related bat viruses were isolated but found to encode divergent ORF8 proteins. '}

{'ha': 'An gano rugujewar kwayar halittar 29 daga yanayin SARS-CoVs a jini a farkon lokacin da aka fara gano annobar a jikin dan adam.', 'en': ' A 29-nucleotide deletion characteristic of SARS-CoVs has been found in strains isolated at the beginning of the human epidemic. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan sharewa ta shiga ORF8 zuwa ORF8a da ORF8b kuma ana zaton shine maye gurbi wanda yake inganta canjin mafaka.', 'en': ' This deletion splits ORF8 into ORF8a and ORF8b and is thought to be an adaptive mutation that promotes the switch of hosts. '}

{'ha': 'Bayan haka, SARS-CoV yana da yiwuwar sake duba tarihin tare da layin alpha- da gamma-CoVs, inda aka gano yawancin adadin yankuna masu rarrafe a cikin polymrase ɗin RNA da suke dogara da RNA.', 'en': ' Besides, SARS-CoV has a possible recombination history with lineages of alpha- and gamma-CoVs, where a large number of smaller recombinant regions were identified in the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase. '}

{'ha': 'An kuma gano wuraren sake canzawa a cikin nsp9, mafi yawan nsp10, da kuma sassan nsp14.', 'en': ' Recombination locations were also identified in the nsp9, most of nsp10, and parts of nsp14. '}

{'ha': 'Hakanan, an nuna cewa annobar MERS-CoV ta sami abubuwan sake haduwa tsakanin layuka daban-daban, wanda ya faru a cikin raƙuman masu tozo guda a Saudiya.', 'en': ' Likewise, it has been shown that the epidemic MERS-CoV experienced recombination events between different lineages, which occurred in dromedary camels in Saudi Arabia. '}

{'ha': 'Gefen wannan SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV, an kuma lura da abubuwan sake maye a cikin wasu HCoVs, wanda HCoVs suka sake haɗuwa da wasu CoVs na dabba a cikin abubuwan halittar da basu da tsari.', 'en': ' Besides SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, recombination events have also been observed in other HCoVs, in which the HCoVs recombine with other animal CoVs in their non-structural genes. '}

{'ha': 'Hakanan ya kamata a yi gargaɗin cewa zaɓin ɗan adam zai iya ba da gudummawa ga canje-canjen da ba a yi tsammani ba a kwayoyin halittar, wataƙila ana haifar da sauƙaƙe ƙwayoyin cuta daga matsanancin zaɓi, kamar su tsarin garkuwar jiki.', 'en': ' It should also be cautioned that artificial selection can contribute to unintended changes in viral genomes, most likely resulting from relieving viruses from selection pressures exerted, such as by the host immune system. '}

{'ha': 'Misalin waɗannan tasirin shine asarar cikakken tsawon ORF4 a cikin ƙwayar samfurin HCoV-229E, sakamakon shafewar nucleotide guda biyu.', 'en': ' An example of these effects is the loss of a full-length ORF4 in the HCoV-229E prototype strain, owing to a two-nucleotide deletion. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da yake ana iya lura da ingantaccen ORF4 a cikin ƙwayoyin cutar jemage da raƙumi waɗanda ke da alaƙa da HCoV-229E, alpha-CoV ta rakumin alpaca yana nuna guda ɗaya na nucleotide, wanda ya haifar da sauyin frameshift.', 'en': ' While intact ORF4 could be observed in bat and camel viruses related to HCoV-229E, the alpaca alpha-CoV displays a single nucleotide insertion, resulting in a frameshift. '}

{'ha': 'Daga ƙarshe amma ba ƙarami ba, juyin halittar sabbin HCoVs yana kuma faruwa ne ta hanyar matsi na zabin a cikin mafakar taskokinsu.', 'en': ' Last but not least, the evolution of novel HCoVs is also driven by the selection pressure in their reservoir hosts. '}

{'ha': 'Mai nuna ya kamu da cuta ko kawai bayyanar cututtuka ne aka gano yayin da Jemagu sun kamu da cuta na CoVs, yana nuna daidaitawar juna tsakanin CoVs da jemagu.', 'en': ' Asymptomatic or only mild symptoms were detected when bats were infected with CoVs, indicating the mutual adaptation between CoVs and bats. '}

{'ha': 'Ta bayyana cewa jemagu sune matattarar kwayoyin halittar CoVs lura da yanayin jikinsu da kuma yadda gabobin jikin nasu ke aiki.', 'en': ' It appeared that bats are well adapted to CoVs anatomically and physiologically. '}

{'ha': 'Alal misali, lahani a cikin faifan martani na maganin kumburi-kumburi a cikin jemagu yadda yakamata ya rage cutarwar da CoVs tayi.', 'en': ' For example, defects in the activation of pro-inflammatory response in bats efficiently reduce the pathology triggered by CoVs. '}

{'ha': 'Bayan haka, ayyukan kwayar halittar kisa a cikin jemagu tana lalacewa sakamakon hauhawar mai hana karbar kwayar halittar kisa NKG2/CD94 da ƙarancin matakin bayyana manyan kwayoyin halittun aji I hadaddu masu dacen jini.', 'en': ' Besides, the natural killer cell activity in bats is suppressed due to upregulation of inhibitory natural killer cell receptor NKG2/CD94 and low expression level of major histocompatibility complex class I molecules. '}

{'ha': "Haka kuma, babban nau'in nau'in oxygen mai aiki (ROS) wanda aka samo asali daga ayyukan kwayoyi na jemagu na iya murkushe kwafin kwayar CoV kuma yana shafar karantawa ta hanyar karba-karba, ta haka ne samar da matsin zabi na tsararrakin kwayar cuta mai matukar birgeshi yayin gabatar da shi cikin sabon mai watsa shiri.", 'en': ' Moreover, the high level of reactive oxygen species (ROS) generated from high metabolic activity of bats could both suppress CoV replication and affects proofreading by exoribonuclease, thus providing the selection pressure for the generation of virus strains highly pathogenic when introduced into a new host. '}

{'ha': 'Haka kuma cututtukan CoV na pathogenic CoV na iya canzawa ta hanyar sake halittar, wanda ke haifar da sifofin furotin ko littafin fasalin furotin don karbuwa.', 'en': ' More pathogenic CoV strains might also evolve by recombination, leading to the acquisition of novel proteins or protein features for host adaptation. '}

{'ha': 'Don haka, babu wat hanya ba ne cewa uku na HCoVs sun fito a cikin shekaru ashirin da suka gabata.', 'en': ' Thus, it is not by chance that three novel HCoVs have emerged in the past two decades. '}

{'ha': 'CoVs ba cuta ba ne ko haifar karamin alamu cuta a cikin ɗakunan masu kamu da su kamar gemage da raƙuma.', 'en': ' CoVs are non-pathogenic or cause mild symptoms in their reservoir hosts such as bats and camels. '}
{'ha': 'Suna iya rarrabawa sosai ba tare nuna garkuwar jiki daga mai zama da ciwon ba.', 'en': ' They replicate robustly without eliciting a strong host immune response. '}

{'ha': 'Anan ne aka samu sirrin me ya sa marasa nuna alamar kamuwa ake ganinsu da kuma abun da yake haifar da mummunan lamura a kamuwa da cutar a mutum.', 'en': ' Herein lie the secrets of why asymptomatic carriers are seen and what causes the severe cases in human infection. '}

{'ha': 'Radadin alamun cutar suna faruwa ne sakamakon yadda kwayoyin halittar jikin mutum masu yaki da cuta suke kokarin yakar cutar wanda idan aka samu karfin nasu sosai hakan zai kuma yi illar gaske ga huhun mutum.', 'en': ' The severe symptoms are mainly due to the hyperactivation of immune response and the cytokine storm wherein the stronger the immune response, the more severe the lung damage. '}

{'ha': 'Sabanin haka, a cikin marasa nuna alamar kamuwa da cutar, amsa rigakafi ya kasance kasa ga yaduwar Cov.', 'en': ' In contrast, in asymptomatic carriers, the immune response has been de-coupled from CoV replication. '}

{'ha': 'Dabarun iri daya ta raba cudanya da amsawar rigakafin iya samun sakamako masu amfani a cikin maganin anti-SARS-CoV-2.', 'en': ' The same strategy of delinking the immune response might have beneficial effects in anti-SARS-CoV-2 therapy. '}
{'ha': 'Amsar interferon tana da ƙarfi musamman a cikin jemagu.', 'en': ' The interferon response is particularly strong in bats. '}

{'ha': "Don haka, gudanar da nau'in I interferon aƙalla a farkon kamuwa da cutar SARS-CoV-2 a cikin ɗan adam ya kamata ya zama da amfani.", 'en': ' Thus, administration of type I interferon at least in the early phase of SARS-CoV-2 infection in humans should be beneficial. '}
{'ha': 'Bugu da Kari, kunnawar NLRP3 cikin jemagu na da illa.', 'en': ' In addition, NLRP3 inflammasome activation in bats is defective. '}

{'ha': 'Lura da wannan dalilin, rayuwar kwayar halittar NLRP3 da kumburinsa da MCC950 zai yi tasiri wajen warkar cutar COVID-19.', 'en': ' By this reasoning, inhibition of NLRP3 inflammasome with MCC950 might be useful in the treatment of COVID-19. '}
{'ha': 'Samuwar SARS-CoV-2 ya biyo bayan jigo ne wanda SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV suka tashi.', 'en': ' The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 follows the general theme by which SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV arose. '}

{'ha': 'Ganin cewa wata beta-CoV raba 95% nucleotide homology tare da SARS-CoV, Hakanan akwai wanzuwar batirin-CoV wanda ke hade da kashi 96% na nucleotide homology tare da SARS-CoV-2.', 'en': ' Whereas a bat beta-CoV sharing 95% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV has been found, there also exists a bat-CoV sharing 96% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV-2. '}

{'ha': 'Ganin cewa dabbar sivets da sauran dabbobi a cikin kasuwanni an same su dauke da ƙwayoyin cuta masu kama da SARS-CoV, ba a gano mafakar SARS-CoV-2 ta nan-kusa ba.', 'en': ' Whereas civets and other animals in the markets have been found to harbour viruses identical to SARS-CoV, immediate intermediate hosts for SARS-CoV-2 have not been identified. '}

{'ha': 'Pangolin beta-CoVs mai matukar alaƙar daidaituwa ga SARS-CoV-2 an samo, yana nuna cewa pangolins na iya zama ɗaya daga cikin tsaka-tsakin runduna ko pangolin beta-CoVs na iya ba da gudummawar gutsuttsuran jabu ga fasalin ƙarshe na SARS-CoV-2.', 'en': ' Pangolin beta-CoVs strikingly homologous to SARS-CoV-2 have been found, indicating that pangolins might serve as one of intermediate hosts or pangolin beta-CoVs could contribute gene fragments to the final version of SARS-CoV-2. '}

{'ha': 'Kodayake tambayoyin suna wanzuwa, babu wata shaida da ke nuna cewa SARS-CoV-2 an yi mutum ne da gangan ko hadari.', 'en': ' Although questions remain, there is no evidence that SARS-CoV-2 is man-made either deliberately or accidentally. '}
{'ha': 'CoVs sun dawo zuwa haskakawa sakamakon barkewar kwanan nan na SARS-CoV-2.', 'en': ' CoVs have returned to the limelight due to the recent outbreak of SARS-CoV-2. '}

{'ha': 'Nazarin cututtukan CoVs a jikin jemagu da sauran dabbobi ya sauya tunaninmu game da muhimmancin tushen cutar HcoVs ta samo asali ne daga jikin dabbobi wajen baza ta zuwa ga mutane.', 'en': ' The study of CoVs in bats and other animals has drastically changed our perception of the importance of zoonotic origins and animal reservoirs of HCoVs in human transmission. '}

{'ha': 'Shaida da yawa ta nuna cewa SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV da SARS-CoV-2 suna da asalin batir kuma ana tura su ga mutane ta hanyar runduna ta tsakiya.', 'en': ' Pervasive evidence has shown that SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 have a bat origin and are transmitted to humans via intermediate hosts. '}

{'ha': 'Ganin cewa cutar SARS-CoV ta samo asali ne daga saduwa tsakanin mutane dabbar civets a cikin kasuwanni, rufe kasuwannin rigar da kashe biranen da ke faruwa na iya kawo karshen cutar ta SARS.', 'en': ' Given that SARS-CoV infection originates from the contact between humans and civets in the markets, closing wet markets and killing civets therein could have effectively ended the SARS epidemic. '}

{'ha': "Ta hanyar dalilai iri ɗaya, ya kamata a cire pangolins daga kasuwannin nama don hana watsa cuta daga dabba zuwa mutum, ta la'akari da binciken gano asalin cutar a pangolin da yawa daga beta-CoVs masu kusancin dangantaka da SARS-CoV-2.", 'en': ' By the same reasoning, pangolins should be removed from wet markets to prevent zoonotic transmission, in view of the discovery of multiple lineages of pangolin beta-CoVs closely related to SARS-CoV-2. '}

{'ha': "Koyaya, ko yaya kuma aka watsa SARS-CoV-2 ga mutane ta hanyar pangolins da sauran dabbobi masu shayarwa har yanzu za'a fayyace su a cikin binciken da za'a yi nan gaba.", 'en': ' However, whether and how SARS-CoV-2 is transmitted to humans through pangolins and other mammals remain to be clarified in future investigations. '}
{'ha': 'A gefe guda, MERS-CoV ya wanzu cikin rakuman larabawa.', 'en': ' On the other hand, MERS-CoV has existed in dromedary camels for a long time. '}

{'ha': 'Waɗannan raƙuma suna da mahimmanci ga kayan sufuri da kuma babban tushen nama, madara, fata da kayan ulu ga mutanen yankin.', 'en': ' These camels serve as an important tool for transportation as well as a main source of meat, milk, leather and wool products for the local people. '}
{'ha': 'Suna nan ko ina a Gabas ta Tsakiya da Afirka.', 'en': ' They are widely distributed across the Middle East and Africa. '}

{'ha': 'Don haka, kusan abune da ba zai yiwuwa ba a ce a soke dukkan rakuma domin kawai a shawo kan cutar ta MERS, kamar dai yadda aka yi a kasuwar dabbobin dawa a qasar China domin shawo kan bazuwar cutar SARS-CoV da SARS-CoV-2.', 'en': ' It is therefore impossible to sacrifice all camels for the control of MERS, as what was done in wild animal markets in China to prevent the spreading of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2. '}

{'ha': 'Don dakatar da yawan yaduwar MERS, ya kamata a ɗauki cikakkiyar hanya don haɓaka rigakafin tasiri ga MERS-CoV don raƙuma, tare da sauran matakan kula da kamuwa da cuta.', 'en': ' To stop the recurrent outbreaks of MERS, a comprehensive approach should be taken to develop effective vaccines against MERS-CoV for camels, in combination with other infection control measures. '}

{'ha': 'Kasancewar ba mu iya kawar da kwayoyin cututtukan nan ba, watakila a iya samun bullar sabbin kwayoyin halittan da za su haifar da bazuwar cututtuka.', 'en': ' As we are not able to eliminate these viruses, new genotypes might emerge to cause outbreaks. '}
{'ha': 'Yawancin CoV na zoonotic suna yaduwa a cikin daji.', 'en': ' A variety of zoonotic CoVs are circulating in the wild. '}
{'ha': 'Alal misali, cututtukan jemage na CoVs da suka samo asali daga jikin dabbobi suna nan birjik.', 'en': ' Particularly, bat CoVs with zoonotic potential are so diverse. '}

{'ha': 'Akwai hujjoji da dama da ke nuna cewa cututtukan CoVs suna rayuwa tare da rikida zuwa cutar CoVs da take shafar dan adam cikin sauri kuma ta iya zama mai saurin kisa a nan gaba.', 'en': ' There are plenty of opportunities that these zoonotic CoVs evolve and recombine, resulting in the emergence of new CoVs that are more transmissible and/or deadly in humans in future. '}

{'ha': "Ya kamata a watsar da al'adun cin namun daji a wasu wurare na China don rage hulɗa da ba ta dace tsakanin mutane da dabbobi.", 'en': ' The culture of eating wild animals in some places of China should be abandoned to reduce unnecessary contact between humans and animals. '}

{'ha': 'Lura da yadda aka sha fama da cututtukan SARS da MERS da kuma COVID-19, lallai ne a yi shirin kwarai wajen tunkarar ta.', 'en': ' With the ordeals of SARS, MERS and COVID-19, a better preparedness and response plan should be in place. '}
{'ha': 'A zahiri, ƙwayoyin cuta da yawa sun wanzu a cikin duniyar ta dogon lokaci.', 'en': ' In fact, many viruses have existed in the planet for a very long time. '}
{'ha': 'Suna zama a cikin ɗakunan ajiya na asali nasu har sai an sami damar yaduwa.', 'en': ' They stay in their own natural reservoirs until there is a chance for spillover. '}

{'ha': "Kodayake jemagu suna da fasaloli da yawa waɗanda suka fi dacewa da yada ƙwayoyin cuta, damar da dan Adam zai iya hulɗa da jemagu da sauran nau'in dabbobin daji za a iya rage ta idan an ilmantar da mutane su nisanta da su.", 'en': ' Although bats have many features that favours the spreading of viruses, the chance for humans to be in contact with bats and other wildlife species can be minimized if people are educated to stay away from them. '}

{'ha': 'Cigaba da sanya ido a cikin dabbobi masu shayarwa wajibi ne don kyakkyawar fahimtar yanayin ilimin halittu na CoVs da rundunonin su na halitta, wanda zai tabbatar da amfani wajen hana yaduwar dabbobi zuwa mutane da kuma barkewar gaba.', 'en': ' Continuous surveillance in mammals is necessary for better understanding of the ecology of CoVs and their natural hosts, which will prove useful in preventing animal-to-human transmission and future outbreaks. '}

{'ha': 'Hanya mafi sahihanci wajen kare bazuwar cututtuka daga jikin dabbobi zuwa mutane ita ce dan adam ya kaurace wa wadannan dabbobin da suke dauke da kwayoyin cututtukan.', 'en': ' To conclude, the most effective way to prevent viral zoonosis is for humans to stay away from the ecological niches of the natural reservoirs of the zoonotic viruses. '}

{'ha': 'Abubuwa da yawa a cikin wasan kwaikwayon game da asalin zoonotic na SARS-CoV-2 har yanzu sun ɓace.', 'en': ' Several pieces in the puzzle of the zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2 are still missing. '}

{'ha': "Da farko, idan jemagu suna yada kwayar cutar magabata na SARS-CoV-2 zuwa pangolins, Zai zama abin ban sha'awa idan kaga irin yanayi da jemagu da kuma nau'ikan pangolins za su iya zamowa cikin muhalli iri daya.", 'en': ' First, if bats transmit an ancestral virus of SARS-CoV-2 to pangolins, it will be of interest to see under what circumstances bats and pangolins could share the same ecological niche. '}

{'ha': 'Na biyu kuma, idan dai har jemagu suna taka muhimmiyar rawa wajen yada cutar zuwa mutane, yaya za a tabbatar da haduwar mutum da kuma jemagun.', 'en': ' Second, if bats play a more direct role in human transmission, how humans get into contact with bats should be determined. '}

{'ha': "Na uku, idan dabbobi masu shayarwa na uku suka zama mai masaukin gaskiya na tsakiya, yadda yake ma'amala da nau'ikan halittu gami da mutane, jemagu da pangolins ya zama dole a fayyace su.", 'en': ' Third, if a third mammal acts as the true intermediate host, how it interacts with the different species including humans, bats and pangolins has to be clarified. '}

{'ha': 'A karshe dai, lura da galibin dabbobi masu shayarwa ciki har da na gida za su kamuwa da cutar SARS-CoV-2, ya kamata a gudanar da bincike hakika a kai.', 'en': ' Finally, since many mammals including domestic animals might be susceptible to SARS-CoV-2, both surveillance and experimental infection should be conducted. '}

{'ha': 'Shin Jemage ne, ko pangolin ko wata dabba mai shayarwa, ana tsammanin SARS-CoV-2 ko ƙwayoyin mahaifan sa waɗanda suke kusan iri ɗaya ne za a gano shi a cikin masaukinsa na halitta a nan gaba.', 'en': ' Should it be a bat, a pangolin or another mammal, it is expected that SARS-CoV-2 or its parental viruses that are almost identical will be identified in its natural hosts in future. '}

{'ha': 'Binciken da aka ci gaba a wannan yankin zai ba da damar hanyar juyin halitta na SARS-CoV-2 a cikin dabbobi, tare da mahimmancin tasiri a cikin rigakafin da kuma sarrafa COVID-19 a cikin mutane.', 'en': ' Continued investigations in this area will elucidate the evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in animals, with important implications in the prevention and control of COVID-19 in humans. '}

{'ha': "Ana sabunta ka'idojin gwaji na COVID-19 “wanda ake ganin sun kamu da cuta” da “da wanda an riga an gano na da cutar” ya zama dole", 'en': ' Updating the diagnostic criteria of COVID-19 “suspected case” and “confirmed case” is necessary '}

{'ha': 'A 6 Fabrairu 2020, ƙungiyarmu ta buga jagorar shawara mai sauri don ganewar asali da lura da kamuwa da cutar 2019 noro coronavirus (2019-nCoV), kuma wannan jagorar ya samar mana da kwarewarmu kuma mu bayar da tunani sosai game da yakar wannan cuta ta duniya.', 'en': ' On 6 February 2020, our team had published a rapid advice guideline for diagnosis and treatment of 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) infection, and this guideline provided our experience and make well reference for fighting against this pandemic worldwide. '}

{'ha': 'Koyaya, cutar coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) sabon cuta ce, wayewarmu da iliminmu suna karuwa ne sannu a hankali bisa binciken ci gaba da ƙwarewar aikin asibiti; Saboda haka, dabarun ganewar asali da magani ana kuma sabunta su koyaushe.', 'en': ' However, the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge are gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated. '}

{'ha': "A cikin wannan wasika, mun ba da amsa guda ɗaya game da jagorarmu kuma mun samar da sabon yanayin bincike na “wanda ake zargi da cuta” da “tabbataccen cutar” bisa ga sabon bincike da Jagororin Kulawa na COVID-19 (sigar na bakwai) wanda Kwamitin Lafiya na Kasa na jamhuriyar jama'ar Sin ya bayar.", 'en': ' In this letter, we answered one comment on our guideline and provided the newest diagnostic criteria of “suspected case” and “confirmed case” according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (seventh version) that issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China. '}

{'ha': 'A cikin watan Disamba na 2019, coronavirus na shekara ta 2019 (2019-nCoV) ya haifar da fashewa, wanda a yanzu an nada shi a matsayin cutar coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) kuma an sanya sunan ƙwayar cuta mai ƙuna mai nauyi ta cutar coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV- 2).', 'en': ' In December 2019, the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) has caused an outbreak, which is now officially named as the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the virus has been named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2). '}
{'ha': 'A ranar 11 Maris 2020, WHO ta kwatanta COVID-19 a matsayin annoba.', 'en': ' On 11 March 2020, WHO characterized COVID-19 as a pandemic. '}

{'ha': 'Don yin yaƙi da kamuwa da cututtukan SARS-CoV-2, ƙungiyarmu ta ɓullo da jagorar shawara mai sauri kuma an buga wannan kan layi a cikin Binciken Ilimin Kiwon Lafiyar Sojoji a ranar 06 ga Fabrairu 2020.', 'en': ' In order to fight against the SARS-CoV-2 infection, our team has developed a rapid advice guideline and that has been published online in Military Medical Research on 06 February 2020. '}
{'ha': 'An jawo hankalin sosai tun lokacin da aka buga.', 'en': ' It has attracted a great attention since published. '}
