{'ha': 'Ka lura duk da cewa COVID-19 sabon cuta ne, ƙwarewarmu da iliminmu suna ƙaruwa sannu-sannu bisa binciken ci gaba da ƙwarewar aikin asibiti; Saboda haka, dabarun ganewar asali da magani ana kuma sabunta su koyaushe.', 'en': ' Note however that COVID-19 is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge is gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated. '}

{'ha': "Misali, Binciken Bincike da Ka'idodin Jiyya don COVID-19 wanda Kwamitin Kiwan Lafiya na Jamhuriyar Jama'ar Sin ya bayar (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), tsakanin 16 ga Janairu 2020 zuwa 3 Maris 2020, sun ba da sanarwar total bakwai bugu tare da wasu mahallin da ake canza sosai.", 'en': ' For instance the Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), among 16 January 2020 to 3 March 2020, has issued a total of seven editions with some contexts being substantively changed. '}

{'ha': 'Yanzu jagorancinmu ta karɓi sharhi ta hanyar Zhou et al., Sun gabatar da wani tsari mai sauƙi wanda ya danganci ƙwarewar asibiti.', 'en': ' Now our guideline received a comment by Zhou et al., they introduced a simple scoring proposal based on their clinical experience. '}

{'ha': "Ayyukan su sun ƙara sabon shaida don jagorar mu kuma sun ba da ma'anar mahimmanci ga wannan anoba ta duniya.", 'en': ' Their work added new evidence for our guideline and also make valuable reference for this pandemic worldwide. '}
{'ha': 'Muna alfahari da muhimmiyar aikin su kuma muna nuna godiyarsu.', 'en': ' We endorse their significant work and express our thanks. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, aikin su ma yana buƙatar sabuntawa bisa ga sabon Ganewar asalin ciwo da Jagororin Jinyar COVID-19 (Sigar gwajin bakwai) da kuma binciken kwana nan.', 'en': ' However, their work also needs update according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (Trial seventh version) and recently studies. '}

{'ha': 'Dangane da bugu na bakwai (3 Maris 2020), don tabbatar da tuhumar da ake buƙata na buƙatar haɗu da kowane abu guda na abubuwan tarihin annoba tare da abubuwa biyu na alamun bayyanar asibiti don yin cikakken bincike, ko kuma buƙatar haɗuwa da abubuwa uku na bayyanannin asibiti idan ba tare da bayyananne ba tarihin annoba:', 'en': ' According to the seventh edition (3 March 2020), to confirm the suspected case needs to combine any one item of epidemiological history features with two items of clinical manifestations to make a comprehensive analysis, or needs to meet three items of clinical manifestations if without clear epidemiological history: '}

{'ha': "Tarihin cututtukan cuta: (1) tarihin tafiya ko zama a cikin birnin Wuhan da kewayenta, ko wasu al'ummomin da aka sami rahoton cutar COVID-19 a cikin kwanaki 14 na ƙarshe kafin alamun farawa; (2) tarihin saduwa da SARS-CoV-2 cututtukan fata (tare da ingantaccen gwajin nucleic acid);(3) tarihin tuntuɓar marasa lafiya tare da zazzabi ko alamu na numfashi daga garin Wuhan da kewayenta, ko kuma sauran al'ummomin da aka sami rahoton COVID-19 a cikin kwanaki 14 na ƙarshe kafin alamun farawa;(4) tarihin hulɗa tare da tarin abubuwan da aka tabbatar(≥ 2 lokuta biyu da zazzabi da / ko alamun cututtukan numfashi sun faru a cikin makonni 2 a cikin ƙananan yankuna, kamar gida, ofis, aji na makaranta, da sauransu).", 'en': ' Epidemiological history: (1) a history of travel or residence in Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 cases had been reported in the last 14\u2009days before symptom onset; (2) a history of contact with SARS-CoV-2 infectious cases (with positive nucleic acid test); (3) a history of contacting with patients with fever or respiratory symptoms from Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 had been reported in the last 14\u2009days before symptom onset; (4) a history of contacting with cluster of confirmed cases (≥ 2 cases with fever and/or respiratory symptoms occurred within 2\u2009weeks in small areas, such as home, office, class of school, etc). '}

{'ha': 'Bayyanuwar cututtuka na asibiti: (1) zazzabi da/ko alamun cutar hanyoyin numfashi; (2) tare da alamun fasahar kamuwa da COVID-19; (3) jimlar tantanin halitar farin jinin da ke nuna daidai, raguwa, ko raguwar yawan adadin kumburin lymphocyte a farkon matakin.', 'en': ' Clinical manifestations: (1) fever and/ or respiratory symptoms; (2) with imaging features of COVID-19 infection; (3) total white blood cell counts showing normal, decreased, or reduced lymphocyte count in the early onset stage. '}

{'ha': "Binciken shari'ar da aka tabbatar ya kamata ya dogara ne akan tuhumar da ake zargi tare da kowane abu guda na pathogenic ko shaidar serological kamar haka: (1) gwajin PCR na hakika tabbatacce ga SARS-CoV-2; (2) hoto ko bidiyo mai zagaya yanar gizo da sauri duk tsarin halitta wanda yake nuna babban ɗabi'a ga sanannun coronaviruses; (3) tabbatacce ga takamaiman IgM antibody da IgG antibody zuwa SARS-CoV-2 a cikin gwajin serum; ko sauyawar SARG-CoV-2-IgG takamaiman IgG daga mummunan zuwa tabbatacce, ko titer yana tashi ≥4 sau a cikin lokacin dawo da sama wanda ke cikin mawuyacin lokaci.", 'en': ' Diagnosing the confirmed case should base on suspected case with any one item of pathogenic or serological evidence as following: (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2; (2) viral whole genome sequencing showing high homogeneity to the known novel coronaviruses; (3) positive for the specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody to SARS-CoV-2 in serum test; or a change of the SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody from negative to positive, or titer rising ≥4 times in the recovery phase above that in the acute phase. '}

{'ha': 'Za mu iya ganin cewa ainihin gwajin PCR na ainihin acid na nucleic acid a cikin tsarin numfashi ko samfurori na jini sun kara zuwa na biyu (18 Janairu 2020) da na uku (22 Janairu 2020).', 'en': ' We can see that the real-time PCR test for nucleic acid in respiratory tract or blood samples was added to the second (18 January 2020) and third (22 January 2020) editions. '}

{'ha': 'An ƙara gano ƙwaƙwalwar ƙwayar jini a cikin na huɗu (27 Janairu 2020) da na biyar (8 Fabrairu 2020); sannan kuma an kara tabbatar da shaidar serological zuwa bugu na bakwai.', 'en': ' The pathogenic detection of blood sample was added to the fourth (27 January 2020) and fifth (8 February 2020) editions; and then the serological evidence was added to the seventh edition. '}

{'ha': "Wadannan gyare-gyaren da aka danganta da masu binciken sun ci gaba da aikin da cewa don bincika ingantaccen ƙwayar cuta ta hanzari, da samfurori daga ƙwayar numfashi ciki har da samfurin jini, wanda ya haɓaka samar da samfurori daban-daban, kuma yana tallafawa samar da takamaiman sakamako na antibody. a cikin ka'idodin da aka tabbatar.", 'en': ' These modifications based on the researchers continued work that to search for an optimal nucleic acid detection kit for rapid diagnosis, as well as the samples from respiratory tract including blood sampling, which increased the availability of different specimens, and supported bringing the specific antibody positive result into the confirmed criteria. '}

{'ha': 'Bayan haka, akwai ƙarin tabbaci da yawa waɗanda ke tunatar da mu mai da hankali tare da marasa lafiyar marasa lafiya da marasa lafiyar asymptomatic.', 'en': ' Besides, there are more and more evidence that remind us to caution with the atypical symptomatic and asymptomatic patients. '}

{'ha': 'Saboda haka, jerin gwanon Zhou et al. yakamata a sabunta shi, kamar yadda suke rarraba mutum ba tare da alamun asibiti kamar “ƙananan haɗari ba”.', 'en': ' Hence, the flow chart of Zhou et al. should be updated, as they classified the person without clinical symptoms as “low risk”. '}
{'ha': 'Hakanan ana buƙatar tabbatar da tsarin ƙimar ci gaba a cikin aikin asibiti da kuma karatun.', 'en': ' The score system also needs to be verified in further clinical practice and studies. '}

{'ha': "Don kammalawa, muna fatan ƙarin tabbaci kai tsaye da ke zuwa tare da yin kira ga masu karatu su faɗi ra'ayoyinsu.", 'en': ' To conclude, we hope more direct evidence coming up and call for readers to provide their comments. '}

{'ha': 'Don bincikar “ciwon da ba a gano ba” da “ciwon da aka gano”, muna ba da shawarar ganowa da yin biyayya da sababbin jagororin ƙasashen su.', 'en': ' For the diagnosis of “suspected case” and “confirmed case”, we suggest to trace and obey the newest guidelines of their home countries. '}
{'ha': 'Kungiyar mu su ma za su sabunta jagorar mu domin bayar da taimako.', 'en': ' Our team will also timely update our guideline to offer help. '}
{'ha': 'Bangladesh ta ba da rahoton sabbin mutuwa guda biyar ta dalilin COVID-19, mafi yawa a rana guda.', 'en': ' Bangladesh reports five new deaths due to COVID-19, a daily highest '}
{'ha': 'Jiya, Bangladesh ta tabbatar da sabbin mutuwa har guda biyar saboda COVID-19 a ranar.', 'en': ' Yesterday, Bangladesh has confirmed five new deaths due to COVID-19 on the day. '}
{'ha': 'Wannan shine lamba mafi yawa na mutuwa a rana guda saboda kwayar cutan.', 'en': ' This is the highest number of fatalities in a day due to the virus. '}

"}
{'ha': 'Adadin mutane 17 da suka mutu aka rubuta.', 'en': ' A total of 17 deaths have been recorded. '}

{'ha': 'Cikin labarai kan layin intane, Darectan IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, ta ce wadanda suka rasa rayukansu sun hada da maza hudu da mace daya.', 'en': ' In an online news briefing, the director of IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, said the fatalities included four males and one female. {'ha': 'A cewar Dr meerjady, kararraki masun cutar biyu sun kai shekaru 60, biyu tsakanin 51 da 60, kuma daya shekaru 41-50.', 'en': ' According to Dr Meerjady, two cases were aged above 60, two between 51 and 60, and one 41-50 years old. '}
{'ha': 'Ta kuma ce biyu daga cikin wadanda cutar ya shafa sun fito ne daga Dhakar.', 'en': ' She also said two of the victims were from Dhaka. '}

{'ha': 'Wani jami’in asibitin ya fada wa kamfanin dillancin labarai na Anadolu, tashar labarai ta gida cewa daya daga cikin mamacin shi ne Jalal Safur Rahaman daraktan ne na hukumar cin hanci da rashawa na Bengali, wanda aka kula dashi a asibitin Kuwait Maitree.', 'en': ' A hospital official told Anadolu Agency, a local news outlet, that one of the deceased was Jalal Saifur Rahman, a director of Bengali Anti-Corruption Commission, who was cared for at the Kuwait Maitree Hospital. {'ha': "A ranar Asabar, a cikin sanarwar bidiyo ta yanar gizo, Ministan Jigilar Hanya da Gadodi na Bangladesh Obaidul Quader ya ce za a rufe jigilar jama'a na tsawon lokaci fiye da yadda aka tsara tun farko, har sai ranar Asabar mai zuwa.", 'en': ' On Saturday, in an online video announcement, Bangladeshi Road Transport and Bridges Minister Obaidul Quader said public transport would be shut down for longer than initially planned, until this coming Saturday. {'ha': "Kantuna a Ostiraliya sun rage takarda bayan gida ga kowane ma'amala", 'en': ' Stores in Australia lower toilet paper limits per transaction '}

{'ha': 'A yammacin ranakun Asabar da lahadi kantin Woolworths and Coles dake kasar Australia ta takaita adadin tolifefa zuwa daya ko biyu ga ko wani mai siya a ko wani kantin ta dake fadin kasar.', 'en': ' On Sunday and Saturday evening, Australian store chains Woolworths and Coles lowered their purchase restrictions on toilet paper to two and one package per transaction in all stores on national level, respectively. '}
{'ha': 'ALDI sun bijiro da iyakar nadi daya, ranar litinin', 'en': ' ALDI also introduced a one-pack limit, on Monday. '}

{'ha': 'A wallafa ka’idojin ne a bangon fita da kuma shafin kantin dake kafar sadarwa na Facebook.', 'en': " These limitations were posted as messages on the checkouts, and on the chains' Facebook pages. "}

{'ha': 'Rahoto ya nuna masu siyan kaya sun garkame kayayyaki bisa ga tsoron COVID-19 da daukar matakin killacewa waje guda.', 'en': ' Buyers were reportedly stocking up due to fears of COVID-19 in case people need to self-isolate. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar Laraba, Woolworths ya siya takarda bayan gida kadan don kaiwa gida fakiti ɗaya kowane oda.', 'en': ' On Wednesday, Woolworths also limited toilet paper purchases for home delivery to one pack per order. '}

{'ha': 'Wadannan canje-canje sun biyo bayan ƙuntatawar fakiti-hudu ko wace ma’amala wanda Woolworths da Coles suka gabatar a watan Maris rana 4 da 5 bi da bi.', 'en': ' These changes followed the previous four-pack per transaction restriction introduced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 respectively. '}

{'ha': 'Coles, a rahoton shi na ranar 8 ga watan Maris yake cewa da mataki na hudu da aka sanya mmafi yawan shaguna na sayar da kaya cikin sa’a guda da sauke kayan, kuma ya kira bukatar da zamto na rashin laakari shi kuma ALDI a wani rubutun shi na shifin sada zumunta na facebook na rananr talata ya kira shi da mara zato.', 'en': ' Coles, in its March 8 media release, reported that with the four-pack restriction in place, "many stores are still selling out within an hour of delivery", and called the demand "unprecedented", while ALDI, in a Facebook post on Tuesday, called it "unexpected". '}
{'ha': 'Ciniki ya hau cikin sauri a makon da ya wuce, a maganar kakakin woolworth.', 'en': ' Sales went up in a "sharp increase" last week, according to a Woolworths spokesperson. '}
{'ha': "Shagunan Costco's A Canberra Sun Takaita Yawan Sayarwa Zuwa Nadi Biyu Satin Da Ya Wuce.", 'en': " Costco's store in Canberra also limited the allowed amount to two packs last week. "}

{'ha': 'Don ci gaba da rage ƙarancin, Coles ya ba da umarnin manyan kunshin daga masu kaya da ƙara yawan bayarwa, Woolworths ya ba da odar ƙarin jari, yayin da ALDI ya sanya hannun jari don shirin Laraba na musamman da za a fara da wuri.', 'en': ' To further alleviate the shortage, Coles ordered bigger packages from suppliers and increased delivery frequency, Woolworths ordered extra stock, while ALDI made stocks for a planned Wednesday special available early. '}

{'ha': 'Russell Zimmerman, shugaban kungiyar kakanan yan kasuwa, yace kanaken yan kasuwa na kokarin kara kaya, ammman matakan gida akan lokacin shigowar motocin su na zama da shi mai wahala.', 'en': ' Russell Zimmerman, executive director of the Australian Retailers Association, said that retailers try to raise stock, but local council restrictions on the timing of truck-deliveries make it hard. '}

{'ha': 'Ya sa rai samun karuwar farashin sarrafa kaya a yayin kokarin biyan bukatu da makamanci haka na musamman.', 'en': ' He expects rising production costs, as suppliers try to meet demand, and fewer specials. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar Talata, ALDI ya sanar da cewa bayan farkon sakin hannun jari, wasu shagunan ba za su iya gudanar da ranar Laraba ta musamman ba.', 'en': " On Tuesday, ALDI announced that following the early release of stock, some stores can't run the Wednesday special. "}

{'ha': "A Cikin News.com.au., Dr Gary Mortimer ya bada rahoton cewa, Masanin Kananan Ciniki Daga Jami'ar kimiya na Queensland, Ya ce Shagunan Na Cika Kayakin Sayarwan a kowace Dare.", 'en': ' In a News.com.au report, Dr Gary Mortimer, retail expert from Queensland University of Technology, said the stores fill the stock every night. '}

{'ha': 'Yana Cewa Takardar bayan gida Abu ne Mai Yawa, Wanda Ke Sa Kaya Su Yi Karanci A Yawa, Kuma In An Sayar Duka, Su Kan Bar Guraben Ajiya Su Fayau, Hakan Na Matsantawa Karancin Su.', 'en': ' He remarked toilet paper is a bulky item, leading to low quantity of stocks in numbers, and, when sold out, leaves vast shelf spaces empty, hardening the feeling of a shortage. '}

{'ha': '"Coles da Woolworths suna da ra\'ayi [cewa] idan akwai kayayyaki da yawa akan wurin ajiye kaya (shelf), idan kayayyaki kamar takardan bayan gida da abun tsabtacewa [sayi] kuma suna can da yawa, watakila za a rage yawan fargaba" in ji Russell Zimmerman a cikin Labarai na ABC.', 'en': ' "Coles and Woolworths have a view [that] if there was plenty of stuff on the shelf, if product like toilet rolls and sanitiser could be [bought] and are there in quantities, you would probably minimise the panic" said Russell Zimmerman per ABC News. '}

{'ha': 'Mai sake saraffa takardar bayan gida Wanda ya bada Crap ya ce a ranar Laraba ta karshe zasu kare.', 'en': " Recycled toilet paper producer Who Gives a Crap said on last Wednesday they'd run out of stock. "}

{'ha': 'Kimberly-Clark, wanda ke yin Kleenex Toilet Tissue, da Solaris Paper wanda ke yin Sorbent, ya jaddada cewa suna aiki 24/7 don kula da wadatar, a cewa rahoton News.com.au.', 'en': ' Kimberly-Clark, which makes Kleenex Toilet Tissue, and Solaris Paper which makes Sorbent, emphasized they were working 24/7 to maintain the supply, according to the News.com.au report. '}

{'ha': 'Domain.com shafin chinikayyan gidaje, sun bada rahoton wasu masun sayarwa suna bada takardan bayangida kyauta ga wanda zai fara ciniki kan gwanjon a Melbourne, lokacin da aka gudanar da gwanjon kadan domin masun saya sun tafi hutu a dogon karshen mako ranar iyan kwadago.', 'en': ' Domain.com, a real estate site, reported some property sellers offering free toilet paper to the first bidder on auctions in Melbourne, when fewer auctions were held because of buyers having time off on the long weekend of Labour Day. {'ha': 'Shirin ranar Alhamis na jaridar NT na dauke da shafuka guda takwas wanda ya kamace ya yanka domin yin amfani a matsayin tolifefa.', 'en': ' The Thursday edition of NT News, a daily printed in Darwin, included an eight-page insert meant to be cut up and used as toilet paper. '}

{'ha': 'Da farko Shagunan Sun nuna Rashin aikata Daga Farko Wajen Sa Matakan, A Yadda Wani rahoto Na ABC Australia a ranar 3 ga Watan Maris Wanda Suka Ce Babu Wani Shiri Don Takaita Siyyayya.', 'en': ' The stores were originally reluctant to impose restrictions, according to a report from ABC Australia on March 3 in which they said they had no plans to introduce restrictions on the purchases. {'ha': 'Russell Zimmerman ya kara wasu kayakin da ake bukatar su sosai, harda kariyar fuska, sabulun hannu, busashen kaya, ruwan goge hannu da ma filawa.', 'en': ' Russell Zimmerman added that other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitiser, dried goods, handwash and flour. '}

{'ha': 'A irin haka, a wajen Australia, a rananr lahadi da yamma an lura da cewa shafin kasuwanci na Birtania a yanar gizo Ocado na takaita sayarwan takadar bayan gida Andres zuwa fakitin biyu na nadi-12.', 'en': ' Similarly, outside of Australia, on Sunday evening online British supermarket Ocado was observed limiting purchases of Andres toilet paper to two 12-roll packs. '}
{'ha': 'Kungiyar Lafiya ta Duniya ta ayyana COVID-19 a matsayin annoba', 'en': ' World Health Organization declares COVID-19 pandemic '}

{'ha': 'Ranar hukumar lafiya ta WHO ta kaddamar da barkewar COVID-19 da ciwon da coronavirus SARS-COV-2 ke haifarwa a matsayin annoba.', 'en': ' On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19 — the disease caused by coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 — to be a pandemic. '}

{'ha': 'Ko da yake ita kalmar anoba na nufin yanda cutar ke yaduwa, ba yanda hadarin wasu majinyatan ba, WHO ta bukaci sahalewar gwamnatoci wajen yakin.', 'en': ' Although the word "pandemic" only refers to how widely a disease has spread, not how dangerous specific cases are, the WHO noted the need to drive governments to action: '}
{'ha': '“Dukanin kasashen duniya har yanzu na iya sauya fasalin wannan annobar.', 'en': ' "All countries can still change the course of this pandemic. '}

{'ha': 'idan kasashe suka gane, gwaji, warkar, binciko, da tura mutanen su izuwa agaji, “ inji Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, shugaban kungiyar WHO.', 'en': ' If countries detect, test, treat, isolate, trace and mobilize their people in the response," said Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the Director-General of the WHO. '}

{'ha': '"Muna matukar damuwa da duka matakan tashin hankali da yaduwar cutar da kuma matakan rashin damuwa."', 'en': ' "We are deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity and by the alarming levels of inaction." '}

{'ha': 'A Cewar Dr Tom Frienden, Tsohon Shugaban Hukumar Kula Da Cuttutuka Da Ma Kariya Daga Kamuwa Cewa ita Wannan Annoba Ba a San Kan ta ba Tukun.', 'en': ' According to Dr. Tom Frieden, formerly the director of the United States\' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented." '}

'}

"}

'}

'}

'}

'}

{'ha': 'Babu sanannen rigakafi ko wata kulawa domin kawar da ita.', 'en': ' There is no known vaccine or specific antiviral treatment. '}

{'ha': 'Kulawa Ta farko Na da nasaba Da Kuma Bada Garkuwa Wajen kawo Sauki, Matakan Kare Kai Ciki Harda wanke Hannu, Rufe baki Yayin Tari, Bada tazara Ga Mutanne, Kula da kuma Kebe Kai wa Mutanen Da Ke Dauke da ko Ake Zargin Sun Kamu Da ita.', 'en': " Primary treatment is symptomatic and supportive therapy.Recommended preventive measures include hand washing, covering one's mouth when coughing, maintaining distance from other people, and monitoring and self-isolation for people who suspect they are infected. "}

{'ha': 'Hukumomi a fadin duniya sun mayar da martani ta hanyar daukar matakai kamar takaita safara, killacewa, dokar hana fita, bin ka’idojin rage hatsari a wuraren aiki da kuma kulle masana’antu.', 'en': ' Authorities worldwide have responded by implementing travel restrictions, quarantines, curfews, workplace hazard controls, and facility closures. '}

{'ha': "annoban ta haifar da mummunar rikice-rikicen tattalin arziƙin duniya, dakatar da sokewa ko soke wasannin, addinai, siyasa da al'adu, da kuma wadatar kayayyaki da ke haifar da sayan ban tsoro.", 'en': ' The pandemic has led to severe global socioeconomic disruption, the postponement or cancellation of sporting, religious, political and cultural events, and widespread shortages of supplies exacerbated by panic buying. '}

{'ha': 'Makarantu da jami’o’i sun rufe kodai a kasa gaba daya ko a wasu wurare a cikin kasashe 193, ya shafi a kalla kimanin kashi 99.4% na yawan daliban duniya.', 'en': " Schools and universities have closed either on a nationwide or local basis in 193 countries, affecting approximately 99.4 percent  of the world's student population. "}

'}

{'ha': 'Sakamakon dakatar da tafiye-tafiyte da kuma rufe manyan masana’antu an samu karancin gurbatattun iska.', 'en': ' Due to reduced travel and closures of heavy industry, there has been a decrease in air pollution and carbon emissions. '}

{'ha': 'Jami’o’in lafiya a Wuhan sun kawo rahoto cewa an gano taron cutar ta hanyar kwayar Pneumonia a 31 ga watan Disemba na 2019 bayan haka an kaddamar da bincike a farkon watan Janairu na 2020.', 'en': ' Health authorities in Wuhan, China (the capital of Hubei province) reported a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 31 December 2019, and an investigation was launched in early January 2020. '}

{'ha': 'Yawancin lokuta suna da alaƙa da Kasuwancin kayan ruwa a Huanan don haka ana tunanin cutar tana da asalin zoonotic.', 'en': ' The cases mostly had links to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market and so the virus is thought to have a zoonotic origin. '}

{'ha': 'Kwayar cutar da ta haifar da barkewar cutar ana kiranta da SARS-CoV-2, sabuwar kwayar cutar da aka gano tana da alaƙa da coronaviruses na gemage, pangolin coronaviruses, da SARS-CoV. Wanda aka fara gano shi da alamun cutar daga baya an gano cewa ya kamu da rashin lafiya a ranar 1 ga Disamba 2019 , kuma mutumin bai da alaƙa da bayyane tare da tari mai rukunin kasuwa na baya.', 'en': ' The virus that caused the outbreak is known as SARS-CoV-2, a newly discovered virus closely related to bat coronaviruses, pangolin coronaviruses, and SARS-CoV.The earliest known person with symptoms was later discovered to have fallen ill on 1 December 2019, and that person did not have visible connections with the later wet market cluster. '}

{'ha': 'Daga farkon tarin rahoton wadanda suka kamu da cutar cikin watan Disamba na shekarar 2019, an gano kashi biyu cikin uku suna da nasaba da kasuwa.', 'en': ' Of the early cluster of cases reported in December 2019, two-thirds were found to have a link with the market. '}

{'ha': "A ranar 13 ga Maris 2020, wani rahoto da ba a tabbatar da shi ba daga South China Morning Post ya ba da shawarar cewa, wata kara ta fara daga ranar 17 ga Nuwamban shekarar 2019, a cikin wani dan shekara 55 daga lardin Hubei, watakila shi ne na farko. A ranar 26 ga Fabrairu 2020, WHO ta ba da rahoton cewa, yayin da aka samu rahoton bullar sabbin maganganu a China amma ba zato ba tsammani ya karu a Italiya, Iran, da Koriya ta Kudu, Yawan sababbin shari'o'i a wajen kasar Sin sun wuce adadin sabbin maganganu a cikin kasar Sin a karon farko.", 'en': ' On 13 March 2020, an unverified report from the South China Morning Post suggested that a case traced back to 17 November 2019, in a 55-year-old from Hubei province, may have been the first.On 26 February 2020, the WHO reported that, as new cases reportedly declined in China but suddenly increased in Italy, Iran, and South Korea, the number of new cases outside China had exceeded the number of new cases within China for the first time. '}

{'ha': 'Zai yiwu a sami rahoto mai yawa, musamman tsakanin waɗanda ke da alamun karamin bayyanar cututtukan.', 'en': ' There may be substantial underreporting of cases, particularly among those with milder symptoms. '}

{'ha': 'Ya zuwa 26 ga watan Fabrairu, ba a samu karancin lokuta ba a tsakanin matasa, wadanda shekarun su 19 kuma wadanda ke kasa da kashi 2.4 cikin dari na duk duniya. Babban mashawarcin kimiyya na Burtaniya, Patrick Vallance, ya kiyasta cewa kashi 60% na mutanen Birtaniya za su kamu da cutar kafin cimma wata ingantaccen garkuwa.', 'en': " By 26 February, relatively few cases had been reported among youths, with those 19 and under making up 2.4% of cases worldwide.The United Kingdom's chief scientific adviser, Patrick Vallance, estimated that 60% of the British population would need to become infected before effective herd immunity could be achieved. "}

{'ha': 'Yanayi ya nuna yawan mutane da suka gudanar da gwajin COVID-19 wanda kuma gwajin na nuna cewa suna dauke da cutar bisa tabbacin hukuma.', 'en': ' Cases refers to the number of people who have been tested for COVID-19, and whose test has been confirmed positive according to official protocols. '}

{'ha': 'A 23 ga watan Maris ba’a samu kasar da ta gudanar da gwajin cutar na sama da 3% kuma akasarin kasashen sun samu tsari daga hukuma na yin gwaji har ga wadanda basu nuna kananan alamu ba. cikin kasashen akwai Italy da Netherlands da Spain da kuma Switzerland.', 'en': ' As of 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries have had official policies not to test those with only mild symptoms, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, and Switzerland. '}

{'ha': 'Wani binciken da aka buga a ranar 16 ga Maris ya gano cewa, a cikin kasar Sin, har zuwa 23 ga Janairu, an kiyasta kimanin kashi 86% na cututtukan COVID-19, kuma waɗannan cututtukan da ba a yarda da su ba sune tushen kamuwa da cuta kashi 79% na kamuwa da cutan yadda yake a rubuce.', 'en': ' A study published on 16 March found that in China, up to 23 January, an estimated 86% of COVID-19 infections had not been detected, and that these undocumented infections were the infection source for 79% of documented cases. '}

'}

'}

{'ha': "Waɗannan lambobin sun bambanta daga yanki da na tsawon lokaci, kuma ana rinjayar su da ƙimar gwaji, ingancin tsarin kiwon lafiya, zaɓuɓɓukan magani, tun lokaci barkewar farko, da kuma halayen jama'a kamar shekaru, jima'i, da kuma lafiyar gaba ɗaya. yana nuna adadin mutuwar da aka rarrabe ta hanyar adadin cututtukan da aka gano a tsakanin wani lokaci na wani lokaci.", 'en': ' These numbers vary by region and over time, and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak, and population characteristics such as age, sex, and overall health.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval. '}

{'ha': "Dangane da ƙididdigar Jami'ar Johns Hopkins, ƙimar mutuwa-ta-duniya shine 6.0% (97,039 / 1,617,204) kamar 10 na Afrilu 2020.", 'en': ' Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) as of 10 April 2020. '}
{'ha': 'Lambobin ya banbanta tsakanin yanki.', 'en': ' The number varies by region. '}

{'ha': 'A China kiyastawar da aka yi na nuna cewa mutuwa sanadiyar cutar ta ragu daga 17.3% ( Na wadanda suka nuna alamu daga ranar 1 zuwa 10 na watan Janairu 2020) zuwa 0.7% (Na wadanda suka nuna alamu daga ranar 1 na watan Febreru 2020). Sauran matakai da aka dauka ya kunshi matakin auna mutuwa wanda ke nuna yawar mutane da aka kwantar sanadiyar wani cuta da suka mutu. Hakazalika akwai matakin auna kamuwa da cutar mai nuna yawan mutanen (wadanda aka kwantar da akasin su) da suka mutu sakamakon cutar.', 'en': ' In China, estimates for the death-to-case ratio decreased from 17.3% (for those with symptom onset 1–10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those with symptom onset after 1 February 2020).Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed people who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease. '}

{'ha': "Waɗannan ƙididdigar basu da iyakar lokaci kuma suna bin takamaiman yawan jama'a daga kamuwa da cuta ta hanyar sassanci.", 'en': ' These statistics are not timebound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution. '}

"}

'}

{'ha': 'Maciej Bony daga Penn State University ya bayyana cewa idan ba’a kula ba barkewar shafuwar ta zai haura sa’anan ya fara raguwa yayin da cutar ta rasa jiki da zata rayu a kai.', 'en': ' Maciej Boni of Penn State University stated, "Left unchecked, infectious outbreaks typically plateau and then start to decline when the disease runs out of available hosts. '}

{'ha': 'Amma kusan ba zai yiwu a yi wani tsinkaye ba game da lokacin da hakan zai kasance ”.', 'en': ' But it\'s almost impossible to make any sensible projection right now about when that will be". '}

{'ha': 'Babban jami’i mai baiwa gwamnatin China shawara a kan kiwon lafiya Zhong Nashan yana mai ra’ayi cewa akwai yiwuwar kawo karshen ta a watan Yuni mudin dukanin kasashen duniya sun lura da shawarar da hukumar WHO ta bayar na matakan takaita yaduwar kwayar cuta.', 'en': ' The Chinese government\'s senior medical adviser Zhong Nanshan argued that "it could be over by June" if all countries can be mobilized to follow the WHO\'s advice on measures to stop the spread of the virus. '}

'}

{'ha': 'Bisa ga Kwalejin Ilimi na Imperiyal Wani Bincike Wanda Neil Ferguson Ya Jagoranta, za a bukanci Nesantawar jama’a Da ma Wasu matakai “har ya zuwa lokacin da za a  sami maganin rigakafi (a kalla Watani 18 ko ma ya fi)".', 'en': ' According to the Imperial College study led by Neil Ferguson, physical distancing and other measures will be required "until a vaccine becomes available (potentially 18 months or more)". '}

{'ha': 'William Schaffner na Jami\'ar Vanderbilt ya ce, "Ina tsammanin ba zai yiwu ba wannan coronavirus - saboda yana da sauƙin ɗaukar hoto - za ta shuɗe gabaɗaya" kuma "" na iya zama cuta ta zamani, da ke dawowa kowace shekara ".', 'en': ' William Schaffner of Vanderbilt University stated, "I think it\'s unlikely that this coronavirus—because it\'s so readily transmissible—will disappear completely" and it "might turn into a seasonal disease, making a comeback every year". '}
