{'ha': 'Alamomin COVID-19 na iya zama mara takamaiman rashin daidaito kuma mutane masu kamuwa da cuta na iya zama mara sa alamun cutar.', 'en': ' Symptoms of COVID-19 can be relatively non-specific and infected people may be asymptomatic. '}
{'ha': 'Mafi yawan alamun rashin lafiya su ne zazzabi (88%) da ma busashen tari (68%).', 'en': ' The two most common symptoms are fever (88%) and dry cough (68%). '}

{'ha': 'Wasu kananan bayyanuwar cutan ta hadar da gajiya, fitar da majina daga hanyar numfashi (phlegm), rashin jin kanshi, karancin numfashi, ciwon gabobi da na jiki, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon kai, rashin jin dadi, amai, da gudawa, ko canza launin fata wato cyanosis. WHO ta sanar cewa kimanin mutum daya a cikin shida ya kamu da rashin lafiya kuma yana da wahala yin numfashi.', 'en': ' Less common symptoms include fatigue, respiratory sputum production (phlegm), loss of the sense of smell, shortness of breath, muscle and joint pain, sore throat, headache, chills, vomiting, hemoptysis, diarrhea, or cyanosis.The WHO states that approximately one person in six becomes seriously ill and has difficulty breathing. '}

{'ha': 'Cibiyar Kula da Cututtuka da kawarwa ta U.S. (CDC) ta lissafa alamu na gaggawa kamar wahalar numfashi, tsayayyar ciwon kirji ko matsi, rikicewar kwatsam, farkawa mara wahala, da fuska mai kyau ko lebe; Ana ba da shawarar likita na gaggawa idan waɗannan alamu suna nan.Farin ci gaba na cutar na iya haifar da matsananciyar ciwon huhu, cuta hanyoyin numfashi mai tsananin gajiyar alamar cutan, tashin zuciya, sepsis, girgiza septic da mutuwa.', 'en': ' The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) lists emergency symptoms as difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, sudden confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.Further development of the disease can lead to severe pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, sepsis, septic shock and death. '}

{'ha': 'Wasu daga cikin masu kamuwa da cutar na iya zama asymptomatic, ba tare da alamu na asibiti ba amma tare da sakamakon gwaji da ke tabbatar da kamuwa da cuta, don haka masu bincike sun ba da shawara cewa waɗanda ke da kusanci da mutanen da suka kamu da cutar ya kamata a sa ido sosai kuma a bincika su kawar da kamuwa da cuta.', 'en': ' Some of those infected may be asymptomatic, with no clinical symptoms but with test results that confirm infection, so researchers have issued advice that those with close contact to confirmed infected people should be closely monitored and examined to rule out infection. '}
{'ha': 'Kdiddigar Sinanci na jimlar mara alamun cutar yana daga kalilan zuwa 44%.', 'en': ' Chinese estimates of the asymptomatic ratio range from few to 44%. '}

{'ha': 'Lokacin da aka saba amfani da shi (lokacin tsakanin kamuwa da cuta da farawa) ya fara daga daya zuwa kwanaki 14; mafi yawan lokuta kwana biyar ne.To da misalin rashin tabbas, kimantawar ɓarkewar mutane da COVID-19 waɗanda suka rasa kamshin da ƙanshi ya fara daga 30% kuma daga baya ya faɗi zuwa 15%.', 'en': ' The usual incubation period (the time between infection and symptom onset) ranges from one to 14 days; it is most commonly five days.As an example of uncertainty, the estimate of the fraction of people with COVID-19 who lost their sense of smell was initially 30% and later fell to 15%. '}
{'ha': 'Wasu jawaban akan yadda cutar ke yaduwa ake kokarin ganowa.', 'en': ' Some details about how the disease is spread are still being determined. '}

{'ha': 'Akwai yakinin farkon yaduwar ciwon at hanyar hulda da mai shi sai kuma ta hanyar digo da aka samu yayin tari ko atishawa ko yin magana tare da samun kusanci da mutum tsakanin mita 1 zuwa 2 (kafa 3 zuwa 6).', 'en': ' The disease is believed to be primarily spread during close contact and by small droplets produced during coughing, sneezing, or talking; with close contact being within 1 to 2 metres (3 to 6 feet). '}

{'ha': 'Bincike ya gano cewa tari da ba a rufe ba yana iya haifar da didiga wanda wand zai iya tafiya zuwa mita 4,5 (ƙafa 15) zuwa mita 8.2 (ƙafa 27).', 'en': ' Studies have found that an uncovered coughing can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 metres (15 feet) to 8.2 metres (27 feet). '}

{'ha': 'Wasu sun kudurta cewa kwayar cutar na iya yaduwa ne ta hanyar dugon ruwa da ta zauna a iska a tsawon lokaci mai yawa bayan haka a kamu da ita ta hanyar magana. Haka zalika digo ta hanyar nunfashi na iya samuwa yayin da mutum ke numfasa iska waje ko yayin magana. Asali dai hanyar shigar kwayar cutar bai takaita a kan hanyar iska ba.', 'en': ' Some have proposed that the virus may also be transmitted by small droplets that stay for more prolonged periods in the air, that may be generated during speech.Respiratory droplets may also be produced during breathing out, including when talking, though the virus is not generally airborne. '}

{'ha': 'Digon na iya fadawa a baki ko hancin wanda ke kusa wata sa’i ma ana iya shakar ta zuwa ga hunhu.', 'en': ' The droplets can land in the mouths or noses of people who are nearby or possibly be inhaled into the lungs. '}

{'ha': 'Wasu dagag cikin hanyoyin samada da lafiya kamar saka bututu don shakar iska da kuma farfadowa ta zuci suna iya zama sila na yada cutar ta iska.', 'en': ' Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolized and thus result in airborne spread. '}

{'ha': 'Hakanan yana iya yaduwa lokacin da mutum ya taɓa abin da ya gurbata, gami da fata, sannan ya taɓa idanunsu, hanci, ko bakin su.', 'en': ' It may also spread when one touches a contaminated surface, including skin, and then touches their eyes, nose, or mouth. '}

{'ha': 'A yayin da yaduwar ta na iya faruwa ta hanyar kashi ke razanar da mutane, hatsarin ta kuwa na da karanci matuka.', 'en': ' While there are concerns it may spread by faeces, this risk is believed to be low. '}

{'ha': 'Gwamnatin China ta karyata yiwuwar yaduwar kamuwa da SaRS-CoV-2 ta hanyar takshi zuwa baki. Kwayar cutar ta fiye yaduwa rana uku da nuna alama sai dai akwai yiwuwar yaduwar ta kafin alamun sun bayyana ko kuma kafin ta ketara zuwa mataki na biyu na ciwon.', 'en': ' The Government of China denied the possibility of faecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2.The virus is most contagious during the first three days after onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease. '}

{'ha': 'Bayan gwaji an gano mutane sun kamu da cutar har tsawon kwana uku kafin bayyanar alamomin ta. Wannan ke nuna cewa akwai yiwuwar kamuwa da cutar kafin bayyanar alamomin ta.', 'en': ' People have tested positive for the disease up to three days before onset of symptoms suggesting transmission is possible before developing significant symptoms. '}

{'ha': 'kadan dag cikin rahotannin dakin gwaji kae tabbatar da mmatsanancin hali da aka samu, amman tsananin yaduwar ya tabbata a wasu kasashe yayin binciken yaduwar da ma alaka.', 'en': ' Only few reports of laboratory-confirmed asymptomatic cases exist, but asymptomatic transmission has been identified by some countries during contact tracing investigations. '}

{'ha': 'Hukumar dakile yadduwar cututtuka na nahiyar turai ta sanar da cewa mutum daya yakan iya raba ma mutum biyu ko uku cutar. Kuma kwayar cutar na tasiri sa’o’i zuwa ranaku a fili.', 'en': ' The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) states that while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces. '}

{'ha': "Musamman, an gano kwayar cutar har zuwa kwanaki uku akan filastik (polypropylene) da 304 bakin karfe, na kwana ɗaya a cikin kwali, kuma har tsawon sa'o'i huɗu akan jan ƙarfe.", 'en': ' Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and 304 stainless steel, for one day on cardboard, and for up to four hours on copper. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan, duk da haka, ya bambanta dangane da ɗanshin yanayi da zafin yanayin jiki. An samu dabbobin gida da wasu dabbobin da cutar COVID-19 bayan gwaji.', 'en': ' This, however, varies based on the humidity and temperature.Pets and other animals have tested positive for COVID-19. '}

{'ha': 'Babu wata shaida mai nuna cewa dabba na iya zamo sanadiyar kamuwar cutar ga dan Adam. Sai dai hukumar Birtaniya ta shawarci da a wanke hannaye bayan hulda da dabba da sauran wurare da mai dauke da cutar ke iya tabawa.', 'en': " There is no evidence animals can pass the virus on to humans, though British authorities advise washing one's hands after contact with animals, like after contact with other surfaces infected people could have touched. "}

{'ha': 'Kwayar cutar 2 SARS-COV-2 kwayar cuta ce wanda ke da asali. An fara samo ta ne daga mutane uku masu dauke da cutar pneumonia dake tare da ciwon nunfashi mai tsanani a nan birnin Wuhan na kasar China.', 'en': ' Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel virus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan. '}

{'ha': 'Dukkan fasalin Wannan sabon kwayar cutan SARS-CoV-2 Sun Faru daga coronavirus dangi iri daya a yanayin su. A Wajen Jikin mutum, a kan kashe kwayar cutan da sabulun gida, Wanda ke Narkar Da Matakan Kariya. SARS-CoV-2 Na Da dangataka Da Ainahin SARS-CoV.', 'en': ' All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which dissolves its protective envelope.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV. '}
{'ha': 'Ana tsammanin yana da asalin zoonotic.', 'en': ' It is thought to have a zoonotic origin. '}

{'ha': "Binciken kwayar halitta ta bayyana cewa coronavirus yana hade da kwayoyin halittar Betacoronavirus, a cikin subgenus Sarbecovirus (jinsi B) tare da nau'ikan baturi biyu da aka samo.", 'en': ' Genetic analysis has revealed that the coronavirus genetically clusters with the genus Betacoronavirus, in subgenus Sarbecovirus (lineage B) together with two bat-derived strains. '}

{'ha': 'Kaso 96% na nuna kamala a wani bangare yayin gina kwayoyin hallita idan aka kwatanta da samfurin Bat coronavirus (BatCov RaTG13).', 'en': ' It is 96% identical at the whole genome level to other bat coronavirus samples (BatCov RaTG13). '}

{'ha': 'A watan Faburairu 2020, masu bincike yan chinese sun gano cewar akwai wani kwayar hallita a sassa na kawayr da alakar ta tsakanin cutar dama kwayar da kuma wanda ke jikin mutum.', 'en': ' In February 2020, Chinese researchers found that there is only one amino acid difference in certain parts of the genome sequences between the viruses from pangolins and those from humans. '}

{'ha': 'Da aka kwatanta abubuwa da suke gina kwayoyin halitta na an gano cewa kaso 92% iri daya ne tsakanin pangolin coronavirus da na SARS-COV-2. Hakan dai baya tabbatar da pangolin a matsayin masauki na tsakani ba.', 'en': ' Whole-genome comparison to date has found at most 92% of genetic material shared between pangolin coronavirus and SARS-CoV-2, which is insufficient to prove pangolins to be the intermediate host. '}

{'ha': 'Ana iya gano da kamuwa da kwayar cutar kan alamu, kodayake tabbatarwa daga ƙarshe ita ce hanyar jujjuyawar kwayar polymerase (rRT-PCR) ta kamuwa ko hoton CT.', 'en': ' Infection by the virus can be provisionally diagnosed on the basis of symptoms, though confirmation is ultimately by reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) of infected secretions or CT imaging. '}

{'ha': 'Wani bincike mai hada PCR Da CT a Wuhan Na Da raayin cewa CT Na Da Saurin Dauka akan PCR, Duk da rashin takaicewa, Dama Yawancin irin Ganin yadda Wasu cututukan Sanyi Da wasu Cuttutukan Suka gudana.', 'en': ' A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes. '}

{'ha': 'ya zuwa Maris 2020, Cibiyar Nazarin Kama Hoton Jiki na Amurka wato American College of Radiology ta ba da shawarar cewa "Bai kamata a yi amfani da CT don bincika ko a matsayin gwajin fari don gano da cutar COVID-19 ba".', 'en': ' As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19". '}

{'ha': 'Hukumar WHO ta wallafa hanyoyi gwajin ta hanyar kwayar hallita na SARS-COV-2. Ta wallafa na farkon ne a ranar 17 ga watan Janairu.', 'en': ' The WHO has published several RNA testing protocols for SARS-CoV-2, with the first issued on 17 January. '}
{'ha': 'Gwajin yana amfani da rikodin sarkar polymerase real-lokaci (rRT-PCR).', 'en': ' The test uses real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR). '}
{'ha': 'Za a iya gwajin daga layin numfashi ko ma samfurin jini.', 'en': ' The test can be done on respiratory or blood samples. '}
{'ha': "Ana samun sakamako gaba ɗaya cikin 'yan awanni kaɗan zuwa kwanaki.", 'en': ' Results are generally available within a few hours to days. '}

{'ha': 'Kullum ana yin wannan gwajin ne a kan nasopharyngeal swab kodayake ana iya amfani da makogwaron makogwaro. Yawancin dakunan gwaje-gwaje da kamfanoni ke yin gwaje-gwaje na serological, wanda ke gano kwayoyin.', 'en': ' Generally this test is carried out on a nasopharyngeal swab though a throat swab may also be used.A number of laboratories and companies are developing serological tests, which detect antibodies. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 6 ga watan Afrilu 2020, wannan duk ba a tabbatar da ingancin su ba wajen yawan yaduwar.', 'en': ' As of 6 April 2020, none of these has been proved sufficiently accurate to be approved for widespread use. '}

{'ha': 'A cikin U.S. an yarda da gwajin serological da Cellex ya kirkira wanda an aminci da shi don amfani da shi lokacin gaggawa a dakin gwajin da aka amince da ita.', 'en': ' In the US a serological test developed by Cellex has been approved for emergency use by certified laboratories only. '}

{'ha': 'Siffofin kwaikwayo na halayyar hoto a cikin hotunan rediyo da kuma lissafin tomography (CT) na mutanen da ke da alamun cutar sun haɗa da yanayin gilashin ƙasa na asymmetric da kuma abubuwan rashin jin daɗin rayuwa.', 'en': ' Characteristic imaging features on radiographs and computed tomography (CT) of people who are symptomatic include asymmetric peripheral ground glass opacities and absent pleural effusions. '}

{'ha': "Kungiyar Radiological na Italiyanci tana tattara bayanan yanar gizo na kan layi na binciken abubuwan binciken don tabbatattun shari'o'in a duniya.", 'en': ' The Italian Radiological Society is compiling an international online database of imaging findings for confirmed cases. '}

{'ha': 'Sakamakon kewayawa tare da wasu cututtukan irin su adenovirus, hoto ba tare da tabbatarwar PCR ba shi da iyaka takamaiman ganowa COVID-19.', 'en': ' Due to overlap with other infections such as adenovirus, imaging without confirmation by PCR is of limited specificity in identifying COVID-19. '}

{'ha': 'Wani gaggarumin bincike a China ta kwatanta sakamakon hoton kirji da na kwayoyin halitta inda ta gano karancin samar da hakikanin hoton kumuwar cutar. Ta gano cewa kwayar cutar ta fiye sauri kuma ta fi hadari ta kara da bada shawara na a sauya hanyar wajen gwajin cututuka a wuraren da annobar ke da yawa.', 'en': ' A large study in China compared chest CT results to PCR and demonstrated that though imaging is less specific for the infection, it is faster and more sensitive, suggesting its consideration as a screening tool in epidemic areas. '}

{'ha': 'An tsara cibiyoyin sadarwa na tsarin wucin gadi na fasahar mutum don gano fasali masu kwayar cutar tare da hotunan rediyo da CT.', 'en': ' Artificial intelligence-based convolutional neural networks have been developed to detect imaging features of the virus with both radiographs and CT. '}

{'ha': 'Dabarun hana yaduwar cutar sun hada da kula tsabtacewar mutum gaba daya, wanke hannaye, gujewa taba idanu, hanci, ko baki da hannayen ku wanda ba a wanke ba, da tari ko atishawa cikin takarda da sanya takardan cikin kwandon shara.', 'en': ' Strategies for preventing transmission of the disease include maintaining overall good personal hygiene, washing hands, avoiding touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands, and coughing or sneezing into a tissue and putting the tissue directly into a waste container. '}

{'ha': "An shawarci waɗanda su riga su ka kamu da wannan cutar su sanya abin rufe fuska na tiyata a cikin jama'a.", 'en': ' Those who may already have the infection have been advised to wear a surgical mask in public. '}

{'ha': 'Guje ma musabiha tsakanin juna na daga cikin matakan magance yaduwar cuta da aka dauka. Mafi yawancin gwamnatocin kasashe sun shawarci da a hana tafiyar kai da kawowa zuwa kasashen da annobar ta shafa.', 'en': ' Physical distancing measures are also recommended to prevent transmission.Many governments have restricted or advised against all non-essential travel to and from countries and areas affected by the outbreak. '}
{'ha': 'Amman cutar ta kai matakin yaduwa a cikin alumma a sassa na duniya.', 'en': ' However, the virus has reached the stage of community spread in large parts of the world. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan Ya Nuna Cewa Kwayan Cutar Na Yaduwa A Cikin al’ummai, Kuma Wasu Mazuna Yankin basu San Ko Ta Ina Bane Ko Ta Yaya ne Suka Kamu Da Wannan Cutar. MaAikatan kiwon Lafiya Masu Kula Da Marasa Lafiya suna Umarta wadanda suka kamu da cutar Cewa Su Yi amfani Da kaidar Kariya, da kaidar huldawa, kariyar ido. Neman wadanda suka yi hulda da marasa lafiya hanya ce mai mahimmanci ga hukumomin kiwon lafiya su gano ainihin inda cutar ta bullo da kuma hana shi daga yaduwa.', 'en': " This means that the virus is spreading within communities, and some community members don't know where or how they were infected.Health care providers taking care of someone who may be infected are recommended to use standard precautions, contact precautions, and eye protection.Contact tracing is an important method for health authorities to determine the source of an infection and to prevent further transmission. "}

{'ha': 'Yin amfani da bayanan wuri daga wayoyin hannu ta gwamnatoci don wannan dalili ya haifar da damuwa na sirri, tare da Amnesty International da wasu kungiyoyi sama da 100 suna ba da sanarwa suna kiran iyaka akan wannan sa-ido.', 'en': ' The use of location data from mobile phones by governments for this purpose has prompted privacy concerns, with Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issuing a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance. '}

{'ha': 'An aiwatar da aikace-aikacen wayar hannu daban-daban ko aka gabatar don amfani da son rai, kuma daga ranar 7 ga Afrilu, 2020, gungun masana kwararru da yawa suna aiki akan hanyoyin sadarwar sirri, kamar yin amfani da Bluetooth don shiga kusancin mai amfani da sauran wayoyin hannu.', 'en': " Various mobile apps have been implemented or proposed for voluntary use, and as of April 7, 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth to log a user's proximity to other cellphones. "}

{'ha': 'Masun amfani sun sami sako cewa idan sun hulda da wani wanda aka gwada kuma na dauke cutar COVID-19. Rashin fahimta na ta yadawa akan yadda za a kariya daga samun cutar; alal misali, wanke hanci da ma kurkurar baki basa kare mutu daga cutar ba.', 'en': " Users then receive a message if they've been in close contact with someone who has tested positive for COVID-19.Misconceptions are circulating about how to prevent infection; for example, rinsing the nose and gargling with mouthwash are not effective. "}
{'ha': 'Babu maganin cutar COVID-19 amman kungiyoyi na ta kokari samar da guda.', 'en': ' There is no COVID-19 vaccine, though many organizations are working to develop one. '}
{'ha': 'An shawarci wanke hannaye domin kiyaye yaduwar cutar.', 'en': ' Hand washing is recommended to prevent the spread of the disease. '}

{'ha': 'Hukumar CDC Ta Bukaci Mutane da su wanke Hannayen su a koda Yaushe Da Sabulu Ma A Kalla Dakika Aishirin, mussaman Bayan Su Ziyar Ci Bandaki Ko In Hannun Su Na Da Datti; Dama Bayan Fece Hanci, Tari Ko Hatishawa.', 'en': " The CDC recommends that people wash hands often with soap and water for at least twenty seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty; before eating; and after blowing one's nose, coughing, or sneezing. "}

{'ha': 'Wannan na faruwa ne saboda a wajen jikin mutum ana iya kashe kwayar cutar da sabulu , sabulun ta kan fasa launin dake bayar da kariya.', 'en': ' This is because outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble. '}

{'ha': 'CDC ta kara da cewa ayi anfani da man tsaftacewar hannu mai sinadarin alcohol kashi 60% idan ba bu ruwa ko sabulu a kusa.', 'en': ' CDC further recommended using an alcohol-based hand sanitizer with at least 60% alcohol by volume when soap and water are not readily available. '}

{'ha': 'Kungiyyar WHO Tana Shawartar mutane da su Kiyayi taba Ido, Hanci da bakin su Ba Tare da wanke Hannu Ba.', 'en': ' The WHO advises people to avoid touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands. '}

{'ha': "Za'a iya wanke kwayoyin cututtuka daga saman da yawancin hanyoyin magancewa (a cikin minti daya na bayyanuwa ga mai lalata ga bakin karfe), hade da kashi 62-71 bisa dari ethanol, kashi 50-100 bisa dari isopropanol, kashi 0.1 bisa dari sodium hypochlorite, 0.5% hydrogen peroxide, da kashi 0.2-7.5 bisa dari na povidone-iodine.", 'en': ' Surfaces may be decontaminated with a number of solutions (within one minute of exposure to the disinfectant for a stainless steel surface), including 62–71% ethanol, 50–100% isopropanol, 0.1% sodium hypochlorite, 0.5% hydrogen peroxide, and 0.2–7.5% povidone-iodine. '}

{'ha': 'Sauran rigakafi kamar Benzalkonium chloride da Chrohexidine tasirin su bai yi karfi ba.', 'en': ' Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chrohexidine gluconate, are less effective. '}

{'ha': 'CDC ta ba da shawarar cewa idan ana zargin COVID idan aka tabbatar ko aka tabbatar da shi a wani ofishi kamar ofis ko kulawar rana, duk bangarorin kamar ofisoshin, wuraren wanka, wuraren gama gari, kayan lantarki kamar na allunan, allon taɓawa, keɓaɓɓun maɓallin, na nesa, da ATM injunan da marasa lafiyar ke amfani da su, ya kamata a warwatsa su.', 'en': ' The CDC recommends that if a COVID case is suspected or confirmed at a facility such as an office or day care, all areas such as offices, bathrooms, common areas, shared electronic equipment like tablets, touch screens, keyboards, remote controls, and ATM machines used by the ill persons, should be disinfected. '}

{'ha': 'Kungiyoyin kiwon lafiya sun shawarciu da jama’a suyi rufe baki da hancin ta hanyar lankewasa gwiwar hannaye ko kuma ayi amfani da tolifefa yayin da mutum ke tari ko atishawa kuma a tabbatar an zubar da tolifefa ba tare da bata lokaci ba bayan kammala hakan.', 'en': ' Health organizations recommended that people cover their mouth and nose with a bent elbow or a tissue when coughing or sneezing, and disposing of any tissue immediately. '}

{'ha': 'Ana ba da shawarar amfani da abin rufe fuska na tiyata ga waɗanda wataƙila sun kamu da cutar, domin sanya abin rufe fuska na iya taƙaita yawan tafiyar nesan tarwatsewar ɗigagga nufanshin waje a lokacin magana, atishawa, da yin tari.', 'en': ' Surgical masks are recommended for those who may be infected, as wearing a mask can limit the volume and travel distance of expiratory droplets dispersed when talking, sneezing, and coughing. '}
{'ha': 'Hukumar WHO ta ba da umarni kan yaushe da kuma yadda za a yi amfani da abin rufe fuskoki.', 'en': ' The WHO has issued instructions on when and how to use masks. '}

{'ha': 'Bisa bayani kwararre a bangaren kwayar cuta a jami’ar Leeds Stephen Griffin sanya takunkunmin fuska na rake yiwuwar taba fusta da hannu wanda yin haka yana daga cikin manyan hanyoyin samun cuta matukar ba’a wanke hannu da kyau. “ Hakazalika an shawarci yin amfani da takunkumin fuska ga masu jinyar wadanda ke dauke da ciwon.', 'en': ' According to Stephen Griffin, a virologist at the University of Leeds, "Wearing a mask can reduce the propensity [of] people to touch their faces, which is a major source of infection without proper hand hygiene."Masks have also been recommended for use by those taking care of someone who may have the disease. '}

{'ha': 'WHO Tana shwartar Sanya kariyar fuska ga masu lafiya in har suna daga cikin wanda ke iya fuskantar barazana, alal misali wanda ke kula da masu cutar COVID-19, duk da cewa sun amince da sanya kariyar fuska yana iya taimakawar mutane don hana su shafa fuskar su.', 'en': ' The WHO has recommended the wearing of masks by healthy people only if they are at high risk, such as those who are caring for a person with COVID-19, although they also acknowledge that wearing masks may help people avoid touching their face. '}
{'ha': 'Kasashe Da Dama Sun Fara Daukaka Amfani Da Kariyar Fuska Ga membobin Al’umamn Su.', 'en': ' Several countries have started to encourage the use of face masks by members of the public. '}

{'ha': "A cikin U.S., CDC ta ba da shawarar saka suturar fuska wanda ba na asibiti ba wacce aka yi da zane.China ta ba da shawarar musamman amfani da abubuwan rufe fuska wanda za a iya jefarwa ta hanyar wakilan jama'a masu lafiya, musamman idan suna cikin kusanci (1 mita (3 ft) ko lessasa da haka) ) da sauran mutane.", 'en': ' In the U.S., the CDC recommends wearing non-medical face mask made out of cloth.China has specifically recommended the use of disposable medical masks by healthy members of the public, particularly when coming into close contact (1 metre (3 ft) or less) with other people. '}

{'ha': 'Hong Kong ta umarci da a sanya takunkumin fuska yayin shiga abun hawa kuma inda jama’a suka taru.', 'en': ' Hong Kong recommends wearing a surgical mask when taking public transport or staying in crowded places. '}

{'ha': "Ma'aikatan lafiyar Thailad suna kara karfafa mutane da su saka kariyar fuska a gida kuma su wanke su a kullum.", 'en': " Thailand's health officials are encouraging people to make cloth facemasks at home and wash them daily. "}

{'ha': "Jamhuriyar Czech da Slovakia sun hana fita a bainar jama'a ba tare da sanya abin rufe fuska ba ko rufe hanci da bakin mutum.", 'en': " The Czech Republic and Slovakia banned going out in public without wearing a mask or covering one's nose and mouth. "}

{'ha': "A ranar 16 Maris, Vietnam ta buƙaci kowa da kowa ya sanya abin rufe fuska yayin zuwa wuraren jama'a don kare kansu da sauran jama'a.", 'en': ' On 16 March, Vietnam requested everyone to wear a face mask when going to public areas in order to protect themselves and others. '}

{'ha': 'Gwamnatin Ostireliya ta ba da umarnin cewa duk wanda ya shiga kantin kayan miya dole ne ya sanya abin rufe fuska.', 'en': ' The Austrian government mandated that everyone entering a grocery store must wear a face mask. '}
{'ha': "Israila Ta Umarci mazaunan ta Da a Sanya Kariyar Fuska Indan Zai Fito Cikin Jama'a.", 'en': ' Israel has asked all residents to wear face masks when in public. '}

{'ha': 'Taiwan, wanda ke sakar Kariyar Fuska A Rana kusan guda milliyan Goma tun Tsakiyar watan Maris, Ta bukaci Fasanja a Jirgin kasa Da motoccin Haya Na Bas Da su sanya Kariyar fuska Daga 1 ga watan Afrilu.', 'en': ' Taiwan, which has been producing ten million masks per day since mid-March, required passengers on trains and intercity buses to wear face masks on 1 April. '}

{'ha': 'Kasar Panama ta wajabta sanya takunkumin rufe hanci da baki ga ko wani dan kasa yayin fita waje. Ta bada shawarar na a sarrafa irin takunkumi na gargajiya idan babu halin siyan ainihin samfurin.', 'en': ' Panama has made it obligatory to wear a face mask whenever going outside, while also recommending the manufacture of a homemade face mask for those who cannot purchase face masks. '}

{'ha': 'Akasarin mutane na amfani da takunkumin fuska a kasashen Japan da South Africa da Malaysia da Korea da kuma Singapore.', 'en': ' Face masks have also been widely used in Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, and Singapore. '}

{'ha': 'Nisantawar zamantakewa (wanda kuma aka sani da nesa da jiki) ya hada da ayyukan sarrafa kamuwa da cuta wanda aka yi niyya don rage yaduwar cutar ta hanyar rage kusancin tsakanin mutane.', 'en': ' Social distancing (also known as physical distancing) includes infection control actions intended to slow the spread of disease by minimizing close contact between individuals. '}

{'ha': 'matakai sun hadar da kebe kai, hana tafiye-tafiye, da rufe makarantu, da maaikatu, da filayen wasa, dandalin wasanni ko shagunan siyayya.', 'en': ' Methods include quarantines; travel restrictions; and the closing of schools, workplaces, stadiums, theatres, or shopping centres. '}

{'ha': "Mutane dayawa na iya amfani da hanyoyin nisanta daga jama'a ta hanyar kasancewa a gida, rage tafiye-tafiye, guje wuraren cunkoso, yi amfani da gaisuwa ba tare da wata ma'amala ba, da nisantar kansu daga wasu.", 'en': ' Individuals may apply social distancing methods by staying at home, limiting travel, avoiding crowded areas, using no-contact greetings, and physically distancing themselves from others. '}

{'ha': "Yawancin gwamnatoci yanzu suna ba da izini ko bayar da shawarar nisantar jama'ar yankuna da cutar ta barke.", 'en': ' Many governments are now mandating or recommending social distancing in regions affected by the outbreak. '}

{'ha': 'Mafi girman taro da hukumomin gwamnatin U.S da kungiyoyin lafiya suka saurin rage shi zuwa mutum 250 (idan har ba a samu yaduwar COVID-19 a yankin ba) zuwa mutum 50, daga bisani ma mutum 10.', 'en': ' The maximum gathering size recommended by US government bodies and health organizations was swiftly reduced from 250 people (if there was no known COVID-19 spread in a region) to 50 people, and later to 10 people. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 22 Maris 2020, Jamus ta haramta haɗuwa da jama\'a fiye da mutane biyu. Manyan manya da waɗanda ke da halayen kiwon lafiya kamar su ciwon sukari, ciwon zuciya, ciwon hanyar numfashi, hauhawar jini, da kuma tsarin jayyayar garkuwar jiki suna fuskantar haɗarin kamuwa da cutar rashin ƙarfi da rikice-rikice kuma sun kasance CDC ta shawarci su ci gaba da kasancewa cikin gida a duk lokacin da yankin ke barkewar cutar. A karshen Maris 2020, hukumar ta WHO da sauran bangarorin lafiya sun fara maye gurbin amfani da kalmar "nisanta daga jama\'a" tare da "nisantar jiki", don fayyace cewa Manufar shine a rage yawan sadarwar jiki yayin da ake tsare haduwar jama\'a, ko nesa gaske ko kusa.', 'en': ' On 22 March 2020, Germany banned public gatherings of more than two people.Older adults and those with underlying medical conditions such as diabetes, heart disease, respiratory disease, hypertension, and compromised immune systems face increased risk of serious illness and complications and have been advised by the CDC to stay home as much as possible in areas of community outbreak.In late March 2020, the WHO and other health bodies began to replace the use of the term "social distancing" with "physical distancing", to clarify that the aim is to reduce physical contact while maintaining social connections, either virtually or at a distance. '}

{'ha': 'Lakanin “Bayar da tazarar muamala” ya maye zukatan jama’a da killacewa baki daya ba tare da waiwaya baya wajen hulda da jama’a ta wata hanya daban. Hukumomi sun isar da shafuda jima’i masu amfani na kiwon lafiya yayin annobar.', 'en': ' The use of the term "social distancing" had led to implications that people should engage in complete social isolation, rather than encouraging them to stay in contact with others through alternative means.Some authorities have issued sexual health guidelines for use during the pandemic. '}

{'ha': 'Ciki akwai shawarar yin jima’i tare da wanda suka zamanto muhallin su daya kuma wanda/wacce ba’a samu kwayar cutar ko alamun ta a jikin su.', 'en': ' These include recommendations to only have sex with someone you live with, who does not have the virus or symptoms of the virus. '}

{'ha': 'An shawarci masu dauke da cutar korona da su killace a gida tare da wadanda suke zaton sun kamu COVID-19 a sanadiyar su.', 'en': ' Self-isolation at home has been recommended for those diagnosed with COVID-19 and those who suspect they have been infected. '}

{'ha': "Hukumomin kiwon lafiya sun ba da cikakkun bayanai na yadda ya dace a kebance. Gwamnatocin da dama sun ba da umarnin ko bayar da shawarar keɓance kai ga dukkan jama'ar da ke zaune a yankunan da abin ya shafa.", 'en': ' Health agencies have issued detailed instructions for proper self-isolation.Many governments have mandated or recommended self-quarantine for entire populations living in affected areas. '}
{'ha': 'An ba da umarni mafi ƙarfi na keɓancewar kai ga waɗanda ke cikin haɗarin mai karfi.', 'en': ' The strongest self-quarantine instructions have been issued to those in high risk groups. '}

{'ha': 'Wadanda watakila sun fallasa ga wani tare da COVID-19 da waɗanda suka tafi kwanan nan zuwa wata ƙasa ko yanki tare da watsawa masu yaduwa an shawarce su keɓe kansu na kwanaki 14 daga lokacin bayyanar ƙarshe.', 'en': ' Those who may have been exposed to someone with COVID-19 and those who have recently travelled to a country or region with widespread transmission have been advised to self-quarantine for 14 days from the time of last possible exposure. '}
{'ha': 'Dabarun da ke cikin kula da barkewa sune garkuwa ko hanawa, da ragewa.', 'en': ' Strategies in the control of an outbreak are containment or suppression, and mitigation. '}

{'ha': "Ana gudanar da kokarin rage barkewar cutar a farko matakai da nufin ganowa da kuma ware wadanda suka kamu da cutar akazalika bullo da wasu matakan sarrafawar kamuwa da cutan da kuma rigakafin don hana yaduwar cutar zuwa sauran jama'a.", 'en': ' Containment is undertaken in the early stages of the outbreak and aims to trace and isolate those infected as well as introduce other measures of infection control and vaccinations to stop the disease from spreading to the rest of the population. '}

{'ha': "Lokacin da ba zai yiwu a iya ɗaukar yaduwar cutar ba, kokarin sai a matsa zuwa matakin ragewa: ana ɗaukar matakan rage jinkirin yaduwar cutar da kuma tasirin ta kan tsarin kiwon lafiya da al'umma.", 'en': ' When it is no longer possible to contain the spread of the disease, efforts then move to the mitigation stage: measures are taken to slow the spread and mitigate its effects on the healthcare system and society. '}
{'ha': 'Ana iya aiwatar da matakan kariya da ragewar cutan a lokaci guda.', 'en': ' A combination of both containment and mitigation measures may be undertaken at the same time. '}

{'ha': 'Takaitawa na bukatar karin tsauraran matakai don sauya cutar ta hanyar rage lambar haifuwa ta asali da kasa da 1.Sashin gudanar da kamuwa da barkewar cutan na kokarin rage haurawar annoban, da aka sani da karkatar bakin hanyar annoban.', 'en': ' Suppression requires more extreme measures so as to reverse the pandemic by reducing the basic reproduction number to less than 1.Part of managing an infectious disease outbreak is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as flattening the epidemic curve. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan yana rage haɗarin ayyukan kiwon lafiya da ake fama da shi kuma yana ba da ƙarin lokaci don jinyar allurar rigakafi da jiyya.', 'en': ' This decreases the risk of health services being overwhelmed and provides more time for vaccines and treatments to be developed. '}

{'ha': 'Kariya wanda ba na magani ba wanda zai iya kare barkewar ta hada da matakan kariyar mutum, kamar, sanya abun rufe fuska, da kebewar kai; matakai na al’uma da nufin nisantar jiki kamar rufewar makarantu da hana babban taruka; hadin kan al’uma don karfafa karbuwa da gudanarwa a iri wadanan kariya; har da matakan yanayi kamar tsaftacewar saman ababe. An dauki ayyukan da aka yi niyya sosai domin rage barkewar cutan a China lokacin da tsananin barkewar ta bayyana a sarari, kamar kebewar dukan birane da  tilasta dokar hana tafiye-tafiye.', 'en': ' Non-pharmaceutical interventions that may manage the outbreak include personal preventive measures, such as hand hygiene, wearing face-masks, and self-quarantine; community measures aimed at physical distancing such as closing schools and cancelling mass gathering events; community engagement to encourage acceptance and participation in such interventions; as well as environmental measures such surface cleaning.More drastic actions aimed at containing the outbreak were taken in China once the severity of the outbreak became apparent, such as quarantining entire cities and imposing strict travel bans. '}
{'ha': 'Wasu kasashen suma sun dau matakai da dama waje rage yaduwar cutar.', 'en': ' Other countries also adopted a variety of measures aimed at limiting the spread of the virus. '}

{'ha': 'Koriya ta Kudu ta gabatar da gwaje-gwaje na taro da kuma keɓewa ta gida, tare da ba da sanarwar faɗakarwa game da ƙungiyoyin masu cutar.', 'en': ' South Korea introduced mass screening and localized quarantines, and issued alerts on the movements of infected individuals. '}

{'ha': 'Singapore ta ba da tallafin kudi ga wadanda suka kamu da kebe wadanda suka kebe kansu tare da sanya babbar asara ga wadanda suka kasa yin hakan.', 'en': ' Singapore provided financial support for those infected who quarantined themselves and imposed large fines for those who failed to do so. '}

{'ha': 'Taiwan Ta Kara Yawan Hada Kariyar fuska Tare Da Hukunta Masu Boye Kayan Kiyon Lafiya. Matakan Kasar Birtania Da Na Kasar Amurka Na Nuna Yanayin (raguwan annoba Amman Ba a Hana Yaduwar ba) Da Ma Rage (Juya yaduwar annoba) Na Da manyan Matsaloli.', 'en': ' Taiwan increased face mask production and penalized hoarding of medical supplies.Simulations for Great Britain and the United States show that mitigation (slowing but not stopping epidemic spread) and suppression (reversing epidemic growth) have major challenges. '}

{'ha': 'Tsarin rage kaifin cutar na iya haddasa raguwar bukatun harkokin lafiya zuwa 2/3 da kuma mace-mace zuwa rabi. Hakazalika tana iya haifar da mutuwa daruruwan dubbunan mutane tare da fin karfin tsare-tsaren kula da lafiya.', 'en': ' Optimal mitigation policies might reduce peak healthcare demand by 2/3 and deaths by half, but still result in hundreds of thousands of deaths and health systems being overwhelmed. '}

{'ha': 'An fiye amfani da mataki na dannewa har tsawon lokaci da kwayar cutar ke yawo a jikin dan Adam (Ko kuma har sain an samu rigafi) domin yaduwa na iya canza salon ta yayi da aka sassauta matakin.', 'en': ' Suppression can be preferred but needs to be maintained for as long as the virus is circulating in the human population (or until a vaccine becomes available, if that comes first), as transmission otherwise quickly rebounds when measures are relaxed. '}
{'ha': 'sa baki na dogon lokaci don kashe cutar na haifar da tsadarna zamantakewa da tattalin arziƙi.', 'en': ' Long-term intervention to suppress the pandemic causes social and economic costs. '}

{'ha': 'Babu tabbatacciyar magani dake yakar kwayar cutar COVID-19 amma har yanzu ana yunkurin ganowa cikin yunkurin da ake akwai gwajin magunguna da aka riga aka sarrafa.', 'en': ' There are no specific antiviral medications approved for COVID-19, but development efforts are underway, including testing of existing medications. '}

{'ha': 'Shan magani da yawan shan abu mai malala tare da hutawa na iya taimakawa wajen rage girman alamomin ciwon.', 'en': ' Taking over-the-counter cold medications, drinking fluids, and resting may help alleviate symptoms. '}

{'ha': 'Ya danganta da tsananin ta ana iya bukatar jinya ta hanyar iskar Oxygen da shigar sinadarin ruwa ta hanyar bututun jini tare da kuma shakar iska.', 'en': ' Depending on the severity, oxygen therapy, intravenous fluids, and breathing support may be required. '}
{'ha': 'Yin amfani da magungunan steroids na iya tsanantar sakamako.', 'en': ' The use of steroids may worsen outcomes. '}

{'ha': 'Yawancin mahadi waɗanda aka yarda da su don maganin wasu cututtukan gama gari ana bincikarsu don amfani da su wajen jinyar COVID-19.', 'en': ' Several compounds that were previously approved for treatment of other viral diseases are being investigated for use in treating COVID-19. '}

{'ha': 'WHO ta kara da cewa wasu maganin gargajiya na iya sassauta alamu da SARS-COV-19 ke haifarwa.', 'en': ' The WHO also stated that some "traditional and home remedies" can provide relief of the symptoms caused by SARS-CoV-19. '}

{'ha': 'ingizawa tare da bayar da sauya tsarin kiwon lafiya domin biyan bukatar mara lafiya mai fama da ciwon COVID-19 ta kasance gaggarumi mataki na gaggawa kamar yadda WHO ta bayyana.', 'en': ' Increasing capacity and adapting healthcare for the needs of COVID-19 patients is described by the WHO as a fundamental outbreak response measure. '}

{'ha': "ECDC da ofishin yanki na Turai na WHO sun ba da jagororin asibitoci da sabis na kiwon lafiya na farko don canza albarkatu a matakan da yawa, ciki har da sabis na dakin gwaje-gwaje zuwa gwajin COVID-19, soke hanyoyin zaɓe a duk lokacin da zai yiwu, kebanta da ware marasa lafiya masu COVID-19, da haɓaka ƙarfin kulawa mai zurfi ta hanyar horar da ma'aikatan da kuma ƙara yawan wadatattun masu ba da iska da gadaje.", 'en': ' The ECDC and the European regional office of the WHO have issued guidelines for hospitals and primary healthcare services for shifting of resources at multiple levels, including focusing laboratory services towards COVID-19 testing, cancelling elective procedures whenever possible, separating and isolating COVID-19 positive patients, and increasing intensive care capabilities by training personnel and increasing the number of available ventilators and beds. '}

{'ha': 'Akwai ra’yi da Dama Akan inda Cutar ta fara (ainahin Mai Dauke Da Ita) Wanda Ta Bulla Daga Wajen Shi.', 'en': ' There are various theories about where the very first case (the so-called patient zero) may have originated. '}

{'ha': 'Maganar farko da aka santa da cutar Coronavirus ana iya gano ta zuwa 1 ga Disamba 2019 a Wuhan, Hubei, China.', 'en': ' The first known case of the novel coronavirus may trace back to 1 December 2019 in Wuhan, Hubei, China. '}
{'ha': 'A tsakanin wata daya, yawan cututtukan coronavirus a Hubei sannu a hankali ya ƙaru.', 'en': ' Within a month, the number of coronavirus cases in Hubei gradually increased. '}

{'ha': "Wadannan galibi ana alakanta su da Kasuwar Kayan Ruwan Huanan, wanda shima ya sayar da dabbobi masu rayuwa, kuma wata ka'ida ita ce cutar ta fito ne daga ɗayan nau'ikan dabbobi; ko, a takaice dai, yana da asalin zoonotic.An lura da tarin nimoniya wanda ba a sani ba a ranar 26 ga Disamba kuma likitan Zhang Jixian ya bayyana a Asibitin lardin Hubei, wanda ya sanar da CDC na Wuhan Jianghan a ranar 27 ga Disamba.", 'en': ' These were mostly linked to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, which also sold live animals, and one theory is that the virus came from one of these kinds of animals; or, in other words, has a zoonotic origin.A pneumonia cluster of unknown cause was observed on 26 December and treated by the doctor Zhang Jixian in Hubei Provincial Hospital, who informed the Wuhan Jianghan CDC on 27 December. '}

{'ha': 'A Ranar 30 ga Watan December, wata Kungiyyar likitoci A Asibitin Tsakiyyar Wuhan Sun Sanar Da Abokan aikin Su Akan “coronavirus mai kamar da-SARS.', 'en': ' On 30 December, a group of doctors at Wuhan Central Hospital alerted their colleagues of a "SARS-like coronavirus". '}

{'ha': "'Yan sanda sun kama takwas daga cikin likitocin, ciki har da Li Wenliang, saboda yada jita-jitar karya, sannan wasu manyan jami'anta, Ai Fen, sun tsawata mata game da batun kararrawa.", 'en': ' Eight of these doctors, including Li Wenliang, were admonished by the police for spreading false rumours, and another, Ai Fen, was reprimanded by her superiors for raising the alarm. '}

{'ha': 'Hukumar lafiya na alkaryar Wuhan daga baya ta sanar da jama’a ranar 31 ga watan Disemba tare da bayana ma hukumar WHO.', 'en': ' The Wuhan Municipal Health Commission later released a public notice on 31 December and informed the WHO. '}

{'ha': 'An bada rahoton yanayin da ba a ganewa ba da dama ga hukumomin kiwon lafiya a Wuhan don haifar da bincike a farkon watan Janairu. A yayin farkon lokacin barkewar cutar, adadin cutar yana ninka kamar kowace kwana bakwai da rabi a takaice.', 'en': ' Enough cases of unknown pneumonia had been reported to health authorities in Wuhan to trigger an investigation in early January.During the early stages of the outbreak, the number of cases doubled approximately every seven and a half days. '}

{'ha': 'A farkon da tsakiyar Janairu na 2020, cutar ta bazu zuwa wasu lardunan kasar Sin, da yin amfani da Sabuwar kasar Sin da Wuhan su zama tashar sufuri da kuma babbar musayar layin dogo.', 'en': ' In early and mid-January 2020, the virus spread to other Chinese provinces, helped by the Chinese New Year migration and Wuhan being a transport hub and major rail interchange. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 20 ga watan Janairu, kasar Sin ta ba da rahoton sabbin masu kamu da cutar kusan 140 a cikin kwana guda, wadanda suka hada da mutane biyu a nan Beijing da kuma daya a Shenzhen.', 'en': ' On 20 January, China reported nearly 140 new cases in one day, including two people in Beijing and one in Shenzhen. '}

{'ha': 'Bayanai daga baya sun nuna cewa mutane 6,174 sun kamu da alamun cutar a ranar 20 ga Janairu 2020. Tun daga ranar 26 ga Maris, Amurka ta mamaye China da Italiya tare da mafi yawan adadin lokuta da aka tabbatar a duniya. A cikin 9 Afrilu 2020, an bayar da rahoton fiye da miliyan 1.61 a duk duniya; mutane fiye da 97,000 sun mutu kuma sama da 364,000 sun murmure.', 'en': ' Later official data shows that 6,174 people had already developed symptoms by 20 January 2020.As of 26 March, the United States has overtaken China and Italy with the highest number of confirmed cases in the world.As of 9 April 2020, more than 1.61 million cases have been reported worldwide; more than 97,000 people have died and more than 364,000 have recovered. '}
{'ha': 'Akalla a samun mutum daya wanda ya kamu da cutar a kasashe 200 da yankuna.', 'en': ' Around 200 countries and territories have had at least one case. '}

{'ha': 'Saboda Annobar dake Europe, Kasahe da Dama dake karkashin Tsarin Schenghen sun Takaita Zirga-zirga domin Samar da Doka A Iyakokin.', 'en': ' Due to the pandemic in Europe, many countries in the Schengen Area have restricted free movement and set up border controls. '}

{'ha': 'Tunanin kasa ya hada da matakain ragewar cutan kamar kebe mutane don samun (wato umurnin zaman gida, wajajen mafaka, ko ma rufe gari) da ma dokar ta baci. A ranar 2 ga watan afrillu kusa mutane milliyan 300, ko kimanin kashi 90% na alumma, na kar kashi wata irin doka ta kulle a kasar amurka, fiye da mutane milliyan 50 na kulle a kasar phillipines, kusan mutane milliyan 59 na kulle a kasar africa ta kudu, da mutane billiyan 1.3 na fuskantar kulle a kasar india.', 'en': ' National reactions have included containment measures such as quarantines (known as stay-at-home orders, shelter-in-place orders, or lockdown) and curfews.As of 2 April, nearly 300 million people, or about 90% of the population, are under some form of lockdown in the United States, more than 50 million people are in lockdown in the Philippines, about 59 million people are in lockdown in South Africa, and 1.3 billion people are in lockdown in India. '}

{'ha': "26 ga watan Maris, mutane biliyan 1.7 a duk duniya sun kasance a cikin wasu nau'ikan kullewa, wanda ya karu zuwa mutane biliyan 2.6 a cikin kwana biyu - kusan kashi ɗaya cikin uku na yawan jama’ar duniya.", 'en': " On 26 March, 1.7 billion people worldwide were under some form of lockdown, which increased to 2.6 billion people two days later—around a third of the world's population. "}

{'ha': 'Mutumin Farko Da Aka samu Da Cutar COVID-19 An Bibiya Shi ranar 1 ga Watan December Na 2019 a Wuhan; A Wani Rahoto Mara Tabbaci An Ce Na Farokon Tun 17 ga Watan Nuwamba.', 'en': ' The first confirmed case of COVID-19 has been traced back to 1 December 2019 in Wuhan; one unconfirmed report suggests the earliest case was on 17 November. '}

{'ha': 'Likita Zhang Jixian ya lura da lura da taruwar alamar pneumonia mara asali wanda a 26 ga watan Disemba. Samun haka ya sanya asibitin ta ya sanar da hukumar dakile cututtuka masu yaduwa ta Wuhan Jianghan a ranar 27 ga watan Disemba.', 'en': ' Doctor Zhang Jixian observed a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 26 December, upon which her hospital informed Wuhan Jianghan CDC on 27 December. '}

{'ha': 'Gwajin Masarrafar kwayar hallita na farko na mara lafiya aka gudanar a 27 ga watan Disemba na 2019 ya nuna kasancewar kwayar cuta mai kama da SARS coronavirus.', 'en': ' Initial genetic testing of patient samples on 27 December 2019 indicated the presence of a SARS-like coronavirus. '}

{'ha': "An fitar da Sanarwa ta Jama'a baki daya daga Hukumar Lafiya na Wuhan A ranar 31 ga watan Disamba.", 'en': ' A public notice was released by Wuhan Municipal Health Commission on 31 December. '}
{'ha': 'An sanar da hukumar lafiya na duniya (WHO) a ranar.', 'en': ' The WHO was informed on the same day. '}

{'ha': 'Yayin da waɗannan sanarwar suka faru, \'yan sanda sun gargaɗi likitocin Wuhan game da "yada jita-jita" game da barakar.', 'en': ' As these notifications occurred, doctors in Wuhan were warned by police for "spreading rumours" about the outbreak. '}

{'ha': 'Hukumar lafiya ta kasar China a farko tayi ikirari cewa babu tabbaciyar matsaya na kamuwa tsakanin Mutum zuwa wani.', 'en': ' The Chinese National Health Commission initially claimed that there was no "clear evidence" of human-to-human transmission. '}

{'ha': 'A karshen watan Janairu, gwamnatin kasar Sin ta bullo da wani shiri na daga baya wanda babban sakataren jam\'iyyar kwaminis ta kasar Sin Xi Jinping ya bayyana a matsayin "yakin mutane" don shawo kan yaduwar cutar.', 'en': ' In late January, the Chinese government launched a radical campaign later described by the Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping as a "people\'s war" to contain the spread of the virus. '}

{'ha': 'A Abun da aka kimanta da Mafi Girman Kebe Alumma a Tarihin bil adama",a Cordon sanitaire an Sanar A Ranar 23 gawatan Junairu Hana tafiye-tafiye a Ciki da Wajen Wuhan, Wanda Bisani Aka Kara Da birane 15 a Hubei, Wanda ya Shafi mutane kimanin Miliyan 57.', 'en': ' In what has been described as "the largest quarantine in human history", a cordon sanitaire was announced on 23 January stopping travel in and out of Wuhan, which was extended to a total of 15 cities in Hubei, affecting a total of about 57 million people. '}
{'ha': 'An hana amfani da motoci mutane a cikin birni.', 'en': ' Private vehicle use was banned in the city. '}
{'ha': 'An soke bikin Sabuwar shekarar kasar Sin (25 Janairu) a wurare da yawa.', 'en': ' Chinese New Year (25 January) celebrations were cancelled in many places. '}

{'ha': 'Mahukuntan sun kuma ba da sanarwar gina wani asibiti na wucin gadi, asibitin Huoshenshan, wanda aka kammala cikin kwanaki 10.', 'en': ' The authorities also announced the construction of a temporary hospital, Huoshenshan Hospital, which was completed in 10 days. '}

{'ha': 'An kara gina wata asibitin bayan haka,  Asibitin Leishenshan, za su kula da karin marasa lafiya.', 'en': ' Another hospital was built afterwards, Leishenshan Hospital, to handle additional patients. '}

{'ha': 'Kari da sabbin asibitocin da aka gina, Sin ta mayar da wasu cibiyoyi 14 a Wuhan, kamar wuraren taron gasa da filin wasa, zuwa asibitoci na wucin gadi. A ranar 26 ga Janairu, gwamnatin ta kafa wasu matakai don dakile barkewar COVID-19, gami da bayar da sanarwar lafiyar matafiya da kuma tsawaita lokacin bikin bazara.', 'en': ' In addition to newly constructed hospitals, China also converted 14 other facilities in Wuhan, such as convention centers and stadiums, into temporary hospitals.On 26 January, the government instituted further measures to contain the COVID-19 outbreak, including issuing health declarations for travellers and extending the Spring Festival holiday. '}
{'ha': "Jami'oi da makarantu a fadin kasar suma a kulle suke.", 'en': ' Universities and schools around the country were also closed. '}

{'ha': 'Yankin Hong Kong da Macau sun dau matakai musamman na dangane da makarantu da jami’o’i.', 'en': ' The regions of Hong Kong and Macau instituted several measures, particularly in regard to schools and universities. '}
{'ha': 'An bullo da matakan aiki da yawa a yankuna da yawa na kasar Sin.', 'en': ' Remote working measures were instituted in several Chinese regions. '}
{'ha': 'A Saka ƙuntatawa Akan tafiye-tafiye A Ciki da wajen Hubei.', 'en': ' Travel restrictions were enacted in and outside of Hubei. '}
{'ha': 'An canza fasalin safarar jama’a tare da kulle wuraren tarihi na takaitaccen lokaci a China.', 'en': ' Public transport was modified, and museums throughout China were temporarily closed. '}

{'ha': 'An yi amfani da ikon motsi a cikin birane da yawa, kuma an kiyasta cewa kimanin mutane miliyan 760 (sama da rabin yawan jama\'a) sun fuskanci wani nau\'in dokar hana fita daga waje. Bayan barkewar cutar ta shiga matsayinta na duniya a watan Maris, hukumomin kasar Sin sun dauki tsauraran matakan. hana cutar daga "shigo da" daga wasu ƙasashe.', 'en': ' Control of public movement was applied in many cities, and it has been estimated that about 760 million people (more than half the population) faced some form of outdoor restriction.After the outbreak entered its global phase in March, Chinese authorities took strict measures to prevent the virus from "importing" from other countries. '}

{'ha': 'Misali, birnin Beijing ya sanya dokar hana fita ta kwanaki 14 ga duk matafiya na duniya da suka shiga cikin birnin. {'ha': 'A ranar 24 ga watan maris 2020, Firimiyar Sinawa Li Keqiang ya bada rahoto cewa an toshe yaduwar kamuwa da cutan da kuma an lura da barkewar a China.', 'en': ' On 24 March 2020, Chinese Premier Li Keqiang reported that the spread of domestically transmitted cases has been basically blocked and the outbreak has been controlled in China. '}

{'ha': "Gwamnatin kasar Sin ta karfafawa 'yan kasuwa da masana'antu damar sake budewa a ranar 30 ga Maris, tare da samar da kayan tallafin kudi don kamfanonin.Gwamnatin kasar ta ba da sanarwar ranar juyayin da za a fara daga wani yanayi na mintuna uku na kasa da karfe 10:00 4 ga Afrilu, a hade tare da bikin Qingming, kodayake gwamnatin tsakiya ta nemi iyalai don biyan bukatunsu ta hanyar layi don kiyaye damuwa ta jiki kamar gujewa sake bullar cutar COVID-19.", 'en': ' The Chinese government encouraged businesses and factories to re-open on 30 March, and provided monetary stimulus packages for firms.The State Council declared a day of mourning to begin with a national three-minute moment of silence on 10:00 4 April, coinciding with Qingming Festival, although the central government asked families to pay their respects online in observance of physical distancing as to avoid a renewed COVID-19 outbreak. '}

{'ha': 'An tabbatar da cewa COVID-19 ya bazu zuwa Koriya ta Kudu a ranar 20 ga Janairu 2020 daga China.', 'en': ' COVID-19 was confirmed to have spread to South Korea on 20 January 2020 from China. '}

"}

'}

{'ha': 'An kuma shafi tsarin jigilar sufurin jiragen sama kuma saboda haka an canza su.South Korea ta gabatar da abin da ake ganin shi ne mafi girma kuma mafi kyawun tsari a duniya don duba yawan mutanen da ke dauke da kwayar cutar, da kuma ware duk wani da ya kamu da cutar da kuma gano wadanda suka tuntube su. .', 'en': ' Airline schedules were also affected and therefore they were changed.South Korea introduced what was considered the largest and best-organized programme in the world to screen the population for the virus, and isolate any infected people as well as tracing and quarantining those who contacted them. {'ha': 'Hanyar gwajin ya kunshi kai kara na dole na nuna alamu daga baki masu shigowa daga kasar waje ta hanyar na’urar waya. Akwai kuma gwajin bi-ta-mota wanda ana iya samun sakamakon ta washe gari. Wannan na daga cikin matakin rage yaduwar kwayar cutar.', 'en': ' Beginning on 15 March, many businesses closed or reduced hours throughout the U.S. to try to reduce the spread of the virus. '}

'}

{'ha': "A ranar 25 ga watan Maris, gwamnan ya ce an cimma nisantawar jama'a, yadda kimanin yaduwar cutan wanda ya hau yana fadiwa daga kwanaki 2.0 zuwa 4.7.", 'en': ' On 25 March, the governor said that social distancing seemed to be working, as estimates of case doubling slowed from 2.0 days to 4.7 days. '}

{'ha': 'A gameda rahoton yan jarida na ranar 30 ga watan maris shuga Trump na anurka ya kara wa’adin dokar bada tazara zuwa 30 ga watan afrilu.', 'en': ' Per media reports on 30 March, U.S. President Trump has decided to extend social distancing guidelines until 30 April. '}

{'ha': "A ranar 3 ga watan Afrilu, Amurka ta sami rikodin mutuwar 884 sakamakon ƙwayar cuta a cikin sa'o'i 24.", 'en': ' On 3 April, the U.S. had a record 884 deaths due to the coronavirus in a 24-hour period. '}

{'ha': 'Gabaɗaya amincewar da gwamnatin Trump ta yi game da rikicin ya kasance an ba da izini ta hanyar ɓangarori daban-daban.', 'en': " Overall approval of Trump's management of the crisis has been polarized along partisan lines. "}

{'ha': 'Ya ce har yanzu ba a gano abubuwa da yawa game da COVID-19 ba, kuma Australiya za ta jaddada ikon kan iyaka da sadarwa a cikin martanin ta game da cutar.', 'en': ' It stated that much was yet to be discovered about COVID-19, and that Australia would emphasize border control and communication in its response to the pandemic. {'ha': 'Ranar 11 ga watan Febreru wani jirgi dake dauke da yan kasar Canada guda 185 daga birnin Wuhan ya sauka a filin jirgi na CFB Trenton.', 'en': ' On 11 February, another plane of 185 Canadians from Wuhan landed at CFB Trenton. '}

{'ha': 'Ma’aikatan Australia sun kubutar da yan kasar su 277 tsakanin ranar 3 da 4 na watan February zuwa tsangayar Christmas Island wanda aka gyara musamman domin killace jama’a. an killace su har tsawon kwana 14.', 'en': ' Australian authorities evacuated 277 citizens on 3 and 4 February to the Christmas Island Detention Centre, which had been repurposed as a quarantine facility, where they remained for 14 days. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 20 ga Maris, Amurka ta fara cire dakarunta daga Iraki sakamakon kamuwa da annoban.', 'en': ' On 20 March, the United States began to partially withdrawal its troops from Iraq due to the pandemic. '}

{'ha': "A ranar 5 ga Fabrairu, ma'aikatar harkokin waje ta kasar Sin ta bayyana cewa, kasashe 21 (ciki har da Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad da Tobago, Egypt, da Iran) sun aika da taimako ga kasar Sin.", 'en': ' On 5 February, the Chinese foreign ministry stated that 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt, and Iran) had sent aid to China. '}

{'ha': "Wasu daliban Sinawa a jami'o'in Amurka sun hadu tare don taimakawa kan aika da taimako ga sassan kasar Sin da kwayar cutar ta kashe, tare da wata rukunin hadin gwiwa a cikin babban yankin Chicago da aka bayar da rahoton cewa za su tura mashin 50,000 na N95 zuwa asibitoci a lardin Hubei a ranar 30 ga Janairu. Kungiyar ba da agaji ta jin kai ta kai tsaye, tare da hadin gwiwar FedEx, sun tura kayan rufe fuska 200,000 tare da sauran kayan kariya na sirri, gami da safofin hannu da kayan kwalliya, ta hanyar saukar jiragen sama na gaggawa zuwa Asibitin Wuhan a ranar 30 ga Janairu.", 'en': ' Some Chinese students at American universities joined together to help send aid to virus-stricken parts of China, with a joint group in the greater Chicago area reportedly managing to send 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in the Hubei province on 30 January.The humanitarian aid organization Direct Relief, in coordination with FedEx, sent 200,000 face masks along with other personal protective equipment, including gloves and gowns, by emergency airlift to the Wuhan Union Hospital by 30 January. '}

'}

{'ha': 'A ranar 19 ga watan febrairu, kungiyar agaji ta Red Cross ta kasar Singapore ta ba da sanarwar cewa, za ta aika wa kasar Sin taimakon miliyan 2.26.', 'en': ' On 19 February, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send $2.26 million worth of aid to China. '}

{'ha': 'Kasar Japan ta ba da abin rufe fuska miliyan daya ga Wuhan, Turkiyya ta tura kayan aikin likita, Rasha ta tura kayan agaji sama da tan 13 ga kasar Wuhan, Malaysia ta sanar da ba da gudummawar safar magunguna miliyan 18 ga kasar Sin, kasar ta Jamus ta ba da kayayyakin jinya daban-daban ciki har da rigar Hazmat 10,000, da kuma Kasar Amurka ta bayar da gudummawar tan ton 17.8 na kayayyakin kiwon lafiya ga kasar Sin, kuma ta yi alkawarin karin dala miliyan $100 na tallafin kudi ga kasashen da abin ya shafa.Bayan da yanayin da ake ciki a kasar Sin da alama ya daidaita, kasar tana ta aike da taimako zuwa ga kasashe daban-daban da suka kamu da annoban.', 'en': ' Japan donated one million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey dispatched medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tonnes of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced a donation of 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany delivered various medical supplies including 10,000 Hazmat suits, and the United States donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and promised an additional $100 million in financial support to affected countries.After cases in China seemed to stabilize, the country has been sending aid to various nations hit by the pandemic. '}

{'ha': 'A Watan Maris, China, Cuba, Rasha Sun Tura Kayayyaki da Maiakatan Lafiya Don Taimakawa Italiya Shawo kan yaduwan Cutar Coronavirus.', 'en': ' In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to help Italy deal with its coronavirus outbreak. '}

{'ha': 'Dan kasuwa Jack Ma ya aika da kayan gwaji miliyan 1.1, abin rufe fuska miliyan 6, da kuma rigar kariya 60,000 zuwa Addis Ababa, Habasha domin Kungiyar Tarayyar Afirka ta rarraba.', 'en': ' Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, and 60,000 protective suits to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia for distribution by the African Union. '}

{'ha': 'Daga baya ya tura kayan gwaji 5000, abin rufe fuska 100,000 da kuma na’uran bada iska guda 5 zuwa Panama.', 'en': ' He later sent 5,000 testing kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama. '}

{'ha': "Ma ya ba da gudummawar magunguna ga Kanada.The Netherlands, Spain, Turkiya, Georgia, da Czech Republic sun nuna damuwarsu game da abubuwan rufe fuska da na'urorin gwaji.", 'en': ' Ma also donated medical supplies to Canada.The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, and the Czech Republic expressed their concerns over Chinese-made masks and test kits. '}

'}

{'ha': 'Hukumar ta WHO ta yaba da kokarin hukumomin kasar Sin wajen shawo kan shawo kan cutar.', 'en': ' The WHO has commended the efforts of Chinese authorities in managing and containing the epidemic. '}

{'ha': 'WHO ta lura da sabanin da ke tsakanin barkewar SARS a 2002 - 2004, inda aka zargi hukumomin China da tona asirin da ke kawo cikas ga kokarin kare da hana kokarin, da rikicin yanzu inda gwamnatin tsakiya "ta samar da sabuntawa na yau da kullun don guje wa fargaba kafin hutun sabuwar shekara." .', 'en': ' The WHO noted the contrast between the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak, where Chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that impeded prevention and containment efforts, and the current crisis where the central government "has provided regular updates to avoid panic ahead of Lunar New Year holidays". '}

{'ha': 'A 23 ga watan Janairu a yayin da yake mayar da martani game da matakin hana safara da hukumomin tsakiya suka dauka jami’in hukumar WHO Gauden Galea ya furta cewa “ A gaskiya wannan bata daga cikin shawara da WHO ta bada” kuma “ Matakin ne babba na jawo bala’in inda tafi taruwa. yace hakan hatsari ne a tarihin kiwon lafiya. Bayan tabbatuwar kamuwa da cutar tsakina mutum da mutum a 30 ga watan Janairu a wajen China tare da karuwar adadin wadanda suka kamu da cutar a sauran kasashe hukumar WHO ta kaddamar da barkewar a matsayin lamari na samar da lafiyar jama’a gaggawa wanda ta shafi kasashe, wannan shina kaddamarwa na shida bayan na farkon da ya faru yayin da aka samu barkewar annobar cutar swine Flu na shakarar 2009.', 'en': ' On 23 January, in reaction to the central authorities\' decision to implement a transportation ban in Wuhan, WHO representative Gauden Galea remarked that while it was "certainly not a recommendation the WHO has made", it was also "a very important indication of the commitment to contain the epidemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history".On 30 January, following confirmation of human-to-human transmission outside China and the increase in the number of cases in other countries, the WHO declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), the sixth PHEIC since the measure was first invoked during the 2009 swine flu pandemic. '}

{'ha': 'Babban direkta na hukumar WHO Tedros Adhanom yace an kaddamar da ita a matsayin bayar da lafiya ga jama’a na gaggawa wanda ta shafi kasashe bisa ga illar yaduwar ta musamman ga kasashe masu karancin tattalin arziki da kuma cibiyoyi neman lafiya nagari.', 'en': ' WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom said that the PHEIC was due to "the risk of global spread, especially to low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems. '}

{'ha': 'Cikin martanin sa game da matakin takaita tafiya Tedros ya sanar cewa “ Babu bukatar kaddamar da mataki wanda ke haifar da katsalanda da kasuwanci da tafiya kasashen waje. Ya kuma kara da cewa hukumar WHO bata bada shawarar tak, aita kasuwanci da kuma zirga-zirga.', 'en': ' In response to the implementations of travel restrictions, Tedros stated that "there is no reason for measures that unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and that the "WHO doesn\'t recommend limiting trade and movement." '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 5 ga Fabrairu, Hukumar ta WHO ta yi kira ga kasashen duniya kan dala miliyan $675 don ba da gudummawar shirin a kasashe masu karamin tatalin arziki, tare da yin kira da a gaggauta tallafawa wadancan kasashen da “ba su da tsarin a wurin don gano mutanen da suka kamu da kwayar cutar , ko da kuwa zai fito ne”.', 'en': ' On 5 February, the WHO appealed to the global community for a $675 million contribution to fund strategic preparedness in low-income countries, citing the urgency to support those countries which "do not have the systems in place to detect people who have contracted the virus, even if it were to emerge". '}

{'ha': 'Tedros ya kara bayyanawa cewa “muna da karfi gwargwadon mahadi mafi rauni”, tare da yin kira ga sauran kasashen duniya da su dauki na gaggawa domin magance sakamako mara dadi nan gaba. A ranar 11 ga watan Febreru hukumar WHO a wata zantarwa da tayi da manema labarai ta kaddamar da COVID-19 a matsayin sunan cutar.', 'en': ' Tedros further made statements declaring that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later".On 11 February, the WHO in a press conference established COVID-19 as the name of the disease. '}

{'ha': 'A rana daya, Tedros ya sanar da cewa babban Sakataren majalissar dinkin duniya UN Antonio Gueterres ya yarda zai samar da “ikon dukkan tsarin UN a cikin martani”.', 'en': ' On the same day, Tedros stated that UN Secretary-General António Guterres had agreed to provide the "power of the entire UN system in the response". '}

{'ha': 'An tayar da Kwamitin Gudanar da Rikicin Majalisar Dinkin Duniya wato UN Crisis Management Team a sakamakon, an ba da izinin daidaitawar amsan dukkan Majalisar Dinkin Duniya, wanda ƙasashen WHO za su ba su damar "mai da hankali kan amsar kiwon lafiya yayin da sauran hukumomin za su iya kawo ƙwarewar su don tallafawa mafi yawan zamantakewar al\'umma, tattalin arziki, da cigaban nuna yada yaduwar annobar ta ke ".', 'en': ' A UN Crisis Management Team was activated as a result, allowing coordination of the entire United Nations response, which the WHO states will allow them to "focus on the health response while the other agencies can bring their expertise to bear on the wider social, economic and developmental implications of the outbreak". '}

{'ha': 'A anar 14 ga Watan Faburairu, wani Gammayar Kungiyar WHO MaI Jagoranci Da Wasu Yan China Aka Fitar Don Samar Da Kwarewa A Kasar China Domin Tallafin Cikun gida Na Gano “Tsananin da Ma Yaduwar Cutar” Ta Hanyar Daukan nauyin Taruka da Koyarwa Tare Da Hukumomin Kasa Na Mussaman Da kuma Su Ziyarci Alumma Don Tabatar da “ayukan agaji Da Ke Gudana a Yankunan Da Matakin Kauyuka, Daga Birni har ma da karkara a ranar”. A ranar 25 ga Watan faburairu, WHO Ta Sanar Cewa “Duniya Ta kokari ta Shirya ga Barkewar Amobar Coronavirus mai yiwuwa,” Da cewa tun Da Cutar Ba ta kai matakin Annoba Ba, Amman Kasashe “su Fara Shiri Don Kar Ko Ta Baci”.', 'en': ' On 14 February, a WHO-led Joint Mission Team with China was activated to provide international and WHO experts on the ground in China to assist in the domestic management and evaluate "the severity and the transmissibility of the disease" by hosting workshops and meetings with key national-level institutions and to conduct field visits to assess the "impact of response activities at provincial and county levels, including urban and rural settings".On 25 February, the WHO declared that "the world should do more to prepare for a possible coronavirus pandemic," stating that while it was still too early to call it a pandemic, countries should nonetheless be "in a phase of preparedness". '}

{'ha': 'Don kawo karshen barkewar cutar yayin da take yaduwa hukumar WHO ta tuwa tawaga ta musamman domin yin duba. A 28 ga watan Febreru jami’an WHO sun bayyana cewa hadarin coronavirus idan aka makala ta ga matakin duniya zata haura matuka haka zai zamanto kololuwar halin takatsantsan.', 'en': ' In response to a developing outbreak in Iran, the WHO sent a Joint Mission Team there to assess the situation.On 28 February, WHO officials said that the coronavirus threat assessment at the global level would be raised from "high" to "very high", its highest level of alert and risk assessment. '}

{'ha': 'Mike Ryan, darektan zartarwa na shirin kiwon lafiya na WHO, ya yi gargadin a cikin wata sanarwa cewa, "Wannan bincike ne na gaskiya ga kowace gwamnati a duniyar nan: Farka.', 'en': ' Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO\'s health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "This is a reality check for every government on the planet: Wake up. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan kwayar cutar na iya kasancewa a kan hanyarta kuma kuna buƙatar kasancewa a shirye, "suna kira cewa matakan da suka dace na iya taimakawa duniya su guji" mafi munin ta ".', 'en': ' This virus may be on its way and you need to be ready," urging that the right response measures could help the world avoid "the worst of it". '}

{'ha': 'Ryan Ya cigaba da Cewa Wannan Bayanai Na Yanzu Bai ba wa Jami’an kiwon lafiya Su Tabbatar Da Cutar A Matsayin Annoba A Duniya ba, Cewa Wannan sanarwa Na Nufin “musamman muna yarda cewa ko wane mutun a Duniya Na Fuskantar Barazanar Daukar Wannan Cuta”.', 'en': ' Ryan further stated that the current data did not warrant public health officials to declare a global pandemic, saying that such a declaration would mean "we\'re essentially accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to that virus." '}
{'ha': 'WHO ta kaddamar da barkewar cutar Korona a matsayin annoba a ranar 11 ga watan Maris.', 'en': ' On 11 March, the WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic. '}

{'ha': 'Tasirin ta ga fanin safara ta hanya ruwa ta haura zuwa mataki wanda ba’a taba samu ba a fannin', 'en': ' The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before. '}
{'ha': 'Yawancin tashoshin Jirgin Kasa Da Na Jiragen ruwa su Ma Rufe Su.', 'en': ' Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed. '}

{'ha': 'Aukuwar annobar ta faru ne lokaci guda da bikin Chunyun. Wato bikin hutu na farin cikin shiga sabuwar shekara.', 'en': ' The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday. '}

{'ha': "Da dama daga cikin gwamnatocin jihohi da na yanki sun soke abubuwa da yawa da suka hada da taron jama'a, wadanda suka hada da bikin Sabuwar shekara, tare da kamfanoni masu zaman kansu su rufe shagunansu da wuraren shakatawa irin su Hong Kong Disneyland da Shanghai Disneyland.", 'en': ' A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland. '}

'}

"}
{'ha': 'Wadanan yankuna sun wakilta kashi 80% na tattalin arziki kasa wato GDP da cinikin waje kashi 90%.', 'en': " These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports. "}

'}
{'ha': 'Ziyara ga kananan yan kasuwa ta ragu a Turai da yanki Amurka na Latin ga kashi 40%.', 'en': ' Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%. '}

{'ha': "Ma'aikata kantin sayar da kayayyaki a duk duniya sun sanya karin matakan, irin wannan karuwar tsafta, shigar da na'urar sikirin na daskararru don duba zafin jiki na masu siyayya, da kuma soke abubuwan da suka faru.Bayan da kidayar Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ta Latin Amurka ta kiyasta cewa, annobar ta barke tsakanin mutane miliyan 14 zuwa 22 cikin matsanancin talauci a Latin Amurka fiye da yadda za ta kasance a wannan yanayin in ba tare da cutar ba.", 'en': ' Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic. {'ha': 'A watan Janairu da Fabrairu na 2020, a yayin da cutar ta bulla a Wuhan, mutane miliyan 5 na kasar Sin sun rasa rayyukansu.', 'en': ' In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs. '}

'}

{'ha': 'A Maris 2020, a Duniya Da kewaye, gidajen Tarihi, dakunan karatu, Dandalin wassani, Da Wajen Bukukuwa na Gargajiyya, An Rufe Su Dindindin Da Alamuran Su Kamar nishadi da Ma Bikin Wasu An Soke Zwasu kuma An Dage.', 'en': ' By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed. {'ha': 'A cikin martanin da aka samu akwai kokarin da ake yi na samar da wasu ayyukan ta hanyar dandamali na dijital. '}

{'ha': 'Yana neman "E" wanda aka raba ta duk beta coronaviruses, da kuma RdRp takamaiman kwayar halita ga SARS-CoV-2. A kasar Sin, kungiyar BGI ta kasance daya daga cikin kamfanoni na farko da suka samu amincewar amfani da gaggawa daga Hukumar Kula da Lafiya ta Kasar don PCS-CoV-2 gano kayan kitse-A Amurka, Cibiyar Kula da Cututtukan (CDC) tana rarraba kan ta sabuwar Coronavirus-2019 (2019-nCoV) Lokaci-Kai Tsaye RT-PCR Binciken Cibiyoyin lafiya ga wurin gwajin lafiyar jama\'a ta hanyar International Reagent Resource.', 'en': ' It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China\'s National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource. '}

{'ha': 'Daya daga cikin kwayoyin gwajin na da wanda ya zama ba cikakkeba saboda matsala mahadi kuma a bakin kwalbar gwajin ta CDD a Atlanta; wannan ya kawo kusan samfuri 100 wanda sukai daidai a cikin watan Febrairu 2020.', 'en': ' One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020. '}

{'ha': 'Amfani da abun gwaji biyu bai nuna inganci ba har 28 Febrairu 2020, kuma har sai sanda aka ba jihohi da dakin gwaji damar yin gwaji.', 'en': ' Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing. '}

{'ha': 'An samu yarda gwajin ne da ga hukumar abinci da magunguna karkashin bangaren gudanarwa ta gaggawa. dakin gwaji na kudin a US sun fara gwajin a farko Maris 2020.', 'en': ' The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 5 ga watan Maris 2020 LabCorp ta bada sanarwar samun gwaji daga cutar COVID-19 a kasa gaba daya wanda ya danganta ga RT-PCR.', 'en': ' As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR. '}

{'ha': 'Quest Diagnostics wanda aka yi iri daya a duk fadin kasa akwai gwajin COVID-19 daga ranar 9 ga watan Maris 2020', 'en': ' Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020. '}

{'ha': 'Ba a sanar da babu iyakar yawan ba, samfurin da aka dauka kuma an yi aiki da su dole ne a yi shi ta hanyar yadda CDC suke bukata', 'en': ' No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements. '}

{'ha': 'A kasar Rasha an haɓaka gwajin COVID-19 kuma Binciken Jihar ne wato State Research na Virology da Biotechnolgy VECTOR suka sarrafa.', 'en': ' In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 11 ga watan Febrairu 2020 gwajin da aka shigar daga Federal Service for Surveilance a bangaren kiwon lafiya. A ranar 12 ga watan Maris 2020, Asibitin Mayo sun ruwaito cewa akwai tsarin gwajin ciwon COVID-19. A ranar 13 ga watan Maris 2020, Roche Diagnostics sun samu yardar FDA don yin gwajin da za’a yi cikin awanni 3.5 mafi yawa, duk da cewa zasu bar na’ura tayi gwajin kusan 4,128 a cikin sa’a 24', 'en': ' On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 19 Maris 2020, FDA ta ba da izini na amfani da gaggawa (EUA) ga Abbott Laboratories don gwaji akan tsarin m2000 na Abbott; FDA ta ba da izini iri ɗaya ga Hologic, LabCorp, da kuma Thermo Fisher Scientific.', 'en': " On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific. "}
