{'ha': 'A ranar 21 ga watan Maris 2020, Cepheid ya karɓi EUA daga FDA don gwaji da zai dauki mintuna 45.', 'en': ' On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes. '}

{'ha': 'FDA ta amince da wani gwajin da ke amfani da fasahar fadadarwa ruwan yacid isothermal nucleic a maimakon PCR.', 'en': ' The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR. '}

{'ha': 'Tunda wannan baya bukatar wani tsarin yanayi to hanyar ka iya haifar da sakamon tabbarwa mai yan mintuna biyar kuma sakamakon rashin tabbas cikin mintuna 13.', 'en': ' Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes. '}

{'ha': 'Ayanzu haka akwai kimanin 18,000 na nairan nan a US kuma Abbott na saran cewa za’a kara samar da gwajin 50,000 a rana. Gwajin da ke dauke da garkuwan jiki na monoclonal wanda ke gusar da nucleacapsid protein (N Protein) na cibiyar korona virus ana hadashi a Taiwan, tare da tsammanin cewa ai iya bada sakamako cikin mintuna15 zuwa 20 kamar ciwon mura mai hauhawa.', 'en': ' There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test. '}

{'ha': 'Wani bita da aka yi game da wallafe-wallafen Maris na 2020 ya kammala cewa "hotunan rediyo na kirji ba su da ƙima sosai game da ganewar asali a farkon matakai, alhali CT [ƙididdigar tomography] binciken na iya kasancewa har ma kafin bayyanar cututtuka. "', 'en': ' A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset." '}

{'ha': 'Sanene Sifofin CT sun hada da bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities da periheral, asymmetric da rarrabawar posterior.', 'en': ' Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution. '}

{'ha': 'yada cutar ke fitowa an haɓaka mamayewar Subpleural, tsagewar fata wato crazy paving da karfafawa.', 'en': ' Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves. '}

{'ha': 'Binciken gwajin PCR zuwa CT cikin Wuhan a matsayin asalin annoban ta yanzu ya nuna cewa CT ya fi kamuwa fiye da PCR, kodayake ba shi da takamaiman bayani, da yawancin fasahar hoto wanda ke hade da wasu cututtukan huhu da tafiyar matakai na cuta.', 'en': ' A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes. '}

{'ha': 'A watan Maris shekarar 2020. Kolejin Daukar Hoton Jiki na Amurka wato American college of Radiology ta bada shawaran cewa ayi kada a yi amfani da CT wajen gwajin farkon COVID-19". A watan Maris 2020, CDC ta bada shawarar yin amfani da PCR domin gwajin farko.', 'en': ' As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening. '}

{'ha': 'Bangaren garkuwan jiki dake kariya daga cutar shine a habakar da garkuwar jiki wanda suka hada da Igm da IgG.', 'en': ' Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG. '}

{'ha': 'Za a iya amfani da su domin gano mutanen da suka kamu da cutar wanda ya fara daga kwana 7 ko haka bayan farin alamar cutan, domin gano da kariya, da kuma kiyaye da yawan jama’a. Za a iya amfani da Assays cikin dakin gwaji (CLT) ko ta gwajin point-of-care (PoCT).', 'en': ' These can be used to detect infection in individuals starting 7 days or so after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity, and in population surveillance.Assays can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT). '}

{'ha': 'Na’urar sanya aiki da kai wato high-throughput cikin dakin gwajin asibitoci da yawa can iya aikata wadanan gwaje-gwajen amma samun su zai danganta ga nawa ake samarwa ga ko wace na’ura.', 'en': ' The high-throughput automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system. '}

{'ha': "Don CLT samfurin guda ɗaya na jini na gefe wanda aka saba amfani dashi, kodayake za'a iya amfani da samfuran na yauda kullun don bibiyar maganin rigakafi.", 'en': ' For CLT a single specimen of peripheral blood is commonly used, although serial specimens can be used to follow the immune response. '}
{'ha': 'PoCT samfurin jini daya na jini akan debane ta hanyar huda fata.', 'en': ' For PoCT a single specimen of blood is usually obtained by skin puncture. '}

{'ha': 'Ba kamar da hanyoyin PCR ba a buƙatar matakin haɓaka kafin assay ba. A ranar 26 ga watan Maris, 2020, FDA ta bawa mutane 29 damar bada sanarwa ga hukuma kamar yadda ake buƙata kuma a yanzu suna da ikon rarraba gwajin garkuwar jikin su.', 'en': ' Unlike PCR methods an extraction step is not needed before assay.On March 26, 2020, the FDA named 29 entities that provided notification to the agency as required and are now therefore able to distribute their antibody tests. '}

{'ha': 'FDA sun amince gwaji a watan Aprilu 7 2020, a karkashin amfanin gaggawar izini a karshen watan Maris 2020. Euriommum Medical Laboratory Diagnostics da Epitope Diagnostics sun samu Yardar European domin kayan gajin su wanda zai iya gano IgG da igAna garkuwan jiki akan kwayar cutar a samfurin jini.', 'en': ' As of April 7, 2020, only a single test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approvals for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples. '}

{'ha': 'Yanayin girman gwajin yana da yawan darukan samfuri cikin awanni kuma na da sauri sosai fiye da PCR assay na viral RNA wanda aka saba.', 'en': ' The testing capacity is several hundred samples within hours and therefore much faster than the conventional PCR assay of viral RNA. '}

{'ha': 'Ana iya gano garkuwan jikin kwana 14 bayan farawar cutan. A farkon watan Afrilu, kasar UK ba ta sami wani abun gwajin garkuwan jikin da aka saya da amfani ba.', 'en': ' The antibodies are usually detectable 14 days after the onset of the infection.In early April, the UK found none of the antibody test kits it purchased were sufficiently good to use. '}

{'ha': 'Hong Kong ta tsara wata makirci inda wadanda ake gani suna da cutar kan zauna a gida, "sashen gaggawa za su bada bututun samfuri wa marasa lafiyan", za su tofa miyau ciki, tura shi wurin su kuma a sami sakamakon gwajin nan gaba. NHS na Birtaniya sun sanar da makirci gwajin farko domin gwajin wadanda ake ganin suna da cutan a gida, wanda ya cire hadarin yaduwar cutan daga marasa lafiyan zuwa wasu idan suka zo asibitin ko ta wurin wankewar kwayar cutan daga motar daukan gawa wato ambulance idan an yi amfani da ita. A ta wuring gwajin COVID-19 na kowa ga wadanda ake zaton sun kamu da cutar, kwarare ma’aikatar kiwon lafiya zai dauke samfurin ta wuring yin amfani da ko wande irin matakan kariya.', 'en': ' Hong Kong has set up a scheme where suspected patients can stay home, "emergency department will give a specimen tube to the patient", they spit into it, send it back and get a test result a while after.The British NHS has announced that it is piloting a scheme to test suspected cases at home, which removes the risk of a patient infecting others if they come to a hospital or having to disinfect an ambulance if one is used.In drive-through testing for COVID-19 for suspected cases, a healthcare professional takes sample using appropriate precautions. '}

{'ha': 'Wuraren gwajin da suke kusa sun taimaka ma Kasar Korea ta Kudu yin gwaji mai sauri da tsada a kowace kasa. A Jamus, likitoci a National Association of Statutory Health Insurance sun ce a rana 2 ga watan Maris, cewa suna da damar yin gwaji guda 12,000 a rana a tsarin kuma 10.700 aka gada a makon da ya gabata.', 'en': ' Drive-through centers have helped South Korea do some of the fastest, most-extensive testing of any country.In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on 2 March, that it had a capacity for about 12,000 tests per day in the ambulatory setting and 10.700 had been tested in the prior week. '}
{'ha': 'Farashin wajen Ma’aikatan inshora lokacinda likita ya odar yin gwajin.', 'en': ' Costs are borne by the health insurance when the test is ordered by a physician. '}

{'ha': 'Bisa ga shugaban makarantar Robert Koch, Jamaus yana da karfin iya gwajin 160,000 a mako guda.', 'en': ' According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has an overall capacity for 160,000 tests per week. '}
{'ha': 'Daga ranar 19 ga watan Mari anyi gwajin mai yawa a manyan birane.', 'en': ' As of 19 March drive in tests were offered in several large cities. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 26 ga watan Mari 2020 an samu adadin lambar gwajin da aka yi a Jamus ba’a san su ba, sai dai kawi wanda aka sani sun kamu da cutar.', 'en': ' As of 26 March 2020 the total number of tests performed in Germany was unknown, because only positive results are reported. '}

{'ha': 'Binciken farko na dakin gwaji sun tabbatar da cewa a makon 12/2020 an gwada samfuri kimanin 483,295 har zuwa hade da makon 12/2020 da kuma samfuri 33.491 (kashi 6.9 bisa dari) wanda ya nuna akwai SARS-COV-2. A Isra’ila, masu bincike a Technion da Asibitin Rambam sun habaka da kuma yin wani salon gwajin don gwajin samfuri daga masu jinya 64 atare, ta hanyar gwajin samfurin da tabbatar da cewa hadadden samfurin ne kawai ya tabbata. A Wuhan an samu kimanin 2000-sq-meter a dakin gwaji na gaggawa wanda ake kira ‘’Huo-Yan’’ (da China: 火眼, ko "Fire Eye" a turance) wanda BGI suka budeshi a ranar 5 February 2020, wanda zai iya yin gwajin samfuri kimanin 10.000 a rana.', 'en': ' A first lab survey revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested up to and including week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the samples and only testing further if the combined sample is found to be positive.In Wuhan a makeshift 2000-sq-meter emergency detection laboratory named "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, which can process over 10,000 samples a day. '}

{'ha': 'Tare da mai lura da ginin wato mai kafa BGI Wang Jian wanda ya dauka kwanaki 5, gwajin ta nuna akwai mai kamu da cutar a Hubei da zai fi kashi 47% da kuma daidai kudin da za a kashe domin kebewa da zai ninka kudin sau biyu inda yawan gwajin bai za kan layi ba.', 'en': " With the construction overseen by BGI-founder Wang Jian and taking 5-days, modelling has show cases in Hubei would have been 47% higher and the corresponding cost of the tackling the quarantine would have doubled if this testing capacity hadn't come on line. "}

{'ha': 'Dakin gwajin Wuhan wanda dakin gwajin Hou-Yan ke bi a Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijin, da Shanghai a cikin dukan birane 12 a kewayar kasar Sin.', 'en': ' The Wuhan Laboratory has been promptly followed by Huo-Yan labs in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, in a total of 12 cities across China. '}

{'ha': 'A ranar 4 a watan Maris 2020 dukan gwajin ko wace rana sun kai 50,000. Origami Assays sun zana kuma sun saki Tushen budewa wato Open Source, Multilexed an saki su domin gwajin samfurin wadanda suka kamu da COVID19 dayawa kamar guda 1122 ta yin amfani da assays 93 ba tare da bukatar ruwan robotic handlers ba.', 'en': ' By 4 March 2020 the daily throughput totals were 50,000 tests per day.Open source, multiplexed designs released by Origami Assays have been released that can test as many as 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 assays .  These balanced designs can be run in small laboratories without the need for robotic liquid handlers. '}

{'ha': 'A watan Maris, karanci da rashin mahadin gwaji (reagent) ya hana yin gawji da yawa a kasashen turai (EU) da kuma UK da kasar Amurka.', 'en': ' By March, shortages and insufficient amounts of reagent has become a bottleneck for mass testing in the EU and UK and the US. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan ya sanya wasu marubuta su karanci shiryawar samfurin tsarin aikin wanda ya hada da dumawar samfuri a 98 °C (208 °F) na mintuna 5 don fitar da RNA genomes don karin gwajin. A ranar 31 ga watan Maris aka sanar cewa hadaddiyar daular larabawa sun fara gwajin coronavirus a cikin yawan jama’ar ta fiye da kowace kasa, kuma suna kan kokari domin kara yawan gwajin domin kai ga dukan yawan jama’a.', 'en': ' This has led some authors to explore sample preparation protocols that involve heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to release RNA genomes for further testing.On 31 March it was announced United Arab Emirates was now testing more of its population for Coronavirus per head than any other country, and was on track to scale up the level of testing to reach the bulk of the population. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan ya kasance ta hanyar haɗuwar karfin gwajin shiga wato drive-through, sayan na’uran gwajin population-scale mass-throughput daga kungiya 42 da BGI (bisa ga “Huo-Yan” dakunan gwajin ganowar gaggwa cikin kasar Sin).', 'en': ' This was through a combination of drive-through capability, and purchasing a population-scale mass-throughput laboratory from Group 42 and BGI (based on their "Huo-Yan" emergency detection laboratories in China). '}

{'ha': 'An gina shi a kwana 14, dakin gwajin zai iya gudanar da gwaji dubu goma Na RT-PCR a rana kuma shine na farko da yake aiki a wajen kasar sin.', 'en': ' Constructed in 14 days, the lab is capable of conducting tens of thousands RT-PCR tests per day and is the first in the world of this scale to be operational outside of China. '}

{'ha': 'Kayayyakin gwaji daban-daban na sasan kwayoyin halitar coronavirus an haɓaka su a kasar Sin, Faransa, Jamus, Hon Kon, Japan, da kasar U.S.', 'en': ' Different testing recipes targeting different parts of the coronavirus genetic profile were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States. '}

{'ha': 'Hukumar lafiya ta dunia ta dauki tsarin kasar Jamus na sarrafa abin gwaji wanda aka tura ƙasashe masu ƙarancin kuɗi wanda ba su da albarkun kasa domin sarrafa nasu.', 'en': ' The World Health Organization adopted the German recipe for manufacturing kits sent to low-income countries without the resources to develop their own. '}

{'ha': 'An buga girke-girke na Jamusanci a ranar 17 Janairu 2020; ba a samu yarjejeniya da Cibiyar Kula da Cututtukan Amurka ba har zuwa 28 ga Janairu, jinkirta samar da gwaje-gwaje a cikin U.S.China da Amurka suna da matsaloli game da amincin kayan gwaji a farkon fashewar, kuma waɗannan ƙasashe da Ostiraliya sun kasa samar da isassun kayan sawa don gamsar da buƙatun da shawarwari na ƙwararrun masana kiwon lafiya.', 'en': ' The German recipe was published on 17 January 2020; the protocol developed by the United States Centers for Disease Control was not available until 28 January, delaying available tests in the U.S.China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to satisfy demand and recommendations for testing by health experts. '}

{'ha': 'Banda haka, masana sun ce taimakon yawan gwajin da akwai a Koriya ta Kudu ya taimaka wajen rage yaduwar cutar coronavirus.', 'en': " In contrast, experts say South Korea's broad availability of testing helped reduce the spread of the novel coronavirus. "}

{'ha': 'Yanayin gwajin, yawanci dakin gwaji masu zaman kansu an gina su shekaru da yawa daga Gwamnatin Koiya ta Kudu.', 'en': ' Testing capacity, largely in private sector labs, was built up over several years by the South Korean government. '}

{'ha': 'Ranar 16 ga watan Maris, Hukumar Lafiya ta duniya tace yin gwaji shine hanya mafi kyau da inganci na wannan annobar COVID-19. Akwai bukatar gwai sosai don cutar yana yaduwa hakan ya kawo koma baya wajen gwajin a dakin gwajin U.S. da kuma bada samfurin da kuma sinadarin gwaji na da illa.', 'en': ' On 16 March, the World Health Organization called for ramping up the testing programmes as the best way to slow the advance of COVID-19 pandemic.High demand for testing due to wide spread of the virus caused backlogs of hundreds of thousands of tests at private U.S. labs, and supplies of swabs and chemical reagents became strained. '}
{'ha': 'A watan Maris 2020 Kasar Sin ta rawaito matslolin wanda ya shafi kyawun kayan aiki.', 'en': ' In March 2020 China reported problems with accuracy in their test kits. '}

{'ha': 'A kasar Amurka,  abin gwaji da ka dabakar daga CDC yana da matsaloli sai gwamnati ta cire bangaranci wanda ke hana dakin gwaji masu zamna kasu suyi aiki. Kasar Spain ta sayi abin gwaji daga kasar sin wato Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology co ltd sai ta samu cewa sakamakon bai da inganci.', 'en': ' In the United States, the test kits developed by the CDC had "flaws;" the government then removed the bureaucratic barriers that had prevented private testing.Spain purchased test kits from Chinese firm  Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found that results were inaccurate. '}

{'ha': 'Kamfanin ya bayyana cewa ba daidai ba sakamakon na iya zama sakamakon gazawar tattara samfurori ko amfani da kaya daidai.', 'en': ' The firm explained that the incorrect results may be a result of a failure to collect samples or use the kits correctly. '}

{'ha': 'Hukumar Spanish sunce zasu jany kayan gwanjin da bai da sakamako mai kyau, kuma zau sauya da wasu nau’in daban wan Shnghen Bioeasy 80% na abin gwajin na Czech Republic suka saya a kasar sin sun samu sakamako ba daidai ba. Slovakia sun say kusan abin gwaji miliyan 1.2 a kasar sin wan suka samu baiyi daidai ba.', 'en': ' The Spanish ministry said it will withdraw the kits that returned incorrect results, and would replace them with a different testing kit provided by Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of test kits the Czech Republic purchased from China gave wrong results.Slovakia purchased 1.2 million test kits from China which were found to be inaccurate. '}

{'ha': 'Firayin Minista Matovic ya bada shawarar a aje shi cikin Danube Ates Kara na ma’aikatan kiwon lafiyar kasar Turkiyya yace abin gwajin da Kasar Turkiyya ta saya daga kasar Sin yana da kurakurai sosai kuma basa amfani dashi. Kasar UK ta sayi abin gwajin na kimanin miliyn 3.5 daga kasar Sin amma a farkon watan Aprilu 2020 sun ce wannan ba za’a iya amfani da su ba.', 'en': ' Prime Minister Matovič suggested these be dumped into the Danube.Ateş Kara of the Turkish Health Ministry said the test kits Turkey purchased from China had a "high error rate" and did not "put them into use."The UK purchased 3.5 million test kits from China but in early April 2020 announced these were not usable. '}

{'ha': 'Gwadawa, da bin bayan kebewa wadanda aka same su da cutan da neman wadanda suka hadu da wadanda suka kamu da cutar SaRS-CoV-2 wadanda suka kamu da cutar suna da huldawa mara kyau wanda ke haifar kamuwa da cutan.', 'en': ' Testing, followed with quarantine of those who tested positive and tracing of those with whom the SARS-CoV-2 positive people had had contact, resulted in positive outcomes. '}

{'ha': 'Masu bincike wadanda suke aiki a kasar Italy na VO a wurin da aka gano farin mutuwa ga CoVID-19 cikin Italy, sun gudanar da wasu gwaji kan dukan yawan jama’a guda 3,400, kusan kwanaki goma a rabe.', 'en': ' Researchers working in the Italian town of Vò, the site of the first COVID-19 death in Italy, conducted two rounds of testing on the entire population of about 3,400 people, about ten days apart. '}

{'ha': 'Kusan rabin masu dauke da cutar basa nuna alamomin ciwon kuma an kebe dukan wadanda aka same su da cutar.', 'en': ' About half the people testing positive had no symptoms, and all discovered cases were quarantined. '}
{'ha': 'Akan tsarin hana zirga-zirga, hakan sai ya kashe wasu ciwukan gaba daya.', 'en': ' With travel to the commune restricted, this eliminated new infections completely. '}

{'ha': 'Da bibiyan wanda suka hadu da marasa lafiya, tafiye-tafiye na cikin gida, gwaji da kebewa, cutar coronavirus na 2020 a Singapore na tafiya kadan-kadan fiye da wasu cikin kasashen da kasashen da suka yi girma, amma babu wata kuntatawa ba kamar rufewar dakin cin abinci da wuraren tsayar da kayayyaki.', 'en': ' With aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, the 2020 coronavirus pandemic in Singapore has proceeded much more slowly than in other developed countries, but without extreme restrictions like forced closure of restaurants and retail establishments. '}

{'ha': 'An dakatar da duk wasu al’amuran, da kasar Singapore tayi ta sanar iyan gida cewa su zauna a gidan su ranar 28 ga watan Maris, amma an sake bude makarantu a ranar 23 ga watan Maris.', 'en': ' Many events have been cancelled, and Singapore did start advising residents to stay at home on 28 March, but schools reopened on time after holiday break on 23 March. '}

{'ha': 'Kasashe da dama sun hana yaduwar annoban ta hanyar nemo wandanda sun cudanya da masu cutan, hana tafiye-tafiye, gwaje-gwaje da kuma tafiye-tafiyen masu cutar tare da kebancewar su amma banda hana mutane yawo kamar kasar Iceland da Koriya ta Kudu.', 'en': ' Several other countries have also managed the pandemic with aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, but with less aggressive lock-downs, such as Iceland and South Korea. '}

{'ha': 'Binciken kididdiga ya nuna cewa kasashe wadanda suka yi gwaji sosai, abin da ya shafi adadin mutuwa, suna da karancin wanda suka jikata, watakila domin wadannan ƙasashen sun fi iya gano waɗanda ke da karami ko babu alamun kamu da cutan.', 'en': ' A statistical study has found that countries that have tested more, relative to the number of deaths, have much lower case fatality rates, probably because these countries are better able to detect those with only mild or no symptoms. '}

{'ha': 'WHO ta ba da shawarar cewa ƙasashen da ba su da ƙarfin gwaji da dakunan gwaje-gwaje na ƙasa ba da ƙarancin kwarewa kan COVID-19 su aika farkon tabbatattun gwaji guda biyar da samfurin wadanda ba a tabatar ba duda goma COVID-19 samfurin daya daga cikin 16 na shaidar dakin gwajin WHO tabbatarwar gwajin.', 'en': ' WHO recommends that countries that do not have testing capacity and national laboratories with limited experience on COVID-19 send their first five positives and the first ten negative COVID-19 samples to one of the 16 WHO reference laboratories for confirmatory testing. '}

{'ha': 'Daga cikin shaidar dakin gwaji 16, 7 suna Asia, 5 a nahiyar turai, 2 a Afirka, 1 a Amurka ta arewada, 1 a Nahiyar Australia.', 'en': ' Out of the 16 reference laboratories, 7 are in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia. '}

{'ha': 'A wadanan ginshiƙi, al’amudi “tabbaci kamar % na gwaji” yana tasiri ta hanyar tsarin gwajin kasa.', 'en': " In the following chart, the column “Positive as % of tests” is influenced by the country's testing policy. "}

{'ha': 'Kasar da ke gwajin mutane kawai aka shigar da su a asibitoci za su sami inganci sosai a matsayin kashi % na gwaje-gwajen dukan ‘yan kasa, ko sun nuna alamun cutar ko babu, idan sauran abubuwa sun zama daidai.', 'en': ' A country that only tests people admitted to hospitals will have a higher positive as % of tests than a country that tests all citizens, whether or not they are showing symptoms, other things being equal. '}

{'ha': 'Wanke hannu wadda aka sani da tsaftan hannu, hanya ce ta wanke hannye domin cire kasa, man shafawa, kananan halittu, ko kuma wasu abubuwa da ba a bukata.', 'en': " Hand washing (or handwashing), also known as hand hygiene, is the act of cleaning one's hands for the purpose of removing soil, grease, microorganisms, or other unwanted substances. "}

{'ha': 'Wanke hannu da sabulu akai-akai "Lokaci mai mahimmanci" da rana yana hana yaduwar cututtuka da yawa, misali zawo da kwalara wanda ake yaɗa ta hanyar kashi-baki.', 'en': ' Hand washing with soap consistently at certain "critical moments" during the day prevents the spread of many diseases, for example diarrhoea and cholera, which are transmitted through fecal–oral route. '}

{'ha': 'Hakanan mutane na iya kamuwa da cutar ta huhu ko kuma mura na yau da kullum, misali idan basu wanke hannayensu ba kafin su taɓa idanunsu, hanci da bakinsu.', 'en': ' People can also become infected with respiratory diseases such as influenza or the common cold, for example, if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose, or mouth (i.e., mucous membranes). '}

{'ha': "Lokaci biyar da suke da mahimmaci a rana sune ayayin da wanke hannu da sabulu yanada mahimmanci hadi da:kafin da bayan fitowa daga bayan gida, bayan yiwa yaro tsarki kokuma canza wa yaro napkin, kafin bawa yaro abinci, kafin cin abinci, kafin da kuma bayan dafa abinci, dakuma bayan ta'ammali da danyen name, kifi ko gidan gona.", 'en': " The five critical moments during the day where washing hands with soap is important include: before and after defecation, after cleaning a child's bottom or changing nappies, before feeding a child, before eating and before and after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry. "}

{'ha': "Idan ba'a samu ruwa da sabulu ba za'a iya wanke hannun da toka, WHO ta bada shawarar wanke hannu:", 'en': ' If water and soap are not available, hands can be cleaned with ash.The World Health Organization recommends washing hands: '}
{'ha': 'Kafin, lokacin, da bayan dafa abinci.', 'en': ' Before, during, and after preparing food. '}
{'ha': 'kafin ko kuma bayan lura da mara lafiya.', 'en': ' Before and after caring for a sick person. '}
{'ha': 'Bayan canza wa yaro zanin diapers ko tsaftace yaron da ya yi amfani da wurin bayan gida.', 'en': ' After changing the diapers or cleaning up a child who has used the toilet. '}
{'ha': 'Bayan hura hanci, tari ko atishawa.', 'en': ' After blowing your nose, coughing or sneezing. '}
{'ha': 'Bayan taɓa dabba, abincin dabbobi da kashin dabbobi.', 'en': ' After touching animal, animal feed, or animal waste. '}
{'ha': 'Tsabtace hannu na tsarin likita yana nufin tsabtace aikin da ya shafi aikin likita.', 'en': ' Medical hand hygiene refers to hygiene practices related to medical procedures. '}

{'ha': 'Wanke hannu kafin bayar da magani ko jiyya kan iya hana ko ya rage yaduwan cutan.', 'en': ' Hand washing before administering medicine or medical care can prevent or minimize the spread of disease. '}

{'ha': 'Asalin dalilin lafiya na wanke hannaye shi ne domin cire wasu kananan halittu daga hannu (pathogens kamar bacteria, viruses, ko sauran kananan kwayoyin halitta masu kawo cuta) da sinadarai dake iya jawo illa ko cutuka.', 'en': ' The main medical purpose of washing hands is to cleanse the hands of pathogens (bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms that can cause disease) and chemicals which can cause harm or diseases. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan yana da muhimmanci musamman ga mutane wadanda suke aikin abinci ko suna aiki a fannin lafiya, kuma yana da muhimmanci wa dukan al’umma.', 'en': ' This is especially important for people who handle food or work in the medical field, but also an important practice for the general public. '}

{'ha': "Wanke hannaye nada anfani sosai game da ragewar cutar mura, cutar corona da sauran cututtukan da wani yakan shafawa wani, hana la'anar kamuwa da zawo da raguwar cutar lumfashi.", 'en': ' Hand washing has many health benefits, including minimizing the spread of influenza, coronavirus, and other infectious diseases; preventing infectious causes of diarrhea; decreasing respiratory infections; '}
{'ha': 'Da kuma rage mutuwar jarirai a haihuwar gida.', 'en': ' and reducing infant mortality rate at home birth deliveries. '}

{'ha': 'Wani bincike na 2013 ya nuna cewa ingantattun ayyukan wanke hannu na iya haifar da ƙananan ci gaba a cikin tsayi da girma a yara kasa da shekaru biyar.', 'en': ' A 2013 study showed that improved hand washing practices may lead to small improvements in the length growth in children under five years of age. '}

{'ha': 'A cikin kasashe masu tasowa, Ana iya rage yawan mace-macen kananan yara da suka danganci cutar numfashi da zawo ta hanyar gabatar da sauye sauyen halaye kamar wanke hannaye da sabulu.', 'en': ' In developing countries, childhood mortality rates related to respiratory and diarrheal diseases can be reduced by introducing simple behavioral changes, such as hand washing with soap. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan matakin mai sauqi na iya rage yawan mace-mace daga wadannan cututtukan da kusan kashi 50%.', 'en': ' This simple action can reduce the rate of mortality from these diseases by almost 50%. '}

{'ha': 'Kariya wanda ke kara matsayin wanken hannu na iya rage yawan zawo har kimanin kashi daya cikin uku, kuma za a iya kwatanta wannan da samar da ruwa mai tsabta a cikin matalauta.', 'en': ' Interventions that promote hand washing can reduce diarrhoea episodes by about a third, and this is comparable to providing clean water in low income areas. '}

{'ha': "48% na raguwar cututtukan zawo na iya haɗuwa da wanke hannu da sabulu. Wanke hannu da sabulu ita ce hanya mafi inganci kuma mai sauki don hana cutar gudawa da kamuwa da cutar huhu kamar yadda aka a cikin makarantu, gida da al'umma a duk duniya.", 'en': ' 48% of reductions in diarrhoea episodes can be associated with hand washing with soap.Hand washing with soap is the single most effective and inexpensive way to prevent diarrhea and acute respiratory infections (ARI), as automatic behavior performed in homes, schools, and communities worldwide. '}

{'ha': 'Kwayar cutar huhu, babbar cutar ARI, ita ce ta farko da ke haifar da mace-mace a tsakanin yara ‘yan kasa da shekara biyar, da ke ɗaukar kimanin yara miliyan 1.8 a shekara.', 'en': ' Pneumonia, a major ARI, is the number one cause of mortality among children under five years old, taking the lives of an estimated 1.8 million children per year. '}
{'ha': 'Cutar gudawa da na nimoniya suna kawo mutuwar yara kussan milliyan 3.5 a kowace shekara.', 'en': ' Diarrhea and pneumonia together account for almost 3.5 million child deaths annually. '}

{'ha': "A cewar UNICEF wanke hannun da sabulu kafin cin abinci da bayan amfani da bayan gida yazama al'ada hakan zai ita ceton rai fiye da kowane allurar riga kafi kokuma magani, Yanke mace daga gudawa da kusan rabin kuma mutuwa daga kamuwa da cutar rashin iya lumfashi quater daya.", 'en': ' According to UNICEF, turning hand washing with soap before eating and after using the toilet into an ingrained habit can save more lives than any single vaccine or medical intervention, cutting deaths from diarrhea by almost half and deaths from acute respiratory infections by one-quarter. '}

{'ha': 'Wanke hannu koyaushe ana hade tare da sauran hanyoyin tsabtace ruwa a matsayin ɓangare na ruwa, tsabta da kuma tsabta (WASH).', 'en': ' Hand washing is usually integrated together with other sanitation interventions as part of water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) programmes. '}

{'ha': 'Wanke hannu ma yakan kare daga impetigo (cutar fata) wadda ake samu ta wajen haduwa ta zahiri.', 'en': ' Hand washing also protects against impetigo which is transmitted through direct physical contact. '}

{'ha': 'Karamin matsalar wanke hannu shine yawan wanke hannu na iya jawo lalacewar fatan jiki saboda bushewar fatan.', 'en': ' A small detrimental effect of hand washing is that frequent hand washing can lead to skin damage due to drying of the skin. '}

{'ha': 'A wata binciken skarar 2012, an gano cewa yawan wanke hannu na iya jawo kaikayi, laushin hannu wanda ya fi yawa a cikin ma’aikatan lafiya.', 'en': ' A 2012 Danish study found that excessive hand washing can lead to an itchy, flaky skin condition known as hand eczema or hand dermatitis, which is especially common among health-care workers. '}

{'ha': 'Wanke hannu akai-akai shi ma ana ganinsa a matsayin daya daga cikin alamun yawan tunani mara fasali wato obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).', 'en': ' Too frequent hand washing is also seen as one of the symptoms of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD). '}

{'ha': 'Akwai lokuta guda biyar duk rana da wanke hannu da sabulu ke da muhimmanci domin rage yaduwar cutan ta fuska da baki: bayan amfani da gidan wanka (fisari, ba haya), bayan gyara ma yaro ko yarinya duwawu (canza nafkin), kafin ciyar da yaro ko yarinya, kafin cin abinci da kuma kafin/bayan sarafa abinci ko rike danyen nama, kifi, ko kaza.', 'en': " There are five critical times during the day where washing hands with soap is important to reduce fecal-oral transmission of disease: after using the bathroom (urination, defecation), after cleaning a child's bottom (changing nappies), before feeding a child, before eating and before/after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry. "}

{'ha': 'Sauran lokuta da ya kamata a dauki matakan wanke hannu da kyau domin guje wa yaduwar cutan ya hada da kafin ko kuma bayan jiyyan yanka ko rauni; bayan taba kashin daba ko rike dabbobi; da bayan taba datti.', 'en': ' Other occasions when correct handwashing technique should be practiced in order to prevent the transmission of disease include before and after treating a cut or wound; after sneezing, coughing, or blowing your nose; after touching animal waste or handling animals; and after touching garbage. '}
{'ha': 'A cikin ƙasashe da yawa akwai ƙarancin wanke hannuwa da sabulu.', 'en': ' In many countries, there is a low rate of hand washing with soap. '}

{'ha': 'Binciken wanke hannu a cikin kasashe 54 a shekarar 2015 ya gano cewa a matsakaici kashi 38.7% na mutanan gida suna wanke hannu da sabulu. Wani bincike na shekarar 2014 ya nuna cewa Saudiyya tana da mafi girman kaso na kashi 97% na jihar sai kasar amerika da ke kusa da tsakiya tare da kashi 77% sai china mai mafi karancin kashi 23%. Da yawa daga canjin yanayin canji yana karuwa da matakan wanke hannu da sabulu a lokaci mai mahimmanci Kungiyar wanke hannu na eh yara na makaranta a lokutan rana shine zaɓi ɗaya a cikin ƙasashe masu tasowa don sanyawa yara kudurin wanke hannu a cikin halayensu.', 'en': " A study of hand washing in 54 countries in 2015 found that on average, 38.7% of households practiced hand washing with soap.A 2014 study showed that Saudi Arabia had the highest rate of 97 percent; the United States near the middle with 77 percent; and China with the lowest rate of 23 percent.Several behaviour change methodologies now exist to increase uptake of the behaviour of hand washing with soap at the critical times.Group hand washing for school children at set times of the day is one option in developing countries to engrain hand washing in children's behaviors. "}

{'ha': '"Shirin Tubalin Lafiya" (“Essential Health Program”) wanda Hukumar Ilimi a Philippines ta aiwatar misali ne kan daukan matakin inganta lafiyar yara da iliminsu.', 'en': ' The "Essential Health Care Program" implemented by the Department of Education in the Philippines is an example of at scale action to promote children\'s health and education. '}

{'ha': 'Ragewa sau biyu a shekara, wanda yake taimakawa da wanke hannu kullun tare da sabulu, goge baki yau da kullun tare da Fluoride, shine ainihin wannan shirin na ƙasa.', 'en': ' Deworming twice a year, supplemented with washing hands daily with soap, brushing teeth daily with fluoride, is at the core of this national program. '}
{'ha': 'Hakanan an sami nasarar aiwatar da shi a Indonesia.', 'en': ' It has also been successfully implemented in Indonesia. '}

{'ha': 'Cire kananan halittu da ido ba zai iya gani ba daga fata na kara ingantuwa idan aka hada da sabulu ko garin sabulu a ruwa.', 'en': ' Removal of microorganisms from skin is enhanced by the addition of soaps or detergents to water. '}

{'ha': 'Asalin mataki na sabulai da garin sabulu ana yi ne domin rage shinge ga nasara da karin narkewa.', 'en': ' The main action of soaps and detergents is to reduce barriers to solution, and increase solubility. '}

{'ha': 'Ruwa kadai muhimin abu ne na wanke fata ba domin mai da furotin, wadanda suna asali daga cikin kasa, wadda ba su narkewa cikin ruwa.', 'en': ' Water alone is an inefficient skin cleanser because fats and proteins, which are components of organic soil, are not readily dissolved in water. '}
{'ha': 'Ana tsarkakewa da taimakon ruwa mai gudu.', 'en': ' Cleansing is, however, aided by a reasonable flow of water.. '}

{'ha': "Sabulu na ruwa saboda shi za'a iya sake anfani dashi a kowane lokaci, zai iya riƙe kwayoyin cuta da aka samu daga amfanin da suka gabata.", 'en': ' Solid soap, because of its reusable nature, may hold bacteria acquired from previous uses. '}

{'ha': 'ƙaramin nazarin karatu sun nuna canja wurin ƙwayoyin cuta daga gurbataccen sabulu an kammala canja wuri ba kamar yadda kwayoyin cuta suka tafi tare da kumfa.', 'en': ' A small number of studies which have looked at the bacterial transfer from contaminated solid soap have concluded transfer is unlikely as the bacteria are rinsed off with the foam. '}
{'ha': 'CDC tana kan bayyana cewa “sabulun ruwa da hanyan zuba ruwa domin fitarwa ya fi kyau”.', 'en': ' The CDC still states "liquid soap with hands-free controls for dispensing is preferable". '}
{'ha': 'Ana gargadin al’umma da su yi amfani da sabulu mai kashe kwayoyin cuta.', 'en': ' Antibacterial soaps have been heavily promoted to a health-conscious public. '}

{'ha': 'Zuwa yau, babu wata hujja da ke nuna amfani da ita don maganin rigakafin ƙwayar cuta ko kuma kwayoyin halittun da suke jure kwayoyin cuta a yanayi.', 'en': ' To date, there is no evidence that using recommended antiseptics or disinfectants selects for antibiotic-resistant organisms in nature. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, Sabulun kariya daga kwayoyin cuta suna dauke da wakilai na kashe kwayar cuta irinsu triclosan, wanda yake dauke jerin abubuwa masu yawa na tsarin kwayoyin.', 'en': ' However, antibacterial soaps contain common antibacterial agents such as triclosan, which has an extensive list of resistant strains of organisms. '}

{'ha': "Don haka koda ba'a zabi kwayoyin juriyar garkuwan jiki ba don sabulun kariya daga kwayoyin cuta, yiwuwa ba za su zama da inganci yadda ake tallata su ba.", 'en': " So, even if antibiotic resistant strains aren't selected for by antibacterial soaps, they might not be as effective as they are marketed to be. "}

{'ha': "Bayan surfactant da fata mai wakilin kariya, Tsarin sararin samaniya yana iya ƙunsar ruwan yacid(acetic acid, ascorbic acid lactic acid) A matsayin mai tsara PH, antimicrobial active benzoic acid da kara yanayin fata (aleo vera, vitamin, menthol, plant extract) Takaitaccen bincike daga Jami'ar Orogon makarantar kula da lafiyar yanuna cewa sabulu a bayyane yake kamar sabulu masu kashe kwayoyin cuta mai kushe da triclosan don kariya daga rashin lafiya dakuma kashe kwayoyin cuta daka hannu.", 'en': ' Besides the surfactant and skin-protecting agent, the sophisticated formulations may contain acids (acetic acid, ascorbic acid, lactic acid) as pH regulator, antimicrobially active benzoic acid and further skin conditioners (aloe vera, vitamins, menthol, plant extracts).A comprehensive analysis from the University of Oregon School of Public Health indicated that plain soaps are as effective as consumer-grade anti-bacterial soaps containing triclosan in preventing illness and removing bacteria from the hands. '}
{'ha': 'Ruwan zafi da yake da dadin wanke hannu ba shi da zafin da zai iya kashe kwayoyin cutan.', 'en': ' Hot water that is comfortable for washing hands is not hot enough to kill bacteria. '}
{'ha': 'Kwayoyin cuta sun fi girma idan jiki na da zafi wato a yanayin (37 °C).', 'en': ' Bacteria grow much faster at body temperature (37 °C). '}

{'ha': 'Ko da shike, ruwan dumi, ruwan sabulu ya fi na sanyi aiki, ruwan sabulu ya fi cire mai da ke kasa, da kananan hallitu da ido ba zai iya gani ba.', 'en': ' However, warm, soapy water is more effective than cold, soapy water at removing natural oils which hold soils and bacteria. '}

{'ha': 'Akasin abin da mutane suka gaskanta, bincike na kimiya ta nuna cewa amfani da ruwan dumi ba shi da wani amfani wajen rage yawan kananan halittu a hannaye.', 'en': ' Contrary to popular belief however, scientific studies have shown that using warm water has no effect on reducing the microbial load on hands. '}
{'ha': 'Mai tsabtace hannu ko man kariya daga kwayar cuta wanda asalin wakilin tsaftar hannu mara ruwa.', 'en': ' A hand sanitizer or hand antiseptic is a non-water-based hand hygiene agent. '}

{'ha': 'A karshen sheakarun 1990 da farkon karni na 21, abubuwan tsaftace hannu masu sinadarin alcohol kuma wadanda ba ruwa a cikinsu (kuma akan kira su da man hannu mai sinadarin alcohol, man hannu na magani, ko man tsaftace hannu) sun samu shahara.', 'en': ' In the late 1990s and early part of the 21st century, alcohol rub non-water-based hand hygiene agents (also known as alcohol-based hand rubs, antiseptic hand rubs, or hand sanitizers) began to gain popularity. '}

{'ha': 'Yawancinsu sun dogara kan sinadarin isopropyl alcohol ko ethanol da aka hada tare da sinadarin sa abu ya yi kauri kamar Carbomer (polymer na acrylic acid) a cikin wani mai, ko hemectant kamar glycerin a cikin ruwa, ko kumfa don saukin amfani sannan don rage tasirin bushewa na sinadarin alcohol.', 'en': ' Most are based on isopropyl alcohol or ethanol formulated together with a thickening agent such as Carbomer (polymer of acrylic acid) into a gel, or a humectant such as glycerin into a liquid, or foam for ease of use and to decrease the drying effect of the alcohol. '}

{'ha': 'Dingara ƙara da aka samar da hydrogen-peroxide,, don ci gaba da ake dasu da ayyukan, sinadarin tsabtace hannu waɗanda ke ɗauke da mafi ƙarancin kashi 60-95% sune sukafi tasiri a kashe ƙwayoyin cuta.', 'en': ' Adding diluted hydrogen-peroxide increases further  the antimicrobial activity.Hand sanitizers containing a minimum of 60 to 95% alcohol are efficient germ killers. '}

{'ha': 'Man shafawa a hannu maisinadarin kashe kwayoyin cuta, mai maganin juriya, Magungunan ƙwayoyin cuta masu guba da yawa(MRSA and VRE) cutar tarin fuka da wasu ƙwayoyin cuta (Ciki harda cutar HIV, cutar dabbobi, RSV, rhinovirus, vaccinia, mura da hepatitis) da fungi.', 'en': ' Alcohol rub sanitizers kill bacteria, multi-drug resistant bacteria (MRSA and VRE), tuberculosis, and some viruses (including HIV, herpes, RSV, rhinovirus, vaccinia, influenza, and hepatitis) and fungi. '}

{'ha': 'Mai tsftace hannu mai sinadarin Alcohol dauke da sinadarin alcohol kashi 70% suna kashewa kashi 99.97% (raguwar log 3.5, mai kama da raguwar decbel 35) na ƙwayoyin cuta akan hannaye secan 30 bayan shafawa da kashi 99.99% zuwa 99.999% (Raguwar log 4 zuwa 5) na ƙwayoyin cuta akan hannu minti 1 bayan bayan shafawa. Man tsaftacewan hannu suna da tasiri kan kwayoyin cutar bacteriya kuma da reshin tasiri kan kwayoyin cuta birus.', 'en': ' Alcohol rub sanitizers containing 70% alcohol kill 99.97% (3.5 log reduction, similar to 35 decibel reduction) of the bacteria on hands 30 seconds after application and 99.99% to 99.999% (4 to 5 log reduction) of the bacteria on hands 1 minute after application.Hand sanitizers are most effective against bacteria and less effective against some viruses. '}

{'ha': 'Man sabtace hannu na giya ba su da tasiri a kan cutar norovirus, mafi jawo gastroenteritis (ciwon ciki) mai yaduwa. Dole ayi amfani da antiseptic ko giya domin jika ko kuma rufe duka hannaye.', 'en': ' Alcohol-based hand sanitizers are almost entirely ineffective against norovirus (or Norwalk) type viruses, the most common cause of contagious gastroenteritis.Enough hand antiseptic or alcohol rub must be used to thoroughly wet or cover both hands. '}

{'ha': 'Ana goge gaba da baya na hannaye da kuma tsakanin iyakar dukkan yatsunsu kusan sekan 30 har sai ruwa, ta yi kumfa ko sinadarin tsaftar ya bushe.', 'en': ' The front and back of both hands and between and the ends of all fingers are rubbed for approximately 30 seconds until the liquid, foam or gel is dry. '}

{'ha': 'Dole a wanke yatsa da kyau, a share duka tafin hannayen. US Center for Disease Control and Prevention sun ba da shawara da a wanke hannu tare da man tsaftace hannu, musamman idan hannaye sun nuna datti a zahiri.', 'en': ' Finger tips must be washed well too, rubbing them in both palms.The US Center for Disease Control and Prevention recommends hand washing over hand sanitizer rubs, particularly when hands are visibly dirty. '}

{'ha': 'kara amfani da wadannan wakilan Ya dogara ne akan sauƙin amfani da ayyukan kashewa da sauri akan kwayoyin cuta Koyaya ya kamata suyi amfani da matsayin sauyawa don wankin da ya dace saidai kuma idan babu ruwa ko sabulu.', 'en': ' The increasing use of these agents is based on their ease of use and rapid killing activity against micro-organisms; however, they should not serve as a replacement for proper hand washing unless soap and water are unavailable. '}

{'ha': 'Yawaita amfani da man tsaftace hannu mai sinadarin alcohol na iya jawo bushewar fata sai dai in an hada da sinadarin emollients da/ko sinadaran hana fata bushewa a cikin hadin.', 'en': ' Frequent use of alcohol-based hand sanitizers can cause dry skin unless emollients and/or skin moisturizers are added to the formula. '}

{'ha': 'Ana iya rage tasirin bushewar ko a cirewar sinadarin wanke hannu ta hanyar ƙara glycerin da/kokuma emollient ta dubara.', 'en': ' The drying effect of alcohol can be reduced or eliminated by adding glycerin and/or other emollients to the formula. '}

{'ha': 'A cikin gwaji na asibiti, mayukan tsaftace hannu masu sinadarin alcohol waɗanda ke ɗauke da emollients sun haifar da ƙarancin kaikayin fata da bushewar fata fiye da sabulu ko sabulu mai maganin kananan halittu.', 'en': ' In clinical trials, alcohol-based hand sanitizers containing emollients caused substantially less skin irritation and dryness than soaps or antimicrobial detergents. '}

{'ha': 'Rashin lafiyan kusanci dermatitis, kusancin urticaria ciwo ko rashin lafiyar jiki ga sinadari ko qari a cikin sinadarin wanke hannu baya faruwa.', 'en': ' Allergic contact dermatitis, contact urticaria syndrome or hypersensitivity to alcohol or additives present in alcohol hand rubs rarely occur. '}

{'ha': 'Rashin karfin halin jawo matsalan haduwa da dermatitis ya zama abin jan hankali a bisan wanke hannu da sabulu da ruwa.', 'en': ' The lower tendency to induce irritant contact dermatitis became an attraction as compared to soap and water hand washing. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da ingancinsu wakilin dabana ruwa bane baya tsabtace hannun, amma yana lalata su.', 'en': ' Despite their effectiveness, non-water agents do not cleanse the hands of organic material, but simply disinfect them. '}

{'ha': 'Dalilin haka ne man wanke hannu mai kashe kwayar cuta ba shi da tasiri kamar wanke hannu da ruwa da sabulu saboda hana yanduwar kwayoyin cuta da yawa, tun da ana samun sauran cututtukan a hannaye.', 'en': ' It is for this reason that hand sanitizers are not as effective as soap and water at preventing the spread of many pathogens, since the pathogens still remain on the hands. '}

{'ha': 'Aikin mai na tsaftace hannu ya dangana ga sinadaransa da inda aka sarafa shi, kuma bisa ga tarihi bai da wani amfani sosai da shafawa.', 'en': ' Alcohol-free hand sanitizer efficacy is heavily dependent on the ingredients and formulation, and historically has significantly under-performed alcohol and alcohol rubs. '}

{'ha': 'Kwanan nan, an nuna hanyoyin da ake hadin sinadarai benzalkonium chloride sun nuna suna da wadatarwa da kuma tarawar ayyukan antimicrobial bayan amfani, ba kamar sinadarin alcohol ba, ragewar inganci bayan maimaitawa amfani da ita, wataƙila sakamakon cigaban tsananin batawar fata.', 'en': ' More recently, formulations that use benzalkonium chloride have been shown to have persistent and cumulative antimicrobial activity after application, unlike alcohol, which has been shown to decrease in efficacy after repeated use, probably due to progressive adverse skin reactions. '}

{'ha': 'Mutane da yawa cikin al’umma da ke da rashin kudi  ba za su iya siyan sabulu ba sai su yi amfani da toka ko ƙasa maimako su.', 'en': ' Many people in low-income communities cannot afford soap and use ash or soil instead. '}
{'ha': 'Toka ko kasa na iya zama da amfani fiye da zallan ruwa, amma ba zai kai sabulu aiki ba.', 'en': ' Ash or soil may be more effective than water alone, but may be less effective than soap. '}

{'ha': 'Wata abin damuwa shine idan kasa ko toka ta gurbata da kananan halittu da ido ba su gani, zai iya kara yaduwan cutan a maimakon ya rage ta.', 'en': ' One concern is that if the soil or ash is contaminated with microorganisms it may increase the spread of disease rather than decrease it. '}

{'ha': 'Kamar sabulu, toka shima wakilin sabulune saboda yana iya fitar da kwayar cuta idan aka hada daruwa yana samar da sinadarin Alkaline.', 'en': ' Like soap, ash is also a disinfecting agent because in contact with water, it forms an alkaline solution. '}

{'ha': 'Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO) ta ba da shawara ayi amfani da toka ko kasa a madadin sabulu idan babu sabulu.', 'en': ' WHO recommended ash or sand as alternative to soap when soap is not available. '}

{'ha': 'Ingantattun hanyoyin wanke hannu da US Centers for Disease Control domin kiyaye yaduwar cuta suna nan kamar haka:', 'en': ' Correct handwashing technique recommended by the US Centers for Disease Control  for prevention of transmission of disease includes the following steps: '}
{'ha': 'Jika hannaye da ruwan dumi ko ruwan tsanyi wanda ke gudu.', 'en': ' Wet hands with warm or cold running water. '}

{'ha': 'An ba da shawaran amfani da ruwa mai gudana saboda ruwa a cikin kwari na iya zama gurbatacce yayinda dumi ko sanyin ruwa ba zai canza komi ba.', 'en': ' Running water is recommended because standing basins may be contaminated, while the temperature of the water does not seem to make a difference. '}

{'ha': 'Sa kumfa a hannu ta hanyar gaga su da sabulu sosai, hada da bayan hannu, tsakanin yatsu, da karkashin kusar yatsun.', 'en': ' Lather hands by rubbing them with a generous amount of soap, including the backs of hands, between fingers, and under nails. '}

{'ha': 'Sabulu yana cire ƙwayar cuta daga fata, kuma bincike ya nuna cewa mutane sukan wanke hannayensu sosai lokacin da ake amfani da sabulu maimakon ruwa kaɗai.', 'en': ' Soap lifts germs from the skin, and studies show that people tend to wash their hands more thoroughly when soap is used rather than water alone. '}
{'ha': 'Goge na tsawan akalla daƙiƙa 20.', 'en': ' Scrub for at least 20 seconds. '}

{'ha': 'Gogewa na haifar da karfin rikewa, wanda ke taimakawa wajen cire kwayar cuta daga fata, Kuma goga na tsawon lokaci yakan cire kwayoyi cutan da yawa.', 'en': ' Scrubbing creates friction, which helps remove germs from skin, and scrubbing for longer periods removes more germs. '}
{'ha': 'A dauraye da kyau a ruwa mai gudana.', 'en': ' Rinse well under running water. '}
{'ha': 'Daurayar hannaye acikin kwano yakan iya sake kama hannu.', 'en': ' Rinsing in a basin can recontaminate hands. '}
{'ha': 'Bushewa da tawul mai kyaw kokuma a shanya a iska a barshi ya bushe.', 'en': ' Dry with a clean towel or allow to air dry. '}

{'ha': 'jikaken hannaye ko sukan saurin gurbantawa. Wurare da an fi samun haka sune babban yasa, wuyan hannu, tsakanin hannu da tafin hannu, tsakanin yatsu, da karkashen yatsu.', 'en': ' Wet and moist hands are more easily recontaminated.The most commonly missed areas are the thumb, the wrist, the areas between the fingers, and under fingernails. '}
{'ha': 'Yatsun hannu wanda mutum ya sa da sinadarin goge ƙusan yatsu na iya riƙe ƙwayoyin cuta.', 'en': ' Artificial nails and chipped nail polish may harbor microorganisms. '}

{'ha': 'An bada shawarar anfani da ruwan shafa fuska don hana hannayen daga bushewa, fata mai bushewa na iya haifar da lalacewar fata wanda zai iya lalata haɗarin kamuwa da cutar.', 'en': ' Moisturizing lotion is often recommended to keep the hands from drying out; dry skin can lead to skin damage which can increase the risk for the transmission of infection. '}

{'ha': 'Akwai hanyoyi da yawa masu sauki wadda za a bi don inganta wanke hannu a inda babu ruwan famfo da/ko sabulu misali, zuba ruwa daga jarka da ke a rataye ko kwarya mai ramuka ko kuma amfani da jikin kankana da ramuka da/ko toka in bukata ta tashi a kasashe masu tasowa. A yayinda babu isashen ruwa (kamar makarantu ko kauyuka a kasashe masu tasowa), akwai hanyoyin kiyaye da ruwa kamar ratayayyen jarka da wasu hanyoyi masu sauki.', 'en': ' Various low-cost options can be made to facilitate hand washing where tap-water and/or soap is not available e.g. pouring water from a hanging jerrycan or gourd with suitable holes and/or using ash if needed in developing countries.In situations with limited water supply (such as schools or rural areas in developing countries), there are water-conserving solutions, such as "tippy-taps" and other low-cost options. '}

{'ha': 'Magudanan ruwa na takawa da kafa ba tare da an sa hannu ba wata fasaha ce mai sauki wanda ya kunshi daura buta da igiya, da inda za a taka da kafa domin ya zubo ruwa kadan a hannaye da sandan sabulu.', 'en': ' A tippy-tap is a simple technology using a jug suspended by a rope, and a foot-operated lever to pour a small amount of water over the hands and a bar of soap. '}

{'ha': 'Busar da hannaye da kyau hanya ce ta tsabtan hannu amma akwai muhawara a kan hanya mafi inganci a busarwa a gidan wankan jama’a.', 'en': ' Effective drying of the hands is an essential part of the hand hygiene process, but there is some debate over the most effective form of drying in public washrooms. '}

{'ha': "Binciken haɓaka yanuna kuma yabada shawarar tawul ɗin takarda sun fi bada tsabta fiye da na'urar bushewar hannu ta lantarki da ake samu a ɗakunan wanka da yawa.", 'en': ' A growing volume of research suggests paper towels are much more hygienic than the electric hand dryers found in many washrooms. '}

{'ha': 'A shekarar 2008, wata bincike da University na Westminster, London, ta yi wanda masana’antan sarafa tawul takarda wato European Tissue Symposium, don kwatanta matakan tsabta da ake samu daga tawul takarda ta yi, dumin-iskar na’uran busar da hannu da na’urar iskar busar da hannu.', 'en': ' In 2008, a study was conducted by the University of Westminster, London, and sponsored by the paper-towel industry the European Tissue Symposium, to compare the levels of hygiene offered by paper towels, warm-air hand dryers and the more modern jet-air hand dryers. '}

{'ha': 'Bayan wankewa da busar da hannaye da warm-air dryer, an gano da cewa duka lambar kananan hallitu da ba a gani da ido na karuwa a kunbuna da akalla 194% da kuma tafin hannu da 254%.', 'en': ' After washing and drying hands with the warm-air dryer, the total number of bacteria was found to increase on average on the finger pads by 194% and on the palms by 254%. '}

{'ha': "Bushewa tare da na'urar iskar busarwa a karuwar matsakaicin yawan adadin ƙwayoyin cuta a kan yatsun hannu da 42% kuma a cikin tafin hannu da 15%.", 'en': ' Drying with the jet-air dryer resulted in an increase on average of the total number of bacteria on the finger pads by 42% and on the palms by 15%. '}

{'ha': 'Bayan wankewa da busar da hannu da tawul din takarda, duka adadin kwayar cutar bacteria kan kasan yatsu ya ragu da gwargwadon kashi 76% sannan kan tafin hannu har gwargwadon kashi 77%. Masanan kimiyan kuma sun yi wasu gwaje-gwaje domin tabbatar ko za a iya samun gurbata tsakanin masu amfani da bandaki da shi kanshi muhallin bandakin saboda kowanne irin hanyar busarwa.', 'en': ' After washing and drying hands with a paper towel, the total number of bacteria was reduced on average on the finger pads by up to 76% and on the palms by up to 77%.The scientists also carried out tests to establish whether there was the potential for cross contamination of other washroom users and the washroom environment as a result of each type of drying method. '}

{'ha': "Mabushin iska mai qirar jirgi mai sauqar ungulu, wanda ke busa iska daga cikin rukunin a kan gudu 180m/s (650km/h; 400mph) yana iya busar da kananun kwayoyin halitta daga hannu da na'urar kuma yakan iya lalata masu anfani da sauran wajan wanke-wanken da muhallin wajan wanke wanken har tsayin meter 2.", 'en': ' The jet-air dryer, which blows air out of the unit at claimed speeds of 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph), was capable of blowing micro-organisms from the hands and the unit and potentially contaminating other washroom users and the washroom environment up to 2 metres away. '}

{'ha': "Amfani da na'urar bushewa da dumin iska yana yada kananan kwayoyin cuta har zuwa mita 0.25 daga na'urar bushewar.", 'en': ' Use of a warm-air hand dryer spread micro-organisms up to 0.25 metres from the dryer. '}

{'ha': 'Tawul tarkada ya nuna babu wani yaduwan kananan halittu da ido ba ya iya gani, wato micro-organism. A 2005, a wata bincike da kayyayakin TUV da yanayi, kimanta hanyoyin busar da hannu dabam-dabam.', 'en': ' Paper towels showed no significant spread of micro-organisms.In 2005, in a study conducted by TÜV Produkt und Umwelt, different hand drying methods were evaluated. '}
{'ha': 'Canje-canje masu zuwa a cikin ƙididdigar ƙwayoyin cuta bayan lura da bushewar hannaye:', 'en': ' The following changes in the bacterial count after drying the hands were observed: '}

{'ha': "Yawancin masana'antun kayan bushewar hannu sun wanzu, kuma an kwatanta na’urar bushewar hannu da bushewa da tawul ɗin takarda.", 'en': ' Many different hand dryer manufacturers exist, and hand driers have been compared against drying with paper towels. '}

{'ha': 'Wanke hannu ta hanyar amfani da tsabtace tsutsa hannu shine madadin yayin tafiya yayin da babu sabulu da ruwa.', 'en': ' Hand washing using hand sanitizing wipes is an alternative during traveling in the absence of soap and water. '}
{'ha': 'Man tsabtace hannu mai dauke da sinadari alcohol yakamata ya ƙunshi aƙalla kashi 60% na sinadarin alcohol.', 'en': ' Alcohol-based hand sanitizer should contain at least 60% alcohol. '}

{'ha': 'Wanke hannu na tsarin likita ya zama tilas wani dan kasar Hungary Ignaz semmelwais ya tabbatar da ingancin sa a shekara ta 1846 don hana yaduwar cutar a farfajiyar asibiti.', 'en': ' Medical hand-washing became mandatory long after Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis discovered its effectiveness (in 1846) in preventing disease in a hospital environment. '}

{'ha': "Akwai na'urorin lantarki waɗanda ke ba da ra'ayi don tunatar da ma'aikatan asibitin don wanke hannayen su lokacin da suka manta.", 'en': ' There are electronic devices that provide feedback to remind hospital staff to wash their hands when they forget. '}
{'ha': 'Nazari daya ta samo rage kamuwa da cuta tare da amfanin su.', 'en': ' One study has found decreased infection rates with their use. '}

{'ha': 'Wankewar hannu na tsarin likitanci yana kai wa akalla tsawan dakikoki 15, tare da amfani da sabulu da ruwa mai yawa ko mai don kumfa da shafawa kowane bangare na hannu.', 'en': ' Medical hand-washing is for a minimum of 15 seconds, using generous amounts of soap and water or gel to lather and rub each part of the hands. '}
{'ha': "A shafa hannaye tare, ta yadda 'yan-yatsu za su yi tsifa.", 'en': ' Hands should be rubbed together with digits interlocking. '}
{'ha': 'Idan akwai tarkace a karkashin yatsun hanu, ana iya amfani da buroshi domin cire shi.', 'en': ' If there is debris under fingernails, a bristle brush may be used to remove it. '}

{'ha': 'Tunda kwayoyi cuta na iya zama cikin ruwan da ya rage a hannayan mu, yana da mahimmanci a dauraye sosai kuma a goge da busasshen tawul mai tsafta.', 'en': ' Since germs may remain in the water on the hands, it is important to rinse well and wipe dry with a clean towel. '}

{'ha': 'Bayan busarwa, ayi amfani da tawul na takardan domin rufe ruwan (bude duk wani kofar fita in ta yiwu).', 'en': ' After drying, the paper towel should be used to turn off the water (and open any exit door if necessary). '}
{'ha': 'Wannan yana kiyaye sake gurbata hannaye da wadannan farfajiya.', 'en': ' This avoids re-contaminating the hands from those surfaces. '}

{'ha': 'Dalilin wanke hannu a cikin tsarin kula da lafiya shine a cire kwaya cututtukan jini wato pathogenic microorganisms (kwayar cutar) kuma su guji yada su.', 'en': ' The purpose of hand-washing in the health-care setting is to remove pathogenic microorganisms ("germs") and avoid transmitting them. '}

{'ha': 'Sabuwar mujalla na magani ta ba da rahoto da cewa wanke hannu a yawancin ma’aikatun lafiya ba abin karbuwa bane, yawancin likitoci da ingozomai sukan manta wanke hannu kafin taba marasa lafiya, wanda ke jawo yaduwan kananan halittu masu yada cuta.', 'en': ' The New England Journal of Medicine reports that a lack of hand-washing remains at unacceptable levels in most medical environments, with large numbers of doctors and nurses routinely forgetting to wash their hands before touching patients, thus transmitting microorganisms. '}

{'ha': 'Bincike ya nuna wanke hannu yadda ya dace kuma dabin sauran hanyoyin masu sauki zasu iya rage adadin catheter-cutar jini mai alaqa da kamuwa da cuta da kashi 66%, hukumar lafiya ta duniya (WHO) ta wallafa wata takarda dake nuna daidaitaccen wanke-wanke da kuma shafa hannu a sassan Lafiya.', 'en': ' One study showed that proper hand-washing and other simple procedures can decrease the rate of catheter-related bloodstream infections by 66 percent.The World Health Organization has published a sheet demonstrating standard hand-washing and hand-rubbing in health-care sectors. '}

{'ha': 'Ana iya samun wannan ka’idoji na tsabtan hannu na kugiyan daga sashin yanar gizon ra’ayin jama’a.', 'en': ' The draft guidance of hand hygiene by the organization can also be found at its website for public comment. '}
{'ha': 'Whitby et al. Sun gudanar da bita mai dacewa.', 'en': ' A relevant review was conducted by Whitby et al. '}

{'ha': 'Na’urorin kasuwanci na iya auna tsaftan hannu, idan ana bukatan tsari, ana bukatan yarda.', 'en': ' Commercial devices can measure and validate hand hygiene, if demonstration of regulatory compliance is required. '}
{'ha': 'Kungiyar lafiya ta duniya (WHO) na da lokuta biyar (Five Moments) na wanke hannaye:', 'en': ' The World Health Organization has "Five Moments" for washing hands: '}
{'ha': 'bayan alaka da abin da ya kunshi jini ko ruwan jiki.', 'en': ' after exposure to blood/body fluids '}
{'ha': 'Kafin aiki aseptic, dakuma', 'en': ' before an aseptic task, and '}

{'ha': 'bayan jiyyan mara lafiya. Karin sinadarin kashe cuta a sabulu (sabulun "maganin cuta" ko "maganin kwayoyin cuta) yana kara karfin kashe cuta ga man wanke hannu.', 'en': ' after patient care.The addition of antiseptic chemicals to soap ("medicated" or "antimicrobial" soaps) confers killing action to a hand-washing agent. '}

{'ha': "Ana iya son irin wannan kisan kafin a yi aikin tiyata ko a saiti, acikin kwayoyin juriya masu daukaka sosai, cuda hannuwa don aikin tiyata, wajibi ne a sami famfo wanda za'a iya kunna da kashewa ba tare da taɓawa da hannu ba, Wasu chlorhexidine ko aidin na wanke abu, bakararren tawul don bushewar hannu bayan an wanke, da bakararren burushi saboda cudawa da kuma wasu bakararren kayan aiki don tsaftace karkashin farce.", 'en': " Such killing action may be desired prior to performing surgery or in settings in which antibiotic-resistant organisms are highly prevalent.To 'scrub' one's hands for a surgical operation, it is necessary to have a tap that can be turned on and off without touching it with the hands, some chlorhexidine or iodine wash, sterile towels for drying the hands after washing, and a sterile brush for scrubbing and another sterile instrument for cleaning under the fingernails. "}
{'ha': 'A cire dukan kayan ado.', 'en': ' All jewelry should be removed. '}
{'ha': 'Wannan hanya na bukatan wanke hannaye akalla mintuna 2 zuwa 6.', 'en': ' This procedure requires washing the hands and forearms up to the elbow, usually 2–6 minutes. '}
{'ha': 'Dogon lokacin-gogewa (minti 10) ba lallai ba ne.', 'en': ' Long scrub-times (10 minutes) are not necessary. '}
{'ha': 'Yayinda ake wanke hannaye, kada a yarda a bar ruwa a gaban hannu yana komawa bayan hannu.', 'en': ' When rinsing, water on the forearms must be prevented from running back to the hands. '}

{'ha': 'Bayan an gama wanke hannu, hannayen sun bushe da kayan mara tabarau kuma an yi wa kayan wanki tiyata.', 'en': ' After hand-washing is completed, the hands are dried with a sterile cloth and a surgical gown is donned. '}

{'ha': 'Don rage yaduwar kwayar cuta, yana da kyaw a wanke hannuwa ko anfani da sabulun kariya kafin da kuma bayan dubawar mara lafiya.', 'en': ' To reduce the spread of germs, it is better to wash the hands or use a hand antiseptic before and after tending to a sick person. '}

{'ha': 'Domin magance kamuwa da cutan staphylococcal a asibitai, an gano cewa babban amfanin wanke hannu har kashi 20% da karamar karin amfanin wanda aka samo lokacin wanke hannu kullum ya karu fiye da kashi 35%.', 'en': ' For control of staphylococcal infections in hospitals, it has been found that the greatest benefit from hand-cleansing came from the first 20% of washing, and that very little additional benefit was gained when hand cleansing frequency was increased beyond 35%. '}

{'ha': 'Wankewa da sabulu na yau da kullun yana haifar da sakamako sama da sau uku na ƙwayar cuta ta kwayar cutar zuwa abinci idan aka kwatanta da wanka tare da sabulu mai ƙwayar cuta. Kwatanta hannun-shafa tare da maganin shaye-shaye tare da wankewar hannu tare da sabulu na kwayar cuta na tsawon mintuna 30 na kowannensu ya nuna cewa barasa mai amfani da giya ya rage gurbatar kwayar cuta 26% fiye da sabulu na kwayar cuta.', 'en': ' Washing with plain soap results in more than triple the rate of bacterial infectious disease transmitted to food as compared to washing with antibacterial soap.Comparing hand-rubbing with alcohol-based solution with hand washing with antibacterial soap for a median time of 30 seconds each showed that the alcohol hand-rubbing reduced bacterial contamination 26% more than the antibacterial soap. '}

{'ha': "Amma sabulu da ruwa yafi inganci akan sinadarin man alcohol wanda ake gogawa don raguwar H1N1 na cutar amai da gudawa dakuma clostridium defficile spores daga hannu, Ayyuka don inganta tsabtace hannu a cikin tsarin kula da lafiya na iya haɓaka ilimi ga ma'aikata a kan wanke hannu, da wadatar samar da sinadarin wanke hannu na goga wa da rubutattun fi'iloli da tunatarwa ga ma'aikatan.", 'en': ' But soap and water is more effective than alcohol-based hand rubs for reducing H1N1 influenza A virus and Clostridium difficile spores from hands.Interventions to improve hand hygiene in healthcare settings can involve education for staff on hand washing, increasing the availability of alcohol-based hand rub, and written and verbal reminders to staff. '}

{'ha': 'Akwai buƙatar ƙarin bincike, a gano aciki wannen suka fi tasiri a tsarin kulawa da lafiya daban-daban.', 'en': ' There is a need for more research into which of these interventions are most effective in different healthcare settings. '}

{'ha': 'A kasashe masu tasowa, ana ganin wanke hannu da sabulu a matsayin hanya mai sauki, hanya mai kyau na samun lafiya, da ma cin abinci mai kyau.', 'en': ' In developing countries, hand washing with soap is recognized as a cost-effective, essential tool for achieving good health, and even good nutrition. '}

{'ha': 'Ko da yake rashin ingantaccen ruwan sha, sabulu da kayan wanke hannu a gidaje, makarantu da wurin aiki ya sa yazama ƙalubale don cimma yanayin wanke hannu na duniya.', 'en': " However, a lack of reliable water supply, soap or hand washing facilities in people's homes, at schools and at the workplace make it a challenge to achieve universal hand washing behaviors. "}

{'ha': 'Misali a mafi yawan yankunan karkara na afirca famfunan wanke hannu na kusa da bayan gida na gwamnati kona gida yana da karanci, dukda cewa akwai zaɓuɓɓuka masu arha don gina tashoshin wanke hannu.', 'en': ' For example, in most of rural Africa hand washing taps close to every private or public toilet are scarce, even though cheap options exist to build hand washing stations. '}

{'ha': "Kodayake ƙarancin filin wanke-wanke yana iya zama sakamakon al'ada maimakon rashin sabulu da ruwa.", 'en': ' However, low hand washing rates rather can also be the result of engrained habits rather than due to a lack of soap or water. '}

{'ha': 'Bayar da shawarwari a kan wanke hannu da sabulu na iya yin tasiri wurin yanke shawara, kara sani a kan muhimmancin wanke hannu kuma na iya kawo canjin halayan mutane.', 'en': ' The promotion and advocacy of hand washing with soap can influence policy decisions, raise awareness about the benefits of hand washing and lead to long-term behavior change of the population. '}
{'ha': 'Don wannan yayi aiki yadda yakamata, saka idanu da kimantawa wajibi ne.', 'en': ' For this to work effectively, monitoring and evaluation are necessary. '}

{'ha': 'A wata bita na bincike guda 70 ta nuna hanyan wayar da kai kan wanke hannu cikin al’umma ta fi inganci a wajen kara amincewa da wanke hannu a LMICs, sannan camfen na tallan jama’a ba shi da wani inganci mai kyau. Wata misali domin wayar da kai kan wanke hannu a makarantu shine “Three Star Approach” wadda UNICEF ta kago wanda ke karfafa makarantu su dauki matakai marasa sada domin ganin cewa dalibai sun wanke hannayensu da sabulu, tare da wasu hanyoyi na tsafta.', 'en': ' A systematic review of 70 studies found that community-based approaches are effective at increasing hand washing in LMICs, while social marketing campaigns are less effective.One example for hand washing promotion in schools is the "Three Star Approach" by UNICEF that encourages schools to take simple, inexpensive steps to ensure that students wash their hands with soap, among other hygienic requirements. '}
{'ha': 'Idan aka iya cimma burin,makarantu na iya masawa zuwa fanni na tauraron karshe.', 'en': ' When minimum standards are achieved, schools can move from one to ultimately three stars. '}

{'ha': 'Gina wuraren wanke hannu na iya zama hanya ta kamfen da gabatarwa da ake yi domin rage cututtuka da mutuwan yara kanana.', 'en': ' Building hand washing stations can be a part of hand washing promotion campaigns that are carried out in order to reduce diseases and child mortality. '}

{'ha': 'Ranar wanke hannu na duniya wata misali ce ta kara sani da ke kokarin canza halaya. Sakamakon anobar cutan coronavirus 2019-20, UNICEF ta inganta amfani da emoji na wanke hannu.', 'en': ' Global Hand washing Day is another example of an awareness-raising campaign that is trying to achieve behavior change.As a result of the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, UNICEF promoted the adoption of a handwashing emoji. '}

{'ha': "''Yan nazarin kalilan sun yi la’akari da tasirin farashin wanke hannu a kasashe masu tasowa, a cikin alaƙar da aka hana DALY.", 'en': ' Few studies have considered the overall cost effectiveness of hand washing in developing countries in relationship to DALYs averted. '}

{'ha': 'Koyaya, an bada shawara cewa inganta wanke hannu da sabulu yana da matukar tasiri fiye da sauran ruwa da tsabta.', 'en': ' However, one review suggests that promoting hand washing with soap is significantly more cost-effective than other water and sanitation interventions. '}

{'ha': 'Muhimmancin wanke hannu domin lafiya mutum musamman ma mutanen da ke mummunan yanayi kamar uwaye da suka haihu ko kuma sojoji da suke da rauni a asibiti tana da asali ne a tsakiyan karni ta sha tara (19th Century) ta wurin majagaba na tsabtan hannu guda biyu. ikitan Hugary Ignaz Semmelweis wanda ya yi aiki a Vienna, Austria da Florence Nightingale, baturiya “da ta kafa reno na zamani”.', 'en': ' The importance of hand washing for human health – particularly for people in vulnerable circumstances like mothers who had just given birth or wounded soldiers in hospitals – was first recognized in the mid 19th century by two pioneers of hand hygiene: the Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis who worked in Vienna, Austria and Florence Nightingale, the English "founder of modern nursing". '}

{'ha': 'A lokacin can yawancin mutane sun gaskanta cewa kamuwa da cutar na faruwa ne ta wurin wani wari mai suna miasmas.', 'en': ' At that time most people still believed that infections were caused by foul odors called miasmas. '}

{'ha': 'A shekarun 1980, barkewar cuta daga abinci da haɗarin kamuwa da cuta don rashin kulawa da lafiya ya kai Cibiyar Kula da Cututtuka da Kariya na U.S. wato U.S Center for Disease Control and Prevention ga karfafawar tsabtacewar hannu a matseyin hanya mai dacewa ga kariya daga yaduwar cututtuka.', 'en': ' In the 1980s, foodborne outbreaks and healthcare-associated infections led the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to more actively promote hand hygiene as an important way to prevent the spread of infection. '}

{'ha': 'Cutar amai da gudawa a shekara ta 2009 da cutar ta COVID-19 a 2020 ta haifar da fadakarwa a kasashe da dama mahimmancin wanke hannu da sabulu don kare kai daga irin wannan cutar.', 'en': ' The outbreak of swine flu in 2009 and the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020 led to increased awareness in many countries of the importance of washing hands with soap to protect oneself from such infectious diseases. '}

{'ha': 'A misali, an rataya takaddan wayar da kai mai dauke da “hanyoyi ingantattu na wanke hannu,” kusa da inda ake wanke hannu a wurin bayi na jama’a da kuma wurin ba haya na ma’aikatu da filiayen jiragen sama a Jamus.', 'en': ' For example, posters with "correct hand washing techniques" were hung up next to hand washing sinks in public toilets and in the toilets of office buildings and airports in Germany. '}

{'ha': 'Kalamai nan "wanke hannun wani" wani abu, yana nufin ayyana waɗanda basu yarda ba su ɗauki alhakin abin ko kuma suka yi tarayya cikin wahala.', 'en': ' The phrase "washing one\'s hands of" something, means declaring one\'s unwillingness to take responsibility for the thing or share complicity in it. '}

{'ha': 'Ya samo asali daga nassi na Baibul a cikin matthew, inda Pontius Pilate ya wanke hannun sa don giciye Yesu Kristi, amma sun zama zance tare da yawan yin amfani cikin al’uman Turanci.', 'en': ' It originates from the bible passage in Matthew where Pontius Pilate washed his hands of the decision to crucify Jesus Christ, but has become a phrase with a much wider usage in some English communities. '}

{'ha': 'A takaddan Shakespeare mai suna Macbeth, Lady Macbeth ta fara naciyan wanke hannaye da tunanin share tabo da take tunani, wadda ya nuna lamirinta ya kasheta a kan laifi da ta aikata kuma ta sa mijinta aikatawa.', 'en': " In Shakespeare's Macbeth, Lady Macbeth begins to compulsively wash her hands in an attempt to cleanse an imagined stain, representing her guilty conscience regarding crimes she had committed and induced her husband to commit. "}

{'ha': 'An kuma gano cewa wasu mutane sukan wanke hannayensu sau da yawa, fiye da sauran jama’a bayan sun yi tunanin aikata wani abin da ya saba wa doka, kuma sukan martaba kayan wanke hannu fiye da saura.', 'en': ' It has also been found that people, after having recalled or contemplated unethical acts, tend to wash hands more often than others, and tend to value hand washing equipment more. '}

{'ha': 'Bugu da kari, wadanda aka barsu su wanke hannayensu bayan irin wannan ayukan ba a samani za su yi wani aikin tsaftacewa na ramako, kamar sadaukarwa.', 'en': ' Furthermore, those who are allowed to wash their hands after such a contemplation are less likely to engage in other "cleansing" compensatory actions, such as volunteering. '}

{'ha': 'Addinai suna gargadin wanke hannu domin tsabta da alaman ibada. Wanke hannu domin ibada, amfani da ruwa amma banda sabulu domin wanke hannaye, yana cikin wanke hannu domin ibada a addinai da yawa, ya hada da Imanin Baha’i, Hinduism, tevilah da netilat yadayim a Judaism, Lavado a Kiristanci, da wundu a Islam. Addinai su ma suna gargadin tsabtan wanke hannu, musamman bayan wasu ayuka.', 'en': " Religions prescribe hand washing for both hygienic and symbolic purposes.Symbolic hand washing, using water but no soap to wash hands, is a part of ritual hand washing featured in many religions, including Bahá'í Faith, Hinduism, tevilah and netilat yadayim in Judaism, Lavabo in Christianity, and Wudhu in Islam.Religions also prescribe hygienic hand washing, especially after certain actions. "}
{'ha': 'Addinin hindu, juda da addinin musulunci sun yarda da wanke hannaye bawai anfani da bayan gida.', 'en': ' Hinduism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands after using the toilet. '}

{'ha': 'Sannan Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism da Islam suna da umurnin wanke hannu kafin a ci abinci ko bayan kowanne cin abinci.', 'en': ' And, Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands before and after every meal. '}
{'ha': 'Kula da hadarin wurin aiki domin cutar COVID-19', 'en': ' Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19 '}

{'ha': 'Lura da hadarin wurin aiki daga CoVID-19 suna kariya a wurin aiki da hanyoyin kiwon lafiya don lura da hadari zuwa kare mutane daga kamuwa da cutar coronavirus COVID-19 shekarar 2019.', 'en': ' Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19 are the application of occupational safety and health methodologies for hazard controls to the prevention of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19). '}

{'ha': 'Lurawa na kwarai ga hadari a wurin aiki ya danganta ga yanayin wurin aikin da aikin, dangane da bincikan hadari dake tare da wurin yaduwan cutar, tsananin cutar a al’uma, da kuma hadari dake tare da ma’aikata wanda suna iya kamuwa da COVID-19.', 'en': ' The proper hazard controls in the workplace depend on the worksite and job task, based on a risk assessment of sources of exposure, disease severity in the community, and risk factors of individual workers who may be vulnerable to contracting COVID-19. '}

{'ha': "Dangane da Hukumar Kula da Lafiya da Kiwon Lafiya wato Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), hadarin bayyana ga kankantan aikin huldawa tare da jama’a da wasu abokan aiki wanda ake bada shawarar matakan kariya na kamuwa da cuta, hade da wanke hannu, karfafa ma’aikata su kasance a gida idan ba su da lafiya, Da'awar numfashi, shara na yau da kullun, share da kashe kwayar cuta a yanayin wurin aiki.", 'en': ' According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers, for which basic infection prevention measures are recommended, including hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment. '}
