{'ha': 'Aiki wadanda suke da haɗarin cutar sun haɗa da waɗanda ke buƙata kulum ko huldawa da mutane ba a san su ba ko zaton suna da cutar COVID-19, amma suna iya kamuwa saboda yaduwar da ke kan faruwa cikin al’umma ko tafiya kasar waje.', 'en': ' Medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact with people who are not known or suspected with COVID-19, but may be infected due to ongoing community transmission or international travel. '}

{'ha': 'Hakan ya hada da ma’aikata wadanda suke da hulɗa da jama’a kamar makarantu, yanayin da akwai yawan jama’a, da wuraren da ake yawan saye-saye.', 'en': ' This includes workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings. '}

{'ha': 'Kulawar haɗari ga wadannan rukuni, bugu da kari game da hanyoyin karewar daga kamuwa da cuta ya hada da, na’urar bada iska wanda ke amfani da abun tacewar iska maikyau, abin rufe atishawa da samun kayayyakin sa a jiki idan har akwai wanda ya kamu da cutar COVID-19.', 'en': ' Hazard controls for this group, in addition to basic infection prevention measures, include ventilation using high-efficiency air filters, sneeze guards, and having personal protective equipment available in case a person with COVID-19 is encountered. '}

{'ha': "OSHA tana ɗaukar ma'aikatan kiwon lafiya da ma’aikatan gidan da aka fallasa ga sanannen mutum ko wanda ake zargi da COVID-19 kasance cikin haɗarin haɗari sosai, wanda ke ƙaruwa zuwa babban haɗarin haɗuwa idan ma’aikata suka bi ka’idar fesawar aerosl, ko tattarawa ko sarrafa samfuran daga, sanannu ko mutumin da ake zaton yana da cutar COVID-19.", 'en': ' OSHA considers healthcare and mortuary workers exposed to known or suspected person with COVID-19 to be at high exposure risk, which increases to very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected person with COVID-19. '}

{'ha': 'Lurawar hadari wanda ke daidai ga ma’aikata na hade da lurar Injiniya kamar su dakin matsin na’urar iska, da kayayyakin kariyar ma’aikata wanda ya dace ga aikin.', 'en': ' Hazard controls appropriate for these workers include engineering controls such as negative pressure ventilation rooms, and personal protective equipment appropriate to the job task. '}
{'ha': 'Barkewar cOVID-19 na iya samun matsaloli dayawa daga wuring aiki.', 'en': ' COVID-19 outbreaks can have several effects within the workplace. '}

{'ha': 'Ma’aikata ka iya yin fashi aiki saboda rashin lafiya, ko don su kula da wasu, ko don tsoron kamuda da cutar.', 'en': ' Workers may be absent from work due to becoming sick, needing to care for others, or from fear of possible exposure. '}

{'ha': 'Tsarin kasuwanci na iya canzawa, har ta bangaren wande irin kaya ake bukata, da yadda za ‘a samar da kayayyakin (Kamar sayen kaya a cikin dare ko ta hanyar drive-through sabis wato).', 'en': ' Patterns of commerce may change, both in terms of what goods are demanded, and the means of acquiring these goods (such as shopping at off-peak hours or through delivery or drive-through services). '}

{'ha': 'A karshe, kuma kayan da aka turo a nahiyoyi wuraren da ke da tsananin cutar COVID-19 na iya katsewa. Shiryawa don cuta wanda ke yaduwa za a iya amfani da tsarin amsa a mataseyin jagorar aikin kariya.', 'en': ' Lastly, shipments of items from geographic areas severely affected by COVID-19 may be interrupted.An infectious disease preparedness and response plan can be used to guide protective actions. '}

{'ha': 'Tsari mai kyau ne yake rage hadarin dake tattare da wuraren ayuka da aikin yi, ya hada da inda aka kamu da cuta, lamuran tasowar hadarin daga gida da yanayin al’umma, da lamuran hadarin masun aiki kamar yawan shekaru ko wata yanayin lafiya mai tsanani.', 'en': ' Plans address the levels of risk associated with various worksites and job tasks, including sources of exposure, risk factors arising from home and community settings, and risk factors of individual workers such as old age or chronic medical conditions. '}

{'ha': 'Sun nuna tsarin lura wanda sun dace ga hadarorin, da tsarin gaba domin irin wannan hali wanda zai iya faruwa kum domin barkewar.', 'en': ' They also outline controls necessary to address those risks, and contingency plans for situations that may arise as a result of outbreaks. '}

{'ha': 'Shirin cututtuka masun yadawa da shirin amsawa za su iya zama taken shawarwarin kasa ko gefen kasa.', 'en': ' Infectious disease preparedness and response plans may be subject to national or subnational recommendations. '}

{'ha': 'Manufofin samun bayanai idan an samu bulluwar cuta ya hada da rage yaduwarsa a tsakanin ma’aikata, kare lafiyar mutanen da ake ganin yafi saurin kamasu, gyara tsarin kasuwanci da muka rage cakuduwar wasu wanda suke kan tsarin.', 'en': ' Objectives for response to an outbreak include reducing transmission among staff, protecting people who are at higher risk for adverse health complications, maintaining business operations, and minimizing adverse effects on other entities in their supply chains. '}
{'ha': 'CUtar na da tasiri a unguwani inda sana’o’i ke gudana.', 'en': ' The disease severity in the community where the business is located affects the responses taken. '}

{'ha': 'Bibiyar lurawan hadari wata tsari ne wanda ake amfani da ita ko ina cikin lafiyar wuring aiki da lafiya zuwa hadarin rukuni ta muhimanci.', 'en': ' The hierarchy of hazard controls is a framework widely used in occupational safety and health to group hazard controls by effectiveness. '}

{'ha': 'Inda baza a iya cirewar hadarin COVID-19 ba, lura mafi kyau su ne lurar injiniya, lurar gudanarwa ke bi, a karshe kayayyakin kariyar sa a jiki.', 'en': ' Where COVID-19 hazards cannot be eliminated, the most effective controls are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and lastly personal protective equipment. '}

{'ha': 'Lurar Injiniya ya danganta ga warewar ma’aikata daga hadarin da ta shafi aiki ba tare da dogara kan halayen ma’aikata ba, kuma zai zama mafita mai arha wanda aka aiwatar.', 'en': ' Engineering controls involve isolating employees from work-related hazards without relying on worker behavior, and can be the most cost-effective solution to implement. '}

{'ha': 'Hukumar lura na canja yanayin aiki da tsari da zai bukaci hobbasa na ma’aikaci.', 'en': ' Administrative controls are changes in work policy or procedures that require action by the worker or employer. '}

{'ha': 'Kayayyakin kariya wato Personal Protective Equipent (PPE) ana ganin kamar baida karfin kariya amma zai taimaka wajen rage wata cutar, amma zai iya rage kamuwa da cutan.', 'en': ' Personal protective equipment (PPE) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent some exposures. '}

{'ha': 'Duk na’uin PPE dole a zabe su kafin hadarin ya afku ga ma’aikaci, asa shi yadda ya kamata (Ms. abin numfashi), asahi akoda yaushe kuma da kyau, kuma a rika duba shi akai-akai, a kuma canja idan ya kama kuma a cire, a wanke, a addana shi da kyau don gudun shina ya jirkita.', 'en': ' All types of PPE must be selected based upon the hazard to the worker, properly fitted as applicable (e.g., respirators), consistently and properly worn, regularly inspected, maintained, and replaced, as necessary, and properly removed, cleaned, and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination. '}

{'ha': 'Bisa ga Kariyar Wurin Aiki da Gudanarwar Lafiya wato Occupational Safety and Health Administration na U.S. (OSHA), karamin bayyana cikin hadarin wurin aiki na da kankancin huldawar ma’aikaci da jama’a da wasu ma’aikaci.', 'en': ' According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers. '}

{'ha': 'Asali tsarin kariya daga kamuwa da cuta ya bada shawarar ga duk wuraren aiki sun hada da cikakken wanke hanu kullum, karfafarwa ma’aikata su kasance a gida idan ba su da lafiya, da’ar hanyoyin numfashi tare da rufin tari da atishawa, samarwar rumbun takarda da shara, shirya wajen aiki daga gida ko kuma juyin jefi-jefi idan an buƙaci haka, hana ma’aikata daga amfani da kayan aikin da kayan wasu, da kiyaye tsabtatawar rage cutan da kuma lalata yanayin aiki.', 'en': " Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette including covering coughs and sneezes, providing tissues and trash receptacles, preparing for telecommuting or staggered shifts if needed, discouraging workers from using others' tools and equipment, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment. "}

{'ha': 'Saurin Ganowa da kuma kebe wanda suke da cutar shine hanya mafi inganci wanjen kare lafiyar ma’aikat, kwastamomi. baki da kuma wanda suke wuraren aikin su.', 'en': ' Prompt identification and isolation of potentially infectious individuals is a critical step in protecting workers, customers, visitors, and others at a worksite. '}

{'ha': 'Sashen bangaren kula da cututtuka da kariya na U.S. wato U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) tace ma’aikata da suke da alamomin ciwon numashi su zauna a gida har sai sun warke, idan alamun zazzabi ya dade har ya kai tsawon awa 24 batare da ya ragu ba ko alamar bai jin magani kuma hutun rashin lafiya yayi daidai to abar ma;aikaci ya zauna agida ya yi jinyar mara lafiyar tunda sun san tsare-tsaren.', 'en': ' The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness are to stay home until they are free of fever, signs of a fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing or other symptom-altering medicines, and that sick leave policies are flexible, permit employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies. '}

{'ha': "A fadawar OSHA, aiki wadanda suke da haɗarin cutar sun haɗa da waɗanda ke buƙata kulum ko huldawa tsakanin ƙafa shida (1.8 m) na mutanen da ba a san su ba ko kuma waɗanda ake ganin suna da cutar COVID-19, amma suna iya kamuwa da SARS-CoV-2 saboda yaduwar cutar tsakanin al'umma a wuraren kasuwanci, ko kuma saboda wani yayi tafiya a wata ƙasa zuwa wani wuri mai wanda yaduwar COVID-19 ya faru.", 'en': ' According to OSHA, medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact within six feet (1.8 m) of people who are not known or suspected COVID-19 patients, but may be infected with SARS-CoV-2 due to ongoing community transmission around the business location, or because the individual has recent international travel to a location with widespread COVID-19 transmission. '}

{'ha': "Waɗannan sun haɗa da ma'aikata waɗanda ke da hulɗa tare da dukan jama'a kamar a makarantu, wuraren aiki mai yanayin aiki wanda akwai yawan jama’a kwarai da gaske, da wuraren da ake yawan saye-saye. Sarrafawar injiniya don wannan da rukuni masun hadari ya hada da girkawar ingantaciyar mataciyar iska, karin adadin na’urar iska, girkawar shingen zahiri kamar na’uran roba na kariyar atishawa, da girkawar tagar drive-through domin hidimar abokan ciniki. Lura na mai gudanarwa domin wannan da rukuni mafi hadari wanda suka hada da karfafa ma’aikacin da ba su da lafiya su zauna a gida, canza haduwar fuska-ta-fuska da sadarwar nesa, kaddamar da juying aiki, bar tafiye-tafiyen da babu kan ta zuwa inda akwai barkewar cutar COVID-19, haɓaka tsarin sadarwa na gaggawa hade da taron amsa damuwan ma'aikatan, samar da ma'aikata ingantaccen ilimi da horo kan dalilan haɗarin COVID-19 da halayyar kariya, ma'aikatan horo waɗanda suke buƙatar yin amfani da kare sutura da kayan aiki yadda za a yi amfani da shi, samar da albarkatu da yanayin aiki wanda ke inganta tsabtace mutum, buƙatar wanke hannu na yau da kullun, iyakance abokan ciniki da kuma damar samun dama ga masu aiki, da kuma sanya hannu kan batun Wanke hannu da sauran matakan kariya na COVID-19.Doke kan aikin, ma’aikatan da ke da hatsarin aƙalla na matsakaici na iya buƙatar sa kayan kariya na sirri da suka haɗa da wasu safofin hannu, gown, garkuwar fuska ko abin rufe fuska, ko goggles.", 'en': " These include workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.Engineering controls for this and higher risk groups include installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic sneeze guards, and installing a drive-through window for customer service.Administrative controls for this and higher risk groups include encouraging sick workers to stay at home, replacing face-to-face meetings with virtual communications, establishing staggered shifts, discontinuing nonessential travel to locations with ongoing COVID-19 outbreaks, developing emergency communications plans including a forum for answering workers’ concerns, providing workers with up-to-date education and training on COVID-19 risk factors and protective behaviors, training workers who need to use protecting clothing and equipment how to use it, providing resources and a work environment that promotes personal hygiene, requiring regular hand washing, limiting customers' and the public's access to the worksite, and posting signage about hand washing and other COVID-19 protective measures.Depending on the work task, workers with at least medium exposure risk may need to wear personal protective equipment including some combination of gloves, a gown, a face shield or face mask, or goggles. "}
{'ha': 'Ma’aikaci wanda suke a cikin rukunin masun hadari suna bukatar amfani da na’uran iska.', 'en': ' Workers in this risk group rarely require use of respirators. '}

{'ha': "Idan mutum ya kamu da rashin lafiya a cikin jirgin sama, madaidaiciyar iko don kare ma'aikata da sauran fasinjoji sun haɗa da rarrabe mara lafiya da wasu tazara ta ƙafa 6, zayyana daya daga cikin matukan jirgin don bautar da mara lafiya, da kuma bayar da abin rufe fuska ga mara lafiya ko tambayar mai mara lafiyar ya rufe bakinsu da hanci da kyallen takarda yayin tari ko atishawa.", 'en': ' If a person becomes sick on an airplane, proper controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by a distance of 6 feet, designating one crew member to serve the sick person, and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues when coughing or sneezing. '}

{'ha': 'Masu bin jirgin ruwa su sa safar hannun asibiti lokacin da ake kula da matafiyin mara lafiya ko tabawar ruwan jiki ko yiwuwar gurbatan muhalli, da yiwuwar ƙarin kayan aikin kariya idan matafiyi mara lafiyan na da zazzabi, tari mai dauriya, ko wahalar numfashi.', 'en': ' Cabin crew should wear disposable medical gloves when tending to a sick traveler or touching body fluids or potentially contaminated surfaces, and possibly additional personal protective equipment if the sick traveler has fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing. '}

{'ha': "Safar hannu da sauran abubuwan da za'a iya zubar dasu a cikin jakar hadarin kwayoyin, fuskar abubawa wanda suna da cutar yakamata a tsabtace shi kuma a cire cutar bayan haka. Don jigilar kasuwanci, hade da jiragen shakatawa da sauran jiragen fasinjoji, sarrafa haɗari sun haɗa da jinkirta tafiya lokacin rashin lafiya, da waren kai da kuma sanar da cibiyar kula da lafiya kai tsaye idan mutum ya kamu da zazzabi ko wasu alamun yayin da ake tafiya.", 'en': ' Gloves and other disposable items should be disposed of in a biohazard bag, and contaminated surfaces should be cleaned and disinfected afterwards.For commercial shipping, including cruise ships and other passenger vessels, hazard controls include postponing travel when sick, and self-isolating and informing the onboard medical center immediately if one develops a fever or other symptoms while on board. '}

{'ha': 'Mafi kyawu abi da tsarin kiwon lafiya a wurin da ake kebe mutane. A makarantu da wurin kula da yara, CDC tace yakamata a dan rufe su don a samu a tsaftace wurin koda an samu mai dauke da ciwon da makaratar batare da dubiya da yaduwarsa a unguwaba.', 'en': " Ideally, medical follow-up should occur in the isolated person's cabin.For schools and childcare facilities, CDC recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread. "}

{'ha': 'Idan akwai dan yaduwa cutar kadan a al-umma, sai a samu tsarin bada tazara kamar hana zirga-zirga, taro, harda manya tarurruka kamar daura or ajin choir, ko wurin cin abinci, sai a matsar da tebura, da lokutan tashi, rage masu ziyara wandanda basu zama wajibi ba, da kuma ware wani sashe na yare wanda suke da alamun mura.', 'en': ' When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms. '}

{'ha': 'Lokacin da akwai yaduwar cuta cikin al’umar gida, bugu da kari ga zaman nesa, dogon kwanakin hutu daga makarantu ana iya sa cikin lisafi. Ga ma’aikacin iyansanda wadanda su ke aikinsu na yau da kullum, hadarin kamuwa da cutan yana kasa haka CDC suka fada.', 'en': ' When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.For law enforcement personnel performing daily routine activities, the immediate health risk is considered low by CDC. '}

{'ha': 'Jami’an mahukunta wadanda dole ne su hadu da mutanen da aka same su da cutar ko ake zaton suna da COVID-19 ana shawartarsu da bin dokokin gaggawa na masun aikin asibiti, tare da ingantaccen kayan aikin kariya.', 'en': ' Law enforcement officials who must make contact with individuals confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19 are recommended to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical technicians, including proper personal protective equipment. '}

{'ha': 'idan an samu huldawa lokacin tsoro, ma’aikaci su share da tsaftace kayayyakin aikin su kafin a sake aiki da su ta amfani da abin fesawa na gida ko sharewa, da bin umurin amfani da su domin isawa da yarwa da PPE wanda aka yi amfani da ita da wanke kayan sa wa.', 'en': ' If close contact occurs during apprehension, workers should clean and disinfect their duty belt and gear prior to reuse using a household cleaning spray or wipe, and follow standard operating procedures for the containment and disposal of used PPE and for containing and laundering clothes. '}

{'ha': 'OSHA na duba yiwuwar wani bangaren kiwon lafiya da ma’aikata wurin ajiye gawa domin zama a tsaye domin hadarin kamuwa da cutan.', 'en': ' OSHA considers certain healthcare and mortuary workers to be at high or very high categories of exposure risk. '}

{'ha': 'Hadarin ayuka wadanda ke da bayyanarwar mutum sun hadu da ma’aikan kiwon lafiya, tallafi, dakin gwaji da ma’aikatan jigilar asibiti wadanda a bayyanai suke ga mai kamu da cutan ko wanda ake zato na da COVID-19.', 'en': ' High exposure risk jobs include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to known or suspected COVID-19 patients. '}

{'ha': 'Sukan zama cikin hadari sosai idan ma’aikata suka bi ka’idar fesawar aerosl wato aerosol-generating, ko amsar abun gwaji daga wanda ake zargin nada coVID-19.', 'en': ' These become very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected COVID-19 patients. '}

{'ha': 'ka’idar fesawar aerosl wato aerosal generating pocedures ya hada da shigarwa, kakalo tari , da kuma ain da ya shafiy huhu da sauransu.', 'en': ' Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection. '}

{'ha': 'Wanda hadarin yafi akansu sune aikin gidan ajiye gawa sun hada da ma’aikaci wadanda ke gyara gawakin mutanen da aka san su ko ana ganin kamar suna dauke da COVID-19 a lokacin mutuwar su; wadanan suna da hadari sosai idan sun gwada gawan. Karin sarrafawar injiniya a wadannan rukuni masun hadarin cutar ya hada da dakunan kebe wadanda suka kamu da cutar ko wadanda ake zato suna da COVID-19 duk lokacin ka’idar fesawar aerosl wato aerosol-generating procedures.', 'en': ' High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed. '}

{'ha': 'Na’urar bada iska na musamman ya kan iya zaman daidai a wasu wuraren kiwo lafiya wuraren dakunan ajiye gawaki.', 'en': ' Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings. '}
{'ha': 'Ya kamata a rike dukan samfura da matakan kariya uku na lafiyar halita wato Biosafety Level 3 prcaution.', 'en': ' Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions. '}

{'ha': 'Hukumar lafiya ta duniya (WHO) sun bada shawarar cewa a kebe sabbin marasa lafiya a wasu wurare daban zai dangata ko wani ne wanda ya kamu da cutar COVID-19.. Bugu da kari zuwa wasu PPE, OSHA an shawarta yin amfani da na’urar bada iska ga wadanda suke aiki tsakanin kafa 6 ga marasa lafiyan da aka sani ko wanda ake gani na da cutar, SARS-COV-2, da wadanda ke yin ka’idar fesawar aerosl wato aerosol-generating procedures.', 'en': ' The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures. '}

{'ha': 'A kasar Amurka, NIOSH ta amince da N95 don tace abin numfashi ko ma yin amfani dasu da kyau, an samu kariya wanda ya hada da gwaji mai kyau, karantarwa da kuma gwajin asibiti.', 'en': ' In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams. '}

{'ha': 'Wasu na’uran iska suna iya karewa mai kyau tare da inganta jin dadin ma’aikata. WHO ba ta amince yin amfani da kabido ba, don COVID-19 ciwon ne na hanyar numfashi wanda ke yaduwa ta hanyar ruwan jiki.', 'en': ' Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids. '}
{'ha': 'WHO ta shawarta cewa abun rufe fuska na asibiti ya dace ga ma’aikan dubawa don point-of-entry.', 'en': ' WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel. '}

{'ha': 'Ga wadanda ke karban samfuring gwajin hanyar numfashi daga, lura wa, ko tafiyar da wanda ya kamu da COVID-19 ba tare da ka’idar fesawar aerosl ba wato aerosol-generating procedure, WHO ta shawarta cewa, abin rufe fuskar tiyata, tabarau, ko garkuwar fuska, babban riga, da safar hannu.', 'en': ' For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves. '}

{'ha': 'Idan an bi ka’idar fesawar aerosl wato aerosol-generating akayi, zai mayar da gurbin amfani da abin rufe fuskar asibiti wato N95 ko abin numfashi FFP2.', 'en': ' If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator. '}

{'ha': 'Ganin cewa wadatarwar PPE a duniya bai isa ba, WHO ta ba da shawarar rage buƙatar PPE ta hanyar ba da magunguna ta hanyar sadarwa, shinge na jiki kamar wani budadeyar abun rufe fuska, barin waɗanda ke da hannu cikin kulawa kai tsaye su shiga daki da mai kamu da cutar COVID-19 yake, yin amfani da PPE kawai don takamaiman aikin, ci gaba da amfani da na’urar bada iska wanda aka saba ba tare da cire shi ba yayin da kulawa da marasa lafiya da yawa da cuta iri daya, lura da daidaita wadatarwar yawan PPE, da kuma hana amfani da abin rufe fuska ga mutane da suke da alamar cutar.', 'en': ' Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals. '}
{'ha': 'DAGA: Katherine Maher, Shugaban Gidauniyar Wikimedia', 'en': ' FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO '}
{'ha': 'ZUWA: Dukka Ma’akacin Gidauniyar Wikimedia', 'en': ' TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff '}
{'ha': 'LAYIN TAKE: [Covid-19] Ragewar kayan da kuma shiri don gaba', 'en': ' SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future '}
{'ha': 'TURA KWANA/LOKACI: Ranar 14 ga watan Maris, 2020, 00:24 UTC', 'en': ' SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC '}
{'ha': 'Bada dama: CC0: No rights reserved', 'en': ' LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved '}
{'ha': 'Mun samu kanmu cikin wani yanayi kwarai a wannan watan.', 'en': ' We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month. '}

{'ha': 'Annobar COVID-19 wani abu ne da ke bayyanarwar dangantakar mu a duniya da kuma nauyin da ya rataya ga kowanen mu.', 'en': ' The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another. '}

{'ha': 'Ba mu da fi son domin kalubale, amma mun tsani cewa, amsar mu ya danganta ga tausayawa, hadin gwiwa da ginan al’uma wanda yake zaune cikin zuciyar gungiyar.', 'en': ' We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization. '}

{'ha': 'Zaman tare da kulawa da muka gani a cikin dukkanin abokan aikin namu kan imel, kira, da taɗi wani tabbaci ne na tabbataccen mutane muna da sa’a sosai don aiki tare.', 'en': ' The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with. '}
{'ha': 'Bazan yi kasa a gwuiwa ba na insaku cikin abokan aikina ba.', 'en': ' I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues. '}
{'ha': 'Makon jiya, wani ya raba godiyar sa ga aikin mu', 'en': ' Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work. '}

{'ha': 'Sun tunastar da ni yaddan duniyar ta iya sauya Wikipea ayanzu, wanda ta zama zakaran gwajin dafi ta kasance bude a yanar gizo kuma ga kowa', 'en': ' They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all. '}

{'ha': "Ayyukan ka sun sa wannan ya yiwu, shin ka kiyaye shafukan yanar gizon su tsaya ko abokan aikinmu sun biya ko kuma daga ajiyar al'ummomin mu.", 'en': ' Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe. '}
{'ha': 'Duniya tana bukatar bayanan da Wikipeidia ka bayarwa, fiye da haka yanzu.', 'en': ' The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever. '}

{'ha': 'Wannan lokaci ne wanda ba abin da mu ke yi ba ne, amma yadda muka yi shi, hakan zai tasiri sosai ga duniya.', 'en': ' This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world. '}

{'ha': 'Saboda amfani mqnufqr wannan da kuma irin rawar da zaka taka zamu yi wasu yan canje-canje a tsarin aikin namu wanda hakan zai fara a mako mai zuwa.', 'en': ' Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week. '}
{'ha': 'Daidaitawa ga aikin mu da tsarin aiki', 'en': ' Adjustments to our work and schedules '}

{'ha': 'Kamar yadda Robyn ya ce, su kungiya c wato c-team sun hadu a daren jiya sun tattauna kusantar mu da tsari don kwanaki da watanni masu zuwa.', 'en': ' As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months. '}

{'ha': 'A wannan zancen, mun duba abin da mu ka ga zai dace ga amsar abin da mu ke fuskanta da kuma kyakyawar hanya wanda zai rike kungiyar ta dace a wannan lokacin.', 'en': ' In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time. '}
{'ha': 'Muna so mu cire damuwa da tallafawa manufan mu ga dogon lokacin.', 'en': ' Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term. '}
{'ha': 'Idan kana son kara kira, shikenan.', 'en': ' If you need to dial back, that’s okay. '}
{'ha': 'Don duka ma’aikata, Yan kwangila da ma’aikatancu/', 'en': ' For all staff, contractors, and contract workers: '}

{'ha': 'Zatan aikin mu na ko wace rana zai zama kamar sa’oi 4 a rana, ko sa’oi 20 a mako har sai sanarwan nan gaba.', 'en': ' our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice. '}

{'ha': 'Ba zamu ba da hutu ba - idan zaka iya aiki sosai a sa’oin da aka saba, kungiyar za to iya aiki da kai.', 'en': ' We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, ba za a iya annabtar duniya a yanzu ba, kuma ya kamata a lura da kaunattatu, saya kayan miya, ko je wurin likita, lafiyar ku shine fifikon mu.', 'en': ' However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority. '}
{'ha': 'Ba mu bi lokacin ka', 'en': ' We are not tracking your time. '}
{'ha': 'Idan ba ku da lafiya, kada ku yi aiki', 'en': ' If you are sick, do not work. '}
{'ha': 'Wannan ya tafi batare da an yi magana ba, amma muna maganan sa.', 'en': ' This should go without saying, but we’re saying it. '}

{'ha': 'Babu ranar ciwo ko bukatar PTO fada wa manajan ku da taimakon sake kalandar kungiyar ku da tsarin tabbatar muhimin panin aiki.', 'en': ' No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered. '}

{'ha': '(Idan an maku gwaji aka tabbatar kuna dauke da cutar COVID-19, to kabar Bryan cikin T&C Ops san haka T&C zai taimaka wajen tabbatar da cewa lamarin ya samu kulawa ta mussamman).', 'en': ' (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management). '}
{'ha': "Za a biya cikakke Jama'ar sa’oi.", 'en': ' Hourly folks will be fully paid. '}

{'ha': 'Mun riga mun ce, kuma muna girmama dukkanin sadaukarwar mu ga iyar kwangilar mu da ma’aikata abokanin aikin sa’oi.', 'en': ' We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues. '}
{'ha': 'Za a biya kowa daidai da yanayin aikin da suka yi na awoyi kamar yadda yake.', 'en': ' Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances. '}
{'ha': 'Wannan ya hada da idan kana ciwo kuma ka kasa yin aiki.', 'en': ' This includes if you are sick and unable to work. '}
{'ha': 'Idan zaku yii aiki, zamu tallafa maka.', 'en': ' If you want to work, we support you. '}
{'ha': 'Mutane da yawa suna mafani da aiki a matsayin hanyar turo matsalolin su a duniya kewaye da mu.', 'en': ' Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us. '}
{'ha': 'Abin da muke yi na iya zama mai bada ladan gaske, musamman irin wadannan lokutan.', 'en': ' What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this. '}
{'ha': 'Haka kuma wannan game da kula da kaine', 'en': ' Again, this is about your self-care. '}

{'ha': 'Aikin mu shine yin magana da manajanka, sabo da mu san me muke bukata da yadda za mu iya daidaita.', 'en': ' Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly. '}
{'ha': 'Wasu ayyukan suna da muhimmanci.', 'en': ' Some work is considered essential. '}
{'ha': 'Akwai wasu abubuwan da ya kamata mu ci gaba da yi.', 'en': ' There are some things that we must keep doing. '}

{'ha': 'SRE, HR Ops, Dogaro da aminci, da teamsungiyoyin tara kuɗi (a tsakanin sauran) suna yin aiki mai mahimmanci wanda ke buƙatar ƙarin tallafi.', 'en': ' The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support. '}

{'ha': 'Za mu fara aiwatar da dukkan sashin don tantance manufofin yanzu kuma musanya hankali kan tallafawa abin da ke da muhimmanci a aikin mu.', 'en': ' We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission. '}
{'ha': 'Akwai sauran aiki mai yawa akanmu, amma zamu mai da hankali akan masu muhimmanci.', 'en': ' There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects. '}
{'ha': 'Raguwa yanzu ba zai cutar ba nan gaba.', 'en': ' Slowing now won’t hurt later. '}
{'ha': 'Bama shirin tafiya “karo-lokaci sau biyu don a cimma buri” idan annoban ta kare..', 'en': ' We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed. '}

{'ha': 'Baza a so ku yin aiki da karin awa ba domin yanzu lokacin gama aikin ba abu ne mai yiwuwa ba.', 'en': ' You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic. '}

{'ha': 'Mun yardacewa yanayi ya canja, kuma zamu yi aikin da zai samar da sabbin tsare-tsare aka lokaci idan ya kama.', 'en': ' We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate. '}
{'ha': 'Me ya faru da APP (Tsarin Shekara)?', 'en': ' What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)? '}

{'ha': 'Don iya canza zuwa yanayin yanzu da sa’oin ayukan mu na yau da kullum, muna tunanin canza lokacin domin iya kai ga tsarin mu na shekara 2020-2021', 'en': ' To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan. '}

{'ha': 'NIyyarmu shine mu kara jan tsarin mu na shekara 2019-2020 wanda zai bada lokacin kasafin kudi sosai don barin ma’aikata su bada hankalin su ga muhimin ayyuka, kulawar kai, da kulawar kaunatattu yayinda ake barin wadanda suke bukatar ko son aiki a ragen tsarin lokaci a cikin makonai masu zuwa.', 'en': ' Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks. '}

{'ha': 'Karin wannan lokacin ya kara rage shirin nauyin aiki da matsi a fadin kungiyar.', 'en': ' This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization. '}

{'ha': 'Zamu tura tsarin mu ga tsangayarmu mako mai zuwa tare da sabbin jami’ai da kungiya a kan tsarin mu na gaba don tabbatarwa.', 'en': ' We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation. '}
{'ha': 'Na gode wa kungiyar APP saboda jagoranci ku a wannan.', 'en': ' Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this. '}
{'ha': 'Matsayin ofishi, cikin hadari, da tsaftacewa', 'en': ' Office status, exposure, and cleaning '}

{'ha': 'A makon da ta gabata mun samu cewa daya daga cikin ma’aikacin na SF-BASEDya kamu da cutar COVID-19.', 'en': ' Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus. '}

{'ha': 'Duk da haka, cikin yawaltar kiyayewa, mun samo wata ƙungiya masu tsabtacewar kwayan cuta domin su share dukan farfajiya a ofishin mu na San Francisco.', 'en': ' However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office. '}

{'ha': 'A goge ko ina da abin kashe kwayoyin cuta don hana yaduwar cuta a wuri, harda hanyoyi da bangaren lungu na kasa.', 'en': ' They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor. '}

{'ha': 'Ginin na samun sabon yanayi na tsarin kulawa da lura na kayyayaki don tabbatar da lafiyar mutanenta.', 'en': ' The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants. '}
{'ha': 'Muna jin dadin cewa za a shirya ofishin duk lokacin da muka shirya dawowa.', 'en': ' We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return. '}

{'ha': 'Ofishin mu na DC wanda yake WeWork, wanda ya baiyanar da tsarin CoVID-19 damu da duk wani ma’aikacin DC-BASED', 'en': ' Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members. '}

{'ha': 'A makon da ta gabata, Ofishin mu na DC suka zama cikakken wuri tare da bayanan kariya daga San Francisco.', 'en': ' As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco. '}

{'ha': 'Kamar wasu abokan aikinmu wandanda ke da zama a NYC sun san,muna cikin tattaunawa game da bayar da wata wuri Brooklyn.', 'en': ' As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn. '}
{'ha': 'Ana cin gaba da wadannan zance amma ya kan yi jinkiri.', 'en': ' These discussions are continuing but may be delayed. '}
{'ha': 'Wasu ma’aikatanmu suna aiki daga nesa akaro na farko.', 'en': ' Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time. '}

{'ha': 'Abokai aikinmu na nesa sun san cewar zai iya zaman daidaitawa ne, kuma suna son su bada shawara.', 'en': ' Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice: '}
{'ha': 'A rage tsawon tattaunawa zuwa dai awa daya ko biyu a jere.', 'en': ' Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments. '}

{'ha': 'Idan ana buƙatar tsawan lokaci, yi tunani yadda za a rarraba su a cikin kwanakin gaba da yawa.', 'en': ' If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days. '}
{'ha': 'Ƙayyade haduwar sosai, sami dalilin taron, da tura da kayayyakin karatu.', 'en': ' Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance. '}

{'ha': 'Ka sanya bidiyo yazama na ainihi, da kayan aiki irin su Google Docs da Zoom don sauƙaƙe saduwa da sadarwa na kai tsaye ta hanyar intanet.', 'en': ' Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection. '}

{'ha': 'Yi jagora don sauƙaƙewar kowane taro, wani don saka idanu akan tattaunawa don tambayoyi da bibiyar jerin masu magana, da kuma wani don taimakawa wajen daukar bayanan (ko hadin gwiwan daukan-rubutu).', 'en': ' Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking). '}
{'ha': 'Ka tura sakon imel ga tech support idan kan bukata na’urar sa a kune wato headset wanda ke da dadi.', 'en': ' Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset. '}
{'ha': 'Yi amfani da abin kara lafiyar ka a matsayin abun ciye-ciye.', 'en': ' Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks. '}
{'ha': 'Shiga tashar #remoties a Slack domin tatauna da abokan aiki game da rarrabawar aiki.', 'en': ' Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work '}

{'ha': 'Ayyukan HR tana neman jagora cikin jagorar tushen ginin gizon ergonomics don tallafawa karuwan rarraba aikin a fadin Gidauniyar.', 'en': ' The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation. '}

{'ha': 'Mun tambayi dukan al’uma a makon da ta gabata su ba magajiya su sauke tallafin kudin Wikimedia ga jama’a, kamar editathons, har sai WHO tace annobar ya kare.', 'en': ' This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over. '}

{'ha': 'Mun sanar da cewa mun fahimta bukatun mu na dakatar da wasu ƙuntatawa zai sa gamawar yarjejeniyan tallafin kudin su da wuya da cewa babu wani wanda za a hukuna domin bata lokaci ko gyara manufofin.', 'en': ' We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals. '}

{'ha': 'Zamu sake bi da karin jagorori cikin mako mai zuwa kan Wikimedia da wasu yanki da taron al’uma yadda aka saba.', 'en': ' This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences. '}

{'ha': 'Tunanin mutane gabaki daya daga al’uman duniya ya nuna zaman a matsayin bakin ciki da rushewa amma an sake a ganawa maikyau da karfin mai da hankali a kan al’umai, Wikimedia da in ba haka ba.', 'en': ' The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise. '}

{'ha': 'Cin gaba, CRT tana aiki wajen samar da shafi ta META-WIKI don samar da fili don al’uma zasu lura kuma su rika bin dukkanin bayananmu da su.', 'en': ' Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them. '}
{'ha': 'Kasance cikin lura da duk abinda ya shafi COVID-19', 'en': ' Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues '}

{'ha': 'Zamu tura muku da gayyatar ta kalanda Ranar Alhamis mai zuwa, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT don taron na mussamma ga ma’aikatan mu.', 'en': ' We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting. '}

{'ha': 'Za mu yi amfani da wannan lokacin don raba ƙarin sabuntawa, amsa tambayoyin kuma kashe ɗan lokaci kaɗan don haɗu da juna.', 'en': ' We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other. '}
{'ha': 'Muna cikin wannan tare kuma muna nan mu taimaki duk yadda za mu iya.', 'en': ' We’re in this together and here to help however we can. '}

{'ha': 'A dan lokaci nan, zaku iya samun bayanan na ta wannan imel, da kuma wurin da ya shafi bayanai iri daya na COVID-19 kan Office Wiki,', 'en': ' In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki. '}
{'ha': 'CRT kan aje shafukan ne da kyau da dukan bayanaia wuri guda.', 'en': ' The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place. '}

{'ha': "Muna aiki don ci gaba da sadarwa tare da ma'aikata waɗanda suke zaune a cikin ƙasashen da a halin yanzu suke shafa.", 'en': ' We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected. '}

{'ha': 'Idan kana da tambaya game da yin tafiya, ko wani sha’ani, ko wani aiki, ko cike gurbi ko wani abu to kana bukatar taimako kar kaji komai ka sanar damu ka ba CRT goyon baya.', 'en': ' If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT. '}
{'ha': 'Muna nan don mu bada taimakon mu da tallafi idan an bukaci hakan.', 'en': ' We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed. '}

{'ha': 'Idan kana da wani abu mai muhimmanci ko al’amari mai bukatar kulawa, don Allah ka tura sakon imel ga Bryan Judan - Darectan HR International Global Operations.', 'en': ' If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations. '}
{'ha': 'Kada a ga wadannan canje-canje a matsayin barin aiki gaba daya da takalifi.', 'en': ' None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations. '}

{'ha': 'Maimakon haka, suna sanen cewa a wannan lokacin, aikin mu da takalifin kan iya buƙaci daidaitawa ta hanyar da ba mu yi ba a da.', 'en': ' Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past. '}

{'ha': 'Wadannan sune matakan da muke gani yana da muhimmanci domin tallafawa juna sabo da mu ci gaba da gudanar da aiki, mu samar wa kungiyar mu da taimakon da suke bukata, da aikin da duniya ta dogara.', 'en': ' These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on. '}
{'ha': 'Tsarin aikin mu na nan kuma na kan jiran mu idan lokacin ya yi.', 'en': ' Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes. '}

{'ha': 'A yanzu, lokaci ne na kula da juna a kuma samar da wuri domin muhimancin aikin da ke zuwa cikin makonai da watakila watanai masu zuwa.', 'en': ' For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead. '}

{'ha': 'Muna bukatan goyon bayan ku wajen tabbatar da hakan ta yiwu, don haka muna so ku kula da kan ku da iyalan ku don kusamu damar taimakawar idan bukatan haka ta taso.', 'en': ' We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises. '}
{'ha': 'Yanzu, don Allah - ku wanke hannuwanku kuma kada ku taɓa fuskarku!', 'en': ' Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face! '}

{'ha': 'Katherine, ita CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), tare da sauran shuwagabanni (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, da Toby N).', 'en': ' Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N). '}

{'ha': 'Juyawar b’Angiotensin enzyme na 2 (ACE2) wani enzyme ne wanda aka haɗe zuwa saman farfajiya (membranes cell) na sel a cikin huhu, arteries, zuciya, koda, da hanji.', 'en': "b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines."}

{'ha': 'ACE2 yana ƙididdige ayyukan aikin enzyme mai alaƙa da haɗin gwiwa (ACE) ta hanyar rage yawan ƙwayar angiotensin-II da haɓaka Ang (1-7) yana sanya shi manufa mai mahimmanci don magance cututtukan zuciya. ACE2 kuma yana aiki azaman hanyar shiga cikin sel don wasu coronaviruses.', 'en': 'ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.'}
{'ha': 'Irin ra’ayi enzyme na dan Adam ana kiransa hACE2.', 'en': 'The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.'}

{'ha': 'Ingantaccen enzyme na Angiotensin 2 shine zinc wanda ke dauke da ironloenzyme wanda yake a saman endothelial da sauran sel.', 'en': 'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.'}

{'ha': 'Abubuwan gina jiki na ACE2 ya ƙunshi yanki na N-terminal peptidase M2 da yankin C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transportar domain.', 'en': 'ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.'}

{'ha': "ACE2 nau'ikan furotin membrane ne mai wucewa, tare da yanki mai aiki na enzymatically wanda yake fallasa saman sel a cikin huhu da sauran kyallen jiki.", 'en': 'ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.'}

{'ha': 'Yankin extracellular na ACE2 an barke shi daga yanki mai ƙwayar cuta ta wani enzyme da aka sani da zubar da jini, kuma sakamakon furotin mai narkewa ana fitar dashi cikin magudanar jini kuma a ƙarshe ya kasance cikin fitsari.', 'en': 'The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.'}

{'ha': 'ACE2 yana nan cikin yawancin gabobin: ACE2 na haɗu da fatar mafi yawa nau’in huhu II na tantanin halitar alveolar, enterocytes na ƙananan hanji, jijiya da ƙwayoyin jijiyoyin tantanin halita na zuciya da kuma ƙwayoyin tsoka mai laushi a cikin yawancin gabobin.', 'en': 'ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.'}

{'ha': 'ACE2 MRNA bayanana ana iya samun su a cerebral cortex, straitum hypotamalamus da briainstem.', 'en': 'ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.'}
{'ha': "Aikin farko na ACE2 shine tsaya a matsayin daidaita ma'auni ga ACE.", 'en': 'The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.'}
{'ha': 'ACE ta kuntatawa angiotensin I hormone cikin vasoconstricting angiotensin II.', 'en': 'ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.'}

{'ha': 'ACE2 bi da bi ya kuntatawa da carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine daga angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) da hydrolyses shi cikin vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg -Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).', 'en': 'ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).'}

{'ha': 'ACE2 na iya share wasu peptides da suka hada da [des-Arg9] -bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, da ghrelin.', 'en': 'ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.'}

{'ha': 'ACE2 kuma yana daidaita fataucin membrane na tsaka mai ɗaukar amino acid SLC6A19 kuma yana da nasaba da cutar ta Hartnup.', 'en': "ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease."}

{'ha': 'A matsayin transmembrane furotin, ACE2 na aiki a matsayin babban hanyar shiga cikin tantanin halita (Cell) ga wasu coronavirus, hade da HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (kwayar cuta da ke haifar da SARS); da SARS-CoV-2 (kwayar cuta da ke haifar da COVID-19).', 'en': 'As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).'}

{'ha': 'mussaman kamar dai hadewar protein spike s1 na sars-cov da sars-cov2 do hadewa majinyacin a ACE2 a sansanin kwayar halitta wanda sakakmakon haka na haifar da endocytosis da translocation na cutar da ma kwayar hallitar a cikin endosome wanda ce a cikin cells.', 'en': 'More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.'}

{'ha': 'mashigar na tar-tare da dukkan kaidojin priming na S protein na daga maajin serine protease TMPRSS2, da samuwar wanda ake bincikawa a yanzua matsayin babban thrapeutic. wanan ya jagoranci saukar kintaci a matakin na ACE2, a cikin cells, wada ka iya taimakawa wajen kokawa da cutar.', 'en': 'This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.'}

{'ha': 'ko da kuwa ya yawan su alummar kwarraru dama sun bukaci cigaba da tsarin ACE inhibitor dama ARB therapyh.', 'en': 'However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.'}

{'ha': 'wane sake duba aka wallalfa a yuly 11 na 2012 wanda ya gano ACE inhibitiors nada alaka da kaso 34% na ragin sanyi in ka kwatanta da maaunan.', 'en': 'A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."'}

{'ha': 'kura hadarin sanyi aka bawa majinyatan ACE inhibitors wanda ka daf da kamuwa da sanyoi. ko mutuwar jiki ko zuciya.', 'en': 'Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.'}

{'ha': 'Amfani da masu hana kwayoyin cuta na ACE shima yana da alaƙa da rage yawan mace-macen huhu, kodayake sakamakon da aka samu ba shi da ƙima baya ga haɗarin cutar huhu.', 'en': 'Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."'}

{'ha': 'Haduwar tantanin halita mutum wato Recombination human ACE2 (rhACE2) ana zaton zaman jinyar tsanani ciwon huhu, ya bayyana zuwa ingantawar aikin huhun da isashen iska a cikin kananan aledu da jawowar cututtukar lipopolysaccharide wanda ke haifar alamun tsananin gajiyar hanyar numfashi.', 'en': 'Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.'}

{'ha': 'rabin ran RHACE2 a mutane na da sa’a 10 da aikin dakika 30 ciki harda karin aikin sa’a 24.', 'en': 'The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.'}

{'ha': 'Yawancin binciken da aka samu sun nuna cewa rhACE2 na iya zama magani wadanda basa jureyar renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) ko a cututtuka in da kewayewar anglotensin II na ɗaukaka. An kimanta rhACE2 wanda aka cika a gwajin asibiti domin jinyar alamun tsananin gajiyar hanyar numfashi.', 'en': 'Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.'}

{'ha': 'b\'COVID-19 sune aikace-aikacen software na wayar hannu waɗanda aka tsara don taimaka wajan tuntuɓar ganowa don mayar da martani ga cutar ta coronavirus ta 2019-20, watau aiwatar da gano mutane ("lambobin sadarwa") waɗanda wataƙila sun kasance suna hulɗa da mutumin da ya kamu.', 'en': 'b\'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.'}

{'ha': 'neman shiga da dama aka kero ko samo, amman da tallafin gwamnati a wasu yankunan da mazaunan bayannane.', 'en': 'Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.'}
{'ha': 'tsari da dama dan gano wanda aka yi alaka dasu aka bijiro.', 'en': 'Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.'}

{'ha': 'An tayar da damuwar sirri, musamman game da tsarin da ya danganta ga bin wuraren kasashen masu amfani da manahaja.', 'en': 'Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.'}

{'ha': 'karamin wani KAFAR na amfani da iska don shiga sansanin yanar wassu wayoyin.', 'en': "Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones."}

{'ha': 'A ranar 10 ga Afrilu 2020, Google da Apple sun ba da sanarwar cewa za su haɗu da ayyuka don tallafa wa irin waɗannan aikace-aikacen da ke cikin Bluetooth kai tsaye a cikin tsarin aikinsu na Android da iOS.', 'en': 'On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.'}

{'ha': "A cikin China, gwamnatin kasar, tare da hadin gwiwar Alipay, ta tura wani manahaja wanda barin 'yan ƙasa damar bincika idan sun kasance suna hulɗa da mutanen da ke da cutar COVID-19.", 'en': 'In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.'}

{'ha': 'Ana amfani da shi sama da biranen China fiye da 200. A Singapore, ana amfani da wani app da ake kira TraceTogether.', 'en': 'It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.'}

{'ha': 'Al\'umar gida na IT ne suka kirkiro manahanjar, an sake shi a matsayin budade ne kuma za a mika shi ga gwamnati. Arewacin Makidoniya ta ƙaddamar da "StopKorona!", Wata manahanja ce ta Bluetooth don gano haɗarin daga mutanen da ke kamuwa da kwaya cutar kuma suna ba da amsa ga hukumomin lafiya.', 'en': 'The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.'}
{'ha': "Ma'aikatar Sadarwa da Fasaha da Ma'aikatar Kiwon lafiya ne suka kirkiri app din.", 'en': 'The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.'}

{'ha': 'Tun daga ranar 14 ga watan Afrilu 2020, app ɗin yana jiran amincewa daga Google Play Store da Apple App Store.', 'en': 'As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.'}

{'ha': 'ranar 12 ga watan afrilu gwamnatin tace bibiyar muammal ta manhaja na ciki zanon jigaba kuma an kusa sakin shi cikin makwanin makamanciyar wannan manhaja ake kir kira a ireland da mma faransa stopcovid.', 'en': 'On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").'}

{'ha': "Dukansu Ostiraliya da New Zealand suna la'akari da aikace-aikacen da aka yi amfani da su dangane da TraceTogether app na Singapore da yarjejeniya ta BlueTrace. Rasha ta yi niyyar gabatar da wani babban juzu'i na kayan aiki ga marasa lafiya da aka gano tare da COVID-19 da ke zaune a Moscow, wanda aka tsara don tabbatar da cewa ba su bar gida ba.", 'en': "Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home."}

{'ha': "Ross Anderson, farfesa a fannin injiniya na tsaro a Jami'ar Cambridge, ya lissafa wasu matsaloli masu yuwuwar aiwatar da tsare-tsaren aikace-aikacen na yanar gizo, gami da karairayi na karya da kuma yiwuwar rashin inganci idan shan kayan aikin zai iyakance ne ga karancin al'umma.", 'en': 'Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.'}

{'ha': 'Magance damuwa game da yaudarar yaduwar ko cutarwar manhajar “coronavirus”, Apple ta seta iyaka a bisan irin na’uin da kungiya za su iya sa wanda ke da alaka da coronavirus a cikin shagon manhaja, iyakance su kawai “jami’oi” ko wasu kungiya da ke sananne.', 'en': 'Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.'}
{'ha': 'Google da amazon sun aiwatar da ƙuntatawa iri daya.', 'en': 'Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.'}

{'ha': "Masu tallata bayanan sirri sun bayyana damuwar su game da tasirin sa ido tsakanin jama'a ta amfani da kayan aikin coronavirus, musamman game da ko kayayyakin aikin sa ido da aka kirkira don magance cutar ta Coronavirus za a watsar da zarar barazanar ta wuce.", 'en': 'Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.'}

{'ha': "Kungiyar kare hakkin dan adam ta Amnesty International da wasu kungiyoyi sama da 100 sun fitar da sanarwa suna kiran a takaita wannan nau'in sa ido.", 'en': 'Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.'}
{'ha': 'Kungiyoyin sun bayana yanayi takwas a kan ayyukan gwamnati:', 'en': 'The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:'}
{'ha': 'Dole ne ayyukan sa ido su kasance “bisa doka, sannan ya zama ana bukatar sa, kuma daidai gwargwado”.', 'en': 'surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";'}
{'ha': 'buda ko kula da bibini na iya samun yammacin.', 'en': 'extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;'}
{'ha': 'yin amfani da bayanai ya zama dole ne a taƙaice ga dalilai na COVID-19;', 'en': 'the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;'}

{'ha': "Dole ne a kiyaye bayanan sirri da kuma ba da ma'amala kuma a nuna a kiyaye shi bisa dalilai;", 'en': 'data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;'}
{'ha': 'Saka ido kan marasa lafiya ta hanyar na’uran dijital dole ne a guje wariaya da raban kai.', 'en': 'digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;'}
{'ha': 'duk wani musayar bayanai tare da wasu dole ne a ayyana shi a cikin doka;', 'en': 'any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;'}

{'ha': "Akwai kiyayewa daga zagi da kuma hakkin 'yan kasa don mayar da martani ga cin zarafin;", 'en': 'there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;'}

{'ha': 'Shiga tataunawar da ma’ana ga dukkan masu fada aji ake bukata, dama na ma’aikatan kiwon lafiya da kungiyoyi gammayayar kungiyanr na’urar jamus CCC da ma yan jarida marasa iyaka (Reporter ohne Grenzen) RSF suma sun fidda sunayen dubawa.', 'en': 'meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.'}

{'ha': 'Tsarin Google / Apple da aka gabatar ya yi niyya don magance matsalar ci gaba da sa ido ta hanyar cire hanyar ganowa daga cikin tsarin aikin na’urar su muddin ba a bukatar hakan.', 'en': 'The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.'}

{'ha': 'wasu kasashen sun yi amfani da bibiyar inda ake a maimakon manhajojin wanda ke fitar da amfanin sauke manhajar da kuma kare bibiyar in da ake.', 'en': 'Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.'}
{'ha': 'A cikin Isra’ila, an amince da bincika hanyoyin sadarwa.', 'en': 'In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.'}

{'ha': 'Mafita hanyoyin sadarwa waɗanda ke da damar yin amfani da bayanan albarkatun wuri suna da mahimmancin nuna matsalolin sirri.', 'en': 'Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.'}

{'ha': 'Koyaya, ba duk tsarin da sabobin tsakiya ke buƙatar samun damar zuwa wurin bayanan sirri ba; da yawa tsarin tsare sirri na sirri wadanda aka kirkira wadanda suke amfani da sabobin tsakiya kawai don sadarwa (duba sashin da ke ƙasa).', 'en': 'However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).'}
{'ha': 'A Korea ta Kudu wata kafa ce ba manhaja ba akayi amfani da ita wajen gano muammala.', 'en': 'In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.'}

{'ha': "Maimakon yin amfani da tsararren manahaja (app), tsarin ya tattara bayanan bin diddigin abubuwa daga kafofin da yawa haɗe da bayanan waya da bayanan ma'amala na katin, da haɗa waɗannan don haifar da sanarwa ta hanyar saƙonnin rubutu ga mutane masu kamuwa da cuta.", 'en': 'Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.'}

{'ha': 'Baya ga yin amfani da wannan bayanin don faɗakar da abokan hulɗa, gwamnatin ta kuma sanya bayanan wurin a bayyane, wani abin da aka ba da izini saboda canje-canje masu yawa ga dokokin sirri bayan fashewar MERS a waccan ƙasar.', 'en': 'In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.'}

{'ha': "Ana amfani da wannan bayanin ga jama'a ta hanyar wasu aikace-aikace da shafukan yanar gizo. Asusun da ya haɗa da Jamus an yi amfani da su ta amfani da tsarin tsarke da tsare sirri.", 'en': 'This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.'}
{'ha': 'a ranar 6 ga watan Afrilu 2020, ba bayanin da aka saki tukkunna.', 'en': 'As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.'}

{'ha': 'Tsare bayanan sirri na tuntuɓar ganowa ingantaccen tsari ne, tare da ingantaccen jikin littafin binciken waɗanda suka fara komawa aƙalla shekarar 2013. Tun daga 7 Afrilu 2020, sama da gwanayen kwararru goma sha biyu suna aiki akan mafita na sirri, kamar amfani da Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) don rattaba kusanci ga mai amfani da sauran wayoyin salula.', 'en': "Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones."}

{'ha': "Duk da haka, PEPP-PT ƙoƙari ne na haɗin gwiwar wanda ya ƙunshi duka hanyoyin tsakiya da kuma hanyoyin sassauƙa, ba yarjejeniya ɗaya ba. Ka'idojin da aka ba da sun hada da Kan Sirri na Shaida (DP-PPT / DP-3T), Lambobin Gida na Lokaci (TCN, fka ayyukar lambobin haduwa, CEN), Tsarin Sirrin da Tsarin Hanyoyi don Binciken Sadarwar Waya (PACT) da sauran su.", 'en': 'However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.'}

{'ha': 'janssen na kirkiro magani na rowa tare da abokin huldar shir wadan ya kware a dakin gwaji vaxart.', 'en': 'Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.'}

{'ha': 'A ranar 18 ga watan Maris 2020, Emergent BioSolutions sun ba da sanarwar hadin gwiwan sarrafawa tare da Vaxart don haɓakar maganin rigakafi.', 'en': 'On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.'}

{'ha': 'A ranar 8 ga Fabrairu 2020, dakin gwaje-gwaje na OncoGen a Romania sun buga takarda kan ƙirar rigakafin tare da fasaha mai kama da wannan don maganin rigakafin cutar kansa.', 'en': 'On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.'}

{'ha': 'A ranar 25 Ga Watan Maris Shugaban Makarantar Bincike ya sanar cewa sun gama hadawar Rigakafin kuma and fara gwajin ta.', 'en': 'On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.'}

{'ha': 'A ranar 27 ga Fabrairu 2020, wani kamfanin tallafi na Generex, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, ya ba da sanarwar cewa sun fara aikin rigakafin cutar don kirkirar wani allurar rigakafin Ii-Key a kan COVID-19.', 'en': 'On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.'}
{'ha': 'Suna So Su Samar Da Rigakafin Da Za A Iya Gwada Shi A Kan Mutum “A tsakanin Kwanaki 90.”', 'en': 'They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."'}

{'ha': "A ranar 5 Maris 2020, Jami'ar Washington da ke St. Louis ta ba da sanarwar ayyukanta don bunkasa allurar rigakafi.", 'en': 'On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.'}

{'ha': 'A rana 5 ga watan Maris 2020, aurka makarantar sojin ta su n vyi vbincvike a fort derick da walter reed da makarantar bincike na silver spring duk a western mary lant sun sanar da aikin ne man nagani.', 'en': 'On 5 March 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on a vaccine.'}

{'ha': "A kusan 10 Maris 2020, Emergent Biosolutions ya ba da sanarwar cewa ta yi ma'amala tare da Novavax Inc.", 'en': 'Around 10 March 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had teamed with Novavax Inc.'}
{'ha': 'a hadin da ma kir-kirar magani.', 'en': 'in the development and manufacture of a vaccine.'}

{'ha': 'Abokan haɗin gwiwar sun kara ba da sanarwar shirye-shiryen gwajin fari da Mataki I na gwajin asibiti a watan Yuli 2020.', 'en': 'The partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial by July 2020.'}

{'ha': "A ranar 12 Maris 2020, Ma'aikatar Lafiya ta Indiya ta sanar da cewa suna aiki tare da kebe guda 11, kuma koda akan saurin sauri zai ɗauki akalla shekara ɗaya da rabi zuwa shekara biyu don samar da maganin.", 'en': "On 12 March 2020, India's Health Ministry announced they are working with 11 isolates, and that even on a fast track it would take at least around one-and-a-half to two years to develop a vaccine."}

{'ha': 'A ranar 12 ga watan Maris 2020, Medicago, kamfani a fannin ilimin halittu a Birnin Quebec, Quebec, ya ba da rahoton ci gaban coronavirus-kamar ɓarke ƙarƙashin ɓangare na kudade daga Makarantun Kanada don Binciken Kiwon Lafiya.', 'en': 'On 12 March 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported development of a coronavirus-like particle under partial funding from the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.'}

{'ha': 'Maganin riga kafin da ake gwaji Na Cikin Dakin Bincike, Da tsarin gwajin a watan Yuly Ko AuGusta 2020.', 'en': 'The vaccine candidate is in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.'}

{'ha': "A farkon makon nan, Jaridar The Guardian ta bayar da rahoton cewa Shugaban Amurka Donald Trump ya yi wa CureVac '' kudade masu yawa 'don damar samun damar yin amfani da allurar rigakafin cutar ta' 'Covid-19', wanda gwamnatin Jamus ta nuna rashin amincewarta.", 'en': 'Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that the US President Donald Trump had offered CureVac "\'large sums of money\' for exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine", against which the German government protested.'}

{'ha': 'Ranar 17 ga watan Maris 2020, Kamfanin maganin Amurka Pfizer ta sanar da hadin gwiwa tare da kamfanin BioNTech na Jamus don haɓaka rigakafi irin ta mRNA.', 'en': 'On 17 March 2020, American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop a mRNA-based vaccine.'}

{'ha': 'magani irin na mRNA-based dan bNT162, wanda a yanzu ke cikin gwajin lafiya ana tsamanin shi a april 2020.', 'en': 'mRNA-based vaccine candidate BNT162, currently in pre-clinical testing with clinical trials expected to begin in April 2020.'}

{'ha': 'A Italiya a ranar 17 Maris 2020, Takis Biotech, wani kamfani na ilimin kimiyyar kere-kere na Italiya ya sanar da cewa za su sami sakamakon gwajin-asibiti a watan Afrilu 2020 kuma dan takarar na karshe na rigakafin cutar zai iya fara gwajin dan adam da faduwa.', 'en': 'In Italy on 17 March 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotech company announced they will have pre-clinical testing results in April 2020 and their final vaccine candidate could begin human testing by fall.'}

{'ha': "A Faransa a ranar 19 Maris 2020, Kungiyar Hadin Gwiwa game da Cike da cuta (CEPI) ta sanar da saka hannun jari na dala miliyan $ 4.9 a cikin wata cibiyar bincike ta COVID-19 wacce ta shafi Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), da Jami'ar Pittsburgh, suna kawowa, Jami'ar Pittsburgh, suna kawowa Jami'ar Pittsburgh, suna kawo Kudaden hannun jarin CEPI a cikin ci gaban allurar rigakafin COVID-19 zuwa dala miliyan 29.", 'en': "In France on 19 March 2020, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment in COVID-19 vaccine development to US$29 million."}

{'ha': "Sauran abokan hadin gwiwar CEPI don ci gaban allurar rigakafin COVID-19 sune Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, Jami'ar Hong Kong, Jami'ar Oxford, da Jami'ar Queensland.", 'en': "CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford, and the University of Queensland."}

{'ha': 'A ranar 20 ga Maris 2020, jami’an kiwon lafiya na kasar Rasha sun ba da sanarwar cewa masana kimiyya sun fara gwajin dabbobi daban-daban ‘yan takarar rigakafi shida.', 'en': 'On 20 March 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists have begun animal testing of six different vaccine candidates.'}

{'ha': 'Masu binciken Kwalejin Kwaleji ta Landan sun sanar a ranar 20 ga Maris 2020 cewa suna haɓaka maganin RNA na karɓar kansa don COVID-19.', 'en': 'Imperial College London researchers announced on 20 March 2020 that they are developing a self-amplifying RNA vaccine for COVID-19.'}
{'ha': 'Aka haɓaka maganin rigakafin cikin kwanaki 14 ya inda aka samo jerin gwajin daga China.', 'en': 'The vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.'}

{'ha': "A ƙarshen watan Maris, gwamnatin Kanada ta ba da sanarwan miliyan C$275 a cikin kudade don ayyukan bincike na 96 a kan magungunan ƙetare game da COVID-19, hade da takara da yawa na allurar rigakafi a kamfanoni da jami'o'in Kanada, kamar ayyukan Medicago da Jami'ar Saskatchewan.", 'en': 'In late March, the Canadian government announced C$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities, such as the Medicago and University of Saskatchewan initiatives.'}

{'ha': 'A kusan lokaci guda, Gwamnatin Kanada ta ba da miliyan C$192 musamman don inganta allurar rigakafin COVID-19, tare da shirye-shiryen kafa "bankin maganin rigakafin" na ƙasa na wasu sabbin alluran rigakafin da za a iya amfani da su idan wani barkewar cutar coronavirus ya faru.', 'en': 'Around the same time, the Canadian government announced C$192 million specifically for developing a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.'}

{'ha': 'A ranar 2 ga Afrilu 2020, masu bincike a Jami\'ar Pittsburgh makarantar ilimin magani sun ba da rahoto game da gwajin PittCoVacc, yiwuwar maganin rigakafin COVID-19 a cikin beraye, yana mai cewa "MNA ta ba da ƙarancin SARS-CoV-2 S1 allurar rigakafin ta nuna yiwuwar antigen-specific amsawar garkuwar jiki [a cikin bera] wadanda suka fara bayyana makonni 2 bayan alurar rigakafi."', 'en': 'On 2 April 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported on testing of PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccines elicited potent antigen-specific antibody responses [in the mice] that were evident beginning 2 weeks after immunization."'}

{'ha': 'a canada a ranar 16 ga watan afrilu 2020, makarantar magunguna karkashin jamiar waterloo sun sanar da feshin hanci a matsayin maganin su na kwayar halittar DNA.', 'en': 'In Canada on 16 April 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a possible nasal spray.'}
